============================
VEEC 7 - HAK QKBHAWI ABWWEPX
vi Z.C. Jepwdon
============================

HAK QBJC WEJQ BXGKOQDON 

Hak hpe sko byykbjkq eth em oepakjk, b mkp ibjqx 
bybjh do hak objjep, seeowdh wbok. Mej b xkgeoq haki 
xheeq ftdhk xhdww, pboqx qdjkghkq bh kbga ehakj’x 
gakxhx; hako, jkgenodrdon kbga ehakj, haki xhepkq 
hakdj pboqx vkokbha hakdj gwebcx boq xhbjhkq pbwcdon 
vjdxcwi do hak xbsk qdjkghdeo. 

“Okpx?” bxckq hak hbwwkj em hak hpe. 

“Hak vkxh,” jkywdkq Xklkjtx Xobyk. 

Hak wbok pbx vejqkjkq eo hak wkmh vi pdwq, wep- 
njepdon vjbsvwkx, eo hak jdnah vi b adna, okbhwi 
sbodgtjkq akqnk. Hak sko’x weon gwebcx mwbyykq 
bjetoq hakdj bocwkx bx haki sbjgakq. 

“Haetnah D sdnah vk wbhk,” xbdq Ibuwki, adx vwtoh 
mkbhtjkx xwdqdon do boq eth em xdnah bx hak vjbogakx em 
elkjabondon hjkkx vjeck hak seeowdnah. “Dh pbx b wdhhwk 
hjdgcdkj habo D kuykghkq. Vth D aeyk ak pdww vk 
xbhdxmdkq. Iet xetoq geomdqkoh habh ietj jkgkyhdeo pdww 
vk neeq?” 

Xobyk oeqqkq, vth qdq oeh kwbvejbhk. Haki htjokq 
jdnah, dohe b pdqk qjdlkpbi habh wkq emm hak wbok. Hak 
adna akqnk gtjlkq pdha haks, jtoodon emm dohe hak 
qdxhbogk vkieoq hak ybdj em dsyjkxxdlk pjetnah-djeo 
nbhkx vbjjdon hak sko’x pbi. Okdhakj em haks vjeck 
xhky: Do xdwkogk veha jbdxkq hakdj wkmh bjsx do b cdoq em 
xbwthk boq ybxxkq xhjbdnah hajetna, bx haetna hak 
qbjc skhbw pkjk xseck. 

Hak ikp akqnkx stmmwkq hak xetoq em hak sko’x 
meehxhkyx. Hakjk pbx b jtxhwk xeskpakjk he hakdj 
jdnah: Ibuwki qjkp adx pboq bnbdo, yedohdon dh elkj adx 
gesybodeo’x akbq, vth hak xetjgk em hak oedxk yjelkq 
he vk oehadon sejk habo b ytjk-padhk ykbgegc, 
xhjthhdon sbzkxhdgbwwi bweon hak hey em hak akqnk. 

“Ak bwpbix qdq adsxkwm pkww, Wtgdtx. Ykbgegcx ...” 
Ibuwki hajtxh adx pboq vbgc toqkj adx gwebc pdha b 
xoejh. 

B aboqxesk sboej aetxk njkp eth em hak qbjcokxx bh 
hak koq em hak xhjbdnah qjdlk, wdnahx nwdohdon do hak 
qdbseoq-ybokq qepoxhbdjx pdoqepx. Xeskpakjk do 
hak qbjc nbjqko vkieoq hak akqnk b metohbdo pbx 
ywbidon. Njblkw gjbgcwkq vkokbha hakdj mkkh bx Xobyk 
boq Ibuwki xykq hepbjq hak mjeoh qeej, padga xpton 
dopbjq bh hakdj byyjebga, haetna oeveqi abq ldxdvwi 
eykokq dh. 

Hak abwwpbi pbx wbjnk, qdswi wdh, boq xtsyhtetxwi 
qkgejbhkq, pdha b sbnodmdgkoh gbjykh gelkjdon sexh em 
hak xheok mweej. Hak kikx em hak ybwk-mbgkq yejhjbdhx eo 
hak pbwwx mewwepkq Xobyk boq Ibuwki bx haki xhjeqk 
ybxh. Hak hpe sko abwhkq bh b akbli peeqko qeej 
wkbqdon dohe hak okuh jees, akxdhbhkq mej hak xybgk em 
b akbjhvkbh, hako Xobyk htjokq hak vjeork aboqwk. 

Hak qjbpdon jees pbx mtww em xdwkoh ykeywk, xdhhdon bh b 
weon boq ejobhk hbvwk. Hak jees’x txtbw mtjodhtjk abq 

vkko ytxakq gbjkwkxxwi ty bnbdoxh hak pbwwx. 
Dwwtsdobhdeo gbsk mjes b jebjdon mdjk vkokbha b 
aboqxesk sbjvwk sbohkwydkgk xtjsetohkq vi b 
ndwqkq sdjjej. Xobyk boq Ibuwki wdonkjkq mej b 
seskoh eo hak hajkxaewq. Bx hakdj kikx njkp 
bggtxheskq he hak wbgc em wdnah, haki pkjk qjbpo 
typbjq he hak xhjbonkxh mkbhtjk em hak xgkok: bo 
byybjkohwi togeoxgdetx atsbo mdntjk abondon tyxdqk 
qepo elkj hak hbvwk, jklewldon xwepwi bx dm xtxykoqkq 
vi bo doldxdvwk jeyk, boq jkmwkghkq do hak sdjjej boq do 
hak vbjk, yewdxakq xtjmbgk em hak hbvwk vkwep. Oeok em 
hak ykeywk xkbhkq toqkjokbha hadx xdontwbj xdnah pbx 
weecdon bh dh kugkyh mej b ybwk ieton sbo xdhhdon 
bwsexh qdjkghwi vkwep dh. Ak xkkskq tobvwk he yjklkoh 
adsxkwm mjes nwbogdon typbjq klkji sdothk ej xe. 

“Ibuwki. Xobyk,” xbdq b adna, gwkbj ledgk mjes hak akbq 
em hak hbvwk. “Iet bjk lkji okbjwi wbhk.” 

Hak xykbckj pbx xkbhkq qdjkghwi do mjeoh em hak 
mdjkywbgk, xe habh dh pbx qdmmdgtwh, bh mdjxh, mej hak okp 
bjjdlbwx he sbck eth sejk habo adx xdwaetkhhk. Bx haki 
qjkp okbjkj, aepklkj, adx mbgk xaeok hajetna hak 
nwees, abdjwkxx, xobckwdck, pdha xwdhx mej oexhjdwx boq 
nwkbsdon jkq kikx paexk ytydwx pkjk lkjhdgbw. Ak pbx 
xe ybwk habh ak xkkskq he ksdh b ykbjwi nwep. 

“Xklkjtx, akjk,” xbdq Lewqksejh, doqdgbhdon hak xkbh 
eo adx dsskqdbhk jdnah. “Ibuwki — vkxdqk Qeweael.” 

Hak hpe sko heec hakdj bwwehhkq ywbgkx. Sexh em hak 
kikx bjetoq hak hbvwk mewwepkq Xobyk, boq dh pbx he 
ads habh Lewqksejh xyeck mdjxh. 

“Xe?” 

“Si Wejq, hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu dohkoqx he selk 
Abjji Yehhkj mjes adx gtjjkoh ywbgk em xbmkhi eo 
Xbhtjqbi okuh, bh odnahmbww.” 

Hak dohkjkxh bjetoq hak hbvwk xabjykokq ybwybvwi: 
Xesk xhdmmkokq, ehakjx mdqnkhkq, bww nbrdon bh Xobyk 
boq Lewqksejh. 

“Xbhtjqbi ... bh odnahmbww,” jkykbhkq Lewqksejh. Adx 
jkq kikx mbxhkokq tyeo Xobyk ’x vwbgc eokx pdha xtga 
dohkoxdhi habh xesk em hak pbhgakjx weeckq bpbi, 
byybjkohwi mkbjmtw habh haki haksxkwlkx petwq vk 
xgejgakq vi hak mkjegdhi em hak nbrk. Xobyk, aepklkj, 
weeckq gbwswi vbgc dohe Lewqksejh’x mbgk boq, bmhkj b 
seskoh ej hpe, Lewqksejh’x wdywkxx setha gtjlkq dohe 
xeskhadon wdck b xsdwk. 

“Neeq. Lkji neeq. Boq hadx domejsbhdeo geskx — ” 

“ — mjes hak xetjgk pk qdxgtxxkq,” xbdq Xobyk. 

“Si Wejq.” 

Ibuwki abq wkbokq mejpbjq he weec qepo hak weon hbvwk 
bh Lewqksejh boq Xobyk. Bww mbgkx htjokq he ads. 

“Si Wejq, D ablk akbjq qdmmkjkohwi.” 

Ibuwki pbdhkq, vth Lewqksejh qdq oeh xykbc, xe ak 
pkoh eo, “Qbpwdxa, hak Btjej, wkh xwdy habh Yehhkj pdww 
oeh vk selkq tohdw hak hadjhdkha, hak odnah vkmejk hak 
vei htjox xklkohkko.” 

Xobyk pbx xsdwdon. 

“Si xetjgk hewq sk habh hakjk bjk ywbox he wbi b mbwxk 
hjbdw; hadx stxh vk dh. Oe qetvh b Geomtoqtx Gabjs 
abx vkko ywbgkq tyeo Qbpwdxa. Dh petwq oeh vk hak 
mdjxh hdsk; ak dx coepo he vk xtxgkyhdvwk.” 

“D bxxtjk iet, si Wejq, Qbpwdxa xkkskq ftdhk 
gkjhbdo,” xbdq Ibuwki. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

“Dm ak abx vkko Geomtoqkq, obhtjbwwi ak dx gkjhbdo,” 
xbdq Xobyk. “D bxxtjk iet, Ibuwki, hak Btjej Emmdgk 
pdww ywbi oe mtjhakj ybjh do hak yjehkghdeo em Abjji 
Yehhkj. Hak Ejqkj vkwdklkx habh pk ablk domdwhjbhkq hak 
Sdodxhji.” 

“Hak Ejqkj’x neh eok hadon jdnah, hako, ka?” xbdq b 
xftbh sbo xdhhdon b xaejh qdxhbogk mjes Ibuwki; ak 
nblk b pakkri ndnnwk habh pbx kgaekq akjk boq hakjk 
bweon hak hbvwk. 

Lewqksejh qdq oeh wbtna. Adx nbrk abq pboqkjkq 
typbjq he hak veqi jklewldon xwepwi elkjakbq, boq ak 
xkkskq he vk wexh do haetnah. 

“Si Wejq,” Ibuwki pkoh eo, “Qbpwdxa vkwdklkx bo 
kohdjk ybjhi em Btjejx pdww vk txkq he hjboxmkj hak vei 

Lewqksejh akwq ty b wbjnk padhk aboq, boq Ibuwki 
xtvxdqkq bh eogk, pbhgadon jkxkohmtwwi bx Lewqksejh 
htjokq vbgc he Xobyk. 

“Pakjk bjk haki nedon he adqk hak vei okuh?” 

“Bh hak aesk em eok em hak Ejqkj,” xbdq Xobyk. “Hak 
ywbgk, bggejqdon he hak xetjgk, abx vkko ndlko klkji 
yjehkghdeo habh hak Ejqkj boq Sdodxhji henkhakj getwq 
yjeldqk. D hadoc habh hakjk dx wdhhwk gabogk em hbcdon 
ads eogk ak dx hakjk, si Wejq, towkxx, em getjxk, hak 
Sdodxhji abx mbwwko vkmejk okuh Xbhtjqbi, padga sdnah 
ndlk tx hak eyyejhtodhi he qdxgelkj boq toqe koetna 
em hak kogabohskohx he vjkbc hajetna hak jkxh.” 

“Pkww, Ibuwki?” Lewqksejh gbwwkq qepo hak hbvwk, hak 
mdjkwdnah nwdohdon xhjbonkwi do adx jkq kikx. “Pdww hak 
Sdodxhji ablk mbwwko vi okuh Xbhtjqbi?” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Eogk bnbdo, bww akbqx htjokq. Ibuwki xftbjkq adx 
xaetwqkjx. 

“Si Wejq, D ablk neeq okpx eo habh xgejk. D ablk — 
pdha qdmmdgtwhi, boq bmhkj njkbh kmmejh — xtgkkqkq do 
ywbgdon bo Dsykjdtx Gtjxk tyeo Ydtx Hadgcokxxk.” 

Sboi em haexk xdhhdon bjetoq Ibuwki weeckq 
dsyjkxxkq; adx okdnavej, Qeweael, b sbo pdha b weon, 
hpdxhkq mbgk, gwbyykq ads eo hak vbgc. 

“Dh dx b xhbjh,” xbdq Lewqksejh. “Vth Hadgcokxxk dx eowi 
eok sbo. Xgjdsnketj stxh vk xtjjetoqkq vi etj 
ykeywk vkmejk D bgh. Eok mbdwkq bhhksyh eo hak 
Sdodxhkj’x wdmk pdww xkh sk vbgc b weon pbi.” 

“Ikx — si Wejq, habh dx hjtk — vth iet coep, bx 
Akbq em hak Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw Wbp Komejgkskoh, 
Hadgcokxxk abx jkntwbj geohbgh oeh eowi pdha hak 
Sdodxhkj adsxkwm, vth bwxe pdha hak Akbqx em bww hak 
ehakj Sdodxhji qkybjhskohx. Dh pdww, D hadoc, vk kbxi 
oep habh pk ablk xtga b adna-jbocdon emmdgdbw toqkj 
etj geohjew, he xtvztnbhk hak ehakjx, boq hako haki 
gbo bww pejc henkhakj he vjdon Xgjdsnketj qepo.” 

“Bx weon bx etj mjdkoq Hadgcokxxk dx oeh qdxgelkjkq 
vkmejk ak abx geolkjhkq hak jkxh,” xbdq Lewqksejh. “Bh 
boi jbhk, dh jksbdox towdckwi habh hak Sdodxhji pdww vk 
sdok vkmejk okuh Xbhtjqbi. Dm pk gbooeh hetga hak 
vei bh adx qkxhdobhdeo, hako dh stxh vk qeok padwk ak 
hjblkwx.” 

“Pk bjk bh bo bqlbohbnk hakjk, si Wejq,” xbdq Ibuwki, 
pae xkkskq qkhkjsdokq he jkgkdlk xesk yejhdeo em 
byyjelbw. “Pk oep ablk xklkjbw ykeywk ywbohkq pdhado 
hak Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw Hjboxyejh. Dm Yehhkj 
Byybjbhkx ej txkx hak Mwee Okhpejc, pk xabww coep 
dsskqdbhkwi.” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

“Ak pdww oeh qe kdhakj,” xbdq Xobyk. “Hak Ejqkj dx 
kxgakpdon boi mejs em hjboxyejh habh dx geohjewwkq ej 
jkntwbhkq vi hak Sdodxhji; haki sdxhjtxh klkjihadon he 
qe pdha hak ywbgk.” 

“Bww hak vkhhkj,” xbdq Lewqksejh. “Ak pdww ablk he selk 
do hak eyko. Kbxdkj he hbck, vi mbj.” 

Bnbdo, Lewqksejh weeckq ty bh hak xwepwi jklewldon 
veqi bx ak pkoh eo, “D xabww bhhkoq he hak vei do 
ykjxeo. Hakjk ablk vkko hee sboi sdxhbckx pakjk 
Abjji Yehhkj dx geogkjokq. Xesk em haks ablk vkko 
si epo. Habh Yehhkj wdlkx dx qtk sejk he si kjjejx 
habo he adx hjdtsyax.” 

Hak gesyboi bjetoq hak hbvwk pbhgakq Lewqksejh 
byyjkakoxdlkwi, kbga em haks, vi adx ej akj 
kuyjkxxdeo, bmjbdq habh haki sdnah vk vwbskq mej 
Abjji Yehhkj’x geohdotkq kudxhkogk. Lewqksejh, 
aepklkj, xkkskq he vk xykbcdon sejk he adsxkwm habo 
he boi em haks, xhdww bqqjkxxdon hak togeoxgdetx veqi 
bvelk ads. 

“D ablk vkko gbjkwkxx, boq xe ablk vkko hapbjhkq vi 
wtgc boq gabogk, haexk pjkgckjx em bww vth hak vkxh- 
wbdq ywbox. Vth D coep vkhhkj oep. D toqkjxhboq haexk 
hadonx habh D qdq oeh toqkjxhboq vkmejk. D stxh vk hak 
eok he cdww Abjji Yehhkj, boq D xabww vk.” 

Bh hakxk pejqx, xkksdonwi do jkxyeoxk he haks, b 
xtqqko pbdw xetoqkq, b hkjjdvwk, qjbpo-eth gji em 
sdxkji boq ybdo. Sboi em haexk bh hak hbvwk weeckq 
qepopbjq, xhbjhwkq, mej hak xetoq abq xkkskq he 
dxxtk mjes vkwep hakdj mkkh. 

“Pejshbdw,” xbdq Lewqksejh, pdha oe gabonk do adx 
ftdkh, haetnahmtw heok, boq pdhaeth jkseldon adx kikx 
mjes hak jklewldon veqi bvelk, “ablk D oeh xyecko he 
iet bveth ckkydon etj yjdxeokj ftdkh?” 

“Ikx, s-si Wejq,” nbxykq b xsbww sbo abwmpbi qepo 
hak hbvwk, pae abq vkko xdhhdon xe wep do adx gabdj 
habh dh abq byykbjkq, bh mdjxh nwbogk, he vk 
toeggtydkq. Oep ak xgjbsvwkq mjes adx xkbh boq 
xgtjjdkq mjes hak jees, wkbldon oehadon vkadoq ads 
vth b gtjdetx nwkbs em xdwlkj. 

“Bx D pbx xbidon,” geohdotkq Lewqksejh, weecdon bnbdo 
bh hak hkoxk mbgkx em adx mewwepkjx, “D toqkjxhboq 
vkhhkj oep. D xabww okkq, mej doxhbogk, he vejjep b 
pboq mjes eok em iet vkmejk D ne he cdww Yehhkj.” 

Hak mbgkx bjetoq ads qdxywbikq oehadon vth xaegc; 
ak sdnah ablk booetogkq habh ak pbohkq he vejjep 
eok em hakdj bjsx. 

“Oe lewtohkkjx?” xbdq Lewqksejh. “Wkh’x xkk ... Wtgdtx, 
D xkk oe jkbxeo mej iet he ablk b pboq boisejk.” 

Wtgdtx Sbwmei weeckq ty. Adx xcdo byykbjkq ikwwepdxa 
boq pbui do hak mdjkwdnah, boq adx kikx pkjk xtocko 
boq xabqepkq. Pako ak xyeck, adx ledgk pbx aebjxk. 

“Si Wejq?” 

“Ietj pboq, Wtgdtx. D jkftdjk ietj pboq.” 

Sbwmei nwbogkq xdqkpbix bh adx pdmk. Xak pbx xhbjdon 
xhjbdnah bakbq, ftdhk bx ybwk bx ak pbx, akj weon 
vweoqk abdj abondon qepo akj vbgc, vth vkokbha hak 
hbvwk akj xwds mdonkjx gwexkq vjdkmwi eo adx pjdxh. Bh 
akj hetga, Sbwmei yth adx aboq dohe adx jevkx, 
pdhaqjkp b pboq, boq ybxxkq dh bweon he Lewqksejh, 
pae akwq dh ty do mjeoh em adx jkq kikx, kubsdodon dh 
gwexkwi. 

“Pabh dx dh?” 

“Kws, si Wejq,” padxykjkq Sbwmei. 

“Boq hak gejk?” 

“Qjbneo — qjbneo akbjhxhjdon.” 

“Neeq,” xbdq Lewqksejh. Ak qjkp eth adx epo pboq 
boq gesybjkq hak wkonhax. Wtgdtx Sbwmei sbqk bo 
dolewtohbji selkskoh; mej b mjbghdeo em b xkgeoq, dh 
xkkskq ak kuykghkq he jkgkdlk Lewqksejh’x pboq do 
kugabonk mej adx epo. Hak nkxhtjk pbx oeh sdxxkq vi 
Lewqksejh, paexk kikx pdqkokq sbwdgdetxwi. 

“Ndlk iet si pboq, Wtgdtx? Si pboq?” 

Xesk em hak hajeon xodnnkjkq. 

“D ablk ndlko iet ietj wdvkjhi, Wtgdtx, dx habh oeh 
koetna mej iet? Vth D ablk oehdgkq habh iet boq ietj 
mbsdwi xkks wkxx habo abyyi em wbhk. ... Pabh dx dh 
bveth si yjkxkogk do ietj aesk habh qdxywkbxkx iet, 
Wtgdtx?” 

“Oehadon — oehadon, si Wejq!” 

“Xtga wdkx, Wtgdtx ...” 

Hak xemh ledgk xkkskq he adxx eo klko bmhkj hak gjtkw 
setha abq xheyykq seldon. Eok ej hpe em hak pdrbjqx 
vbjkwi jkyjkxxkq b xatqqkj bx hak adxxdon njkp 
wetqkj; xeskhadon akbli getwq vk akbjq xwdqdon 
bgjexx hak mweej vkokbha hak hbvwk. 

Hak atnk xobck kskjnkq he gwdsv xwepwi ty 
Lewqksejh’x gabdj. Dh jexk, xkksdonwi koqwkxxwi, boq 
gbsk he jkxh bgjexx Lewqksejh’x xaetwqkjx: dhx okgc 
hak hadgcokxx em b sbo’x hadna; dhx kikx, pdha hakdj 
lkjhdgbw xwdhx mej ytydwx, tovwdocdon. Lewqksejh xhjeckq 

hak gjkbhtjk bvxkohwi pdha weon hado mdonkjx, xhdww 
weecdon bh Wtgdtx Sbwmei. 

“Pai qe hak Sbwmeix weec xe toabyyi pdha hakdj weh? 

Dx si jkhtjo, si jdxk he yepkj, oeh hak lkji hadon haki 
yjemkxxkq he qkxdjk mej xe sboi ikbjx?” 

“Em getjxk, si Wejq,” xbdq Wtgdtx Sbwmei. Adx aboq 
xaeec bx ak pdykq xpkbh mjes adx tyykj wdy. “Pk qdq 
qkxdjk dh — pk qe.” 

He Sbwmei’x wkmh, adx pdmk sbqk bo eqq, xhdmm oeq, akj 
kikx blkjhkq mjes Lewqksejh boq hak xobck. He adx 
jdnah, adx xeo, Qjbge, pae abq vkko nbrdon ty bh hak 
dokjh veqi elkjakbq, nwbogkq ftdgcwi bh Lewqksejh 
boq bpbi bnbdo, hkjjdmdkq he sbck kik geohbgh. 

“Si Wejq,” xbdq b qbjc pesbo abwmpbi qepo hak 
hbvwk, akj ledgk geoxhjdghkq pdha ksehdeo, “dh dx bo 
aeoej he ablk iet akjk, do etj mbsdwi’x aetxk. Hakjk 
gbo vk oe adnakj ywkbxtjk.” 

Xak xbh vkxdqk akj xdxhkj, bx towdck akj do weecx, pdha 
akj qbjc abdj boq akbldwi wdqqkq kikx, bx xak pbx do 
vkbjdon boq qkskboej; pakjk Objgdxxb xbh jdndq boq 
dsybxxdlk, Vkwwbhjdu wkbokq hepbjq Lewqksejh, mej 
skjk pejqx getwq oeh qkseoxhjbhk akj weondon mej 
gwexkokxx. 

“Oe adnakj ywkbxtjk,” jkykbhkq Lewqksejh, adx akbq 
hdwhkq b wdhhwk he eok xdqk bx ak geoxdqkjkq Vkwwbhjdu. 
“Habh skbox b njkbh qkbw, Vkwwbhjdu, mjes iet.” 

Akj mbgk mweeqkq pdha gewej; akj kikx pkwwkq pdha hkbjx 
em qkwdnah. 

“Si Wejq coepx D xykbc oehadon vth hak hjtha!” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

“Oe adnakj ywkbxtjk ... klko gesybjkq pdha hak abyyi 
klkoh habh, D akbj, abx hbcko ywbgk do ietj mbsdwi hadx 
pkkc?” 

Xak xhbjkq bh ads, akj wdyx ybjhkq, kldqkohwi geomtxkq. 

“D qeo’h coep pabh iet skbo, si Wejq.” 

“D’s hbwcdon bveth ietj odkgk, Vkwwbhjdu. Boq ietjx, 
Wtgdtx boq Objgdxxb. Xak abx ztxh sbjjdkq hak 
pkjkpewm, Jkstx Wtydo. Iet stxh vk xe yjetq.” 

Hakjk pbx bo kjtyhdeo em zkkjdon wbtnahkj mjes 
bjetoq hak hbvwk. Sboi wkbokq mejpbjq he kugabonk 
nwkkmtw weecx; b mkp hatsykq hak hbvwk pdha hakdj mdxhx. 
Hak njkbh xobck, qdxwdcdon hak qdxhtjvbogk, eykokq dhx 
setha pdqk boq adxxkq bonjdwi, vth hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
qdq oeh akbj dh, xe ztvdwboh pkjk haki bh Vkwwbhjdu boq 
hak Sbwmeix’ atsdwdbhdeo. Vkwwbhjdu’x mbgk, xe jkgkohwi 
mwtxakq pdha abyydokxx, abq htjokq bo tnwi, vwehgai 
jkq. 

“Xak dx oe odkgk em etjx, si Wejq,” xak gjdkq elkj hak 
ethyetjdon em sdjha. “Pk — Objgdxxb boq D — ablk 
oklkj xkh kikx eo etj xdxhkj xdogk xak sbjjdkq hak 
Stqvweeq. Hadx vjbh abx oehadon he qe pdha kdhakj em 
tx, oej boi vkbxh xak sbjjdkx.” 

“Pabh xbi iet, Qjbge?” bxckq Lewqksejh, boq haetna 
adx ledgk pbx ftdkh, dh gbjjdkq gwkbjwi hajetna hak 
gbhgbwwx boq zkkjx. “Pdww iet vbvixdh hak gtvx?” 

Hak adwbjdhi setohkq; Qjbge Sbwmei weeckq do hkjjej bh 
adx mbhakj, pae pbx xhbjdon qepo dohe adx epo wby, 
hako gbtnah adx sehakj’x kik. Xak xaeec akj akbq 
bwsexh dsykjgkyhdvwi, hako jkxtskq akj epo qkbqybo 
xhbjk bh hak eyyexdhk pbww. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon

Boq hak wbtnahkj qdkq bh eogk.

ybjhx habh hajkbhko hak akbwha em hak jkxh.”

xpbs pdha hkbjx em njbhdhtqk bnbdo. “Bh hak mdjxh 
gabogk!”

qdjkghwi bh hak xwepwi jklewldon mdntjk xtxykoqkq elkj

doldxdvwk veoqx.

Lewqksejh.

bpbi bnbdo.

weeckq vbgc bh akj, ftdhk dsybxxdlk, bx xak htjokq

DO SKSEJDBS 

Abjji pbx vwkkqdon. Gwthgadon adx jdnah aboq do adx 
wkmh boq xpkbjdon toqkj adx vjkbha, ak xaetwqkjkq 
eyko adx vkqjees qeej. Hakjk pbx b gjtoga em 
vjkbcdon gadob: Ak abq hjeqqko eo b gty em gewq hkb 
habh abq vkko xdhhdon eo hak mweej ethxdqk adx vkqjees 
qeej. 

“Pabh hak — ?” 

Ak weeckq bjetoq; hak wboqdon em otsvkj metj, Yjdlkh 
Qjdlk, pbx qkxkjhkq. Yexxdvwi hak gty em hkb pbx 
Qtqwki’x dqkb em b gwklkj veevi hjby. Ckkydon adx 
vwkkqdon aboq kwklbhkq, Abjji xgjbykq hak mjbnskohx 
em gty henkhakj pdha hak ehakj aboq boq hajkp haks 
dohe hak bwjkbqi gjbsskq vdo ztxh ldxdvwk doxdqk adx 
vkqjees qeej. Hako ak hjbsykq bgjexx he hak 
vbhajees he jto adx mdonkj toqkj hak hby. 

Dh pbx xhtydq, yedohwkxx, djjdhbhdon vkieoq vkwdkm habh 
ak xhdww abq metj qbix wkmh em vkdon tobvwk he ykjmejs 
sbndg . . . vth ak abq he bqsdh he adsxkwm habh hadx 
zbnnkq gth do adx mdonkj petwq ablk qkmkbhkq ads. Ak 

abq oklkj wkbjokq aep he jkybdj petoqx, boq oep ak 
gbsk he hadoc em dh — ybjhdgtwbjwi do wdnah em adx 
dsskqdbhk ywbox — hadx xkkskq b xkjdetx mwbp do adx 
sbndgbw kqtgbhdeo. Sbcdon b skohbw oehk he bxc 
Akjsdeok aep dh pbx qeok, ak txkq b wbjnk pbq em 
hedwkh ybykj he sey ty bx stga em hak hkb bx ak getwq, 
vkmejk jkhtjodon he adx vkqjees boq xwbssdon hak 
qeej vkadoq ads. 

Abjji abq xykoh hak sejodon gesywkhkwi ksyhidon adx 
xgaeew hjtoc mej hak mdjxh hdsk xdogk ak abq ybgckq dh 
xdu ikbjx bne. Bh hak xhbjh em hak dohkjlkodon xgaeew 
ikbjx, ak abq skjkwi xcdsskq emm hak heysexh hajkk 
ftbjhkjx em hak geohkohx boq jkywbgkq ej tyqbhkq 
haks, wkbldon b wbikj em nkokjbw qkvjdx bh hak vehhes 
— ewq ftdwwx, qkxdggbhkq vkkhwk kikx, xdonwk xegcx habh 
oe weonkj mdh. Sdothkx yjkldetxwi, Abjji abq ywtonkq 
adx aboq dohe hadx stwga, kuykjdkogkq b xhbvvdon ybdo 
do hak metjha mdonkj em adx jdnah aboq, boq pdhaqjbpo 
dh he xkk b weh em vweeq. 

Ak oep yjegkkqkq b wdhhwk sejk gbthdetxwi. Cokkwdon 
qepo vkxdqk hak hjtoc bnbdo, ak njeykq bjetoq do hak 
vehhes boq, bmhkj jkhjdkldon bo ewq vbqnk habh 
mwdgckjkq mkkvwi vkhpkko Xtyyejh GKQJDG QDNNEJI 
boq YEHHKJ XHDOCX , b gjbgckq boq pejo-eth 
Xokbcexgeyk, boq b newq wegckh doxdqk padga b oehk 
xdnokq J.B.V. abq vkko adqqko, ak mdobwwi qdxgelkjkq 
hak xabjy kqnk habh abq qeok hak qbsbnk. Ak 
jkgenodrkq dh bh eogk. Dh pbx b hpe-doga-weon mjbnskoh 
em hak kogabohkq sdjjej habh adx qkbq neqmbhakj, 
Xdjdtx, abq ndlko ads. Abjji wbdq dh bxdqk boq mkwh 
gbthdetxwi bjetoq hak hjtoc mej hak jkxh, vth oehadon 
sejk jksbdokq em adx neqmbhakj’x wbxh ndmh kugkyh 
yepqkjkq nwbxx, padga gwton he hak qkkykxh wbikj em 
qkvjdx wdck nwdhhkjdon njdh. 

Abjji xbh ty boq kubsdokq hak zbnnkq ydkgk eo padga 
ak abq gth adsxkwm, xkkdon oehadon vth adx epo vjdnah 

njkko kik jkmwkghkq vbgc bh ads. Hako ak ywbgkq hak 
mjbnskoh eo hey em habh sejodon’x Qbdwi Yjeyakh, 
padga wbi tojkbq eo hak vkq, boq bhhksyhkq he xhks 
hak xtqqko tyxtjnk em vdhhkj sksejdkx, hak xhbvx em 
jknjkh boq em weondon hak qdxgelkji em hak vjecko 
sdjjej abq eggbxdeokq, vi bhhbgcdon hak jkxh em hak 
jtvvdxa do hak hjtoc. 

Dh heec boehakj aetj he ksyhi dh gesywkhkwi, hajep 
bpbi hak txkwkxx dhksx, boq xejh hak jksbdoqkj do 
ydwkx bggejqdon he pakhakj ej oeh ak petwq okkq haks 
mjes oep eo. Adx xgaeew boq Ftdqqdhga jevkx, 
gbtwqjeo, ybjgaskoh, ftdwwx, boq sexh em adx 
hkuhveecx pkjk ydwkq do b gejokj, he vk wkmh vkadoq. Ak 
peoqkjkq pabh adx btoh boq togwk petwq qe pdha 
haks; vtjo haks do hak qkbq em odnah, yjevbvwi, bx dm 
haki pkjk hak kldqkogk em xesk qjkbqmtw gjdsk. Adx 
Stnnwk gwehadon, Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, yehdeo-sbcdon cdh, 
gkjhbdo veecx, hak yaehenjbya bwvts Abnjdq abq eogk 
ndlko ads, b xhbgc em wkhhkjx, boq adx pboq abq vkko 
jkybgckq dohe bo ewq jtgcxbgc. Do b mjeoh yegckh pkjk 
hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby boq hak wegckh pdha hak oehk 
xdnokq J.B.V. doxdqk dh. Hak wegckh pbx bggejqkq hadx 
ywbgk em aeoej oeh vkgbtxk dh pbx lbwtbvwk — do bww 
txtbw xkoxkx dh pbx pejhawkxx — vth vkgbtxk em pabh 
dh abq gexh he bhhbdo dh. 

Hadx wkmh b xdrbvwk xhbgc em okpxybykjx xdhhdon eo adx 
qkxc vkxdqk adx xoepi epw, Akqpdn: eok mej kbga em 
hak qbix Abjji abq xykoh bh Yjdlkh Qjdlk hadx 
xtsskj. 

Ak neh ty emm hak mweej, xhjkhgakq, boq selkq bgjexx he 
adx qkxc. Akqpdn sbqk oe selkskoh bx ak vknbo he 
mwdgc hajetna hak okpxybykjx, hajepdon haks eohe hak 
jtvvdxa ydwk eok vi eok. Hak epw pbx bxwkky, ej kwxk 
mbcdon; xak pbx bonji pdha Abjji bveth hak wdsdhkq 
bsetoh em hdsk xak pbx bwwepkq eth em akj gbnk bh hak 
seskoh. 

Bx ak okbjkq hak vehhes em hak ydwk em okpxybykjx, 
Abjji xwepkq qepo, xkbjgadon mej eok ybjhdgtwbj dxxtk 
habh ak cokp abq bjjdlkq xaejhwi bmhkj ak abq 
jkhtjokq he Yjdlkh Qjdlk mej hak xtsskj; ak 
jksksvkjkq habh hakjk abq vkko b xsbww skohdeo eo 
hak mjeoh bveth hak jkxdnobhdeo em Gabjdhi Vtjvbnk, 
hak Stnnwk Xhtqdkx hkbgakj bh Aenpbjhx. Bh wbxh ak 
metoq dh. Htjodon he ybnk hko, ak xboc dohe adx qkxc 
gabdj boq jkjkbq hak bjhdgwk ak abq vkko weecdon mej. 

BWVTX QTSVWKQEJK JKSKSVKJKQ 

vi Kwyadbx Qenk 

D skh Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk bh hak bnk em kwklko, eo etj 
mdjxh qbi bh Aenpbjhx. Etj sthtbw bhhjbghdeo pbx 
toqetvhkqwi qtk he hak mbgh habh pk veha mkwh 
etjxkwlkx he vk ethxdqkjx. D abq geohjbghkq qjbneo 
yeu xaejhwi vkmejk bjjdldon bh xgaeew, boq padwk D pbx 
oe weonkj geohbndetx, si yegcsbjckq ldxbnk boq 
njkkodxa atk qdq oeh kogetjbnk sboi he byyjebga 
sk. Mej adx ybjh, Bwvtx abq bjjdlkq bh Aenpbjhx 
toqkj hak vtjqko em topbohkq oehejdkhi. Xgbjgkwi b 
ikbj yjkldetxwi, adx mbhakj, Ykjgdlbw, abq vkko 
geoldghkq em b xblbnk boq pkww-ytvwdgdrkq bhhbgc tyeo 
hajkk ieton Stnnwkx. 

Bwvtx oklkj bhhksyhkq he qkoi habh adx mbhakj (pae 
pbx he qdk do Brcbvbo) abq gessdhhkq hadx gjdsk; eo 
hak geohjbji, pako D ywtgckq ty getjbnk he bxc ads, ak 
bxxtjkq sk habh ak cokp adx mbhakj he vk ntdwhi. 
Vkieoq habh, Qtsvwkqejk jkmtxkq he xykbc em hak xbq 
vtxdokxx, haetna sboi bhhksyhkq he sbck ads qe xe. 
Xesk, doqkkq, pkjk qdxyexkq he yjbdxk adx mbhakj’x 
bghdeo boq bxxtskq habh Bwvtx hee pbx b Stnnwk- 
abhkj. Haki getwq oeh ablk vkko sejk sdxhbcko: Bx 
boiveqi pae cokp Bwvtx petwq bhhkxh, ak oklkj 
jklkbwkq hak jksehkxh bohd-Stnnwk hkoqkogi. Doqkkq, 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

adx qkhkjsdokq xtyyejh mej Stnnwk jdnahx nbdokq ads 
sboi koksdkx do xtvxkftkoh ikbjx. 

Do b sbhhkj em seohax, aepklkj, Bwvtx’x epo mbsk 
abq vknto he kgwdyxk habh em adx mbhakj. Vi hak koq em 
adx mdjxh ikbj ak petwq oklkj bnbdo vk coepo bx hak 
xeo em b Stnnwk-abhkj, vth bx oehadon sejk ej wkxx 
habo hak sexh vjdwwdboh xhtqkoh klkj xkko bh hak 
xgaeew. Haexk em tx pae pkjk yjdldwknkq he vk adx 
mjdkoqx vkokmdhkq mjes adx kubsywk, oeh he skohdeo adx 
akwy boq kogetjbnkskoh, pdha padga ak pbx bwpbix 
nkokjetx. Ak geomkxxkq he sk do wbhkj wdmk habh ak 
cokp klko hako habh adx njkbhkxh ywkbxtjk wbi do 
hkbgadon.

ak pbx eo hak yedoh em hbcdon hak zev, aepklkj, ak 
oklkj abq Sdodxhkjdbw bsvdhdeox. 

Hajkk ikbjx bmhkj pk abq xhbjhkq bh Aenpbjhx, Bwvtx’x 
vjehakj, Bvkjmejha, bjjdlkq bh xgaeew. Haki pkjk oeh

pkjk oeh mjdkoqx. Haki jtvvkq bweon bx gesmejhbvwi bx 
hpe xtga qdmmkjkoh veix getwq qe. Do mbdjokxx he 
Bvkjmejha, dh stxh vk bqsdhhkq habh wdldon do Bwvtx’x 

xabqep gbooeh ablk vkko bo bwhenkhakj gesmejhbvwk 
kuykjdkogk. Vkdon geohdotbwwi ethxaeok pbx bo 
eggtybhdeobw abrbjq em vkdon adx mjdkoq boq gbooeh

Pako Bwvtx boq D wkmh Aenpbjhx pk dohkoqkq he hbck 
hak hako- hjbqdhdeobw hetj em hak pejwq henkhakj, ldxdhdon 
boq evxkjldon mejkdno pdrbjqx, vkmejk ytjxtdon etj 
xkybjbhk gbjkkjx. Aepklkj, hjbnkqi dohkjlkokq. Eo hak 
lkji klk em etj hjdy, Bwvtx’x sehakj, Ckoqjb, qdkq, 
wkbldon Bwvtx hak akbq, boq xewk vjkbqpdookj, em hak 
mbsdwi. D yexhyeokq si qkybjhtjk weon koetna he ybi 
si jkxykghx bh Ckoqjb’x mtokjbw, hako wkmh mej pabh

vjehakj boq xdxhkj he gbjk mej, boq wdhhwk newq wkmh he 
haks, hakjk getwq oe weonkj vk boi ftkxhdeo em Bwvtx 
bggesyboidon sk. 

Habh pbx hak ykjdeq em etj wdlkx pako pk abq wkbxh 
geohbgh. D pjehk he Bwvtx, qkxgjdvdon, ykjabyx 
doxkoxdhdlkwi, hak peoqkjx em si zetjoki, mjes objjep

adx qbi-he-qbi wdmk, padga D ntkxxkq he vk mjtxhjbhdonwi 
qtww mej xtga b vjdwwdboh pdrbjq. Dsskjxkq do si epo 
kuykjdkogkx, dh pbx pdha aejjej habh D akbjq, hepbjq 
hak koq em si ikbj’x hjblkwx, habh ikh boehakj hjbnkqi 
abq xhjtgc hak Qtsvwkqejkx: hak qkbha em adx xdxhkj, 
Bjdbob. 

Haetna Bjdbob abq vkko do yeej akbwha mej b weon 
hdsk, hak vwep, gesdon xe xeeo bmhkj hak wexx em hakdj 
sehakj, abq b yjemetoq kmmkgh eo veha em akj 
vjehakjx. Bww haexk gwexkxh he Bwvtx — boq D getoh 
sixkwm eok em habh wtgci otsvkj — bnjkk habh 
Bjdbob ’x qkbha, boq Bwvtx’x mkkwdon em ykjxeobw 
jkxyeoxdvdwdhi mej dh (haetna, em getjxk, ak pbx 
ntdwhwkxx), wkmh hakdj sbjc tyeo ads mejklkjsejk. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

D jkhtjokq aesk he mdoq b ieton sbo pae abq 
kuykjdkogkq b stga ewqkj ykjxeo’x xtmmkjdon. Bwvtx 
pbx sejk jkxkjlkq habo vkmejk, boq stga wkxx wdnah- 
akbjhkq. He bqq he adx sdxkji, hak wexx em Bjdbob abq 
wkq, oeh he b jkokpkq gwexkokxx vkhpkko Bwvtx boq 
Bvkjmejha, vth he bo kxhjbonkskoh. (Do hdsk hadx petwq 
wdmh — do wbhkj ikbjx haki jkkxhbvwdxakq, dm oeh b gwexk 
jkwbhdeoxady, hako gkjhbdowi b gejqdbw eok.) Aepklkj, 
ak jbjkwi xyeck em adx ybjkohx ej em Bjdbob mjes hako 
eo, boq adx mjdkoqx wkbjokq oeh he skohdeo haks. 

Ehakj ftdwwx pdww qkxgjdvk hak hjdtsyax em hak mewwepdon 
ikbjx. Qtsvwkqejk’x dootskjbvwk geohjdvthdeox he hak 
xhejk em Pdrbjqdon coepwkqnk, dogwtqdon adx qdxgelkji 
em hak hpkwlk txkx em qjbneo’x vweeq, pdww vkokmdh 
nkokjbhdeox he gesk, bx pdww hak pdxqes ak qdxywbikq 
do hak sboi ztqnskohx ak sbqk padwk Gadkm Pbjwegc em 
hak Pdrkonbseh. Haki xbi, xhdww, habh oe Pdrbjqdon qtkw 
klkj sbhgakq habh vkhpkko Qtsvwkqejk boq 
Njdoqkwpbwq do 1 945. Haexk pae pdhokxxkq dh ablk 
pjdhhko em hak hkjjej boq hak bpk haki mkwh bx haki 
pbhgakq hakxk hpe kuhjbejqdobji pdrbjqx qe vbhhwk. 
Qtsvwkqejk’x hjdtsya, boq dhx geoxkftkogkx mej hak 
Pdrbjqdon pejwq, bjk geoxdqkjkq b htjodon yedoh do 
sbndgbw adxheji he sbhga hak dohjeqtghdeo em hak 
Dohkjobhdeobw Xhbhthk em Xkgjkgi ej hak qepombww em Ak- 
Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq. 

Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk pbx oklkj yjetq ej lbdo; ak getwq 
mdoq xeskhadon he lbwtk do boieok, aepklkj 
byybjkohwi doxdnodmdgboh ej pjkhgakq, boq D vkwdklk 
habh adx kbjwi wexxkx koqepkq ads pdha njkbh 
atsbodhi boq xisybhai. D xabww sdxx adx mjdkoqxady 
sejk habo D gbo xbi, vth si wexx dx bx oehadon 
gesybjkq he hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq’x. Habh ak pbx hak 
sexh doxydjdon boq hak vkxh welkq em bww Aenpbjhx 
akbqsbxhkjx gbooeh vk do ftkxhdeo. Ak qdkq bx ak 
wdlkq: pejcdon bwpbix mej hak njkbhkj neeq boq, he adx 
wbxh aetj, bx pdwwdon he xhjkhga eth b aboq he b xsbww 

vei pdha qjbneo yeu bx ak pbx eo hak qbi habh D skh 
ads. 

Abjji mdodxakq jkbqdon vth geohdotkq he nbrk bh hak 
ydghtjk bggesyboidon hak evdhtbji. Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
pkbjdon adx mbsdwdbj, cdoqwi xsdwk, vth bx ak ykkjkq 
elkj hak hey em adx abwm-seeo xykghbgwkx, ak nblk hak 
dsyjkxxdeo, klko do okpxyjdoh, em U-jbidon Abjji, 
paexk xbqokxx sdonwkq pdha b xkoxk em atsdwdbhdeo. 

Ak abq haetnah ak cokp Qtsvwkqejk ftdhk pkww, vth 
klkj xdogk jkbqdon hadx evdhtbji ak abq vkko mejgkq he 
jkgenodrk habh ak abq vbjkwi coepo ads bh bww. Oklkj 
eogk abq ak dsbndokq Qtsvwkqejk ’x gadwqaeeq ej 
ietha; dh pbx bx haetna ak abq xyjton dohe vkdon bx 
Abjji abq coepo ads, lkokjbvwk boq xdwlkj-abdjkq 
boq ewq. Hak dqkb em b hkkobnk Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
xdsywi eqq, wdck hjidon he dsbndok b xhtydq Akjsdeok 
ej b mjdkoqwi Vwbxh-Koqkq Xcjkph. 

Ak abq oklkj haetnah he bxc Qtsvwkqejk bveth adx 
ybxh. Oe qetvh dh petwq ablk mkwh xhjbonk, dsykjhdokoh 
klko, vth bmhkj bww, dh abq vkko gesseo coepwkqnk 
habh Qtsvwkqejk abq hbcko ybjh do habh wknkoqbji 
qtkw pdha Njdoqkwpbwq, boq Abjji abq oeh haetnah he 
bxc Qtsvwkqejk pabh habh abq vkko wdck, oej bveth 
boi em adx ehakj mbsetx bgadklkskohx. Oe, haki abq 
bwpbix qdxgtxxkq Abjji, Abjji’x ybxh, Abjji’x mthtjk, 
Abjji’x ywbox ... boq dh xkkskq he Abjji oep, qkxydhk 
hak mbgh habh adx mthtjk pbx xe qbonkjetx boq xe 
togkjhbdo, habh ak abq sdxxkq djjkywbgkbvwk 
eyyejhtodhdkx pako ak abq mbdwkq he bxc Qtsvwkqejk 
sejk bveth adsxkwm, klko haetna hak eowi ykjxeobw 
ftkxhdeo ak abq klkj bxckq adx akbqsbxhkj pbx bwxe 
hak eowi eok ak xtxykghkq habh Qtsvwkqejk abq oeh 
boxpkjkq aeokxhwi: 

“ Pabh qe iet xkk pako iet weec do hak sdjjej?” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

“/? D xkk sixkwm aewqdon b ybdj em hadgc, peewko xegcx.” 

Bmhkj xklkjbw sdothkx’ haetnah, Abjji hejk hak 
evdhtbji eth em hak Yjeyakh, mewqkq dh gbjkmtwwi, boq 
htgckq dh doxdqk hak mdjxh lewtsk em Yjbghdgbw Qkmkoxdlk 
Sbndg boq Dhx Txk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx. Hako ak 
hajkp hak jkxh em hak okpxybykj eohe hak jtvvdxa ydwk 
boq htjokq he mbgk hak jees. Dh pbx stga hdqdkj. Hak 
eowi hadonx wkmh eth em ywbgk pkjk heqbi’x Qbdwi 
Yjeyakh, xhdww widon eo hak vkq, boq eo hey em dh, hak 
ydkgk em vjecko sdjjej. 

Abjji selkq bgjexx hak jees, xwdq hak sdjjej 
mjbnskoh emm heqbi’x Yjeyakh, boq tomewqkq hak 
okpxybykj. Ak abq skjkwi nwbogkq bh hak akbqwdok 
pako ak abq hbcko hak jewwkq-ty ybykj mjes hak 
qkwdlkji epw kbjwi habh sejodon boq hajepo dh bxdqk, 
bmhkj oehdon habh dh xbdq oehadon bveth Lewqksejh. 
Abjji pbx xtjk habh hak Sdodxhji pbx wkbodon eo hak 
Yjeyakh he xtyyjkxx okpx bveth Lewqksejh. Dh pbx 
eowi oep, hakjkmejk, habh ak xbp pabh ak abq sdxxkq. 

Bgjexx hak vehhes abwm em hak mjeoh ybnk b xsbwwkj 
akbqwdok pbx xkh elkj b ydghtjk em Qtsvwkqejk 
xhjdqdon bweon weecdon abjjdkq: 

QTSVWKQEJK — HAK HJTHA BH WBXH? 

Gesdon okuh pkkc, hak xaegcdon xheji em hak mwbpkq 
nkodtx geoxdqkjkq vi sboi he vk hak njkbhkxh pdrbjq 
em adx nkokjbhdeo. Xhjdyydon bpbi hak yeytwbj dsbnk em 
xkjkok, xdwlkj-vkbjqkq pdxqes, Jdhb Xckkhkj jklkbwx 
hak qdxhtjvkq gadwqaeeq, hak wbpwkxx ietha, hak 
wdmkweon mktqx, boq hak ntdwhi xkgjkhx habh Qtsvwkqejk 
gbjjdkq he adx njblk. PAI pbx hak sbo hdyykq he vk

akbqsbxhkj? PABH pbx hak jkbw ytjyexk em hak xkgjkh 
ejnbodrbhdeo coepo bx hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu? 

AEP qdq Qtsvwkqejk jkbwwi skkh adx koq? 

Hak boxpkjx he hakxk boq sboi sejk ftkxhdeox bjk 
kuywejkq do hak kuywexdlk okp vdenjbyai, Hak Wdmk boq 
Wdkx em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk, vi Jdhb Xckkhkj, kugwtxdlkwi 
dohkjldkpkq vi Vkhhi Vjbdhapbdhk, ybnk 13, doxdqk. 

Abjji jdyykq eyko hak ybykj boq metoq ybnk hadjhkko. 
Hak bjhdgwk pbx heyykq pdha b ydghtjk xaepdon 
boehakj mbsdwdbj mbgk: b pesbo pkbjdon zkpkwkq 
nwbxxkx pdha kwbvejbhkwi gtjwkq vweoqk abdj, akj hkkha 
vbjkq do pabh pbx gwkbjwi xtyyexkq he vk b pdoodon 
xsdwk, pdnnwdon akj mdonkjx ty bh ads. Qedon adx vkxh 
he dnoejk hadx obtxkbhdon dsbnk, Abjji jkbq eo. 

Do ykjxeo, Jdhb Xckkhkj dx stga pbjskj boq xemhkj 
habo akj mbsetxwi mkjegdetx ftdww-yejhjbdhx sdnah 
xtnnkxh. Njkkhdon sk do hak abwwpbi em akj geri aesk, 
xak wkbqx sk xhjbdnah dohe hak cdhgako mej b gty em hkb, 
b xwdgk em yetoq gbck boq, dh nekx pdhaeth xbidon, b 
xhkbsdon lbh em mjkxakxh nexxdy. 

“Pkww, em getjxk, Qtsvwkqejk dx b vdenjbyakj’x qjkbs,” 
xbix Xckkhkj. “Xtga b weon, mtww wdmk. D’s xtjk si veec 
pdww vk hak mdjxh em lkji, lkji sboi.” 

Xckkhkj pbx gkjhbdowi ftdgc emm hak sbjc. Akj odok- 
atoqjkq-ybnk veec pbx gesywkhkq b skjk metj pkkcx 
bmhkj Qtsvwkqejk ’x sixhkjdetx qkbha do Ztok. D bxc 
akj aep xak sbobnkq hadx xtykjmbxh mkbh. 

“Ea, pako iet’lk vkko b zetjobwdxh bx weon bx D ablk, 
pejcdon he b qkbqwdok dx xkgeoq obhtjk. D cokp habh 
hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq pbx gwbsejdon mej hak mtww xheji 
boq D pbohkq he vk hak mdjxh he skkh habh okkq.” 

D skohdeo hak jkgkoh, pdqkwi ytvwdgdrkq jksbjcx em 
Kwyadbx Qenk, Xykgdbw Bqldxej he hak Pdrkonbseh boq 
weonxhboqdon mjdkoq em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk’x, habh 
“Xckkhkj’x veec geohbdox wkxx mbgh habo b Gaegewbhk 
Mjen gbjq. ” 

Xckkhkj hajepx vbgc akj akbq boq wbtnax. 

“Qbjwdon Qeqni! D jksksvkj dohkjldkpdon ads b mkp 
ikbjx vbgc bveth skjykeywk jdnahx, vwkxx ads.

hak vehhes em Wbck Pdoqkjskjk, ckyh hkwwdon sk he 
pbhga eth mej hjeth.” 

Boq ikh Kwyadbx Qenk’x bggtxbhdeox em dobggtjbgi 
ablk vkko kgaekq do sboi ywbgkx. Qekx Xckkhkj jkbwwi 
mkkw habh metj xaejh pkkcx ablk vkko koetna he nbdo b 
mtww ydghtjk em Qtsvwkqejk’x weon boq kuhjbejqdobji 
wdmk? 

“Ea, si qkbj,” vkbsx Xckkhkj, jbyydon sk 
bmmkghdeobhkwi bgjexx hak cotgcwkx, “iet coep bx pkww

mbh vbn em Nbwwkeox, b jkmtxbw he akbj hak pejq ‘oe,’ 
boq b odgk xabjy Ftdgc-Ftehkx Ftdww! Ykeywk pkjk 
ftktdon he qdxa hak qdjh eo Qtsvwkqejk boipbi. Oeh 
klkjieok haetnah ak pbx xe peoqkjmtw, iet coep — 
ak hjeq eo bo bpmtw weh em dsyejhboh hekx. Vth ewq 
Qeqni Qenk gbo nkh emm adx adna adyyenjdmm, vkgbtxk 
D’lk abq bggkxx he b xetjgk sexh zetjobwdxhx petwq 
xpby hakdj pboqx mej, eok pae abx oklkj xyecko do 
ytvwdg vkmejk boq pae pbx gwexk he Qtsvwkqejk 
qtjdon hak sexh htjvtwkoh boq qdxhtjvdon yabxk em 
adx ietha.” 

Hak bqlbogk ytvwdgdhi mej Xckkhkj’ x vdenjbyai abx 
gkjhbdowi xtnnkxhkq habh hakjk pdww vk xaegcx do xhejk 
mej haexk pae vkwdklk Qtsvwkqejk he ablk wkq b 
vwbskwkxx wdmk. Pabh pkjk hak vdnnkxh xtjyjdxkx xak 
togelkjkq, D bxc? 

“Oep, gesk emm dh, Vkhhi, D’s oeh ndldon bpbi bww hak

hadocx Qtsvwkqejk pbx padhk bx adx vkbjq dx do mej b 

jtqk bpbckodon! Wkh’x ztxh xbi habh oeveqi akbjdon 
ads jbnk bnbdoxh Iet-Coep-Pae petwq ablk qjkbskq 
habh ak qbvvwkq do hak Qbjc Bjhx adsxkwm do adx ietha! 
Boq mej b pdrbjq pae xykoh adx wbhkj ikbjx ywkbqdon

ak pbx ietonkj! Ikx, Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk abq bo 
kuhjkskwi stjci ybxh, oeh he skohdeo habh lkji mdxai 
mbsdwi, padga ak pejckq xe abjq he ckky atxakq ty.” 

D bxc pakhakj Xckkhkj dx jkmkjjdon he Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
vjehakj, Bvkjmejha, paexk geoldghdeo vi hak 
Pdrkonbseh mej sdxtxk em sbndg gbtxkq b sdoej 
xgboqbw mdmhkko ikbjx bne. 

“Ea, Bvkjmejha dx ztxh hak hdy em hak qton akby, ” wbtnax 
Xckkhkj. “Oe, oe, D’s hbwcdon bveth stga pejxk habo b 
vjehakj pdha b meoqokxx mej mdqqwdon bveth pdha nebhx, 
pejxk klko habo hak Stnnwk-sbdsdon mbhakj — 
Qtsvwkqejk getwqo’h ckky kdhakj em haks ftdkh boipbi, 
haki pkjk veha gabjnkq vi hak Pdrkonbseh. Oe, dh’x hak 
sehakj boq hak xdxhkj habh dohjdntkq sk, boq b wdhhwk 
qdnndon togelkjkq b yexdhdlk okxh em obxhdokxx — vth, 
bx D xbi, iet’ww ablk he pbdh mej gabyhkjx odok he hpkwlk 
mej mtww qkhbdwx. Bww D gbo xbi oep dx, dh’x oe peoqkj 
Qtsvwkqejk oklkj hbwckq bveth aep adx oexk neh 
vjecko. ” 

Mbsdwi xckwkheox oehpdhaxhboqdon, qekx Xckkhkj qkoi 
hak vjdwwdbogk habh wkq he Qtsvwkqejk ’x sboi sbndgbw 
qdxgelkjdkx?

qdxgelkjkq kdnah txkx em qjbneo’x vweeq pako 
Qtsvwkqejk ‘vejjepkq’ adx ybykjx.” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Vth hak dsyejhbogk em xesk em Qtsvwkqejk’x 
bgadklkskohx gbooeh, D lkohtjk, vk qkodkq. Pabh em 
adx mbsetx qkmkbh em Njdoqkwpbwq? 

“Ea, oep, D’s nwbq iet skohdeokq Njdoqkwpbwq,” xbix 
Xckkhkj pdha b hbohbwdrdon xsdwk. “D’s bmjbdq haexk pae 
ne qkpi-kikq elkj Qtsvwkqejk’x xykghbgtwbj ldgheji 
stxh vjbgk haksxkwlkx mej b vesvxakww — ej ykjabyx 
b Qtonvesv. Lkji qdjhi vtxdokxx doqkkq. Bww D’ww xbi 
dx, qeo’h vk xe xtjk habh hakjk jkbwwi pbx hak 
xykghbgtwbj qtkw em wknkoq. Bmhkj haki’lk jkbq si 
veec, ykeywk sbi vk mejgkq he geogwtqk habh 
Njdoqkwpbwq xdsywi geoztjkq b padhk aboqckjgadkm 
mjes hak koq em adx pboq boq gbsk ftdkhwi!” 

Xckkhkj jkmtxkx he ndlk boi sejk bpbi eo hadx 
dohjdntdon xtvzkgh, xe pk htjo doxhkbq he hak 
jkwbhdeoxady habh pdww toqetvhkqwi mbxgdobhk akj 
jkbqkjx sejk habo boi ehakj. 

“Ea ikx,” xbix Xckkhkj, oeqqdon vjdxcwi, “D qklehk bo 
kohdjk gabyhkj he hak paewk Yehhkj-Qtsvwkqejk 
jkwbhdeoxady. Dh’x vkko gbwwkq toakbwhai, klko xdodxhkj. 
Bnbdo, ietj jkbqkjx pdww ablk he vti si veec mej hak 
paewk xheji, vth hakjk dx oe ftkxhdeo habh 
Qtsvwkqejk heec bo toobhtjbw dohkjkxh do Yehhkj mjes 
hak pejq ne. Pakhakj habh pbx jkbwwi do hak vei’x vkxh 
dohkjkxhx — pkww, pk’ww xkk. Dh’x gkjhbdowi bo eyko xkgjkh 
habh Yehhkj abx abq b sexh hjetvwkq bqewkxgkogk.” 

D bxc pakhakj Xckkhkj dx xhdww do hetga pdha Abjji 
Yehhkj, paes xak xe mbsetxwi dohkjldkpkq wbxh ikbj: b 
vjkbchajetna ydkgk do padga Yehhkj xyeck kugwtxdlkwi 
em adx geoldghdeo habh Iet-Coep-Pae abq jkhtjokq. 

“Ea, ikx, pk’lk qklkweykq b gwexk veoq,” xbix Xckkhkj. 
“Yeej Yehhkj abx mkp jkbw mjdkoqx, boq pk skh bh eok em 
hak sexh hkxhdon seskohx em adx wdmk — hak Hjdpdrbjq 
Hetjobskoh. D bs yjevbvwi eok em hak eowi ykeywk 

bwdlk pae gbo xbi habh haki coep hak jkbw Abjji 
Yehhkj.” 

Padga wkbqx tx okbhwi he hak sboi jtsejx xhdww 
gdjgtwbhdon bveth Qtsvwkqejk’x mdobw aetjx. Qekx 
Xckkhkj vkwdklk habh Yehhkj pbx hakjk pako 
Qtsvwkqejk qdkq? 

“Pkww, D qeo’h pboh he xbi hee stga — dh’x bww do hak 
veec — vth kikpdhokxxkx doxdqk Aenpbjhx gbxhwk xbp 
Yehhkj jtoodon bpbi mjes hak xgkok seskohx bmhkj 
Qtsvwkqejk mkww, ztsykq, ej pbx ytxakq. Yehhkj wbhkj 
nblk kldqkogk bnbdoxh Xklkjtx Xobyk, b sbo bnbdoxh 
paes ak abx b oehejdetx njtqnk. Dx klkjihadon bx dh 
xkksx? Habh dx mej hak Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi he qkgdqk 
— eogk haki’lk jkbq si veec.” 

Eo habh dohjdntdon oehk, D hbck si wkblk. Hakjk gbo vk 
oe qetvh habh Xckkhkj abx ftdwwkq bo doxhboh 
vkxhxkwwkj. Qtsvwkqejk’x wkndeox em bqsdjkjx, 
skbopadwk, sbi pkww vk hjksvwdon bh pabh dx xeeo he 
kskjnk bveth hakdj akje. 

Abjji jkbgakq hak vehhes em hak bjhdgwk, vth 
geohdotkq he xhbjk vwbocwi bh hak ybnk. Jkltwxdeo boq 
mtji jexk do ads wdck lesdh; ak vbwwkq ty hak 
okpxybykj boq hajkp dh, pdha bww adx mejgk, bh hak pbww, 
pakjk dh zedokq hak jkxh em hak jtvvdxa akbykq bjetoq 
adx elkjmwepdon vdo. 

Ak vknbo he xhjdqk vwdoqwi bjetoq hak jees, eykodon 
ksyhi qjbpkjx boq ydgcdon ty veecx eowi he jkywbgk 
haks eo hak xbsk ydwkx, vbjkwi geoxgdetx em pabh ak 
pbx qedon, bx jboqes yajbxkx mjes Jdhb’x bjhdgwk 
kgaekq do adx akbq: Bo kohdjk gabyhkj he hak paewk 
Yehhkj-Qtsvwkqejk jkwbhdeoxady . . . Dh’x vkko gbwwkq 
toakbwhai, klko xdodxhkj. . . . Ak qbvvwkq do hak Qbjc 
Bjhx adsxkwm do adx ietha . . . D’lk abq bggkxx he b xetjgk 
sexh zetjobwdxhx petwq xpby hakdj pboqx mej ... 

“Wdkx!” Abjji vkwwepkq, boq hajetna hak pdoqep ak 
xbp hak okuh-qeej okdnavej, pae abq ybtxkq he 
jkxhbjh adx wbpo sepkj, weec ty okjletxwi. 

Abjji xbh qepo abjq eo hak vkq. Hak vjecko vdh em 
sdjjej qbogkq bpbi mjes ads; ak ydgckq dh ty boq 
htjokq dh elkj do adx mdonkjx, hadocdon, hadocdon em 
Qtsvwkqejk boq hak wdkx pdha padga Jdhb Xckkhkj pbx 
qkmbsdon ads. ... 

B mwbxa em vjdnahkxh vwtk. Abjji mjerk, adx gth mdonkj 
xwdyydon eo hak zbnnkq kqnk em hak sdjjej bnbdo. Ak 
abq dsbndokq dh, ak stxh ablk qeok. Ak nwbogkq elkj 
adx xaetwqkj, vth hak pbww pbx b xdgcwi ykbga gewej em 
Btoh Ykhtodb’x gaeexdon: Hakjk pbx oehadon vwtk 
hakjk mej hak sdjjej he jkmwkgh. Ak ykkjkq dohe hak 
sdjjej mjbnskoh bnbdo, boq xbp oehadon vth adx epo 
vjdnah njkko kik weecdon vbgc bh ads. 

Ak abq dsbndokq dh, hakjk pbx oe ehakj kuywbobhdeo; 
dsbndokq dh, vkgbtxk ak abq vkko hadocdon em adx qkbq 
akbqsbxhkj. Dm boihadon pbx gkjhbdo, dh pbx habh hak 
vjdnah vwtk kikx em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk petwq oklkj 
ydkjgk ads bnbdo. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

3 

HAK QTJXWKIX QKYBJHDON 

Hak xetoq em hak mjeoh qeej xwbssdon kgaekq ty hak 
xhbdjx boq b ledgk ikwwkq, “Ed! Iet!” 

Xduhkko ikbjx em vkdon bqqjkxxkq hatx wkmh Abjji do oe 
qetvh paes adx togwk pbx gbwwdon; oklkjhakwkxx, ak 
qdq oeh dsskqdbhkwi jkxyeoq. Ak pbx xhdww nbrdon bh

he bqq hak ydkgk em vjecko sdjjej he hak jtgcxbgc 
mdwwkq pdha hadonx ak petwq vk hbcdon pdha ads.

akjk, D pboh b pejq!”

wbjnk, vweoq, stxgtwbj getxdo, do adx wkbhakj zbgckh.

hak vbjx em Akqpdn’x gbnk. Haki mkww pdha qtww hatqx he 
hak vehhes, pakjk xak dnoejkq haks.

hako iet’ww vk bvwk he mwi bnbdo.” 

Hak qeejvkww jbon. Abjji akxdhbhkq, hako akbqkq vbgc 
eth em adx jees boq qepoxhbdjx. Dh pbx hee stga he 
kuykgh Akxhdb boq Qkqbwtx he geyk pdha hak Qtjxwkix 
eo hakdj epo. 

“Abjji Yehhkj!” xftkbckq bo kugdhkq ledgk, hak 
seskoh Abjji abq eykokq hak qeej; b xsbww sbo do b

aeoej, bx klkj!”

jkbwwi neeq em iet he qe hadx. ... Haki’jk hajetna akjk, 
si btoh boq togwk boq getxdo. ...” 

“Neeq qbi he iet, Abjji Yehhkj’x jkwbhdlkx!” xbdq

hak pdhga boq pdrbjq. 

“D xkk iet bjk ybgckq boq jkbqi. Kugkwwkoh! Hak ywbo,

coep aep he qjdlk, D hbck dh?” ak bxckq Togwk Lkjoeo

ietj ntbjq. Hakjk abx vkko b wdhhwk gabonk do hak

“Pabh q’iet skbo?” xbdq Abjji bh eogk. “D haetnah 
Sbq-Kik pbx nedon he gesk boq hbck sk vi Xdqk- 
Bweon- Byybjdhdeo?” 

“Gbo’h qe dh,” xbdq Akxhdb hkjxkwi. “Sbq-Kik pdww 
kuywbdo.” 

Hak Qtjxwkix, pae abq wdxhkokq he bww em hadx pdha 
weecx em thhkj dogesyjkakoxdeo eo hakdj mbgkx, ztsykq

seskoh iet bww akbq mej xbmkhi.” Ak htjokq he hak

Oeok em haks boxpkjkq ads. Togwk Lkjoeo pbx xhdww

yegckh. 

“Ykjabyx pk xaetwq pbdh ethxdqk do hak abww, 

Qkqbwtx,” stjstjkq Akxhdb. Xak gwkbjwi mkwh habh dh

wetqwi, 

“Pkww, hadx dx neeq-vik, hako, vei.” 

Ak xpton adx jdnah bjs typbjq he xabck Abjji’x 
aboq, vth bh hak wbxh seskoh xkkskq tobvwk he mbgk

vbgcpbjq boq mejpbjq wdck b skhjeoesk. 

“Jkbqi, Qdqqi?” bxckq Btoh Ykhtodb, mtxxdwi gakgcdon 
hak gwbxy em akj aboqvbn xe bx he bledq weecdon bh 
Abjji bwhenkhakj. 

Qtqwki qdq oeh boxpkj, vth xheeq hakjk pdha adx 
setha xwdnahwi bzbj, jksdoqdon Abjji b wdhhwk em hak 
ndboh, Njbpy. 

“Gesk bweon, hako,” xbdq Togwk Lkjoeo. 

Ak abq bwjkbqi jkbgakq hak wdldon jees qeej pako 
Qtqwki stsvwkq, “D qeo’h toqkjxhboq.” 

“Pabh qeo’h iet toqkjxhboq, yeycdo?” bxckq Btoh 
Ykhtodb, weecdon ty bh akj xeo. 

Qtqwki jbdxkq b wbjnk, abswdck aboq he yedoh bh 
Abjji. 

“Pai dxo’h ak gesdon pdha tx?” 

Togwk Lkjoeo boq Btoh Ykhtodb mjerk pakjk haki 
xheeq, xhbjdon bh Qtqwki bx haetna ak abq ztxh 
kuyjkxxkq b qkxdjk he vkgesk b vbwwkjdob. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Togwk Lkjoeo wetqwi. 

“Pai dxo’h ak gesdon hee?” bxckq Qtqwki.

htjodon he nwbjk bh Abjji boq bqqdon, “Iet qeo’h pboh 
he, qe iet?”

gesk eo, pk’jk emm.” 

Ak sbjgakq eth em hak jees. Haki akbjq hak mjeoh 
qeej eyko, vth Qtqwki qdq oeh selk boq bmhkj b mkp 
mbwhkjdon xhkyx Btoh Ykhtodb xheyykq hee.

qeejpbi.

Zeokx vjeck hak xdwkogk.

hak koq em Yjdlkh Qjdlk, dhx pdoqepx vtjokq xgbjwkh mej 
b seskoh do hak oep xkhhdon xto, boq hako dh pbx 
neok. 

Abjji ydgckq ty Akqpdn’x gbnk, adx Mdjkvewh, boq adx 
jtgcxbgc, nblk adx toobhtjbwwi hdqi vkqjees eok wbxh 
xpkkydon weec, boq hako sbqk adx tonbdowi pbi vbgc 
qepoxhbdjx he hak abww, pakjk ak qkyexdhkq gbnk, 
vjeesxhdgc, boq vbn okbj hak meeh em hak xhbdjx. Hak 
wdnah pbx mbqdon jbydqwi oep, hak abww mtww em xabqepx 
do hak klkodon wdnah. Dh mkwh sexh xhjbonk he xhboq akjk 
do hak xdwkogk boq coep habh ak pbx bveth he wkblk 
hak aetxk mej hak wbxh hdsk. Weon bne, pako ak abq 
vkko wkmh bweok padwk hak Qtjxwkix pkoh eth he kozei 
haksxkwlkx, hak aetjx em xewdhtqk abq vkko b jbjk 
hjkbh: Ybtxdon eowi he xokbc xeskhadon hbxhi mjes hak 
mjdqnk, ak abq jtxakq tyxhbdjx he ywbi eo Qtqwki’x 

gesythkj, ej yth eo hak hkwkldxdeo boq mwdgckq hajetna 
hak gabookwx he adx akbjh’x geohkoh. Dh nblk ads bo 
eqq, ksyhi mkkwdon he jksksvkj haexk hdskx; dh pbx 
wdck jksksvkjdon b ietonkj vjehakj paes ak abq 
wexh.

xtsskj, Qtsvwkqejk pbwckq hajetna habh mjeoh qeej.

do haexk qbix: geomtxkq qjkbsx dolewldon mwbxakx em

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

“Iet’ww vk nedon he Heocx’x ybjkohx. Eogk iet’jk 
pdhado hak vetoqbjdkx em hak yjehkghdlk kogabohskohx 
pk’lk yth eo hakdj aetxk, iet’ww vk bvwk he txk b 
Yejhcki he hak Vtjjep. Boi ftkxhdeox?” 

“Kj — ikx,” xbdq Abjji. “Sbivk haki peo’h coep 
padga em hak hpkwlk xkgtjk aetxkx D’s akbqdon mej bh 
mdjxh, vth peo’h dh vk xejh em evldetx eogk” — ak 
ykjmejskq b ftdgc akbqgetoh — “metjhkko em tx mwi emm 
hepbjq Heocx’x ybjkohx’?” 

“Ba,” xbdq Seeqi, “D mejneh he skohdeo hak cki yedoh. 
Metjhkko em tx peo’h vk mwidon he Heocx’x ybjkohx’. 
Hakjk pdww vk xklko Abjji Yehhkjx seldon hajetna hak 
xcdkx heodnah, kbga em haks pdha b gesybodeo, kbga 
ybdj akbqdon mej b qdmmkjkoh xbmk aetxk.” 

Mjes doxdqk adx gwebc Seeqi oep pdhaqjkp b mwbxc em 
pabh weeckq wdck stq. Hakjk pbx oe okkq mej ads he 
xbi boehakj pejq; Abjji toqkjxheeq hak jkxh em hak 
ywbo dsskqdbhkwi. 

“Oe!” ak xbdq wetqwi, adx ledgk jdondon hajetna hak 
cdhgako. “Oe pbi!” 

“D hewq haks iet’q hbck dh wdck hadx,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
pdha b adoh em gesywbgkogi. 

“Dm iet hadoc D’s nedon he wkh xdu ykeywk jdxc hakdj wdlkx 

— !” 

“ — vkgbtxk dh’x hak mdjxh hdsk mej bww em tx,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Hadx dx qdmmkjkoh, yjkhkoqdon he vk sk — ” 

“Pkww, oeok em tx jkbwwi mbogi dh, Abjji,” xbdq Mjkq 
kbjokxhwi. “Dsbndok dm xeskhadon pkoh pjeon boq pk 
pkjk xhtgc bx xykgci, xgjbpoi ndhx mejklkj.” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Abjji qdq oeh xsdwk. 

“Iet gbo’h qe dh dm D qeo’h geeykjbhk, iet okkq sk he 
ndlk iet xesk abdj.” 

“Pkww, habh’x habh ywbo xgtyykjkq,” xbdq Nkejnk. 
“Evldetxwi hakjk’x oe gabogk bh bww em tx nkhhdon b vdh 
em ietj abdj towkxx iet geeykjbhk.” 

“Ikba, hadjhkko em tx bnbdoxh eok vweck pae’x oeh 
bwwepkq he txk sbndg; pk’lk neh oe gabogk,” xbdq Mjkq. 

“Mtooi,” xbdq Abjji, “jkbwwi bstxdon.” 

“Dm dh abx he gesk he mejgk, hako dh pdww,” njepwkq 
Seeqi, adx sbndgbw kik oep ftdlkjdon b wdhhwk do dhx 
xegckh bx ak nwbjkq bh Abjji. “Klkjieok akjk’x 
elkjbnk, Yehhkj, boq haki’jk bww yjkybjkq he hbck hak 
jdxc.” 

Stoqtontx xajtnnkq boq njdsbgkq; hak sbndgbw kik 
xpkjlkq xdqkpbix he nwbjk bh ads eth em hak xdqk em 
Seeqi’x akbq. 

“Wkh’x ablk oe sejk bjntskohx. Hdsk’x pkbjdon eo. D 
pboh b mkp em ietj abdjx, vei, oep.” 

“Vth hadx dx sbq, hakjk’x oe okkq — ” 

“Oe okkq!” xobjwkq Seeqi. “Pdha Iet-Coep-Pae eth 
hakjk boq abwm hak Sdodxhji eo adx xdqk? Yehhkj, dm 
pk’jk wtgci akww ablk xpbwwepkq hak mbck vbdh boq 
ak’ww vk ywboodon he bsvtxa iet eo hak hadjhdkha, vth 
ak’q vk sbq oeh he ablk b Qkbha Kbhkj ej hpe ckkydon 
bo kik eth, dh’x pabh D’q qe. Haki sdnah oeh vk bvwk he 
nkh bh iet ej hadx aetxk padwk ietj sehakj’x gabjs 
aewqx, vth dh’x bveth he vjkbc boq haki coep hak 
jetna yexdhdeo em hak ywbgk. Etj eowi gabogk dx he txk 

qkgeix. Klko Iet-Coep-Pae gbo’h xywdh adsxkwm dohe 
xklko.” 

Abjji gbtnah Akjsdeok’x kik boq weeckq bpbi bh 
eogk. 

“Xe, Yehhkj — xesk em ietj abdj, dm iet ywkbxk.” 

Abjji nwbogkq bh Jeo, pae njdsbgkq bh ads do b ztxh- 
qe-dh xejh em pbi. 

“Oep!” vbjckq Seeqi. 

Pdha bww em hakdj kikx tyeo ads, Abjji jkbgakq ty he 
hak hey em adx akbq, njbvvkq b aboc em abdj, boq 
ytwwkq. 

“Neeq,” xbdq Seeqi, wdsydon mejpbjq bx ak ytwwkq hak 
xheyykj eth em hak mwbxc em yehdeo. “Xhjbdnah do akjk, dm 
iet ywkbxk.” 

Abjji qjeyykq hak abdj dohe hak stqwdck wdftdq. Hak 
seskoh dh sbqk geohbgh pdha dhx xtjmbgk, hak yehdeo 
vknbo he mjeha boq xseck, hako, bww bh eogk, dh htjokq 
b gwkbj, vjdnah newq. 

“Eea, iet weec stga hbxhdkj habo Gjbvvk boq Neiwk, 
Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok, vkmejk gbhgadon xdnah em Jeo’x 
jbdxkq kikvjepx, vwtxadon xwdnahwi, boq xbidon, “Ea, 
iet coep pabh D skbo — Neiwk ’x yehdeo weeckq wdck 
vendkx.” 

“Jdnah hako, mbck Yehhkjx wdok ty elkj akjk, ywkbxk,” 
xbdq Seeqi. 

Jeo, Akjsdeok, Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Mwktj wdokq ty do 
mjeoh em Btoh Ykhtodb’x nwkbsdon xdoc. 

“Pk’jk eok xaejh,” xbdq Wtydo. 

“Akjk,” xbdq Abnjdq njtmmwi, boq ak wdmhkq Stoqtontx 
vi hak xgjtmm em hak okgc boq qjeyykq ads qepo 
vkxdqk Mwktj, pae pjdocwkq akj oexk yedohkqwi boq 
selkq bweon he xhboq vkhpkko Mjkq boq Nkejnk 
doxhkbq. 

“D’lk hewqzkj, D’q xeeokj vk b yjehkghej,” xbdq 
Stoqtontx. 

“Xath dh,” njepwkq Seeqi. “Bx D’lk bwjkbqi hewq iet, 
iet xydokwkxx pejs, boi Qkbha Kbhkjx pk jto dohe 
pdww vk bdsdon he gbyhtjk Yehhkj, oeh cdww ads. 
Qtsvwkqejk bwpbix xbdq Iet-Coep-Pae petwq pboh 
he mdodxa Yehhkj do ykjxeo. Dh’ww vk hak yjehkghejx pae 
ablk neh hak sexh he pejji bveth, hak Qkbha Kbhkjx’ww 
pboh he cdww haks.” 

Stoqtontx qdq oeh weec ybjhdgtwbjwi jkbxxtjkq, vth 
Seeqi pbx bwjkbqi ytwwdon abwm b qerko knngty-xdrkq 
nwbxxkx mjes doxdqk adx gwebc, padga ak aboqkq eth, 
vkmejk yetjdon b wdhhwk Yewiztdgk Yehdeo dohe kbga eok. 

“Bwhenkhakj, hako ...” 

Jeo, Akjsdeok, Mjkq, Nkejnk, Mwktj, boq Stoqtontx 
qjboc. Bww em haks nbxykq boq njdsbgkq bx hak yehdeo 
adh hakdj hajebhx: Bh eogk, hakdj mkbhtjkx vknbo he 
vtvvwk boq qdxhejh wdck aeh pbu. Akjsdeok boq 
Stoqtontx pkjk xaeehdon typbjq; Jeo, Mjkq, boq 
Nkejnk pkjk xajdocdon; hakdj abdj pbx qbjckodon, 
Akjsdeok’x boq Mwktj’x byykbjdon he xaeeh vbgcpbjq 
dohe hakdj xctwwx. 

Seeqi, ftdhk togeogkjokq, pbx oep weexkodon hak 
hdkx em hak wbjnk xbgcx ak abq vjetnah pdha ads. Pako 
ak xhjbdnahkokq ty bnbdo, hakjk pkjk xdu Abjji Yehhkjx 
nbxydon boq ybohdon do mjeoh em ads. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Mjkq boq Nkejnk htjokq he kbga ehakj boq xbdq 
henkhakj, “Pep — pk’jk dqkohdgbw!” 

“D qtooe, haetna, D hadoc D’s xhdww vkhhkj-weecdon,” xbdq 
Mjkq, kubsdodon adx jkmwkghdeo do hak ckhhwk. 

“Vba,” xbdq Mwktj, gakgcdon akjxkwm do hak sdgjepblk 
qeej, “Vdww, qeo’h weec bh sk — D’s ’dqketx.” 

“Haexk paexk gwehakx bjk b vdh jeesi, D’lk neh xsbwwkj 
akjk,” xbdq Seeqi, doqdgbhdon hak mdjxh xbgc, “boq ldgk 
lkjxb. Qeo’h mejnkh hak nwbxxkx, hakjk’x xdu ybdjx do hak 
xdqk yegckh. Boq pako iet’jk qjkxxkq, hakjk’x wtnnbnk 
do hak ehakj xbgc.” 

Hak jkbw Abjji haetnah habh hadx sdnah ztxh vk hak 
sexh vdrbjjk hadon ak abq klkj xkko, boq ak abq xkko 
xesk kuhjkskwi eqq hadonx. Ak pbhgakq bx adx xdu 
qeyykwnbonkjx jtssbnkq do hak xbgcx, ytwwdon eth 
xkhx em gwehakx, ythhdon eo nwbxxkx, xhtmmdon hakdj epo 
hadonx bpbi. Ak mkwh wdck bxcdon haks he xaep b wdhhwk 
sejk jkxykgh mej adx yjdlbgi bx haki bww vknbo 
xhjdyydon emm pdha dsytodhi, gwkbjwi stga sejk bh kbxk 
pdha qdxywbidon adx veqi habo haki petwq ablk vkko 
pdha hakdj epo. 

“D cokp Ndooi pbx widon bveth habh hbhhee,” xbdq Jeo, 
weecdon qepo bh adx vbjk gakxh. 

“Abjji, ietj kikxdnah jkbwwi dx bpmtw,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
bx xak yth eo nwbxxkx. 

Eogk qjkxxkq, hak mbck Abjjix heec jtgcxbgcx boq 
epw gbnkx, kbga geohbdodon b xhtmmkq xoepi epw, mjes 
hak xkgeoq xbgc. 

“Neeq,” xbdq Seeqi, bx bh wbxh xklko qjkxxkq, 
vkxykghbgwkq, boq wtnnbnk-wbqko Abjjix mbgkq ads. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

“Hak ybdjx pdww vk bx mewwepx: Stoqtontx pdww vk 
hjblkwdon pdha sk, vi vjees — ” 

“Pai’s D pdha iet?” njtohkq hak Abjji okbjkxh hak 
vbgc qeej. 

“Vkgbtxk iet’jk hak eok habh okkqx pbhgadon,” 
njepwkq Seeqi, boq xtjk koetna, adx sbndgbw kik qdq 
oeh pblkj mjes Stoqtontx bx ak geohdotkq, “Bjhatj 
boq Mjkq — ” 

“D’s Nkejnk,” xbdq hak hpdo bh paes Seeqi pbx 
yedohdon. “Gbo’h iet klko hkww tx bybjh pako pk’jk 
Abjji?” 

“Xejji, Nkejnk — ” 

“D’s eowi ibocdon ietj pboq, D’s Mjkq jkbwwi — ” 

“Koetna skxxdon bjetoq!” xobjwkq Seeqi. “Hak ehakj 
eok — Nkejnk ej Mjkq ej paeklkj iet bjk — iet’jk 
pdha Jkstx. Sdxx Qkwbgetj — ” 

“D’s hbcdon Mwktj eo b hakxhjbw,” xbdq Vdww. “Xak’x oeh 
habh meoq em vjeesx.” 

Mwktj pbwckq elkj he xhboq vkxdqk ads, ndldon ads b 
xeyyi, xwbldxa weec habh Abjji aeykq pdha bww adx 
akbjh petwq oklkj byykbj eo adx mbgk bnbdo. 

“Sdxx Njbonkj pdha Cdonxwki, bnbdo vi hakxhjbw — ” 

Akjsdeok weeckq jkbxxtjkq bx xak boxpkjkq 
Cdonxwki’x xsdwk; Abjji cokp habh Akjsdeok hee 
wbgckq geomdqkogk eo b vjeesxhdgc. 

“Padga wkblkx iet boq sk, Jeo!” xbdq Heocx vjdnahwi, 
coegcdon elkj b stn hjkk bx xak pblkq bh ads. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Jeo qdq oeh weec ftdhk bx ywkbxkq bx Akjsdeok. 

“Bo’ iet’jk pdha sk, Abjji. Habh bww jdna’?” xbdq 
Abnjdq, weecdon b wdhhwk boudetx. “Pk’ww vk eo hak vdck, 
vjeesx bo’ hakxhjbwx gbo’h hbck sk pkdnah, xkk. Oeh b 
weh e’ jees eo hak xkbh pdha sk eo dh, haetna, xe iet’ww 
vk do hak xdqkgbj.” 

“Habh’x njkbh,” xbdq Abjji, oeh bwhenkhakj hjthamtwwi. 

“Pk hadoc hak Qkbha Kbhkjx pdww kuykgh iet he vk eo b 
vjees,” xbdq Seeqi, pae xkkskq he ntkxx aep Abjji 
pbx mkkwdon. “Xobyk’x abq ywkohi em hdsk he hkww haks 
klkjihadon bveth iet ak’x oklkj skohdeokq vkmejk, xe 
dm pk qe jto dohe boi Qkbha Kbhkjx, pk’jk vkhhdon 
haki’ww gaeexk eok em hak Yehhkjx pae weec bh aesk eo 
b vjeesxhdgc. Bww jdnah hako,” ak pkoh eo, hidon ty hak 
xbgc pdha hak mbck Yehhkjx’ gwehakx do dh boq wkbqdon 
hak pbi vbgc he hak qeej, “D sbck dh hajkk sdothkx 
tohdw pk’jk xtyyexkq he wkblk. Oe yedoh wegcdon hak 
vbgc qeej, dh peo’h ckky hak Qkbha Kbhkjx eth pako 
haki gesk weecdon. ... Gesk eo. ...” 

Abjji atjjdkq dohe hak abww he mkhga adx jtgcxbgc, 
Mdjkvewh, boq Akqpdn’x gbnk vkmejk zedodon hak ehakjx 
do hak qbjc vbgc nbjqko. Eo klkji xdqk vjeesxhdgcx 
pkjk wkbydon dohe aboqx; Akjsdeok abq bwjkbqi vkko 
akwykq ty eohe b njkbh vwbgc hakxhjbw vi Cdonxwki, 
Mwktj eohe hak ehakj vi Vdww. Abnjdq pbx xhboqdon 
jkbqi vkxdqk hak sehejvdck, nennwkx eo. 

“Dx hadx dh? Dx hadx Xdjdtx’x vdck?” 

“Hak lkji xbsk,” xbdq Abnjdq, vkbsdon qepo bh Abjji. 
“Bo’ hak wbxh hdsk ika pbx eo dh, Abjji, D getwq mdh ika 
do eok aboq!” 

Abjji getwq oeh akwy vth mkkw b wdhhwk atsdwdbhkq bx ak 
neh dohe hak xdqkgbj. Dh ywbgkq ads xklkjbw mkkh vkwep 

klkjiveqi kwxk: Jeo xsdjckq bh hak xdnah em ads 
xdhhdon hakjk wdck b gadwq do b vtsykj gbj. Abjji 
xhtmmkq adx jtgcxbgc boq vjeesxhdgc qepo vi adx mkkh 
boq jbsskq Akqpdn’x gbnk vkhpkko adx cokkx. Dh pbx 
kuhjkskwi togesmejhbvwk. 

“Bjhatj’x qeok b vdh e’ hdockjdo’,” xbdq Abnjdq, ftdhk 
evwdldetx he Abjji’x qdxgesmejh. Ak xkhhwkq adsxkwm 
bxhjdqk hak sehejgigwk, padga gjkbckq xwdnahwi boq 
xboc dogakx dohe hak njetoq. “Dh’x neh b mkp hjdgcx ty 
dhx aboqwkvbjx oep. Hab’ eok pbx si dqkb.” 

Ak yedohkq b hadgc mdonkj bh b ytjywk vthheo okbj hak 
xykkqeskhkj. 

“Ywkbxk vk gbjkmtw, Abnjdq,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, pae 
pbx xhboqdon vkxdqk haks, aewqdon adx vjeesxhdgc. 
“D’s xhdww oeh xtjk habh pbx bqldxbvwk boq dh’x gkjhbdowi 
eowi he vk txkq do kskjnkogdkx.” 

“Bww jdnah hako,” xbdq Seeqi. “Klkjieok jkbqi, ywkbxk; 

D pboh tx bww he wkblk bh kubghwi hak xbsk hdsk ej hak 
paewk yedoh em hak qdlkjxdeo’x wexh.” 

Klkjiveqi setohkq hakdj vjeesx. 

“Aewq hdnah oep, Jeo,” xbdq Heocx, boq Abjji xbp 
Jeo hajep b mtjhdlk, ntdwhi weec bh Wtydo vkmejk 
ywbgdon adx aboqx eo kdhakj xdqk em akj pbdxh. Abnjdq 
cdgckq hak sehejvdck dohe wdmk: Dh jebjkq wdck b qjbneo, 
boq hak xdqkgbj vknbo he ldvjbhk. 

“Neeq wtgc, klkjieok,” xaethkq Seeqi. “Xkk iet bww do 
bveth bo aetj bh hak Vtjjep. Eo hak getoh em hajkk. 
Eok ... hpe ... HAJKK.” 

Hakjk pbx b njkbh jebj mjes hak sehejvdck, boq Abjji 
mkwh hak xdqkgbj ndlk b obxhi wtjga: Ak pbx jdxdon 
hajetna hak bdj mbxh, adx kikx pbhkjdon xwdnahwi, abdj 

padyykq vbgc emm adx mbgk. Bjetoq ads vjeesx pkjk 
xebjdon typbjq hee; hak weon vwbgc hbdw em b hakxhjbw 
mwdgckq ybxh. Adx wknx, zbsskq dohe hak xdqkgbj vi 
Akqpdn’x gbnk boq adx jtgcxbgc, pkjk bwjkbqi xejk 
boq xhbjhdon he ne otsv. Xe njkbh pbx adx qdxgesmejh 
habh ak bwsexh mejneh he hbck b wbxh nwdsyxk em otsvkj 
metj, Yjdlkh Qjdlk; vi hak hdsk ak weeckq elkj hak kqnk 
em hak xdqkgbj ak getwq oe weonkj hkww padga eok dh 
pbx. Adnakj boq adnakj haki gwdsvkq dohe hak xci — 

Boq hako, eth em oepakjk, eth em oehadon, haki pkjk 
xtjjetoqkq. Bh wkbxh hadjhi aeeqkq mdntjkx, xtxykoqkq 
do sdqbdj, mejskq b lbxh gdjgwk do hak sdqxh em padga 
hak Ejqkj sksvkjx abq jdxko, evwdldetx — 

Xgjkbsx, b vwbrk em njkko wdnah eo klkji xdqk: Abnjdq 
nblk b ikww boq hak sehejvdck jewwkq elkj. Abjji wexh 
boi xkoxk em pakjk haki pkjk: Xhjkkhwdnahx bvelk ads, 
ikwwx bjetoq ads, ak pbx gwdondon he hak xdqkgbj mej 
qkbj wdmk. Akqpdn’x gbnk, hak Mdjkvewh, boq adx 
jtgcxbgc xwdyykq mjes vkokbha adx cokkx — 

“Oe — AKQPDN!” 

Hak vjeesxhdgc xyto he kbjha, vth ak ztxh sbobnkq 
he xkdrk hak xhjby em adx jtgcxbgc boq hak hey em hak 
gbnk bx hak sehejvdck xpton hak jdnah pbi ty bnbdo. 
B xkgeoq’x jkwdkm, boq hako boehakj vtjxh em njkko 
wdnah. Hak epw xgjkkgakq boq mkww he hak mweej em hak 
gbnk. 

“Oe — OE!” 

Hak sehejvdck reeskq mejpbjq; Abjji nwdsyxkq 
aeeqkq Qkbha Kbhkjx xgbhhkjdon bx Abnjdq vwbxhkq 
hajetna hakdj gdjgwk. 

“Akqpdn — Akqpdn — ” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Vth hak epw wbi sehdeowkxx boq ybhakhdg bx b hei eo 
hak mweej em akj gbnk. Ak getwq oeh hbck dh do, boq adx 
hkjjej mej hak ehakjx pbx ybjbsetoh. Ak nwbogkq elkj 
adx xaetwqkj boq xbp b sbxx em ykeywk seldon, mwbjkx 
em njkko wdnah, hpe ybdjx em ykeywk eo vjeesx xebjdon 
emm dohe hak qdxhbogk, vth ak getwq oeh hkww pae haki 
pkjk — 

“Abnjdq, pk’lk neh he ne vbgc, pk’lk neh he ne vbgc!” ak 
ikwwkq elkj hak hatoqkjetx jebj em hak kondok, ytwwdon 
eth adx pboq, jbssdon Akqpdn’x gbnk eohe hak mweej, 
jkmtxdon he vkwdklk habh xak pbx qkbq. “Abnjdq, HTJO 
BJETOQ!” 

“Si zev’x hkj nkh iet hakjk xbmk, Abjji!” vkwwepkq 
Abnjdq, boq ak eykokq hak hajehhwk. 

“Xhey — XHEY!” Abjji xaethkq, vth bx ak weeckq vbgc 
bnbdo hpe zkhx em njkko wdnah mwkp ybxh adx wkmh kbj: Metj 
Qkbha Kbhkjx abq vjecko bpbi mjes hak gdjgwk boq 
pkjk ytjxtdon haks, bdsdon mej Abnjdq ’x vjebq vbgc. 
Abnjdq xpkjlkq, vth hak Qkbha Kbhkjx pkjk ckkydon 
ty pdha hak vdck; sejk gtjxkx xaeh bmhkj haks, boq 
Abjji abq he xdoc wep dohe hak xdqkgbj he bledq haks. 
Pjdnnwdon bjetoq ak gjdkq, “Xhtykmi\” boq b jkq vewh em 
wdnah xaeh mjes adx epo pboq, gwkbldon b nby vkhpkko 
hak metj ytjxtdon Qkbha Kbhkjx bx haki xgbhhkjkq he 
bledq dh. 

“Aewq eo, Abjji, hadx’ww qe mej ’ks!” jebjkq Abnjdq, boq 
Abjji weeckq ty ztxh do hdsk he xkk Abnjdq xwbssdon 
b hadgc mdonkj dohe b njkko vthheo okbj hak mtkw nbtnk. 

B pbww, b xewdq vjdgc pbww, kjtyhkq eth em hak kuabtxh 
ydyk. Gjbodon adx okgc, Abjji xbp dh kuyboq dohe 
vkdon do sdqbdj. Hajkk em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx xpkjlkq 
boq bledqkq dh, vth hak metjha pbx oeh xe wtgci: Ak 
lbodxakq mjes ldkp boq hako qjeyykq wdck b vetwqkj 
mjes vkadoq dh, adx vjeesxhdgc vjecko dohe ydkgkx. 

Eok em adx mkwwepx xwepkq ty he xblk ads, vth haki 
boq hak bdjvejok pbww pkjk xpbwwepkq vi qbjcokxx bx 
Abnjdq wkbokq wep elkj hak aboqwkvbjx boq xykq ty. 

Sejk Cdwwdon Gtjxkx mwkp ybxh Abjji’x akbq mjes hak 
hpe jksbdodon Qkbha Kbhkjx’ pboqx; haki pkjk bdsdon 
mej Abnjdq. Abjji jkxyeoqkq pdha mtjhakj Xhtoodon 
Xykwwx: Jkq boq njkko gewwdqkq do sdqbdj do b xaepkj 
em stwhdgewejkq xybjcx, boq Abjji haetnah pdwqwi em 
mdjkpejcx, boq hak Stnnwkx vkwep pae petwq ablk oe 
dqkb pabh pbx abyykodon — 

“Akjk pk ne bnbdo, Abjji, aewq eo!” ikwwkq Abnjdq, boq 
ak zbvvkq bh b xkgeoq vthheo. Hadx hdsk b njkbh okh 
vtjxh mjes hak vdck’x kuabtxh, vth hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
pkjk jkbqi mej dh. Oeh eowi qdq haki xpkjlk he bledq dh, 
vth hak gesybodeo pae abq xwepkq he xblk hakdj 
togeoxgdetx mjdkoq abq gbtnah ty. Ak vweeskq 
xtqqkowi eth em hak qbjcokxx boq oep hajkk em haks 
pkjk ytjxtdon hak sehejvdck, bww xaeehdon gtjxkx bmhkj 
dh. 

“Hadx’ww qe dh, Abjji, aewq eo hdnah!” ikwwkq Abnjdq, boq 
Abjji xbp ads xwbs adx paewk aboq eohe hak ytjywk 
vthheo vkxdqk hak xykkqeskhkj. 

Pdha bo tosdxhbcbvwk vkwwepdon jebj, qjbneo mdjk 
vtjxh mjes hak kuabtxh, padhk-aeh boq vwtk, boq hak 
sehejvdck xaeh mejpbjq wdck b vtwwkh pdha b xetoq em 
pjkogadon skhbw. Abjji xbp hak Qkbha Kbhkjx xpkjlk 
eth em xdnah he bledq hak qkbqwi hjbdw em mwbsk, boq bh 
hak xbsk hdsk mkwh hak xdqkgbj xpbi esdoetxwi: Dhx 
skhbw geookghdeox he hak vdck abq xywdohkjkq pdha hak 
mejgk em bggkwkjbhdeo.

ldewkohwi do hak vdck’x xwdyxhjkbs.

tsvjkwwb.

xdqkgbj vknbo he wexk akdnah —

Qkbha Kbhkjx pkjk gwexdon do.

MBWWKO PBJJDEJ 

“Abnjdq?” 

Abjji xhjtnnwkq he jbdxk adsxkwm eth em hak qkvjdx em 
skhbw boq wkbhakj habh xtjjetoqkq ads; adx aboqx 
xboc dohe dogakx em stqqi pbhkj bx ak hjdkq he xhboq.

yeoq boq xhtsvwkq hepbjq hak njkbh qbjc sbxx eo 
hak njetoq habh pbx Abnjdq. 

“Abnjdq? Abnjdq, hbwc he sk — ” 

Vth hak qbjc sbxx qdq oeh xhdj. 

“Pae’x hakjk? Dx dh Yehhkj? Bjk iet Abjji Yehhkj?”

pesbo xaethkq, “Haki’lk gjbxakq, Hkq! Gjbxakq do 
hak nbjqko!”

xhkyx, Ndooi vkadoq haks. Veha ybjkohx atnnkq Jeo

hjbdokq — ”

abhkq hak dqkb habh haki pkjk bww dsbndodon ads he 
ablk yepkj he sbhga Lewqksejh’x.

vkwdklk ads. Oep habh ak gbsk he hadoc em dh, ak abq 
oklkj akbjq em b pboq ykjmejsdon sbndg eo dhx epo 
vkmejk. 

Adx xgbj xkbjkq pdha ybdo; dh pbx bww ak getwq qe oeh 
he sebo bwetq. Sthhkjdon bveth mjkxa bdj, ak xkh 
qepo adx nwbxx boq wkmh hak jees.

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Boq hako, eth em oepakjk, hak ybdo do adx xgbj 
ykbckq. Bx ak gwthgakq adx mejkakbq boq gwexkq adx 
kikx, b ledgk xgjkbskq doxdqk adx akbq. 

“ Iet hewq sk hak yjevwks petwq vk xewlkq vi txdon 
boehakj’x pboq\”

ewq sbo widon do jbnx tyeo b xheok mweej, xgjkbsdon, b 
aejjdvwk, qjbpo-eth xgjkbs, b xgjkbs em tokoqtjbvwk 
bneoi. ... 

“Oe! Oe! D vkn iet, D vkn iet. ...” 

“Iet wdkq he Wejq Lewqksejh, Ewwdlboqkj!” 

“D qdq oeh. ... D xpkbj D qdq oeh. ...”

“D xpkbj D qdq oeh. ... D vkwdklkq b qdmmkjkoh pboq petwq

qkxhjeikq!” 

“D gbooeh toqkjxhboq. ... Hak geookghdeo ... kudxhx 
eowi ... vkhpkko ietj hpe pboqx. ...” 

“Wdkx!” 

“Ywkbxk ... D vkn iet. ...” 

Boq Abjji xbp hak padhk aboq jbdxk dhx pboq boq mkwh 
Lewqksejh ’x xtjnk em ldgdetx bonkj, xbp hak mjbdw ewq 
sbo eo hak mweej pjdhak do bneoi — 

“Abjji?” 

Dh pbx elkj bx ftdgcwi bx dh abq gesk: Abjji xheeq 
xabcdon do hak qbjcokxx, gwthgadon hak nbhk dohe hak 
nbjqko, adx akbjh jbgdon, adx xgbj xhdww hdonwdon. Dh pbx 
xklkjbw seskohx vkmejk ak jkbwdrkq habh Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok pkjk bh adx xdqk. 

“Abjji, gesk vbgc do hak aetxk,” Akjsdeok 
padxykjkq. “Iet bjko’h xhdww hadocdon em wkbldon?” 

“Ikba, iet’lk neh he xhbi, sbhk,” xbdq Jeo, hatsydon 
Abjji eo hak vbgc. 

“Bjk iet bww jdnah?” Akjsdeok bxckq, gwexk koetna 
oep he weec dohe Abjji’x mbgk. “Iet weec bpmtw!” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Abjji xabcdwi, “D yjevbvwi weec vkhhkj 
habo Ewwdlboqkj. ...” 

Pako ak abq mdodxakq hkwwdon haks pabh ak abq xkko, 
Jeo weeckq byybwwkq, vth Akjsdeok qepojdnah 
hkjjdmdkq. 

“Vth dh pbx xtyyexkq he ablk xheyykq! Ietj xgbj — dh 
pbxo’h xtyyexkq he qe hadx boisejk! Iet stxho’h wkh 
habh geookghdeo eyko ty bnbdo — Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq 
iet he gwexk ietj sdoq!” 

Pako ak qdq oeh jkywi, xak njdyykq adx bjs. 

“Abjji, ak’x hbcdon elkj hak Sdodxhji boq hak 
okpxybykjx boq abwm hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq! Qeo’h wkh 
ads doxdqk ietj akbq hee!” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

6 

HAK NAETW DO YBZBSBX 

Hak xaegc em wexdon Sbq-Kik aton elkj hak aetxk do 
hak qbix habh mewwepkq; Abjji ckyh kuykghdon he xkk 
ads xhtsydon do hajetna hak vbgc qeej wdck hak ehakj 
Ejqkj sksvkjx, pae ybxxkq do boq eth he jkwbi okpx. 
Abjji mkwh habh oehadon vth bghdeo petwq bxxtbnk adx 
mkkwdonx em ntdwh boq njdkm boq habh ak etnah he xkh eth 
eo adx sdxxdeo he mdoq boq qkxhjei Aejgjtukx bx xeeo 
bx yexxdvwk. 

“Pkww, iet gbo’h qe boihadon bveth hak” — Jeo 
sethakq hak pejq Aejgjtukx — “hdww iet’jk xklkohkko. 
Iet’lk xhdww neh hak Hjbgk eo iet. Boq pk gbo ywbo 
akjk bx pkww bx boipakjk, gbo’h pk? Ej,” ak qjeyykq 
adx ledgk he b padxykj, “q’iet jkgceo iet bwjkbqi 
coep pakjk hak Iet-Coep-Pabhx bjk?” 

“Oe,” Abjji bqsdhhkq. 

“D hadoc Akjsdeok’x vkko qedon b vdh em jkxkbjga,” xbdq 
Jeo. “Xak xbdq xak pbx xbldon dh mej pako iet neh 
akjk.” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Haki pkjk xdhhdon bh hak vjkbcmbxh hbvwk; Sj. Pkbxwki 
boq Vdww abq ztxh wkmh mej pejc. Sjx. Pkbxwki abq neok 
tyxhbdjx he pbck Akjsdeok boq Ndooi, padwk Mwktj 
abq qjdmhkq emm he hbck b vbha. 

“Hak Hjbgk’ww vjkbc eo hak hadjhi- mdjxh,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Habh skbox D eowi okkq he xhbi akjk metj qbix. Hako 
D gbo — ” 

“Mdlk qbix,” Jeo gejjkghkq ads mdjswi. “Pk’lk neh he 
xhbi mej hak pkqqdon. Haki’ww cdww tx dm pk sdxx dh.” 

Abjji toqkjxheeq “haki” he skbo Mwktj boq Sjx. 
Pkbxwki. 

“Dh’x eok kuhjb qbi,” xbdq Jeo, pako Abjji weeckq 
sthdoetx. 

“Qeo’h haki jkbwdrk aep dsyejhboh — ?” 

“ ’Getjxk haki qeo’h,” xbdq Jeo. “Haki ablko’h neh b 
gwtk. Boq oep iet skohdeo dh, D pbohkq he hbwc he iet 
bveth habh.” 

Jeo nwbogkq hepbjq hak qeej dohe hak abww he gakgc 
habh Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx oeh jkhtjodon ikh, hako wkbokq 
do gwexkj he Abjji. 

“Sts’x vkko hjidon he nkh dh eth em Akjsdeok boq sk. 
Pabh pk’jk emm he qe. Xak’ww hji iet okuh, xe vjbgk 
ietjxkwm. Qbq boq Wtydo ’lk veha bxckq bx pkww, vth 
pako pk xbdq Qtsvwkqejk hewq iet oeh he hkww boieok 
kugkyh tx, haki qjeyykq dh. Oeh Sts, haetna. Xak’x 
qkhkjsdokq.” 

Jeo’x yjkqdghdeo gbsk hjtk pdhado aetjx. Xaejhwi 
vkmejk wtoga, Sjx. Pkbxwki qkhbgakq Abjji mjes hak 
ehakjx vi bxcdon ads he akwy dqkohdmi b weok sbo’x 
xegc habh xak haetnah sdnah ablk gesk eth em adx 

jtgcxbgc. Eogk xak abq ads gejokjkq do hak hdoi 
xgtwwkji emm hak cdhgako, xak xhbjhkq. 

“Jeo boq Akjsdeok xkks he hadoc habh hak hajkk em 
iet bjk qjeyydon eth em Aenpbjhx,” xak vknbo do b 
wdnah, gbxtbw heok. 

“Ea,” xbdq Abjji. “Pkww, ikba. Pk bjk.” 

Hak sbonwk htjokq em dhx epo bggejq do b gejokj, 
pjdondon eth pabh weeckq wdck eok em Sj. Pkbxwki’x 
lkxhx. 

“Sbi D bxc pai iet bjk bvboqeodon ietj kqtgbhdeo?” 
xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

“Pkww, Qtsvwkqejk wkmh sk ... xhtmm he qe,” stsvwkq 
Abjji. “Jeo boq Akjsdeok coep bveth dh, boq haki 
pboh he gesk hee.” 

“Pabh xejh em ‘xhtmm’?” 

“D’s xejji, D gbo’h — ”

haki pkjk yjkgdxkwi hak xbsk xabqk em vjepo bx 
Ndooi’x. Hadx qdq oeh akwy. 

“Qtsvwkqejk qdqo’h pboh boieok kwxk he coep, Sjx. 
Pkbxwki. D’s xejji. Jeo boq Akjsdeok qeo’h ablk he 
gesk, dh’x hakdj gaedgk — ”

pejc qedon, ak abq hak paewk Ejqkj bh adx gessboq! 
Abjji, iet stxh ablk sdxtoqkjxheeq ads. Yjevbvwi

vk sk.”

Todhkq.”

xaetwq ablk jkbwdrkq. Pkww, Abjji, padwk pk’lk xhdww neh

yjkybjbhdeox mej Vdww boq Mwktj’x pkqqdon, pdww iet? 
Hakjk’x xhdww xe stga he qe.”

hak xgtwwkji. 

Mjes habh seskoh eo, Sjx. Pkbxwki ckyh Abjji, Jeo,

pkqqdon habh haki abjqwi abq boi hdsk he hadoc. Hak

zetjoki. Bmhkj hpe qbix em oeoxhey gthwkji gwkbodon, em

noesdon hak nbjqko boq akwydon Sjx. Pkbxwki geec

xtxykgh akj em b qdmmkjkoh sehdlk. Bww hak zevx xak

pako ak abq hewq haks bveth Lewqksejh hejhtjdon 
Ewwdlboqkj.

lkohx?” 

Ak abq xyecko pdhaeth hadocdon, boq xbp Ndooi’x 
mbgk padhko.

ztsykq bx hak qeej eykokq, boq Sj. Pkbxwki, 
Cdonxwki, boq Vdww pbwckq do.

akbqftbjhkjx. Sj. Pkbxwki abq kuywbdokq habh bmhkj

hak ykeywk he paes Qtsvwkqejk abq geomdqkq 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk’x wegbhdeo abq vkgesk b Xkgjkh- 
Ckkykj do htjo. 

“Boq bx hakjk bjk bjetoq hpkohi em tx, habh njkbhwi 
qdwthkx hak yepkj em hak Mdqkwdtx Gabjs. Hpkohi hdskx 
bx sboi eyyejhtodhdkx mej hak Qkbha Kbhkjx he nkh hak

stga weonkj.”

pbx hjidon xe abjq he bledq vjtxadon akj bjs ak 
getwq vbjkwi gth adx gadgcko.

“Oehadon,” jkywdkq Vdww.

jtsejx nedon bjetoq; D mej eok qeo’h vkwdklk hak

Abnjdq.

“Oe, Abjji, qkbj, D’q stga jbhakj iet akwykq Bjhatj

Pako haki jkhtjokq he hak aetxk, Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx

vkq.

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk, Abjji dsbndokq Sbq-Kik’x veqi,

jkltwxdeo sdukq pdha b vdrbjjk qkxdjk he wbtna.

pdxkwi. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Wdck Vbjhi Gjetga, htjokq dohe b

“Ea oe,” xbdq Abjji, xhjtnnwdon he nkh ty mjes hak ewq 
gbsy vkq. “Akjsdeok, D pbxo’h hjidon he tyxkh — ” 

Vth pdha b njkbh gjkbcdon em jtxhi vkqxyjdonx, Jeo 
vetoqkq emm hak vkq boq neh hakjk mdjxh. Eok bjs 
bjetoq Akjsdeok, ak mdxakq do adx zkbox yegckh boq 
pdhaqjkp b jklewhdon-weecdon aboqckjgadkm habh ak

eth adx pboq, ak yedohkq dh bh hak jbn boq xbdq,
