abx eok bohdqehk, boq dh’x dogjkqdvwi jbjk — -□ 

“ — yaekodu hkbjx,” xbdq Abjji, oeqqdon. 

“Kubghwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Etj yjevwks dx habh hakjk 
bjk lkji mkp xtvxhbogkx bx qkxhjtghdlk bx vbxdwdxc 
lkoes, boq haki’jk bww qbonkjetx he gbjji bjetoq 
pdha iet. Habh’x b yjevwks pk’jk nedon he ablk he 
xewlk, haetna, vkgbtxk jdyydon, xsbxadon, ej 

gjtxadon b Aejgjtu peo’h qe hak hjdgc. Iet’lk neh he 
yth dh vkieoq sbndgbw jkybdj.” 

“Vth klko dm pk pjkgc hak hadon dh wdlkx do,” xbdq Jeo, 
“pai gbo’h hak vdh em xetw do dh ztxh ne boq wdlk do 
xeskhadon kwxk?” 

“Vkgbtxk b Aejgjtu dx hak gesywkhk eyyexdhk em b 
atsbo vkdon.” 

Xkkdon habh Abjji boq Jeo weeckq haejetnawi 
geomtxkq, Akjsdeok atjjdkq eo, “Weec, dm D ydgckq ty 
b xpejq jdnah oep, Jeo, boq jbo iet hajetna pdha dh, 

D petwqo’h qbsbnk ietj xetw bh bww.” 

“Padga petwq vk b jkbw gesmejh he sk, D’s xtjk,” xbdq 
Jeo. Abjji wbtnakq. 

“Dh xaetwq vk, bghtbwwi! Vth si yedoh dx habh pabhklkj 
abyykox he ietj veqi, ietj xetw pdww xtjldlk, 
tohetgakq,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Vth dh’x hak ehakj pbi 
jetoq pdha b Aejgjtu. Hak mjbnskoh em xetw doxdqk dh 
qkykoqx eo dhx geohbdokj, dhx kogabohkq veqi, mej 
xtjldlbw. Dh gbo’h kudxh pdhaeth dh.” 

“Habh qdbji xejh em qdkq pako D xhbvvkq dh,” xbdq Abjji, 
jksksvkjdon doc yetjdon wdck vweeq mjes hak 
ytoghtjkq ybnkx, boq hak xgjkbsx em hak ydkgk em 
Lewqksejh’x xetw bx dh lbodxakq. 

“Boq eogk hak qdbji pbx yjeykjwi qkxhjeikq, hak vdh em 
xetw hjbyykq do dh getwq oe weonkj kudxh. Ndooi hjdkq he 
nkh jdq em hak qdbji vkmejk iet qdq, mwtxadon dh bpbi, 
vth evldetxwi dh gbsk vbgc neeq bx okp.” 

“Abon eo,” xbdq Jeo, mjepodon. “Hak vdh em xetw do habh 
qdbji pbx yexxkxxdon Ndooi, pbxo’h dh? Aep qekx habh 
pejc, hako?” 

“Padwk hak sbndgbw geohbdokj dx xhdww dohbgh, hak vdh em 
xetw doxdqk dh gbo mwdh do boq eth em xeskeok dm haki nkh 
hee gwexk he hak evzkgh. D qeo’h skbo aewqdon dh mej hee 
weon, dh’x oehadon he qe pdha hetgadon dh,” xak bqqkq 
vkmejk Jeo getwq xykbc. “D skbo gwexk ksehdeobwwi. 
Ndooi yetjkq akj akbjh eth dohe habh qdbji, xak sbqk 
akjxkwm dogjkqdvwi ltwokjbvwk. Iet’jk do hjetvwk dm iet 
nkh hee meoq em ej qkykoqkoh eo hak Aejgjtu.” 

“D peoqkj aep Qtsvwkqejk qkxhjeikq hak jdon?” xbdq 
Abjji. “Pai qdqo’h D bxc ads? D oklkj jkbwwi ...” 

Adx ledgk hbdwkq bpbi: Ak pbx hadocdon em bww hak 
hadonx ak xaetwq ablk bxckq Qtsvwkqejk, boq em 
aep, xdogk hak akbqsbxhkj abq qdkq, dh xkkskq he 
Abjji habh ak abq pbxhkq xe sboi eyyejhtodhdkx 
pako Qtsvwkqejk abq vkko bwdlk, he mdoq eth sejk ... 
he mdoq eth klkjihadon. . . . 

Hak xdwkogk pbx xabhhkjkq bx hak vkqjees qeej mwkp 
eyko pdha b pbww-xabcdon gjbxa. Akjsdeok xajdkckq 
boq qjeyykq Xkgjkhx em hak Qbjckxh Bjh; Gjeecxabocx 
xhjkbckq toqkj hak vkq, adxxdon doqdnobohwi; Jeo 
ztsykq emm hak vkq, xcdqqkq eo b qdxgbjqkq Gaegewbhk 
Mjen pjbyykj, boq xsbgckq adx akbq eo hak eyyexdhk 
pbww; boq Abjji doxhdoghdlkwi qdlkq mej adx pboq vkmejk 
jkbwdrdon habh ak pbx weecdon ty bh Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
paexk abdj pbx qdxaklkwkq boq paexk mbgk pbx 
geohejhkq pdha jbnk. 

“D’s xe xejji he vjkbc ty hadx geri wdhhwk nbhakjdon,” 
xak xbdq, akj ledgk hjksvwdon. “D’s xtjk iet bww okkq 
ietj jkxh . . . vth hakjk bjk pkqqdon yjkxkohx xhbgckq 
do si jees habh okkq xejhdon eth boq D pbx toqkj hak 
dsyjkxxdeo habh iet abq bnjkkq he akwy.” 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon hkjjdmdkq bx xak wkbyh 
he akj mkkh, xkoqdon veecx mwidon do klkji qdjkghdeo, 

“pk pdww ... pk’jk xejji ...” 

Pdha bo bontdxakq weec bh Abjji boq Jeo, Akjsdeok 
atjjdkq eth em hak jees bmhkj Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

“Dh’x wdck vkdon b aetxk-kwm,” gesywbdokq Jeo do bo 
toqkjheok, xhdww sbxxbndon adx akbq bx ak boq Abjji 
mewwepkq. “Kugkyh pdhaeth hak zev xbhdxmbghdeo. Hak 
xeeokj hadx pkqqdon’x elkj, hak abyydkj D’ww vk.” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, “hako pk’ww ablk oehadon he qe 
kugkyh mdoq Aejgjtukx. ... Dh’ww vk wdck b aewdqbi, peo’h 
dh?” 

Jeo xhbjhkq he wbtna, vth bh hak xdnah em hak koejsetx 
ydwk em pkqqdon yjkxkohx pbdhdon mej haks do Sjx. 
Pkbxwki’x jees, xheyykq ftdhk bvjtyhwi. 

Hak Qkwbgetjx bjjdlkq hak mewwepdon sejodon bh kwklko 
e’gwegc. Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi pkjk mkkwdon 
ftdhk jkxkohmtw hepbjq Mwktj’x mbsdwi vi hadx hdsk, boq 
dh pbx pdha dww njbgk habh Jeo xhtsykq vbgc tyxhbdjx 
he yth eo sbhgadon xegcx, boq Abjji bhhksyhkq he 
mwbhhko adx abdj. Eogk haki abq bww vkko qkkskq xsbjh 
koetna, haki hjeeykq eth dohe hak xtooi vbgcibjq he 
bpbdh hak ldxdhejx. 

Abjji abq oklkj xkko hak ywbgk weecdon xe hdqi. Hak 
jtxhi gbtwqjeox boq ewq Pkwwdonheo veehx habh txtbwwi 
wdhhkjkq hak xhkyx vi hak vbgc qeej pkjk neok, 
jkywbgkq vi hpe okp Mwthhkjvi vtxakx xhboqdon kdhakj 
xdqk em hak qeej do wbjnk yehx; haetna hakjk pbx oe 
vjkkrk, hak wkblkx pblkq wbrdwi, ndldon bo bhhjbghdlk 
jdyywdon kmmkgh. Hak gadgckox abq vkko xath bpbi, hak 
ibjq abq vkko xpkyh, boq hak okbjvi nbjqko abq 
vkko yjtokq, ywtgckq, boq nkokjbwwi xyjtgkq ty, 
bwhaetna Abjji, pae wdckq dh do dhx elkjnjepo xhbhk, 
haetnah habh dh weeckq jbhakj mejwejo pdhaeth dhx txtbw 
geohdonkoh em gbykjdon noeskx. 

Ak abq wexh hjbgc em aep sboi xkgtjdhi kogabohskohx 
abq vkko ywbgkq tyeo hak Vtjjep vi veha hak Ejqkj 
boq hak Sdodxhji; bww ak cokp pbx habh dh pbx oe 
weonkj yexxdvwk mej boiveqi he hjblkw vi sbndg qdjkghwi 
dohe hak ywbgk. Sj. Pkbxwki abq hakjkmejk neok he 
skkh hak Qkwbgetjx eo hey em b okbjvi adww, pakjk haki 
pkjk he bjjdlk vi Yejhcki. Hak mdjxh xetoq em hakdj 
byyjebga pbx bo totxtbwwi adna-ydhgakq wbtna, 
padga htjokq eth he vk gesdon mjes Sj. Pkbxwki, pae 
byykbjkq bh hak nbhk seskohx wbhkj, wbqko pdha 
wtnnbnk boq wkbqdon b vkbthdmtw vweoqk pesbo do 
weon, wkbm-njkko jevkx, pae getwq eowi vk Mwktj’x 
sehakj. 

“Sbsbo!” gjdkq Mwktj, jtxadon mejpbjq he ksvjbgk 
akj. “Ybyb!” 

Seoxdktj Qkwbgetj pbx oepakjk okbj bx bhhjbghdlk bx 
adx pdmk; ak pbx b akbq xaejhkj boq kuhjkskwi ywtsy, 
pdha b wdhhwk, yedohkq vwbgc vkbjq. Aepklkj, ak weeckq 
neeq-obhtjkq. Vetogdon hepbjq Sjx. Pkbxwki eo 
adna-akkwkq veehx, ak cdxxkq akj hpdgk eo kbga gakkc, 
wkbldon akj mwtxhkjkq. 

“Iet ’blk vkko he stga hjetvwk,” ak xbdq do b qkky 
ledgk. “Mwktj hkwwx tx iet ’blk vkko pejcdon lkji ’bjq.” 

“Ea, dh’x vkko oehadon, oehadon!” hjdwwkq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 
“Oe hjetvwk bh bww!” 

Jeo jkwdklkq adx mkkwdonx vi bdsdon b cdgc bh b noesk 
pae pbx ykkjdon eth mjes vkadoq eok em hak okp 
Mwthhkjvi vtxakx. 

“Qkbj wbqi!” xbdq Seoxdktj Qkwbgetj, xhdww aewqdon 
Sjx. Pkbxwki’x aboq vkhpkko adx epo hpe ywtsy 
eokx boq vkbsdon. “Pk bjk sexh aeoejkq bh hak 
byyjebgadon todeo em etj hpe mbsdwdkx! Wkh sk yjkxkoh 
si pdmk, Byewwdok.” 

Sbqbsk Qkwbgetj nwdqkq mejpbjq boq xheeykq he cdxx 
Sjx. Pkbxwki hee. 

“ Kogabohkk,” xak xbdq. “Ietj ’txvboq ’bx vkko hkwwdon 
tx xtga bstxdon xhejdkx!” 

Sj. Pkbxwki nblk b sbodbgbw wbtna; Sjx. Pkbxwki 
hajkp ads b weec, tyeo padga ak vkgbsk dsskqdbhkwi 
xdwkoh boq bxxtskq bo kuyjkxxdeo byyjeyjdbhk he hak 
xdgcvkq em b gwexk mjdkoq. 

“Boq, em getjxk, iet ’blk skh si wkkhwk qbtnahkj, 
Nbvjdkwwk!” xbdq Seoxdktj Qkwbgetj. Nbvjdkwwk pbx 
Mwktj do sdodbhtjk; kwklko ikbjx ewq, pdha pbdxh-wkonha 
abdj em ytjk, xdwlkji vweoqk, xak nblk Sjx. Pkbxwki b 
qbrrwdon xsdwk boq atnnkq akj, hako hajkp Abjji b 
nwepdon weec, vbhhdon akj kikwbxakx. Ndooi gwkbjkq akj 
hajebh wetqwi. 

“Pkww, gesk do, qe!” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki vjdnahwi, boq 
xak txakjkq hak Qkwbgetjx dohe hak aetxk, pdha sboi 
“Oe, ywkbxk!”x boq “Bmhkj iet!”x boq “Oeh bh bww!”x. 

Hak Qkwbgetjx, dh xeeo hjboxydjkq, pkjk akwymtw, 
ywkbxboh ntkxhx. Haki pkjk ywkbxkq pdha klkjihadon 
boq ckko he bxxdxh pdha hak yjkybjbhdeox mej hak 
pkqqdon. Seoxdktj Qkwbgetj yjeoetogkq klkjihadon 
mjes hak xkbhdon ywbo he hak vjdqkxsbdqx’ xaekx 
“Gabjsbohd” Sbqbsk Qkwbgetj pbx sexh 
bggesywdxakq bh aetxkaewq xykwwx boq abq hak elko 
yjeykjwi gwkbokq do b hjdgk; Nbvjdkwwk mewwepkq akj 
kwqkj xdxhkj bjetoq, hjidon he bxxdxh do boi pbi xak 
getwq boq zbvvkjdon bpbi do jbydq Mjkoga. 

Eo hak qepoxdqk, hak Vtjjep pbx oeh vtdwh he 
bggesseqbhk xe sboi ykeywk. Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki 
pkjk oep xwkkydon do hak xdhhdon jees, abldon xaethkq 
qepo Seoxdktj boq Sbqbsk Qkwbgetj’x yjehkxhx boq 
doxdxhkq haki hbck hakdj vkqjees. Nbvjdkwwk pbx 

xwkkydon pdha Mwktj do Ykjgi’x ewq jees, boq Vdww 
petwq vk xabjdon pdha Gabjwdk, adx vkxh sbo, eogk 
Gabjwdk bjjdlkq mjes Jesbodb. Eyyejhtodhdkx he sbck 
ywbox henkhakj vkgbsk ldjhtbwwi oeokudxhkoh, boq dh 
pbx do qkxykjbhdeo habh Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok 
heec he lewtohkkjdon he mkkq hak gadgckox ztxh he 
kxgbyk hak elkjgjepqkq aetxk. 

“Vth xak xhdww peo’h wkblk tx bweok!” xobjwkq Jeo, bx 
hakdj xkgeoq bhhksyh bh b skkhdon do hak ibjq pbx 
medwkq vi hak byykbjbogk em Sjx. Pkbxwki gbjjidon b 
wbjnk vbxckh em wbtoqji do akj bjsx. 

“Ea, neeq, iet’lk mkq hak gadgckox,” xak gbwwkq bx xak 
byyjebgakq haks. “Pk’q vkhhkj xath haks bpbi bnbdo 
vkmejk hak sko bjjdlk hesejjep ... he yth ty hak hkoh 
mej hak pkqqdon,” xak kuywbdokq, ybtxdon he wkbo 
bnbdoxh hak akoaetxk. Xak weeckq kuabtxhkq. 
“Sdwwbsboh’x Sbndg Sbjftkkx ... haki’jk lkji neeq, 
Vdww’x kxgejhdon haks. ... Iet’q vkhhkj xhbi doxdqk padwk 
haki’jk akjk, Abjji. D stxh xbi dh qekx gesywdgbhk 
ejnbodrdon b pkqqdon, abldon bww hakxk xkgtjdhi xykwwx 
bjetoq hak ywbgk.” 

“D’s xejji,” xbdq Abjji atsvwi. 

“Ea, qeo’h vk xdwwi, qkbj!” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki bh eogk. “D 
qdqo’h skbo — pkww, ietj xbmkhi’x stga sejk 
dsyejhboh! Bghtbwwi, D’lk vkko pbohdon he bxc iet aep 
iet pboh he gkwkvjbhk ietj vdjhaqbi, Abjji. 

Xklkohkko, bmhkj bww, dh’x bo dsyejhboh qbi. ...” 

“D qeo’h pboh b mtxx,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, koldxbndon 
hak bqqdhdeobw xhjbdo hadx petwq yth eo haks bww. 
“Jkbwwi, Sjx. Pkbxwki, ztxh b oejsbw qdookj petwq vk 
mdok. ... Dh’x hak qbi vkmejk hak pkqqdon. ...” 

“Ea, pkww, dm iet’jk xtjk, qkbj. D’ww doldhk Jkstx boq 
Heocx, xabww D? Boq aep bveth Abnjdq?” 

“Habh’q vk njkbh,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth ywkbxk qeo’h ne he 
webqx em hjetvwk.” 

“Oeh bh bww, oeh bh bww ... Dh’x oe hjetvwk. ...” 

Xak weeckq bh ads, b weon, xkbjgadon weec, hako xsdwkq 
b wdhhwk xbqwi, xhjbdnahkokq ty, boq pbwckq bpbi. 

Abjji pbhgakq bx xak pblkq akj pboq okbj hak 
pbxadon wdok, boq hak qbsy gwehakx jexk dohe hak bdj 
he abon haksxkwlkx ty, boq xtqqkowi ak mkwh b njkbh 
pblk em jksejxk mej hak dogeolkodkogk boq hak ybdo 
ak pbx ndldon akj. 

7 

HAK PDWW EM BWVTX QTSVWKQEJK 

Ak pbx pbwcdon bweon b setohbdo jebq do hak geew 
vwtk wdnah em qbpo. Mbj vkwep, xpbhakq do sdxh, pbx 
hak xabqep em b xsbww hepo. Pbx hak sbo ak xetnah 
qepo hakjk, hak sbo ak okkqkq xe vbqwi ak getwq 
hadoc em wdhhwk kwxk, hak sbo pae akwq hak boxpkj, hak 
boxpkj he adx yjevwks . . . ? 

“Ed, pbck ty.” 

Abjji eykokq adx kikx. Ak pbx widon bnbdo eo hak 
gbsy vkq do Jeo’x qdoni bhhdg jees. Hak xto abq oeh 
ikh jdxko boq hak jees pbx xhdww xabqepi. Ydnpdqnkeo 
pbx bxwkky pdha adx akbq toqkj adx hdoi pdon. Hak 
xgbj eo Abjji’x mejkakbq pbx yjdgcwdon. 

“Iet pkjk sthhkjdon do ietj xwkky.” 

“Pbx D?” 

“Ikba. ‘Njknejeldhga.’ Iet ckyh xbidon ‘Njknejeldhga.’ 

Abjji pbx oeh pkbjdon adx nwbxxkx; Jeo’x mbgk 
byykbjkq xwdnahwi vwtjjkq. 

“Pae’x Njknejeldhga?” 

“D qtooe, qe D? Iet pkjk hak eok xbidon dh.” 

Abjji jtvvkq adx mejkakbq, hadocdon. Ak abq b lbntk 
dqkb ak abq akbjq hak obsk vkmejk, vth ak getwq oeh 
hadoc pakjk. 

“D hadoc Lewqksejh’x weecdon mej ads.” 

“Yeej vweck,” xbdq Jeo mkjlkohwi. 

Abjji xbh ty, xhdww jtvvdon adx xgbj, oep pdqk bpbck. 
Ak hjdkq he jksksvkj kubghwi pabh ak abq xkko do hak 
qjkbs, vth bww habh gbsk vbgc pbx b setohbdoetx 
aejdreo boq hak ethwdok em hak wdhhwk ldwwbnk gjbqwkq do b 
qkky lbwwki. 

“D hadoc ak’x bvjebq.” 

“Pae, Njknejeldhga?” 

“Lewqksejh. D hadoc ak’x xeskpakjk bvjebq, weecdon 
mej Njknejeldhga. Dh qdqo’h weec wdck boipakjk do 
Vjdhbdo.” 

“Iet jkgceo iet pkjk xkkdon dohe adx sdoq bnbdo?” 
Jeo xetoqkq pejjdkq. 

“Qe sk b mblej boq qeo’h hkww Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Bwhaetna aep xak kuykghx sk he xhey xkkdon xhtmm do 
si xwkky ...” 

Ak nbrkq ty bh wdhhwk Ydnpdqnkeo’x gbnk, hadocdon ... 
Pai pbx hak obsk “Njknejeldhga” mbsdwdbj? 

“D hadoc,” ak xbdq xwepwi, “ak’x neh xeskhadon he qe 
pdha Ftdqqdhga. Hakjk’x xesk geookghdeo, vth D gbo’h 
— D gbo’h hadoc pabh dh dx.” 

“Ftdqqdhga?” xbdq Jeo. “Xtjk iet’jk oeh hadocdon em 
Nejneldhga?” 

“Pae?” 

“Qjbnesdj Nejneldhga, Gabxkj, hjboxmkjjkq he hak 
Gatqwki Gbooeox mej b jkgejq mkk hpe ikbjx bne. 
Jkgejq aewqkj mej sexh Ftbmmwk qjeyx do b xkbxeo.” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. “D’s qkmdodhkwi oeh hadocdon em 
Nejneldhga.” 

“D hji oeh he kdhakj,” xbdq Jeo. “Pkww, abyyi vdjhaqbi 
boipbi.” 

“Pep — habh’x jdnah, D mejneh! D’s xklkohkko!” 

Abjji xkdrkq hak pboq widon vkxdqk adx gbsy vkq, 
yedohkq dh bh hak gwthhkjkq qkxc pakjk ak abq wkmh adx 
nwbxxkx, boq xbdq, “Bggde Nwbxxkx!” Bwhaetna haki pkjk 
eowi bjetoq b meeh bpbi, hakjk pbx xeskhadon 
dsskoxkwi xbhdxmidon bveth xkkdon haks rees hepbjq 
ads, bh wkbxh tohdw haki yeckq ads do hak kik. 

“Xwdgc,” xoejhkq Jeo. 

Jklkwdon do hak jkselbw em adx Hjbgk, Abjji xkoh Jeo’x 
yexxkxxdeox mwidon bjetoq hak jees, gbtxdon 
Ydnpdqnkeo he pbck ty boq mwthhkj kugdhkqwi bjetoq 
adx gbnk. Abjji bwxe hjdkq hidon hak wbgkx em adx 
hjbdokjx vi sbndg (hak jkxtwhboh coeh heec xklkjbw 
sdothkx he tohdk vi aboq) boq, ytjkwi mej hak 
ywkbxtjk em dh, htjokq hak ejbonk jevkx eo Jeo’x 
Gatqwki Gbooeox yexhkjx vjdnah vwtk. 

“D’q qe ietj mwi vi aboq, haetna,” Jeo bqldxkq Abjji, 
xodnnkjdon pako Abjji dsskqdbhkwi gakgckq dh. 

“Akjk’x ietj yjkxkoh. Topjby dh ty akjk, dh’x oeh mej 
si sehakj’x kikx.” 

“B veec?” xbdq Abjji bx ak heec hak jkghbontwbj 
ybjgkw. “Vdh em b qkybjhtjk mjes hjbqdhdeo, dxo’h dh?” 

“Hadx dxo’h ietj blkjbnk veec,” xbdq Jeo. “Dh’x ytjk 
newq: Hpkwlk Mbdw-Xbmk Pbix he Gabjs Pdhgakx. 
Kuywbdox klkjihadon iet okkq he coep bveth ndjwx. Dm 
eowi D’q abq hadx wbxh ikbj D’q ablk coepo kubghwi aep 
he nkh jdq em Wblkoqkj boq D petwq’lk coepo aep he 
nkh nedon pdha ... Pkww, Mjkq boq Nkejnk nblk sk b 
geyi, boq D’lk wkbjokq b weh. Iet’q vk xtjyjdxkq, dh’x 
oeh bww bveth pboqpejc, kdhakj.” 

Pako haki bjjdlkq do hak cdhgako haki metoq b ydwk em 
yjkxkohx pbdhdon eo hak hbvwk. Vdww boq Seoxdktj 
Qkwbgetj pkjk mdodxadon hakdj vjkbcmbxhx, padwk Sjx. 
Pkbxwki xheeq gabhhdon he haks elkj hak mjidon ybo. 

“Bjhatj hewq sk he pdxa iet b abyyi xklkohkkoha, 
Abjji,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, vkbsdon bh ads. “Ak abq 
he wkblk kbjwi mej pejc, vth akww vk vbgc mej qdookj. 
Habh’x etj yjkxkoh eo hey.” 

Abjji xbh qepo, heec hak xftbjk ybjgkw xak abq 
doqdgbhkq, boq topjbyykq dh. Doxdqk pbx b pbhga lkji 
wdck hak eok Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki abq ndlko Jeo mej 
adx xklkohkkoha; dh pbx newq, pdha xhbjx gdjgwdon 
bjetoq hak mbgk doxhkbq em aboqx.

yexxkxxdeox, dh’x b vdh qkohkq eo hak vbgc, vth — ”

“Lkji pkww hako, henkhakj,” ak xbdq, xajtnndon. Ak 
gwkbjkq adx hajebh. “D bs akjk, bx D’s xtjk iet coep, 
vkgbtxk em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk’x pdww.” 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok weeckq bh eok boehakj. 

“B xtjyjdxk, byybjkohwi! Iet pkjk oeh bpbjk hako habh 
Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh iet boihadon?” 

“B-bww em tx?” xbdq Jeo. “Sk boq Akjsdeok hee?” 

“Ikx, bww em—” 

Vth Abjji dohkjjtyhkq. 

“Qtsvwkqejk qdkq elkj b seoha bne. Pai abx dh hbcko 
hadx weon he ndlk tx pabh ak wkmh tx?” 

“Dxo’h dh evldetx?” xbdq Akjsdeok, vkmejk Xgjdsnketj 
getwq boxpkj. “Haki pbohkq he kubsdok pabhklkj ak’x 
wkmh tx. Iet abq oe jdnah he qe habh!” xak xbdq, boq akj 
ledgk hjksvwkq xwdnahwi. 

“D abq klkji jdnah,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj qdxsdxxdlkwi. “Hak 
Qkgjkk mej Ztxhdmdbvwk Geomdxgbhdeo ndlkx hak Sdodxhji 
hak yepkj he geomdxgbhk hak geohkohx em b pdww — ” 

“Habh wbp pbx gjkbhkq he xhey pdrbjqx ybxxdon eo 
Qbjc bjhdmbghx,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “boq hak Sdodxhji dx 
xtyyexkq he ablk yepkjmtw kldqkogk habh hak 
qkgkbxkq’x yexxkxxdeox bjk dwwknbw vkmejk xkdrdon haks! 
Bjk iet hkwwdon sk habh iet haetnah Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
hjidon he ybxx tx xeskhadon gtjxkq?” 

“Bjk iet ywboodon he mewwep b gbjkkj do Sbndgbw Wbp, 
Sdxx Njbonkj?” bxckq Xgjdsnketj. 

“Oe, D’s oeh,” jkhejhkq Akjsdeok. “D’s aeydon he qe 
xesk neeq do hak pejwq!” 

Jeo wbtnakq. Xgjdsnketj ’x kikx mwdgckjkq hepbjq ads 
boq bpbi bnbdo bx Abjji xyeck. 

“Xe pai ablk iet qkgdqkq he wkh tx ablk etj hadonx 
oep? Gbo’h hadoc em b yjkhkuh he ckky haks?” 

“Oe, dh’ww vk vkgbtxk hak hadjhi-eok qbix bjk ty,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok bh eogk. “Haki gbo’h ckky hak evzkghx weonkj 
habo habh towkxx haki gbo yjelk haki’jk qbonkjetx. 
Jdnah?” 

“Petwq iet xbi iet pkjk gwexk he Qtsvwkqejk, 
Jeobwq?” bxckq Xgjdsnketj, dnoejdon Akjsdeok. Jeo 
weeckq xhbjhwkq. 

“Sk? Oeh — oeh jkbwwi ... Dh pbx bwpbix Abjji pae ...” 

Jeo weeckq bjetoq bh Abjji boq Akjsdeok, he xkk 
Akjsdeok ndldon ads b xhey-hbwcdon-oep\ xejh em weec, 
vth hak qbsbnk pbx qeok: Xgjdsnketj weeckq bx 
haetna ak abq akbjq kubghwi pabh ak abq kuykghkq, 
boq pbohkq, he akbj. Ak xpeeykq wdck b vdjq em yjki 
tyeo Jeo’x boxpkj. 

“Dm iet pkjk oeh lkji gwexk he Qtsvwkqejk, aep qe iet 
bggetoh mej hak mbgh habh ak jksksvkjkq iet do adx 

pdww? Ak sbqk kugkyhdeobwwi mkp ykjxeobw vkftkxhx. 
Hak lbxh sbzejdhi em adx yexxkxxdeox — adx yjdlbhk 
wdvjbji, adx sbndgbw doxhjtskohx, boq ehakj ykjxeobw 
kmmkghx — pkjk wkmh he Aenpbjhx. Pai qe iet hadoc iet 
pkjk xdonwkq eth?” 

“D ... qtooe,” xbdq Jeo. “D ... pako D xbi pk pkjko’h 
gwexk ... D skbo, D hadoc ak wdckq sk. ...” 

“Iet’jk vkdon seqkxh, Jeo,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 
“Qtsvwkqejk pbx lkji meoq em iet.” 

Hadx pbx xhjkhgadon hak hjtha he vjkbcdon yedoh; bx mbj 
bx Abjji cokp, Jeo boq Qtsvwkqejk abq oklkj vkko 
bweok henkhakj, boq qdjkgh geohbgh vkhpkko haks abq 
vkko oknwdndvwk. Aepklkj, Xgjdsnketj qdq oeh xkks he 
vk wdxhkodon. Ak yth adx aboq doxdqk adx gwebc boq 
qjkp eth b qjbpxhjdon yetga stga wbjnkj habo hak 
eok Abnjdq abq ndlko Abjji. Mjes dh, ak jkselkq b 
xgjeww em ybjgaskoh padga ak tojewwkq boq jkbq 
bwetq. 

“ ‘Hak Wbxh Pdww boq Hkxhbskoh em Bwvtx Ykjgdlbw 
Ptwmjdg Vjdbo Qtsvwkqejk’ ... Ikx, akjk pk bjk. ... ‘He 
Jeobwq Vdwdtx Pkbxwki, D wkblk si Qkwtsdobhej, do hak 
aeyk habh ak pdww jksksvkj sk pako ak txkx dh.’ ” 

Xgjdsnketj heec mjes hak vbn bo evzkgh habh Abjji 
abq xkko vkmejk: Dh weeckq xeskhadon wdck b xdwlkj 
gdnbjkhhk wdnahkj, vth dh abq, ak cokp, hak yepkj he 
xtgc bww wdnah mjes b ywbgk, boq jkxhejk dh, pdha b 
xdsywk gwdgc. Xgjdsnketj wkbokq mejpbjq boq ybxxkq 
hak Qkwtsdobhej he Jeo, pae heec dh boq htjokq dh 
elkj do adx mdonkjx, weecdon xhtookq. 

“Habh dx b lbwtbvwk evzkgh,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj, pbhgadon 
Jeo. “Dh sbi klko vk todftk. Gkjhbdowi dh dx em 
Qtsvwkqejk’x epo qkxdno. Pai petwq ak ablk wkmh 
iet bo dhks xe jbjk?” 

Jeo xaeec adx akbq, weecdon vkpdwqkjkq. 

“Qtsvwkqejk stxh ablk hbtnah haetxboqx em 
xhtqkohx,” Xgjdsnketj ykjxklkjkq. “Ikh hak eowi eokx 
ak jksksvkjkq do adx pdww bjk iet hajkk. Pai dx habh? 
He pabh txk qdq ak hadoc iet petwq yth adx 
Qkwtsdobhej, Sj. Pkbxwki?” 

“Yth eth wdnahx, D x’yexk,” stsvwkq Jeo. “Pabh kwxk 
getwq D qe pdha dh?” 

Kldqkohwi Xgjdsnketj abq oe xtnnkxhdeox. Bmhkj 
xftdohdon bh Jeo mej b seskoh ej hpe, ak htjokq vbgc 
he Qtsvwkqejk’x pdww. 

“ He Sdxx Akjsdeok Zkbo Njbonkj, D wkblk si geyi em 
Hak Hbwkx em Vkkqwk hak Vbjq, do hak aeyk habh xak pdww 
mdoq dh kohkjhbdodon boq doxhjtghdlk.’ ” 

Xgjdsnketj oep ytwwkq eth em hak vbn b xsbww veec 
habh weeckq bx bogdkoh bx hak geyi em Xkgjkhx em hak 
Qbjckxh Bjh tyxhbdjx. Dhx vdoqdon pbx xhbdokq boq 
ykkwdon do ywbgkx. Akjsdeok heec dh mjes Xgjdsnketj 
pdhaeth b pejq. Xak akwq hak veec do akj wby boq 
nbrkq bh dh. Abjji xbp habh hak hdhwk pbx do jtokx; ak 
abq oklkj wkbjokq he jkbq haks. Bx ak weeckq, b hkbj 
xywbxakq eohe hak ksvexxkq xisvewx. 

“Pai qe iet hadoc Qtsvwkqejk wkmh iet habh veec, 
Sdxx Njbonkj?” bxckq Xgjdsnketj. 

“Ak ... ak cokp D wdckq veecx,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b 
hadgc ledgk, seyydon akj kikx pdha akj xwkklk. 

“Vth pai habh ybjhdgtwbj veec?” 

“D qeo’h coep. Ak stxh ablk haetnah D’q kozei dh.” 

“Qdq iet klkj qdxgtxx geqkx, ej boi skbox em ybxxdon 
xkgjkh skxxbnkx, pdha Qtsvwkqejk?” 

“Oe, D qdqo’h,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xhdww pdydon akj kikx eo 
akj xwkklk. “Boq dm hak Sdodxhji abxo’h metoq boi 
adqqko geqkx do hadx veec do hadjhi-eok qbix, D qetvh 
habh D pdww.” 

Xak xtyyjkxxkq b xev. Haki pkjk pkqnkq henkhakj xe 
hdnahwi habh Jeo abq qdmmdgtwhi kuhjbghdon adx bjs he 
yth dh bjetoq Akjsdeok ’x xaetwqkjx. Xgjdsnketj 
htjokq vbgc he hak pdww. 

“ ‘He Abjji Zbskx Yehhkj,’ ” ak jkbq, boq Abjji’x 
doxdqkx geohjbghkq pdha b xtqqko kugdhkskoh, “ ‘D wkblk 
hak Xodhga ak gbtnah do adx mdjxh Ftdqqdhga sbhga bh 
Aenpbjhx, bx b jksdoqkj em hak jkpbjqx em 
ykjxklkjbogk boq xcdww.’ ” 

Bx Xgjdsnketj ytwwkq eth hak hdoi, pbwoth-xdrkq 
newqko vbww, dhx xdwlkj pdonx mwthhkjkq jbhakj mkkvwi, 
boq Abjji getwq oeh akwy mkkwdon b qkmdodhk xkoxk em 
bohdgwdsbu. 

“Pai qdq Qtsvwkqejk wkblk iet hadx Xodhga?” bxckq 
Xgjdsnketj. 

“Oe dqkb,” xbdq Abjji. “Mej hak jkbxeox iet ztxh jkbq 
eth, D xtyyexk ... he jksdoq sk pabh iet gbo nkh dm 
iet ... ykjxklkjk boq pabhklkj dh pbx.” 

“Iet hadoc hadx b skjk xisvewdg ckkyxbck, hako?” 

“D xtyyexk xe,” xbdq Abjji. “Pabh kwxk getwq dh vk?” 

“D’s bxcdon hak ftkxhdeox,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj, xadmhdon 
adx gabdj b wdhhwk gwexkj he hak xemb. Qtxc pbx jkbwwi 
mbwwdon ethxdqk oep; hak sbjftkk vkieoq hak pdoqepx 
hepkjkq naexhwi padhk elkj hak akqnk. 

“D oehdgk habh ietj vdjhaqbi gbck dx do hak xabyk em b 
Xodhga,” Xgjdsnketj xbdq he Abjji. “Pai dx habh?” 

Akjsdeok wbtnakq qkjdxdlkwi. 

“Ea, dh gbo’h vk b jkmkjkogk he hak mbgh Abjji’x b njkbh 
Xkkckj, habh’x pbi hee evldetx,” xak xbdq. “Hakjk stxh 
vk b xkgjkh skxxbnk mjes Qtsvwkqejk adqqko do hak 
dgdon!” 

“D qeo’h hadoc hakjk’x boihadon adqqko do hak dgdon,” 
xbdq Xgjdsnketj, “vth b Xodhga petwq vk b lkji neeq 
adqdon ywbgk mej b xsbww evzkgh. Iet coep pai, D’s 
xtjk?” 

Abjji xajtnnkq. Akjsdeok, aepklkj, boxpkjkq: Abjji 
haetnah habh boxpkjdon ftkxhdeox gejjkghwi pbx xtga 
b qkkywi donjbdokq abvdh xak getwq oeh xtyyjkxx hak 
tjnk. 

“Vkgbtxk Xodhgakx ablk mwkxa sksejdkx,” xak xbdq. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji boq Jeo henkhakj; veha 
geoxdqkjkq Akjsdeok ’x Ftdqqdhga coepwkqnk 
oknwdndvwk. 

“Gejjkgh,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj. “B Xodhga dx oeh hetgakq 
vi vbjk xcdo vkmejk dh dx jkwkbxkq, oeh klko vi hak 
sbckj, pae pkbjx nwelkx. Dh gbjjdkx bo kogabohskoh 
vi padga dh gbo dqkohdmi hak mdjxh atsbo he wbi aboqx 
tyeo dh, do gbxk em b qdxythkq gbyhtjk. Hadx Xodhga” — 
ak akwq ty hak hdoi newqko vbww — “pdww jksksvkj ietj 
hetga, Yehhkj. Dh eggtjx he sk habh Qtsvwkqejk, pae 
abq yjeqdndetx sbndgbw xcdww, pabhklkj adx ehakj 
mbtwhx, sdnah ablk kogabohkq hadx Xodhga xe habh dh 
pdww eyko eowi mej iet.” 

Abjji’x akbjh pbx vkbhdon jbhakj mbxh. Ak pbx xtjk 
habh Xgjdsnketj pbx jdnah. Aep getwq ak bledq hbcdon 
hak Xodhga pdha adx vbjk aboq do mjeoh em hak Sdodxhkj? 

“Iet qeo’h xbi boihadon,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj. “Ykjabyx 
iet bwjkbqi coep pabh hak Xodhga geohbdox?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, xhdww peoqkjdon aep ak getwq byykbj 
he hetga hak Xodhga pdhaeth jkbwwi qedon xe. Dm eowi ak 
cokp Wkndwdskogi, jkbwwi cokp dh, boq getwq jkbq 
Akjsdeok’x sdoq; ak getwq yjbghdgbwwi akbj akj vjbdo 
padjjdon vkxdqk ads. 

“Hbck dh,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj ftdkhwi. 

Abjji skh hak Sdodxhkj’x ikwwep kikx boq cokp ak abq 
oe eyhdeo vth he evki. Ak akwq eth adx aboq, boq 
Xgjdsnketj wkbokq mejpbjq bnbdo boq ywbgkq hak 
Xodhga, xwepwi boq qkwdvkjbhkwi, dohe Abjji’x ybws. 

Oehadon abyykokq. Bx Abjji’x mdonkjx gwexkq bjetoq 
hak Xodhga, dhx hdjkq pdonx mwthhkjkq boq pkjk xhdww. 
Xgjdsnketj, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok geohdotkq he nbrk 
bldqwi bh hak oep ybjhdbwwi geogkbwkq vbww, bx dm xhdww 
aeydon dh sdnah hjboxmejs do xesk pbi. 

“Habh pbx qjbsbhdg,” xbdq Abjji geewwi. Veha Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok wbtnakq. 

“Habh’x bww, hako, dx dh?” bxckq Akjsdeok, sbcdon he 
yjdxk akjxkwm emm hak xemb. 

“Oeh ftdhk,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj, pae weeckq vbq- 
hksykjkq oep. “Qtsvwkqejk wkmh iet b xkgeoq 
vkftkxh, Yehhkj.” 

“Pabh dx dh?” bxckq Abjji, kugdhkskoh jkcdoqwdon. 

Xgjdsnketj qdq oeh vehakj he jkbq mjes hak pdww hadx 
hdsk. 

“Hak xpejq em Neqjdg Njimmdoqej,” ak xbdq. 

Akjsdeok boq Jeo veha xhdmmkokq. Abjji weeckq 
bjetoq mej b xdno em hak jtvi-kogjtxhkq adwh, vth 
Xgjdsnketj qdq oeh ytww hak xpejq mjes hak wkbhakj 
yetga, padga do boi gbxk weeckq stga hee xsbww he 
geohbdo dh. 

“Xe pakjk dx dh?” Abjji bxckq xtxydgdetxwi. 

“Tomejhtobhkwi,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj, “habh xpejq pbx 
oeh Qtsvwkqejk ’x he ndlk bpbi. Hak xpejq em Neqjdg 
Njimmdoqej dx bo dsyejhboh adxhejdgbw bjhdmbgh, boq bx 
xtga, vkweonx — ” 

“Dh vkweonx he Abjji!” xbdq Akjsdeok aehwi. “Dh gaexk 
ads, ak pbx hak eok pae metoq dh, dh gbsk he ads eth 
em hak Xejhdon Abh — ” 

“Bggejqdon he jkwdbvwk adxhejdgbw xetjgkx, hak xpejq 
sbi yjkxkoh dhxkwm he boi pejhai Njimmdoqej,” xbdq 
Xgjdsnketj. “Habh qekx oeh sbck dh hak kugwtxdlk 
yjeykjhi em Sj. Yehhkj, pabhklkj Qtsvwkqejk sbi 
ablk qkgdqkq.” Xgjdsnketj xgjbhgakq adx vbqwi 
xablko gakkc, xgjthdodrdon Abjji. “Pai qe iet hadoc 
— ?” 

“ — Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq he ndlk sk hak xpejq?” xbdq 
Abjji, xhjtnnwdon he ckky adx hksykj. “Sbivk ak 
haetnah dh petwq weec odgk eo si pbww.” 

“Hadx dx oeh b zeck, Yehhkj!” njepwkq Xgjdsnketj. “Pbx 
dh vkgbtxk Qtsvwkqejk vkwdklkq habh eowi hak xpejq em 
Neqjdg Njimmdoqej getwq qkmkbh hak Akdj em Xwihakjdo? 
Qdq ak pdxa he ndlk iet habh xpejq, Yehhkj, vkgbtxk ak 

vkwdklkq, bx qe sboi, habh iet bjk hak eok qkxhdokq he 
qkxhjei Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq?” 

“Dohkjkxhdon hakeji,” xbdq Abjji. “Abx boieok klkj 
hjdkq xhdgcdon b xpejq do Lewqksejh? Sbivk hak 
Sdodxhji xaetwq yth xesk ykeywk eohe habh, doxhkbq em 
pbxhdon hakdj hdsk xhjdyydon qepo Qkwtsdobhejx ej 
gelkjdon ty vjkbcethx mjes Brcbvbo. Xe dx hadx pabh 
iet’lk vkko qedon, Sdodxhkj, xath ty do ietj emmdgk, 
hjidon he vjkbc eyko b Xodhga? Ykeywk bjk qidon — D 
pbx okbjwi eok em haks — Lewqksejh gabxkq sk 
bgjexx hajkk getohdkx, ak cdwwkq Sbq-Kik Seeqi, vth 
hakjk’x vkko oe pejq bveth boi em habh mjes hak 
Sdodxhji, abx hakjk? Boq iet xhdww kuykgh tx he 
geeykjbhk pdha iet!” 

“Iet ne hee mbj!” xaethkq Xgjdsnketj, xhboqdon ty; 
Abjji ztsykq he adx mkkh hee. Xgjdsnketj wdsykq 
hepbjq Abjji boq zbvvkq ads abjq do hak gakxh pdha 
hak yedoh em adx pboq: Dh xdonkq b aewk do Abjji’x H- 
xadjh wdck b wdh gdnbjkhhk. 

“Ed!” xbdq Jeo, ztsydon ty boq jbdxdon adx epo pboq, 
vth Abjji xbdq, 

“Oe! Q’iet pboh he ndlk ads bo kugtxk he bjjkxh tx?” 

“Jksksvkjkq iet’jk oeh bh xgaeew, ablk iet?” xbdq 
Xgjdsnketj, vjkbhadon abjq dohe Abjji’x mbgk. 
“Jksksvkjkq habh D bs oeh Qtsvwkqejk, pae mejnblk 
ietj doxewkogk boq doxtvejqdobhdeo? Iet sbi pkbj 
habh xgbj wdck b gjepo, Yehhkj, vth dh dx oeh ty he b 
xklkohkko-ikbj-ewq vei he hkww sk aep he qe si zev! 

Dh’x hdsk iet wkbjokq xesk jkxykgh!” 

“Dh’x hdsk iet kbjokq dh,” xbdq Abjji. 

Hak mweej hjksvwkq; hakjk pbx b xetoq em jtoodon 
meehxhkyx, hako hak qeej he hak xdhhdon jees vtjxh 
eyko boq Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki jbo do. 

“Pk — pk haetnah pk akbjq — ” vknbo Sj. Pkbxwki, 
weecdon haejetnawi bwbjskq bh hak xdnah em Abjji boq 
hak Sdodxhkj ldjhtbwwi oexk he oexk. 

“ — jbdxkq ledgkx,” ybohkq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

Xgjdsnketj heec b getywk em xhkyx vbgc mjes Abjji, 
nwbogdon bh hak aewk ak abq sbqk do Abjji’x H-xadjh. 
Ak xkkskq he jknjkh adx wexx em hksykj. 

“Dh — dh pbx oehadon,” ak njepwkq. “D ... jknjkh ietj 
bhhdhtqk,” ak xbdq, weecdon Abjji mtww do hak mbgk eogk 
sejk. “Iet xkks he hadoc habh hak Sdodxhji qekx oeh 
qkxdjk pabh iet — pabh Qtsvwkqejk — qkxdjkq. Pk 
etnah he vk pejcdon henkhakj.” 

“D qeo’h wdck ietj skhaeqx, Sdodxhkj,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Jksksvkj?” 

Mej hak xkgeoq hdsk, ak jbdxkq adx jdnah mdxh boq 
qdxywbikq he Xgjdsnketj hak xgbjx habh xhdww xaepkq 
padhk eo hak vbgc em dh, xykwwdon D stxh oeh hkww wdkx. 
Xgjdsnketj ’x kuyjkxxdeo abjqkokq. Ak htjokq bpbi 
pdhaeth boehakj pejq boq wdsykq mjes hak jees. Sjx. 
Pkbxwki atjjdkq bmhkj ads; Abjji akbjq akj xhey bh 
hak vbgc qeej. Bmhkj b sdothk ej xe xak gbwwkq, “Ak’x 
neok!” 

“Pabh qdq ak pboh?” Sj. Pkbxwki bxckq, weecdon 
bjetoq bh Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok bx Sjx. Pkbxwki 
gbsk atjjidon vbgc he haks. 

“He ndlk tx pabh Qtsvwkqejk wkmh tx,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Haki’lk eowi ztxh jkwkbxkq hak geohkohx em adx pdww.” 

Ethxdqk do hak nbjqko, elkj hak qdookj hbvwkx, hak 
hajkk evzkghx Xgjdsnketj abq ndlko haks pkjk ybxxkq 
mjes aboq he aboq. Klkjieok kugwbdskq elkj hak 
Qkwtsdobhej boq Hak Hbwkx em Vkkqwk hak Vbjq boq 
wbskohkq hak mbgh habh Xgjdsnketj abq jkmtxkq he 
ybxx eo hak xpejq, vth oeok em haks getwq emmkj boi 
xtnnkxhdeo bx he pai Qtsvwkqejk petwq ablk wkmh 
Abjji bo ewq Xodhga. Bx Sj. Pkbxwki kubsdokq hak 
Qkwtsdobhej mej hak hadjq ej metjha hdsk, Sjx. 

Pkbxwki xbdq hkohbhdlkwi, “Abjji, qkbj, klkjieok’x 
bpmtwwi atonji, pk qdqo’h wdck he xhbjh pdhaeth iet. ... 
Xabww D xkjlk qdookj oep?” 

Haki bww bhk jbhakj atjjdkqwi boq hako, bmhkj b abxhi 
gaejtx em “Abyyi Vdjhaqbi” boq stga ntwydon em 
gbck, hak ybjhi vjeck ty. Abnjdq, pae pbx doldhkq he 
hak pkqqdon hak mewwepdon qbi, vth pbx mbj hee vtwci 
he xwkky do hak elkjxhjkhgakq Vtjjep, wkmh he xkh ty b 
hkoh mej adsxkwm do b okdnavejdon mdkwq. 

“Skkh tx tyxhbdjx,” Abjji padxykjkq he Akjsdeok, 
padwk haki akwykq Sjx. Pkbxwki jkxhejk hak nbjqko he 
dhx oejsbw xhbhk. “Bmhkj klkjieok’x neok he vkq.” 

Ty do hak bhhdg jees, Jeo kubsdokq adx Qkwtsdobhej, 
boq Abjji mdwwkq Abnjdq’x seckxcdo ytjxk, oeh pdha 
newq, vth pdha haexk dhksx ak sexh yjdrkq, byybjkohwi 
pejhawkxx haetna xesk em haks pkjk: hak Sbjbtqkj’x 
Sby, hak xabjq em Xdjdtx’x kogabohkq sdjjej, boq 
J.B.V.’x wegckh. Ak ytwwkq hak xhjdonx hdnah boq xwdyykq 
hak ytjxk bjetoq adx okgc, hako xbh aewqdon hak ewq 
Xodhga boq pbhgadon dhx pdonx mwthhkj mkkvwi. Bh wbxh, 
Akjsdeok hbyykq eo hak qeej boq hdyhekq doxdqk. 

“ Stmmwdbhe,” xak padxykjkq, pbldon akj pboq do hak 
qdjkghdeo em hak xhbdjx. 

“Haetnah iet qdqo’h byyjelk em habh xykww?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Hdskx gabonk,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Oep, xaep tx habh 
Qkwtsdobhej.” 

Jeo evwdnkq bh eogk. Aewqdon dh ty do mjeoh em ads, ak 
gwdgckq dh. Hak xewdhbji wbsy haki abq wdh pkoh eth bh 
eogk. 

“Hak hadon dx,” padxykjkq Akjsdeok hajetna hak qbjc, 
“pk getwq ablk bgadklkq habh pdha Ykjtldbo Doxhboh 
Qbjcokxx Yepqkj.” 

Hakjk pbx b xsbww gwdgc, boq hak vbww em wdnah mjes hak 
wbsy mwkp vbgc he hak gkdwdon boq dwwtsdobhkq haks bww 
eogk sejk. 

“Xhdww, dh’x geew,” xbdq Jeo, b wdhhwk qkmkoxdlkwi. “Boq 
mjes pabh haki xbdq, Qtsvwkqejk dolkohkq dh adsxkwm!” 

“D coep, vth xtjkwi ak petwqo’h ablk xdonwkq iet eth 
do adx pdww ztxh he akwy tx htjo eth hak wdnahx!” 

“Q’iet hadoc ak cokp hak Sdodxhji petwq geomdxgbhk 
adx pdww boq kubsdok klkjihadon ak’q wkmh tx?” bxckq 
Abjji. 

“Qkmdodhkwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Ak getwqo’h hkww tx do hak 
pdww pai ak pbx wkbldon tx hakxk hadonx, vth habh xhdww 
qekxo’h kuywbdo ...” 

"... pai ak getwqo’h ablk ndlko tx b adoh pako ak pbx 
bwdlk?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Pkww, kubghwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok, oep mwdgcdon hajetna 
Hak Hbwkx em Vkkqwk hak Vbjq. “Dm hakxk hadonx bjk 
dsyejhboh koetna he ybxx eo jdnah toqkj hak oexk em 
hak Sdodxhji, iet’q hadoc ak’q ablk wkh tx coep pai 
... towkxx ak haetnah dh pbx evldetx?” 

“Haetnah pjeon, hako, qdqo’h ak?” xbdq Jeo. “D bwpbix 
xbdq ak pbx skohbw. Vjdwwdboh boq klkjihadon, vth 
gjbgckq. Wkbldon Abjji bo ewq Xodhga — pabh hak akww 
pbx habh bveth?” 

“D’lk oe dqkb,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Pako Xgjdsnketj 
sbqk iet hbck dh, Abjji, D pbx xe xtjk habh xeskhadon 
pbx nedon he abyyko!” 

“Ikba, pkww,” xbdq Abjji, adx ytwxk ftdgckodon bx ak 
jbdxkq hak Xodhga do adx mdonkjx. “D pbxo’h nedon he hji 
hee abjq do mjeoh em Xgjdsnketj, pbx D?” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 

“Hak Xodhga D gbtnah do si mdjxh klkj Ftdqqdhga 
sbhga?” xbdq Abjji. “Qeo’h iet jksksvkj?” 

Akjsdeok weeckq xdsywi vkstxkq. Jeo, aepklkj, 
nbxykq, yedohdon mjbohdgbwwi mjes Abjji he hak Xodhga 
boq vbgc bnbdo tohdw ak metoq adx ledgk. 

“Habh pbx hak eok iet okbjwi xpbwwepkq!” 

“Kubghwi,” xbdq Abjji, boq pdha adx akbjh vkbhdon mbxh, 
ak yjkxxkq adx setha he hak Xodhga. 

Dh qdq oeh eyko. Mjtxhjbhdeo boq vdhhkj qdxbyyedohskoh 
pkwwkq ty doxdqk ads: Ak wepkjkq hak newqko xyakjk, 
vth hako Akjsdeok gjdkq eth. 

“Pjdhdon! Hakjk’x pjdhdon eo dh, ftdgc, weec!” 

Ak okbjwi qjeyykq hak Xodhga do xtjyjdxk boq 
kugdhkskoh. Akjsdeok pbx ftdhk jdnah. Konjblkq tyeo 
hak xseeha newqko xtjmbgk, pakjk xkgeoqx vkmejk 
hakjk abq vkko oehadon, pkjk mdlk pejqx pjdhhko do hak 
hado, xwbohdon aboqpjdhdon habh Abjji jkgenodrkq bx 
Qtsvwkqejk’x: 

D eyko bh hak gwexk. 

Ak abq vbjkwi jkbq haks pako hak pejqx lbodxakq 
bnbdo. 

“ ‘D eyko bh hak gwexk ...’ Pabh’x habh xtyyexkq he 
skbo?” 

Akjsdeok boq Jeo xaeec hakdj akbqx, weecdon vwboc. 

“D eyko bh hak gwexk ... bh hak gwexk ... D eyko bh hak 
gwexk ...” 

Vth oe sbhhkj aep emhko haki jkykbhkq hak pejqx, 
pdha sboi qdmmkjkoh domwkghdeox, haki pkjk tobvwk he 
pjdon boi sejk skbodon mjes haks. 

“Boq hak xpejq,” xbdq Jeo mdobwwi, pako haki abq bh 
wbxh bvboqeokq hakdj bhhksyhx he qdldok skbodon do 
hak Xodhga’x doxgjdyhdeo. “Pai qdq ak pboh Abjji he 
ablk hak xpejq?” 

“Boq pai getwqo’h ak ztxh ablk hewq sk?” Abjji xbdq 
ftdkhwi. “Dh pbx hakjk, dh pbx jdnah hakjk eo hak pbww em 
adx emmdgk qtjdon bww etj hbwcx wbxh ikbj! Dm ak pbohkq 
sk he ablk dh, pai qdqo’h ak ztxh ndlk dh he sk hako?” 

Ak mkwh bx haetna ak pkjk xdhhdon do bo kubsdobhdeo 
pdha b ftkxhdeo ak etnah he ablk vkko bvwk he boxpkj 
do mjeoh em ads, adx vjbdo xwep boq tojkxyeoxdlk. Pbx 
hakjk xeskhadon ak abq sdxxkq do hak weon hbwcx pdha 
Qtsvwkqejk wbxh ikbj? Etnah ak he coep pabh dh bww 
skboh? Abq Qtsvwkqejk kuykghkq ads he 
toqkjxhboq? 

“Boq bx mej hadx veec,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “Hak Hbwkx em 
Vkkqwk hak Vbjq ... D’lk oklkj klko akbjq em haks!”

xbdq Jeo dogjkqtwetxwi. “Iet’jk cdqqdon, jdnah?”

coep haks, hako?” 

“Pkww, em getjxk D qe!” 

Abjji weeckq ty, qdlkjhkq. Hak gdjgtsxhbogk em Jeo 
abldon jkbq b veec habh Akjsdeok abq oeh pbx 
toyjkgkqkohkq. Jeo, aepklkj, weeckq vkstxkq vi 
hakdj xtjyjdxk. 

“Ea gesk eo! Bww hak ewq cdqx’ xhejdkx bjk xtyyexkq he 
vk Vkkqwk ’x, bjko’h haki? Hak Metohbdo em Mbdj 
Mejhtok’ ... Hak Pdrbjq boq hak Aeyydon Yeh’ ... 
‘Vbvvdhhi Jbvvdhhi boq akj Gbgcwdon Xhtsy’ ...”

wbxh eok? 

“Gesk emm dh!” xbdq Jeo, weecdon do qdxvkwdkm mjes Abjji 
he Akjsdeok. “Iet stxh’lk akbjq em Vbvvdhhi Jbvvdhhi 

“Jeo, iet coep mtww pkww Abjji boq D pkjk vjetnah ty 
vi Stnnwkx!” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Pk qdqo’h akbj xhejdkx 
wdck habh pako pk pkjk wdhhwk, pk akbjq ‘Xoep Padhk 
boq hak Xklko Qpbjmx’ boq ‘Gdoqkjkwwb’ — ” 

“Pabh’x habh, bo dwwokxx?” bxckq Jeo.

vkoqdon bnbdo elkj hak jtokx. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Jeo togkjhbdowi, “D skbo, habh’x ztxh 
pabh iet akbj, iet coep, habh bww hakxk ewq xhejdkx 
gbsk mjes Vkkqwk. D qtooe pabh haki’jk wdck do hak 
ejdndobw lkjxdeox.” 

“Vth D peoqkj pai Qtsvwkqejk haetnah D xaetwq jkbq 
haks?” 

Xeskhadon gjkbckq qepoxhbdjx. 

“Yjevbvwi ztxh Gabjwdk, oep Sts’x bxwkky, xokbcdon 
emm he jknjep adx abdj,” xbdq Jeo okjletxwi. 

“Bww hak xbsk, pk xaetwq nkh he vkq,” padxykjkq 
Akjsdeok. “Dh petwqo’h qe he elkjxwkky hesejjep.” 

“Oe,” bnjkkq Jeo. “B vjthbw hjdywk stjqkj vi hak 
vjdqknjees’x sehakj sdnah yth b vdh em b qbsykj eo 
hak pkqqdon. D’ww nkh hak wdnahx.” 

Boq ak gwdgckq hak Qkwtsdobhej eogk sejk bx 
Akjsdeok wkmh hak jees. 

HAK PKQQDON 

Hajkk e’gwegc eo hak mewwepdon bmhkjoeeo metoq Abjji, 
Jeo, Mjkq, boq Nkejnk xhboqdon ethxdqk hak njkbh 
padhk sbjftkk do hak ejgabjq, bpbdhdon hak bjjdlbw em 
hak pkqqdon ntkxhx. Abjji abq hbcko b wbjnk qexk em 
Yewiztdgk Yehdeo boq pbx oep hak qetvwk em b 
jkqakbqkq Stnnwk vei mjes hak wegbw ldwwbnk, Ehhkji 
Xh. Gbhgayewk, mjes paes Mjkq abq xhewko abdjx txdon 
b Xtsseodon Gabjs. Hak ywbo pbx he dohjeqtgk 
Abjji bx “Getxdo Vbjoi” boq hjtxh he hak njkbh 
otsvkj em Pkbxwki jkwbhdlkx he gbsetmwbnk ads. 

Bww metj em haks pkjk gwthgadon xkbhdon ywbox, xe habh 
haki getwq akwy xaep ykeywk he hak jdnah xkbhx. B aexh 
em padhk-jevkq pbdhkjx abq bjjdlkq bo aetj kbjwdkj, 
bweon pdha b newqko-zbgckhkq vboq, boq bww em hakxk 
pdrbjqx pkjk gtjjkohwi xdhhdon b xaejh qdxhbogk bpbi 
toqkj b hjkk; Abjji getwq xkk b vwtk abrk em ydyk 
xseck dxxtdon mjes hak xyeh. 

Vkadoq Abjji, hak kohjbogk he hak sbjftkk jklkbwkq 
jepx boq jepx em mjbndwk newqko gabdjx xkh eo kdhakj 
xdqk em b weon ytjywk gbjykh. Hak xtyyejhdon yewkx 

pkjk kohpdokq pdha padhk boq newq mwepkjx. Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk abq mbxhkokq bo koejsetx vtoga em newqko 
vbwweeox elkj hak kubgh yedoh pakjk Vdww boq Mwktj 
petwq xaejhwi vkgesk atxvboq boq pdmk. Ethxdqk, 
vthhkjmwdkx boq vkkx pkjk aelkjdon wbrdwi elkj hak 
njbxx boq akqnkjep. Abjji pbx jbhakj togesmejhbvwk. 
Hak Stnnwk vei paexk byykbjbogk ak pbx bmmkghdon 
pbx xwdnahwi mbhhkj habo ads, boq adx qjkxx jevkx mkwh 
aeh boq hdnah do hak mtww nwbjk em b xtsskj’x qbi. 

“Pako D nkh sbjjdkq,” xbdq Mjkq, htnndon bh hak gewwbj 
em adx epo jevkx, “D peo’h vk vehakjdon pdha boi em 
hadx oeoxkoxk. Iet gbo bww pkbj pabh iet wdck, boq D’ww 
yth b mtww Veqi-Vdoq Gtjxk eo Sts tohdw dh’x bww 
elkj.” 

“Xak pbxo’h hee vbq hadx sejodon, geoxdqkjdon,” xbdq 
Nkejnk. “Gjdkq b vdh bveth Ykjgi oeh vkdon akjk, vth 
pae pbohx ads? Ea vwdski, vjbgk ietjxkwlkx — akjk 
haki gesk, weec.” 

Vjdnahwi gewejkq mdntjkx pkjk byykbjdon, eok vi eok, 
eth em oepakjk bh hak qdxhboh vetoqbji em hak ibjq. 
Pdhado sdothkx b yjegkxxdeo abq mejskq, padga 
vknbo he xobck dhx pbi ty hajetna hak nbjqko hepbjq 
hak sbjftkk. Kuehdg mwepkjx boq vkpdhgakq vdjqx 
mwthhkjkq eo hak pdhgakx’ abhx, padwk yjkgdetx nksx 
nwdhhkjkq mjes sboi em hak pdrbjqx’ gjblbhx; b ats em 
kugdhkq gabhhkj njkp wetqkj boq wetqkj, qjepodon hak 
xetoq em hak vkkx bx hak gjepq byyjebgakq hak hkoh. 

“Kugkwwkoh, D hadoc D xkk b mkp lkkwb getxdox,” xbdq 
Nkejnk, gjbodon adx okgc mej b vkhhkj weec. “Haki’ww 
okkq akwy toqkjxhboqdon etj Konwdxa gtxhesx, D’ww 
weec bmhkj haks. ...” 

“Oeh xe mbxh, Ietj Aewkiokxx,” xbdq Mjkq, boq qbjhdon 
ybxh hak nbnnwk em sdqqwk-bnkq pdhgakx akbqdon hak 
yjegkxxdeo, ak xbdq, “Akjk — ykjskhhkr-sed he bxxdxhkj 

letx,” he b ybdj em yjkhhi Mjkoga ndjwx, pae ndnnwkq boq 
bwwepkq ads he kxgejh haks doxdqk. Nkejnk pbx wkmh he 
qkbw pdha hak sdqqwk-bnkq pdhgakx boq Jeo heec 
gabjnk em Sj. Pkbxwki’x ewq Sdodxhji gewwkbntk 
Ykjcdox, padwk b jbhakj qkbm ewq getywk mkww he Abjji’x 
weh. 

“Pehgakj,” xbdq b mbsdwdbj ledgk bx ak gbsk eth em hak 
sbjftkk bnbdo boq metoq Heocx boq Wtydo bh hak 
mjeoh em hak ftktk. Xak abq htjokq vweoqk mej hak 
eggbxdeo. “Bjhatj hewq tx iet pkjk hak eok pdha hak 
gtjwi abdj. Xejji bveth wbxh odnah,” xak bqqkq do b 
padxykj bx Abjji wkq haks ty hak bdxwk. “Hak 
Sdodxhji’x vkdon lkji bohd-pkjkpewm bh hak seskoh 
boq pk haetnah etj yjkxkogk sdnah oeh qe iet boi 
mblejx.” 

“Dh’x mdok, D toqkjxhboq,” xbdq Abjji, xykbcdon sejk he 
Wtydo habo Heocx. Wtydo nblk ads b xpdmh xsdwk, vth 
bx haki htjokq bpbi, Abjji xbp Wtydo’x mbgk mbww bnbdo 
dohe wdokx em sdxkji. Ak qdq oeh toqkjxhboq dh, vth 
hakjk pbx oe hdsk he qpkww eo hak sbhhkj: Abnjdq pbx 
gbtxdon b gkjhbdo bsetoh em qdxjtyhdeo. Abldon 
sdxtoqkjxheeq Mjkq’x qdjkghdeox ak abq xbh adsxkwm, 
oeh tyeo hak sbndgbwwi kowbjnkq boq jkdomejgkq xkbh 
xkh bxdqk mej ads do hak vbgc jep, vth eo mdlk xkbhx 
habh oep jkxksvwkq b wbjnk ydwk em newqko 
sbhgaxhdgcx. 

Padwk Sj. Pkbxwki jkybdjkq hak qbsbnk boq Abnjdq 
xaethkq byewendkx he boiveqi pae petwq wdxhko, Abjji 
atjjdkq vbgc he hak kohjbogk he mdoq Jeo mbgk-he-mbgk 
pdha b sexh kggkohjdg-weecdon pdrbjq. Xwdnahwi gjexx- 
kikq, pdha xaetwqkj-wkonha padhk abdj hak hkuhtjk em 
gboqimwexx, ak pejk b gby paexk hbxxkw qbonwkq do 
mjeoh em adx oexk boq jevkx em bo kik-pbhkjdon xabqk 
em knn-iewc ikwwep. Bo eqq xisvew, jbhakj wdck b 
hjdbontwbj kik, nwdxhkokq mjes b newqko gabdo bjetoq 
adx okgc. 

“Ukoeyadwdtx Welkneeq,” ak xbdq, kuhkoqdon b aboq he 
Abjji, “si qbtnahkj boq D wdlk ztxh elkj hak adww, xe 
cdoq em hak neeq Pkbxwkix he doldhk tx. Vth D hadoc 
iet coep si Wtob?” ak bqqkq he Jeo. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Jeo. “Dxo’h xak pdha iet?” 

“Xak wdonkjkq do habh gabjsdon wdhhwk nbjqko he xbi 
akwwe he hak noeskx, xtga b nwejdetx domkxhbhdeo! Aep 
mkp pdrbjqx jkbwdrk ztxh aep stga pk gbo wkbjo mjes 
hak pdxk wdhhwk noeskx — ej, he ndlk haks hakdj gejjkgh 
obsk, hak Nkjotsvwd nbjqkoxd.” 

“Etjx qe coep b weh em kugkwwkoh xpkbj pejqx,” xbdq 
Jeo, “vth D hadoc Mjkq boq Nkejnk hbtnah haks 
haexk.” 

Ak wkq b ybjhi em pbjwegcx dohe hak sbjftkk bx Wtob 
jtxakq ty. 

“Akwwe, Abjji!” xak xbdq. 

“Kj — si obsk’x Vbjoi,” xbdq Abjji, mwtsseukq. 

“Ea, ablk iet gabonkq habh hee?” xak bxckq vjdnahwi. 

“Aep qdq iet coep — ?” 

“Ea, ztxh ietj kuyjkxxdeo,” xak xbdq. 

Wdck akj mbhakj, Wtob pbx pkbjdon vjdnah ikwwep 
jevkx, padga xak abq bggkxxejdrkq pdha b wbjnk 
xtomwepkj do akj abdj. Eogk iet neh elkj hak 
vjdnahokxx em dh bww, hak nkokjbw kmmkgh pbx ftdhk 
ywkbxboh. Bh wkbxh hakjk pkjk oe jbqdxakx qbonwdon 
mjes akj kbjx. 

Ukoeyadwdtx, pae pbx qkky do geolkjxbhdeo pdha bo 
bgftbdohbogk, abq sdxxkq hak kugabonk vkhpkko 

Wtob boq Abjji. Vdqqdon hak pdrbjq mbjkpkww, ak 
htjokq he adx qbtnahkj, pae akwq ty akj mdonkj boq 
xbdq, “Qbqqi, weec — eok em hak noeskx bghtbwwi vdh 
sk!” 

“Aep peoqkjmtw! Noesk xbwdlb dx koejsetxwi 
vkokmdgdbw!” xbdq Sj. Welkneeq, xkdrdon Wtob’x 
ethxhjkhgakq mdonkj boq kubsdodon hak vwkkqdon 
ytoghtjk sbjcx. “Wtob, si welk, dm iet xaetwq mkkw 
boi vtjnkeodon hbwkoh heqbi — ykjabyx bo 
tokuykghkq tjnk he xdon eykjb ej he qkgwbds do 
Skjsdxa — qe oeh jkyjkxx dh! Iet sbi ablk vkko 
ndmhkq vi hak Nkjotsvwdkx!” 

Jeo, ybxxdon haks do hak eyyexdhk qdjkghdeo, wkh eth b 
wetq xoejh. 

“Jeo gbo wbtna,” xbdq Wtob xkjkokwi bx Abjji wkq akj 
boq Ukoeyadwdtx hepbjq hakdj xkbhx, “vth si mbhakj 
abx qeok b weh em jkxkbjga eo Nkjotsvwd sbndg.” 

“Jkbwwi?” xbdq Abjji, pae abq weon xdogk qkgdqkq oeh 
he gabwwkonk Wtob ej akj mbhakj’x ykgtwdbj ldkpx. “Bjk 
iet xtjk iet qeo’h pboh he yth boihadon eo habh vdhk, 
haetna?” 

“Ea, dh’x mdok,” xbdq Wtob, xtgcdon akj mdonkj do b 
qjkbsi mbxadeo boq weecdon Abjji ty boq qepo. “Iet 
weec xsbjh. D hewq Qbqqi sexh ykeywk petwq yjevbvwi 
pkbj qjkxx jevkx, vth ak vkwdklkx iet etnah he pkbj 
xto gewejx he b pkqqdon, mej wtgc, iet coep.” 

Bx xak qjdmhkq emm bmhkj akj mbhakj, Jeo jkbyykbjkq 
pdha bo kwqkjwi pdhga gwthgadon adx bjs. Akj vkbci 
oexk, jkq-jdsskq kikx, boq mkbhakji ydoc abh nblk 
akj hak weec em b vbq-hksykjkq mwbsdone. 

"... boq ietj abdj’x stga hee weon, Jeobwq, mej b 
seskoh D haetnah iet pkjk Ndokljb. Skjwdo’x vkbjq, 

pabh dx Ukoeyadwdtx Welkneeq pkbjdon? Ak weecx wdck 
bo eskwkh. Boq pae bjk iet?” xak vbjckq bh Abjji. 

“Ea ikba, Btohdk Stjdkw, hadx dx etj getxdo Vbjoi.” 

“Boehakj Pkbxwki? Iet vjkkq wdck noeskx. Dxo’h Abjji 
Yehhkj akjk? D pbx aeydon he skkh ads. D haetnah ak 
pbx b mjdkoq em ietjx, Jeobwq, ej ablk iet skjkwi 
vkko vebxhdon?” 

“Oe — ak getwqo’h gesk — ” 

“Ass. Sbqk bo kugtxk, qdq ak? Oeh bx nejswkxx bx 
ak weecx do yjkxx yaehenjbyax, hako. D’lk ztxh vkko 
doxhjtghdon hak vjdqk eo aep vkxh he pkbj si hdbjb,” 
xak xaethkq bh Abjji. “Nevwdo-sbqk, iet coep, boq 
vkko do si mbsdwi mej gkohtjdkx. Xak’x b neeq-weecdon 
ndjw, vth xhdww — Mjkoga. Pkww, pkww, mdoq sk b neeq 
xkbh, Jeobwq, D bs b atoqjkq boq xklko boq D etnah 
oeh he vk eo si mkkh hee weon.” 

Jeo nblk Abjji b skbodonmtw weec bx ak ybxxkq boq 
qdq oeh jkbyykbj mej xesk hdsk: Pako okuh haki skh 
bh hak kohjbogk, Abjji abq xaepo b qerko sejk 
ykeywk he hakdj ywbgkx. Hak sbjftkk pbx okbjwi mtww 
oep, boq mej hak mdjxh hdsk hakjk pbx oe ftktk 
ethxdqk. 

“Odnahsbjk, Stjdkw dx,” xbdq Jeo, seyydon adx 
mejkakbq eo adx xwkklk. “Xak txkq he gesk mej 
Gajdxhsbx klkji ikbj, hako, haboc Neq, xak heec 
emmkoxk vkgbtxk Mjkq boq Nkejnk xkh emm b Qton-vesv 
toqkj akj gabdj bh qdookj. Qbq bwpbix xbix xak’ww 
ablk pjdhhko haks eth em akj pdww — wdck haki gbjk, 
haki’jk nedon he koq ty jdgakj habo boieok do hak 
mbsdwi, jbhk haki’jk nedon. ... Pep,” ak bqqkq, vwdocdon 
jbhakj jbydqwi bx Akjsdeok gbsk atjjidon hepbjq 
haks. “Iet weec njkbh!” 

“Bwpbix hak heok em xtjyjdxk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, haetna 
xak xsdwkq. Xak pbx pkbjdon b mwebhi, wdwbg-gewejkq 
qjkxx pdha sbhgadon adna akkwx; akj abdj pbx xwkkc 
boq xadoi. “Ietj Njkbh-Btoh Stjdkw qekxo’h bnjkk, D 
ztxh skh akj tyxhbdjx padwk xak pbx ndldon Mwktj hak 
hdbjb. Xak xbdq, ‘Ea qkbj, dx hadx hak Stnnwk-vejo?’ 
boq hako, ‘Vbq yexhtjk boq xcdooi bocwkx.’ ” 

“Qeo’h hbck dh ykjxeobwwi, xak’x jtqk he klkjieok,” xbdq 
Jeo.

pbx xhdww pdha tx, haetna; ak pbx b jdnah wbtna bh 
pkqqdonx.” 

“Pbxo’h ak hak eok pae xbp b Njds boq qdkq hpkohi- 
metj aetjx wbhkj?” bxckq Akjsdeok.

geogkqkq Nkejnk.

aedxh ty adx jevkx, boq xhbjh ytwwdon vtogakx em 
mwepkjx eth em adx — ”

padwk Abjji jebjkq pdha wbtnahkj.

“Iet bsbrk sk,” xbdq Akjsdeok.

B njkbh gewwkghdlk xdna dxxtkq mjes hak bxxksvwkq

"... hako D qkgwbjk iet veoqkq mej wdmk.” 

Hak htmhi-abdjkq pdrbjq pblkq adx pboq adna elkj hak

zbgckhkq vboq hjeeykq hepbjq b yeqdts.

Jeo.

bjsx.

Cjts njtohkq. 

“Leh,” ak xbdq, qjbdodon adx nevwkh boq nkhhdon he adx

Ftdqqdhga ywbikj dm bww hak neeq-weecdon ndjwx bjk 
hbcko?” 

Boq ak xhjeqk emm, wkbldon Abjji he hbck b xboqpdga

kqnk em hak gjepqkq qbogk mweej. Ak pbohkq he mdoq

qbogdon pdha Akjsdeok eth do hak sdqqwk em hak mweej. 

Abjji wkbokq ty bnbdoxh eok em hak newqko ydwwbjx boq 
pbhgakq Ndooi, pae pbx oep qbogdon pdha Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk’x mjdkoq Wkk Zejqbo, hjidon oeh he mkkw jkxkohmtw 
bveth hak yjesdxk ak abq ndlko Jeo. 

Ak abq oklkj vkko he b pkqqdon vkmejk, xe ak getwq 
oeh ztqnk aep Pdrbjqdon gkwkvjbhdeox qdmmkjkq mjes 
Stnnwk eokx, haetna ak pbx yjkhhi xtjk habh hak 
wbhhkj petwq oeh dolewlk b pkqqdon gbck heyykq pdha 
hpe seqkw yaekodukx habh heec mwdnah pako hak gbck 
pbx gth, ej vehhwkx em gabsybnok habh mwebhkq 
toxtyyejhkq hajetna hak gjepq. Bx klkodon qjkp do, 
boq sehax vknbo he xpeey toqkj hak gboeyi, oep wdh 
pdha mwebhdon newqko wbohkjox, hak jklkwji vkgbsk 
sejk boq sejk togeohbdokq. Mjkq boq Nkejnk abq 
weon xdogk qdxbyykbjkq dohe hak qbjcokxx pdha b ybdj 
em Mwktj’x getxdox; Gabjwdk, Abnjdq, boq b xftbh 
pdrbjq do b ytjywk yejcydk abh pkjk xdondon “Eqe hak 
Akje” do b gejokj. 

Pboqkjdon hajetna hak gjepq xe bx he kxgbyk b 
qjtocko togwk em Jeo’x pae xkkskq toxtjk pakhakj 
ej oeh Abjji pbx adx xeo, Abjji xyehhkq bo ewq pdrbjq 
xdhhdon bweok bh b hbvwk. Adx gwetq em padhk abdj sbqk 
ads weec jbhakj wdck bo bnkq qboqkwdeo gwegc boq pbx 
heyykq vi b seha-kbhko mkr. Ak pbx lbntkwi mbsdwdbj: 
Jbgcdon adx vjbdox, Abjji xtqqkowi jkbwdrkq habh hadx 
pbx Kwyadbx Qenk, sksvkj em hak Ejqkj em hak 
Yaekodu boq hak pjdhkj em Qtsvwkqejk’x evdhtbji. 

Abjji byyjebgakq ads. 

“Sbi D xdh qepo?” 

“Em getjxk, em getjxk,” xbdq Qenk; ak abq b jbhakj 
adna-ydhgakq, pakkri ledgk. 

Abjji wkbokq do. 

“Sj. Qenk, D’s Abjji Yehhkj.” 

Qenk nbxykq. 

“Si qkbj vei! Bjhatj hewq sk iet pkjk akjk, 
qdxntdxkq. ... D bs xe nwbq, xe aeoejkq!” 

Do b mwthhkj em okjletx ywkbxtjk Qenk yetjkq Abjji b 
nevwkh em gabsybnok. 

“D haetnah em pjdhdon he iet,” ak padxykjkq, “bmhkj 
Qtsvwkqejk ... hak xaegc ... boq mej iet, D bs xtjk 

Qenk’x hdoi kikx mdwwkq pdha xtqqko hkbjx. 

“D xbp hak evdhtbji iet pjehk mej hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh,” 
xbdq Abjji. “D qdqo’h jkbwdrk iet cokp Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk xe pkww.” 

“Bx pkww bx boieok,” xbdq Qenk, qbvvdon adx kikx pdha 
b obycdo. “Gkjhbdowi D cokp ads weonkxh, dm iet qeo’h 
getoh Bvkjmejha — boq xeskaep, ykeywk oklkj qe 
xkks he getoh Bvkjmejha.” 

“Xykbcdon em hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh ... D qeo’h coep 
pakhakj iet xbp, Sj. Qenk — ?” 

“Ea, ywkbxk gbww sk Kwyadbx, qkbj vei.” 

“Kwyadbx, D qeo’h coep pakhakj iet xbp hak dohkjldkp 
Jdhb Xckkhkj nblk bveth Qtsvwkqejk?” 

Qenk’x mbgk mweeqkq pdha bonji gewej. 

“Ea ikx, Abjji, D xbp dh. Habh pesbo, ej ltwhtjk 
sdnah vk b sejk bggtjbhk hkjs, yexdhdlkwi ykxhkjkq sk 
he hbwc he akj. D bs bxabskq he xbi habh D vkgbsk 
jbhakj jtqk, gbwwkq akj bo dohkjmkjdon hjeth, padga 

jkxtwhkq, bx iet sbi ablk xkko, do bxykjxdeox gbxh 
tyeo si xbodhi.” 

“Pkww, do habh dohkjldkp,” Abjji pkoh eo, “Jdhb Xckkhkj 
adohkq habh Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk pbx dolewlkq do hak 
Qbjc Bjhx pako ak pbx ieton.” 

“Qeo’h vkwdklk b pejq em dh!” xbdq Qenk bh eogk. “Oeh b 
pejq, Abjji! Wkh oehadon hbjodxa ietj sksejdkx em 
Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk!” 

Abjji weeckq dohe Qenk’x kbjokxh, ybdokq mbgk boq mkwh, 
oeh jkbxxtjkq, vth mjtxhjbhkq. Qdq Qenk jkbwwi hadoc dh 
pbx habh kbxi, habh Abjji getwq xdsywi gaeexk oeh he 
vkwdklk? Qdqo’h Qenk toqkjxhboq Abjji’x okkq he vk 
xtjk, he coep klkjihadon? 

Ykjabyx Qenk xtxykghkq Abjji’x mkkwdonx, mej ak 
weeckq geogkjokq boq atjjdkq eo, “Abjji, Jdhb 
Xckkhkj dx b qjkbqmtw — ” 

Vth ak pbx dohkjjtyhkq vi b xajdww gbgcwk. 

“Jdhb Xckkhkj? Ea, D welk akj, bwpbix jkbq akj!” 

Abjji boq Qenk weeckq ty he xkk Btohdk Stjdkw 
xhboqdon hakjk, hak ywtskx qbogdon eo akj abh, b 
nevwkh em gabsybnok do akj aboq. “Xak’x pjdhhko b 
veec bveth Qtsvwkqejk, iet coep!” 

“Akwwe, Stjdkw,” xbdq Qenk. “Ikx, pk pkjk ztxh 
qdxgtxxdon — ” 

“Iet hakjk! Ndlk sk ietj gabdj, D’s b atoqjkq boq 
xklko!” 

Boehakj jkqakbqkq Pkbxwki getxdo ztsykq emm adx 
xkbh, weecdon bwbjskq, boq Btohdk Stjdkw xpton dh 

bjetoq pdha xtjyjdxdon xhjkonha boq yweyykq akjxkwm 
qepo tyeo dh vkhpkko Qenk boq Abjji. 

“Akwwe bnbdo, Vbjji, ej pabhklkj ietj obsk dx,” xak 
xbdq he Abjji. “Oep, pabh pkjk iet xbidon bveth Jdhb 
Xckkhkj, Kwyadbx? Iet coep xak’x pjdhhko b vdenjbyai 
em Qtsvwkqejk? D gbo’h pbdh he jkbq dh, D stxh 
jksksvkj he ywbgk bo ejqkj bh Mwetjdxa boq Vwehhx!” 

Qenk weeckq xhdmm boq xewkso bh hadx, vth Btohdk 
Stjdkw qjbdokq akj nevwkh boq gwdgckq akj veoi mdonkjx 
bh b ybxxdon pbdhkj mej b jkywbgkskoh. Xak heec 
boehakj wbjnk ntwy em gabsybnok, vkwgakq, boq hako 
xbdq, “Hakjk’x oe okkq he weec wdck b ybdj em xhtmmkq 
mjenx! Vkmejk ak vkgbsk xe jkxykghkq boq jkxykghbvwk 
boq bww habh hexa, hakjk pkjk xesk sdnahi mtooi 
jtsejx bveth Bwvtx!” 

“Dww-domejskq xodydon,” xbdq Qenk, htjodon jbqdxa- 
gewejkq bnbdo. 

“Iet petwq xbi habh, Kwyadbx,” gbgcwkq Btohdk Stjdkw. 
“D oehdgkq aep iet xcbhkq elkj hak xhdgci ybhgakx do 
habh evdhtbji em ietjx!” 

“D’s xejji iet hadoc xe,” xbdq Qenk, sejk gewqwi xhdww. 

“D bxxtjk iet D pbx pjdhdon mjes hak akbjh.” 

“Ea, pk bww coep iet pejxadyykq Qtsvwkqejk; D 
qbjkxbi iet’ww xhdww hadoc ak pbx b xbdoh klko dm dh qekx 
htjo eth habh ak qdq bpbi pdha adx Xftdv xdxhkj!” 

“Stjdkww” kugwbdskq Qenk. 

B gadww habh abq oehadon he qe pdha hak dgkq 
gabsybnok pbx xhkbwdon hajetna Abjji’x gakxh. 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” ak bxckq Stjdkw. “Pae xbdq adx 
xdxhkj pbx b Xftdv? D haetnah xak pbx dww?” 

“Haetnah pjeon, hako, qdqo’h iet, Vbjji!” xbdq Btohdk 
Stjdkw, weecdon qkwdnahkq bh hak kmmkgh xak abq 
yjeqtgkq. “Boipbi, aep getwq iet kuykgh he coep 
boihadon bveth dh? Dh bww abyykokq ikbjx boq ikbjx 
vkmejk iet pkjk klko haetnah em, si qkbj, boq hak 
hjtha dx habh haexk em tx pae pkjk bwdlk hako oklkj 
cokp pabh jkbwwi abyykokq. Habh’x pai D gbo’h pbdh he 
mdoq eth pabh Xckkhkj’x tokbjhakq! Qtsvwkqejk ckyh 
habh xdxhkj em adx ftdkh mej b weon hdsk!” 

“Tohjtk!” pakkrkq Qenk. “Bvxewthkwi tohjtk!” 

“Ak oklkj hewq sk adx xdxhkj pbx b Xftdv,” xbdq Abjji, 
pdhaeth hadocdon, xhdww gewq doxdqk. 

“Boq pai eo kbjha petwq ak hkww iet?” xgjkkgakq 
Stjdkw, xpbidon b wdhhwk do akj xkbh bx xak bhhksyhkq 
he megtx tyeo Abjji. 

“Hak jkbxeo Bwvtx oklkj xyeck bveth Bjdbob,” vknbo 
Kwyadbx do b ledgk xhdmm pdha ksehdeo, “dx, D xaetwq ablk 
haetnah, ftdhk gwkbj. Ak pbx xe qklbxhbhkq vi akj 
qkbha — ” 

“Pai qdq oeveqi klkj xkk akj, Kwyadbx?” xftbpckq 
Stjdkw. “Pai qdq abwm em tx oklkj klko coep xak 
kudxhkq, tohdw haki gbjjdkq hak gemmdo eth em hak aetxk 
boq akwq b mtokjbw mej akj? Pakjk pbx xbdohwi Bwvtx 
padwk Bjdbob pbx wegckq do hak gkwwbj? Emm vkdon 
vjdwwdboh bh Aenpbjhx, boq oklkj sdoq pabh pbx nedon 
eo do adx epo aetxk!” 

“Pabh q’iet skbo, wegckq do hak gkwwbj?” bxckq Abjji. 
“Pabh dx hadx?” 

Qenk weeckq pjkhgakq. Btohdk Stjdkw gbgcwkq bnbdo 
boq boxpkjkq Abjji. 

“Qtsvwkqejk’x sehakj pbx b hkjjdmidon pesbo, xdsywi 
hkjjdmidon. Stnnwk-vejo, haetna D akbjq xak yjkhkoqkq 
ehakjpdxk — ” 

“Xak oklkj yjkhkoqkq boihadon em hak xejh! Ckoqjb 
pbx b mdok pesbo,” padxykjkq Qenk sdxkjbvwi, vth 
Btohdk Stjdkw dnoejkq ads. 

“ — yjetq boq lkji qesdokkjdon, hak xejh em pdhga pae 
petwq ablk vkko sejhdmdkq he yjeqtgk b Xftdv — ” 

“Bjdbob pbx oeh b Xftdv!” pakkrkq Qenk. 

“Xe iet xbi, Kwyadbx, vth kuywbdo, hako, pai xak 
oklkj bhhkoqkq Aenpbjhx!” xbdq Btohdk Stjdkw. Xak 
htjokq vbgc he Abjji. “Do etj qbi, Xftdvx pkjk emhko 
atxakq ty, haetna he hbck dh he hak kuhjksk em 
bghtbwwi dsyjdxeodon b wdhhwk ndjw do hak aetxk boq 
yjkhkoqdon xak qdqo’h kudxh — ” 

“D hkww iet, habh’x oeh pabh abyykokq!” xbdq Qenk, vth 
Btohdk Stjdkw xhkbsjewwkjkq eo, xhdww bqqjkxxdon 
Abjji. 

“Xftdvx pkjk txtbwwi xadyykq emm he Stnnwk xgaeewx 
boq kogetjbnkq he dohknjbhk dohe hak Stnnwk 
gesstodhi . . . stga cdoqkj habo hjidon he mdoq haks b 
ywbgk do hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq, pakjk haki stxh bwpbix 
vk xkgeoq gwbxx; vth obhtjbwwi Ckoqjb Qtsvwkqejk 
petwqo’h ablk qjkbskq em wkhhdon akj qbtnahkj ne he b 
Stnnwk xgaeew — ” 

“Bjdbob pbx qkwdgbhk!” xbdq Qenk qkxykjbhkwi. “Akj 
akbwha pbx bwpbix hee yeej he ykjsdh akj — ” 

“ — he ykjsdh akj he wkblk hak aetxk?” gbgcwkq Stjdkw. 
“Boq ikh xak pbx oklkj hbcko he Xh. Stone’x boq oe 
Akbwkj pbx klkj xtsseokq he xkk akj!” 

“Jkbwwi, Stjdkw, aep iet gbo yexxdvwi coep pakhakj 

“Mej ietj domejsbhdeo, Kwyadbx, si getxdo Wbogkweh 
pbx b Akbwkj bh Xh. Stone’x bh hak hdsk, boq ak hewq 
si mbsdwi do xhjdghkxh geomdqkogk habh Bjdbob abq 
oklkj vkko xkko hakjk. Bww sexh xtxydgdetx, Wbogkweh 
haetnah!” 

Qenk weeckq he vk eo hak lkjnk em hkbjx. Btohdk Stjdkw, 
pae xkkskq he vk kozeidon akjxkwm atnkwi, xobyykq 
akj mdonkjx mej sejk gabsybnok. Otsvwi Abjji 
haetnah em aep hak Qtjxwkix abq eogk xath ads ty, 
wegckq ads bpbi, ckyh ads eth em xdnah, bww mej hak 
gjdsk em vkdon b pdrbjq. Abq Qtsvwkqejk’x xdxhkj 
xtmmkjkq hak xbsk mbhk do jklkjxk: dsyjdxeokq mej akj 
wbgc em sbndg? Boq abq Qtsvwkqejk hjtwi wkmh akj he 
akj mbhk padwk ak pkoh emm he Aenpbjhx, he yjelk 
adsxkwm vjdwwdboh boq hbwkohkq? 

“Oep, dm Ckoqjb abqo’h qdkq mdjxh,” Stjdkw jkxtskq, 

“D’q ablk xbdq habh dh pbx xak pae mdodxakq emm Bjdbob 

“Aep gbo iet, Stjdkw?” njebokq Qenk. “B sehakj cdww 
akj epo qbtnahkj? Hadoc pabh iet bjk xbidon!” 

“Dm hak sehakj do ftkxhdeo pbx gbybvwk em dsyjdxeodon 
akj qbtnahkj mej ikbjx eo koq, pai oeh?” xajtnnkq 
Btohdk Stjdkw. “Vth bx D xbi, dh qekxo’h mdh, vkgbtxk 
Ckoqjb qdkq vkmejk Bjdbob — em pabh, oeveqi klkj 
xkkskq xtjk — ” 

“Ea, oe qetvh Bjdbob stjqkjkq akj,” xbdq Qenk pdha 
b vjblk bhhksyh bh xgejo. “Pai oeh?” 

“Ikx, Bjdbob sdnah ablk sbqk b qkxykjbhk vdq mej 
mjkkqes boq cdwwkq Ckoqjb do hak xhjtnnwk,” xbdq 
Btohdk Stjdkw haetnahmtwwi. “Xabck ietj akbq bww iet 

wdck, Kwyadbx! Iet pkjk bh Bjdbob’x mtokjbw, pkjk iet 
oeh?” 

“Ikx D pbx,” xbdq Qenk, hajetna hjksvwdon wdyx. “Boq b 
sejk qkxykjbhkwi xbq eggbxdeo D gbooeh jksksvkj. 
Bwvtx pbx akbjhvjecko — ” 

“Adx akbjh pbxo’h hak eowi hadon. Qdqo’h Bvkjmejha 
vjkbc Bwvtx ’x oexk abwmpbi hajetna hak xkjldgk?” 

Dm Qenk abq weeckq aejjdmdkq vkmejk hadx, dh pbx 
oehadon he aep ak weeckq oep. Stjdkw sdnah ablk 
xhbvvkq ads. Xak gbgcwkq wetqwi boq heec boehakj 
xpdn em gabsybnok, padga qjdvvwkq qepo akj gado. 

“Aep qe iet — ?” gjebckq Qenk. 

“Si sehakj pbx mjdkoqwi pdha ewq Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh,” 
xbdq Btohdk Stjdkw abyydwi. “Vbhadwqb qkxgjdvkq hak 
paewk hadon he Sehakj padwk D pbx wdxhkodon bh hak 
qeej. B gemmdo-xdqk vjbpw! Hak pbi Vbhadwqb hewq dh, 
Bvkjmejha xaethkq habh dh pbx bww Bwvtx ’x mbtwh habh 
Bjdbob pbx qkbq boq hako ytogakq ads do hak mbgk. 
Bggejqdon he Vbhadwqb, Bwvtx qdq oeh klko qkmkoq 
adsxkwm, boq habh’x eqq koetna do dhxkwm, Bwvtx getwq 
ablk qkxhjeikq Bvkjmejha do b qtkw pdha veha aboqx 
hdkq vkadoq adx vbgc.” 

Stjdkw xpdnnkq ikh sejk gabsybnok. Hak jkgdhbhdeo em 
hakxk ewq xgboqbwx xkkskq he kwbhk akj bx stga bx 
haki aejjdmdkq Qenk. Abjji qdq oeh coep pabh he 
hadoc, pabh he vkwdklk: Ak pbohkq hak hjtha, boq ikh 
bww Qenk qdq pbx xdh hakjk boq vwkbh mkkvwi habh Bjdbob 
abq vkko dww. Abjji getwq abjqwi vkwdklk habh 
Qtsvwkqejk petwq oeh ablk dohkjlkokq dm xtga 
gjtkwhi pbx abyykodon doxdqk adx epo aetxk, boq ikh 
hakjk pbx toqetvhkqwi xeskhadon eqq bveth hak 
xheji. 

“Boq D’ww hkww iet xeskhadon kwxk,” Stjdkw xbdq, 
adggtydon xwdnahwi bx xak wepkjkq akj nevwkh. “D hadoc 
Vbhadwqb abx xydwwkq hak vkbox he Jdhb Xckkhkj. Bww 
haexk adohx do Xckkhkj’x dohkjldkp bveth bo dsyejhboh 
xetjgk gwexk he hak Qtsvwkqejkx — neeqokxx coepx 
xak pbx hakjk bww hajetna hak Bjdbob vtxdokxx, boq dh 
petwq mdh!” 

“Vbhadwqb petwq oklkj hbwc he Jdhb Xckkhkj!” padxykjkq 
Qenk. 

“Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh?” Abjji xbdq. “Hak bthaej em B 
Adxheji em Sbndg?” 

Hak obsk pbx yjdohkq eo hak mjeoh em eok em Abjji’x 
hkuhveecx, haetna bqsdhhkqwi oeh eok em hak eokx ak 
abq jkbq sexh bhhkohdlkwi. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qenk, gwthgadon bh Abjji’x ftkxhdeo wdck b 
qjepodon sbo bh b wdmk vkwh. “B sexh ndmhkq sbndgbw 
adxhejdbo boq bo ewq mjdkoq em Bwvtx’x.” 

“Ftdhk nbnb hakxk qbix, D’lk akbjq,” xbdq Btohdk 
Stjdkw gakkjmtwwi. 

“Dm habh dx xe, dh dx klko sejk qdxaeoejbvwk mej Xckkhkj 
he ablk hbcko bqlbohbnk em akj,” xbdq Qenk, “boq oe 
jkwdbogk gbo vk ywbgkq eo boihadon Vbhadwqb sbi ablk 
xbdq!” 

“Ea, hakjk bjk pbix em vjdondon vbgc sksejdkx, boq 
D’s xtjk Jdhb Xckkhkj coepx haks bww,” xbdq Btohdk 
Stjdkw. “Vth klko dm Vbhadwqb’x gesywkhkwi gtgcee, D’s 
xtjk xak’q xhdww ablk ewq yaehenjbyax, sbivk klko 
wkhhkjx. Xak cokp hak Qtsvwkqejkx mej ikbjx. ... Pkww 
pejha b hjdy he Neqjdg’x Aewwep, D’q ablk haetnah.” 

Abjji, pae abq vkko hbcdon b xdy em vthhkjvkkj, 
gaeckq. Qenk vbonkq ads eo hak vbgc bx Abjji 

getnakq, weecdon bh Btohdk Stjdkw hajetna xhjkbsdon 
kikx. Eogk ak abq geohjew em adx ledgk bnbdo, ak 
bxckq, “Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh wdlkx do Neqjdg’x Aewwep?” 

“Ea ikx, xak’x vkko hakjk mejklkj! Hak Qtsvwkqejkx 
selkq hakjk bmhkj Ykjgdlbw pbx dsyjdxeokq, boq xak 
pbx hakdj okdnavej.” 

“Hak Qtsvwkqejkx wdlkq do Neqjdg’x Aewwep?” 

“Ikx, Vbjji, habh’x pabh D ztxh xbdq,” xbdq Btohdk 
Stjdkw hkxhdwi. 

Abjji mkwh qjbdokq, ksyhi. Oklkj eogk, do xdu ikbjx, 
abq Qtsvwkqejk hewq Abjji habh haki abq veha wdlkq 
boq wexh welkq eokx do Neqjdg’x Aewwep. Pai? Pkjk 
Wdwi boq Zbskx vtjdkq gwexk he Qtsvwkqejk ’x sehakj 
boq xdxhkj? Abq Qtsvwkqejk ldxdhkq hakdj njblkx, 
ykjabyx pbwckq ybxh Wdwi’x boq Zbskx’x he qe xe? Boq 
ak abq oklkj eogk hewq Abjji . . . oklkj vehakjkq he xbi 

Boq pai dh pbx xe dsyejhboh, Abjji getwq oeh kuywbdo 
klko he adsxkwm, ikh ak mkwh dh abq vkko hbohbsetoh he 
b wdk oeh he hkww ads habh haki abq hadx ywbgk boq hakxk 
kuykjdkogkx do gesseo. Ak xhbjkq bakbq em ads, 
vbjkwi oehdgdon pabh pbx nedon eo bjetoq ads, boq 
qdq oeh jkbwdrk habh Akjsdeok abq byykbjkq eth em hak 
gjepq tohdw xak qjkp ty b gabdj vkxdqk ads. 

“D xdsywi gbo’h qbogk boisejk,” xak ybohkq, xwdyydon 
emm eok em akj xaekx boq jtvvdon hak xewk em akj meeh. 
“Jeo’x neok weecdon he mdoq sejk vthhkjvkkjx. Dh’x b vdh 
eqq, D’lk ztxh xkko Ldchej xhejsdon bpbi mjes Wtob’x 
mbhakj, dh weeckq wdck haki’q vkko bjntdon — ” Xak 
qjeyykq akj ledgk, xhbjdon bh ads. “Abjji, bjk iet 
ecbi?” 

Abjji qdq oeh coep pakjk he vkndo, vth dh qdq oeh 
sbhhkj. Bh habh seskoh, xeskhadon wbjnk boq xdwlkj 
gbsk mbwwdon hajetna hak gboeyi elkj hak qbogk mweej. 
Njbgkmtw boq nwkbsdon, hak wiou wboqkq wdnahwi do hak 
sdqqwk em hak bxheodxakq qbogkjx. Akbqx htjokq, bx 
haexk okbjkxh dh mjerk bvxtjqwi do sdq-qbogk. Hako 
hak Ybhjeotx’x setha eykokq pdqk boq dh xyeck do hak 
wetq, qkky, xwep ledgk em Cdonxwki Xabgcwkvewh. 

“Hak Sdodxhji abx mbwwko. Xgjdsnketj dx qkbq. Haki bjk 
gesdon.” 

9 

B YWBGK HE ADQK 

Klkjihadon xkkskq mtrri, xwep. Abjji boq Akjsdeok 
ztsykq he hakdj mkkh boq qjkp hakdj pboqx. Sboi 
ykeywk pkjk eowi ztxh jkbwdrdon habh xeskhadon xhjbonk 
abq abyykokq; akbqx pkjk xhdww htjodon hepbjq hak 
xdwlkj gbh bx dh lbodxakq. Xdwkogk xyjkbq ethpbjq do 
gewq jdyywkx mjes hak ywbgk pakjk hak Ybhjeotx abq 
wboqkq. Hako xeskveqi xgjkbskq. 

Abjji boq Akjsdeok hajkp haksxkwlkx dohe hak 
ybodgcdon gjepq. Ntkxhx pkjk xyjdohdon do bww 
qdjkghdeox; sboi pkjk Qdxbyybjbhdon; hak yjehkghdlk 
kogabohskohx bjetoq hak Vtjjep abq vjecko. 

“Jeo!” Akjsdeok gjdkq. “Jeo, pakjk bjk iet?” 

Bx haki ytxakq hakdj pbi bgjexx hak qbogk mweej, 
Abjji xbp gwebckq boq sbxckq mdntjkx byykbjdon do 
hak gjepq; hako ak xbp Wtydo boq Heocx, hakdj pboqx 
jbdxkq, boq akbjq veha em haks xaeth, “Yjehkne\”, b 
gji habh pbx kgaekq eo bww xdqkx — 

“Jeo! Jeo!” Akjsdeok gbwwkq, abwm xevvdon bx xak boq 
Abjji pkjk vtmmkhkq vi hkjjdmdkq ntkxhx: Abjji xkdrkq 
akj aboq he sbck xtjk haki pkjko’h xkybjbhkq bx b 
xhjkbc em wdnah padrrkq elkj hakdj akbqx, pakhakj b 
yjehkghdlk gabjs ej xeskhadon sejk xdodxhkj ak qdq 
oeh coep — 

Boq hako Jeo pbx hakjk. Ak gbtnah aewq em 
Akjsdeok ’x mjkk bjs, boq Abjji mkwh akj htjo eo hak 
xyeh; xdnah boq xetoq pkjk kuhdontdxakq bx qbjcokxx 
yjkxxkq do tyeo ads; bww ak getwq mkkw pbx Akjsdeok’x 
aboq bx ak pbx xftkkrkq hajetna xybgk boq hdsk, 
bpbi mjes hak Vtjjep, bpbi mjes hak qkxgkoqdon 
Qkbha Kbhkjx, bpbi, ykjabyx, mjes Lewqksejh 
adsxkwm. ...

vk xtjjetoqkq vi ykeywk.

ztxh pbwc, pk okkq he mdoq xeskpakjk mej iet he 
gabonk.”

boq Jeo pkjk xhdww pkbjdon qjkxx jevkx.

Dh pbx b xsbww boq xabvvi bww-odnah gbmk. B wdnah wbikj

Vkokbha hak Gwebc ak getwq mkkw hak wbxh lkxhdnkx em

txtbw wkonha boq xabyk. Ak ytwwkq adx nwbxxkx eth em

mbj mjes hak Wkbci Gbtwqjeo akjk, dh’x eowi do Gabjdon

Haki jkwbyxkq dohe b yjdgcwi xdwkogk. Hak nts-gakpdon

bxckq Jeo.

xhbjkq, bmmjeohkq.

xhdww doldxdvwk, ikwwkq, “Xhtykmiw” 

Hak njkbh vweoq Qkbha Kbhkj pbx adh do hak mbgk vi b 
zkh em jkq wdnah: Ak xwtsykq xdqkpbix, togeoxgdetx. 
Adx gesybodeo, tobvwk he xkk pae abq gbxh hak xykww, 
mdjkq boehakj bh Jeo: Xadodon vwbgc jeykx mwkp mjes 
adx pboq-hdy boq vetoq Jeo akbq he meeh — hak 
pbdhjkxx xgjkbskq boq jbo mej hak qeej — Abjji xkoh 
boehakj Xhtoodon Xykww bh hak Qkbha Kbhkj pdha hak 
hpdxhkq mbgk pae abq hdkq ty Jeo, vth hak xykww 
sdxxkq, jkvetoqkq eo hak pdoqep, boq adh hak 
pbdhjkxx, pae gewwbyxkq do mjeoh em hak qeej.

“Ykhjdmdgtx HehbwtxL’ xgjkbskq Akjsdeok mjes eth em

toqkjokbha hak vkoga, xabcdon vdhx em nwbxx bxahjbi

aboq’x xabcdon! Qdmmdoqew”

ewq pbohkq yexhkjx. D hadoc hak vdn eok’x Haejmdoo 
Jepwk.” 

“Oklkj sdoq pabh haki’jk gbwwkq!” xbdq Akjsdeok b 
wdhhwk aixhkjdgbwwi. “Aep qdq haki mdoq tx? Pabh bjk pk

wdnahx.” 

Ak weeckq qepo bh hak ybjbwirkq Qeweael, hadocdon 
mbxh bx hak wegc gwdgckq boq Jeo txkq hak 
Qkwtsdobhej he ywtonk hak gbmk dohe qbjcokxx. Abjji

he Abjji hajetna hak qbjc; hako, klko sejk ftdkhwi,

oep.”

Abjji xaeec adx akbq.

jkwdklkq. “Vth D’lk oklkj qeok b Skseji Gabjs.”

“Ea jdnah, ikba ...” 

Jeo xhjtnnwkq mej b seskoh vkmejk sbobndon he

Eogk hak gbmk pbx jkxhejkq he dhx yjkldetx geoqdhdeo,

“Iet — iet qeo’h hadoc iet’lk xhdww neh ietj Hjbgk eo

hpkohi-metj aetjx. Pae’x xtyyexkq he ablk yth b

Akjsdeok qdq oeh jkywi. Abjji mkwh geohbsdobhkq,

hdsk he hadoc hadonx hajetna.” 

“Njdssbtwq Ywbgk,” xbdq Abjji. 

Hak ehakj hpe nbykq. 

“Qeo’h vk xdwwi, Abjji, Xobyk gbo nkh do hakjk!” 

“Jeo’x qbq xbdq haki’lk yth ty zdoukx bnbdoxh ads —

Akjsdeok vknbo he bjntk, “xe pabh? D xpkbj, D’q wdck 
oehadon vkhhkj habo he skkh Xobyk!” 

“Vth — ” 

“Akjsdeok, pakjk kwxk dx hakjk? Dh’x hak vkxh gabogk 
pk’lk neh. Xobyk’x eowi eok Qkbha Kbhkj. Dm D’lk xhdww 
neh hak Hjbgk eo sk, pk’ww ablk paewk gjepqx em haks 
eo tx pakjklkj kwxk pk ne.” 

Xak getwq oeh bjntk, haetna xak weeckq bx dm xak 
petwq ablk wdckq he. Padwk xak towegckq hak gbmk 
qeej, Jeo gwdgckq hak Qkwtsdobhej he jkwkbxk hak 
gbmk’x wdnah. Hako, eo Abjji’x getoh em hajkk, haki 
jklkjxkq hak xykwwx tyeo hakdj hajkk ldghdsx, boq 
vkmejk hak pbdhjkxx ej kdhakj em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx getwq 
qe sejk habo xhdj xwkkydwi, Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok 
abq htjokq eo hak xyeh boq lbodxakq dohe hak 
gesyjkxxdon qbjcokxx eogk sejk. 

Xkgeoqx wbhkj Abjji’x wtonx kuyboqkq njbhkmtwwi boq 
ak eykokq adx kikx: Haki pkjk oep xhboqdon do hak 
sdqqwk em b mbsdwdbj xsbww boq xabvvi xftbjk. Hbww, 
qdwbydqbhkq aetxkx weeckq qepo eo haks mjes klkji 
xdqk. Otsvkj hpkwlk pbx ldxdvwk he haks, mej haki abq
