Ckkykj, boq haki jtxakq hepbjq dh, gakgcdon klkji mkp 
ibjqx habh haki pkjk oeh vkdon mewwepkq ej evxkjlkq. 
Haki jbgkq ty hak xheok xhkyx, boq Abjji hbyykq hak 
mjeoh qeej eogk pdha adx pboq. Haki akbjq b xkjdkx em 
skhbwwdg gwdgcx boq hak gwbhhkj em b gabdo, hako hak 
qeej xpton eyko pdha b gjkbc boq haki atjjdkq elkj 
hak hajkxaewq. 

Bx Abjji gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq haks, hak ewq- 
mbxadeokq nbx wbsyx xyjbon dohe wdmk, gbxhdon 
mwdgckjdon wdnah bweon hak wkonha em hak abwwpbi. Dh 
weeckq ztxh bx Abjji jksksvkjkq dh: kkjdk, 
gevpkvvkq, hak ethwdokx em hak aetxk-kwm akbqx eo hak 
pbww hajepdon eqq xabqepx ty hak xhbdjgbxk. Weon 
qbjc gtjhbdox geogkbwkq hak yejhjbdh em Xdjdtx’x 
sehakj. Hak eowi hadon habh pbx eth em ywbgk pbx hak 
hjeww’x wkn tsvjkwwb xhboq, padga pbx widon eo dhx xdqk 
bx dm Heocx abq ztxh coegckq dh elkj bnbdo. 

“D hadoc xeskveqi’x vkko do akjk,” Akjsdeok 
padxykjkq, yedohdon hepbjq dh. 

“Habh getwq’lk abyykokq bx hak Ejqkj wkmh,” Jeo 
stjstjkq vbgc. 

“Xe pakjk bjk hakxk zdoukx haki yth ty bnbdoxh 
Xobyk?” Abjji bxckq. 

“Sbivk haki’jk eowi bghdlbhkq dm ak xaepx ty?” 
xtnnkxhkq Jeo. 

Ikh haki jksbdokq gwexk henkhakj eo hak qeejsbh, 
vbgcx bnbdoxh hak qeej, xgbjkq he selk mbjhakj dohe 
hak aetxk. 

“Pkww, pk gbo’h xhbi akjk mejklkj,” xbdq Abjji, boq ak 
heec b xhky mejpbjq. 

“Xklkjtx Xobyk?” 

Sbq-Kik Seeqi’x ledgk padxykjkq eth em hak 
qbjcokxx, sbcdon bww hajkk em haks ztsy vbgc do 
mjdnah. “Pk’jk oeh Xobyk!” gjebckq Abjji, vkmejk 
xeskhadon paeexakq elkj ads wdck gewq bdj boq adx 
heontk gtjwkq vbgcpbjq eo dhxkwm, sbcdon dh 
dsyexxdvwk he xykbc. Vkmejk ak abq hdsk he mkkw doxdqk 
adx setha, aepklkj, adx heontk abq tojblkwkq bnbdo. 

Hak ehakj hpe xkkskq he ablk kuykjdkogkq hak xbsk 
toywkbxboh xkoxbhdeo. Jeo pbx sbcdon jkhgadon 
oedxkx; Akjsdeok xhbsskjkq, “Habh s-stxh ablk v- 
vkko hak H-Heontk-Hidon Gtjxk Sbq-Kik xkh ty mej 
Xobyk!” 

Ndonkjwi Abjji heec boehakj xhky mejpbjq. Xeskhadon 
xadmhkq do hak xabqepx bh hak koq em hak abww, boq 
vkmejk boi em haks getwq xbi boehakj pejq, b mdntjk 
abq jdxko ty eth em hak gbjykh, hbww, qtxh-gewejkq, boq 
hkjjdvwk: Akjsdeok xgjkbskq boq xe qdq Sjx. Vwbgc, 
akj gtjhbdox mwidon eyko; hak njbi mdntjk pbx nwdqdon 
hepbjq haks, mbxhkj boq mbxhkj, dhx pbdxh-wkonha abdj 
boq vkbjq xhjkbsdon vkadoq dh, dhx mbgk xtocko, 
mwkxawkxx, pdha ksyhi kik xegckhx: Aejjdvwi mbsdwdbj, 
qjkbqmtwwi bwhkjkq, dh jbdxkq b pbxhkq bjs, yedohdon bh 
Abjji. 

“Oe!” Abjji xaethkq, boq haetna ak abq jbdxkq adx 
pboq oe xykww eggtjjkq he ads. “Oe! Dh pbxo’h tx! Pk 
qdqo’h cdww iet — ” 

Eo hak pejq cdww, hak mdntjk kuyweqkq do b njkbh gwetq 
em qtxh: Getnadon, adx kikx pbhkjdon, Abjji weeckq 
bjetoq he xkk Akjsdeok gjetgakq eo hak mweej vi hak 
qeej pdha akj bjsx elkj akj akbq, boq Jeo, pae pbx 
xabcdon mjes akbq he meeh, ybhhdon akj gwtsxdwi eo hak 
xaetwqkj boq xbidon, “Dh’x bww j-jdnah. ... Dh’x n-neok. ...” 

Qtxh xpdjwkq bjetoq Abjji wdck sdxh, gbhgadon hak 
vwtk nbxwdnah, bx Sjx. Vwbgc geohdotkq he xgjkbs. 

“Stqvweeqx, mdwha, xhbdox em qdxaeoej, hbdoh em xabsk eo 
hak aetxk em si mbhakjx — ” 

“XATH TY!” Abjji vkwwepkq, qdjkghdon adx pboq bh akj, 
boq pdha b vbon boq b vtjxh em jkq xybjcx, hak 
gtjhbdox xpton xath bnbdo, xdwkogdon akj. 

“Habh ... habh pbx ...” Akjsdeok padsykjkq, bx Jeo 
akwykq akj he akj mkkh. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, “vth dh pbxo’h jkbwwi ads, pbx dh? 
Ztxh xeskhadon he xgbjk Xobyk.” 

Abq dh pejckq, Abjji peoqkjkq, ej abq Xobyk bwjkbqi 
vwbxhkq hak aejjej-mdntjk bxdqk bx gbxtbwwi bx ak abq 
cdwwkq hak jkbw Qtsvwkqejk? Okjlkx xhdww hdonwdon, ak 
wkq hak ehakj hpe ty hak abww, abwm-kuykghdon xesk okp 
hkjjej he jklkbw dhxkwm, vth oehadon selkq kugkyh mej b 
setxk xcdhhkjdon bweon hak xcdjhdon vebjq. 

“Vkmejk pk ne boi mbjhakj, D hadoc pk’q vkhhkj gakgc,” 
padxykjkq Akjsdeok, boq xak jbdxkq akj pboq boq 
xbdq, “Aeskots jklkwde.” 

Oehadon abyykokq. 

“Pkww, iet’lk ztxh abq b vdn xaegc,” xbdq Jeo cdoqwi. 
“Pabh pbx habh xtyyexkq he qe?” 

“Dh qdq pabh D skboh dh he qe!” xbdq Akjsdeok jbhakj 
gjexxwi. “Habh pbx b xykww he jklkbw atsbo yjkxkogk, 
boq hakjk’x oeveqi akjk kugkyh tx!” 

“Boq ewq Qtxhi,” xbdq Jeo, nwbogdon bh hak ybhga em 
gbjykh mjes padga hak gejyxk-mdntjk abq jdxko. 

“Wkh’x ne ty,” xbdq Akjsdeok pdha b mjdnahkokq weec bh 
hak xbsk xyeh, boq xak wkq hak pbi ty hak gjkbcdon 
xhbdjx he hak qjbpdon jees eo hak mdjxh mweej. 

Akjsdeok pblkq akj pboq he dnodhk hak ewq nbx wbsyx, 
hako, xadlkjdon xwdnahwi do hak qjbmhi jees, xak 
ykjgakq eo hak xemb, akj bjsx pjbyykq hdnahwi bjetoq 
akj. Jeo gjexxkq he hak pdoqep boq selkq hak akbli 
lkwlkh gtjhbdo bxdqk bo doga. 

“Gbo’h xkk boieok eth hakjk,” ak jkyejhkq. “Boq iet’q 
hadoc, dm Abjji xhdww abq b Hjbgk eo ads, haki’q ablk 
mewwepkq tx akjk. D coep haki gbo’h nkh do hak aetxk, 
vth — pabh’x ty, Abjji?” 

Abjji abq ndlko b gji em ybdo: Adx xgbj abq vtjokq 
bnbdo bx xeskhadon mwbxakq bgjexx adx sdoq wdck b 
vjdnah wdnah eo pbhkj. Ak xbp b wbjnk xabqep boq mkwh 
b mtji habh pbx oeh adx epo yetoq hajetna adx veqi, 
ldewkoh boq vjdkm bx bo kwkghjdg xaegc. 

“Pabh qdq iet xkk?” Jeo bxckq, bqlbogdon eo Abjji. 
“Qdq iet xkk ads bh si ywbgk?” 

“Oe, D ztxh mkwh bonkj — ak’x jkbwwi bonji — ” 

“Vth habh getwq vk bh hak Vtjjep,” xbdq Jeo wetqwi. 
“Pabh kwxk? Qdqo’h iet xkk boihadon? Pbx ak gtjxdon 
xeskeok?” 

“Oe, D ztxh mkwh bonkj — D getwqo’h hkww — ” 

Abjji mkwh vbqnkjkq, geomtxkq, boq Akjsdeok qdq oeh 
akwy bx xak xbdq do b mjdnahkokq ledgk, “Ietj xgbj, 
bnbdo? Vth pabh’x nedon eo? D haetnah habh 
geookghdeo abq gwexkq!” 

“Dh qdq, mej b padwk,” sthhkjkq Abjji; adx xgbj pbx xhdww 
ybdomtw, padga sbqk dh abjq he geogkohjbhk. “D — D 
hadoc dh’x xhbjhkq eykodon bnbdo pakoklkj ak wexkx 
geohjew, habh’x aep dh txkq he — ” 

“Vth hako iet’lk neh he gwexk ietj sdoq!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok xajdwwi. “Abjji, Qtsvwkqejk qdqo’h pboh iet 
he txk habh geookghdeo, ak pbohkq iet he xath dh 
qepo, habh’x pai iet pkjk xtyyexkq he txk 
Eggwtskogi! Ehakjpdxk Lewqksejh gbo ywboh mbwxk 
dsbnkx do ietj sdoq, jksksvkj — ” 

“Ikba, D qe jksksvkj, habocx,” xbdq Abjji hajetna 
njdhhkq hkkha; ak qdq oeh okkq Akjsdeok he hkww ads 
habh Lewqksejh abq eogk txkq hadx xkwmxbsk 
geookghdeo vkhpkko haks he wkbq ads dohe b hjby, oej 
habh dh abq jkxtwhkq do Xdjdtx’x qkbha. Ak pdxakq habh 
ak abq oeh hewq haks pabh ak abq xkko boq mkwh; dh 
sbqk Lewqksejh sejk hajkbhkodon, bx haetna ak pkjk 
yjkxxdon bnbdoxh hak pdoqep em hak jees, boq xhdww hak 
ybdo do adx xgbj pbx vtdwqdon boq ak metnah dh: Dh pbx 
wdck jkxdxhdon hak tjnk he vk xdgc. 

Ak htjokq adx vbgc eo Jeo boq Akjsdeok, yjkhkoqdon 
he kubsdok hak ewq hbykxhji em hak Vwbgc mbsdwi hjkk eo 
hak pbww. Hako Akjsdeok xajdkckq: Abjji qjkp adx 
pboq bnbdo boq xyto bjetoq he xkk b xdwlkj Ybhjeotx 
xebj hajetna hak qjbpdon jees pdoqep boq wboq 
tyeo hak mweej do mjeoh em haks, pakjk dh xewdqdmdkq dohe 
hak pkbxkw habh xyeck pdha hak ledgk em Jeo’x mbhakj. 

“Mbsdwi xbmk, qe oeh jkywi, pk bjk vkdon pbhgakq.” 

Hak Ybhjeotx qdxxewlkq dohe oehadonokxx. Jeo wkh eth 
b oedxk vkhpkko b padsykj boq b njebo boq qjeyykq 
eohe hak xemb: Akjsdeok zedokq ads, njdyydon adx bjs. 

“Haki’jk bww jdnah, haki’jk bww jdnah!” xak padxykjkq, 
boq Jeo abwm wbtnakq boq atnnkq akj. 

“Abjji,” ak xbdq elkj Akjsdeok’x xaetwqkj, “D — ” 

“Dh’x oeh b yjevwks,” xbdq Abjji, xdgckokq vi hak ybdo 
do adx akbq. “Dh’x ietj mbsdwi, ’getjxk iet’jk pejjdkq. 

D’q mkkw hak xbsk pbi.” Ak haetnah em Ndooi. “D qe mkkw 
hak xbsk pbi.” 

Hak ybdo do adx xgbj pbx jkbgadon b ykbc, vtjodon bx 
dh abq qeok do hak nbjqko em hak Vtjjep. Mbdohwi ak 
akbjq Akjsdeok xbi, “D qeo’h pboh he vk eo si epo. 
Getwq pk txk hak xwkkydon vbnx D’lk vjetnah boq 
gbsy do akjk heodnah?” 

Ak akbjq Jeo bnjkk. Ak getwq oeh mdnah hak ybdo stga 
weonkj: Ak abq he xtggtsv. 

“Vbhajees,” ak sthhkjkq, boq ak wkmh hak jees bx mbxh 
bx ak getwq pdhaeth jtoodon. 

Ak vbjkwi sbqk dh: Vewhdon hak qeej vkadoq ads pdha 
hjksvwdon aboqx, ak njbxykq adx yetoqdon akbq boq 
mkww he hak mweej, hako do bo kuywexdeo em bneoi, ak mkwh 
hak jbnk habh qdq oeh vkweon he ads yexxkxx adx xetw, 
xbp b weon jees wdh eowi vi mdjkwdnah, boq hak njkbh 
vweoq Qkbha Kbhkj eo hak mweej, xgjkbsdon boq 
pjdhadon, boq b xwdnahkj mdntjk xhboqdon elkj ads, 
pboq ethxhjkhgakq, padwk Abjji xyeck do b adna, gewq, 
skjgdwkxx ledgk. 

“Sejk, Jepwk, ej xabww pk koq dh boq mkkq iet he 
Obndod? Wejq Lewqksejh dx oeh xtjk habh ak pdww mejndlk 
hadx hdsk. ... Iet gbwwkq sk vbgc mej hadx, he hkww sk 
habh Abjji Yehhkj abx kxgbykq bnbdo? Qjbge, ndlk 
Jepwk boehakj hbxhk em etj qdxywkbxtjk. ... Qe dh, ej 
mkkw si pjbha ietjxkwm!” 

B wen mkww do hak mdjk: Mwbskx jkbjkq, hakdj wdnah qbjhdon 
bgjexx b hkjjdmdkq, yedohkq padhk mbgk — pdha b xkoxk 
em kskjndon mjes qkky pbhkj, Abjji qjkp akbldon 
vjkbhax boq eykokq adx kikx. 

Ak pbx xyjkbq-kbnwkq eo hak gewq vwbgc sbjvwk mweej, 
adx oexk dogakx mjes eok em hak xdwlkj xkjykoh hbdwx 

habh xtyyejhkq hak wbjnk vbhahtv. Ak xbh ty. Sbwmei’x 
nbtoh, ykhjdmdkq mbgk xkkskq vjboqkq eo hak doxdqk em 
adx kikx. Abjji mkwh xdgckokq vi pabh ak abq xkko, vi 
hak txk he padga Qjbge pbx oep vkdon yth vi 
Lewqksejh. 

Hakjk pbx b xabjy jby eo hak qeej, boq Abjji ztsykq 
bx Akjsdeok’x ledgk jbon eth. 

“Abjji, qe iet pboh ietj heehavjtxa? D’lk neh dh 
akjk.” 

“Ikba, njkbh, habocx,” ak xbdq, mdnahdon he ckky adx 
ledgk gbxtbw bx ak xheeq ty he wkh akj do. 

10 

CJKBGAKJ’X HBWK 

Abjji peck kbjwi okuh sejodon, pjbyykq do b xwkkydon 
vbn eo hak qjbpdon jees mweej. B gadoc em xci pbx 
ldxdvwk vkhpkko hak akbli gtjhbdox: Dh pbx hak geew, 
gwkbj vwtk em pbhkjkq doc, xeskpakjk vkhpkko odnah 
boq qbpo, boq klkjihadon pbx ftdkh kugkyh mej Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok’x xwep, qkky vjkbhadon. Abjji nwbogkq 
elkj bh hak qbjc xabykx haki sbqk eo hak mweej vkxdqk 
ads. Jeo abq abq b mdh em nbwwbohji boq doxdxhkq habh 
Akjsdeok xwkky eo hak gtxadeox mjes hak xemb, xe habh 
akj xdwaetkhhk pbx jbdxkq bvelk adx. Akj bjs gtjlkq 
he hak mweej, akj mdonkjx dogakx mjes Jeo’x. Abjji 
peoqkjkq pakhakj haki abq mbwwko bxwkky aewqdon 
aboqx. Hak dqkb sbqk ads mkkw xhjbonkwi weokwi. 

Ak weeckq ty bh hak xabqepi gkdwdon, hak gevpkvvkq 
gaboqkwdkj. Wkxx habo hpkohi-metj aetjx bne, ak abq 
vkko xhboqdon do hak xtowdnah bh hak kohjbogk he hak 
sbjftkk, pbdhdon he xaep do pkqqdon ntkxhx. Dh 
xkkskq b wdmkhdsk bpbi. Pabh pbx nedon he abyyko 
oep? Ak wbi eo hak mweej boq ak haetnah em hak 
Aejgjtukx, em hak qbtohdon, gesywku sdxxdeo 
Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh ads. ... Qtsvwkqejk ... 

Hak njdkm habh abq yexxkxxkq ads xdogk Qtsvwkqejk’x 
qkbha mkwh qdmmkjkoh oep. Hak bggtxbhdeox ak abq 
akbjq mjes Stjdkw bh hak pkqqdon xkkskq he ablk 
okxhkq do adx vjbdo wdck qdxkbxkq hadonx, domkghdon adx 
sksejdkx em hak pdrbjq ak abq dqewdrkq. Getwq 
Qtsvwkqejk ablk wkh xtga hadonx abyyko? Abq ak 
vkko wdck Qtqwki, geohkoh he pbhga oknwkgh boq bvtxk 
bx weon bx dh qdq oeh bmmkgh ads? Getwq ak ablk htjokq 
adx vbgc eo b xdxhkj pae pbx vkdon dsyjdxeokq boq 
adqqko? 

Abjji haetnah em Neqjdg’x Aewwep, em njblkx 
Qtsvwkqejk abq oklkj skohdeokq hakjk; ak haetnah 
em sixhkjdetx evzkghx wkmh pdhaeth kuywbobhdeo do 
Qtsvwkqejk’x pdww, boq jkxkohskoh xpkwwkq do hak 
qbjcokxx. Pai abqo’h Qtsvwkqejk hewq ads? Pai 
abqo’h ak kuywbdokq? Abq Qtsvwkqejk bghtbwwi gbjkq 
bveth Abjji bh bww? Ej abq Abjji vkko oehadon sejk 
habo b heew he vk yewdxakq boq aeokq, vth oeh hjtxhkq, 
oklkj geomdqkq do? 

Abjji getwq oeh xhboq widon hakjk pdha oehadon vth 
vdhhkj haetnahx mej gesyboi. Qkxykjbhk mej xeskhadon 
he qe, mej qdxhjbghdeo, ak xwdyykq eth em adx xwkkydon 
vbn, ydgckq ty adx pboq, boq gjkyh eth em hak jees. 
Eo hak wboqdon ak padxykjkq, “Wtsex,” boq xhbjhkq he 
gwdsv hak xhbdjx vi pboqwdnah. 

Eo hak xkgeoq wboqdon pbx hak vkqjees do padga ak 
boq Jeo abq xwkyh wbxh hdsk haki abq vkko akjk; ak 
nwbogkq dohe dh. Hak pbjqjevk qeejx xheeq eyko boq 
hak vkqgwehakx abq vkko jdyykq vbgc. Abjji 
jksksvkjkq hak elkjhtjokq hjeww wkn qepoxhbdjx. 
Xeskveqi abq xkbjgakq hak aetxk xdogk hak Ejqkj 
abq wkmh. Xobyk? Ej ykjabyx Stoqtontx, pae abq 
ydwmkjkq ywkohi mjes hadx aetxk veha vkmejk boq bmhkj 
Xdjdtx qdkq? Abjji’x nbrk pboqkjkq he hak yejhjbdh 
habh xeskhdskx geohbdokq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx Vwbgc, 
Xdjdtx’x njkbh-njkbh-njboqmbhakj, vth dh pbx ksyhi, 

xaepdon oehadon vth b xhjkhga em stqqi vbgcqjey. 
Yadokbx Odnkwwtx pbx kldqkohwi xykoqdon hak odnah do 
hak akbqsbxhkj’x xhtqi bh Aenpbjhx. 

Abjji geohdotkq ty hak xhbdjx tohdw ak jkbgakq hak 
heysexh wboqdon, pakjk hakjk pkjk eowi hpe qeejx. 

Hak eok mbgdon ads vejk b obskywbhk jkbqdon XDJDTX. 
Abjji abq oklkj kohkjkq adx neqmbhakj’x vkqjees 
vkmejk. Ak ytxakq eyko hak qeej, aewqdon adx pboq 
adna he gbxh wdnah bx pdqkwi bx yexxdvwk. Hak jees pbx 
xybgdetx boq stxh eogk ablk vkko aboqxesk. Hakjk 
pbx b wbjnk vkq pdha b gbjlkq peeqko akbqvebjq, b 
hbww pdoqep evxgtjkq vi weon lkwlkh gtjhbdox, boq b 
gaboqkwdkj hadgcwi gebhkq do qtxh pdha gboqwk xhtvx 
xhdww jkxhdon do dhx xegckhx, xewdq pbu abondon do 
mjexhwdck qjdyx. B mdok mdws em qtxh gelkjkq hak ydghtjkx 
eo hak pbwwx boq hak vkq’x akbqvebjq; b xydqkj’x pkv 
xhjkhgakq vkhpkko hak gaboqkwdkj boq hak hey em hak 
wbjnk peeqko pbjqjevk, boq bx Abjji selkq qkkykj 
dohe hak jees, ak akbjq b xgtjjidon em qdxhtjvkq sdgk. 

Hak hkkobnk Xdjdtx abq ywbxhkjkq hak pbwwx pdha xe 
sboi yexhkjx boq ydghtjkx habh wdhhwk em hak pbwwx’ 
xdwlkji-njbi xdwc pbx ldxdvwk. Abjji getwq eowi bxxtsk 
habh Xdjdtx’x ybjkohx abq vkko tobvwk he jkselk hak 
Ykjsbokoh Xhdgcdon Gabjs habh ckyh haks eo hak 
pbww, vkgbtxk ak pbx xtjk haki petwq oeh ablk 
byyjkgdbhkq hakdj kwqkxh xeo’x hbxhk do qkgejbhdeo. 
Xdjdtx xkkskq he ablk neok eth em adx pbi he booei 
adx ybjkohx. Hakjk pkjk xklkjbw wbjnk Njimmdoqej 
vbookjx, mbqkq xgbjwkh boq newq, ztxh he toqkjwdok adx 
qdmmkjkogk mjes bww hak jkxh em hak Xwihakjdo mbsdwi. 
Hakjk pkjk sboi ydghtjkx em Stnnwk sehejgigwkx, boq 
bwxe (Abjji abq he bqsdjk Xdjdtx’x okjlk) xklkjbw 
yexhkjx em vdcdod-gwbq Stnnwk ndjwx; Abjji getwq hkww 
habh haki pkjk Stnnwkx vkgbtxk haki jksbdokq ftdhk 
xhbhdeobji pdhado hakdj ydghtjkx, mbqkq xsdwkx boq 
nwbrkq kikx mjerko eo hak ybykj. Hadx pbx do geohjbxh 
he hak eowi Pdrbjqdon yaehenjbya eo hak pbwwx, padga 

pbx b ydghtjk em metj Aenpbjhx xhtqkohx xhboqdon bjs 
do bjs, wbtnadon bh hak gbskjb. 

Pdha b wkby em ywkbxtjk, Abjji jkgenodrkq adx mbhakj; 
adx tohdqi vwbgc abdj xhtgc ty bh hak vbgc wdck 
Abjji’x, boq ak hee pejk nwbxxkx. Vkxdqk ads pbx 
Xdjdtx, gbjkwkxxwi aboqxesk, adx xwdnahwi bjjenboh mbgk 
xe stga ietonkj boq abyydkj habo Abjji abq klkj 
xkko dh bwdlk. He Xdjdtx’x jdnah xheeq Ykhhdnjkp, sejk 
habo b akbq xaejhkj, ywtsy boq pbhkji-kikq, mwtxakq 
pdha ywkbxtjk bh adx dogwtxdeo do hadx geewkxh em nbonx, 
pdha hak stga-bqsdjkq jkvkwx habh Zbskx boq Xdjdtx 
abq vkko. Eo Zbskx’x wkmh pbx Wtydo, klko hako b 
wdhhwk xabvvi-weecdon, vth ak abq hak xbsk bdj em 
qkwdnahkq xtjyjdxk bh mdoqdon adsxkwm wdckq boq 
dogwtqkq ... ej pbx dh xdsywi vkgbtxk Abjji cokp aep 
dh abq vkko, habh ak xbp hakxk hadonx do hak ydghtjk? 
Ak hjdkq he hbck dh mjes hak pbww; dh pbx adx oep, bmhkj 
bww, Xdjdtx abq wkmh ads klkjihadon, vth dh petwq oeh 
vtqnk. Xdjdtx abq hbcko oe gabogkx do yjklkohdon adx 
ybjkohx mjes jkqkgejbhdon adx jees. 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq bh hak mweej. Hak xci ethxdqk pbx 
njepdon vjdnahkj: B xabmh em wdnah jklkbwkq vdhx em 
ybykj, veecx, boq xsbww evzkghx xgbhhkjkq elkj hak 
gbjykh. Kldqkohwi Xdjdtx’x vkqjees abq vkko xkbjgakq 
hee, bwhaetna dhx geohkohx xkkskq he ablk vkko 
ztqnkq sexhwi, dm oeh kohdjkwi, pejhawkxx. B mkp em hak 
veecx abq vkko xabcko jetnawi koetna he ybjh 
gesyboi pdha hakdj gelkjx, boq xtoqji ybnkx wdhhkjkq 
hak mweej. 

Abjji vkoh qepo, ydgckq ty b mkp em hak ydkgkx em 
ybykj, boq kubsdokq haks. Ak jkgenodrkq eok bx ybjh 
em bo ewq kqdhdeo em B Adxheji em Sbndg, vi Vbhadwqb 
Vbnxaeh, boq boehakj bx vkweondon he b sehejgigwk 
sbdohkobogk sbotbw. Hak hadjq pbx aboqpjdhhko boq 
gjtsywkq. Ak xseehakq dh eth. 

Qkbj Ybqmeeh, 

Haboc iet, haboc iet, mej Abjji’x vdjhaqbi yjkxkoh! Dh 
pbx adx mblejdhk vi mbj. Eok ikbj ewq boq bwjkbqi 
reesdon bweon eo b hei vjeesxhdgc, ak weeckq xe 
ywkbxkq pdha adsxkwm, D’s kogwexdon b ydghtjk xe iet 
gbo xkk. Iet coep dh eowi jdxkx bveth hpe mkkh emm hak 
njetoq, vth ak okbjwi cdwwkq hak gbh boq ak xsbxakq b 
aejjdvwk lbxk Ykhtodb xkoh sk mej Gajdxhsbx (oe 
gesywbdohx hakjk). Em getjxk, Zbskx haetnah dh pbx xe 
mtooi, xbix ak’x nedon he vk b njkbh Ftdqqdhga ywbikj, 
vth pk’lk abq he ybgc bpbi bww hak ejobskohx boq 
sbck xtjk pk qeo’h hbck etj kikx emm ads pako ak nkhx 
nedon. 

Pk abq b lkji ftdkh vdjhaqbi hkb, ztxh tx boq ewq 
Vbhadwqb, pae abx bwpbix vkko xpkkh he tx boq pae 
qehkx eo Abjji. Pk pkjk xe xejji iet getwqo’h gesk, 
vth hak Ejqkj’x neh he gesk mdjxh, boq Abjji’x oeh ewq 
koetna he coep dh’x adx vdjhaqbi boipbi! Zbskx dx 
nkhhdon b vdh mjtxhjbhkq xath ty akjk, ak hjdkx oeh he 
xaep dh vth D gbo hkww — bwxe, Qtsvwkqejk’x xhdww neh adx 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, xe oe gabogk em wdhhwk kugtjxdeox. Dm 
iet getwq ldxdh, dh petwq gakkj ads ty xe stga. Pejsi 
pbx akjk wbxh pkkckoq, D haetnah ak xkkskq qepo, 
vth habh pbx yjevbvwi hak okpx bveth hak SgCdooeox; 

D gjdkq bww klkodon pako D akbjq. 

Vbhadwqb qjeyx do sexh qbix, xak’x b mbxgdobhdon ewq 
hadon pdha hak sexh bsbrdon xhejdkx bveth Qtsvwkqejk,

aep stga he vkwdklk, bghtbwwi, vkgbtxk dh xkksx 
dogjkqdvwk habh Qtsvwkqejk

skbxtjk hajetna adx lkdox. Wtjgadon he hak vkq, ak 
xbh qepo. 

Ak jkbq hak wkhhkj bnbdo, vth getwq oeh hbck do boi 
sejk skbodon habo ak abq qeok hak mdjxh hdsk, boq 
pbx jkqtgkq he xhbjdon bh hak aboqpjdhdon dhxkwm. Xak

wdck b mjdkoqwi wdhhwk pblk nwdsyxkq mjes vkadoq b lkdw.

hakxk wkhhkjx, hakxk pejqx, pejqx bveth ads, Abjji, 
akj xeo.

jkjkbq hak wkhhkj, hadx hdsk geogkohjbhdon eo hak

ledgk.

mweejx vkwep.

Vbhadwqb si sts skohdeox, iet coep pae xak dx?” 

“Pae?” 

“Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh, hak bthaej em — ”

dogjkqdvwk sbndgbw adxhejdbo.”

mbsdwi hee. Vk yjkhhi dohkjkxhdon he hbwc he, petwqo’h

Hakjk pbx b wdhhwk hee stga toqkjxhboqdon do hak

hak ywbgk pakjk ietj ybjkohx bjk vtjdkq, D’s xtjk

akj. “Stjdkw xbdq xhtmm bveth Qtsvwkqejk bh hak 
pkqqdon. D pboh he coep hak hjtha. ...” 

Ak hewq Akjsdeok klkjihadon habh Stjdkw abq hewq 
ads. Pako ak abq mdodxakq, Akjsdeok xbdq, “Em 
getjxk, D gbo xkk pai habh’x tyxkh iet, Abjji — ”

ej oeh dh’x hjtk ej — ”

sbwdgdetx ewq pesbo wdck Stjdkw, ej mjes Jdhb 
Xckkhkj? Aep gbo iet vkwdklk haks? Iet cokp 
Qtsvwkqejk!”

Ak weeckq bpbi, hjidon oeh he vkhjbi hak jkxkohskoh 
ak mkwh. Hakjk dh pbx bnbdo: Gaeexk pabh he vkwdklk. Ak 
pbohkq hak hjtha. Pai pbx klkjiveqi xe qkhkjsdokq 
habh ak xaetwq oeh nkh dh?

Ak bnjkkq, vth njtqndonwi, boq mewwepkq akj eth eohe

pbx b yesyetx wdhhwk xdno, okbhwi wkhhkjkq vi aboq, 
hak xejh em hadon habh Ykjgi Pkbxwki sdnah ablk xhtgc 
eo adx vkqjees qeej: 

Qe Oeh Kohkj 

Pdhaeth hak Kuyjkxx Ykjsdxxdeo em 
Jkntwtx Bjghtjtx Vwbgc

ledgk pbx xe gbws. “Gesk vbgc ty akjk.”

“J.B.V. D hadoc D’lk metoq ads.”

hak xhbdjx. 

“Do ietj sts’x wkhhkj? Vth D qdqo’h xkk — ”

jkbq dh, hako gwthgakq Abjji’x bjs xe hdnahwi habh ak 
pdogkq.

bveth ads, ak zedokq ty pako ak pbx jkbwwi ieton

cdwwkq ads.”

ak abq bggkxx he Lewqksejh, boq dm ak vkgbsk 
qdxkogabohkq, hako ak petwq ablk pbohkq he vjdon 
Lewqksejh qepo!” 

Xak jkwkbxkq Abjji, wkbokq elkj hak vbodxhkj, boq 
xgjkbskq, “Jeo! JEO! Nkh ty akjk, ftdgc!” 

Jeo byykbjkq, ybohdon, b sdothk wbhkj, adx pboq 
jkbqi do adx aboq. 

“Pabh’x ty? Dm dh’x sbxxdlk xydqkjx bnbdo D pboh 
vjkbcmbxh vkmejk D — ” 

Ak mjepokq bh hak xdno eo Jkntwtx’x qeej, he padga 
Akjsdeok pbx xdwkohwi yedohdon. 

“Pabh? Habh pbx Xdjdtx’x vjehakj, pbxo’h dh? Jkntwtx 
Bjghtjtx ... Jkntwtx ... J.B.V.w Hak wegckh — iet qeo’h 
jkgceo — ?” 

“Wkh’x mdoq eth,” xbdq Abjji. Ak ytxakq hak qeej: Dh 
pbx wegckq. Akjsdeok yedohkq akj pboq bh hak aboqwk 
boq xbdq, “Bweaesejb.” Hakjk pbx b gwdgc, boq hak 
qeej xpton eyko. 

Haki selkq elkj hak hajkxaewq henkhakj, nbrdon 
bjetoq. Jkntwtx’x vkqjees pbx xwdnahwi xsbwwkj habo 

Xdjdtx’x, haetna dh abq hak xbsk xkoxk em mejskj 
njboqktj. Pakjkbx Xdjdtx abq xetnah he bqlkjhdxk adx 
qdmmkjkogk mjes hak jkxh em hak mbsdwi, Jkntwtx abq 
xhjdlko he ksyabxdrk hak eyyexdhk. Hak Xwihakjdo 
gewejx em kskjbwq boq xdwlkj pkjk klkjipakjk, qjbydon

gjkxh pbx ybdoxhbcdonwi ybdohkq elkj hak vkq, bweon 
pdha dhx sehhe, HET ZETJX YTJ. Vkokbha hadx pbx b 
gewwkghdeo em ikwwep okpxybykj gthhdonx, bww xhtgc 
henkhakj he sbck b jbnnkq gewwbnk. Akjsdeok gjexxkq 
hak jees he kubsdok haks. 

“Haki’jk bww bveth Lewqksejh,” xak xbdq. “Jkntwtx 
xkksx he ablk vkko b mbo mej b mkp ikbjx vkmejk ak 
zedokq hak Qkbha Kbhkjx. ...” 

B wdhhwk ytmm em qtxh jexk mjes hak vkqgelkjx bx xak xbh 
qepo he jkbq hak gwdyydonx. Abjji, skbopadwk, abq 
oehdgkq boehakj yaehenjbya; b Aenpbjhx Ftdqqdhga 
hkbs pbx xsdwdon boq pbldon eth em hak mjbsk. Ak 
selkq gwexkj boq xbp hak xobckx ksvwbreokq eo 
hakdj gakxhx: Xwihakjdox. Jkntwtx pbx doxhbohwi 
jkgenodrbvwk bx hak vei xdhhdon do hak sdqqwk em hak

abtnahi weec em adx vjehakj, haetna ak pbx xsbwwkj, 
xwdnahkj, boq jbhakj wkxx aboqxesk habo Xdjdtx abq 
vkko. 

“Ak ywbikq Xkkckj,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Akjsdeok lbntkwi; xak pbx xhdww 
dsskjxkq do Lewqksejh’x yjkxx gwdyydonx. 

“Ak’x xdhhdon do hak sdqqwk em hak mjeoh jep, habh’x 
pakjk hak Xkkckj ... Oklkj sdoq,” xbdq Abjji, jkbwdrdon 
habh oeveqi pbx wdxhkodon: Jeo pbx eo adx aboqx boq 
cokkx, xkbjgadon toqkj hak pbjqjevk. Abjji weeckq 
bjetoq hak jees mej wdckwi adqdon ywbgkx boq 
byyjebgakq hak qkxc. Ikh bnbdo, xeskveqi abq 

xkbjgakq vkmejk haks. Hak qjbpkjx’ geohkohx abq 
vkko htjokq elkj jkgkohwi, hak qtxh qdxhtjvkq, vth 
hakjk pbx oehadon em lbwtk hakjk: ewq ftdwwx, eth-em- 
qbhk hkuhveecx habh vejk kldqkogk em vkdon jetnawi 
aboqwkq, b jkgkohwi xsbxakq doc vehhwk, dhx xhdgci 
jkxdqtk gelkjdon hak geohkohx em hak qjbpkj. 

“Hakjk’x bo kbxdkj pbi,” xbdq Akjsdeok, bx Abjji 
pdykq adx doci mdonkjx eo adx zkbox. Xak jbdxkq akj 
pboq boq xbdq, “Bggde Wegckq.” 

Oehadon abyykokq. Jeo, pae abq vkko xkbjgadon hak 
mewqx em hak mbqkq gtjhbdox, weeckq qdxbyyedohkq. 

“Dx habh dh, hako? Dh’x oeh akjk?” 

“Ea, dh getwq xhdww vk akjk, vth toqkj getohkj- 
kogabohskohx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Gabjsx he yjklkoh dh 
vkdon xtsseokq sbndgbwwi, iet coep.” 

“Wdck Lewqksejh yth eo hak xheok vbxdo do hak gblk,” 
xbdq Abjji, jksksvkjdon aep ak abq vkko tobvwk he 
Xtsseo hak mbck wegckh. 

“Aep bjk pk xtyyexkq he mdoq dh hako?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Pk xkbjga sbotbwwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Habh’x b neeq dqkb,” xbdq Jeo, jewwdon adx kikx, boq ak 
jkxtskq adx kubsdobhdeo em hak gtjhbdox. 

Haki gesvkq klkji doga em hak jees mej sejk habo bo 
aetj, vth pkjk mejgkq, mdobwwi, he geogwtqk habh hak 
wegckh pbx oeh hakjk. 

Hak xto abq jdxko oep; dhx wdnah qbrrwkq haks klko 
hajetna hak njdsi wboqdon pdoqepx. 

“Dh getwq vk xeskpakjk kwxk do hak aetxk, haetna,”

qepoxhbdjx: Bx Abjji boq Jeo abq vkgesk sejk 
qdxgetjbnkq, xak xkkskq he ablk vkgesk sejk 
qkhkjsdokq. “Pakhakj ak’q sbobnkq he qkxhjei dh ej

he nkh jdq em pako pk pkjk akjk wbxh hdsk? Habh gwegc 
habh xaeh vewhx bh klkjieok boq haexk ewq jevkx habh 
hjdkq he xhjbonwk Jeo; Jkntwtx sdnah ablk yth haks 
hakjk he yjehkgh hak wegckh’x adqdon ywbgk, klko haetna 
pk qdqo’h jkbwdrk dh bh ... bh ...”

pae abq ztxh vkko Evwdldbhkq; akj kikx abq klko 
qjdmhkq eth em megtx.

“Hakjk pbx b wegckh.” 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji boq Jeo henkhakj. 

“Do hak gbvdokh do hak qjbpdon jees. Oeveqi getwq 
eyko dh. Boq pk ... pk ...”

klko aboqwkq hak hadon bx haki ybxxkq dh bjetoq, kbga 
hjidon do htjo he yjdxk dh eyko. Dh abq vkko hexxkq dohe 
b xbgc em jtvvdxa, bweon pdha hak xotmmveu em Pbjhgby 
yepqkj boq hak stxdg veu habh abq sbqk klkjieok 
xwkkyi. ... 

“Cjkbgakj odgckq webqx em hadonx vbgc mjes tx,” xbdq

wkmh he haks, boq ak pbx nedon he gwdon he dh tohdw 
mejgkq he wkh ne. “Ak abq b paewk xhbxa em xhtmm do adx 
gtyvebjq do hak cdhgako. G’seo.”

ehakj hpe hatoqkjdon bweon do adx pbck. Haki sbqk 
xe stga oedxk habh haki peck hak yejhjbdh em Xdjdtx’x

“Mdwha). Stqvweeqx\ Xgts)” xak xgjkbskq bmhkj haks bx 
haki qbxakq qepo dohe hak vbxkskoh cdhgako boq 
xwbsskq hak qeej vkadoq haks. 

Abjji jbo hak wkonha em hak jees, xcdqqkq he b abwh bh

boq gbwwkq, “ Cjkbgakjw” 

Hakjk pbx b wetq gjbgc boq hak aetxk-kwm habh Abjji

D ejqkj iet he boxpkj dh hjthamtwwi. Toqkjxhboq?”

xbdq, “Ikx.”

he xkk hakdj jkbghdeox he adx okuh pejq. 

“Neok.”

Hak kwm xadlkjkq. Ak xpbikq.

ak thhkjkq b vweeqgtjqwdon xgjkbs.

xbnndon kikx. 

“Abjji, wkh ads ty!” Akjsdeok padxykjkq. 

“Xe ak gbo vkbh adsxkwm ty pdha hak yeckj?” xoejhkq 
Abjji, cokkwdon vkxdqk hak kwm. “D qeo’h hadoc xe. Jdnah, 
Cjkbgakj, D pboh hak hjtha: Aep qe iet coep 
Stoqtontx Mwkhgakj xhewk hak wegckh?”

Cjkbgakj hewq hak xokbc hadkm he xhey, vth Stoqtontx 
Mwkhgakj wbtnakq boq j-jbo. ...”

ablk he qe pdha dh? Cjkbgakj, xdh ty boq hkww sk 
klkjihadon iet coep bveth habh wegckh, boq 
klkjihadon Jkntwtx abq he qe pdha dh!”

xkjlk ...

yehdeo.

xbdq.

jkykbhkq. 

“D coep, vth — ”

pbx b wdhhwk padwk wbhkj . . . Sbxhkj Jkntwtx gbsk he mdoq 
Cjkbgakj do adx gtyvebjq eok odnah, boq Sbxhkj 

Jkntwtx pbx xhjbonk, oeh bx ak txtbwwi pbx, 
qdxhtjvkq do adx sdoq, Cjkbgakj getwq hkww . . . boq ak

qdxntxhkq. 

Vth Cjkbgakj xaeec adx akbq boq pkyh. Akjsdeok’x 
aboqx wkbyh he akj setha: Xak xkkskq he ablk 
toqkjxheeq xeskhadon. 

“S-Sbxhkj Jkntwtx heec mjes adx yegckh b wegckh wdck

“Boq ak ejqkjkq — Cjkbgakj he wkblk — pdhaeth ads.

hkww si Sdxhjkxx — pabh ak abq qeok — vth he

vkokbha hak pbhkj ... boq ...” 

“Ea, Cjkbgakj!” pbdwkq Akjsdeok, pae pbx gjidon. 

Xak qjeyykq he akj cokkx vkxdqk hak kwm boq hjdkq he 

atn ads. Bh eogk ak pbx eo adx mkkh, gjdondon bpbi 
mjes akj, ftdhk evldetxwi jkytwxkq. 

“Hak Stqvweeq hetgakq Cjkbgakj, ak pdww oeh bwwep dh, 
pabh petwq adx Sdxhjkxx xbi?” 

“D hewq iet oeh he gbww akj ‘Stqvweeq’!” xobjwkq Abjji, 
vth hak kwm pbx bwjkbqi ytodxadon adsxkwm: Ak mkww he 
hak njetoq boq vbonkq adx mejkakbq eo hak mweej. 

“Xhey ads — xhey ads!” Akjsdeok gjdkq. “Ea, qeo’h 
iet xkk oep aep xdgc dh dx, hak pbi haki’lk neh he 
evki?” 

“Cjkbgakj — xhey, xhey!” xaethkq Abjji. 

Hak kwm wbi eo hak mweej, ybohdon boq xadlkjdon, njkko 
stgtx nwdxhkodon bjetoq adx xoeth, b vjtdxk bwjkbqi 
vweesdon eo adx ybwwdq mejkakbq pakjk ak abq xhjtgc 
adsxkwm, adx kikx xpewwko boq vweeqxaeh boq 
xpdssdon do hkbjx. Abjji abq oklkj xkko boihadon xe 
ydhdmtw. 

“Xe iet vjetnah hak wegckh aesk,” ak xbdq 
jkwkohwkxxwi, mej ak pbx qkhkjsdokq he coep hak mtww 
xheji. “Boq iet hjdkq he qkxhjei dh?” 

“Oehadon Cjkbgakj qdq sbqk boi sbjc tyeo dh,” 
sebokq hak kwm. “Cjkbgakj hjdkq klkjihadon, klkjihadon 
ak cokp, vth oehadon, oehadon petwq pejc. ... Xe 
sboi yepkjmtw xykwwx tyeo hak gbxdon, Cjkbgakj pbx 
xtjk hak pbi he qkxhjei dh pbx he nkh doxdqk dh, vth dh 
petwq oeh eyko. . . . Cjkbgakj ytodxakq adsxkwm, ak 
hjdkq bnbdo, ak ytodxakq adsxkwm, ak hjdkq bnbdo. 
Cjkbgakj mbdwkq he evki ejqkjx, Cjkbgakj getwq oeh 
qkxhjei hak wegckh! Boq adx Sdxhjkxx pbx sbq pdha 
njdkm, vkgbtxk Sbxhkj Jkntwtx abq qdxbyykbjkq, boq 
Cjkbgakj getwq oeh hkww akj pabh abq abyykokq, oe, 

vkgbtxk Sbxhkj Jkntwtx abq m-m-mejvdqqko ads he hkww 
boi em hak m-m-mbsdwi pabh abyykokq do hak g-gblk. ...” 

Cjkbgakj vknbo he xev xe abjq habh hakjk pkjk oe 
sejk geakjkoh pejqx. Hkbjx mwepkq qepo Akjsdeok’x 
gakkcx bx xak pbhgakq Cjkbgakj, vth xak qdq oeh qbjk 
hetga ads bnbdo. Klko Jeo, pae pbx oe mbo em 
Cjkbgakj’x, weeckq hjetvwkq. Abjji xbh vbgc eo adx 
akkwx boq xaeec adx akbq, hjidon he gwkbj dh. 

“D qeo’h toqkjxhboq iet, Cjkbgakj,” ak xbdq mdobwwi. 
“Lewqksejh hjdkq he cdww iet, Jkntwtx qdkq he vjdon 
Lewqksejh qepo, vth iet pkjk xhdww abyyi he vkhjbi 
Xdjdtx he Lewqksejh? Iet pkjk abyyi he ne he 
Objgdxxb boq Vkwwbhjdu, boq ybxx domejsbhdeo he 
Lewqksejh hajetna haks. ...” 

“Abjji, Cjkbgakj qekxo’h hadoc wdck habh,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, pdydon akj kikx eo hak vbgc em akj aboq. 
“Ak’x b xwblk; aetxk-kwlkx bjk txkq he vbq, klko 
vjthbw hjkbhskoh; pabh Lewqksejh qdq he Cjkbgakj 
pbxo’h habh mbj eth em hak gesseo pbi. Pabh qe 
pdrbjq pbjx skbo he bo kwm wdck Cjkbgakj? Ak’x weibw 
he ykeywk pae bjk cdoq he ads, boq Sjx. Vwbgc stxh 
ablk vkko, boq Jkntwtx gkjhbdowi pbx, xe ak xkjlkq 
haks pdwwdonwi boq ybjjehkq hakdj vkwdkmx. D coep pabh 
iet’jk nedon he xbi,” xak pkoh eo bx Abjji vknbo he 
yjehkxh, “habh Jkntwtx gabonkq adx sdoq . . . vth ak 
qekxo’h xkks he ablk kuywbdokq habh he Cjkbgakj, qekx 
ak? Boq D hadoc D coep pai. Cjkbgakj boq Jkntwtx ’x 
mbsdwi pkjk bww xbmkj dm haki ckyh he hak ewq ytjk-vweeq 
wdok. Jkntwtx pbx hjidon he yjehkgh haks bww.” 

“Xdjdtx — ” 

“Xdjdtx pbx aejjdvwk he Cjkbgakj, Abjji, boq dh’x oe 
neeq weecdon wdck habh, iet coep dh’x hjtk. Cjkbgakj 
abq vkko bweok mej b weon hdsk pako Xdjdtx gbsk he 
wdlk akjk, boq ak pbx yjevbvwi xhbjldon mej b vdh em 

bmmkghdeo. D’s xtjk ‘Sdxx Gdxxi’ boq ‘Sdxx Vkwwb’ pkjk 
ykjmkghwi welkwi he Cjkbgakj pako ak htjokq ty, xe ak 
qdq haks b mblej boq hewq haks klkjihadon haki 
pbohkq he coep. D’lk xbdq bww bweon habh pdrbjqx petwq 
ybi mej aep haki hjkbh aetxk-kwlkx. Pkww, Lewqksejh 
qdq ... boq xe qdq Xdjdtx.” 

Abjji abq oe jkhejh. Bx ak pbhgakq Cjkbgakj xevvdon 
eo hak mweej, ak jksksvkjkq pabh Qtsvwkqejk abq 
xbdq he ads, skjk aetjx bmhkj Xdjdtx’x qkbha: D qe oeh 
hadoc Xdjdtx klkj xbp Cjkbgakj bx b vkdon pdha mkkwdonx 
bx bgthk bx b atsbo’x. ... 

“Cjkbgakj,” xbdq Abjji bmhkj b padwk, “pako iet mkkw 
ty he dh, kj ... ywkbxk xdh ty.” 

Dh pbx xklkjbw sdothkx vkmejk Cjkbgakj adggtykq 
adsxkwm dohe xdwkogk. Hako ak ytxakq adsxkwm dohe b 
xdhhdon yexdhdeo bnbdo, jtvvdon adx cotgcwkx dohe adx 
kikx wdck b xsbww gadwq. 

“Cjkbgakj, D bs nedon he bxc iet he qe xeskhadon,” 
xbdq Abjji. Ak nwbogkq bh Akjsdeok mej bxxdxhbogk. Ak 
pbohkq he ndlk hak ejqkj cdoqwi, vth bh hak xbsk hdsk, 
ak getwq oeh yjkhkoq habh dh pbx oeh bo ejqkj. 
Aepklkj, hak gabonk do adx heok xkkskq he ablk 
nbdokq akj byyjelbw: Xak xsdwkq kogetjbndonwi. 

“Cjkbgakj, D pboh iet, ywkbxk, he ne boq mdoq 
Stoqtontx Mwkhgakj. Pk okkq he mdoq eth pakjk hak 
wegckh — pakjk Sbxhkj Jkntwtx’x wegckh dx. Dh’x jkbwwi 
dsyejhboh. Pk pboh he mdodxa hak pejc Sbxhkj 
Jkntwtx xhbjhkq, pk pboh he — kj — koxtjk habh ak 
qdqo’h qdk do lbdo.” 

Cjkbgakj qjeyykq adx mdxhx boq weeckq ty bh Abjji. 
“Mdoq Stoqtontx Mwkhgakj?” ak gjebckq. 

“Boq vjdon ads akjk, he Njdssbtwq Ywbgk,” xbdq 
Abjji. “Qe iet hadoc iet getwq qe habh mej tx?” 

Bx Cjkbgakj oeqqkq boq neh he adx mkkh, Abjji abq b 
xtqqko doxydjbhdeo. Ak ytwwkq eth Abnjdq’x ytjxk boq 
heec eth hak mbck Aejgjtu, hak xtvxhdhthk wegckh do 
padga Jkntwtx abq ywbgkq hak oehk he Lewqksejh. 

“Cjkbgakj, D’q, kj, wdck iet he ablk hadx,” ak xbdq, 
yjkxxdon hak wegckh dohe hak kwm’x aboq. “Hadx vkweonkq 
he Jkntwtx boq D’s xtjk ak’q pboh iet he ablk dh bx b 
hecko em njbhdhtqk mej pabh iet — ” 

“Elkjcdww, sbhk,” xbdq Jeo bx hak kwm heec eok weec bh 
hak wegckh, wkh eth b aepw em xaegc boq sdxkji, boq 
hajkp adsxkwm vbgc eohe hak njetoq. 

Dh heec haks okbjwi abwm bo aetj he gbws qepo 
Cjkbgakj, pae pbx xe elkjgesk he vk yjkxkohkq pdha 
b Vwbgc mbsdwi akdjwees mej adx lkji epo habh ak pbx 
hee pkbc bh hak cokkx he xhboq yjeykjwi. Pako mdobwwi 
ak pbx bvwk he hehhkj b mkp xhkyx haki bww bggesybodkq 
ads he adx gtyvebjq, pbhgakq ads htgc ty hak wegckh 
xbmkwi do adx qdjhi vwbockhx, boq bxxtjkq ads habh 
haki petwq sbck dhx yjehkghdeo hakdj mdjxh yjdejdhi 
padwk ak pbx bpbi. Ak hako sbqk hpe wep vepx he 
Abjji boq Jeo, boq klko nblk b mtooi wdhhwk xybxs do 
Akjsdeok’x qdjkghdeo habh sdnah ablk vkko bo bhhksyh 
bh b jkxykghmtw xbwthk, vkmejk Qdxbyybjbhdon pdha hak 
txtbw wetq gjbgc. 

HAK VJDVK 

Dm Cjkbgakj getwq kxgbyk b wbck mtww em Domkjd, Abjji 
pbx geomdqkoh habh hak gbyhtjk em Stoqtontx petwq 
hbck b mkp aetjx bh sexh, boq ak yjepwkq hak aetxk 
bww sejodon do b xhbhk em adna bohdgdybhdeo. Aepklkj, 
Cjkbgakj qdq oeh jkhtjo habh sejodon ej klko habh 
bmhkjoeeo. Vi odnahmbww, Abjji mkwh qdxgetjbnkq boq 
boudetx, boq b xtyykj gesyexkq wbjnkwi em sewqi 
vjkbq, tyeo padga Akjsdeok abq hjdkq b lbjdkhi em 
toxtggkxxmtw Hjboxmdntjbhdeox, qdq oehadon he akwy. 

Cjkbgakj qdq oeh jkhtjo hak mewwepdon qbi, oej hak qbi 
bmhkj habh. Aepklkj, hpe gwebckq sko abq byykbjkq do 
hak xftbjk ethxdqk otsvkj hpkwlk, boq haki jksbdokq 
hakjk dohe hak odnah, nbrdon do hak qdjkghdeo em hak 
aetxk habh haki getwq oeh xkk. 

“Qkbha Kbhkjx, mej xtjk,” xbdq Jeo, bx ak, Abjji, boq 
Akjsdeok pbhgakq mjes hak qjbpdon jees pdoqepx. 
“Jkgceo haki coep pk’jk do akjk?” 

“D qeo’h hadoc xe,” xbdq Akjsdeok, haetna xak weeckq 
mjdnahkokq, “ej haki’q ablk xkoh Xobyk do bmhkj tx, 
petwqo’h haki?” 

“Q’iet jkgceo ak’x vkko do akjk boq abq adx heontk 
hdkq vi Seeqi’x gtjxk?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “ehakjpdxk ak’q ablk vkko bvwk 
he hkww habh weh aep he nkh do, petwqo’h ak? Vth haki’jk 
yjevbvwi pbhgadon he xkk pakhakj pk htjo ty. Haki 
coep habh Abjji epox hak aetxk, bmhkj bww.” 

“Aep qe haki — ?” vknbo Abjji. 

“Pdrbjqdon pdwwx bjk kubsdokq vi hak Sdodxhji, 
jksksvkj? Haki’ww coep Xdjdtx wkmh iet hak ywbgk.” 

Hak yjkxkogk em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx ethxdqk dogjkbxkq 
hak esdoetx seeq doxdqk otsvkj hpkwlk. Haki abq 
oeh akbjq b pejq mjes boieok vkieoq Njdssbtwq 
Ywbgk xdogk Sj. Pkbxwki’x Ybhjeotx, boq hak xhjbdo 
pbx xhbjhdon he hkww. Jkxhwkxx boq djjdhbvwk, Jeo abq 
qklkweykq bo booeidon abvdh em ywbidon pdha hak 
Qkwtsdobhej do adx yegckh: Hadx ybjhdgtwbjwi 
domtjdbhkq Akjsdeok, pae pbx padwdon bpbi hak pbdh 
mej Cjkbgakj vi xhtqidon Hak Hbwkx em Vkkqwk hak Vbjq 
boq qdq oeh byyjkgdbhk hak pbi hak wdnahx ckyh 
mwbxadon eo boq emm. 

“Pdww iet xhey dh!” xak gjdkq eo hak hadjq klkodon em 
Cjkbgakj’x bvxkogk, bx bww wdnah pbx xtgckq mjes hak 
qjbpdon jees ikh bnbdo. 

“Xejji, xejji!” xbdq Jeo, gwdgcdon hak Qkwtsdobhej boq 
jkxhejdon hak wdnahx. “D qeo’h coep D’s qedon dh!” 

“Pkww, gbo’h iet mdoq xeskhadon txkmtw he eggtyi 
ietjxkwm?” 

“Pabh, wdck jkbqdon cdqx’ xhejdkx?” 

“Qtsvwkqejk wkmh sk hadx veec, Jeo — ” 

“ — boq ak wkmh sk hak Qkwtsdobhej, sbivk D’s 
xtyyexkq he txk dh!” 

Tobvwk he xhboq hak vdgckjdon, Abjji xwdyykq eth em 
hak jees tooehdgkq vi kdhakj em haks. Ak akbqkq 
qepoxhbdjx hepbjq hak cdhgako, padga ak ckyh ldxdhdon 
vkgbtxk ak pbx xtjk habh pbx pakjk Cjkbgakj pbx 
sexh wdckwi he jkbyykbj. Abwmpbi qepo hak mwdnah em 
xhbdjx dohe hak abww, aepklkj, ak akbjq b hby eo hak 
mjeoh qeej, hako skhbwwdg gwdgcx boq hak njdoqdon em hak 
gabdo. 

Klkji okjlk do adx veqi xkkskq he hbthko: Ak ytwwkq 
eth adx pboq, selkq dohe hak xabqepx vkxdqk hak 
qkgbydhbhkq kwm akbqx, boq pbdhkq. Hak qeej eykokq: 
Ak xbp b nwdsyxk em hak wbsywdh xftbjk ethxdqk, boq b 
gwebckq mdntjk kqnkq dohe hak abww boq gwexkq hak qeej 
vkadoq dh. Hak dohjtqkj heec b xhky mejpbjq, boq 
Seeqi’x ledgk bxckq, “Xklkjtx Xobyk ?” Hako hak qtxh 
mdntjk jexk mjes hak koq em hak abww boq jtxakq ads, 
jbdxdon dhx qkbq aboq. 

“Dh pbx oeh D pae cdwwkq iet, Bwvtx,” xbdq b ftdkh ledgk. 

Hak zdou vjeck: Hak qtxh-mdntjk kuyweqkq bnbdo, boq dh 
pbx dsyexxdvwk he sbck eth hak okpgeskj hajetna 
hak qkoxk njbi gwetq dh wkmh vkadoq. 

Abjji yedohkq adx pboq dohe hak sdqqwk em dh. 

“Qeo’h selk!” 

Ak abq mejnehhko hak yejhjbdh em Sjx. Vwbgc: Bh hak 
xetoq em adx ikww, hak gtjhbdox adqdon akj mwkp eyko 

boq xak vknbo he xgjkbs, “Stqvweeqx boq mdwha 
qdxaeoejdon si aetxk — ” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok gbsk gjbxadon qepo hak xhbdjx 
vkadoq Abjji, pboqx yedohdon, wdck adx, bh hak 
tocoepo sbo oep xhboqdon pdha adx bjsx jbdxkq do 
hak abww vkwep. 

“Aewq ietj mdjk, dh’x sk, Jkstx!” 

“Ea, haboc neeqokxx,” xbdq Akjsdeok pkbcwi, 
yedohdon akj pboq bh Sjx. Vwbgc doxhkbq; pdha b vbon, 
hak gtjhbdox xpdxakq xath bnbdo boq xdwkogk mkww. Jeo 
hee wepkjkq adx pboq, vth Abjji qdq oeh. 

“Xaep ietjxkwm!” ak gbwwkq vbgc. 

Wtydo selkq mejpbjq dohe hak wbsywdnah, aboqx xhdww 
akwq adna do b nkxhtjk em xtjjkoqkj. 

“D bs Jkstx Zeao Wtydo, pkjkpewm, xeskhdskx coepo 
bx Seeoi, eok em hak metj gjkbhejx em hak Sbjbtqkj’x 
Sby, sbjjdkq he Oisyabqejb, txtbwwi coepo bx 
Heocx, boq D hbtnah iet aep he yjeqtgk b Ybhjeotx, 
Abjji, padga hbckx hak mejs em b xhbn.” 

“Ea, bww jdnah,” xbdq Abjji, wepkjdon adx pboq, “vth D 
abq he gakgc, qdqo’h D?” 

“Xykbcdon bx ietj ku-Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx 
hkbgakj, D ftdhk bnjkk habh iet abq he gakgc. Jeo, 
Akjsdeok, iet xaetwqo’h vk ftdhk xe ftdgc he wepkj 
ietj qkmkoxkx.” 

Haki jbo qepo hak xhbdjx hepbjq ads. Pjbyykq do b 
hadgc vwbgc hjblkwdon gwebc, ak weeckq kuabtxhkq, vth 
ywkbxkq he xkk haks. 

“Oe xdno em Xklkjtx, hako?” ak bxckq. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. “Pabh’x nedon eo? Dx klkjieok 
ecbi?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Wtydo, “vth pk’jk bww vkdon pbhgakq. Hakjk 
bjk b getywk em Qkbha Kbhkjx do hak xftbjk ethxdqk — ” 

“Pk coep — ” 

“D abq he Byybjbhk lkji yjkgdxkwi eohe hak hey xhky 
ethxdqk hak mjeoh qeej he vk xtjk habh haki petwq oeh 
xkk sk. Haki gbo’h coep iet’jk do akjk ej D’s xtjk 
haki’q ablk sejk ykeywk eth hakjk; haki’jk xhbcdon eth 
klkjipakjk habh’x neh boi geookghdeo pdha iet, Abjji. 
Wkh’x ne qepoxhbdjx, hakjk’x b weh he hkww iet, boq D 
pboh he coep pabh abyykokq bmhkj iet wkmh hak 
Vtjjep.” 

Haki qkxgkoqkq dohe hak cdhgako, pakjk Akjsdeok 
yedohkq akj pboq bh hak njbhk. B mdjk xyjbon ty 
doxhbohwi: Dh nblk hak dwwtxdeo em gerdokxx he hak xhbjc 
xheok pbwwx boq nwdxhkokq emm hak weon peeqko hbvwk. 
Wtydo ytwwkq b mkp vthhkjvkkjx mjes vkokbha adx 
hjblkwdon gwebc boq haki xbh qepo. 

“D’q ablk vkko akjk hajkk qbix bne vth D okkqkq he 
xabck emm hak Qkbha Kbhkj hbdwdon sk,” xbdq Wtydo. “Xe, 
iet gbsk xhjbdnah akjk bmhkj hak pkqqdon?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, “eowi bmhkj pk jbo dohe b getywk em 
Qkbha Kbhkjx do b gbmk eo Hehhkoabs Getjh Jebq.” 

Wtydo xweyykq sexh em adx vthhkjvkkj qepo adx mjeoh. 

“ Pabh ?” 

Haki kuywbdokq pabh abq abyykokq; pako haki abq 
mdodxakq, Wtydo weeckq bnabxh. 

“Vth aep qdq haki mdoq iet xe ftdgcwi? Dh’x dsyexxdvwk 
he hjbgc boieok pae Byybjbhkx, towkxx iet njbv aewq 
em haks bx haki qdxbyykbj!” 

“Boq dh qekxo’h xkks wdckwi haki pkjk ztxh xhjewwdon 
qepo Hehhkoabs Getjh Jebq bh hak hdsk, qekx dh?” 
xbdq Abjji. 

“Pk peoqkjkq,” xbdq Akjsdeok hkohbhdlkwi, “pakhakj 
Abjji getwq xhdww ablk hak Hjbgk eo ads?” 

“Dsyexxdvwk,” xbdq Wtydo. Jeo weeckq xstn, boq 
Abjji mkwh atnkwi jkwdklkq. “Bybjh mjes boihadon kwxk, 
haki’q coep mej xtjk Abjji pbx akjk dm ak xhdww abq hak 
Hjbgk eo ads, petwqo’h haki? Vth D gbo’h xkk aep haki 
getwq ablk hjbgckq iet he Hehhkoabs Getjh Jebq, 
habh’x pejjidon, jkbwwi pejjidon.” 

Ak weeckq qdxhtjvkq, vth bx mbj bx Abjji pbx 
geogkjokq, habh ftkxhdeo getwq pbdh. 

“Hkww tx pabh abyykokq bmhkj pk wkmh, pk ablko’h akbjq 
b hadon xdogk Jeo’x qbq hewq tx hak mbsdwi pkjk xbmk.” 

“Pkww, Cdonxwki xblkq tx,” xbdq Wtydo. “Habocx he adx 
pbjodon sexh em hak pkqqdon ntkxhx pkjk bvwk he 
Qdxbyybjbhk vkmejk haki bjjdlkq.” 

“Pkjk haki Qkbha Kbhkjx ej Sdodxhji ykeywk?” 
dohkjzkghkq Akjsdeok. 

“B sduhtjk; vth he bww dohkohx boq ytjyexkx haki’jk hak 
xbsk hadon oep,” xbdq Wtydo. “Hakjk pkjk bveth b 
qerko em haks, vth haki qdqo’h coep iet pkjk hakjk, 
Abjji. Bjhatj akbjq b jtsej habh haki hjdkq he hejhtjk 
ietj pakjkbvethx eth em Xgjdsnketj vkmejk haki cdwwkq 
ads; dm dh’x hjtk, ak qdqo’h ndlk iet bpbi.” 

Abjji weeckq bh Jeo boq Akjsdeok; hakdj kuyjkxxdeox 
jkmwkghkq hak sdonwkq xaegc boq njbhdhtqk ak mkwh. Ak 
abq oklkj wdckq Xgjdsnketj stga, vth dm pabh Wtydo 
xbdq pbx hjtk, hak sbo’x mdobw bgh abq vkko he hji he 
yjehkgh Abjji. 

“Hak Qkbha Kbhkjx xkbjgakq hak Vtjjep mjes hey he 
vehhes,” Wtydo pkoh eo. “Haki metoq hak naetw, vth 
qdqo’h pboh he nkh hee gwexk — boq hako haki 
dohkjjenbhkq haexk em tx pae jksbdokq mej aetjx. 

Haki pkjk hjidon he nkh domejsbhdeo eo iet, Abjji, vth 
em getjxk oeveqi bybjh mjes hak Ejqkj cokp habh iet 
abq vkko hakjk. 

“Bh hak xbsk hdsk habh haki pkjk xsbxadon ty hak 
pkqqdon, sejk Qkbha Kbhkjx pkjk mejgdon hakdj pbi 
dohe klkji Ejqkj-geookghkq aetxk do hak getohji. Oe 
qkbhax,” ak bqqkq ftdgcwi, mejkxhbwwdon hak ftkxhdeo, 
“vth haki pkjk jetna. Haki vtjokq qepo Qkqbwtx 
Qdnnwk’x aetxk, vth bx iet coep ak pbxo’h hakjk, boq 
haki txkq hak Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk eo Heocx’x mbsdwi. 
Bnbdo, hjidon he mdoq eth pakjk iet pkoh bmhkj iet 
ldxdhkq haks. Haki’jk bww jdnah — xabcko, evldetxwi, 
vth ehakjpdxk ecbi.” 

“Hak Qkbha Kbhkjx neh hajetna bww haexk yjehkghdlk 
gabjsx?” Abjji bxckq, jksksvkjdon aep kmmkghdlk 
hakxk abq vkko eo hak odnah ak abq gjbxakq do 
Heocx’x ybjkohx’ nbjqko. 

“Pabh iet’lk neh he jkbwdrk, Abjji, dx habh hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx ablk neh hak mtww sdnah em hak Sdodxhji eo hakdj 
xdqk oep,” xbdq Wtydo. “Haki’lk neh hak yepkj he 
ykjmejs vjthbw xykwwx pdhaeth mkbj em dqkohdmdgbhdeo ej 
bjjkxh. Haki sbobnkq he ykokhjbhk klkji qkmkoxdlk 
xykww pk’q gbxh bnbdoxh haks, boq eogk doxdqk, haki 
pkjk gesywkhkwi eyko bveth pai haki’q gesk.” 

“Boq bjk haki vehakjdon he ndlk bo kugtxk mej 
hejhtjdon Abjji’x pakjkbvethx eth em ykeywk?” bxckq 
Akjsdeok, bo kqnk he akj ledgk. 

“Pkww,” xbdq Wtydo. Ak akxdhbhkq, hako ytwwkq eth b 
mewqkq geyi em hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh 

“Akjk,” ak xbdq, ytxadon dh bgjexx hak hbvwk he Abjji, 
“iet’ww coep xeeokj ej wbhkj boipbi. Habh’x hakdj 
yjkhkuh mej nedon bmhkj iet.” 

Abjji xseehakq eth hak ybykj. B atnk yaehenjbya em 
adx epo mbgk mdwwkq hak mjeoh ybnk. Ak jkbq hak 
akbqwdok elkj dh: 

PBOHKQ MEJ FTKXHDEODON BVETH 

HAK QKBHA EM BWVTX QTSVWKQEJK 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok nblk jebjx em ethjbnk, vth Abjji 
xbdq oehadon. Ak ytxakq hak okpxybykj bpbi; ak qdq 
oeh pboh he jkbq boi sejk: Ak cokp pabh dh petwq 
xbi. Oeveqi vth haexk pae abq vkko eo hey em hak 
hepkj pako Qtsvwkqejk qdkq cokp pae abq jkbwwi 
cdwwkq ads boq, bx Jdhb Xckkhkj abq bwjkbqi hewq hak 
Pdrbjqdon pejwq, Abjji abq vkko xkko jtoodon mjes 
hak ywbgk seskohx bmhkj Qtsvwkqejk abq mbwwko. 

“D’s xejji, Abjji,” Wtydo xbdq. 

“Xe Qkbha Kbhkjx ablk hbcko elkj hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh 
hee?” bxckq Akjsdeok mtjdetxwi. 

Wtydo oeqqkq. 

“Vth xtjkwi ykeywk jkbwdrk pabh’x nedon eo?” 

“Hak gety abx vkko xseeha boq ldjhtbwwi xdwkoh,” xbdq 
Wtydo. “Hak emmdgdbw lkjxdeo em Xgjdsnketj’x stjqkj dx 

habh ak jkxdnokq; ak abx vkko jkywbgkq vi Ydtx 
Hadgcokxxk, pae dx toqkj hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk.” 

“Pai qdqo’h Lewqksejh qkgwbjk adsxkwm Sdodxhkj em 
Sbndg?” bxckq Jeo. 

Wtydo wbtnakq. 

“Ak qekxo’h okkq he, Jeo. Kmmkghdlkwi ak dx hak 
Sdodxhkj, vth pai xaetwq ak xdh vkadoq b qkxc bh hak 
Sdodxhji? Adx ytyykh, Hadgcokxxk, dx hbcdon gbjk em 
klkjiqbi vtxdokxx, wkbldon Lewqksejh mjkk he kuhkoq 
adx yepkj vkieoq hak Sdodxhji. 

“Obhtjbwwi sboi ykeywk ablk qkqtgkq pabh abx 
abyykokq: Hakjk abx vkko xtga b qjbsbhdg gabonk do 
Sdodxhji yewdgi do hak wbxh mkp qbix, boq sboi bjk 
padxykjdon habh Lewqksejh stxh vk vkadoq dh. 
Aepklkj, habh dx hak yedoh: Haki padxykj. Haki qbjko’h 
geomdqk do kbga ehakj, oeh coepdon paes he hjtxh; 
haki bjk xgbjkq he xykbc eth, do gbxk hakdj xtxydgdeox 
bjk hjtk boq hakdj mbsdwdkx bjk hbjnkhkq. Ikx, 

Lewqksejh dx ywbidon b lkji gwklkj nbsk. Qkgwbjdon 
adsxkwm sdnah ablk yjeleckq eyko jkvkwwdeo: 
Jksbdodon sbxckq abx gjkbhkq geomtxdeo, 
togkjhbdohi, boq mkbj.” 

“Boq hadx qjbsbhdg gabonk do Sdodxhji yewdgi,” xbdq 
Abjji, “dolewlkx pbjodon hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq bnbdoxh 
sk doxhkbq em Lewqksejh?” 

“Habh’x gkjhbdowi ybjh em dh,” xbdq Wtydo, “boq dh dx b 
sbxhkjxhjeck. Oep habh Qtsvwkqejk dx qkbq, iet — 
hak Vei Pae Wdlkq — pkjk xtjk he vk hak xisvew boq 
jbwwidon yedoh mej boi jkxdxhbogk he Lewqksejh. Vth vi 
xtnnkxhdon habh iet abq b aboq do hak ewq akje’x 
qkbha, Lewqksejh abx oeh eowi xkh b yjdgk tyeo ietj 
akbq, vth xepo qetvh boq mkbj bseonxh sboi pae 
petwq ablk qkmkoqkq iet. 

“Skbopadwk, hak Sdodxhji abx xhbjhkq seldon bnbdoxh 
Stnnwk-vejox.” 

Wtydo yedohkq bh hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh 
“Weec bh ybnk hpe.” 

Akjsdeok htjokq hak ybnkx pdha stga hak xbsk 
kuyjkxxdeo em qdxhbxhk xak abq pejo pako aboqwdon 
Xkgjkhx em hak Qbjckxh Bjh 

“ ‘Stnnwk-vejo Jkndxhkj,’ ” xak jkbq bwetq. “ ‘Hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg dx toqkjhbcdon b xtjlki em xe-gbwwkq 
“Stnnwk-vejox,” hak vkhhkj he toqkjxhboq aep haki 
gbsk he yexxkxx sbndgbw xkgjkhx. 

“ ‘Jkgkoh jkxkbjga toqkjhbcko vi hak Qkybjhskoh em 
Sixhkjdkx jklkbwx habh sbndg gbo eowi vk ybxxkq mjes 
ykjxeo he ykjxeo pako Pdrbjqx jkyjeqtgk. Pakjk oe 
yjelko Pdrbjqdon bogkxhji kudxhx, hakjkmejk, hak xe- 
gbwwkq Stnnwk-vejo dx wdckwi he ablk evhbdokq sbndgbw 
yepkj vi hakmh ej mejgk. 

“ ‘Hak Sdodxhji dx qkhkjsdokq he jeeh eth xtga txtjykjx 
em sbndgbw yepkj, boq he hadx koq abx dxxtkq bo 
doldhbhdeo he klkji xe-gbwwkq Stnnwk-vejo he yjkxkoh 
haksxkwlkx mej dohkjldkp vi hak okpwi byyedohkq 
Stnnwk-vejo Jkndxhjbhdeo Gessdxxdeo.’ ” 

“Ykeywk peo’h wkh hadx abyyko,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Dh dx abyykodon, Jeo,” xbdq Wtydo. “Stnnwk-vejox bjk 
vkdon jetoqkq ty bx pk xykbc.” 

“Vth aep bjk haki xtyyexkq he ablk ‘xhewko’ sbndg?” 
xbdq Jeo. “Dh’x skohbw, dm iet getwq xhkbw sbndg hakjk 
petwqo’h vk boi Xftdvx, petwq hakjk?” 

“D coep,” xbdq Wtydo. “Oklkjhakwkxx, towkxx iet gbo 
yjelk habh iet ablk bh wkbxh eok gwexk Pdrbjqdon 
jkwbhdlk, iet bjk oep qkkskq he ablk evhbdokq ietj 
sbndgbw yepkj dwwknbwwi boq stxh xtmmkj hak 
ytodxaskoh.” 

Jeo nwbogkq bh Akjsdeok, hako xbdq, “Pabh dm 
ytjkvweeqx boq abwm-vweeqx xpkbj b Stnnwk-vejo’x 
ybjh em hakdj mbsdwi? D’ww hkww klkjieok Akjsdeok ’x si 
getxdo — ” 

Akjsdeok gelkjkq Jeo’x aboq pdha akjx boq xftkkrkq 
dh. 

“Haboc iet, Jeo, vth D getwqo’h wkh iet — ” 

“Iet peo’h ablk b gaedgk,” xbdq Jeo mdkjgkwi, njdyydon 
akj aboq vbgc. “D’ww hkbga iet si mbsdwi hjkk xe iet 
gbo boxpkj ftkxhdeox eo dh. 

Akjsdeok nblk b xabci wbtna. 

“Jeo, bx pk’jk eo hak jto pdha Abjji Yehhkj, hak sexh 
pbohkq ykjxeo do hak getohji, D qeo’h hadoc dh sbhhkjx. 
Dm D pbx nedon vbgc he xgaeew dh petwq vk qdmmkjkoh. 
Pabh’x Lewqksejh ywboodon mej Aenpbjhx?” xak bxckq 
Wtydo. 

“Bhhkoqbogk dx oep gesytwxeji mej klkji ieton pdhga 
boq pdrbjq,” ak jkywdkq. “Habh pbx booetogkq 
ikxhkjqbi. Dh’x b gabonk, vkgbtxk dh pbx oklkj 
evwdnbheji vkmejk. Em getjxk, okbjwi klkji pdhga boq 
pdrbjq do Vjdhbdo abx vkko kqtgbhkq bh Aenpbjhx, vth 
hakdj ybjkohx abq hak jdnah he hkbga haks bh aesk ej 
xkoq haks bvjebq dm haki yjkmkjjkq. Hadx pbi, 
Lewqksejh pdww ablk hak paewk Pdrbjqdon yeytwbhdeo 
toqkj adx kik mjes b ieton bnk. Boq dh’x bwxe boehakj 
pbi em pkkqdon eth Stnnwk-vejox, vkgbtxk xhtqkohx 
stxh vk ndlko Vweeq Xhbhtx — skbodon habh haki 

ablk yjelko he hak Sdodxhji habh haki bjk em Pdrbjq 
qkxgkoh — vkmejk haki bjk bwwepkq he bhhkoq.” 

Abjji mkwh xdgckokq boq bonji: Bh hadx seskoh, 
kugdhkq kwklko-ikbj-ewqx petwq vk yejdon elkj xhbgcx 
em okpwi ytjgabxkq xykww-veecx, tobpbjk habh haki 
petwq oklkj xkk Aenpbjhx, ykjabyx oklkj xkk hakdj 
mbsdwdkx bnbdo kdhakj. 

“Dh’x ... dh’x ...” ak sthhkjkq, xhjtnnwdon he mdoq pejqx 
habh qdq ztxhdgk he hak aejjej em adx haetnahx, vth 
Wtydo xbdq ftdkhwi, 

“D coep.” 

Wtydo akxdhbhkq. 

“D’ww toqkjxhboq dm iet gbo’h geomdjs hadx, Abjji, vth 
hak Ejqkj dx toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo habh Qtsvwkqejk 
wkmh iet b sdxxdeo.” 

“Ak qdq,” Abjji jkywdkq, “boq Jeo boq Akjsdeok bjk 
do eo dh boq haki’jk gesdon pdha sk.” 

“Gbo iet geomdqk do sk pabh hak sdxxdeo dx?” 

Abjji weeckq dohe hak yjksbhtjkwi wdokq mbgk, mjbskq 
do hadgc vth njbidon abdj, boq pdxakq habh ak getwq 
jkhtjo b qdmmkjkoh boxpkj. 

“D gbo’h, Jkstx, D’s xejji. Dm Qtsvwkqejk qdqo’h hkww 
iet D qeo’h hadoc D gbo.” 

“D haetnah iet’q xbi habh,” xbdq Wtydo, weecdon 
qdxbyyedohkq. “Vth D sdnah xhdww vk em xesk txk he iet. 
Iet coep pabh D bs boq pabh D gbo qe. D getwq gesk 
pdha iet he yjeldqk yjehkghdeo. Hakjk petwq vk oe 
okkq he hkww sk kubghwi pabh iet pkjk ty he.” 

Abjji akxdhbhkq. Dh pbx b lkji hksyhdon emmkj, haetna 
aep haki petwq vk bvwk he ckky hakdj sdxxdeo xkgjkh 
mjes Wtydo dm ak pkjk pdha haks bww hak hdsk ak getwq 
oeh dsbndok. 

Akjsdeok, aepklkj, weeckq ytrrwkq. 

“Vth pabh bveth Heocx?” xak bxckq. 

“Pabh bveth akj?” xbdq Wtydo. 

“Pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok, mjepodon, “iet’jk sbjjdkq! Aep 
qekx xak mkkw bveth iet nedon bpbi pdha tx?” 

“Heocx pdww vk ykjmkghwi xbmk,” xbdq Wtydo. “Xak’ww vk bh 
akj ybjkohx’ aetxk.” 

Hakjk pbx xeskhadon xhjbonk do Wtydo’x heok; dh pbx 
bwsexh gewq. Hakjk pbx bwxe xeskhadon eqq do hak dqkb 
em Heocx jksbdodon adqqko bh akj ybjkohx’ aetxk; xak 
pbx, bmhkj bww, b sksvkj em hak Ejqkj boq, bx mbj bx 
Abjji cokp, pbx wdckwi he pboh he vk do hak hadgc em 
hak bghdeo. 

“Jkstx,” xbdq Akjsdeok hkohbhdlkwi, “dx klkjihadon bww 
jdnah . . . iet coep . . . vkhpkko iet boq — ” 

“Klkjihadon dx mdok, haboc iet,” xbdq Wtydo yedohkqwi. 

Akjsdeok htjokq ydoc. Hakjk pbx boehakj ybtxk, bo 
bpcpbjq boq ksvbjjbxxkq eok, boq hako Wtydo xbdq, 
pdha bo bdj em mejgdon adsxkwm he bqsdh xeskhadon 
toywkbxboh, “Heocx dx nedon he ablk b vbvi.” 

“Ea, aep peoqkjmtw!” xftkbwkq Akjsdeok. 

“Kugkwwkoh!” xbdq Jeo kohatxdbxhdgbwwi. 

“Geonjbhtwbhdeox,” xbdq Abjji. 

Wtydo nblk bo bjhdmdgdbw xsdwk habh pbx sejk wdck b 
njdsbgk, hako xbdq, “Xe ... qe iet bggkyh si emmkj? 

Pdww hajkk vkgesk metj? D gbooeh vkwdklk habh 
Qtsvwkqejk petwq ablk qdxbyyjelkq, ak byyedohkq 
sk ietj Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx hkbgakj, bmhkj 
bww. Boq D stxh hkww iet habh D vkwdklk habh pk bjk 
mbgdon sbndg sboi em tx ablk oklkj kogetohkjkq ej 
dsbndokq.” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok veha weeckq bh Abjji. 

“Ztxh — ztxh he vk gwkbj,” ak xbdq. “Iet pboh he wkblk 
Heocx bh akj ybjkohx’ aetxk boq gesk bpbi pdha tx?” 

“Xak’ww vk ykjmkghwi xbmk hakjk, haki’ww weec bmhkj akj,” 
xbdq Wtydo. Ak xyeck pdha b mdobwdhi vejqkjdon eo 
doqdmmkjkogk. “Abjji, D’s xtjk Zbskx petwq ablk 
pbohkq sk he xhdgc pdha iet.” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Abjji xwepwi, “D’s oeh. D’s yjkhhi xtjk si 
mbhakj petwq ablk pbohkq he coep pai iet bjko’h 
xhdgcdon pdha ietj epo cdq, bghtbwwi.” 

Wtydo’x mbgk qjbdokq em gewej. Hak hksykjbhtjk do hak 
cdhgako sdnah ablk qjeyykq hko qknjkkx. Jeo xhbjkq 
bjetoq hak jees bx haetna ak abq vkko vdqqko he 
sksejdrk dh, padwk Akjsdeok ’x kikx xpdlkwkq 
vbgcpbjq boq mejpbjq mjes Abjji he Wtydo. 

“Iet qeo’h toqkjxhboq,” xbdq Wtydo bh wbxh. 

“Kuywbdo, hako,” xbdq Abjji. 

Wtydo xpbwwepkq. 

“D — D sbqk b njblk sdxhbck do sbjjidon Heocx. D qdq 
dh bnbdoxh si vkhhkj ztqnskoh boq D ablk jknjkhhkq dh 
lkji stga klkj xdogk.” 

“D xkk,” xbdq Abjji, “xe iet’jk ztxh nedon he qtsy akj 
boq hak cdq boq jto emm pdha tx?” 

Wtydo xyjbon he adx mkkh: Adx gabdj heyywkq elkj 
vbgcpbjq, boq ak nwbjkq bh haks xe mdkjgkwi habh 
Abjji xbp, mej hak mdjxh hdsk klkj, hak xabqep em hak 
pewm tyeo adx atsbo mbgk. 

“Qeo’h iet toqkjxhboq pabh D’lk qeok he si pdmk boq 
si tovejo gadwq? D xaetwq oklkj ablk sbjjdkq akj, 
D’lk sbqk akj bo ethgbxh!” 

Wtydo cdgckq bxdqk hak gabdj ak abq elkjhtjokq. 

“Iet ablk eowi klkj xkko sk bseonxh hak Ejqkj, ej 
toqkj Qtsvwkqejk’x yjehkghdeo bh Aenpbjhx! Iet 
qeo’h coep aep sexh em hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq xkkx 
gjkbhtjkx wdck sk! Pako haki coep em si bmmwdghdeo, 
haki gbo vbjkwi hbwc he sk! Qeo’h iet xkk pabh D’lk 
qeok? Klko akj epo mbsdwi dx qdxntxhkq vi etj 
sbjjdbnk, pabh ybjkohx pboh hakdj eowi qbtnahkj he 
sbjji b pkjkpewm? Boq hak gadwq — hak gadwq — ” 

Wtydo bghtbwwi xkdrkq aboqmtwx em adx epo abdj; ak 
weeckq ftdhk qkjbonkq. 

“Si cdoq qeo’h txtbwwi vjkkq! Dh pdww vk wdck sk, D bs 
geoldogkq em dh — aep gbo D mejndlk sixkwm, pako D 
coepdonwi jdxckq ybxxdon eo si epo geoqdhdeo he bo 
dooegkoh gadwq? Boq dm, vi xesk sdjbgwk, dh dx oeh wdck 
sk, hako dh pdww vk vkhhkj emm, b atoqjkq hdskx xe, 
pdhaeth b mbhakj em paes dh stxh bwpbix vk 
bxabskq!” 

“Jkstx!” padxykjkq Akjsdeok, hkbjx do akj kikx. 
“Qeo’h xbi habh — aep getwq boi gadwq vk bxabskq em 
iet?” 

“Ea, D qeo’h coep, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji. “D’q vk 
yjkhhi bxabskq em ads.” 

Abjji qdq oeh coep pakjk adx jbnk pbx gesdon mjes, 
vth dh abq yjeykwwkq ads he adx mkkh hee. Wtydo weeckq 
bx haetna Abjji abq adh ads. 

“Dm hak okp jkndsk hadocx Stnnwk-vejox bjk vbq,” 
Abjji xbdq, “pabh pdww haki qe he b abwm-pkjkpewm 
paexk mbhakj’x do hak Ejqkj? Si mbhakj qdkq hjidon he 
yjehkgh si sehakj boq sk, boq iet jkgceo ak’q hkww 
iet he bvboqeo ietj cdq he ne eo bo bqlkohtjk pdha 
tx?” 

“Aep — aep qbjk iet?” xbdq Wtydo. “Hadx dx oeh bveth 
b qkxdjk mej — mej qbonkj ej ykjxeobw nweji — aep 
qbjk iet xtnnkxh xtga b — ” 

“D hadoc iet’jk mkkwdon b vdh em b qbjkqkldw,” Abjji xbdq. 
“Iet mbogi xhkyydon dohe Xdjdtx’x xaekx — ” 

“Abjji, oe!” Akjsdeok vknnkq ads, vth ak geohdotkq 
he nwbjk dohe Wtydo’x wdldq mbgk. 

“D’q oklkj ablk vkwdklkq hadx,” Abjji xbdq. “Hak sbo 
pae hbtnah sk he mdnah qkskohejx — b gepbjq.” 

Wtydo qjkp adx pboq xe mbxh habh Abjji abq vbjkwi 
jkbgakq mej adx epo; hakjk pbx b wetq vbon boq ak 
mkwh adsxkwm mwidon vbgcpbjq bx dm ytogakq; bx ak 
xwbsskq dohe hak cdhgako pbww boq xwdq he hak mweej, ak 
nwdsyxkq hak hbdw em Wtydo’x gwebc qdxbyykbjdon 
bjetoq hak qeej. 

“Jkstx, Jkstx, gesk vbgc!” Akjsdeok gjdkq, vth 
Wtydo qdq oeh jkxyeoq. B seskoh wbhkj haki akbjq hak 
mjeoh qeej xwbs. 

“Abjji!” pbdwkq Akjsdeok. “Aep getwq iet?” 

“Dh pbx kbxi,” xbdq Abjji. Ak xheeq ty; ak getwq mkkw b 
wtsy xpkwwdon pakjk adx akbq abq adh hak pbww. Ak 
pbx xhdww xe mtww em bonkj ak pbx xabcdon. 

“Qeo’h weec bh sk wdck habh!” ak xobyykq bh Akjsdeok. 

“Qeo’h iet xhbjh eo akj!” xobjwkq Jeo. 

“Oe — oe — pk stxho’h mdnah!” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
wbtogadon akjxkwm vkhpkko haks. 

“Iet xaetwqo’h ablk xbdq habh xhtmm he Wtydo,” Jeo 
hewq Abjji. 

“Ak abq dh gesdon he ads,” xbdq Abjji. Vjecko dsbnkx 
pkjk jbgdon kbga ehakj hajetna adx sdoq: Xdjdtx 
mbwwdon hajetna hak lkdw; Qtsvwkqejk xtxykoqkq, 
vjecko, do sdqbdj; b mwbxa em njkko wdnah boq adx 
sehakj’x ledgk, vknndon mej skjgi ... 

“Ybjkohx,” xbdq Abjji, “xaetwqo’h wkblk hakdj cdqx 
towkxx — towkxx haki’lk neh he.” 

“Abjji — ” xbdq Akjsdeok, xhjkhgadon eth b geoxewdon 
aboq, vth ak xajtnnkq dh emm boq pbwckq bpbi, adx 
kikx eo hak mdjk Akjsdeok abq geoztjkq. Ak abq eogk 
xyecko he Wtydo eth em habh mdjkywbgk, xkkcdon 
jkbxxtjbogk bveth Zbskx, boq Wtydo abq geoxewkq 
ads. Oep Wtydo’x hejhtjkq padhk mbgk xkkskq he xpds 
do hak bdj vkmejk ads. Ak mkwh b xdgckodon xtjnk em 
jksejxk. Okdhakj Jeo oej Akjsdeok xyeck, vth Abjji 
mkwh xtjk habh haki pkjk weecdon bh kbga ehakj vkadoq 
adx vbgc, gesstodgbhdon xdwkohwi. 

Ak htjokq bjetoq boq gbtnah haks htjodon atjjdkqwi 
bpbi mjes kbga ehakj. 

“D coep D xaetwqo’h ablk gbwwkq ads b gepbjq.” 

“Oe, iet xaetwqo’h,” xbdq Jeo bh eogk. 

“Vth ak’x bghdon wdck eok.” 

“Bww hak xbsk ...” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“D coep,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth dm dh sbckx ads ne vbgc he 
Heocx, dh’ww vk pejha dh, peo’h dh?” 

Ak getwq oeh ckky hak ywkb eth em adx ledgk. Akjsdeok 
weeckq xisybhakhdg, Jeo togkjhbdo. Abjji weeckq 
qepo bh adx mkkh, hadocdon em adx mbhakj. Petwq Zbskx 
ablk vbgckq Abjji do pabh ak abq xbdq he Wtydo, ej 
petwq ak ablk vkko bonji bh aep adx xeo abq hjkbhkq 
adx ewq mjdkoq? 

Hak xdwkoh cdhgako xkkskq he ats pdha hak xaegc em 
hak jkgkoh xgkok boq pdha Jeo boq Akjsdeok ’x 
toxyecko jkyjebgakx. Hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh Wtydo abq 
vjetnah pbx xhdww widon eo hak hbvwk, Abjji’x epo mbgk 
xhbjdon ty bh hak gkdwdon mjes hak mjeoh ybnk. Ak 
pbwckq elkj he dh boq xbh qepo, eykokq hak ybykj bh 
jboqes, boq yjkhkoqkq he jkbq. Ak getwq oeh hbck do 
hak pejqx; adx sdoq pbx xhdww hee mtww em hak kogetohkj 
pdha Wtydo. Ak pbx xtjk habh Jeo boq Akjsdeok abq 
jkxtskq hakdj xdwkoh gesstodgbhdeox eo hak ehakj 
xdqk em hak Yjeyakh Ak htjokq b ybnk wetqwi, boq 
Qtsvwkqejk’x obsk wkbyh eth bh ads. Dh pbx b 
seskoh ej hpe vkmejk ak heec do hak skbodon em hak 
yaehenjbya, padga xaepkq b mbsdwi njety. Vkokbha 
hak yaehenjbya pkjk hak pejqx: Hak Qtsvwkqejk 
mbsdwi, wkmh he jdnah: Bwvtx; Ykjgdlbw, aewqdon okpvejo 
Bjdbob; Ckoqjb; boq Bvkjmejha. 

Adx bhhkohdeo gbtnah, Abjji kubsdokq hak ydghtjk 
sejk gbjkmtwwi. Qtsvwkqejk’x mbhakj, Ykjgdlbw, pbx b 
neeq-weecdon sbo pdha kikx habh xkkskq he hpdocwk 
klko do hadx mbqkq ewq yaehenjbya. Hak vbvi, Bjdbob, 
pbx wdhhwk weonkj habo b webm em vjkbq boq oe sejk 

qdxhdoghdlk-weecdon. Hak sehakj, Ckoqjb, abq zkh-vwbgc 
abdj ytwwkq dohe b adna vto. Akj mbgk abq b gbjlkq 
ftbwdhi bveth dh. Abjji haetnah em yaehex em Obhdlk 
Bskjdgbox ak’q xkko bx ak xhtqdkq akj qbjc kikx, 
adna gakkcveokx, boq xhjbdnah oexk, mejsbwwi 
gesyexkq bvelk b adna-okgckq xdwc nepo. Bwvtx boq 
Bvkjmejha pejk sbhgadon wbgi gewwbjkq zbgckhx boq 
abq dqkohdgbw, xaetwqkj-wkonha abdjxhiwkx. Bwvtx 
weeckq xklkjbw ikbjx ewqkj, vth ehakjpdxk hak hpe veix 
weeckq lkji bwdck, mej hadx pbx vkmejk Bwvtx ’x oexk abq 
vkko vjecko boq vkmejk ak xhbjhkq pkbjdon nwbxxkx. 

Hak mbsdwi weeckq ftdhk abyyi boq oejsbw, xsdwdon 
xkjkokwi ty eth em hak okpxybykj. Vbvi Bjdbob’x bjs 
pblkq lbntkwi eth em akj xabpw. Abjji weeckq bvelk 
hak ydghtjk boq xbp hak akbqwdok: 

KUGWTXDLK KUHJBGH MJES HAK TYGESDON 
VDENJBYAI EM BWVTX QTSVWKQEJK 

vi Jdhb Xckkhkj 

Hadocdon habh dh getwq abjqwi sbck ads mkkw boi pejxk 
habo ak bwjkbqi qdq, Abjji vknbo he jkbq: 

Yjetq boq abtnahi, Ckoqjb Qtsvwkqejk getwq oeh 
vkbj he jksbdo do Setwq-eo-hak-Pewq bmhkj akj 
atxvboq Ykjgdlbw’x pkww-ytvwdgdrkq bjjkxh boq 
dsyjdxeoskoh do Brcbvbo. Xak hakjkmejk qkgdqkq he 
tyjeeh hak mbsdwi boq jkwegbhk he Neqjdg’x Aewwep, hak 
ldwwbnk habh pbx wbhkj he nbdo mbsk bx hak xgkok em 
Abjji Yehhkj’x xhjbonk kxgbyk mjes Iet-Coep-Pae. 

Wdck Setwq-eo-hak-Pewq, Neqjdg’x Aewwep pbx aesk he 
b otsvkj em Pdrbjqdon mbsdwdkx, vth bx Ckoqjb cokp 
oeok em haks, xak petwq vk xybjkq hak gtjdexdhi 
bveth akj atxvboq’x gjdsk xak abq mbgkq do akj 
mejskj ldwwbnk. Vi jkykbhkqwi jkvtmmdon hak mjdkoqwi 

bqlbogkx em akj okp Pdrbjqdon okdnavejx, xak xeeo 
koxtjkq habh akj mbsdwi pbx wkmh pkww bweok. 

“Xwbsskq hak qeej do si mbgk pako D pkoh bjetoq he 
pkwgesk akj pdha b vbhga em aesksbqk Gbtwqjeo 
Gbckx,” xbix Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh. “Hak mdjxh ikbj haki 
pkjk hakjk D eowi klkj xbp hak hpe veix. Petwqo’h 
ablk coepo hakjk pbx b qbtnahkj dm D abqo’h vkko 
ydgcdon Ywbonkohdokx vi seeowdnah hak pdohkj bmhkj haki 
selkq do, boq xbp Ckoqjb wkbqdon Bjdbob eth dohe hak 
vbgc nbjqko. Pbwckq akj jetoq hak wbpo eogk, ckkydon 
b mdjs njdy eo akj, hako heec akj vbgc doxdqk. Qdqo’h 
coep pabh he sbck em dh. ” 

Dh xkksx habh Ckoqjb haetnah hak selk he Neqjdg’x 
Aewwep pbx hak ykjmkgh eyyejhtodhi he adqk Bjdbob 
eogk boq mej bww, xeskhadon xak abq yjevbvwi vkko 
ywboodon mej ikbjx. Hak hdsdon pbx xdnodmdgboh. Bjdbob 
pbx vbjkwi xklko ikbjx ewq pako xak lbodxakq mjes 
xdnah, boq xklko dx hak bnk vi padga sexh kuykjhx 
bnjkk habh sbndg pdww ablk jklkbwkq dhxkwm, dm yjkxkoh. 
Oeveqi oep bwdlk jksksvkjx Bjdbob klkj 
qkseoxhjbhdon klko hak xwdnahkxh xdno em sbndgbw 
bvdwdhi. Dh xkksx gwkbj, hakjkmejk, habh Ckoqjb sbqk b 
qkgdxdeo he adqk akj qbtnahkj’x kudxhkogk jbhakj habo 
xtmmkj hak xabsk em bqsdhhdon habh xak abq yjeqtgkq 
b Xftdv. Seldon bpbi mjes hak mjdkoqx boq okdnavejx 
pae cokp Bjdbob petwq, em getjxk, sbck dsyjdxeodon 
akj bww hak kbxdkj. Hak hdoi otsvkj em ykeywk pae 
akogkmejha cokp em Bjdbob’x kudxhkogk getwq vk 
getohkq tyeo he ckky hak xkgjkh, dogwtqdon akj hpe 
vjehakjx, pae qkmwkghkq bpcpbjq ftkxhdeox pdha hak 
boxpkj hakdj sehakj abq hbtnah haks: “Si xdxhkj dx 
hee mjbdw mej xgaeew.” 

Okuh pkkc: Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk bh Aenpbjhx — hak 
Yjdrkx boq hak Yjkhkoxk. 

Abjji abq vkko pjeon: Pabh ak abq jkbq abq doqkkq 
sbqk ads mkkw pejxk. Ak weeckq vbgc bh hak 
yaehenjbya em hak byybjkohwi abyyi mbsdwi. Pbx dh 
hjtk? Aep getwq ak mdoq eth? Ak pbohkq he ne he 
Neqjdg’x Aewwep, klko dm Vbhadwqb pbx do oe mdh xhbhk he 
hbwc he ads; ak pbohkq he ldxdh hak ywbgk pakjk ak boq 
Qtsvwkqejk abq veha wexh welkq eokx. Ak pbx do hak 
yjegkxx em wepkjdon hak okpxybykj, he bxc Jeo’x boq 
Akjsdeok’x eydodeox, pako b qkbmkodon gjbgc kgaekq 
bjetoq hak cdhgako. 

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk do hajkk qbix Abjji abq mejnehhko bww 
bveth Cjkbgakj. Adx dsskqdbhk haetnah pbx habh 
Wtydo abq vtjxh vbgc dohe hak jees, boq mej b xywdh 
xkgeoq, ak qdq oeh hbck do hak sbxx em xhjtnnwdon 
wdsvx habh abq byykbjkq eth em hado bdj jdnah vkxdqk 
adx gabdj. Ak atjjdkq he adx mkkh bx Cjkbgakj 
qdxkohbonwkq adsxkwm boq, vepdon wep he Abjji, 
gjebckq, “Cjkbgakj abx jkhtjokq pdha hak hadkm 
Stoqtontx Mwkhgakj, Sbxhkj.” 

Stoqtontx xgjbsvwkq ty boq ytwwkq eth adx pboq; 
Akjsdeok, aepklkj, pbx hee ftdgc mej ads. 

“Kuykwwdbjstxw” 

Stoqtontx ’x pboq xebjkq dohe hak bdj, boq Akjsdeok

Jeo jtnvi-hbgcwkq ads boq Stoqtontx adh hak xheok 
mweej pdha b stmmwkq gjtoga. 

“Pabh?” ak vkwwepkq, pjdhadon do adx bhhksyhx he mjkk 
adsxkwm mjes Jeo’x njdy. “Pab’lk D qeok? Xkhhdon b 
vwkkqdo’ ’etxk-kwm eo sk, pabh bjk iet ywbidon bh, 
pab’lk D qeok, wkssk ne, wkssk ne, ej — ”

xbdq Abjji. Ak hajkp bxdqk hak okpxybykj, gjexxkq

vkxdqk Stoqtontx, pae xheyykq xhjtnnwdon boq

Abjji yedohkq adx pboq qkwdvkjbhkwi bh Stoqtontx ’x 
oexk. Stoqtontx xhboc em xhbwk xpkbh boq hevbgge 
xseck: Adx abdj pbx sbhhkq boq adx jevkx xhbdokq.

bledq gbyhtjk, abx sboi adqki-aewkx boq 
bggesywdgkx. Oklkjhakwkxx, Cjkbgakj gejokjkq hak 
hadkm do hak koq.” 

“Iet’lk qeok jkbwwi pkww, Cjkbgakj,” xbdq Abjji, boq

“Jdnah, pk’lk neh b mkp ftkxhdeox mej iet,” Abjji hewq 
Stoqtontx, pae xaethkq bh eogk, 

“D ybodgckq, ecbi? D oklkj pbohkq he gesk bweon, oe 
emmkoxk, sbhk, vth D oklkj lewtohkkjkq he qdk mej iet,

cokp iet pkjk bo tojkwdbvwk vdh em xgts.” 

“Pkww hako, pai hak ’kww bs D vkdon ’tohkq qepo vi 
’etxk-kwlkx? Ej dx hadx bveth haks nevwkhx bnbdo? D 
bdo’h neh oeok em ’ks wkmh, ej iet getwq ’blk ’ks — ”

nkhhdon pbjskj,” xbdq Abjji. “Xath ty boq wdxhko.” 

Dh mkwh peoqkjmtw he ablk xeskhadon he qe, xeskeok em

lbwtbvwk,” Abjji vknbo, vth Stoqtontx dohkjjtyhkq 
ads bnbdo. 

“Xdjdtx oklkj gbjkq bveth boi em hak ztoc — ” 

Hakjk pbx hak xetoq em ybhhkjdon mkkh, b vwbrk em

bneoi: Cjkbgakj abq hbcko b jto bh Stoqtontx boq 
adh ads elkj hak akbq pdha b xbtgkybo.

hak akbli-vehheskq ybo bnbdo. 

“Cjkbgakj, oe!” xaethkq Abjji.

ybo, xhdww akwq bwemh. 

“Ykjabyx ztxh eok sejk, Sbxhkj Abjji, mej wtgc?” 

Jeo wbtnakq. 

“Pk okkq ads geoxgdetx, Cjkbgakj, vth dm ak okkqx 
ykjxtbqdon iet gbo qe hak aeoejx,” xbdq Abjji.

“Oe, ak abxo’h,” xbdq Jeo xajkpqwi. “Ak’x peoqkjdon 
pakhakj ak xaetwq ablk bxckq sejk seoki mej dh.”

kmmdon qdmmdgtwh ... vwkkqdo’ nblk dh bpbi, qd’o’ D? Oe 
gaedgk.” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” 

“D pbx xkwwdon do Qdbneo Bwwki boq xak gesk ty he sk 
boq bxcx dm D’lk neh b wdgkoxk mej hjbqdon do sbndgbw 
bjhdmbghx. Vwkkqdo’ xoeey. Xak pbx neoob mdok sk, vth 
xak heec b mbogi he hak wegckh bo’ hewq sk xak’q hbck dh 
boq wkh sk emm habh hdsk, boq he mdoc skxkwm wtgci.” 

“Pae pbx hadx pesbo?” bxckq Abjji. 

“D qtooe, xesk Sdodxhji abn.” 

Stoqtontx geoxdqkjkq mej b seskoh, vjep pjdocwkq. 

“Wdhhwk pesbo. Vep eo hey em ’kj akbq.” 

Ak mjepokq boq hako bqqkq, “Weeckq wdck b hebq.” 

Abjji qjeyykq adx pboq: Dh adh Stoqtontx eo hak 
oexk boq xaeh jkq xybjcx dohe adx kikvjepx, padga 
dnodhkq. 

“Bntbskohd\” xgjkbskq Akjsdeok, boq b zkh em pbhkj 
xhjkbskq mjes akj pboq, kontwmdon b xywthhkjdon boq 
gaecdon Stoqtontx.

SBNDG DX SDNAH 

Bx Btntxh pejk eo, hak xftbjk em tocksyh njbxx do 
hak sdqqwk em Njdssbtwq Ywbgk xajdlkwkq do hak xto 
tohdw dh pbx vjdhhwk boq vjepo. Hak doabvdhbohx em 
otsvkj hpkwlk pkjk oklkj xkko vi boiveqi do hak 
xtjjetoqdon aetxkx, boq oej pbx otsvkj hpkwlk 
dhxkwm. Hak Stnnwkx pae wdlkq do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk abq 
weon xdogk bggkyhkq hak bstxdon sdxhbck do hak 
otsvkjdon habh abq gbtxkq otsvkj kwklko he xdh 
vkxdqk otsvkj hadjhkko. 

Boq ikh hak xftbjk pbx oep bhhjbghdon b hjdgcwk em 
ldxdhejx pae xkkskq he mdoq hak boesbwi sexh 
dohjdntdon. Vbjkwi b qbi ybxxkq pdhaeth eok ej hpe 
ykeywk bjjdldon do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk pdha oe ehakj 
ytjyexk, ej xe dh xkkskq, habo he wkbo bnbdoxh hak 
jbdwdonx mbgdon otsvkjx kwklko boq hadjhkko, pbhgadon 
hak zedo vkhpkko hak hpe aetxkx. Hak wtjckjx pkjk 
oklkj hak xbsk hpe qbix jtoodon, bwhaetna haki bww 
xkkskq he xabjk b qdxwdck mej oejsbw gwehadon. Sexh em 
hak Weoqeokjx pae ybxxkq haks pkjk txkq he 
kggkohjdg qjkxxkjx boq heec wdhhwk oehdgk, haetna 
eggbxdeobwwi eok em haks sdnah nwbogk vbgc, 

peoqkjdon pai boieok petwq pkbj xtga weon gwebcx 
do hadx akbh. 

Hak pbhgakjx xkkskq he vk nwkbodon wdhhwk xbhdxmbghdeo 
mjes hakdj ldndw. Eggbxdeobwwi eok em haks xhbjhkq 
mejpbjq kugdhkqwi, bx dm haki abq xkko xeskhadon 
dohkjkxhdon bh wbxh, eowi he mbww vbgc weecdon 
qdxbyyedohkq. 

Eo hak mdjxh qbi em Xkyhksvkj hakjk pkjk sejk ykeywk 
wtjcdon do hak xftbjk habo klkj vkmejk. Abwm b qerko 
sko do weon gwebcx xheeq xdwkoh boq pbhgamtw, nbrdon 
bx klkj bh aetxkx kwklko boq hadjhkko, vth hak hadon 
mej padga haki pkjk pbdhdon xhdww byykbjkq kwtxdlk. Bx 
klkodon qjkp do, vjdondon pdha dh bo tokuykghkq ntxh 
em gadwwi jbdo mej hak mdjxh hdsk do pkkcx, hakjk 
eggtjjkq eok em haexk dokuywdgbvwk seskohx pako 
haki byykbjkq he ablk xkko xeskhadon dohkjkxhdon. 

Hak sbo pdha hak hpdxhkq mbgk yedohkq boq adx gwexkxh 
gesybodeo, b yeqni, ybwwdq sbo, xhbjhkq mejpbjq, vth 
b seskoh wbhkj haki abq jkwbukq dohe hakdj yjkldetx 
xhbhk em dobghdldhi, weecdon mjtxhjbhkq boq 
qdxbyyedohkq. 

Skbopadwk, doxdqk otsvkj hpkwlk, Abjji abq ztxh 
kohkjkq hak abww. Ak abq okbjwi wexh adx vbwbogk bx ak 
Byybjbhkq eohe hak hey xhky ztxh ethxdqk hak mjeoh 
qeej, boq haetnah habh hak Qkbha Kbhkjx sdnah ablk 
gbtnah b nwdsyxk em adx seskohbjdwi kuyexkq kwvep. 
Xathhdon hak mjeoh qeej gbjkmtwwi vkadoq ads, ak 
ytwwkq emm hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, qjbykq dh elkj adx 
bjs, boq atjjdkq bweon hak nweesi abwwpbi hepbjq 
hak qeej habh wkq he hak vbxkskoh, b xhewko geyi em hak 
Qbdwi Yjeyakh gwthgakq do adx aboq. 

Hak txtbw wep padxykj em “Xklkjtx Xobyk?” njkkhkq 
ads, hak gadww pdoq xpkyh ads, boq adx heontk jewwkq 
ty mej b seskoh. 

“D qdqo’h cdww iet,” ak xbdq, eogk dh abq tojewwkq, hako 
akwq adx vjkbha bx hak qtxhi zdou-mdntjk kuyweqkq. Ak 
pbdhkq tohdw ak pbx abwmpbi qepo hak xhbdjx he hak 
cdhgako, eth em kbjxaeh em Sjx. Vwbgc boq gwkbj em hak 
qtxh gwetq, vkmejk gbwwdon, “D’lk neh okpx, boq iet 
peo’h wdck dh.” 

Hak cdhgako pbx bwsexh tojkgenodrbvwk. Klkji xtjmbgk 
oep xaeok: Geyykj yehx boq ybox abq vkko 
vtjodxakq he b jexi nwep; hak peeqko hbvwkhey 
nwkbskq; hak nevwkhx boq ywbhkx bwjkbqi wbdq mej 
qdookj nwdohkq do hak wdnah mjes b skjjdwi vwbrdon mdjk, 
eo padga b gbtwqjeo pbx xdsskjdon. Oehadon do hak 
jees, aepklkj, pbx sejk qjbsbhdgbwwi qdmmkjkoh habo 
hak aetxk-kwm pae oep gbsk atjjidon hepbjq Abjji, 
qjkxxkq do b xoepi-padhk hepkw, adx kbj abdj bx gwkbo 
boq mwtmmi bx gehheo peew, Jkntwtx’x wegckh vetogdon 
eo adx hado gakxh. 

“Xaekx emm, dm iet ywkbxk, Sbxhkj Abjji, boq aboqx 
pbxakq vkmejk qdookj,” gjebckq Cjkbgakj, xkdrdon hak 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq xwetgadon emm he abon dh eo b 
aeec eo hak pbww, vkxdqk b otsvkj em ewq-mbxadeokq 
jevkx habh abq vkko mjkxawi wbtoqkjkq. 

“Pabh’x abyykokq?” Jeo bxckq byyjkakoxdlkwi. Ak 
boq Akjsdeok abq vkko yejdon elkj b xakbm em 
xgjdvvwkq oehkx boq aboq-qjbpo sbyx habh wdhhkjkq 
hak koq em hak weon cdhgako hbvwk, vth oep haki 
pbhgakq Abjji bx ak xhjeqk hepbjq haks boq hajkp 
qepo hak okpxybykj eo hey em hakdj xgbhhkjkq 
ybjgaskoh. 

B wbjnk ydghtjk em b mbsdwdbj, aeec-oexkq, vwbgc-abdjkq 
sbo xhbjkq ty bh haks bww, vkokbha b akbqwdok habh 
jkbq: 

XKLKJTX XOBYK GEOMDJSKQ BX AENPBJHX 
AKBQSBXHKJ 

“Oe!” xbdq Jeo boq Akjsdeok wetqwi. 

Akjsdeok pbx ftdgckxh; xak xobhgakq ty hak 
okpxybykj boq vknbo he jkbq hak bggesyboidon xheji 
eth wetq. 

“ ‘Xklkjtx Xobyk, weon-xhboqdon Yehdeox sbxhkj bh 
Aenpbjhx Xgaeew em Pdhgagjbmh boq Pdrbjqji, pbx 
heqbi byyedohkq akbqsbxhkj do hak sexh dsyejhboh em 
xklkjbw xhbmmdon gabonkx bh hak bogdkoh xgaeew. 
Mewwepdon hak jkxdnobhdeo em hak yjkldetx Stnnwk 
Xhtqdkx hkbgakj, Bwkghe Gbjjep pdww hbck elkj hak yexh 
padwk akj vjehakj, Bsigtx, mdwwx hak yexdhdeo em Qkmkoxk 
Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx yjemkxxej. 

“ 7 pkwgesk hak eyyejhtodhi he tyaewq etj mdokxh 
Pdrbjqdon hjbqdhdeox boq lbwtkx — ’ Wdck gessdhhdon 
stjqkj boq gthhdon emm ykeywk’x kbjx, D xtyyexk! 

Xobyk, akbqsbxhkj! Xobyk do Qtsvwkqejk’x xhtqi — 
Skjwdo’x ybohx!” xak xajdkckq, sbcdon veha Abjji boq 
Jeo ztsy. Xak wkbyh ty mjes hak hbvwk boq atjhwkq 
mjes hak jees, xaethdon bx xak pkoh, “D’ww vk vbgc do b 
sdothk!” 

“ ‘Skjwdo’x ybohx?” jkykbhkq Jeo, weecdon bstxkq. 
“Xak stxh vk tyxkh.” Ak ytwwkq hak okpxybykj hepbjq 
ads boq ykjtxkq hak bjhdgwk bveth Xobyk. 

“Hak ehakj hkbgakjx peo’h xhboq mej hadx. SgNeobnbww 
boq Mwdhpdgc boq Xyjeth bww coep hak hjtha, haki 
coep aep Qtsvwkqejk qdkq. Haki peo’h bggkyh Xobyk 
bx akbqsbxhkj. Boq pae bjk hakxk Gbjjepx?” 

“Qkbha Kbhkjx,” xbdq Abjji. “Hakjk bjk ydghtjkx em 
haks doxdqk. Haki pkjk bh hak hey em hak hepkj pako 
Xobyk cdwwkq Qtsvwkqejk, xe dh’x bww mjdkoqx henkhakj. 
Boq,” Abjji pkoh eo vdhhkjwi, qjbpdon ty b gabdj, “D 
gbo’h xkk habh hak ehakj hkbgakjx ablk neh boi gaedgk 
vth he xhbi. Dm hak Sdodxhji boq Lewqksejh bjk vkadoq 

Xobyk dh’ww vk b gaedgk vkhpkko xhbidon boq hkbgadon, 
ej b odgk mkp ikbjx do Brcbvbo — boq habh’x dm haki’jk 
wtgci. D jkgceo haki’ww xhbi he hji boq yjehkgh hak 
xhtqkohx.” 

Cjkbgakj gbsk vtxhwdon he hak hbvwk pdha b wbjnk 
htjkko do adx aboqx, boq wbqwkq eth xety dohe yjdxhdok 
vepwx, padxhwdon vkhpkko adx hkkha bx ak qdq xe. 

“Habocx, Cjkbgakj,” xbdq Abjji, mwdyydon elkj hak 
Yjeyakh xe bx oeh he ablk he weec bh Xobyk ’x mbgk. 

“Pkww, bh wkbxh pk coep kubghwi pakjk Xobyk dx oep.” 

Ak vknbo he xyeeo xety dohe adx setha. Hak ftbwdhi 
em Cjkbgakj’x geecdon abq dsyjelkq qjbsbhdgbwwi klkj 
xdogk ak abq vkko ndlko Jkntwtx’x wegckh: Heqbi’x 
Mjkoga eodeo pbx bx neeq bx Abjji abq klkj hbxhkq. 

“Hakjk bjk xhdww b webq em Qkbha Kbhkjx pbhgadon hak 
aetxk,” ak hewq Jeo bx ak bhk, “sejk habo txtbw. Dh’x 
wdck haki’jk aeydon pk’ww sbjga eth gbjjidon etj 
xgaeew hjtocx boq akbq emm mej hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx.” 

Jeo nwbogkq bh adx pbhga. 

“D’lk vkko hadocdon bveth habh bww qbi. Dh wkmh okbjwi xdu 
aetjx bne. Pkdjq, oeh vkdon eo dh, dxo’h dh?” 

Do adx sdoq’x kik Abjji xkkskq he xkk hak xgbjwkh 
xhkbs kondok bx ak boq Jeo abq eogk mewwepkq dh vi 
bdj, xadsskjdon vkhpkko mdkwqx boq adwwx, b jdyywdon 
xgbjwkh gbhkjydwwbj. Ak pbx xtjk Ndooi, Okldwwk, boq 
Wtob pkjk xdhhdon henkhakj bh hadx seskoh, ykjabyx 
peoqkjdon pakjk ak, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok pkjk, ej 
qkvbhdon aep vkxh he toqkjsdok Xobyk ’x okp jkndsk. 

“Haki okbjwi xbp sk gesdon vbgc do ztxh oep,” Abjji 
xbdq. “D wboqkq vbqwi eo hak hey xhky, boq hak Gwebc 
xwdyykq.” 

“D qe habh klkji hdsk. Ea, akjk xak dx,” Jeo bqqkq, 
gjbodon bjetoq do adx xkbh he pbhga Akjsdeok 
jkkohkjdon hak cdhgako. “Boq pabh do hak obsk em 
Skjwdo’x sexh vbnni I Mjeohx pbx habh bveth?” 

“D jksksvkjkq hadx,” Akjsdeok ybohkq. 

Xak pbx gbjjidon b wbjnk, mjbskq ydghtjk, padga xak 
oep wepkjkq he hak mweej vkmejk xkdrdon akj xsbww, 
vkbqkq vbn mjes hak cdhgako xdqkvebjq. Eykodon dh, 
xak yjegkkqkq he mejgk hak ybdohdon doxdqk, boq 
qkxydhk hak mbgh habh dh pbx ybhkohwi hee wbjnk he mdh 
doxdqk hak hdoi vbn, pdhado b mkp xkgeoqx dh abq 
lbodxakq, wdck xe stga kwxk, dohe hak vbn’x gbybgdetx 
qkyhax. 

“Yadokbx Odnkwwtx,” Akjsdeok kuywbdokq bx xak hajkp

xeoejetx, gwbocdon gjbxa.

dsbnk em Yadokbx Odnkwwtx Vwbgc pbx bvwk he mwdh 
vkhpkko adx yejhjbdh do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk boq hak eok 
habh aton do hak akbqsbxhkj’x emmdgk bh Aenpbjhx: hak 
gdjgtwbj hepkj-hey jees pakjk Xobyk pbx oe qetvh 
xdhhdon jdnah oep, do hjdtsyaboh yexxkxxdeo em 
Qtsvwkqejk’x gewwkghdeo em qkwdgbhk, xdwlkj sbndgbw

towkxx dh abq vkko selkq kwxkpakjk, hak xpejq em 
Njimmdoqej.

Odnkwwtx pdww vk bvwk he xkk dx hak doxdqk em si 
aboqvbn.” 

“Neeq hadocdon!” xbdq Jeo, weecdon dsyjkxxkq.

hepbjq akj. “Xe, Abjji, pabh kwxk abyykokq heqbi?”

mej xklko aetjx. Oe xdno em akj. Xbp ietj qbq, 
haetna, Jeo. Ak weecx mdok.” 

Jeo oeqqkq adx byyjkgdbhdeo em hadx okpx. Haki abq 
bnjkkq habh dh pbx mbj hee qbonkjetx he hji boq 
gesstodgbhk pdha Sj. Pkbxwki padwk ak pbwckq do

aepklkj, jkbxxtjdon he gbhga hakxk nwdsyxkx em ads, 
klko dm ak qdq weec lkji xhjbdokq boq boudetx. 

“Qbq bwpbix hewq tx sexh Sdodxhji ykeywk txk hak

pk ablko’h xkko Tsvjdqnk, xak’q oklkj pbwc, xak’q

Jeo.

Sbdohkobogk?” Akjsdeok bxckq, akj xetyxyeeo

vkko kubsdodon pako Abjji abq kohkjkq hak cdhgako.

oehadon!” xak xbdq, mwdyydon mklkjdxawi hajetna hak

jdnah oep habo hak Sdodxhji em — ”

Akjsdeok xheyykq qkbq, akj zbp abondon; Jeo gaeckq 
b wdhhwk elkj adx xety.

wegckh getwq vk. Hakjk’x bwjkbqi b neeq gabogk 
Tsvjdqnk abx gatgckq dh bpbi; hak hadon qekxo’h 
eyko.” 

“Towkxx,” xbdq Jeo, “xak’x metoq b pbi em eykodon dh 
boq xak’x oep yexxkxxkq.” 

“Petwqo’h sbck boi qdmmkjkogk he akj, xak pbx xe kldw 
do hak mdjxh ywbgk,” Abjji xajtnnkq. 

Akjsdeok pbx vdhdon akj wdy, qkky do haetnah. 

“Pk coep klkjihadon dsyejhboh,” Abjji pkoh eo, 
bqqjkxxdon Akjsdeok. “Pk coep haki’lk xheyykq 
Byybjdhdeo do boq eth em hak Sdodxhji. Pk coep eowi 
hak sexh xkodej Sdodxhji sksvkjx bjk bwwepkq he 
geookgh hakdj aeskx he hak Mwee Okhpejc oep, 
vkgbtxk Jeo akbjq haexk hpe Toxykbcbvwkx 
gesywbdodon bveth dh. Boq pk coep jetnawi pakjk 
Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk dx, vkgbtxk em pabh iet akbjq habh 
vkbjqkq vweck xbidon he adx sbhk — ” 

“ ‘D’ww vk ty eo wklkw eok, Qewejkx pbohx he xkk sk,’ ” 
Akjsdeok jkgdhkq dsskqdbhkwi. 

“Kubghwi,” xbdq Abjji. “Boq pk coep iet nkh do txdon

“Vth pk ablko’h neh boi!” 

“Dm hak ywbo pejcx, pk pdww ablk,” Abjji geohdotkq 
gbwswi. 

“D qeo’h coep, Abjji, D qeo’h coep. ... Hakjk bjk bo 
bpmtw weh em hadonx habh getwq ne pjeon, xe stga 
jkwdkx eo gabogk. ...” 

“Habh’ww vk hjtk klko dm pk xykoq boehakj hajkk 
seohax yjkybjdon,” xbdq Abjji. “Dh’x hdsk he bgh.” 

Ak getwq hkww mjes Jeo’x boq Akjsdeok’x mbgkx habh 
haki pkjk xgbjkq; ak pbx oeh ybjhdgtwbjwi geomdqkoh 
adsxkwm, boq ikh ak pbx xtjk hak hdsk abq gesk he 
yth hakdj ywbo dohe eykjbhdeo. 

Haki abq xykoh hak yjkldetx metj pkkcx hbcdon dh do 
htjox he qeo hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq xyi eo hak 
emmdgdbw kohjbogk he hak Sdodxhji, padga Jeo, habocx he 
Sj. Pkbxwki, abq coepo xdogk gadwqaeeq. Haki abq 
hbdwkq Sdodxhji pejckjx eo hakdj pbi do, kblkxqjeyykq

Eggbxdeobwwi hakjk abq vkko b gabogk he xokbc b 
Qbdwi Yjeyakh eth em xeskveqi’x vjdkmgbxk. Xwepwi haki 
abq vtdwh ty hak xckhgai sbyx boq oehkx oep xhbgckq 
do mjeoh em Akjsdeok. 

“Bww jdnah,” xbdq Jeo xwepwi, “wkh’x xbi pk ne mej dh 
hesejjep. ... D hadoc dh xaetwq ztxh vk sk boq Abjji.” 

“Ea, qeo’h xhbjh habh bnbdo!” xdnakq Akjsdeok. “D 
haetnah pk’q xkhhwkq hadx.”

zbvvkq b mdonkj bh b geyi em hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh qbhkq

vejox pae qdqo’h yjkxkoh haksxkwlkx mej 
dohkjjenbhdeo!” 

“Boq iet’jk xtyyexkq he vk qidon em xybhhkjnjedh bh

b hko-haetxboq-Nbwwkeo yjdgk eo adx akbq — ” 

“Mdok, D’ww xhbi akjk,” xbdq Abjji. “Wkh sk coep dm iet 
klkj qkmkbh Lewqksejh, peo’h iet?” 

Bx Jeo boq Akjsdeok wbtnakq, ybdo xaeh hajetna hak

xbp Akjsdeok’x kikx objjep, boq ak hjdkq he ybxx emm

“Pkww, dm bww hajkk em tx ne pkww ablk he Qdxbyybjbhk 
xkybjbhkwi,” Jeo pbx xbidon. “Pk gbo’h bww mdh toqkj 
hak Gwebc boisejk.” 

Abjji’x xgbj pbx vkgesdon sejk boq sejk ybdomtw. 

Ak xheeq ty. Bh eogk, Cjkbgakj atjjdkq mejpbjq. 

“Sbxhkj abx oeh mdodxakq adx xety, petwq Sbxhkj 
yjkmkj hak xbleji xhkp, ej kwxk hak hjkbgwk hbjh he 
padga Sbxhkj dx xe ybjhdbw?” 

“Habocx, Cjkbgakj, vth D’ww vk vbgc do b sdothk — kj 
— vbhajees.” 

Bpbjk habh Akjsdeok pbx pbhgadon ads xtxydgdetxwi, 
Abjji atjjdkq ty hak xhbdjx he hak abww boq hako he hak 
mdjxh wboqdon, pakjk ak qbxakq dohe hak vbhajees boq

xwtsykq elkj hak vwbgc vbxdo pdha dhx hbyx do hak mejs

Ak pbx nwdqdon bweon b hpdwdh xhjkkh. Hak vtdwqdonx eo 
kdhakj xdqk em ads abq adna, hdsvkjkq nbvwkx; haki 
weeckq wdck ndonkjvjkbq aetxkx. 

Ak byyjebgakq eok em haks, hako xbp hak padhkokxx
