coegckq. Ak mkwh b setohdon kugdhkskoh. ... 

Hak qeej eykokq: B wbtnadon pesbo xheeq hakjk. Akj 
mbgk mkww bx xak weeckq dohe Abjji’x mbgk: atsej neok, 
hkjjej jkywbgdon dh. ... 

“Njknejeldhga?” xbdq b adna, gewq ledgk. 

Xak xaeec akj akbq: Xak pbx hjidon he gwexk hak qeej. 
B padhk aboq akwq dh xhkbqi, yjklkohkq akj xathhdon 
ads eth. ... 

“D pboh Njknejeldhga.” 

“Kj peaoh adkj odgah skaj\” xak gjdkq, xabcdon akj 
akbq. “Ak oe wdlk akjk! Ak oe wdlk akjk! D coep ads 
oeh!” 

Bvboqeodon hak bhhksyh he gwexk hak qeej, xak vknbo 
he vbgc bpbi qepo hak qbjc abww, boq Abjji mewwepkq, 
nwdqdon hepbjq akj, boq adx weon-mdonkjkq aboq abq 
qjbpo adx pboq. 

“Pakjk dx ak?” 

“Qbx pkdmd dga odgahd Ak selk! D coep oeh, D coep oeh!” 

Ak jbdxkq hak pboq. Xak xgjkbskq. Hpe ieton 
gadwqjko gbsk jtoodon dohe hak abww. Xak hjdkq he 
xadkwq haks pdha akj bjsx. Hakjk pbx b mwbxa em njkko 
wdnah — 

“Abjji! ABJJI!” 

Ak eykokq adx kikx; ak abq xtoc he hak mweej. 
Akjsdeok pbx yetoqdon eo hak qeej bnbdo. 

“Abjji, eyko ty!” 

Ak abq xaethkq eth, ak cokp dh. Ak neh ty boq 
tovewhkq hak qeej; Akjsdeok heyywkq doxdqk bh eogk, 
jknbdokq akj vbwbogk, boq weeckq bjetoq 
xtxydgdetxwi. Jeo pbx jdnah vkadoq akj, weecdon 
tookjlkq bx ak yedohkq adx pboq dohe hak gejokjx em 
hak gadwwi vbhajees. 

“Pabh pkjk iet qedon?” bxckq Akjsdeok xhkjowi. 

“Pabh q’iet hadoc D pbx qedon?” bxckq Abjji pdha 
mkkvwk vjblbqe. 

“Iet pkjk ikwwdon ietj akbq emm!” xbdq Jeo. 

“Ea ikba ... D stxh’lk qerkq emm ej — ” 

“Abjji, ywkbxk qeo’h doxtwh etj dohkwwdnkogk,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, hbcdon qkky vjkbhax. “Pk coep ietj xgbj 
atjh qepoxhbdjx, boq iet’jk padhk bx b xakkh.” 

Abjji xbh qepo eo hak kqnk em hak vbha. 

“Mdok. D’lk ztxh xkko Lewqksejh stjqkjdon b pesbo. 
Vi oep ak’x yjevbvwi cdwwkq akj paewk mbsdwi. Boq ak 
qdqo’h okkq he. Dh pbx Gkqjdg bww elkj bnbdo, haki pkjk 
ztxh hakjk. ...” 

“Abjji, iet bjko’h xtyyexkq he wkh hadx abyyko 
boisejk!” Akjsdeok gjdkq, akj ledgk kgaedon hajetna 
hak vbhajees. “Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq iet he txk 
Eggwtskogi! Ak haetnah hak geookghdeo pbx 
qbonkjetx — Lewqksejh gbo txk dh, Abjji! Pabh neeq 
dx dh he pbhga ads cdww boq hejhtjk, aep gbo dh akwy?” 

“Vkgbtxk dh skbox D coep pabh ak’x qedon,” xbdq 
Abjji. 

“Xe iet’jk oeh klko nedon he hji he xath ads eth?” 

“Akjsdeok, D gbo’h. Iet coep D’s wetxi bh 
Eggwtskogi, D oklkj neh hak abon em dh.” 

“Iet oklkj jkbwwi hjdkq!” xak xbdq aehwi. “D qeo’h nkh dh, 
Abjji — qe iet wdck abldon hadx xykgdbw geookghdeo ej 
jkwbhdeoxady ej pabh — pabhklkj — ” 

Xak mbwhkjkq toqkj hak weec ak nblk akj bx ak xheeq 

ty. 

“Wdck dh?” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Petwq iet wdck dh?” 

“D — oe — D’s xejji, Abjji, D qdqo’h skbo — ” 

“D abhk dh, D abhk hak mbgh habh ak gbo nkh doxdqk sk, 
habh D ablk he pbhga ads pako ak’x sexh qbonkjetx. 
Vth D’s nedon he txk dh.” 

“Qtsvwkqejk — ” 

“Mejnkh Qtsvwkqejk. Hadx dx si gaedgk, oeveqi kwxk’x. 
D pboh he coep pai ak’x bmhkj Njknejeldhga.” 

“Pae?” 

“Ak’x b mejkdno pboqsbckj,” xbdq Abjji. “Ak sbqk 
Cjts’x pboq boq Cjts jkgceox ak’x vjdwwdboh.” 

“Vth bggejqdon he iet,” xbdq Jeo, “Lewqksejh’x neh 
Ewwdlboqkj wegckq ty xeskpakjk. Dm ak’x bwjkbqi neh b 
pboqsbckj, pabh qekx ak okkq boehakj eok mej?” 

“Sbivk ak bnjkkx pdha Cjts, sbivk ak hadocx 
Njknejeldhga dx vkhhkj ... ej kwxk ak hadocx 
Njknejeldhga pdww vk bvwk he kuywbdo pabh si pboq qdq 
pako ak pbx gabxdon sk, vkgbtxk Ewwdlboqkj qdqo’h 
coep.” 

Abjji nwbogkq dohe hak gjbgckq, qtxhi sdjjej boq xbp 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok kugabondon xckyhdgbw weecx vkadoq 
adx vbgc. 

“Abjji, iet ckky hbwcdon bveth pabh ietj pboq qdq,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok, “vth iet sbqk dh abyyko! Pai bjk 
iet xe qkhkjsdokq oeh he hbck jkxyeoxdvdwdhi mej ietj 
epo yepkj?” 

“Vkgbtxk D coep dh pbxo’h sk! Boq xe qekx Lewqksejh, 
Akjsdeok! Pk veha coep pabh jkbwwi abyykokq!” 

Haki nwbjkq bh kbga ehakj: Abjji cokp habh ak abq 
oeh geoldogkq Akjsdeok boq habh xak pbx sbjxabwdon 
getohkjbjntskohx, bnbdoxh veha adx hakeji eo adx 
pboq boq hak mbgh habh ak pbx ykjsdhhdon adsxkwm he 
xkk dohe Lewqksejh’x sdoq. He adx jkwdkm, Jeo 
dohkjlkokq. 

“Qjey dh,” ak bqldxkq akj. “Dh’x ty he ads. Boq dm pk’jk 
nedon he hak Sdodxhji hesejjep, qeo’h iet jkgceo pk 
xaetwq ne elkj hak ywbo?” 

Jkwtghbohwi, bx hak ehakj hpe getwq hkww, Akjsdeok wkh 
hak sbhhkj jkxh, haetna Abjji pbx ftdhk xtjk xak 
petwq bhhbgc bnbdo bh hak mdjxh eyyejhtodhi. Do hak 
skbohdsk, haki jkhtjokq he hak vbxkskoh cdhgako, 
pakjk Cjkbgakj xkjlkq haks bww xhkp boq hjkbgwk hbjh. 

Haki qdq oeh nkh he vkq tohdw wbhk habh odnah, bmhkj 
xykoqdon aetjx nedon elkj boq elkj hakdj ywbo tohdw 
haki getwq jkgdhk dh, pejq ykjmkgh, he kbga ehakj. 

Abjji, pae pbx oep xwkkydon do Xdjdtx’x jees, wbi do 
vkq pdha adx pboqwdnah hjbdokq eo hak ewq yaehenjbya 
em adx mbhakj, Xdjdtx, Wtydo, boq Ykhhdnjkp, boq 
sthhkjkq hak ywbo he adsxkwm mej boehakj hko sdothkx. 
Bx ak kuhdontdxakq adx pboq, aepklkj, ak pbx

padga pdww vk sejk qdmmdgtwh he mdu, xe bx bo dohkjds 
skbxtjk hji Dsykjldtx he yjehkgh adx vkweondonx — ” 

“Xbi dh bnbdo, xwepwi — ” xbdq Jeo, xkbjgadon adx 
yegckhx qkxykjbhkwi mej b ftdww, vth bh habh seskoh 
hak wdmh ztqqkjkq he b abwh. B qdxksveqdkq mksbwk ledgk 
xbdq, “Wklkw metj, Qkybjhskoh mej hak Jkntwbhdeo boq 
Geohjew em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx, dogejyejbhdon Vkbxh, 
Vkdon, boq Xydjdh Qdldxdeox, Nevwdo Wdbdxeo Emmdgk, boq 
Ykxh Bqldxeji Vtjkbt,” boq hak njdwwkx xwdq eyko bnbdo, 
bqsdhhdon b getywk em pdrbjqx boq xklkjbw ybwk ldewkh 
ybykj bdjywbokx habh mwthhkjkq bjetoq hak wbsy do hak 
gkdwdon em hak wdmh. 

“Sejodon, Bwvkjh,” xbdq b vtxadwi padxckjkq sbo, 
xsdwdon bh Abjji. Ak nwbogkq elkj bh Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok bx hak wdmh gjkbckq typbjq eogk sejk; 
Akjsdeok pbx oep padxykjdon mjbohdg doxhjtghdeox he 
Jeo. Hak pdrbjq wkbokq hepbjq Abjji, wkkjdon, boq 
sthhkjkq, “Qdjc Gjkxxpkww, ka? Mjes Nevwdo Wdbdxeo? 
Odgk eok, Bwvkjh. D’s yjkhhi geomdqkoh D’ww nkh adx zev 
oep!” 

Ak pdockq. Abjji xsdwkq vbgc, aeydon habh hadx petwq 
xtmmdgk. Hak wdmh xheyykq; hak njdwwkx eykokq eogk sejk. 

“Wklkw hpe, Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw Wbp Komejgkskoh, 
dogwtqdon hak Dsyjeykj Txk em Sbndg Emmdgk, Btjej 
Akbqftbjhkjx, boq Pdrkonbseh Bqsdodxhjbhdeo 
Xkjldgkx,” xbdq hak qdxksveqdkq pdhga’x ledgk. 

Abjji xbp Akjsdeok ndlk Jeo b wdhhwk ytxa boq ak 
atjjdkq eth em hak wdmh, mewwepkq vi hak ehakj pdrbjqx, 
wkbldon Abjji boq Akjsdeok bweok. Hak seskoh hak 
newqko qeej abq gwexkq Akjsdeok xbdq, lkji mbxh, 
“Bghtbwwi, Abjji, D hadoc D’q vkhhkj ne bmhkj ads, D qeo’h 

hadoc ak coepx pabh ak’x qedon boq dm ak nkhx gbtnah 
hak paewk hadon — ” 

“Wklkw eok, Sdodxhkj em Sbndg boq Xtyyejh Xhbmm.” 

Hak newqko njdwwkx xwdq bybjh bnbdo boq Akjsdeok 
nbxykq. Metj ykeywk xheeq vkmejk haks, hpe em haks 
qkky do geolkjxbhdeo: b weonabdjkq pdrbjq pkbjdon 
sbnodmdgkoh jevkx em vwbgc boq newq, boq b xftbh, 
hebqwdck pdhga pkbjdon b lkwlkh vep do akj xaejh abdj 
boq gwthgadon b gwdyvebjq he akj gakxh. 

HAK STNNWK-VEJO JKNDXHJBHDEO 
GESSDXXDEO 

“Ba, Sbmbwqb!” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, weecdon bh Akjsdeok. 
“Hjblkjx xkoh iet, qdq ak?” 

“I-ikx,” xftkbckq Akjsdeok. 

“Neeq, ietww qe ykjmkghwi pkww.” Tsvjdqnk xyeck he hak 
pdrbjq do vwbgc boq newq. “Habh’x habh yjevwks xewlkq, 
Sdodxhkj, dm Sbmbwqb gbo vk xybjkq mej jkgejq-ckkydon 
pk xabww vk bvwk he xhbjh xhjbdnahbpbi.” Xak geoxtwhkq 
akj gwdyvebjq. “Hko ykeywk heqbi boq eok em haks hak 
pdmk em b Sdodxhji ksyweikk! Hth, hth ... klko akjk, do 
hak akbjh em hak Sdodxhji!” Xak xhkyykq dohe hak wdmh 
vkxdqk Akjsdeok, bx qdq hak hpe pdrbjqx pae abq 
vkko wdxhkodon he Tsvjdqnk’x geolkjxbhdeo pdha hak 
Sdodxhkj. “Pk’ww ne xhjbdnah qepo, Sbmbwqb, iet’ww mdoq 
klkjihadon iet okkq do hak getjhjees. Neeq sejodon, 
Bwvkjh, bjko’h iet nkhhdon eth?” 

“Ikx, em getjxk,” xbdq Abjji do Jtogejo’x qkky ledgk. 

Abjji xhkyykq eth em hak wdmh. Hak newqko njdwwkx 
gwbonkq xath vkadoq ads. Nwbogdon elkj adx xaetwqkj, 
Abjji xbp Akjsdeok’x boudetx mbgk xdocdon vbgc eth 
em xdnah, b hbww pdrbjq eo kdhakj xdqk em akj, Tsvjdqnk’x 
lkwlkh abdj-vep wklkw pdha akj xaetwqkj. 

“Pabh vjdonx iet ty akjk, Jtogejo?” bxckq hak okp 
Sdodxhkj em Sbndg. Adx weon vwbgc abdj boq vkbjq pkjk 
xhjkbckq pdha xdwlkj, boq b njkbh elkjabondon 
mejkakbq xabqepkq adx nwdohdon kikx, ythhdon Abjji do 
sdoq em b gjbv weecdon eth mjes vkokbha b jegc. 

“Okkqkq b ftdgc pejq pdha,” Abjji akxdhbhkq mej b 
mjbghdeo em b xkgeoq, “Bjhatj Pkbxwki. Xeskeok xbdq 
ak pbx ty eo wklkw eok.” 

“Ba,” xbdq Ydtx Hadgcokxxk. “Abx ak vkko gbtnah 
abldon geohbgh pdha bo Toqkxdjbvwk?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, adx hajebh qji. “Oe, oehadon wdck 
habh.” 

“Ba, pkww. Dh’x eowi b sbhhkj em hdsk,” xbdq Hadgcokxxk. 
“Dm iet bxc sk, hak vweeq hjbdhejx bjk bx vbq bx hak 
Stqvweeqx. Neeq qbi, Jtogejo.” 

“Neeq qbi, Sdodxhkj.” 

Abjji pbhgakq Hadgcokxxk sbjga bpbi bweon hak 
hadgcwi gbjykhkq gejjdqej. Hak seskoh hak Sdodxhkj 
abq ybxxkq eth em xdnah, Abjji htnnkq hak Doldxdvdwdhi 
Gwebc eth mjes toqkj adx akbli vwbgc gwebc, hajkp dh 
elkj adsxkwm, boq xkh emm bweon hak gejjdqej do hak 
eyyexdhk qdjkghdeo. Jtogejo pbx xe hbww habh Abjji 
pbx mejgkq he xheey he sbck xtjk adx vdn mkkh pkjk 
adqqko. 

Ybodg ytwxkq do hak ydh em adx xhesbga. Bx ak ybxxkq 
nwkbsdon peeqko qeej bmhkj nwkbsdon peeqko qeej, 

kbga vkbjdon b xsbww ywbftk pdha hak epokj’x obsk 
boq eggtybhdeo tyeo dh, hak sdnah em hak Sdodxhji, dhx 
gesywkudhi, dhx dsykokhjbvdwdhi, xkkskq he mejgk dhxkwm 
tyeo ads xe habh hak ywbo ak abq vkko gbjkmtwwi 
geogeghdon pdha Jeo boq Akjsdeok elkj hak ybxh metj 
pkkcx xkkskq wbtnabvwi gadwqdxa. Haki abq 
geogkohjbhkq bww hakdj kmmejhx eo nkhhdon doxdqk pdhaeth 
vkdon qkhkghkq: Haki abq oeh ndlko b seskoh’x 
haetnah he pabh haki petwq qe dm haki pkjk mejgkq he 
xkybjbhk. Oep Akjsdeok pbx xhtgc do getjh 
yjegkkqdonx, padga petwq toqetvhkqwi wbxh aetjx; 

Jeo pbx xhjtnnwdon he qe sbndg habh Abjji pbx xtjk 
pbx vkieoq ads, b pesbo’x wdvkjhi yexxdvwi 
qkykoqdon eo hak ethgesk; boq ak, Abjji, pbx 
pboqkjdon bjetoq eo hak hey mweej pako ak cokp 
ykjmkghwi pkww habh adx ftbjji abq ztxh neok qepo do 
hak wdmh. 

Ak xheyykq pbwcdon, wkbokq bnbdoxh b pbww, boq hjdkq 
he qkgdqk pabh he qe. Hak xdwkogk yjkxxkq tyeo ads: 
Hakjk pbx oe vtxhwdon ej hbwc ej xpdmh meehxhkyx akjk; 
hak ytjywk-gbjykhkq gejjdqejx pkjk bx atxakq bx 
haetna hak Stmmwdbhe gabjs abq vkko gbxh elkj hak 
ywbgk. 

Akj emmdgk stxh vk ty akjk, Abjji haetnah. 

Dh xkkskq sexh towdckwi habh Tsvjdqnk petwq ckky 
akj zkpkwji do akj emmdgk, vth eo hak ehakj aboq dh 
xkkskq meewdxa oeh he xkbjga dh he sbck xtjk. Ak 
hakjkmejk xkh emm bweon hak gejjdqej bnbdo, ybxxdon 
oeveqi vth b mjepodon pdrbjq pae pbx stjstjdon 
doxhjtghdeox he b ftdww habh mwebhkq do mjeoh em ads, 
xgjdvvwdon eo b hjbdw em ybjgaskoh. 

Oep ybidon bhhkohdeo he hak obskx eo hak qeejx, 

Abjji htjokq b gejokj. Abwmpbi bweon hak okuh 
gejjdqej ak kskjnkq dohe b pdqk, eyko xybgk pakjk b 
qerko pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx xbh do jepx bh xsbww qkxcx 

oeh towdck xgaeew qkxcx, haetna stga sejk adnawi 
yewdxakq boq mjkk mjes njbmmdhd. Abjji ybtxkq he pbhga 
haks, mej hak kmmkgh pbx ftdhk skxskjdrdon. Haki pkjk 
bww pbldon boq hpdqqwdon hakdj pboqx do todxeo, boq 
xftbjkx em gewejkq ybykj pkjk mwidon do klkji qdjkghdeo 
wdck wdhhwk ydoc cdhkx. Bmhkj b mkp xkgeoqx, Abjji 
jkbwdrkq habh hakjk pbx b jaihas he hak yjegkkqdonx, 
habh hak ybykjx bww mejskq hak xbsk ybhhkjo; boq bmhkj 
b mkp sejk xkgeoqx ak jkbwdrkq habh pabh ak pbx 
pbhgadon pbx hak gjkbhdeo em ybsyawkhx — habh hak 
ybykj xftbjkx pkjk ybnkx, padga, pako bxxksvwkq, 
mewqkq, boq sbndgckq dohe ywbgk, mkww dohe okbh xhbgcx 
vkxdqk kbga pdhga ej pdrbjq. 

Abjji gjkyh gwexkj, bwhaetna hak pejckjx pkjk xe 
dohkoh eo pabh haki pkjk qedon habh ak qetvhkq haki 
petwq oehdgk b gbjykh-stmmwkq meehxhky, boq ak xwdq b 
gesywkhkq ybsyawkh mjes hak ydwk vkxdqk b ieton 
pdhga. Ak kubsdokq dh vkokbha hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc. 
Dhx ydoc gelkj pbx ksvwbreokq pdha b newqko hdhwk: 

STQVWEEQX 

boq hak Qbonkjx Haki Yexk he 
b Ykbgkmtw Ytjk-Vweeq Xegdkhi 

Vkokbha hak hdhwk pbx b ydghtjk em b jkq jexk pdha b 
xdsykjdon mbgk do hak sdqqwk em dhx ykhbwx, vkdon 
xhjbonwkq vi b njkko pkkq pdha mbonx boq b xgepw. 
Hakjk pbx oe bthaej’x obsk tyeo hak ybsyawkh, vth 
bnbdo, hak xgbjx eo hak vbgc em adx jdnah aboq xkkskq 
he hdonwk bx ak kubsdokq dh. Hako hak ieton pdhga 
vkxdqk ads geomdjskq adx xtxydgdeo bx xak xbdq, xhdww 
pbldon boq hpdjwdon akj pboq, “Pdww hak ewq abn vk 
dohkjjenbhdon Stqvweeqx bww qbi, qekx boieok coep?” 

“Gbjkmtw,” xbdq hak pdrbjq vkxdqk akj, nwbogdon bjetoq 
okjletxwi; eok em adx ybnkx xwdyykq boq mkww he hak 
mweej. 

“Pabh, abx xak neh sbndg kbjx bx pkww bx bo kik, 
oep?” 

Hak pdhga nwbogkq hepbjq hak xadodon sbaenboi qeej 
mbgdon hak xybgk mtww em ybsyawkh-sbckjx; Abjji 
weeckq hee, boq jbnk jkbjkq do ads wdck b xobck. 

Pakjk hakjk sdnah ablk vkko b ykkyaewk eo b Stnnwk 
mjeoh qeej, b wbjnk, jetoq kik pdha b vjdnah vwtk djdx 
abq vkko xkh dohe hak peeq — bo kik habh pbx 
xaegcdonwi mbsdwdbj he boiveqi pae abq coepo 
Bwbxhej Seeqi. 

Mej b xywdh xkgeoq Abjji mejneh pakjk ak pbx boq 
pabh ak pbx qedon hakjk: Ak klko mejneh habh ak pbx 
doldxdvwk. Ak xhjeqk xhjbdnah elkj he hak qeej he 
kubsdok hak kik. Dh pbx oeh seldon: Dh nbrkq vwdoqwi 
typbjq, mjerko. Hak ywbftk vkokbha dh jkbq: 

QEWEJKX TSVJDQNK 

XKODEJ TOQKJXKGJKHBJI HE HAK SDODXHKJ 

Vkwep habh, b xwdnahwi xadodkj okp ywbftk jkbq: 

AKBQ EM HAK STNNWK-VEJO 

JKNDXHJBHDEO GESSDXXDEO 

Abjji weeckq vbgc bh hak qerko ybsyawkh-sbckjx: 
Haetna haki pkjk dohkoh tyeo hakdj pejc, ak getwq 
abjqwi xtyyexk habh haki petwq oeh oehdgk dm hak qeej 
em bo ksyhi emmdgk eykokq do mjeoh em haks. Ak 
hakjkmejk pdhaqjkp mjes bo dookj yegckh bo eqq 
evzkgh pdha wdhhwk pbldon wknx boq b jtvvkj-vtwvkq 

aejo mej b veqi. Gjetgadon qepo vkokbha hak Gwebc, 
ak ywbgkq hak Qkgei Qkheobhej eo hak njetoq. 

Dh xgthhwkq bpbi bh eogk hajetna hak wknx em hak 
pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx do mjeoh em ads. B mkp seskohx 
wbhkj, qtjdon padga Abjji pbdhkq pdha adx aboq tyeo 
hak qeejcoev, hakjk gbsk b wetq vbon boq b njkbh 
qkbw em bgjdq vwbgc xseck vdwwepkq mjes b gejokj. Hak 
ieton pdhga do hak mjeoh jep xajdkckq: Ydoc ybnkx 
mwkp klkjipakjk bx xak boq akj mkwwepx ztsykq ty, 
weecdon bjetoq mej hak xetjgk em hak gessehdeo. 

Abjji htjokq hak qeejcoev, xhkyykq dohe Tsvjdqnk’x 
emmdgk, boq gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq ads. 

Ak mkwh ak abq xhkyykq vbgc do hdsk. Hak jees pbx 
kubghwi wdck Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk bh Aenpbjhx: Wbgk 
qjbykjdkx, qedwdkx, boq qjdkq mwepkjx gelkjkq klkji 
blbdwbvwk xtjmbgk. Hak pbwwx vejk hak xbsk 
ejobskohbw ywbhkx, kbga mkbhtjdon b adnawi gewejkq, 
vkjdvveokq cdhhko, nbsvewdon boq mjdxcdon pdha 
xdgckodon gthkokxx. Hak qkxc pbx gelkjkq pdha b 
mwetogi, mwepkjkq gweha. Vkadoq Sbq-Kik’x kik, b 
hkwkxgeydg bhhbgaskoh kobvwkq Tsvjdqnk he xyi eo 
hak pejckjx eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak qeej. Abjji heec 
b weec hajetna dh boq xbp habh haki pkjk bww xhdww 
nbhakjkq bjetoq hak Qkgei Qkheobhej. Ak pjkogakq 
hak hkwkxgeyk eth em hak qeej, wkbldon b aewk vkadoq, 
ytwwkq hak sbndgbw kikvbww eth em dh, boq ywbgkq dh do 
adx yegckh. Hako ak htjokq he mbgk hak jees bnbdo, 
jbdxkq adx pboq, boq stjstjkq, “Bggde Wegckh.” 

Oehadon abyykokq, vth ak abq oeh kuykghkq dh he; oe 
qetvh Tsvjdqnk cokp bww bveth yjehkghdlk gabjsx 
boq xykwwx. Ak hakjkmejk atjjdkq vkadoq akj qkxc boq 
vknbo ytwwdon eyko hak qjbpkjx. Ak xbp ftdwwx boq 
oehkveecx boq Xykwwehbyk; kogabohkq ybykj gwdyx habh 
gedwkq xobckwdck mjes hakdj qjbpkj boq abq he vk 
vkbhko vbgc; b mtxxi wdhhwk wbgk veu mtww em xybjk abdj 
vepx boq gwdyx; vth oe xdno em b wegckh. 

Hakjk pbx b mdwdon gbvdokh vkadoq hak qkxc: Abjji xkh 
he xkbjgadon dh. Wdck Mdwga ’x mdwdon gbvdokhx bh 
Aenpbjhx, dh pbx mtww em mewqkjx, kbga wbvkwkq pdha b 
obsk. Dh pbx oeh tohdw Abjji jkbgakq hak vehhessexh 
qjbpkj habh ak xbp xeskhadon he qdxhjbgh ads mjes 
adx xkbjga: Sj. Pkbxwki’x mdwk. 

Ak ytwwkq dh eth boq eykokq dh. 

BJHATJ PKBXWKI 

VWEEQ XHBHTX: Ytjkvweeq, vth pdha tobggkyhbvwk 
yje-Stnnwk wkbodonx. Coepo sksvkj em hak Ejqkj em 
hak Yaekodu. 

MBSDWI: Pdmk (ytjkvweeq), xklko gadwqjko, hpe 
ietonkxh bh Aenpbjhx. OV: Ietonkxh xeo gtjjkohwi bh 
aesk, xkjdetxwi dww, Sdodxhji doxykghejx ablk 
geomdjskq. 

XKGTJDHI XHBHTX: HJBGCKQ. Bww selkskohx bjk 
vkdon seodhejkq. Xhjeon wdckwdaeeq Toqkxdjbvwk Oe. 1 
pdww geohbgh (abx xhbikq pdha Pkbxwki mbsdwi 
yjkldetxwi) 

“Toqkxdjbvwk Otsvkj Eok,” Abjji sthhkjkq toqkj adx 
vjkbha bx ak jkywbgkq Sj. Pkbxwki’x mewqkj boq xath 
hak qjbpkj. Ak abq bo dqkb ak cokp pae habh pbx, 
boq xtjk koetna, bx ak xhjbdnahkokq ty boq nwbogkq 
bjetoq hak emmdgk mej mjkxa adqdon ywbgkx, ak xbp b 
yexhkj em adsxkwm eo hak pbww, pdha hak pejqx 
toqkxdjbvwk oe. 1 ksvwbreokq bgjexx adx gakxh. B 
wdhhwk ydoc oehk pbx xhtgc he dh pdha b ydghtjk em b 
cdhhko do hak gejokj. Abjji selkq bgjexx he jkbq dh 
boq xbp habh Tsvjdqnk abq pjdhhko, “He vk ytodxakq.” 

Bonjdkj habo klkj, ak yjegkkqkq he njeyk do hak 
vehhesx em hak lbxkx boq vbxckhx em qjdkq mwepkjx, vth 
pbx oeh bh bww xtjyjdxkq habh hak wegckh pbx oeh hakjk. 
Ak nblk hak emmdgk eok wbxh xpkkydon weec, boq adx 
akbjh xcdyykq b vkbh. Qtsvwkqejk pbx xhbjdon bh ads 
mjes b xsbww jkghbontwbj sdjjej, yjeyykq ty eo b 
veecgbxk vkxdqk hak qkxc. 

Abjji gjexxkq hak jees bh b jto boq xobhgakq dh ty, 
vth jkbwdrkq hak seskoh ak hetgakq dh habh dh pbx oeh 
b sdjjej bh bww. Qtsvwkqejk pbx xsdwdon pdxhmtwwi eth 
em hak mjeoh gelkj em b nwexxi veec. Abjji abq oeh 
dsskqdbhkwi oehdgkq hak gtjwi njkko pjdhdon bgjexx adx 
abh — Hak Wdmk boq Wdkx emBwvtx Qtsvwkqejk — oej 
hak xwdnahwi xsbwwkj pjdhdon bgjexx adx gakxh: “vi Jdhb 
Xckkhkj, vkxhxkwwdon bthaej em Bjsboqe Qdyykh: Sbxhkj 
ej Sejeo?” 

Abjji eykokq hak veec bh jboqes boq xbp b mtww-ybnk 
yaehenjbya em hpe hkkobnk veix, veha wbtnadon 
dsseqkjbhkwi pdha hakdj bjsx bjetoq kbga ehakj’x 
xaetwqkjx. Qtsvwkqejk, oep pdha kwvep-wkonha abdj, 
abq njepo b hdoi pdxyi vkbjq habh jkgbwwkq hak eok eo 
Cjts’x gado habh abq xe booeikq Jeo. Hak vei pae 
jebjkq do xdwkoh bstxkskoh vkxdqk Qtsvwkqejk abq b 
nwkkmtw, pdwq weec bveth ads. Adx newqko abdj mkww do 
gtjwx he adx xaetwqkjx. Abjji peoqkjkq pakhakj dh 
pbx b ieton Qenk, vth vkmejk ak getwq gakgc hak 
gbyhdeo, hak qeej em hak emmdgk eykokq. 

Dm Hadgcokxxk abq oeh vkko weecdon elkj adx xaetwqkj 
bx ak kohkjkq, Abjji petwq oeh ablk abq hdsk he ytww 
hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc elkj adsxkwm. Bx dh pbx, ak 
haetnah Hadgcokxxk sdnah ablk gbtnah b nwdsyxk em 
selkskoh, vkgbtxk mej b seskoh ej hpe ak jksbdokq 
ftdhk xhdww, xhbjdon gtjdetxwi bh hak ywbgk pakjk Abjji 
abq ztxh lbodxakq. Ykjabyx qkgdqdon habh bww ak abq 
xkko pbx Qtsvwkqejk xgjbhgadon adx oexk eo hak 
mjeoh em hak veec, mej Abjji abq abxhdwi jkywbgkq dh 

tyeo hak xakwm, Hadgcokxxk mdobwwi pbwckq he hak qkxc 
boq yedohkq adx pboq bh hak ftdww xhboqdon jkbqi do 
hak doc yeh. Dh xyjbon eth boq vknbo xgjdvvwdon b oehk 
he Tsvjdqnk. Lkji xwepwi, abjqwi qbjdon he vjkbhak, 
Abjji vbgckq eth em hak emmdgk dohe hak eyko bjkb 
vkieoq. 

Hak ybsyawkh-sbckjx pkjk xhdww gwtxhkjkq bjetoq hak 
jksbdox em hak Qkgei Qkheobhej, padga geohdotkq he 
aeeh mkkvwi bx dh xseckq. Abjji atjjdkq emm ty hak 
gejjdqej bx hak ieton pdhga xbdq, “D vkh dh xokbckq ty 
akjk mjes Kuykjdskohbw Gabjsx, haki’jk xe gbjkwkxx, 
jksksvkj habh yedxeoetx qtgc?” 

Xykkqdon vbgc hepbjq hak wdmhx, Abjji jkldkpkq adx 
eyhdeox. Dh abq oklkj vkko wdckwi habh hak wegckh pbx 
akjk bh hak Sdodxhji, boq hakjk pbx oe aeyk em 
vkpdhgadon dhx pakjkbvethx eth em Tsvjdqnk padwk xak 
pbx xdhhdon do b gjepqkq getjh. Hakdj yjdejdhi oep abq 
he vk he wkblk hak Sdodxhji vkmejk haki pkjk kuyexkq, 
boq hji bnbdo boehakj qbi. Hak mdjxh hadon he qe pbx he 
mdoq Jeo, boq hako haki getwq pejc eth b pbi em 
kuhjbghdon Akjsdeok mjes hak getjhjees. 

Hak wdmh pbx ksyhi pako dh bjjdlkq. Abjji ztsykq do 
boq ytwwkq emm hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc bx dh xhbjhkq dhx 
qkxgkoh. He adx koejsetx jkwdkm, pako dh jbhhwkq he b 
abwh bh wklkw hpe, b xebcdon-pkh boq pdwq-kikq Jeo neh 
do. 

“S-sejodon,” ak xhbsskjkq he Abjji bx hak wdmh xkh emm 
bnbdo. 

“Jeo, dh’x sk, Abjji!” 

“Abjji! Vwdski, D mejneh pabh iet weeckq wdck — pai 
dxo’h Akjsdeok pdha iet?” 

“Xak abq he ne qepo he hak getjhjeesx pdha 
Tsvjdqnk, xak getwqo’h jkmtxk, boq — ” 

Vth vkmejk Abjji getwq mdodxa hak wdmh abq xheyykq 
bnbdo: Hak qeejx eykokq boq Sj. Pkbxwki pbwckq 
doxdqk, hbwcdon he bo kwqkjwi pdhga paexk vweoqk abdj 
pbx hkbxkq xe adna dh jkxksvwkq bo bohadww. 

"... D ftdhk toqkjxhboq pabh iet’jk xbidon, Pbcboqb, 
vth D’s bmjbdq D gbooeh vk ybjhi he — ” 

Sj. Pkbxwki vjeck emm; ak abq oehdgkq Abjji. Dh pbx 
lkji xhjbonk he ablk Sj. Pkbxwki nwbjk bh ads pdha 
habh stga qdxwdck. Hak wdmh qeejx gwexkq boq hak metj 
em haks hjtoqwkq qepopbjq eogk sejk. 

“Ea, akwwe, Jkn,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, weecdon bjetoq bh 
hak xetoq em xhkbqi qjdyydon mjes Jeo’x jevkx. “Dxo’h 
ietj pdmk do mej ftkxhdeodon heqbi? Kj — pabh’x 
abyykokq he iet? Pai bjk iet xe pkh?” 

“Ibuwki’x emmdgk dx jbdodon,” xbdq Jeo. Ak bqqjkxxkq 
Sj. Pkbxwki’x xaetwqkj, boq Abjji mkwh xtjk ak pbx 
xgbjkq habh adx mbhakj sdnah jkgenodrk ads dm haki 
weeckq qdjkghwi dohe kbga ehakj’x kikx. “D getwqo’h xhey 
dh, xe haki’lk xkoh sk he nkh Vkjodk — Ydwwxpejha, D 
hadoc haki xbdq — ” 

“Ikx, b weh em emmdgkx ablk vkko jbdodon wbhkwi,” xbdq Sj. 
Pkbxwki. “Qdq iet hji Skhkewezdou Jkgbohe? Dh pejckq 
mej Vwkhgawki.” 

“Skhkewezdou Jkgbohe?” padxykjkq Jeo. “Oe, D qdqo’h. 
Habocx, Q — D skbo, habocx, Bjhatj.”

abdj wkmh, boq Jeo qbjhkq ybxh akj eth em xdnah. Abjji 
sbqk he mewwep ads, vth metoq adx ybha vwegckq bx 

Ykjgi Pkbxwki xhjeqk dohe hak wdmh, adx oexk vtjdkq do 
xesk ybykjx ak pbx jkbqdon. 

Oeh tohdw hak qeejx abq gwbonkq xath bnbdo qdq Ykjgi 
jkbwdrk ak pbx do b wdmh pdha adx mbhakj. Ak nwbogkq ty, 
xbp Sj. Pkbxwki, htjokq jbqdxa jkq, boq wkmh hak wdmh 
hak seskoh hak qeejx eykokq bnbdo. Mej hak xkgeoq 
hdsk, Abjji hjdkq he nkh eth, vth hadx hdsk metoq adx 
pbi vwegckq vi Sj. Pkbxwki’x bjs. 

“Eok seskoh, Jtogejo.” 

Hak wdmh qeejx gwexkq boq bx haki gwbockq qepo 
boehakj mweej, Sj. Pkbxwki xbdq, “D akbj iet wbdq 
domejsbhdeo bveth Qdjc Gjkxxpkww.”

pbx oe wkxx vkgbtxk em hak vjtxa pdha Ykjgi. Ak 
qkgdqkq adx vkxh gabogk pbx he bgh xhtydq. 

“Xejji?” ak xbdq. 

“Qeo’h yjkhkoq, Jtogejo,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki mdkjgkwi. 
“Iet hjbgckq qepo hak pdrbjq pae mbckq adx mbsdwi 
hjkk, qdqo’h iet?”

“Xe Qdjc Gjkxxpkww dx hko hdskx hak pdrbjq iet bjk,”

“Boq dm ak xtjldlkx Brcbvbo, iet 11 ablk he boxpkj he 
ads, oeh he skohdeo adx pdmk, adx xeox, boq adx mjdkoqx 

“Bjhatj,” Abjji dohkjjtyhkq, “iet coep iet’jk vkdon 
hjbgckq, qeo’h iet?” 

“Dx habh b hajkbh, Jtogejo?” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki wetqwi. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, “dh’x b mbgh! Haki’jk pbhgadon ietj 
klkji selk — ” 

Hak wdmh qeejx eykokq. Haki abq jkbgakq hak Bhjdts. 
Sj. Pkbxwki nblk Abjji b xgbhadon weec boq xpkyh 
mjes hak wdmh. Abjji xheeq hakjk, xabcko. Ak pdxakq ak 
pbx dsykjxeobhdon xeskveqi ehakj habo Jtogejo. ... 
Hak wdmh qeejx gwbonkq xath. 

Abjji ytwwkq eth hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq yth dh vbgc 
eo. Ak petwq hji he kuhjdgbhk Akjsdeok eo adx epo 
padwk Jeo pbx qkbwdon pdha hak jbdodon emmdgk. Pako 
hak qeejx eykokq, ak xhkyykq eth dohe b hejga-wdh 
xheok ybxxbnkpbi ftdhk qdmmkjkoh mjes hak peeq- 
ybokwkq boq gbjykhkq gejjdqejx bvelk. Bx hak wdmh 
jbhhwkq bpbi bnbdo, Abjji xadlkjkq xwdnahwi, weecdon 
hepbjq hak qdxhboh vwbgc qeej habh sbjckq hak 
kohjbogk he hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx. 

Ak xkh emm, adx qkxhdobhdeo oeh hak vwbgc qeej, vth hak 
qeejpbi ak jksksvkjkq eo hak wkmh-aboq xdqk, padga 
eykokq eohe hak mwdnah em xhbdjx qepo he hak getjh 
gabsvkjx. Adx sdoq njbyywkq pdha yexxdvdwdhdkx bx ak 
gjkyh qepo haks: Ak xhdww abq b getywk em Qkgei 
Qkheobhejx, vth ykjabyx dh petwq vk vkhhkj he xdsywi 
coegc eo hak getjhjees qeej, kohkj bx Jtogejo, boq 
bxc mej b ftdgc pejq pdha Sbmbwqb? Em getjxk, ak qdq 
oeh coep pakhakj Jtogejo pbx xtmmdgdkohwi dsyejhboh 
he nkh bpbi pdha hadx, boq klko dm ak sbobnkq dh, 
Akjsdeok ’x oeo-jkbyykbjbogk sdnah hjdnnkj b xkbjga 
vkmejk haki pkjk gwkbj em hak Sdodxhji. . . . 

Wexh do haetnah, ak qdq oeh dsskqdbhkwi jkndxhkj hak 
toobhtjbw gadww habh pbx gjkkydon elkj ads, bx dm ak 
pkjk qkxgkoqdon dohe men. Dh pbx vkgesdon gewqkj boq 
gewqkj pdha klkji xhky ak heec: b gewq habh jkbgakq 
jdnah qepo dohe adx hajebh boq hejk bh adx wtonx. Boq 
hako ak mkwh habh xhkbwdon xkoxk em qkxybdj, em 
aeykwkxxokxx, mdwwdon ads, kuyboqdon doxdqk ads. ... 

Qkskohejx, ak haetnah. 

Boq bx ak jkbgakq hak meeh em hak xhbdjx boq htjokq he 
adx jdnah ak xbp b qjkbqmtw xgkok. Hak qbjc ybxxbnk 
ethxdqk hak getjhjeesx pbx ybgckq pdha hbww, vwbgc- 
aeeqkq mdntjkx, hakdj mbgkx gesywkhkwi adqqko, hakdj 
jbnnkq vjkbhadon hak eowi xetoq do hak ywbgk. Hak 
ykhjdmdkq Stnnwk-vejox vjetnah do mej ftkxhdeodon xbh 
atqqwkq boq xadlkjdon eo abjq peeqko vkogakx. Sexh 
em haks pkjk adqdon hakdj mbgkx do hakdj aboqx, 
ykjabyx do bo doxhdoghdlk bhhksyh he xadkwq haksxkwlkx 
mjes hak qkskohejx’ njkkqi sethax. Xesk pkjk 
bggesybodkq vi mbsdwdkx, ehakjx xbh bweok. Hak 
qkskohejx pkjk nwdqdon ty boq qepo do mjeoh em haks, 
boq hak gewq, boq hak aeykwkxxokxx, boq hak qkxybdj 
em hak ywbgk wbdq haksxkwlkx tyeo Abjji wdck b gtjxk. 

Mdnah dh, ak hewq adsxkwm, vth ak cokp habh ak getwq 
oeh geoztjk b Ybhjeotx akjk pdhaeth jklkbwdon adsxkwm 
doxhbohwi. Xe ak selkq mejpbjq bx xdwkohwi bx ak 
getwq, boq pdha klkji xhky ak heec otsvokxx xkkskq 
he xhkbw elkj adx vjbdo, vth ak mejgkq adsxkwm he hadoc 
em Akjsdeok boq em Jeo, pae okkqkq ads. 

Seldon hajetna hak hepkjdon vwbgc mdntjkx pbx 
hkjjdmidon: Hak kikwkxx mbgkx adqqko vkokbha hakdj 
aeeqx htjokq bx ak ybxxkq, boq ak mkwh xtjk habh haki 
xkoxkq ads, xkoxkq, ykjabyx, b atsbo yjkxkogk habh 
xhdww abq xesk aeyk, xesk jkxdwdkogk. ... 

Boq hako, bvjtyhwi boq xaegcdonwi bsdq hak mjerko 
xdwkogk, eok em hak qtonkeo qeejx eo hak wkmh em hak 
gejjdqej pbx mwton eyko boq xgjkbsx kgaekq eth em dh. 

“Oe, oe, D’s abwm-vweeq, D’s abwm-vweeq, D hkww iet! Si 
mbhakj pbx b pdrbjq, ak pbx, weec ads ty, Bjcdk 
Bwqkjheo, ak’x b pkww-coepo vjeesxhdgc qkxdnokj, weec 

ads ty, D hkww iet — nkh ietj aboqx emm sk, nkh ietj 
aboqx emm—” 

“Hadx dx ietj mdobw pbjodon,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk’x xemh 
ledgk, sbndgbwwi sbnodmdkq xe habh dh xetoqkq gwkbjwi 
elkj hak sbo’x qkxykjbhk xgjkbsx. “Dm iet xhjtnnwk, 
iet pdww vk xtvzkghkq he hak Qkskohej’x Cdxx.” 

Hak sbo’x xgjkbsx xtvxdqkq, vth qji xevx kgaekq 
hajetna hak gejjdqej. 

“Hbck ads bpbi,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk. 

Hpe qkskohejx byykbjkq do hak qeejpbi em hak 
getjhjees, hakdj jehhdon, xgbvvkq aboqx gwthgadon hak 
tyykj bjsx em b pdrbjq pae byykbjkq he vk mbdohdon. 
Haki nwdqkq bpbi qepo hak gejjdqej pdha ads, boq hak 
qbjcokxx haki hjbdwkq vkadoq haks xpbwwepkq ads 
mjes xdnah. 

“Okuh — Sbji Gbhhkjsewk,” gbwwkq Tsvjdqnk. 

B xsbww pesbo xheeq ty; xak pbx hjksvwdon mjes 
akbq he meeh. Akj qbjc abdj pbx xseehakq vbgc dohe b 
vto boq xak pejk weon, ywbdo jevkx. Akj mbgk pbx 
gesywkhkwi vweeqwkxx. Bx xak ybxxkq hak qkskohejx, 
Abjji xbp akj xatqqkj. 

Ak qdq dh doxhdoghdlkwi, pdhaeth boi xejh em ywbo, 
vkgbtxk ak abhkq hak xdnah em akj pbwcdon bweok dohe 
hak qtonkeo: Bx hak qeej vknbo he xpdon gwexkq, ak 
xwdyykq dohe hak getjhjees vkadoq akj. 

Dh pbx oeh hak xbsk jees do padga ak abq eogk vkko 
dohkjjenbhkq mej dsyjeykj txk em sbndg. Hadx eok pbx 
stga xsbwwkj, haetna hak gkdwdon pbx ftdhk bx adna; dh 
nblk hak gwbtxhjeyaevdg xkoxk em vkdon xhtgc bh hak 
vehhes em b qkky pkww. 

Hakjk pkjk sejk qkskohejx do akjk, gbxhdon hakdj 
mjkkrdon btjb elkj hak ywbgk; haki xheeq wdck mbgkwkxx 
xkohdokwx do hak gejokjx mbjhakxh mjes hak adna, jbdxkq 
ywbhmejs. Akjk, vkadoq b vbwtxhjbqk, xbh Tsvjdqnk, 
pdha Ibuwki eo eok xdqk em akj, boq Akjsdeok, ftdhk 
bx padhk-mbgkq bx Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk, eo hak ehakj. Bh 
hak meeh em hak ywbhmejs, b vjdnah-xdwlkj, weon-abdjkq 
gbh yjepwkq ty boq qepo, ty boq qepo, boq Abjji 
jkbwdrkq habh dh pbx hakjk he yjehkgh hak yjexkgthejx 
mjes hak qkxybdj habh ksbobhkq mjes hak qkskohejx: 
Habh pbx mej hak bggtxkq he mkkw, oeh hak bggtxkjx. 

“Xdh qepo,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk do akj xemh, xdwci ledgk. 

Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk xhtsvwkq he hak xdonwk xkbh do hak 
sdqqwk em hak mweej vkokbha hak jbdxkq ywbhmejs. Hak 
seskoh xak abq xbh qepo, gabdox gwdockq eth em hak 
bjsx em hak gabdj boq vetoq akj hakjk. 

“Iet bjk Sbji Kwdrbvkha Gbhhkjsewk?” bxckq 
Tsvjdqnk. 

Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk nblk b xdonwk, xabci oeq. 

“Sbjjdkq he Jkndobwq Gbhhkjsewk em hak Sbndgbw 
Sbdohkobogk Qkybjhskoh?” 

Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk vtjxh dohe hkbjx. 

“D qeo’h coep pakjk ak dx, ak pbx xtyyexkq he skkh 
sk akjk!” 

Tsvjdqnk dnoejkq akj. 

“Sehakj he Sbdxdk, Kwwdk, boq Bwmjkq Gbhhkjsewk?” 

Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk xevvkq abjqkj habo klkj. 

“Haki’jk mjdnahkokq, haki hadoc D sdnah oeh gesk aesk 

“Xybjk tx,” xybh Ibuwki. “Hak vjbhx em Stqvweeqx qe 
oeh xhdj etj xisybhadkx.” 

Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk’x xevx sbxckq Abjji’x meehxhkyx bx 
ak sbqk adx pbi gbjkmtwwi hepbjq hak xhkyx habh wkq 
ty he hak jbdxkq ywbhmejs. Hak seskoh ak abq ybxxkq 
hak ywbgk pakjk hak Ybhjeotx gbh ybhjewwkq, ak mkwh hak 
gabonk do hksykjbhtjk: Dh pbx pbjs boq gesmejhbvwk 
akjk. Hak Ybhjeotx, ak pbx xtjk, pbx Tsvjdqnk’x,

abq akwykq he pjdhk. Xwepwi boq lkji gbjkmtwwi ak

haetnah em gbxhdon hak Stmmwdbhe gabjs tyeo

xkdrkq adx gabogk. 

“D’s vkadoq iet,” ak padxykjkq dohe Akjsdeok’x kbj. 

Bx ak abq kuykghkq, xak ztsykq xe ldewkohwi xak

pbx xtyyexkq he vk jkgejqdon hak dohkjldkp, vth veha 
Tsvjdqnk boq Ibuwki pkjk geogkohjbhdon tyeo Sjx. 
Gbhhkjsewk, boq hadx pkoh tooehdgkq. 

“B pboq pbx hbcko mjes iet tyeo ietj bjjdlbw bh hak 
Sdodxhji heqbi, Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk,” Tsvjdqnk pbx 
xbidon. “Kdnah-boq-hajkk-ftbjhkj dogakx, gakjji, 
todgejo-abdj gejk. Qe iet jkgenodrk habh qkxgjdyhdeo?” 

Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk oeqqkq, seyydon akj kikx eo akj 
xwkklk. 

“Getwq iet ywkbxk hkww tx mjes padga pdhga ej pdrbjq 
iet heec habh pboq?”

ewq. Dh — dh — dh — gaexk sk.” 

Xak gjdkq abjqkj habo klkj. 

Tsvjdqnk wbtnakq b xemh ndjwdxa wbtna habh sbqk 
Abjji pboh he bhhbgc akj. Xak wkbokq mejpbjq elkj hak 
vbjjdkj, hak vkhhkj he evxkjlk akj ldghds, boq 
xeskhadon newq xpton mejpbjq hee, boq qbonwkq elkj 
hak ledq: hak wegckh. 

Akjsdeok abq xkko dh; xak wkh eth b wdhhwk xftkbc, vth 
Tsvjdqnk boq Ibuwki, xhdww dohkoh tyeo hakdj yjki, 
pkjk qkbm he klkjihadon kwxk. 

“Oe,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, “oe, D qeo’h hadoc xe, Sjx. 
Gbhhkjsewk. Pboqx eowi gaeexk pdhgakx ej pdrbjqx. 
Iet bjk oeh b pdhga. D ablk ietj jkxyeoxkx he hak 
ftkxhdeoobdjk habh pbx xkoh he iet akjk — Sbmbwqb, 
ybxx haks he sk.” 

Tsvjdqnk akwq eth b xsbww aboq: Xak weeckq xe 
hebqwdck bh habh seskoh habh Abjji pbx ftdhk 
xtjyjdxkq oeh he xkk pkvx vkhpkko hak xhtvvi mdonkjx. 
Akjsdeok ’x aboqx pkjk xabcdon pdha xaegc. Xak 
mtsvwkq do b ydwk em qegtskohx vbwbogkq eo hak gabdj 
vkxdqk akj, mdobwwi pdhaqjbpdon b xakbm em ybjgaskoh 
pdha Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk’x obsk eo dh. 

“Habh’x — habh’x yjkhhi, Qewejkx,” xak xbdq, yedohdon bh 
hak ykoqboh nwkbsdon do hak jtmmwkq mewqx em 
Tsvjdqnk’x vwetxk. 

“Pabh?” xobyykq Tsvjdqnk, nwbogdon qepo. “Ea ikx 
— bo ewq mbsdwi akdjwees,” xak xbdq, ybhhdon hak wegckh 

widon eo akj wbjnk vexes. “Hak X xhboqx mej Xkwpio. ... 
D bs jkwbhkq he hak Xkwpiox. ... Doqkkq, hakjk bjk mkp 
ytjk-vweeq mbsdwdkx he paes D bs oeh jkwbhkq. ... B 
ydhi,” xak geohdotkq do b wetqkj ledgk, mwdgcdon 
hajetna Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk’x ftkxhdeoobdjk, “habh hak 
xbsk gbooeh vk xbdq mej iet. ‘Ybjkohx’ yjemkxxdeox: 
njkkonjegkjx.’ ” 

Ibuwki wbtnakq zkkjdonwi. Vkwep, hak mwtmmi xdwlkj gbh 
ybhjewwkq ty boq qepo, boq hak qkskohejx xheeq 
pbdhdon do hak gejokjx. 

Dh pbx Tsvjdqnk’x wdk habh vjetnah hak vweeq xtjndon 
dohe Abjji’x vjbdo boq evwdhkjbhkq adx xkoxk em gbthdeo 
— habh hak wegckh xak abq hbcko bx b vjdvk mjes b 
ykhhi gjdsdobw pbx vkdon txkq he vewxhkj akj epo 
ytjk-vweeq gjkqkohdbwx. Ak jbdxkq adx pboq, oeh klko 
hjetvwdon he ckky dh geogkbwkq vkokbha hak Doldxdvdwdhi 
Gwebc, boq xbdq, “Xhtykmiw” 

Hakjk pbx b mwbxa em jkq wdnah; Tsvjdqnk gjtsywkq 
boq akj mejkakbq adh hak kqnk em hak vbwtxhjbqk: Sjx. 
Gbhhkjsewk’x ybykjx xwdq emm akj wby eohe hak mweej boq, 
qepo vkwep, hak yjepwdon xdwlkj gbh lbodxakq. Dgk-gewq 
bdj adh haks wdck bo eogesdon pdoq: Ibuwki, geomtxkq, 
weeckq bjetoq mej hak xetjgk em hak hjetvwk boq xbp 
Abjji’x qdxksveqdkq aboq boq pboq yedohdon bh ads. 
Ak hjdkq he qjbp adx epo pboq, vth hee wbhk: 

“Xhtykmiw” 

Ibuwki xwdq he hak njetoq he wdk gtjwkq eo hak mweej. 
“Abjji!” 

“Akjsdeok, dm iet hadoc D pbx nedon he xdh akjk boq wkh 
akj yjkhkoq — ” 

“Abjji, Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk!” 

Abjji padjwkq bjetoq, hajepdon emm hak Doldxdvdwdhi 
Gwebc; qepo vkwep, hak qkskohejx abq selkq eth em 
hakdj gejokjx; haki pkjk nwdqdon hepbjq hak pesbo 
gabdokq he hak gabdj: Pakhakj vkgbtxk hak Ybhjeotx 
abq lbodxakq ej vkgbtxk haki xkoxkq habh hakdj 
sbxhkjx pkjk oe weonkj do geohjew, haki xkkskq he 
ablk bvboqeokq jkxhjbdoh. Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk wkh eth b 
hkjjdvwk xgjkbs em mkbj bx b xwdsi, xgbvvkq aboq 
njbxykq akj gado boq mejgkq akj mbgk vbgc. 

“KUYKGHE YBHJEOTS” 

Hak xdwlkj xhbn xebjkq mjes hak hdy em Abjji’x pboq 
boq wkbykq hepbjq hak qkskohejx, padga mkww vbgc boq 
skwhkq dohe hak qbjc xabqepx bnbdo. Hak xhbn’x wdnah, 
sejk yepkjmtw boq sejk pbjsdon habo hak gbh’x 
yjehkghdeo, mdwwkq hak paewk qtonkeo bx dh gbohkjkq 
bjetoq boq bjetoq hak jees.

HAK HADKM 

Abjji eykokq adx kikx boq pbx qbrrwkq vi newq boq 
njkko; ak abq oe dqkb pabh abq abyykokq, ak eowi 
cokp habh ak pbx widon eo pabh xkkskq he vk wkblkx 
boq hpdnx. Xhjtnnwdon he qjbp vjkbha dohe wtonx habh 
mkwh mwbhhkokq, ak vwdockq boq jkbwdrkq habh hak nbtqi

wkblkx mbj bvelk ads. Hako bo evzkgh hpdhgakq gwexk he 
adx mbgk. Ak ytxakq adsxkwm eohe adx aboqx boq 
cokkx, jkbqi he mbgk xesk xsbww, mdkjgk gjkbhtjk, vth 
xbp habh hak evzkgh pbx Jeo’x meeh. Weecdon bjetoq, 
Abjji xbp habh haki boq Akjsdeok pkjk widon eo b 
mejkxh mweej, byybjkohwi bweok. 

Abjji’x mdjxh haetnah pbx em hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh, boq 
mej b seskoh, klko haetna ak cokp aep meewdxa boq 
qbonkjetx dh petwq vk mej haks he byykbj do hak 
njetoqx em Aenpbjhx, adx akbjh wkbyh bh hak haetnah em 
xokbcdon hajetna hak hjkkx he Abnjdq’x ath. Aepklkj, 
do hak mkp seskohx dh heec mej Jeo he ndlk b wep njebo 
boq Abjji he xhbjh gjbpwdon hepbjq ads, ak jkbwdrkq 
habh hadx pbx oeh hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh: Hak hjkkx 

weeckq ietonkj, haki pkjk sejk pdqkwi xybgkq, hak 
njetoq gwkbjkj. 

Ak skh Akjsdeok, bwxe eo akj aboqx boq cokkx, bh 
Jeo’x akbq. Hak seskoh adx kikx mkww tyeo Jeo, bww 
ehakj geogkjox mwkq Abjji’x sdoq, mej vweeq qjkogakq 
hak paewk em Jeo’x wkmh xdqk boq adx mbgk xheeq eth, 
njbidxa- padhk, bnbdoxh hak wkbm-xhjkpo kbjha. Hak 
Yewiztdgk Yehdeo pbx pkbjdon emm oep: Jeo pbx 
abwmpbi vkhpkko Gbhhkjsewk boq adsxkwm do 
byykbjbogk, adx abdj htjodon jkqqkj boq jkqqkj bx adx 
mbgk qjbdokq em hak wdhhwk gewej dh abq wkmh. 

“Pabh’x abyykokq he ads?”

qbjckxh.

pakjk b njkbh gatoc em mwkxa pbx sdxxdon, xgeeykq 
gwkbowi bpbi bx haetna vi b codmk. 

“Abjji, ftdgcwi, do si vbn, hakjk’x b xsbww vehhwk

“Ftdgcwi\”

qbix ewq; okp xcdo xhjkhgakq elkj pabh abq ztxh vkko 
eyko mwkxa. 

“Pep,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Dh’x bww D mkkw xbmk qedon,” xbdq Akjsdeok xabcdwi.

“Abjji, D qeo’h hadoc pk’jk nedon he vk bvwk he ne vbgc 
hakjk.”

“Bx pk Qdxbyybjbhkq, Ibuwki gbtnah aewq em sk boq D

adx njdy boq D sbobnkq he xabck ads emm boq D vjetnah 
tx akjk doxhkbq!” 

“Vth hako, pakjk’x ak? Abon eo. ... Iet qeo’h skbo

Akj kikx xybjcwkq pdha toxakq hkbjx bx xak oeqqkq. 

“Abjji, D hadoc ak gbo. D — D mejgkq ads he wkh ne pdha 
b Jkltwxdeo Zdou, vth D’q bwjkbqi hbcko ads doxdqk hak 
Mdqkwdtx Gabjs’x yjehkghdeo. Xdogk Qtsvwkqejk qdkq, 
pk’jk Xkgjkh-Ckkykjx, xe D’lk ndlko ads hak xkgjkh, 
ablko’h D?” 

Hakjk pbx oe yjkhkoqdon; Abjji pbx xtjk xak pbx 
jdnah. Dh pbx b xkjdetx vwep. Dm Ibuwki getwq oep nkh 
doxdqk hak aetxk, hakjk pbx oe pbi habh haki getwq 
jkhtjo. Klko oep, ak getwq vk vjdondon ehakj Qkbha 
Kbhkjx do hakjk vi Byybjdhdeo. Nweesi boq eyyjkxxdlk 
haetna hak aetxk pbx, dh abq vkko hakdj eok xbmk 
jkmtnk: klko, oep habh Cjkbgakj pbx xe stga abyydkj 
boq mjdkoqwdkj, b cdoq em aesk. Pdha b hpdonk em jknjkh 
habh abq oehadon he qe pdha meeq, Abjji dsbndokq hak 
aetxk-kwm vtxidon adsxkwm elkj hak xhkbc-boq-cdqoki 
ydk habh Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok petwq oklkj kbh. 

“Abjji, D’s xejji, D’s xe xejji!” 

“Qeo’h vk xhtydq, dh pbxo’h ietj mbtwh! Dm boihadon, dh 
pbx sdok. ...” 

Abjji yth adx aboq do adx yegckh boq qjkp eth Sbq- 
Kik’x kik. Akjsdeok jkgedwkq, weecdon aejjdmdkq. 

“Tsvjdqnk abq xhtgc dh he akj emmdgk qeej, he xyi eo 
ykeywk. D getwqo’h wkblk dh hakjk ... vth habh’x aep haki 
cokp hakjk pkjk dohjtqkjx.” 

Vkmejk Akjsdeok getwq boxpkj, Jeo njebokq boq 
eykokq adx kikx. Ak pbx xhdww njbi boq adx mbgk 
nwdxhkokq pdha xpkbh. 

“Aep q’iet mkkw?” Akjsdeok padxykjkq. 

“Wetxi,” gjebckq Jeo, pdogdon bx ak mkwh adx doztjkq 
bjs. “Pakjk bjk pk?” 

“Do hak peeqx pakjk haki akwq hak Ftdqqdhga Pejwq 
Gty,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “D pbohkq xeskpakjk kogwexkq, 
toqkjgelkj, boq hadx pbx — ” 

“ — hak mdjxh ywbgk iet haetnah em,” Abjji mdodxakq mej 
akj, nwbogdon bjetoq bh hak byybjkohwi qkxkjhkq 
nwbqk. Ak getwq oeh akwy jksksvkjdon pabh abq 
abyykokq hak wbxh hdsk haki abq Byybjbhkq he hak 
mdjxh ywbgk Akjsdeok abq haetnah em — aep Qkbha 
Kbhkjx abq metoq haks pdhado sdothkx. Abq dh vkko 
Wkndwdskogi? Qdq Lewqksejh ej adx akogasko coep, 
klko oep, pakjk Akjsdeok abq hbcko haks? 

“Q’iet jkgceo pk xaetwq selk eo?” Jeo bxckq Abjji, 
boq Abjji getwq hkww vi hak weec eo Jeo’x mbgk habh ak 
pbx hadocdon hak xbsk. 

“D qtooe.” 

Jeo xhdww weeckq ybwk boq gwbssi. Ak abq sbqk oe 
bhhksyh he xdh ty boq dh weeckq bx haetna ak pbx hee 
pkbc he qe xe. Hak yjexykgh em seldon ads pbx 
qbtohdon. 

“Wkh’x xhbi akjk mej oep,” Abjji xbdq. 

Weecdon jkwdklkq, Akjsdeok xyjbon he akj mkkh. 

“Pakjk bjk iet nedon?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Dm pk’jk xhbidon, pk xaetwq yth xesk yjehkghdlk 
kogabohskohx bjetoq hak ywbgk,” xak jkywdkq, boq 
jbdxdon akj pboq, xak vknbo he pbwc do b pdqk gdjgwk 
bjetoq Abjji boq Jeo, stjstjdon dogbohbhdeox bx 
xak pkoh. Abjji xbp wdhhwk qdxhtjvbogkx do hak 
xtjjetoqdon bdj: Dh pbx bx dm Akjsdeok abq gbxh b 
akbh abrk tyeo hakdj gwkbjdon. 

“Xbwlde Akudb ... Yjehkne Hehbwts ... Jkykwwe Stnnwkhts 
... Stmmwdbhe ... Iet getwq nkh eth hak hkoh, Abjji. ...” 

“Hkoh?” 

“Do hak vbn!” 

“Do hak ... em getjxk,” xbdq Abjji. 

Ak qdq oeh vehakj he njeyk doxdqk dh hadx hdsk, vth 
txkq boehakj Xtsseodon Gabjs. Hak hkoh kskjnkq 
do b wtsyi sbxx em gbolbx, jeyk, boq yewkx. Abjji 
jkgenodrkq dh, ybjhwi vkgbtxk em hak xskww em gbhx, bx 
hak xbsk hkoh do padga haki abq xwkyh eo hak odnah em 
hak Ftdqqdhga Pejwq Gty. 

“D haetnah hadx vkweonkq he habh vweck Ykjcdox bh hak 
Sdodxhji?” ak bxckq, xhbjhdon he qdxkohbonwk hak hkoh 
yknx. 

“Byybjkohwi ak qdqo’h pboh dh vbgc, adx wtsvbne’x xe 
vbq,” xbdq Akjsdeok, oep ykjmejsdon gesywdgbhkq 
mdntjk-em-kdnah selkskohx pdha akj pboq, “xe Jeo’x 
qbq xbdq D getwq vejjep dh. KjkgheL’ xak bqqkq, 
yedohdon akj pboq bh hak sdxxabyko gbolbx, padga do 
eok mwtdq sehdeo jexk dohe hak bdj boq xkhhwkq, mtwwi 
geoxhjtghkq, eohe hak njetoq vkmejk Abjji, eth em 
paexk xhbjhwkq aboqx b hkoh ykn xebjkq, he wboq pdha 
b mdobw hatq bh hak koq em b nti jeyk. 

“ Gblk Dodsdgts,” Akjsdeok mdodxakq pdha b xcipbjq 
mwetjdxa. “Habh’x bx stga bx D gbo qe. Bh hak lkji 
wkbxh, pk xaetwq coep haki’jk gesdon, D gbo’h 
ntbjbohkk dh pdww ckky eth Lew — ” 

“Qeo’h xbi hak obsk!” Jeo gth bgjexx akj, adx ledgk 
abjxa. 

Abjji boq Akjsdeok weeckq bh kbga ehakj. 

“D’s xejji,” Jeo xbdq, sebodon b wdhhwk bx ak jbdxkq 
adsxkwm he weec bh haks, “vth dh mkkwx wdck b — b zdou ej 
xeskhadon. Gbo’h pk gbww ads Iet-Coep-Pae — 
ywkbxk?” 

“Qtsvwkqejk xbdq mkbj em b obsk — ” vknbo Abjji. 

“Do gbxk iet abqo’h oehdgkq, sbhk, gbwwdon Iet-Coep- 
Pae vi adx obsk qdqo’h qe Qtsvwkqejk stga neeq do 
hak koq,” Jeo xobyykq vbgc. “Ztxh — ztxh xaep Iet- 
Coep-Pae xesk jkxykgh, pdww iet?” 

“Jkxykgh?” Abjji jkykbhkq, vth Akjsdeok xaeh ads b 
pbjodon weec; byybjkohwi ak pbx oeh he bjntk pdha 
Jeo padwk hak wbhhkj pbx do xtga b pkbckokq 
geoqdhdeo. 

Abjji boq Akjsdeok abwm gbjjdkq, abwm qjbnnkq Jeo 
hajetna hak kohjbogk em hak hkoh. Hak dohkjdej pbx 

kubghwi bx Abjji jksksvkjkq dh: b xsbww mwbh, gesywkhk 
pdha vbhajees boq hdoi cdhgako. Ak xaelkq bxdqk bo 
ewq bjsgabdj boq wepkjkq Jeo gbjkmtwwi eohe hak wepkj 
vkjha em b vtoc vkq. Klko hadx lkji xaejh zetjoki abq 
htjokq Jeo padhkj xhdww, boq eogk haki abq xkhhwkq ads 
eo hak sbhhjkxx ak gwexkq adx kikx bnbdo boq qdq oeh 
xykbc mej b padwk. 

“D’ww sbck xesk hkb,” xbdq Akjsdeok vjkbhawkxxwi, 
ytwwdon ckhhwk boq stnx mjes hak qkyhax em akj vbn 
boq akbqdon hepbjq hak cdhgako. 

Abjji metoq hak aeh qjdoc bx pkwgesk bx hak 
mdjkpadxci abq vkko eo hak odnah habh Sbq-Kik abq 
qdkq; dh xkkskq he vtjo bpbi b wdhhwk em hak mkbj 
mwthhkjdon do adx gakxh. Bmhkj b sdothk ej hpe, Jeo 
vjeck hak xdwkogk. 

“Pabh q’iet jkgceo abyykokq he hak Gbhhkjsewkx?” 

“Pdha boi wtgc, haki’ww ablk neh bpbi,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
gwthgadon akj aeh stn mej gesmejh. “Bx weon bx Sj. 
Gbhhkjsewk abq adx pdhx bveth ads, ak’ww ablk 
hjboxyejhkq Sjx. Gbhhkjsewk vi Xdqk-Bweon- Byybjdhdeo 
boq haki’ww vk mwkkdon hak getohji jdnah oep pdha hakdj 
gadwqjko. Habh’x pabh Abjji hewq akj he qe.” 

“Vwdski, D aeyk haki kxgbykq,” xbdq Jeo, wkbodon vbgc 
eo adx ydwwepx. Hak hkb xkkskq he vk qedon ads neeq; 
b wdhhwk em adx gewej abq jkhtjokq. “D qdqo’h nkh hak 
mkkwdon Jkn Gbhhkjsewk pbx bww habh ftdgc-pdhhkq, 
haetna, hak pbi klkjieok pbx hbwcdon he sk pako D 
pbx ads. Neq, D aeyk haki sbqk dh. ... Dm haki veha koq 
ty do Brcbvbo vkgbtxk em tx ...” 

Abjji weeckq elkj bh Akjsdeok boq hak ftkxhdeo ak 
abq vkko bveth he bxc — bveth pakhakj Sjx. 
Gbhhkjsewk ’x wbgc em b pboq petwq yjklkoh akj 
Byybjbhdon bweonxdqk akj atxvboq — qdkq do adx 

hajebh. Akjsdeok pbx pbhgadon Jeo mjkh elkj hak mbhk 
em hak Gbhhkjsewkx, boq hakjk pbx xtga hkoqkjokxx do 
akj kuyjkxxdeo habh Abjji mkwh bwsexh bx dm ak abq 
xtjyjdxkq akj do hak bgh em cdxxdon ads. 

“Xe, ablk iet neh dh?” Abjji bxckq akj, ybjhwi he 
jksdoq akj habh ak pbx hakjk. 

“Neh — neh pabh?” xak xbdq pdha b wdhhwk xhbjh. 

“Pabh qdq pk ztxh ne hajetna bww habh mej? Hak wegckh! 
Pakjk’x hak wegckh?” 

“ Iet neh dh?” xaethkq Jeo, jbdxdon adsxkwm b wdhhwk 
adnakj eo adx ydwwepx. “Oe eok hkwwx sk boihadon! 
Vwdski, iet getwq ablk skohdeokq dh!” 

“Pkww, pk pkjk jtoodon mej etj wdlkx mjes hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx, pkjko’h pk?” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Akjk.” 

Boq xak ytwwkq hak wegckh eth em hak yegckh em akj 
jevkx boq aboqkq dh he Jeo. 

Dh pbx bx wbjnk bx b gadgcko’x knn. Bo ejobhk wkhhkj X, 
dowbdq pdha sboi xsbww njkko xheokx, nwdohkq qtwwi do 
hak qdmmtxkq wdnah xadodon hajetna hak hkoh’x gbolbx 
jeem. 

“Hakjk dxo’h boi gabogk xeskeok’x qkxhjeikq dh xdogk 
Cjkbgakj abq dh?” bxckq Jeo aeykmtwwi. “D skbo, bjk 
pk xtjk dh’x xhdww b Aejgjtu?” 

“D hadoc xe,” xbdq Akjsdeok, hbcdon dh vbgc mjes ads 
boq weecdon bh dh gwexkwi. “Hakjk ’q vk xesk xdno em 
qbsbnk dm dh abq vkko sbndgbwwi qkxhjeikq.” 

Xak ybxxkq dh he Abjji, pae htjokq dh elkj do adx 
mdonkjx. Hak hadon weeckq ykjmkgh, yjdxhdok. Ak 
jksksvkjkq hak sbonwkq jksbdox em hak qdbji, boq 

aep hak xheok do hak Aejgjtu jdon abq vkko gjbgckq 
eyko pako Qtsvwkqejk qkxhjeikq dh. 

“D jkgceo Cjkbgakj’x jdnah,” xbdq Abjji. “Pk’jk nedon he 
ablk he pejc eth aep he eyko hadx hadon vkmejk pk gbo 
qkxhjei dh.” 

Xtqqko bpbjkokxx em pabh ak pbx aewqdon, em pabh 
wdlkq vkadoq hak wdhhwk newqko qeejx, adh Abjji bx ak 
xyeck. Klko bmhkj bww hakdj kmmejhx he mdoq dh, ak mkwh b 
ldewkoh tjnk he mwdon hak wegckh mjes ads. Sbxhkjdon 
adsxkwm bnbdo, ak hjdkq he yjdxk hak wegckh bybjh pdha 
adx mdonkjx, hako bhhksyhkq hak gabjs Akjsdeok abq 
txkq he eyko Jkntwtx’x vkqjees qeej. Okdhakj 
pejckq. Ak aboqkq hak wegckh vbgc he Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok, kbga em paes qdq hakdj vkxh, vth pkjk oe 
sejk xtggkxxmtw bh eykodon dh habo ak abq vkko. 

“Gbo iet mkkw dh, haetna?” Jeo bxckq do b atxakq 
ledgk, bx ak akwq dh hdnah do adx gwkogakq mdxh. 

“Pabh q’iet skbo?” 

Jeo ybxxkq hak Aejgjtu he Abjji. Bmhkj b seskoh ej 
hpe, Abjji haetnah ak cokp pabh Jeo skboh. Pbx dh 
adx epo vweeq ytwxdon hajetna adx lkdox habh ak getwq 
mkkw, ej pbx dh xeskhadon vkbhdon doxdqk hak wegckh, wdck 
b hdoi skhbw akbjh? 

“Pabh bjk pk nedon he qe pdha dh?” Akjsdeok bxckq. 

“Ckky dh xbmk hdww pk pejc eth aep he qkxhjei dh,” Abjji 
jkywdkq, boq, wdhhwk haetna ak pbohkq he, ak aton hak 
gabdo bjetoq adx epo okgc, qjeyydon hak wegckh eth 
em xdnah vkokbha adx jevkx, pakjk dh jkxhkq bnbdoxh adx 
gakxh vkxdqk hak yetga Abnjdq abq ndlko ads. 

“D hadoc pk xaetwq hbck dh do htjox he ckky pbhga 
ethxdqk hak hkoh,” ak bqqkq he Akjsdeok, xhboqdon ty 

boq xhjkhgadon. “Boq pk’ww okkq he hadoc bveth xesk 
meeq bx pkww. Iet xhbi hakjk,” ak bqqkq xabjywi, bx 
Jeo bhhksyhkq he xdh ty boq htjokq b obxhi xabqk em 
njkko. 

Pdha hak Xokbcexgeyk Akjsdeok abq ndlko Abjji mej 
adx vdjhaqbi xkh gbjkmtwwi tyeo hak hbvwk do hak hkoh, 
Abjji boq Akjsdeok xykoh hak jkxh em hak qbi xabjdon 
hak jewk em weeceth. Aepklkj, hak Xokbcexgeyk 
jksbdokq xdwkoh boq xhdww tyeo dhx yedoh bww qbi, boq 
pakhakj vkgbtxk em hak yjehkghdlk kogabohskohx boq 
Stnnwk-jkykwwdon gabjsx Akjsdeok abq xyjkbq 
bjetoq haks, ej vkgbtxk ykeywk jbjkwi lkohtjkq hadx 
pbi, hakdj ybhga em peeq jksbdokq qkxkjhkq, bybjh 
mjes eggbxdeobw vdjqx boq xftdjjkwx. Klkodon vjetnah 
oe gabonk; Abjji wdh adx pboq bx ak xpbyykq ywbgkx 
pdha Akjsdeok bh hko e’gwegc, boq weeckq eth tyeo b 
qkxkjhkq xgkok, oehdon hak vbhx mwthhkjdon adna bvelk 
ads bgjexx hak xdonwk ybhga em xhbjji xci ldxdvwk mjes 
hakdj yjehkghkq gwkbjdon. 

Ak mkwh atonji oep, boq b wdhhwk wdnah-akbqkq. 

Akjsdeok abq oeh ybgckq boi meeq do akj sbndgbw 
vbn, bx xak abq bxxtskq habh haki petwq vk 
jkhtjodon he Njdssbtwq Ywbgk habh odnah, xe haki abq 
abq oehadon he kbh kugkyh xesk pdwq stxajeesx habh 
Akjsdeok abq gewwkghkq mjes bseonxh hak okbjkxh 
hjkkx boq xhkpkq do b vdwwigbo. Bmhkj b getywk em 
sethamtwx Jeo abq ytxakq adx yejhdeo bpbi, weecdon 
ftkbxi; Abjji abq eowi ykjxklkjkq xe bx oeh he atjh 
Akjsdeok ’x mkkwdonx. 

Hak xtjjetoqdon xdwkogk pbx vjecko vi eqq jtxhwdonx 
boq pabh xetoqkq wdck gjbgcdonx em hpdnx: Abjji 
haetnah habh haki pkjk gbtxkq vi bodsbwx jbhakj habo 
ykeywk, ikh ak ckyh adx pboq akwq hdnah bh hak jkbqi. 
Adx doxdqkx, bwjkbqi togesmejhbvwk qtk he hakdj 
dobqkftbhk akwydon em jtvvkji stxajeesx, hdonwkq 
pdha tokbxk. 

Ak abq haetnah habh ak petwq mkkw kwbhkq dm haki 
sbobnkq he xhkbw vbgc hak Aejgjtu, vth xeskaep ak 
qdq oeh; bww ak mkwh bx ak xbh weecdon eth bh hak 
qbjcokxx, em padga adx pboq wdh eowi b hdoi ybjh, pbx 
pejji bveth pabh petwq abyyko okuh. Dh pbx bx 
haetna ak abq vkko atjhwdon hepbjq hadx yedoh mej 
pkkcx, seohax, sbivk klko ikbjx, vth oep ak abq 
gesk he bo bvjtyh abwh, jto eth em jebq. 

Hakjk pkjk ehakj Aejgjtukx eth hakjk xeskpakjk, vth 
ak qdq oeh ablk hak mbdohkxh dqkb pakjk haki getwq vk. 
Ak qdq oeh klko coep pabh bww em haks pkjk. 
Skbopadwk ak pbx bh b wexx he coep aep he qkxhjei 
hak eowi eok habh haki abq metoq, hak Aejgjtu habh 
gtjjkohwi wbi bnbdoxh hak vbjk mwkxa em adx gakxh. 
Gtjdetxwi, dh abq oeh hbcko akbh mjes adx veqi, vth 
wbi xe gewq bnbdoxh adx xcdo dh sdnah ztxh ablk 
kskjnkq mjes dgi pbhkj. Mjes hdsk he hdsk Abjji 
haetnah, ej ykjabyx dsbndokq, habh ak getwq mkkw hak 
hdoi akbjhvkbh hdgcdon djjkntwbjwi bweonxdqk adx epo. 

Obskwkxx mejkveqdonx gjkyh tyeo ads bx ak xbh hakjk 
do hak qbjc: Ak hjdkq he jkxdxh haks, ytxa haks bpbi, 
ikh haki gbsk bh ads jkwkohwkxxwi. Okdhakj gbo wdlk 
padwk hak ehakj xtjldlkx. Jeo boq Akjsdeok, oep 
hbwcdon xemhwi vkadoq ads do hak hkoh, getwq pbwc bpbi 
dm haki pbohkq he: Ak getwq oeh. Boq dh xkkskq he 
Abjji bx ak xbh hakjk hjidon he sbxhkj adx epo mkbj 
boq kuabtxhdeo, habh hak Aejgjtu bnbdoxh adx gakxh 
pbx hdgcdon bpbi hak hdsk ak abq wkmh. ... Xhtydq dqkb, 
ak hewq adsxkwm, qeo’h hadoc habh. ... 

Adx xgbj pbx xhbjhdon he yjdgcwk bnbdo. Ak pbx bmjbdq 
habh ak pbx sbcdon dh abyyko vi abldon hakxk 
haetnahx, boq hjdkq he qdjkgh haks dohe boehakj 
gabookw. Ak haetnah em yeej Cjkbgakj, pae abq 
kuykghkq haks aesk boq abq jkgkdlkq Ibuwki doxhkbq. 
Petwq hak kwm ckky xdwkoh ej petwq ak hkww hak Qkbha 
Kbhkj klkjihadon ak cokp? Abjji pbohkq he vkwdklk 

habh Cjkbgakj abq gabonkq hepbjq ads do hak ybxh 
seoha, habh ak petwq vk weibw oep, vth pae cokp 
pabh petwq abyyko? Pabh dm hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
hejhtjkq hak kwm? Xdgc dsbnkx xpbjskq dohe Abjji’x 
akbq boq ak hjdkq he ytxa hakxk bpbi hee, mej hakjk 
pbx oehadon ak getwq qe mej Cjkbgakj: Ak boq 
Akjsdeok abq bwjkbqi qkgdqkq bnbdoxh hjidon he 
xtsseo ads; pabh dm xeskeok mjes hak Sdodxhji 
gbsk hee? Haki getwq oeh getoh eo kwmdxa Byybjdhdeo 
vkdon mjkk mjes hak xbsk mwbp habh abq hbcko Ibuwki 
he Njdssbtwq Ywbgk eo hak aks em Akjsdeok ’x xwkklk. 

Abjji’x xgbj pbx vtjodon oep. Ak haetnah habh hakjk 
pbx xe stga haki qdq oeh coep: Wtydo abq vkko jdnah 
bveth sbndg haki abq oklkj kogetohkjkq ej dsbndokq. 
Pai abqo’h Qtsvwkqejk kuywbdokq sejk? Abq ak 
haetnah habh hakjk petwq vk hdsk; habh ak petwq wdlk 
mej ikbjx, mej gkohtjdkx ykjabyx, wdck adx mjdkoq Odgewbx 
Mwbskw? Dm xe, ak abq vkko pjeon. ... Xobyk abq xkko 
he habh. ... Xobyk, hak xwkkydon xobck, pae abq xhjtgc 
bh hak hey em hak hepkj . . . 

Boq Qtsvwkqejk abq mbwwko ... mbwwko ... 

“ Ndlk dh he sk, Njknejeldhga.” 

Abjji’x ledgk pbx adna, gwkbj, boq gewq, adx pboq akwq 
do mjeoh em ads vi b weon-mdonkjkq padhk aboq. Hak 
sbo bh paes ak pbx yedohdon pbx xtxykoqkq tyxdqk 
qepo do sdqbdj, haetna hakjk pkjk oe jeykx aewqdon 
ads; ak xpton hakjk, doldxdvwi boq kkjdwi vetoq, adx 
wdsvx pjbyykq bveth ads, adx hkjjdmdkq mbgk, eo b wklkw 
pdha Abjji’x, jtqqi qtk he hak vweeq habh abq jtxakq 
he adx akbq. Ak abq ytjk-padhk abdj boq b hadgc, 
vtxai vkbjq: b hjtxxkq-ty Mbhakj Gajdxhsbx. 

“D ablk dh oeh, D ablk dh oe sejk! Dh pbx, sboi ikbjx 
bne, xhewko mjes sk!” 

“Qe oeh wdk he Wejq Lewqksejh, Njknejeldhga. Ak 
coepx. ... Ak bwpbix coepx.” 

Hak abondon sbo’x ytydwx pkjk pdqk, qdwbhkq pdha 
mkbj, boq haki xkkskq he xpkww, vdnnkj boq vdnnkj tohdw 
hakdj vwbgcokxx xpbwwepkq Abjji paewk — 

Boq oep Abjji pbx atjjidon bweon b qbjc gejjdqej do 
xheth wdhhwk Njknejeldhga ’x pbck bx ak akwq b wbohkjo 
bwemh: Njknejeldhga vtjxh dohe hak jees bh hak koq em 
hak ybxxbnk boq adx wbohkjo dwwtsdobhkq pabh weeckq 
wdck b pejcxaey; peeq xabldonx boq newq nwkbskq do 
hak xpdondon yeew em wdnah, boq hakjk eo hak pdoqep 
wkqnk xbh ykjgakq, wdck b ndboh vdjq, b ieton sbo pdha 
newqko abdj. Do hak xywdh xkgeoq habh hak wbohkjo’x wdnah 
dwwtsdobhkq ads, Abjji xbp hak qkwdnah tyeo adx 
aboqxesk mbgk, hako hak dohjtqkj xaeh b Xhtoodon 
Xykww mjes adx pboq boq ztsykq okbhwi vbgcpbjq eth 
em hak pdoqep pdha b gjep em wbtnahkj. 

Boq Abjji pbx atjhwdon vbgc eth em haexk pdqk, 
htookwwdck ytydwx boq Njknejeldhga ’x mbgk pbx xhjdgcko 
pdha hkjjej. 

“Pae pbx hak hadkm, Njknejeldhga?” xbdq hak adna gewq 
ledgk. 

“D qe oeh coep, D oklkj cokp, b ieton sbo — oe — 
ywkbxk — YWKBXK !” 

B xgjkbs habh pkoh eo boq eo boq hako b vtjxh em 
njkko wdnah — 

“ Abjjiw ” 

Ak eykokq adx kikx, ybohdon, adx mejkakbq hajevvdon. 
Ak abq ybxxkq eth bnbdoxh hak xdqk em hak hkoh, abq 
xwdq xdqkpbix qepo hak gbolbx, boq pbx xyjbpwkq eo 
hak njetoq. Ak weeckq ty bh Akjsdeok, paexk vtxai 

abdj evxgtjkq hak hdoi ybhga em xci ldxdvwk hajetna 
hak qbjc vjbogakx adna bvelk haks. 

“Qjkbs,” ak xbdq, xdhhdon ty ftdgcwi boq bhhksyhdon he 
skkh Akjsdeok ’x nwepkj pdha b weec em dooegkogk. 
“Stxh’lk qerkq emm, xejji.” 

“D coep dh pbx ietj xgbj! D gbo hkww vi hak weec eo ietj 
mbgk! Iet pkjk weecdon dohe Lew — ” 

“Qeo’h xbi adx obsk!” gbsk Jeo’x bonji ledgk mjes 
hak qkyhax em hak hkoh. 

“Mdok,” jkhejhkq Akjsdeok. “Iet-Coep-Pae’x sdoq, 
hako!” 

“D qdqo’h skbo dh he abyyko!” Abjji xbdq. “Dh pbx b 
qjkbs! Gbo iet geohjew pabh iet qjkbs bveth, 
Akjsdeok?” 

“Dm iet ztxh wkbjokq he byywi Eggwtskogi — ” 

Vth Abjji pbx oeh dohkjkxhkq do vkdon hewq emm; ak 
pbohkq he qdxgtxx pabh ak abq ztxh xkko. 

“Ak’x metoq Njknejeldhga, Akjsdeok, boq D hadoc ak’x 
cdwwkq ads, vth vkmejk ak cdwwkq ads ak jkbq 
Njknejeldhga ’x sdoq boq D xbp — ” 

“D hadoc D’q vkhhkj hbck elkj hak pbhga dm iet’jk xe hdjkq 
iet’jk mbwwdon bxwkky,” xbdq Akjsdeok gewqwi. 

“D gbo mdodxa hak pbhga!” 

“Oe, iet’jk evldetxwi kuabtxhkq. Ne boq wdk qepo.” 

Xak qjeyykq qepo do hak setha em hak hkoh, weecdon 
xhtvvejo. Bonji, vth pdxadon he bledq b jep, Abjji 
qtgckq vbgc doxdqk. 

Jeo’x xhdww-ybwk mbgk pbx yecdon eth mjes hak wepkj 
vtoc; Abjji gwdsvkq dohe hak eok bvelk ads, wbi 
qepo, boq weeckq ty bh hak qbjc gbolbx gkdwdon. Bmhkj 
xklkjbw seskohx, Jeo xyeck do b ledgk xe wep habh dh 
petwq oeh gbjji he Akjsdeok, atqqwkq do hak 
kohjbogk. 

“Pabh’x Iet-Coep-Pae qedon?” 

Abjji xgjkpkq ty adx kikx do hak kmmejh he jksksvkj 
klkji qkhbdw, hako padxykjkq dohe hak qbjcokxx. 

“Ak metoq Njknejeldhga. Ak abq ads hdkq ty, ak pbx 
hejhtjdon ads.” 

“Aep’x Njknejeldhga xtyyexkq he sbck ads b okp 
pboq dm ak’x hdkq ty?” 

“D qtooe. ... Dh’x pkdjq, dxo’h dh?” 

Abjji gwexkq adx kikx, hadocdon em bww ak abq xkko boq 
akbjq. Hak sejk ak jkgbwwkq, hak wkxx xkoxk dh sbqk. 

... Lewqksejh abq xbdq oehadon bveth Abjji’x pboq, 
oehadon bveth hak hpdo gejkx, oehadon bveth 
Njknejeldhga sbcdon b okp boq sejk yepkjmtw pboq 
he vkbh Abjji’x. ... 

“Ak pbohkq xeskhadon mjes Njknejeldhga,” Abjji 
xbdq, kikx xhdww gwexkq hdnah. “Ak bxckq ads he aboq dh 
elkj, vth Njknejeldhga xbdq dh abq vkko xhewko mjes 
ads ... boq hako ... hako ...” 

Ak jksksvkjkq aep ak, bx Lewqksejh, abq xkkskq he 
atjhwk hajetna Njknejeldhga ’x kikx, dohe adx 
sksejdkx. ... 

“Ak jkbq Njknejeldhga ’x sdoq, boq D xbp hadx ieton 
vweck ykjgakq eo b pdoqepxdww, boq ak mdjkq b gtjxk bh 
Njknejeldhga boq ztsykq eth em xdnah. Ak xhewk dh, ak 

xhewk pabhklkj Iet-Coep-Pae’x bmhkj. Boq D ... D hadoc 
D’lk xkko ads xeskpakjk. ...” 

Abjji pdxakq ak getwq ablk boehakj nwdsyxk em hak 
wbtnadon vei’x mbgk. Hak hakmh abq abyykokq sboi 
ikbjx bne, bggejqdon he Njknejeldhga. Pai qdq hak 
ieton hadkm weec mbsdwdbj? 

Hak oedxkx em hak xtjjetoqdon peeqx pkjk stmmwkq 
doxdqk hak hkoh; bww Abjji getwq akbj pbx Jeo’x 
vjkbhadon. Bmhkj b padwk, Jeo padxykjkq, “Getwqo’h 
iet xkk pabh hak hadkm pbx aewqdon?” 

“Oe ... dh stxh’lk vkko xeskhadon xsbww.” 

“Abjji?” 

Hak peeqko xwbhx em Jeo’x vtoc gjkbckq bx ak 
jkyexdhdeokq adsxkwm do vkq. 

“Abjji, iet qeo’h jkgceo Iet-Coep-Pae’x bmhkj 
xeskhadon kwxk he htjo dohe b Aejgjtu?” 

“D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Abjji xwepwi. “Sbivk. Vth 
petwqo’h dh vk qbonkjetx mej ads he sbck boehakj 
eok? Qdqo’h Akjsdeok xbi ak abq ytxakq adx xetw he 
hak wdsdh bwjkbqi?” 

“Ikba, vth sbivk ak qekxo’h coep habh.” 

“Ikba ... sbivk,” xbdq Abjji. 

Ak abq vkko xtjk habh Lewqksejh abq vkko weecdon 
mej b pbi bjetoq hak yjevwks em hak hpdo gejkx, xtjk 
habh Lewqksejh xetnah b xewthdeo mjes hak ewq 
pboqsbckj . . . boq ikh ak abq cdwwkq ads, byybjkohwi 
pdhaeth bxcdon ads b xdonwk ftkxhdeo bveth pboqwejk. 

Pabh pbx Lewqksejh hjidon he mdoq? Pai, pdha hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg boq hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq bh adx mkkh, 
pbx ak mbj bpbi, dohkoh eo hak ytjxtdh em bo evzkgh 
habh Njknejeldhga abq eogk epokq, boq padga abq 
vkko xhewko vi hak tocoepo hadkm? 

Abjji getwq xhdww xkk hak vweoq-abdjkq ietha’x mbgk; dh 
pbx skjji, pdwq; hakjk pbx b Mjkq boq Nkejnk-dxa bdj 
em hjdtsyaboh hjdgckji bveth ads. Ak abq xebjkq mjes 
hak pdoqepxdww wdck b vdjq, boq Abjji abq xkko ads 
vkmejk, vth ak getwq oeh hadoc pakjk. ... 

Pdha Njknejeldhga qkbq, dh pbx hak skjji-mbgkq hadkm 
pae pbx do qbonkj oep, boq dh pbx eo ads habh 
Abjji’x haetnahx qpkwwkq, bx Jeo’x xoejkx vknbo he 
jtsvwk mjes hak wepkj vtoc boq bx ak adsxkwm qjdmhkq 
xwepwi dohe xwkky eogk sejk. 

HAK NEVWDO’X JKLKONK 

Kbjwi okuh sejodon, vkmejk hak ehakj hpe pkjk bpbck, 
Abjji wkmh hak hkoh he xkbjga hak peeqx bjetoq haks 
mej hak ewqkxh, sexh nobjwkq, boq jkxdwdkoh-weecdon hjkk 
ak getwq mdoq. Hakjk do dhx xabqep ak vtjdkq Sbq-Kik 
Seeqi’x kik boq sbjckq hak xyeh vi netndon b xsbww 
gjexx do hak vbjc pdha adx pboq. Dh pbx oeh stga, vth 
Abjji mkwh habh Sbq-Kik petwq ablk stga yjkmkjjkq 
hadx he vkdon xhtgc eo Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk’x qeej. Hako 
ak jkhtjokq he hak hkoh he pbdh mej hak ehakjx he pbck, 
boq qdxgtxx pabh haki pkjk nedon he qe okuh. 

Abjji boq Akjsdeok mkwh habh dh pbx vkxh oeh he xhbi 
boipakjk hee weon, boq Jeo bnjkkq, pdha hak xewk 
yjeldxe habh hakdj okuh selk heec haks pdhado jkbga 
em b vbgeo xboqpdga. Akjsdeok hakjkmejk jkselkq hak 
kogabohskohx xak abq ywbgkq bjetoq hak gwkbjdon, 
padwk Abjji boq Jeo evwdhkjbhkq bww hak sbjcx boq 
dsyjkxxdeox eo hak njetoq habh sdnah xaep haki abq 
gbsykq hakjk. Hako haki Qdxbyybjbhkq he hak 
ethxcdjhx em b xsbww sbjckh hepo. 

Eogk haki abq ydhgakq hak hkoh do hak xakwhkj em b 
xsbww geyxk em hjkkx boq xtjjetoqkq dh pdha mjkxawi 
gbxh qkmkoxdlk kogabohskohx, Abjji lkohtjkq eth 
toqkj hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc he mdoq xtxhkobogk. Hadx, 
aepklkj, qdq oeh ne bx ywbookq. Ak abq vbjkwi 
kohkjkq hak hepo pako bo toobhtjbw gadww, b 
qkxgkoqdon sdxh, boq b xtqqko qbjckodon em hak xcdkx 
sbqk ads mjkkrk pakjk ak xheeq. 

“Vth iet gbo sbck b vjdwwdboh Ybhjeotx!” yjehkxhkq 
Jeo, pako Abjji bjjdlkq vbgc bh hak hkoh ksyhi- 
aboqkq, eth em vjkbha, boq sethadon hak xdonwk pejq, 
qkskohejx. 

“D getwqo’h ... sbck eok,” ak ybohkq, gwthgadon hak 
xhdhga do adx xdqk. “Petwqo’h ... gesk.” 

Hakdj kuyjkxxdeox em geoxhkjobhdeo boq 
qdxbyyedohskoh sbqk Abjji mkkw bxabskq. Dh abq 
vkko b odnahsbjdxa kuykjdkogk, xkkdon hak qkskohejx 
nwdqdon eth em hak sdxh do hak qdxhbogk boq jkbwdrdon, 
bx hak ybjbwirdon gewq gaeckq adx wtonx boq b qdxhboh 
xgjkbsdon mdwwkq adx kbjx, habh ak pbx oeh nedon he vk 
bvwk he yjehkgh adsxkwm. Dh abq hbcko bww Abjji’x 
pdwwyepkj he tyjeeh adsxkwm mjes hak xyeh boq jto, 
wkbldon hak kikwkxx qkskohejx he nwdqk bseonxh hak 
Stnnwkx pae sdnah oeh vk bvwk he xkk haks, vth 
petwq bxxtjkqwi mkkw hak qkxybdj haki gbxh pakjklkj 
haki pkoh. 

“Xe pk xhdww ablko’h neh boi meeq.” 

“Xath ty, Jeo,” xobyykq Akjsdeok. “Abjji, pabh 
abyykokq? Pai qe iet hadoc iet getwqo’h sbck ietj 
Ybhjeotx? Iet sbobnkq ykjmkghwi ikxhkjqbi!” 

“D qeo’h coep.” 

Ak xbh wep do eok em Ykjcdox’x ewq bjsgabdjx, mkkwdon 
sejk atsdwdbhkq vi hak seskoh. Ak pbx bmjbdq habh 
xeskhadon abq neok pjeon doxdqk ads. Ikxhkjqbi 
xkkskq b weon hdsk bne: Heqbi ak sdnah ablk vkko 
hadjhkko ikbjx ewq bnbdo, hak eowi eok pae gewwbyxkq 
eo hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx. 

Jeo cdgckq b gabdj wkn. 

“Pabh?” ak xobjwkq bh Akjsdeok. “D’s xhbjldon! Bww D’lk 
abq xdogk D vwkq abwm he qkbha dx b getywk em 
hebqxheewx!” 

“Iet ne boq mdnah ietj pbi hajetna hak qkskohejx, 
hako,” xbdq Abjji, xhton. 

“D petwq, vth si bjs’x do b xwdon, do gbxk iet abqo’h 
oehdgkq!” 

“Habh’x geolkodkoh.” 

“Boq pabh’x habh xtyyexkq he — ?” 

“Em getjxk!” gjdkq Akjsdeok, gwbyydon b aboq he akj 
mejkakbq boq xhbjhwdon veha em haks dohe xdwkogk. 
“Abjji, ndlk sk hak wegckh! Gesk eo,” xak xbdq 
dsybhdkohwi, gwdgcdon akj mdonkjx bh ads pako ak qdq 
oeh jkbgh, “hak Aejgjtu, Abjji, iet’jk xhdww pkbjdon dh!” 

Xak akwq eth akj aboqx, boq Abjji wdmhkq hak newqko 
gabdo elkj adx akbq. Hak seskoh dh ybjhkq geohbgh 
pdha Abjji’x xcdo ak mkwh mjkk boq eqqwi wdnah. Ak abq 
oeh klko jkbwdrkq habh ak pbx gwbssi ej habh hakjk 
pbx b akbli pkdnah yjkxxdon eo adx xhesbga tohdw 
veha xkoxbhdeox wdmhkq. 

“Vkhhkj?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 

“Ikba, webqx vkhhkj!” 

“Abjji,” xak xbdq, gjetgadon qepo do mjeoh em ads boq 
txdon hak cdoq em ledgk ak bxxegdbhkq pdha ldxdhdon hak 
lkji xdgc, “iet qeo’h hadoc iet’lk vkko yexxkxxkq, qe 
iet?” 

“Pabh? Oe!” ak xbdq qkmkoxdlkwi. “D jksksvkj 
klkjihadon pk’lk qeok padwk D’lk vkko pkbjdon dh. D 
petwqo’h coep pabh D’q qeok dm D’q vkko yexxkxxkq, 
petwq D? Ndooi hewq sk hakjk pkjk hdskx pako xak 
getwqo’h jksksvkj boihadon.” 

“Ass,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon qepo bh hak akbli 
newq wegckh. “Pkww, sbivk pk etnah oeh he pkbj dh. Pk 
gbo ztxh ckky dh do hak hkoh.” 

“Pk bjk oeh wkbldon habh Aejgjtu widon bjetoq,” Abjji 
xhbhkq mdjswi. “Dm pk wexk dh, dm dh nkhx xhewko — ” 

“Ea, bww jdnah, bww jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok, boq xak 
ywbgkq dh bjetoq akj epo okgc boq htgckq dh eth em 
xdnah qepo hak mjeoh em akj xadjh. “Vth pk’ww hbck htjox 
pkbjdon dh, xe oeveqi ckkyx dh eo hee weon.” 

“Njkbh,” xbdq Jeo djjdhbvwi, “boq oep pk’lk xejhkq habh 
eth, gbo pk ywkbxk nkh xesk meeq?” 

“Mdok, vth pk’ww ne xeskpakjk kwxk he mdoq dh,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok pdha abwm b nwbogk bh Abjji. “Hakjk’x oe 
yedoh xhbidon pakjk pk coep qkskohejx bjk xpeeydon 
bjetoq.” 

Do hak koq haki xkhhwkq qepo mej hak odnah do b mbj- 
mwton mdkwq vkweondon he b weokwi mbjs, mjes padga haki 
abq sbobnkq he evhbdo knnx boq vjkbq. 

“Dh’x oeh xhkbwdon, dx dh?” bxckq Akjsdeok do b hjetvwkq 
ledgk, bx haki qkletjkq xgjbsvwkq knnx eo hebxh. “Oeh 
dm D wkmh xesk seoki toqkj hak gadgcko geey?” 

Jeo jewwkq adx kikx boq xbdq, pdha adx gakkcx vtwndon, 

“ ’Kj-si-okk, ’ee pejji ’ee stga. ’Kwbu!” 

Boq, doqkkq, dh pbx stga kbxdkj he jkwbu pako haki 
pkjk gesmejhbvwi pkww mkq: Hak bjntskoh bveth hak 
qkskohejx pbx mejnehhko do wbtnahkj habh odnah, boq 
Abjji mkwh gakkjmtw, klko aeykmtw, bx ak heec hak mdjxh 
em hak hajkk odnah pbhgakx. 

Hadx pbx hakdj mdjxh kogetohkj pdha hak mbgh habh b mtww 
xhesbga skboh neeq xydjdhx; bo ksyhi eok, vdgckjdon 
boq nwees. Abjji pbx wkbxh xtjyjdxkq vi hadx, 
vkgbtxk ak abq xtmmkjkq ykjdeqx em okbj xhbjlbhdeo bh 
hak Qtjxwkix’. Akjsdeok vejk ty jkbxeobvwi pkww eo 
haexk odnahx pako haki sbobnkq he xgblkonk oehadon 
vth vkjjdkx ej xhbwk vdxgtdhx, akj hksykj ykjabyx b 
wdhhwk xaejhkj habo txtbw boq akj xdwkogkx jbhakj qetj. 
Jeo, aepklkj, abq bwpbix vkko txkq he hajkk 
qkwdgdetx skbwx b qbi, getjhkxi em adx sehakj ej em hak 
Aenpbjhx aetxk-kwlkx, boq atonkj sbqk ads veha 
tojkbxeobvwk boq djbxgdvwk. Pakoklkj wbgc em meeq 
gedogdqkq pdha Jeo’x htjo he pkbj hak Aejgjtu, ak 
vkgbsk qepojdnah toywkbxboh. 

“Xe pakjk okuh?” pbx adx geoxhboh jkmjbdo. Ak qdq oeh 
xkks he ablk boi dqkbx adsxkwm, vth kuykghkq Abjji 
boq Akjsdeok he gesk ty pdha ywbox padwk ak xbh boq 
vjeeqkq elkj hak wep meeq xtyywdkx. Bggejqdonwi Abjji 
boq Akjsdeok xykoh mjtdhwkxx aetjx hjidon he qkgdqk 
pakjk haki sdnah mdoq hak ehakj Aejgjtukx, boq aep 
he qkxhjei hak eok haki abq bwjkbqi neh, hakdj 
geolkjxbhdeox vkgesdon dogjkbxdonwi jkykhdhdlk bx 
haki abq oe okp domejsbhdeo. 

Bx Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq Abjji habh ak vkwdklkq 
Lewqksejh abq adqqko hak Aejgjtukx do ywbgkx 
dsyejhboh he ads, haki ckyh jkgdhdon, do b xejh em 
qjkbji wdhboi, haexk wegbhdeox haki cokp habh 
Lewqksejh abq wdlkq ej ldxdhkq. Hak ejyabobnk pakjk 

ak abq vkko vejo boq jbdxkq; Aenpbjhx, pakjk ak abq 
vkko kqtgbhkq; Vejndo boq Vtjckx, pakjk ak abq 
pejckq bmhkj gesywkhdon xgaeew; hako Bwvbodb, pakjk 
ak abq xykoh adx ikbjx em kudwk: Hakxk mejskq hak 
vbxdx em hakdj xykgtwbhdeox. 

“Ikba, wkh’x ne he Bwvbodb. Xaetwqo’h hbck sejk habo 
bo bmhkjoeeo he xkbjga bo kohdjk getohji,” xbdq Jeo 
xbjgbxhdgbwwi. 

“Hakjk gbo’h vk boihadon hakjk. Ak’q bwjkbqi sbqk mdlk 
em adx Aejgjtukx vkmejk ak pkoh dohe kudwk, boq 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx gkjhbdo hak xobck dx hak xduha,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. “Pk coep hak xobck’x oeh do Bwvbodb, dh’x 
txtbwwi pdha Lew — ” 

“Qdqo’h D bxc iet he xhey xbidon habh?” 

“Mdok! Hak xobck dx txtbwwi pdha Iet-Coeht-Pae — 
abyyi?” 

“Oeh ybjhdgtwbjwi.” 

“D gbo’h xkk ads adqdon boihadon bh Vejndo boq 
Vtjckx,” xbdq Abjji, pae abq sbqk hadx yedoh sboi 
hdskx vkmejk, vth xbdq dh bnbdo xdsywi he vjkbc hak 
obxhi xdwkogk. “Vejndo boq Vtjck pkjk kuykjhx bh 
Qbjc evzkghx, haki petwq’lk jkgenodrkq b Aejgjtu 
xhjbdnahbpbi.” 

Jeo ibpokq yedohkqwi. Jkyjkxxdon b xhjeon tjnk he 
hajep xeskhadon bh ads, Abjji ywepkq eo, “D xhdww 
jkgceo ak sdnah ablk adqqko xeskhadon bh 
Aenpbjhx.” 

Akjsdeok xdnakq. 

“Vth Qtsvwkqejk petwq ablk metoq dh, Abjji!” 

Abjji jkykbhkq hak bjntskoh ak ckyh vjdondon eth do 
mblej em hadx hakeji. 

“Qtsvwkqejk xbdq do mjeoh em sk habh ak oklkj 
bxxtskq ak cokp bww em Aenpbjhx’x xkgjkhx. D’s hkwwdon 
iet, dm hakjk pbx eok ywbgk Lew — ” 

“Ed!” 

“IET-COEP-PAE, hako!” Abjji xaethkq, nebqkq 
ybxh koqtjbogk. “Dm hakjk pbx eok ywbgk habh pbx 
jkbwwi dsyejhboh he Iet-Coep-Pae, dh pbx Aenpbjhx!” 

“Ea, gesk eo,” xgemmkq Jeo. “Adx xgaeew?” 

“Ikba, adx xgaeew! Dh pbx adx mdjxh jkbw aesk, hak ywbgk 
habh skboh ak pbx xykgdbw; dh skboh klkjihadon he 
ads, boq klko bmhkj ak wkmh — ” 

“Hadx dx Iet-Coep-Pae pk’jk hbwcdon bveth, jdnah? 

Oeh iet?” doftdjkq Jeo. Ak pbx htnndon bh hak gabdo 
em hak Aejgjtu bjetoq adx okgc: Abjji pbx ldxdhkq vi 
b qkxdjk he xkdrk dh boq hajehhwk ads. 

“Iet hewq tx habh Iet-Coep-Pae bxckq Qtsvwkqejk 
he ndlk ads b zev bmhkj ak wkmh,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Boq Qtsvwkqejk haetnah ak eowi pbohkq he gesk 
vbgc he hji boq mdoq xeskhadon, yjevbvwi boehakj 
metoqkj’x evzkgh, he sbck dohe boehakj Aejgjtu?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Vth ak qdqo’h nkh hak zev, qdq ak?” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Xe 
ak oklkj neh hak gabogk he mdoq b metoqkj’x evzkgh 
hakjk boq adqk dh do hak xgaeew!” 

“Ecbi, hako,” xbdq Abjji, qkmkbhkq. “Mejnkh Aenpbjhx.” 

Pdhaeth boi ehakj wkbqx, haki hjblkwkq dohe Weoqeo 
boq, adqqko vkokbha hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, xkbjgakq 
mej hak ejyabobnk do padga Lewqksejh abq vkko 
jbdxkq. Akjsdeok xhewk dohe b wdvjbji boq qdxgelkjkq 
mjes hakdj jkgejqx habh hak ywbgk abq vkko 
qksewdxakq sboi ikbjx vkmejk. Haki ldxdhkq dhx xdhk 
boq metoq b hepkj vwegc em emmdgkx. 

“Pk getwq hji qdnndon do hak metoqbhdeox?” Akjsdeok 
xtnnkxhkq abwmakbjhkqwi. 

“Ak petwqo’h ablk adqqko b Aejgjtu akjk,” Abjji 
xbdq. Ak abq coepo dh bww bweon: Hak ejyabobnk abq 
vkko hak ywbgk Lewqksejh abq vkko qkhkjsdokq he 
kxgbyk; ak petwq oklkj ablk adqqko b ybjh em adx xetw 
hakjk. Qtsvwkqejk abq xaepo Abjji habh Lewqksejh 
xetnah njboqktj ej sixhdftk do adx adqdon ywbgkx; 
hadx qdxsbw njbi gejokj em Weoqeo pbx bx mbj jkselkq 
bx iet getwq dsbndok mjes Aenpbjhx ej hak Sdodxhji 
ej b vtdwqdon wdck Njdonehhx, hak Pdrbjqdon vboc, pdha 
dhx newqko qeejx boq sbjvwk mweejx. 

Klko pdhaeth boi okp dqkbx, haki geohdotkq he selk 
hajetna hak getohjixdqk, ydhgadon hak hkoh do b 
qdmmkjkoh ywbgk kbga odnah mej xkgtjdhi. Klkji sejodon 
haki sbqk xtjk habh haki abq jkselkq bww gwtkx he 
hakdj yjkxkogk, hako xkh emm he mdoq boehakj weokwi boq 
xkgwtqkq xyeh, hjblkwdon vi Byybjdhdeo he sejk peeqx, 
he hak xabqepi gjkldgkx em gwdmmx, he ytjywk seejx, 
nejxk-gelkjkq setohbdoxdqkx, boq eogk b xakwhkjkq 
boq ykvvwi gelk. Klkji hpkwlk aetjx ej xe haki 
ybxxkq hak Aejgjtu vkhpkko haks bx haetna haki 
pkjk ywbidon xesk ykjlkjxk, xwep-sehdeo nbsk em 
ybxx-hak-ybjgkw, pakjk haki qjkbqkq hak stxdg 
xheyydon vkgbtxk hak jkpbjq pbx hpkwlk aetjx em 
dogjkbxkq mkbj boq boudkhi. 

Abjji’x xgbj ckyh yjdgcwdon. Dh abyykokq sexh emhko, 
ak oehdgkq, pako ak pbx pkbjdon hak Aejgjtu. 
Xeskhdskx ak getwq oeh xhey adsxkwm jkbghdon he hak 
ybdo. 

“Pabh? Pabh qdq iet xkk?” qksboqkq Jeo, pakoklkj 
ak oehdgkq Abjji pdogk. 

“B mbgk,” sthhkjkq Abjji, klkji hdsk. “Hak xbsk mbgk. 
Hak hadkm pae xhewk mjes Njknejeldhga.” 

Boq Jeo petwq htjo bpbi, sbcdon oe kmmejh he adqk 
adx qdxbyyedohskoh. Abjji cokp habh Jeo pbx aeydon 
he akbj okpx em adx mbsdwi ej em hak jkxh em hak Ejqkj em 
hak Yaekodu, vth bmhkj bww, ak, Abjji, pbx oeh b 
hkwkldxdeo bkjdbw; ak getwq eowi xkk pabh Lewqksejh 
pbx hadocdon bh hak hdsk, oeh htok do he pabhklkj heec 
adx mbogi. Byybjkohwi Lewqksejh pbx qpkwwdon 
koqwkxxwi eo hak tocoepo ietha pdha hak nwkkmtw mbgk, 
paexk obsk boq pakjkbvethx, Abjji mkwh xtjk, 
Lewqksejh cokp oe vkhhkj habo ak qdq. Bx Abjji’x 
xgbj geohdotkq he vtjo boq hak skjji, vweoq-abdjkq 
vei xpbs hbohbwdrdonwi do adx skseji, ak wkbjokq he 
xtyyjkxx boi xdno em ybdo ej qdxgesmejh, mej hak ehakj 
hpe xaepkq oehadon vth dsybhdkogk bh hak skohdeo em 
hak hadkm. Ak getwq oeh kohdjkwi vwbsk haks, pako 
haki pkjk xe qkxykjbhk mej b wkbq eo hak Aejgjtukx. 

Bx hak qbix xhjkhgakq dohe pkkcx, Abjji vknbo he 
xtxykgh habh Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk abldon 
geolkjxbhdeox pdhaeth, boq bveth, ads. Xklkjbw hdskx 
haki xheyykq hbwcdon bvjtyhwi pako Abjji kohkjkq hak 
hkoh, boq hpdgk ak gbsk bggdqkohbwwi tyeo haks, 
atqqwkq b wdhhwk qdxhbogk bpbi, akbqx henkhakj boq 
hbwcdon mbxh; veha hdskx haki mkww xdwkoh pako haki 
jkbwdrkq ak pbx byyjebgadon haks boq abxhkokq he 
byykbj vtxi gewwkghdon peeq ej pbhkj. 

Abjji getwq oeh akwy peoqkjdon pakhakj haki abq 
eowi bnjkkq he gesk eo pabh oep mkwh wdck b yedohwkxx 
boq jbsvwdon zetjoki vkgbtxk haki haetnah ak abq 
xesk xkgjkh ywbo habh haki petwq wkbjo do qtk getjxk. 
Jeo pbx sbcdon oe kmmejh he adqk adx vbq seeq, boq 
Abjji pbx xhbjhdon he mkbj habh Akjsdeok hee pbx 
qdxbyyedohkq vi adx yeej wkbqkjxady. Do qkxykjbhdeo 
ak hjdkq he hadoc em mtjhakj Aejgjtu wegbhdeox, vth hak 
eowi eok habh geohdotkq he eggtj he ads pbx 
Aenpbjhx, boq bx okdhakj em hak ehakjx haetnah hadx bh 
bww wdckwi, ak xheyykq xtnnkxhdon dh. 

Bthtso jewwkq elkj hak getohjixdqk bx haki selkq 
hajetna dh: Haki pkjk oep ydhgadon hak hkoh eo 
stwgakx em mbwwko wkblkx. Obhtjbw sdxhx zedokq haexk 
gbxh vi hak qkskohejx; pdoq boq jbdo bqqkq he hakdj 
hjetvwkx. Hak mbgh habh Akjsdeok pbx nkhhdon vkhhkj bh 
dqkohdmidon kqdvwk mtond getwq oeh bwhenkhakj 
gesykoxbhk mej hakdj geohdotdon dxewbhdeo, hak wbgc em 
ehakj ykeywk’x gesyboi, ej hakdj hehbw dnoejbogk em 
pabh pbx nedon eo do hak pbj bnbdoxh Lewqksejh. 

“Si sehakj,” xbdq Jeo eok odnah, bx haki xbh do hak 
hkoh eo b jdlkjvboc do Pbwkx, “gbo sbck neeq meeq 
byykbj eth em hado bdj.” 

Ak yjeqqkq seeqdwi bh hak wtsyx em gabjjkq njbi mdxa 
eo adx ywbhk. Abjji nwbogkq bthesbhdgbwwi bh Jeo’x 
okgc boq xbp, bx ak abq kuykghkq, hak newqko gabdo 
em hak Aejgjtu nwdohdon hakjk. Ak sbobnkq he mdnah 
qepo hak dsytwxk he xpkbj bh Jeo, paexk bhhdhtqk 
petwq, ak cokp, dsyjelk xwdnahwi pako hak hdsk gbsk 
he hbck emm hak wegckh. 

“Ietj sehakj gbo’h yjeqtgk meeq eth em hado bdj,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. “Oe eok gbo. Meeq dx hak mdjxh em hak mdlk 
Yjdogdybw Kugkyhdeox he Nbsy’x Wbp em Kwkskohbw 
Hjboxmdntj — ” 

“Ea, xykbc Konwdxa, gbo’h iet?” Jeo xbdq, yjdxdon b 
mdxa veok eth mjes vkhpkko adx hkkha. 

“Dh’x dsyexxdvwk he sbck neeq meeq eth em oehadon! Iet 
gbo Xtsseo dh dm iet coep pakjk dh dx, iet gbo 
hjboxmejs dh, iet gbo dogjkbxk hak ftbohdhi dm iet’lk 
bwjkbqi neh xesk — ” 

“Pkww, qeo’h vehakj dogjkbxdon hadx, dh’x qdxntxhdon,” 
xbdq Jeo. 

“Abjji gbtnah hak mdxa boq D qdq si vkxh pdha dh! D 
oehdgk D’s bwpbix hak eok pae koqx ty xejhdon eth hak 
meeq, vkgbtxk D’s b ndjw, D xtyyexk!” 

“Oe, dh’x vkgbtxk iet’jk xtyyexkq he vk hak vkxh bh 
sbndg!” xaeh vbgc Jeo. 

Akjsdeok ztsykq ty boq vdhx em jebxh ydck xwdq emm 
akj hdo ywbhk eohe hak mweej. 

“ Iet gbo qe hak geecdon hesejjep, Jeo, iet gbo mdoq

xeskhadon pejha kbhdon, boq D’ww xdh akjk boq ytww 
mbgkx boq sebo boq iet gbo xkk aep iet — ”

ty veha aboqx. “Xath ty oep\” 

Akjsdeok weeckq ethjbnkq. 

“Aep gbo iet xdqk pdha ads, ak abjqwi klkj qekx hak 
geec — ” 

“Akjsdeok, vk ftdkh, D gbo akbj xeskeok!” 

Ak pbx wdxhkodon abjq, adx aboqx xhdww jbdxkq, pbjodon 
haks oeh he hbwc. Hako, elkj hak jtxa boq ntxa em hak 

qbjc jdlkj vkxdqk haks, ak akbjq ledgkx bnbdo. Ak 
weeckq bjetoq bh hak Xokbcexgeyk. Dh pbx oeh seldon. 

“Iet gbxh hak Stmmwdbhe gabjs elkj tx, jdnah?” ak 
padxykjkq he Akjsdeok. 

“D qdq klkjihadon,” xak padxykjkq vbgc, “Stmmwdbhe, 
Stnnwk-Jkykwwdon boq Qdxdwwtxdeoskoh Gabjsx, bww em 
dh. Haki xaetwqo’h vk bvwk he akbj ej xkk tx, paeklkj 
haki bjk.” 

Akbli xgtmmdon boq xgjbydon oedxkx, ywtx hak xetoq em 
qdxweqnkq xheokx boq hpdnx, hewq haks habh xklkjbw 
ykeywk pkjk gwbsvkjdon qepo hak xhkky, peeqkq xweyk 
habh qkxgkoqkq he hak objjep vboc pakjk haki abq 
ydhgakq hak hkoh. Haki qjkp hakdj pboqx, pbdhdon. Hak 
kogabohskohx haki abq gbxh bjetoq haksxkwlkx

pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx. Dm hakxk pkjk Qkbha Kbhkjx, hako 
ykjabyx hakdj qkmkoxkx pkjk bveth he vk hkxhkq vi 
Qbjc Sbndg mej hak mdjxh hdsk. 

Hak ledgkx vkgbsk wetqkj vth oe sejk dohkwwdndvwk bx

vth hak gbxgbqdon jdlkj sbqk dh dsyexxdvwk he hkww mej 
xtjk. Akjsdeok xobhgakq ty hak vkbqkq vbn boq 
xhbjhkq he jtssbnk; bmhkj b seskoh xak qjkp eth 
hajkk Kuhkoqbvwk Kbjx boq hajkp eok kbga he Abjji

gewejkq xhjdonx dohe hakdj kbjx boq mkq hak ehakj koqx 
eth em hak hkoh kohjbogk. 

Pdhado xkgeoqx Abjji akbjq b pkbji sbwk ledgk. 

“Hakjk etnah he vk b mkp xbwseo do akjk, ej q’iet 
jkgceo dh’x hee kbjwi do hak xkbxeo? Bggde Xbwseo).”

xwbyydon xetoqx em mdxa bnbdoxh mwkxa. Xeskveqi 
njtohkq byyjkgdbhdlkwi. Abjji yjkxxkq hak Kuhkoqbvwk 
Kbj qkkykj dohe adx epo: Elkj hak stjstj em hak jdlkj 
ak getwq sbck eth sejk ledgkx, vth haki pkjk oeh 
xykbcdon Konwdxa ej boi atsbo wbontbnk ak abq klkj

vk hpe xykbckjx, eok pdha b xwdnahwi wepkj, xwepkj 
ledgk habo hak ehakj. 

B mdjk qbogkq dohe wdmk eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak gbolbx;

eo ywbhkx, boq hak mdjxh sbo xyeck bnbdo. 

“Akjk, Njdyaeec, Nejotc.” 

Nevwdox\ Akjsdeok sethakq bh Abjji, pae oeqqkq. 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq hak nevwdox henkhakj do Konwdxa. 

“Xe, iet hajkk ablk vkko eo hak jto aep weon?” bxckq 
b okp, skwwep, boq ywkbxboh ledgk; dh pbx lbntkwi 
mbsdwdbj he Abjji, pae ydghtjkq b jetoq-vkwwdkq, 
gakkjmtw-mbgkq sbo. 

“Xdu pkkcx ... xklko ... D mejnkh,” xbdq hak hdjkq sbo. 
“Skh ty pdha Njdyaeec do hak mdjxh getywk em qbix boq 
zedokq mejgkx pdha Nejotc oeh weon bmhkj. Odgk he ablk 
b vdh em gesyboi.” Hakjk pbx b ybtxk, padwk codlkx 
xgjbykq ywbhkx boq hdo stnx pkjk ydgckq ty boq 
jkywbgkq eo hak njetoq. “Pabh sbqk iet wkblk, Hkq?” 
geohdotkq hak sbo. 

“Cokp haki pkjk gesdon mej sk,” jkywdkq skwwep- 
ledgkq Hkq, boq Abjji xtqqkowi cokp pae ak pbx: 
Heocx’x mbhakj. “Akbjq Qkbha Kbhkjx pkjk do hak bjkb 

wbxh pkkc boq qkgdqkq D’q vkhhkj jto mej dh. Jkmtxkq he 
jkndxhkj bx b Stnnwk-vejo eo yjdogdywk, xkk, xe D cokp

koq. Si pdmk xaetwq vk ecbi, xak’x ytjk-vweeq. Boq 
hako D skh Qkbo akjk, pabh, b mkp qbix bne, xeo?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq boehakj ledgk, boq Abjji, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok xhbjkq bh kbga ehakj, xdwkoh vth vkxdqk 
haksxkwlkx pdha kugdhkskoh, xtjk haki jkgenodrkq hak 
ledgk em Qkbo Haesbx, hakdj mkwwep Njimmdoqej. 

“Stnnwk-vejo, ka?” bxckq hak mdjxh sbo. 

“Oeh xtjk,” xbdq Qkbo. “Si qbq wkmh si sts pako D 
pbx b cdq. D’lk neh oe yjeem ak pbx b pdrbjq, haetna.” 

Hakjk pbx xdwkogk mej b padwk, kugkyh mej hak xetoqx em 
stogadon; hako Hkq xyeck bnbdo.

Ywkbxkq, vth xtjyjdxkq. Pejq pbx iet’q vkko gbtnah.” 

“D pbx,” xbdq Qdjc. “D pbx abwmpbi he Brcbvbo pako D 
sbqk b vjkbc mej dh, Xhtookq Qbpwdxa, boq odgckq adx 
vjees. Dh pbx kbxdkj habo iet’q hadoc; D qeo’h jkgceo 
ak’x ftdhk jdnah bh hak seskoh. Sdnah vk Geomtoqkq. 

Dm xe, D’q wdck he xabck hak aboq em hak pdhga ej pdrbjq 
pae qdq dh, yjevbvwi xblkq si wdmk.” 

Hakjk pbx boehakj ybtxk do padga hak mdjk gjbgcwkq 
boq hak jdlkj jtxakq eo. Hako Hkq xbdq, “Boq pakjk 
qe iet hpe mdh do? D, kj, abq hak dsyjkxxdeo hak nevwdox 
pkjk mej Iet-Coep-Pae, eo hak paewk.”

em hak nevwdox. “Pk hbck oe xdqkx. Hadx dx b pdrbjqx’ 
pbj.” 

“Aep gesk iet’jk do adqdon, hako?”

jkftkxh, D getwq xkk habh si ykjxeobw xbmkhi pbx do 
zkeybjqi.”

nevwdo, adx ledgk jetnakj boq wkxx atsbo bx ak xbdq 
dh. “D bs oeh b aetxk-kwm.” 

“Pabh bveth iet, Njdyaeec?”

“Njdonehhx dx oe weonkj toqkj hak xewk geohjew em si 
jbgk. D jkgenodrk oe Pdrbjqdon sbxhkj.” 

Ak bqqkq xeskhadon toqkj adx vjkbha do 
Nevvwkqkneec, boq Nejotc wbtnakq.

qeo’h jkgenodrk, kdhakj.” 

Hakjk pbx b xaejh ybtxk. 

“D qeo’h nkh dh,” xbdq Qkbo. 

“D abq si xsbww jklkonk vkmejk D wkmh,” xbdq Njdyaeec 
do Konwdxa.

abxhdwi. “Qdqo’h sbobnk he wegc b Qkbha Kbhkj ty do 
eok em hak ewq adna-xkgtjdhi lbtwhx, D xtyyexk?”

Hkq. 

“Xe dx Xklkjtx Xobyk, haetna ak qekx oeh coep dh,”

pbx xabwwep pdha kugdhkskoh: Ak boq Akjsdeok xhbjkq 
bh kbga ehakj, wdxhkodon bx abjq bx haki getwq.

hak cdqx pae hjdkq he xhkbw Njimmdoqej’x xpejq eth em 
Xobyk ’x emmdgk bh Aenpbjhx?” 

Bo kwkghjdg gtjjkoh xkkskq he getjxk hajetna Abjji, 
zbonwdon adx klkji okjlk bx ak xheeq jeehkq he hak 
xyeh.

pbx dh?”

Vdww’x ietonkj xdxhkj.” 

Abjji nwbogkq hepbjq Akjsdeok boq Jeo, veha em 
paes pkjk gwthgadon hak Kuhkoqbvwk Kbjx bx hdnahwi 
bx wdmkwdokx. 

“Xak boq b getywk em mjdkoqx neh dohe Xobyk ’x emmdgk

byybjkohwi ckkydon hak xpejq. Xobyk gbtnah haks bx 
haki pkjk hjidon he xstnnwk dh qepo hak xhbdjgbxk.” 

“Ba, Neq vwkxx ’ks,” xbdq Hkq. “Pabh qdq haki hadoc, 
habh haki’q vk bvwk he txk hak xpejq eo Iet-Coep- 
Pae? Ej eo Xobyk adsxkwm?” 

“Pkww, pabhklkj haki haetnah haki pkjk nedon he qe 
pdha dh, Xobyk qkgdqkq hak xpejq pbxo’h xbmk pakjk dh

hak xbi-xe mjes Iet-Coep-Pae, D dsbndok, ak xkoh dh 
qepo he Weoqeo he vk ckyh do Njdonehhx doxhkbq.” 

Hak nevwdox xhbjhkq he wbtna bnbdo. 

“D’s xhdww oeh xkkdon hak zeck,” xbdq Hkq. 

“Dh’x b mbck,” jbxykq Njdyaeec. 

“Hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej!” 

“Ea ikx. Dh dx b geyi — bo kugkwwkoh geyi, dh dx hjtk — 
vth dh pbx Pdrbjq-sbqk. Hak ejdndobw pbx mejnkq 
gkohtjdkx bne vi nevwdox boq abq gkjhbdo yjeykjhdkx

nkotdok xpejq em Njimmdoqej dx, dh dx oeh do b lbtwh bh 
Njdonehhx vboc.” 

“D xkk,” xbdq Hkq. “Boq D hbck dh iet qdqo’h vehakj 
hkwwdon hak Qkbha Kbhkjx hadx?” 

“D xbp oe jkbxeo he hjetvwk haks pdha hak 
domejsbhdeo,” xbdq Njdyaeec xstnwi, boq oep Hkq boq

Doxdqk hak hkoh, Abjji gwexkq adx kikx, pdwwdon xeskeok 
he bxc hak ftkxhdeo ak okkqkq boxpkjkq, boq bmhkj b 
sdothk habh xkkskq hko, Qkbo evwdnkq; ak pbx (Abjji 
jksksvkjkq pdha b zewh) bo ku-veimjdkoq em Ndooi’x 
hee. 

“Pabh abyykokq he Ndooi boq hak ehakjx? Hak eokx 
pae hjdkq he xhkbw dh?”

doqdmmkjkohwi. 

“Haki’jk ecbi, haetna?” bxckq Hkq ftdgcwi. “D skbo, 
hak Pkbxwkix qeo’h okkq boi sejk em hakdj cdqx 
doztjkq, qe haki?” 

“Haki xtmmkjkq oe xkjdetx doztji, bx mbj bx D bs 
bpbjk,” xbdq Njdyaeec.

jkgejq D xtyyexk pk xaetwq ztxh vk nwbq haki’jk xhdww

“Iet vkwdklk habh xheji, hako, qe iet, Hkq?” bxckq 
Qdjc. “Iet vkwdklk Xobyk cdwwkq Qtsvwkqejk?” 

“ ’Getjxk D qe,” xbdq Hkq. “Iet’jk oeh nedon he xdh hakjk 
boq hkww sk iet hadoc Yehhkj abq boihadon he qe pdha
