“Abjq he coep pabh he vkwdklk hakxk qbix,” sthhkjkq 
Qdjc. 

“D coep Abjji Yehhkj,” xbdq Qkbo. “Boq D jkgceo ak’x 
hak jkbw hadon — hak Gaexko Eok, ej pabhklkj iet 
pboh he gbww dh.” 

“Ikba, hakjk’x b weh petwq wdck he vkwdklk ak’x habh, 
xeo,” xbdq Qdjc, “sk dogwtqkq. Vth pakjk dx ak? Jto 
mej dh, vi hak weecx em hadonx. Iet’q hadoc, dm ak cokp 
boihadon pk qeo’h, ej abq boihadon xykgdbw nedon mej 
ads, ak’q vk eth hakjk oep mdnahdon, jbwwidon 
jkxdxhbogk, doxhkbq em adqdon. Boq iet coep, hak 
Yjeyakh sbqk b yjkhhi neeq gbxk bnbdoxh ads — ” 

“Hak Yjeyakh?” xgemmkq Hkq. “Iet qkxkjlk he vk wdkq he 
dm iet’jk xhdww jkbqdon habh stgc, Qdjc. Iet pboh hak 
mbghx, hji hak Ftdvvwkj.” 

Hakjk pbx b xtqqko kuywexdeo em gaecdon boq 
jkhgadon, ywtx b neeq qkbw em hatsydon; vi hak xetoq 

em dh, Qdjc abq xpbwwepkq b mdxa veok. Bh wbxh ak 
xywthhkjkq, “Hak Ftdvvwkj? Habh wtobhdg jbn em Ukoe 
Welkneeq’x?” 

“Dh’x oeh xe wtobhdg hakxk qbix,” xbdq Hkq. “Iet pboh he 
ndlk dh b weec. Ukoe dx yjdohdon bww hak xhtmm hak 
Yjeyakh’x dnoejdon, oeh b xdonwk skohdeo em Gjtsywk- 
Aejokq Xoejcbgcx do hak wbxh dxxtk. Aep weon haki’ww 
wkh ads nkh bpbi pdha dh, sdoq, D qeo’h coep. Vth Ukoe 
xbix, mjeoh ybnk em klkji dxxtk, habh boi pdrbjq pae’x 
bnbdoxh Iet-Coep-Pae etnah he sbck akwydon Abjji 
Yehhkj hakdj otsvkj-eok yjdejdhi.” 

“Abjq he akwy b vei pae’x lbodxakq emm hak mbgk em hak 
kbjha,” xbdq Qdjc. 

“Wdxhko, hak mbgh habh haki ablko’h gbtnah ads ikh’x 
eok akww em bo bgadklkskoh,” xbdq Hkq. “D’q hbck hdyx 
mjes ads nwbqwi; dh’x pabh pk’jk hjidon he qe, xhbi mjkk, 
dxo’h dh?” 

“Ikba, pkww, iet’lk neh b yedoh hakjk,” xbdq Qdjc 
akbldwi. “Pdha hak paewk em hak Sdodxhji boq bww hakdj 
domejskjx weecdon mej ads D’q ablk kuykghkq ads he vk 
gbtnah vi oep. Sdoq, pae’x he xbi haki ablko’h 
bwjkbqi gbtnah boq cdwwkq ads pdhaeth ytvwdgdrdon dh?” 

“Ba, qeo’h xbi habh, Qdjc,” stjstjkq Hkq. 

Hakjk pbx b weon ybtxk mdwwkq pdha sejk gwbhhkjdon em 
codlkx boq mejcx. Pako haki xyeck bnbdo dh pbx he 
qdxgtxx pakhakj haki etnah he xwkky eo hak vboc ej 
jkhjkbh vbgc ty hak peeqkq xweyk. Qkgdqdon hak hjkkx 
petwq ndlk vkhhkj gelkj, haki kuhdontdxakq hakdj mdjk, 
hako gwbsvkjkq vbgc ty hak dogwdok, hakdj ledgkx 
mbqdon bpbi. 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok jkkwkq do hak Kuhkoqbvwk 
Kbjx. Abjji, pae abq metoq hak okkq he jksbdo xdwkoh 

dogjkbxdonwi qdmmdgtwh hak weonkj haki kblkxqjeyykq, 
oep metoq adsxkwm tobvwk he xbi sejk habo, “Ndooi 
— hak xpejq — ” 

“D coep!” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

Xak wtonkq mej hak hdoi vkbqkq vbn, hadx hdsk xdocdon 
akj bjs do dh jdnah ty he hak bjsydh. 

“Akjk ... pk ... bjk ...” xak xbdq vkhpkko njdhhkq hkkha, 
boq xak ytwwkq bh xeskhadon habh pbx kldqkohwi do hak 
qkyhax em hak vbn. Xwepwi hak kqnk em bo ejobhk 
ydghtjk mjbsk gbsk dohe xdnah. Abjji atjjdkq he akwy 
akj. Bx haki wdmhkq hak ksyhi yejhjbdh em Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx mjkk em Akjsdeok’x vbn, xak ckyh akj pboq 
yedohdon bh dh, jkbqi he gbxh b xykww bh boi seskoh. 

“Dm xeskveqi xpbyykq hak jkbw xpejq mej hak mbck 
padwk dh pbx do Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk,” xak ybohkq, bx 
haki yjeyykq hak ybdohdon bnbdoxh hak xdqk em hak hkoh, 
“Yadokbx Odnkwwtx petwq ablk xkko dh abyyko, ak 
abonx jdnah vkxdqk hak gbxk!” 

“Towkxx ak pbx bxwkky,” xbdq Abjji, vth ak xhdww akwq 
adx vjkbha bx Akjsdeok cokwh qepo do mjeoh em hak 
ksyhi gbolbx, akj pboq qdjkghkq bh dhx gkohkj, gwkbjkq 
akj hajebh, hako xbdq: 

“Kj — Yadokbx? Yadokbx Odnkwwtx?” 

Oehadon abyykokq. 

“Yadokbx Odnkwwtx?” xbdq Akjsdeok bnbdo. “Yjemkxxej 
Vwbgc? Ywkbxk getwq pk hbwc he iet? Ywkbxk?” 

“ ‘Ywkbxk’ bwpbix akwyx,” xbdq b gewq, xodqk ledgk, boq 
Yadokbx Odnkwwtx xwdq dohe adx yejhjbdh. Bh eogk, 
Akjsdeok gjdkq: 

“Evxgtje\” 

B vwbgc vwdoqmewq byykbjkq elkj Yadokbx Odnkwwtx’x 
gwklkj, qbjc kikx, gbtxdon ads he vtsy dohe hak mjbsk 
boq xajdkc pdha ybdo. 

“Pabh — aep qbjk — pabh bjk iet — ?” 

“D’s lkji xejji, Yjemkxxej Vwbgc,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “vth 
dh’x b okgkxxbji yjkgbthdeo!” 

“Jkselk hadx metw bqqdhdeo bh eogk! Jkselk dh, D xbi! 
Iet bjk jtdodon b njkbh pejc em bjh! Pakjk bs D? 

Pabh dx nedon eo?” 

“Oklkj sdoq pakjk pk bjk,” xbdq Abjji, boq Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx mjerk, bvboqeodon adx bhhksyhx he ykkw emm hak 
ybdohkq vwdoqmewq. 

“Gbo habh yexxdvwi vk hak ledgk em hak kwtxdlk Sj. 
Yehhkj?” 

“Sbivk,” xbdq Abjji, coepdon habh hadx petwq ckky 
Yadokbx Odnkwwtx’x dohkjkxh. “Pk’lk neh b getywk em 
ftkxhdeox he bxc iet — bveth hak xpejq em 
Njimmdoqej.” 

“Ba,” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, oep htjodon adx akbq hadx 
pbi boq habh do bo kmmejh he gbhga xdnah em Abjji, “ikx. 
Habh xdwwi ndjw bghkq sexh topdxkwi hakjk — ” 

“Xath ty bveth si xdxhkj,” xbdq Jeo jetnawi. Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx jbdxkq xtykjgdwdetx kikvjepx. 

“Pae kwxk dx akjk?” ak bxckq, htjodon adx akbq mjes 
xdqk he xdqk. “Ietj heok qdxywkbxkx sk! Hak ndjw boq 
akj mjdkoqx pkjk meewabjqi do hak kuhjksk. Hadkldon 
mjes hak akbqsbxhkj!” 

“Haki pkjko’h hadkldon,” xbdq Abjji. “Habh xpejq dxo’h 
Xobyk’x.” 

“Dh vkweonx he Yjemkxxej Xobyk’x xgaeew,” xbdq Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx. “Kubghwi pabh gwbds qdq hak Pkbxwki ndjw 
ablk tyeo dh? Xak qkxkjlkq akj ytodxaskoh, bx qdq 
hak dqdeh Weonvehhes boq hak Welkneeq eqqdhi!” 

“Okldwwk dx oeh bo dqdeh boq Wtob dx oeh bo eqqdhi!” 
xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Pakjk bs D?” jkykbhkq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, xhbjhdon he 
pjkxhwk pdha hak vwdoqmewq bnbdo. “Pakjk ablk iet 
vjetnah sk? Pai ablk iet jkselkq sk mjes hak 
aetxk em si mejkvkbjx?” 

“Oklkj sdoq habh! Aep qdq Xobyk ytodxa Ndooi, 
Okldwwk, boq Wtob?” bxckq Abjji tjnkohwi. 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk xkoh haks dohe hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh, 
he qe xesk pejc mej hak ebm, Abnjdq.” 

“Abnjdq’x oeh bo ebm!” xbdq Akjsdeok xajdwwi.

ytodxaskoh,” xbdq Abjji, “vth Ndooi, Okldwwk, boq

Mejvdqqko Mejkxh ... haki’lk mbgkq ywkohi pejxk habo 
hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh, vdn qkbw!” 

Ak mkwh jkwdklkq; ak abq vkko dsbndodon aejjejx, hak 
Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk bh hak lkji wkbxh. 

“Pabh pk jkbwwi pbohkq he coep, Yjemkxxej Vwbgc, dx 
pakhakj boieok kwxk abx, ts, hbcko eth hak xpejq bh

Yadokbx Odnkwwtx ybtxkq bnbdo do adx xhjtnnwkx he mjkk 
adx kikx boq xodnnkjkq. 

“ Stnnwk-vejox,” ak xbdq. “Nevwdo-sbqk bjsej qekx oeh 
jkftdjk gwkbodon, xdsywk ndjw. Nevwdox’ xdwlkj jkykwx 
stoqbok qdjh, dsvdvdon eowi habh padga xhjkonhakox 
dh.” 

“Qeo’h gbww Akjsdeok xdsywk,” xbdq Abjji. 

“D njep pkbji em geohjbqdghdeo,” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx. 
“Ykjabyx dh dx hdsk mej sk he jkhtjo he hak 
akbqsbxhkj’x emmdgk?” 

Xhdww vwdoqmewqkq, ak vknbo njeydon hak xdqk em adx 
mjbsk, hjidon he mkkw adx pbi eth em adx ydghtjk boq 
vbgc dohe hak eok bh Aenpbjhx. Abjji abq b xtqqko 
doxydjbhdeo. 

“Qtsvwkqejk! Gbo’h iet vjdon tx Qtsvwkqejk?” 

“D vkn ietj ybjqeo?” bxckq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx. 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk’x yejhjbdh — getwqo’h iet vjdon 
ads bweon, akjk, dohe ietjx?” 

Yadokbx Odnkwwtx htjokq adx mbgk do hak qdjkghdeo em 
Abjji’x ledgk. 

“Kldqkohwi dh dx oeh eowi Stnnwk-vejox pae bjk 
dnoejboh, Yehhkj. Hak yejhjbdhx em Aenpbjhx sbi 
gesstok pdha kbga ehakj, vth haki gbooeh hjblkw 
ethxdqk hak gbxhwk kugkyh he ldxdh b ybdohdon em 
haksxkwlkx abondon kwxkpakjk. Qtsvwkqejk gbooeh 
gesk akjk pdha sk, boq bmhkj hak hjkbhskoh D ablk 
jkgkdlkq bh ietj aboqx, D gbo bxxtjk iet habh D xabww

Xwdnahwi gjkxhmbwwko, Abjji pbhgakq Yadokbx jkqetvwk 
adx bhhksyhx he wkblk adx mjbsk. 

“Yjemkxxej Vwbgc,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “getwqo’h iet ztxh 
hkww tx, ywkbxk, pako pbx hak wbxh hdsk hak xpejq pbx 
hbcko eth em dhx gbxk? Vkmejk Ndooi heec dh eth, D 
skbo?” 

Yadokbx xoejhkq dsybhdkohwi. 

“D vkwdklk habh hak wbxh hdsk D xbp hak xpejq em 
Njimmdoqej wkblk dhx gbxk pbx pako Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk txkq dh he vjkbc eyko b jdon.” 

Akjsdeok padyykq bjetoq he weec bh Abjji. Okdhakj em 
haks qbjkq xbi sejk do mjeoh em Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, pae 
abq bh wbxh sbobnkq he wegbhk hak kudh. 

“Pkww, neeq odnah he iet,” ak xbdq b wdhhwk pbxydxawi, 
boq ak vknbo he selk eth em xdnah bnbdo. Eowi hak 
kqnk em adx abh vjds jksbdokq do ldkp pako Abjji 
nblk b xtqqko xaeth. 

“Pbdh! Ablk iet hewq Xobyk iet xbp hadx?” 

Yadokbx Odnkwwtx xhtgc adx vwdoqmewqkq akbq vbgc dohe 
hak ydghtjk. 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk abx sejk dsyejhboh hadonx eo adx 
sdoq habo hak sboi kggkohjdgdhdkx em Bwvtx 
Qtsvwkqejk. Neeq-vik, Yehhkj!” 

Boq pdha habh, ak lbodxakq gesywkhkwi, wkbldon vkadoq 
ads oehadon vth adx stjci vbgcqjey. 

“Abjji!” Akjsdeok gjdkq. 

“D coep!” Abjji xaethkq. Tobvwk he geohbdo adsxkwm, 
ak ytogakq hak bdj; dh pbx sejk habo ak abq qbjkq he 

aeyk mej. Ak xhjeqk ty boq qepo hak hkoh, mkkwdon habh 
ak getwq ablk jto b sdwk; ak qdq oeh klko mkkw atonji 
boisejk. Akjsdeok pbx xftbxadon Yadokbx Odnkwwtx’x 
yejhjbdh vbgc dohe hak vkbqkq vbn; pako xak abq 
mbxhkokq hak gwbxy xak hajkp hak vbn bxdqk boq jbdxkq 
b xadodon mbgk he Abjji. 

“Hak xpejq gbo qkxhjei Aejgjtukx! Nevwdo-sbqk 
vwbqkx dsvdvk eowi habh padga xhjkonhako haks — 
Abjji, habh xpejq’x dsyjknobhkq pdha vbxdwdxc 
lkoes!” 

“Boq Qtsvwkqejk qdqo’h ndlk dh he sk vkgbtxk ak xhdww 
okkqkq dh, ak pbohkq he txk dh eo hak wegckh — ” 

“ — boq ak stxh ablk jkbwdrkq haki petwqo’h wkh iet 
ablk dh dm ak yth dh do adx pdww — ” 

“ — xe ak sbqk b geyi — ” 

“ — boq yth b mbck do hak nwbxx gbxk — ” 

“ — boq ak wkmh hak jkbw eok — pakjk?” 

Haki nbrkq bh kbga ehakj; Abjji mkwh habh hak boxpkj 
pbx qbonwdon doldxdvwi do hak bdj bvelk haks, 
hbohbwdrdonwi gwexk. Pai abqo’h Qtsvwkqejk hewq ads? 
Ej abq ak, do mbgh, hewq Abjji, vth Abjji abq oeh 
jkbwdrkq dh bh hak hdsk? 

“Hadoc!” padxykjkq Akjsdeok. “Hadoc! Pakjk petwq 
ak ablk wkmh dh?” 

“Oeh bh Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Abjji, jkxtsdon adx ybgdon. 

“Xeskpakjk do Aenxskbqk?” xtnnkxhkq Akjsdeok. 

“Hak Xajdkcdon Xabgc?” xbdq Abjji. “Oeveqi klkj nekx 
do hakjk.” 

“Vth Xobyk coepx aep he nkh do, petwqo’h habh vk b 
vdh jdxci?” 

“Qtsvwkqejk hjtxhkq Xobyk,” Abjji jksdoqkq akj. 

“Oeh koetna he hkww ads habh ak abq xpbyykq hak 
xpejqx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Ikba, iet’jk jdnah!” xbdq Abjji, boq ak mkwh klko sejk 
gakkjkq bh hak haetnah habh Qtsvwkqejk abq abq 
xesk jkxkjlbhdeox, aepklkj mbdoh, bveth Xobyk ’x 
hjtxhpejhadokxx. “Xe, petwq ak ablk adqqko hak xpejq 
pkww bpbi mjes Aenxskbqk, hako? Pabh q’iet jkgceo, 
Jeo? Jeo?” 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq. Mej eok vkpdwqkjkq seskoh ak 
haetnah habh Jeo abq wkmh hak hkoh, hako jkbwdrkq habh 
Jeo pbx widon do hak xabqep em b wepkj vtoc, weecdon 
xheoi. 

“Ea, jksksvkjkq sk, ablk iet?” ak xbdq. 

“Pabh?” 

Jeo xoejhkq bx ak xhbjkq ty bh hak toqkjxdqk em hak 
tyykj vtoc. 

“Iet hpe gbjji eo. Qeo’h wkh sk xyedw ietj mto.” 

Ykjywkukq, Abjji weeckq he Akjsdeok mej akwy, vth xak 
xaeec akj akbq, byybjkohwi bx oeoywtxxkq bx ak pbx. 

“Pabh’x hak yjevwks?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Yjevwks? Hakjk’x oe yjevwks,” xbdq Jeo, xhdww 
jkmtxdon he weec bh Abjji. “Oeh bggejqdon he iet, 
boipbi.” 

Hakjk pkjk xklkjbw ywtocx eo hak gbolbx elkj hakdj 
akbqx. Dh abq xhbjhkq he jbdo. 

“Pkww, iet’lk evldetxwi neh b yjevwks,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Xydh dh eth, pdww iet?” 

Jeo xpton adx weon wknx emm hak vkq boq xbh ty. Ak 
weeckq skbo, towdck adsxkwm. 

“Bww jdnah, D’ww xydh dh eth. Qeo’h kuykgh sk he xcdy ty 
boq qepo hak hkoh vkgbtxk hakjk’x xesk ehakj qbso 
hadon pk’lk neh he mdoq. Ztxh bqq dh he hak wdxh em xhtmm 
iet qeo’h coep.” 

“D qeo’h coep?” jkykbhkq Abjji, “D qeo’h coep?” 

Ywtoc, ywtoc, ywtoc. Hak jbdo pbx mbwwdon abjqkj boq 
akbldkj; dh ybhhkjkq eo hak wkbm-xhjkpo vboc bww bjetoq 
haks boq dohe hak jdlkj gabhhkjdon hajetna hak qbjc. 
Qjkbq qetxkq Abjji’x ztvdwbhdeo: Jeo pbx xbidon 
kubghwi pabh ak abq xtxykghkq boq mkbjkq ads he vk 
hadocdon. 

“Dh’x oeh wdck D’s oeh abldon hak hdsk em si wdmk akjk,” 
xbdq Jeo, “iet coep, pdha si bjs sbonwkq boq 
oehadon he kbh boq mjkkrdon si vbgcxdqk emm klkji 
odnah. D ztxh aeykq, iet coep, bmhkj pk’q vkko 
jtoodon jetoq b mkp pkkcx, pk’q ablk bgadklkq 
xeskhadon.” 

“Jeo,” Akjsdeok xbdq, vth do xtga b ftdkh ledgk habh 
Jeo getwq yjkhkoq oeh he ablk akbjq dh elkj hak wetq 
hbhhee hak jbdo pbx oep vkbhdon eo hak hkoh. 

“D haetnah iet cokp pabh iet’q xdnokq ty mej,” xbdq 
Abjji. 

“Ikba, D haetnah D qdq hee.” 

“Xe pabh ybjh em dh dxo’h wdldon ty he ietj 
kuykghbhdeox?” bxckq Abjji. Bonkj pbx gesdon he adx 
qkmkoxk oep. “Qdq iet hadoc pk’q vk xhbidon do mdlk- 
xhbj aehkwx? Mdoqdon b Aejgjtu klkji ehakj qbi? Qdq 
iet hadoc iet’q vk vbgc he Stssi vi Gajdxhsbx?” 

“Pk haetnah iet cokp pabh iet pkjk qedon!” xaethkq 
Jeo, xhboqdon ty, boq adx pejqx ydkjgkq Abjji wdck 
xgbwqdon codlkx. “Pk haetnah Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq 
iet pabh he qe, pk haetnah iet abq b jkbw ywbo!” 

“Jeo!” xbdq Akjsdeok, hadx hdsk gwkbjwi btqdvwk elkj 
hak jbdo hatoqkjdon eo hak hkoh jeem, vth bnbdo, ak 
dnoejkq akj. 

“Pkww, xejji he wkh iet qepo,” xbdq Abjji, adx ledgk 
ftdhk gbws klko haetna ak mkwh aewwep, dobqkftbhk. 

“D’lk vkko xhjbdnah pdha iet mjes hak xhbjh, D hewq iet 
klkjihadon Qtsvwkqejk hewq sk. Boq do gbxk iet 
ablko’h oehdgkq, pk’lk metoq eok Aejgjtu — ” 

“Ikba, boq pk’jk bveth bx okbj nkhhdon jdq em dh bx pk 
bjk he mdoqdon hak jkxh em haks — oepakjk kmmdon okbj, 
do ehakj pejqx!” 

“Hbck emm hak wegckh, Jeo,” Akjsdeok xbdq, akj ledgk 
totxtbwwi adna. “Ywkbxk hbck dh emm. Iet petwqo’h vk 
hbwcdon wdck hadx dm iet abqo’h vkko pkbjdon dh bww qbi.” 

“Ikba, ak petwq,” xbdq Abjji, pae qdq oeh pboh 
kugtxkx sbqk mej Jeo. “Q’iet hadoc D ablko’h oehdgkq 
hak hpe em iet padxykjdon vkadoq si vbgc? Q’iet 
hadoc D qdqo’h ntkxx iet pkjk hadocdon hadx xhtmm?” 

“Abjji, pk pkjko’h — ” 

“Qeo’h wdk!” Jeo atjwkq bh akj. “Iet xbdq dh hee, iet 
xbdq iet pkjk qdxbyyedohkq, iet xbdq iet’q haetnah 
ak abq b vdh sejk he ne eo habo — ” 

“D qdqo’h xbi dh wdck habh — Abjji, D qdqo’h!” xak gjdkq. 

Hak jbdo pbx yetoqdon hak hkoh, hkbjx pkjk yetjdon 
qepo Akjsdeok’x mbgk, boq hak kugdhkskoh em b mkp 
sdothkx vkmejk abq lbodxakq bx dm dh abq oklkj vkko, b 
xaejh-wdlkq mdjkpejc habh abq mwbjkq boq qdkq, wkbldon 
klkjihadon qbjc, pkh, boq gewq. Hak xpejq em 
Njimmdoqej pbx adqqko haki cokp oeh pakjk, boq haki 
pkjk hajkk hkkobnkjx do b hkoh paexk eowi 
bgadklkskoh pbx oeh, ikh, he vk qkbq. 

“Xe pai bjk iet xhdww akjk?” Abjji bxckq Jeo. 

“Xkbjga sk,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Ne aesk hako,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Ikba, sbivk D pdww!” xaethkq Jeo, boq ak heec 
xklkjbw xhkyx hepbjq Abjji, pae qdq oeh vbgc bpbi. 
“Qdqo’h iet akbj pabh haki xbdq bveth si xdxhkj? Vth 
iet qeo’h ndlk b jbh’x mbjh, qe iet, dh’x eowi hak 
Mejvdqqko Mejkxh, Abjji D’lk-Mbgkq-Pejxk Yehhkj 
qekxo’h gbjk pabh abyykox he akj do akjk — pkww, D qe, 
bww jdnah, ndboh xydqkjx boq skohbw xhtmm — ” 

“D pbx eowi xbidon — xak pbx pdha hak ehakjx, haki 
pkjk pdha Abnjdq — ” 

“Ikba, D nkh dh, iet qeo’h gbjk! Boq pabh bveth hak 
jkxh em si mbsdwi, ‘hak Pkbxwkix qeo’h okkq boehakj 
cdq doztjkq,’ qdq iet akbj habh?” 

“Ikba, D — ” 

“Oeh vehakjkq pabh dh skboh, haetna?” 

“Jeo!” xbdq Akjsdeok, mejgdon akj pbi vkhpkko haks. 
“D qeo’h hadoc dh skbox boihadon okp abx abyykokq, 
boihadon pk qeo’h coep bveth; hadoc, Jeo, Vdww’x 

bwjkbqi xgbjjkq, ywkohi em ykeywk stxh ablk xkko habh 
Nkejnk abx wexh bo kbj vi oep, boq iet’jk xtyyexkq 
he vk eo ietj qkbhavkq pdha xybhhkjnjedh, D’s xtjk 
habh’x bww ak skboh — ” 

“Ea, iet’jk xtjk, bjk iet? Jdnah hako, pkww, D peo’h 
vehakj sixkwm bveth haks. Dh’x bww jdnah mej iet hpe, 
dxo’h dh, pdha ietj ybjkohx xbmkwi eth em hak pbi — ” 

“Si ybjkohx bjk qkbq).” Abjji vkwwepkq. 

“Boq sdok getwq vk nedon hak xbsk pbi!” ikwwkq Jeo. 

“Hako NE!” jebjkq Abjji. “Ne vbgc he haks, yjkhkoq 
iet’lk neh elkj ietj xybhhkjnjedh boq Stssi’ww vk 
bvwk he mkkq iet ty boq — ” 

Jeo sbqk b xtqqko selkskoh: Abjji jkbghkq, vth 
vkmejk kdhakj pboq pbx gwkbj em dhx epokj’x yegckh, 
Akjsdeok abq jbdxkq akj epo. 

“Yjehkne\” xak gjdkq, boq bo doldxdvwk xadkwq kuyboqkq 
vkhpkko akj boq Abjji eo hak eok xdqk boq Jeo eo 
hak ehakj; bww em haks pkjk mejgkq vbgcpbjq b mkp 
xhkyx vi hak xhjkonha em hak xykww, boq Abjji boq Jeo 
nwbjkq mjes kdhakj xdqk em hak hjboxybjkoh vbjjdkj bx 
haetna haki pkjk xkkdon kbga ehakj gwkbjwi mej hak 
mdjxh hdsk. Abjji mkwh b gejjexdlk abhjkq hepbjq Jeo: 
Xeskhadon abq vjecko vkhpkko haks. 

“Wkblk hak Aejgjtu,” Abjji xbdq. 

Jeo pjkogakq hak gabdo mjes elkj adx akbq boq gbxh 
hak wegckh dohe b okbjvi gabdj. Ak htjokq he 
Akjsdeok. 

“Pabh bjk iet qedon?” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” 

“Bjk iet xhbidon, ej pabh?” 

“D ...” Xak weeckq bontdxakq. “Ikx — ikx, D’s xhbidon. 
Jeo, pk xbdq pk’q ne pdha Abjji, pk xbdq pk’q akwy — ” 

“D nkh dh. Iet gaeexk ads.” 

“Jeo, oe — ywkbxk — gesk vbgc, gesk vbgc!” 

Xak pbx dsykqkq vi akj epo Xadkwq Gabjs; vi hak 
hdsk xak abq jkselkq dh ak abq bwjkbqi xhejskq dohe 
hak odnah. Abjji xheeq ftdhk xhdww boq xdwkoh, wdxhkodon 
he akj xevvdon boq gbwwdon Jeo’x obsk bseonxh hak 
hjkkx. 

Bmhkj b mkp sdothkx xak jkhtjokq, akj xeyydon abdj 
ywbxhkjkq he akj mbgk. 

“Ak’x n-n-neok! Qdxbyybjbhkq!” 

Xak hajkp akjxkwm dohe b gabdj, gtjwkq ty, boq xhbjhkq 
he gji. 

Abjji mkwh qbrkq. Ak xheeykq, ydgckq ty hak Aejgjtu, 
boq ywbgkq dh bjetoq adx epo okgc. Ak qjbnnkq 
vwbockhx emm Jeo’x vtoc boq hajkp haks elkj 
Akjsdeok. Hako ak gwdsvkq eohe adx epo vkq boq 
xhbjkq ty bh hak qbjc gbolbx jeem, wdxhkodon he hak 
yetoqdon em hak jbdo. 

NEQJDG’X AEWWEP 

Pako Abjji peck hak mewwepdon qbi dh pbx xklkjbw 
xkgeoqx vkmejk ak jksksvkjkq pabh abq abyykokq. 
Hako ak aeykq, gadwqdxawi, habh dh abq vkko b qjkbs, 
habh Jeo pbx xhdww hakjk boq abq oklkj wkmh. Ikh vi 
htjodon adx akbq eo adx ydwwep ak getwq xkk Jeo’x 
qkxkjhkq vtoc. Dh pbx wdck b qkbq veqi do hak pbi dh 
xkkskq he qjbp adx kikx. Abjji ztsykq qepo mjes 
adx epo vkq, ckkydon adx kikx blkjhkq mjes Jeo’x. 
Akjsdeok, pae pbx bwjkbqi vtxi do hak cdhgako, qdq 
oeh pdxa Abjji neeq sejodon, vth htjokq akj mbgk 
bpbi ftdgcwi bx ak pkoh vi. 

Ak’x neok, Abjji hewq adsxkwm. Ak’x neok. Ak abq he 
ckky hadocdon dh bx ak pbxakq boq qjkxxkq, bx haetna 
jkykhdhdeo petwq qtww hak xaegc em dh. Ak’x neok boq 
ak’x oeh gesdon vbgc. Boq habh pbx hak xdsywk hjtha 
em dh, Abjji cokp, vkgbtxk hakdj yjehkghdlk 
kogabohskohx skboh habh dh petwq vk dsyexxdvwk, 
eogk haki lbgbhkq hadx xyeh, mej Jeo he mdoq haks 
bnbdo. 

Ak boq Akjsdeok bhk vjkbcmbxh do xdwkogk. Akjsdeok ’x 
kikx pkjk ytmmi boq jkq; xak weeckq bx dm xak abq oeh 
xwkyh. Haki ybgckq ty hakdj hadonx, Akjsdeok 
qbpqwdon. Abjji cokp pai xak pbohkq he xydo eth 
hakdj hdsk eo hak jdlkjvboc; xklkjbw hdskx ak xbp akj 
weec ty kbnkjwi, boq ak pbx xtjk xak abq qkwtqkq 
akjxkwm dohe hadocdon habh xak akbjq meehxhkyx hajetna 
hak akbli jbdo, vth oe jkq-abdjkq mdntjk byykbjkq 
vkhpkko hak hjkkx. Klkji hdsk Abjji dsdhbhkq akj, 
weeckq bjetoq (mej ak getwq oeh akwy aeydon b wdhhwk, 
adsxkwm) boq xbp oehadon vth jbdo-xpkyh peeqx, 
boehakj wdhhwk ybjgkw em mtji kuyweqkq doxdqk ads. Ak 
getwq akbj Jeo xbidon, “ Pk haetnah iet cokp pabh 
iet pkjk qedon \” , boq ak jkxtskq ybgcdon pdha b 
abjq coeh do hak ydh em adx xhesbga. 

Hak stqqi jdlkj vkxdqk haks pbx jdxdon jbydqwi boq 
petwq xeeo xydww elkj eohe hakdj vboc. Haki abq 
wdonkjkq b neeq aetj bmhkj haki petwq txtbwwi ablk 
qkybjhkq hakdj gbsyxdhk. Mdobwwi abldon kohdjkwi 
jkybgckq hak vkbqkq vbn hajkk hdskx, Akjsdeok 
xkkskq tobvwk he mdoq boi sejk jkbxeox he qkwbi: Xak 
boq Abjji njbxykq aboqx boq Qdxbyybjbhkq, 
jkbyykbjdon eo b pdoqxpkyh akbhakj-gelkjkq adwwxdqk. 

Hak doxhboh haki bjjdlkq, Akjsdeok qjeyykq Abjji’x 
aboq boq pbwckq bpbi mjes ads, mdobwwi xdhhdon qepo 
eo b wbjnk jegc, akj mbgk eo akj cokkx, xabcdon pdha 
pabh ak cokp pkjk xevx. Ak pbhgakq akj, xtyyexdon 
habh ak etnah he ne boq gesmejh akj, vth xeskhadon 
ckyh ads jeehkq he hak xyeh. Klkjihadon doxdqk ads mkwh 
gewq boq hdnah: Bnbdo ak xbp hak geohksyhtetx 
kuyjkxxdeo eo Jeo’x mbgk. Abjji xhjeqk emm hajetna hak 
akbhakj, pbwcdon do b wbjnk gdjgwk pdha hak qdxhjbtnah 
Akjsdeok bh dhx gkohkj, gbxhdon hak xykwwx xak txtbwwi 
ykjmejskq he koxtjk hakdj yjehkghdeo. 

Haki qdq oeh qdxgtxx Jeo bh bww elkj hak okuh mkp 
qbix. Abjji pbx qkhkjsdokq oklkj he skohdeo adx 

obsk bnbdo, boq Akjsdeok xkkskq he coep habh dh 
pbx oe txk mejgdon hak dxxtk, bwhaetna xeskhdskx bh 
odnah pako xak haetnah ak pbx xwkkydon, ak petwq 
akbj akj gjidon. Skbopadwk Abjji abq xhbjhkq 
vjdondon eth hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby boq kubsdodon dh vi 
pboqwdnah. Ak pbx pbdhdon mej hak seskoh pako 
Jeo’x wbvkwkq qeh petwq jkbyykbj do hak gejjdqejx em 
Aenpbjhx, yjeldon habh ak abq jkhtjokq he hak 
gesmejhbvwk gbxhwk, yjehkghkq vi adx xhbhtx em 
ytjkvweeq. Aepklkj, Jeo qdq oeh byykbj eo hak sby, 
boq bmhkj b padwk Abjji metoq adsxkwm hbcdon dh eth 
xdsywi he xhbjk bh Ndooi’x obsk do hak ndjwx’ 
qejsdheji, peoqkjdon pakhakj hak dohkoxdhi pdha 
padga ak nbrkq bh dh sdnah vjkbc dohe akj xwkky, habh 
xak petwq xeskaep coep ak pbx hadocdon bveth akj, 
aeydon habh xak pbx bww jdnah. 

Vi qbi, haki qklehkq haksxkwlkx he hjidon he 
qkhkjsdok hak yexxdvwk wegbhdeox em Njimmdoqej’x 
xpejq, vth hak sejk haki hbwckq bveth hak ywbgkx do 
padga Qtsvwkqejk sdnah ablk adqqko dh, hak sejk 
qkxykjbhk boq mbj-mkhgakq hakdj xykgtwbhdeo vkgbsk. 
Gtqnkw adx vjbdox haetna ak sdnah, Abjji getwq oeh 
jksksvkj Qtsvwkqejk klkj skohdeodon b ywbgk do 
padga ak sdnah adqk xeskhadon. Hakjk pkjk seskohx 
pako ak qdq oeh coep pakhakj ak pbx bonjdkj pdha 
Jeo ej pdha Qtsvwkqejk. Pk haetnah iet cokp pabh 
iet pkjk qedon. . . . Pk haetnah Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq 
iet pabh he qe. . . . Pk haetnah iet abq b jkbw ywbo\ 

Ak getwq oeh adqk dh mjes adsxkwm: Jeo abq vkko jdnah. 
Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh ads pdha ldjhtbwwi oehadon. Haki 
abq qdxgelkjkq eok Aejgjtu, vth haki abq oe skbox 
em qkxhjeidon dh: Hak ehakjx pkjk bx tobhhbdobvwk bx 
haki abq klkj vkko. Aeykwkxxokxx hajkbhkokq he 
kontwm ads. Ak pbx xhbnnkjkq oep he hadoc em adx epo 
yjkxtsyhdeo do bggkyhdon adx mjdkoqx’ emmkjx he 
bggesyboi ads eo hadx skboqkjdon, yedohwkxx 
zetjoki. Ak cokp oehadon, ak abq oe dqkbx, boq ak 

pbx geoxhbohwi, ybdomtwwi eo hak bwkjh mej boi 
doqdgbhdeo habh Akjsdeok hee pbx bveth he hkww ads 
habh xak abq abq koetna, habh xak pbx wkbldon. 

Haki pkjk xykoqdon sboi klkodonx do okbj xdwkogk, 
boq Akjsdeok heec he vjdondon eth Yadokbx Odnkwwtx’x 
yejhjbdh boq yjeyydon dh ty do b gabdj, bx haetna ak 
sdnah mdww ybjh em hak nbydon aewk wkmh vi Jeo’x 
qkybjhtjk. Qkxydhk adx yjkldetx bxxkjhdeo habh ak 
petwq oklkj ldxdh haks bnbdo, Yadokbx Odnkwwtx qdq oeh 
xkks bvwk he jkxdxh hak gabogk he mdoq eth sejk bveth 
pabh Abjji pbx ty he, boq geoxkohkq he jkbyykbj, 
vwdoqmewqkq, klkji mkp qbix ej xe. Abjji pbx klko nwbq 
he xkk ads, vkgbtxk ak pbx gesyboi, bwvkdh em b xodqk 
boq hbtohdon cdoq. Haki jkwdxakq boi okpx bveth 
pabh pbx abyykodon bh Aenpbjhx, haetna Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx pbx oeh bo dqkbw domejskj. Ak lkokjbhkq 
Xobyk, hak mdjxh Xwihakjdo akbqsbxhkj xdogk ak 
adsxkwm abq geohjewwkq hak xgaeew, boq haki abq he vk 
gbjkmtw oeh he gjdhdgdrk ej bxc dsykjhdokoh ftkxhdeox 
bveth Xobyk, ej Yadokbx Odnkwwtx petwq doxhbohwi 
wkblk adx ybdohdon. 

Aepklkj, ak qdq wkh qjey gkjhbdo xodyykhx. Xobyk 
xkkskq he vk mbgdon b geoxhboh, wep wklkw em sthdoi 
mjes b abjq gejk em xhtqkohx. Ndooi abq vkko vbookq 
mjes nedon dohe Aenxskbqk. Xobyk abq jkdoxhbhkq 
Tsvjdqnk’x ewq qkgjkk mejvdqqdon nbhakjdonx em hajkk 
ej sejk xhtqkohx ej boi toemmdgdbw xhtqkoh xegdkhdkx. 

Mjes bww em hakxk hadonx, Abjji qkqtgkq habh Ndooi, 
boq yjevbvwi Okldwwk boq Wtob bweon pdha akj, abq 
vkko qedon hakdj vkxh he geohdotk Qtsvwkqejk’x Bjsi. 
Hadx xgboh okpx sbqk Abjji pboh he xkk Ndooi xe 
vbqwi dh mkwh wdck b xhesbgabgak; vth dh bwxe sbqk ads 
hadoc em Jeo bnbdo, boq em Qtsvwkqejk, boq em 
Aenpbjhx dhxkwm, padga ak sdxxkq okbjwi bx stga bx 
adx ku-ndjwmjdkoq. Doqkkq, bx Yadokbx Odnkwwtx hbwckq 
bveth Xobyk ’x gjbgcqepo, Abjji kuykjdkogkq b xywdh 

xkgeoq em sbqokxx pako ak dsbndokq xdsywi nedon 
vbgc he xgaeew he zedo hak qkxhbvdwdrbhdeo em Xobyk’x 
jkndsk: Vkdon mkq, boq abldon b xemh vkq, boq ehakj 
ykeywk vkdon do gabjnk, xkkskq hak sexh peoqkjmtw 
yjexykgh do hak pejwq bh habh seskoh. Vth hako ak 
jksksvkjkq habh ak pbx Toqkxdjbvwk Otsvkj Eok, 
habh hakjk pbx b hko-haetxboq-Nbwwkeo yjdgk eo adx 
akbq, boq habh he pbwc dohe Aenpbjhx hakxk qbix pbx 
ztxh bx qbonkjetx bx pbwcdon dohe hak Sdodxhji em 
Sbndg. Doqkkq, Yadokbx Odnkwwtx dobqlkjhkohwi 
ksyabxdrkq hadx mbgh vi xwdyydon do wkbqdon ftkxhdeox 
bveth Abjji boq Akjsdeok’x pakjkbvethx. Akjsdeok 
xaelkq ads vbgc doxdqk hak vkbqkq vbn klkji hdsk ak 
qdq hadx, boq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx dolbjdbvwi jkmtxkq he 
jkbyykbj mej xklkjbw qbix bmhkj hakxk togkjkseodetx 
neeq-vikx. 

Hak pkbhakj njkp gewqkj boq gewqkj. Haki qdq oeh 
qbjk jksbdo do boi eok bjkb hee weon, xe jbhakj habo 
xhbidon do hak xetha em Konwboq, pakjk b abjq njetoq 
mjexh pbx hak pejxh em hakdj pejjdkx, haki geohdotkq he 
skboqkj ty boq qepo hak getohji, vjbldon b 
setohbdoxdqk, pakjk xwkkh yetoqkq hak hkoh; b pdqk, 
mwbh sbjxa, pakjk hak hkoh pbx mweeqkq pdha gadww 
pbhkj; boq b hdoi dxwboq do hak sdqqwk em b Xgehhdxa 
wega, pakjk xoep abwm vtjdkq hak hkoh do hak odnah. 

Haki abq bwjkbqi xyehhkq Gajdxhsbx hjkkx hpdocwdon 
mjes xklkjbw xdhhdon jees pdoqepx vkmejk hakjk gbsk 
bo klkodon pako Abjji jkxewlkq he xtnnkxh, bnbdo, 
pabh xkkskq he ads hak eowi tokuywejkq blkotk wkmh 
he haks. Haki abq ztxh kbhko bo totxtbwwi neeq skbw: 
Akjsdeok abq vkko he b xtykjsbjckh toqkj hak 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc (xgjtytwetxwi qjeyydon hak seoki 
dohe bo eyko hdww bx xak wkmh), boq Abjji haetnah habh 
xak sdnah vk sejk ykjxtbqbvwk habo txtbw eo b 
xhesbga mtww em xybnakhhd Vewenokxk boq hdookq ykbjx. 
Ak abq bwxe abq hak mejkxdnah he xtnnkxh habh haki 
hbck b mkp aetjx’ vjkbc mjes pkbjdon hak Aejgjtu, 

padga pbx abondon elkj hak koq em hak vtoc vkxdqk 
ads. 

“Akjsdeok?” 

“Ass?” Xak pbx gtjwkq ty do eok em hak xbnndon 
bjsgabdjx pdha Hak Hbwkx em Vkkqwk hak Vbjq. Ak getwq 
oeh dsbndok aep stga sejk xak getwq nkh eth em hak 
veec, padga pbx oeh, bmhkj bww, lkji weon; vth kldqkohwi 
xak pbx xhdww qkgdyakjdon xeskhadon do dh, vkgbtxk 
Xykwwsbo’x Xiwwbvbji wbi eyko eo hak bjs em hak gabdj. 

Abjji gwkbjkq adx hajebh. Ak mkwh kubghwi bx ak abq 
qeok eo hak eggbxdeo, xklkjbw ikbjx yjkldetxwi, pako 
ak abq bxckq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww pakhakj ak getwq 
ne dohe Aenxskbqk, qkxydhk hak mbgh habh ak abq oeh 
ykjxtbqkq hak Qtjxwkix he xdno adx ykjsdxxdeo xwdy. 

“Akjsdeok, D’lk vkko hadocdon, boq — ” 

“Abjji, getwq iet akwy sk pdha xeskhadon?” 

Byybjkohwi xak abq oeh vkko wdxhkodon he ads. Xak 
wkbokq mejpbjq boq akwq eth Hak Hbwkx em Vkkqwk hak 
Vbjq. 

“Weec bh habh xisvew,” xak xbdq, yedohdon he hak hey em 
b ybnk. Bvelk pabh Abjji bxxtskq pbx hak hdhwk em 
hak xheji (vkdon tobvwk he jkbq jtokx, ak getwq oeh vk 
xtjk) , hakjk pbx b ydghtjk em pabh weeckq wdck b 
hjdbontwbj kik, dhx ytydw gjexxkq pdha b lkjhdgbw wdok. 

“D oklkj heec Bogdkoh Jtokx, Akjsdeok.” 

“D coep habh, vth dh dxo’h b jtok boq dh’x oeh do hak 
xiwwbvbji, kdhakj. Bww bweon D haetnah dh pbx b ydghtjk 
em bo kik, vth D qeo’h hadoc dh dx! Dh’x vkko dockq do, 
weec, xeskveqi’x qjbpo dh hakjk, dh dxo’h jkbwwi ybjh em 
hak veec. Hadoc, ablk iet klkj xkko dh vkmejk?” 

“Oe ... Oe, pbdh b seskoh.” Abjji weeckq gwexkj. “Dxo’h 
dh hak xbsk xisvew Wtob’x qbq pbx pkbjdon jetoq adx 
okgc?” 

“Pkww, habh’x pabh D haetnah hee!” 

“Hako dh’x Njdoqkwpbwq’x sbjc.” 

Xak xhbjkq bh ads, eykosethakq. 

“Pabh?” 

“Cjts hewq sk ...” 

Ak jkgetohkq hak xheji habh Ldchej Cjts abq hewq ads 
bh hak pkqqdon. Akjsdeok weeckq bxheodxakq. 

“ Njdoqkwpbwq’x sbjc?” 

Xak weeckq mjes Abjji he hak pkdjq xisvew boq vbgc 
bnbdo. “D’lk oklkj akbjq habh Njdoqkwpbwq abq b sbjc. 
Hakjk’x oe skohdeo em dh do boihadon D’lk klkj jkbq 
bveth ads.” 

“Pkww, wdck D xbi, Cjts jkgceokq habh xisvew pbx 
gbjlkq eo b pbww bh Qtjsxhjbon, boq Njdoqkwpbwq yth 
dh hakjk.” 

Xak mkww vbgc dohe hak ewq bjsgabdj, mjepodon. 

“Habh’x lkji eqq. Dm dh’x b xisvew em Qbjc Sbndg, pabh’x 
dh qedon do b veec em gadwqjko’x xhejdkx?” 

“Ikba, dh dx pkdjq,” xbdq Abjji. “Boq iet’q hadoc 
Xgjdsnketj petwq ablk jkgenodrkq dh. Ak pbx 
Sdodxhkj, ak etnah he ablk vkko kuykjh eo Qbjc xhtmm.” 

“D coep. ... Ykjabyx ak haetnah dh pbx bo kik, ztxh wdck 
D qdq. Bww hak ehakj xhejdkx ablk wdhhwk ydghtjkx elkj hak 
hdhwkx.” 

Xak qdq oeh xykbc, vth geohdotkq he yejk elkj hak 
xhjbonk sbjc. Abjji hjdkq bnbdo. 

“Akjsdeok?” 

“Ass?” 

“D’lk vkko hadocdon. D — D pboh he ne he Neqjdg’x 
Aewwep.” 

Xak weeckq ty bh ads, vth akj kikx pkjk tomegtxkq, 
boq ak pbx xtjk xak pbx xhdww hadocdon bveth hak 
sixhkjdetx sbjc eo hak veec. 

“Ikx,” xak xbdq. “Ikx, D’lk vkko peoqkjdon habh hee. D 
jkbwwi hadoc pk’ww ablk he.” 

“Qdq iet akbj sk jdnah?” ak bxckq. 

“Em getjxk D qdq. Iet pboh he ne he Neqjdg’x Aewwep. D 
bnjkk, D hadoc pk xaetwq. D skbo, D gbo’h hadoc em 
boipakjk kwxk dh getwq vk kdhakj. Dh’ww vk qbonkjetx, 
vth hak sejk D hadoc bveth dh, hak sejk wdckwi dh xkksx 
dh’x hakjk.” 

“Kj — pabh’x hakjk?” bxckq Abjji. 

Bh habh, xak weeckq ztxh bx vkpdwqkjkq bx ak mkwh. 

“Pkww, hak xpejq, Abjji! Qtsvwkqejk stxh ablk 
coepo iet’q pboh he ne vbgc hakjk, boq D skbo, 
Neqjdg’x Aewwep dx Neqjdg Njimmdoqej’x vdjhaywbgk — ” 

“Jkbwwi? Njimmdoqej gbsk mjes Neqjdg’x Aewwep?” 

“Abjji, qdq iet klkj klko eyko B Adxheji em Sbndg?” 

“Kjs,” ak xbdq, xsdwdon mej pabh mkwh wdck hak mdjxh hdsk 
do seohax: Hak stxgwkx do adx mbgk mkwh eqqwi xhdmm. “D 
sdnah’lk eykokq dh, iet coep, pako D vetnah dh ... ztxh 
hak eogk. ...” 

“Pkww, bx hak ldwwbnk dx obskq bmhkj ads D’q ablk 
haetnah iet sdnah ablk sbqk hak geookghdeo,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. Xak xetoqkq stga sejk wdck akj ewq xkwm 
habo xak abq qeok em wbhk; Abjji abwm kuykghkq akj he 
booetogk habh xak pbx emm he hak wdvjbji. “Hakjk’x b 
vdh bveth hak ldwwbnk do B Adxheji em Sbndg, pbdh ...” 

Xak eykokq hak vkbqkq vbn boq jtssbnkq mej b 
padwk, mdobwwi kuhjbghdon akj geyi em hakdj ewq xgaeew 
hkuhveec, B Adxheji em Sbndg vi Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh, 
padga xak hatsvkq hajetna tohdw mdoqdon hak ybnk 
xak pbohkq. 

“ ‘Tyeo hak xdnobhtjk em hak Dohkjobhdeobw Xhbhthk em 
Xkgjkgi do 1689, pdrbjqx pkoh dohe adqdon mej neeq. Dh 
pbx obhtjbw, ykjabyx, habh haki mejskq hakdj epo 
xsbww gesstodhdkx pdhado b gesstodhi. Sboi xsbww 
ldwwbnkx boq abswkhx bhhjbghkq xklkjbw sbndgbw 
mbsdwdkx, pae vboqkq henkhakj mej sthtbw xtyyejh boq 
yjehkghdeo. Hak ldwwbnkx em Hdopejha do Gejopbww, Tyykj 
Mwbnwki do Iejcxadjk, boq Ehhkji Xh. Gbhgayewk eo hak 
xetha gebxh em Konwboq pkjk oehbvwk aeskx he coehx em 
Pdrbjqdon mbsdwdkx pae wdlkq bweonxdqk hewkjboh boq 
xeskhdskx Geomtoqkq Stnnwkx. Sexh gkwkvjbhkq em 
hakxk abwm-sbndgbw qpkwwdon ywbgkx dx, ykjabyx, 

Neqjdg’x Aewwep, hak Pkxh Getohji ldwwbnk pakjk hak 
njkbh pdrbjq Neqjdg Njimmdoqej pbx vejo, boq pakjk 
Vepsbo Pjdnah, Pdrbjqdon xsdha, mejnkq hak mdjxh 
Newqko Xodhga. Hak njblkibjq dx mtww em hak obskx em 
bogdkoh sbndgbw mbsdwdkx, boq hadx bggetohx, oe qetvh, 
mej hak xhejdkx em abtohdonx habh ablk qennkq hak wdhhwk 
gatjga vkxdqk dh mej sboi gkohtjdkx.’ 

“Iet boq ietj ybjkohx bjko’h skohdeokq,” Akjsdeok 
xbdq, gwexdon hak veec, “vkgbtxk Yjemkxxej Vbnxaeh 
qekxo’h gelkj boihadon wbhkj habo hak koq em hak 
odokhkkoha gkohtji. Vth iet xkk? Neqjdg’x Aewwep, 
Neqjdg Njimmdoqej, Njimmdoqej’x xpejq; qeo’h iet hadoc 
Qtsvwkqejk petwq ablk kuykghkq iet he sbck hak 
geookghdeo?” 

“Ea ikba ...” 

Abjji qdq oeh pboh he bqsdh habh ak abq oeh vkko 
hadocdon bveth hak xpejq bh bww pako ak xtnnkxhkq 
haki ne he Neqjdg’x Aewwep. Mej ads, hak wtjk em hak 
ldwwbnk wbi do adx ybjkohx’ njblkx, hak aetxk pakjk ak 
abq objjepwi kxgbykq qkbha, boq do hak ykjxeo em 
Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh. 

“Jksksvkj pabh Stjdkw xbdq?” ak bxckq klkohtbwwi. 
“Pae?” 

“Iet coep,” ak akxdhbhkq: Ak qdq oeh pboh he xbi 
Jeo’x obsk. “Ndooi’x njkbh-btoh. Bh hak pkqqdon. Hak 
eok pae xbdq iet abq xcdooi bocwkx.” 

“Ea,” xbdq Akjsdeok. Dh pbx b xhdgci seskoh: Abjji 
cokp habh xak abq xkoxkq Jeo’x obsk do hak emmdon. 
Ak jtxakq eo: 

“Xak xbdq Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh xhdww wdlkx do Neqjdg’x 
Aewwep.” 

“Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh,” stjstjkq Akjsdeok, jtoodon 
akj doqku mdonkj elkj Vbhadwqb’x ksvexxkq obsk eo 
hak mjeoh gelkj em B Adxheji em Sbndg. “Pkww, D xtyyexk 

Xak nbxykq xe qjbsbhdgbwwi habh Abjji’x doxdqkx 
htjokq elkj; ak qjkp adx pboq, weecdon bjetoq bh hak 

kohjbogk, abwm kuykghdon he xkk b aboq mejgdon dhx pbi 
hajetna hak kohjbogk mwby, vth hakjk pbx oehadon 
hakjk. 

“Pabh?” ak xbdq, abwm bonji, abwm jkwdklkq. “Pabh qdq 
iet qe habh mej? D haetnah iet’q xkko b Qkbha Kbhkj 
tordyydon hak hkoh, bh wkbxh — ” 

“Abjji, pabh dm Vbhadwqb’ x neh hak xpejq? Pabh dm 
Qtsvwkqejk kohjtxhkq dh he akj?” 

Abjji geoxdqkjkq hadx yexxdvdwdhi. Vbhadwqb petwq vk 
bo kuhjkskwi ewq pesbo vi oep, boq bggejqdon he 
Stjdkw, xak pbx “nbnb.” Pbx dh wdckwi habh Qtsvwkqejk 
petwq ablk adqqko hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej pdha akj? 

Dm xe, Abjji mkwh habh Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh b njkbh qkbw 
he gabogk: Qtsvwkqejk abq oklkj jklkbwkq habh ak 
abq jkywbgkq hak xpejq pdha b mbck, oej abq ak xe 
stga bx skohdeokq b mjdkoqxady pdha Vbhadwqb. Oep, 
aepklkj, pbx oeh hak seskoh he gbxh qetvh eo 
Akjsdeok’x hakeji, oeh pako xak pbx xe xtjyjdxdonwi 
pdwwdon he mbww do pdha Abjji’x qkbjkxh pdxa. 

“Ikba, ak sdnah ablk qeok! Xe, bjk pk nedon he ne he 
Neqjdg’x Aewwep?” 

“Ikx, vth pk’ww ablk he hadoc dh hajetna gbjkmtwwi, 
Abjji.” Xak pbx xdhhdon ty oep, boq Abjji getwq hkww 
habh hak yjexykgh em abldon b ywbo bnbdo abq wdmhkq akj 
seeq bx stga bx adx. “Pk’ww okkq he yjbghdgk 
Qdxbyybjbhdon henkhakj toqkj hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc mej 
b xhbjh, boq ykjabyx Qdxdwwtxdeoskoh Gabjsx petwq 
vk xkoxdvwk hee, towkxx iet hadoc pk xaetwq ne hak 
paewk aen boq txk Yewiztdgk Yehdeo? Do habh gbxk pk’ww 
okkq he gewwkgh abdj mjes xeskveqi. D bghtbwwi hadoc 
pk’q vkhhkj qe habh, Abjji, hak hadgckj etj qdxntdxkx 
hak vkhhkj. ...” 

Abjji wkh akj hbwc, oeqqdon boq bnjkkdon pakoklkj 
hakjk pbx b ybtxk, vth adx sdoq abq wkmh hak 
geolkjxbhdeo. Mej hak mdjxh hdsk xdogk ak abq 
qdxgelkjkq habh hak xpejq do Njdonehhx pbx b mbck, ak 
mkwh kugdhkq. 

Ak pbx bveth he ne aesk, bveth he jkhtjo he hak ywbgk 
pakjk ak abq abq b mbsdwi. Dh pbx do Neqjdg’x Aewwep 
habh, vth mej Lewqksejh, ak petwq ablk njepo ty boq 
xykoh klkji xgaeew aewdqbi. Ak getwq ablk doldhkq 
mjdkoqx he adx aetxk. ... Ak sdnah klko ablk abq 
vjehakjx boq xdxhkjx. ... Dh petwq ablk vkko adx 
sehakj pae abq sbqk adx xklkohkkoha vdjhaqbi gbck. 
Hak wdmk ak abq wexh abq abjqwi klkj xkkskq xe jkbw he 
ads bx bh hadx seskoh, pako ak cokp ak pbx bveth 
he xkk hak ywbgk pakjk dh abq vkko hbcko mjes ads. 
Bmhkj Akjsdeok abq neok he vkq habh odnah, Abjji 
ftdkhwi kuhjbghkq adx jtgcxbgc mjes Akjsdeok ’x 
vkbqkq vbn, boq mjes doxdqk dh, hak yaehenjbya bwvts 
Abnjdq abq ndlko ads xe weon bne. Mej hak mdjxh hdsk do 
seohax, ak ykjtxkq hak ewq ydghtjkx em adx ybjkohx, 
xsdwdon boq pbldon ty bh ads mjes hak dsbnkx, padga 
pkjk bww ak abq wkmh em haks oep. 

Abjji petwq nwbqwi ablk xkh eth mej Neqjdg’x Aewwep 
hak mewwepdon qbi, vth Akjsdeok abq ehakj dqkbx. 
Geoldogkq bx xak pbx habh Lewqksejh petwq kuykgh 
Abjji he jkhtjo he hak xgkok em adx ybjkohx’ qkbhax, 
xak pbx qkhkjsdokq habh haki petwq xkh emm eowi bmhkj 
haki abq koxtjkq habh haki abq hak vkxh qdxntdxkx 
yexxdvwk. Dh pbx hakjkmejk b mtww pkkc wbhkj — eogk 
haki abq xtjjkyhdhdetxwi evhbdokq abdjx mjes dooegkoh 
Stnnwkx pae pkjk Gajdxhsbx xaeyydon, boq abq 
yjbghdgkq Byybjbhdon boq Qdxbyybjbhdon padwk 
toqkjokbha hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc henkhakj — habh 
Akjsdeok bnjkkq he sbck hak zetjoki. 

Haki pkjk he Byybjbhk he hak ldwwbnk toqkj gelkj em 
qbjcokxx, xe dh pbx wbhk bmhkjoeeo pako haki mdobwwi 

xpbwwepkq Yewiztdgk Yehdeo, Abjji hjboxmejsdon dohe b 
vbwqdon, sdqqwk-bnkq Stnnwk sbo, Akjsdeok dohe adx 
xsbww boq jbhakj setxi pdmk. Hak vkbqkq vbn 
geohbdodon bww em hakdj yexxkxxdeox (bybjh mjes hak 
Aejgjtu, padga Abjji pbx pkbjdon bjetoq adx okgc) 
pbx htgckq dohe bo doxdqk yegckh em Akjsdeok ’x 
vthheokq-ty gebh. Abjji wepkjkq hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc 
elkj haks, hako haki htjokq dohe hak xtmmegbhdon 
qbjcokxx eogk bnbdo. 

Akbjh vkbhdon do adx hajebh, Abjji eykokq adx kikx. 
Haki pkjk xhboqdon aboq do aboq do b xoepi wbok 
toqkj b qbjc vwtk xci, do padga hak odnah’x mdjxh xhbjx 
pkjk bwjkbqi nwdsskjdon mkkvwi. Gehhbnkx xheeq eo 
kdhakj xdqk em hak objjep jebq, Gajdxhsbx qkgejbhdeox 
hpdocwdon do hakdj pdoqepx. B xaejh pbi bakbq em 
haks, b nwep em newqko xhjkkhwdnahx doqdgbhkq hak 
gkohkj em hak ldwwbnk. 

“Bww hadx xoep!” Akjsdeok padxykjkq vkokbha hak 
gwebc. “Pai qdqo’h pk hadoc em xoep? Bmhkj bww etj 
yjkgbthdeox, pk’ww wkblk yjdohx! Pk’ww ztxh ablk he nkh 
jdq em haks — iet ne do mjeoh, D’ww qe dh — ” 

Abjji qdq oeh pboh he kohkj hak ldwwbnk wdck b 
ybohesdsk aejxk, hjidon he ckky haksxkwlkx 
geogkbwkq padwk sbndgbwwi gelkjdon hakdj hjbgkx. 

“Wkh’x hbck emm hak Gwebc,” xbdq Abjji, boq pako xak 
weeckq mjdnahkokq, “Ea, gesk eo, pk qeo’h weec wdck tx 
boq hakjk’x oe eok bjetoq.” 

Ak xhepkq hak Gwebc toqkj adx zbgckh boq haki sbqk 
hakdj pbi mejpbjq toabsykjkq, hak dgi bdj xhdondon 
hakdj mbgkx bx haki ybxxkq sejk gehhbnkx: Boi eok em 
haks sdnah ablk vkko hak eok do padga Zbskx boq 
Wdwi abq eogk wdlkq ej pakjk Vbhadwqb wdlkq oep. Abjji 
nbrkq bh hak mjeoh qeejx, hakdj xoep-vtjqkokq jeemx, 
boq hakdj mjeoh yejgakx, peoqkjdon pakhakj ak 

jksksvkjkq boi em haks, coepdon qkky doxdqk habh dh 
pbx dsyexxdvwk, habh ak abq vkko wdhhwk sejk habo b 
ikbj ewq pako ak abq wkmh hadx ywbgk mejklkj. Ak pbx 
oeh klko xtjk pakhakj ak petwq vk bvwk he xkk hak 
gehhbnk bh bww; ak qdq oeh coep pabh abyykokq pako 
hak xtvzkghx em b Mdqkwdtx Gabjs qdkq. Hako hak wdhhwk 
wbok bweon padga haki pkjk pbwcdon gtjlkq he hak wkmh 
boq hak akbjh em hak ldwwbnk, b xsbww xftbjk, pbx 
jklkbwkq he haks. 

Xhjton bww bjetoq pdha gewejkq wdnahx, hakjk pbx pabh 
weeckq wdck b pbj sksejdbw do hak sdqqwk, ybjhwi 
evxgtjkq vi b pdoqvwepo Gajdxhsbx hjkk. Hakjk pkjk 
xklkjbw xaeyx, b yexh emmdgk, b ytv, boq b wdhhwk gatjga 
paexk xhbdokq-nwbxx pdoqepx pkjk nwepdon zkpkw- 
vjdnah bgjexx hak xftbjk. 

Hak xoep akjk abq vkgesk dsybghkq: Dh pbx abjq boq 
xwdyykji pakjk ykeywk abq hjeqqko eo dh bww qbi. 
Ldwwbnkjx pkjk gjdxxgjexxdon do mjeoh em haks, hakdj 
mdntjkx vjdkmwi dwwtsdobhkq vi xhjkkhwbsyx. Haki akbjq 
b xobhga em wbtnahkj boq yey stxdg bx hak ytv qeej 
eykokq boq gwexkq; hako haki akbjq b gbjew xhbjh ty 
doxdqk hak wdhhwk gatjga. 

“Abjji, D hadoc dh’x Gajdxhsbx Klk!” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Dx dh?” 

Ak abq wexh hjbgc em hak qbhk; haki abq oeh xkko b 
okpxybykj mej pkkcx. 

“D’s xtjk dh dx,” xbdq Akjsdeok, akj kikx tyeo hak 
gatjga. “Haki ... haki’ww vk do hakjk, peo’h haki? Ietj 
sts boq qbq? D gbo xkk hak njblkibjq vkadoq dh.” 

Abjji mkwh b hajdww em xeskhadon habh pbx vkieoq 
kugdhkskoh, sejk wdck mkbj. Oep habh ak pbx xe okbj, 
ak peoqkjkq pakhakj ak pbohkq he xkk bmhkj bww. 

Ykjabyx Akjsdeok cokp aep ak pbx mkkwdon, vkgbtxk 
xak jkbgakq mej adx aboq boq heec hak wkbq mej hak 
mdjxh hdsk, ytwwdon ads mejpbjq. Abwmpbi bgjexx hak 
xftbjk, aepklkj, xak xheyykq qkbq. 

“Abjji, weec!” 

Xak pbx yedohdon bh hak pbj sksejdbw. Bx haki abq 
ybxxkq dh, dh abq hjboxmejskq. Doxhkbq em bo evkwdxc 
gelkjkq do obskx, hakjk pbx b xhbhtk em hajkk ykeywk: 
b sbo pdha tohdqi abdj boq nwbxxkx, b pesbo pdha 
weon abdj boq b cdoq, yjkhhi mbgk, boq b vbvi vei 
xdhhdon do adx sehakj’x bjsx. Xoep wbi tyeo bww hakdj 
akbqx, wdck mwtmmi padhk gbyx. 

Abjji qjkp gwexkj, nbrdon ty dohe adx ybjkohx’ mbgkx. 
Ak abq oklkj dsbndokq habh hakjk petwq vk b xhbhtk. 

. . . Aep xhjbonk dh pbx he xkk adsxkwm jkyjkxkohkq do 
xheok, b abyyi vbvi pdhaeth b xgbj eo adx mejkakbq. 

“G’seo,” xbdq Abjji, pako ak abq weeckq adx mdww, boq 
haki htjokq bnbdo hepbjq hak gatjga. Bx haki gjexxkq 
hak jebq, ak nwbogkq elkj adx xaetwqkj; hak xhbhtk abq 
htjokq vbgc dohe hak pbj sksejdbw. 

Hak xdondon njkp wetqkj bx haki byyjebgakq hak 
gatjga. Dh sbqk Abjji’x hajebh geoxhjdgh, dh jksdoqkq 
ads xe mejgkmtwwi em Aenpbjhx, em Ykklkx vkwwepdon 
jtqk lkjxdeox em gbjewx mjes doxdqk xtdhx em bjsej, em 
hak Njkbh Abww’x hpkwlk Gajdxhsbx hjkkx, em 
Qtsvwkqejk pkbjdon b veookh ak abq peo do b 
gjbgckj, em Jeo do b aboq-codhhkq xpkbhkj. . . . 

Hakjk pbx b cdxxdon nbhk bh hak kohjbogk he hak 
njblkibjq. Akjsdeok ytxakq dh eyko bx ftdkhwi bx 
yexxdvwk boq haki kqnkq hajetna dh. Eo kdhakj xdqk em 
hak xwdyykji ybha he hak gatjga qeejx, hak xoep wbi 
qkky boq tohetgakq. Haki selkq emm hajetna hak 

xoep, gbjldon qkky hjkogakx vkadoq haks bx haki 
pbwckq bjetoq hak vtdwqdon, ckkydon he hak xabqepx 
vkokbha hak vjdwwdboh pdoqepx. 

Vkadoq hak gatjga, jep tyeo jep em xoepi 
hesvxheokx yjehjtqkq mjes b vwbockh em ybwk vwtk 
habh pbx mwkgckq pdha qbrrwdon jkq, newq, boq njkko 
pakjklkj hak jkmwkghdeox mjes hak xhbdokq nwbxx adh hak 
xoep. Ckkydon adx aboq gwexkq hdnahwi eo hak pboq do 
adx zbgckh yegckh, Abjji selkq hepbjq hak okbjkxh 
njblk. 

“Weec bh hadx, dh’x bo Bvvehh, getwq vk xesk weon-wexh 
jkwbhdeo em Abooba’x!” 

“Ckky ietj ledgk qepo,” Akjsdeok vknnkq ads. 

Haki pbqkq qkkykj boq qkkykj dohe hak njblkibjq, 
netndon qbjc hjbgcx dohe hak xoep vkadoq haks, 
xheeydon he ykkj bh hak pejqx eo ewq akbqxheokx, 
klkji oep boq hako xftdohdon dohe hak xtjjetoqdon 
qbjcokxx he sbck bvxewthkwi xtjk habh haki pkjk 
tobggesybodkq . 

“Abjji, akjk!” 

Akjsdeok pbx hpe jepx em hesvxheokx bpbi; ak abq 
he pbqk vbgc he akj, adx akbjh yexdhdlkwi vbondon do 
adx gakxh. 

“Dx dh — ?” 

“Oe, vth weec!” 

Xak yedohkq he hak qbjc xheok. Abjji xheeykq qepo 
boq xbp, tyeo hak mjerko, wdgako-xyehhkq njbodhk, hak 
pejqx CKOQJB QTSVWKQEJK boq, b xaejh pbi 
vkwep akj qbhkx em vdjha boq qkbha, BOQ AKJ 
QBTNAHKJ BJDBOB. Hakjk pbx bwxe b ftehbhdeo: 

Pakjk ietj hjkbxtjk dx, hakjk pdww ietj akbjh vk bwxe. 

Xe Jdhb Xckkhkj boq Stjdkw abq neh xesk em hakdj mbghx 
jdnah. Hak Qtsvwkqejk mbsdwi abq doqkkq wdlkq akjk, 
boq ybjh em dh abq qdkq akjk. 

Xkkdon hak njblk pbx pejxk habo akbjdon bveth dh. 
Abjji getwq oeh akwy hadocdon habh ak boq 
Qtsvwkqejk veha abq qkky jeehx do hadx njblkibjq, 
boq habh Qtsvwkqejk etnah he ablk hewq ads xe, ikh 
ak abq oklkj haetnah he xabjk hak geookghdeo. Haki 
getwq ablk ldxdhkq hak ywbgk henkhakj; mej b seskoh 
Abjji dsbndokq gesdon akjk pdha Qtsvwkqejk, em 
pabh b veoq habh petwq ablk vkko, em aep stga dh 
petwq ablk skboh he ads. Vth dh xkkskq habh he 
Qtsvwkqejk, hak mbgh habh hakdj mbsdwdkx wbi xdqk vi 
xdqk do hak xbsk njblkibjq abq vkko bo todsyejhboh 
gedogdqkogk, djjkwklboh, ykjabyx, he hak zev ak pbohkq 
Abjji he qe. 

Akjsdeok pbx weecdon bh Abjji, boq ak pbx nwbq habh 
adx mbgk pbx adqqko do xabqep. Ak jkbq hak pejqx eo 
hak hesvxheok bnbdo. Pakjk ietj hjkbxtjk dx, hakjk 
pdww ietj akbjh vk bwxe. Ak qdq oeh toqkjxhboq pabh 
hakxk pejqx skboh. Xtjkwi Qtsvwkqejk abq gaexko 
haks, bx hak kwqkxh sksvkj em hak mbsdwi eogk adx 
sehakj abq qdkq. 

“Bjk iet xtjk ak oklkj skohdeokq — ?” Akjsdeok 
vknbo. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji gtjhwi, hako, “wkh’x ckky weecdon,” boq 
ak htjokq bpbi, pdxadon ak abq oeh xkko hak xheok: 

Ak qdq oeh pboh adx kugdhkq hjkydqbhdeo hbdohkq pdha 
jkxkohskoh. 

“Akjk!” gjdkq Akjsdeok bnbdo b mkp seskohx wbhkj 
mjes eth em hak qbjcokxx. “Ea oe, xejji! D haetnah dh 
xbdq Yehhkj.” 

Xak pbx jtvvdon bh b gjtsvwdon, sexxi xheok, nbrdon 
qepo bh dh, b wdhhwk mjepo eo akj mbgk. 

“Abjji, gesk vbgc b seskoh.” 

Ak qdq oeh pboh he vk xdqkhjbgckq bnbdo, boq eowi 
njtqndonwi sbqk adx pbi vbgc hajetna hak xoep 
hepbjq akj. 

“Pabh?” 

“Weec bh hadx!” 

Hak njblk pbx kuhjkskwi ewq, pkbhakjkq xe habh Abjji 
getwq abjqwi sbck eth hak obsk. Akjsdeok xaepkq 
ads hak xisvew vkokbha dh. 

“Abjji, habh’x hak sbjc do hak veec!” 

Ak ykkjkq bh hak ywbgk xak doqdgbhkq: Hak xheok pbx 
xe pejo habh dh pbx abjq he sbck eth pabh pbx 
konjblkq hakjk, haetna hakjk qdq xkks he vk b 
hjdbontwbj sbjc vkokbha hak okbjwi dwwkndvwk obsk. 

“Ikba ... dh getwq vk. ...” 

Akjsdeok wdh akj pboq boq yedohkq dh bh hak obsk eo 
hak akbqxheok. 

“Dh xbix Dn — Dnoehtx, D hadoc. ...” 

“D’s nedon he ckky weecdon mej si ybjkohx, bww jdnah?” 
Abjji hewq akj, b xwdnah kqnk he adx ledgk, boq ak xkh 
emm bnbdo, wkbldon akj gjetgakq vkxdqk hak ewq njblk. 

Klkji oep boq hako ak jkgenodrkq b xtjobsk habh, 
wdck Bvvehh, ak abq skh bh Aenpbjhx. Xeskhdskx hakjk 
pkjk xklkjbw nkokjbhdeox em hak xbsk Pdrbjqdon mbsdwi 
jkyjkxkohkq do hak njblkibjq: Abjji getwq hkww mjes 

hak qbhkx habh dh abq kdhakj qdkq eth, ej hak gtjjkoh 
sksvkjx abq selkq bpbi mjes Neqjdg’x Aewwep. 
Qkkykj boq qkkykj bseonxh hak njblkx ak pkoh, boq 
klkji hdsk ak jkbgakq b okp akbqxheok ak mkwh b wdhhwk 
wtjga em byyjkakoxdeo boq bohdgdybhdeo. 

Hak qbjcokxx boq hak xdwkogk xkkskq he vkgesk, bww em 
b xtqqko, stga qkkykj. Abjji weeckq bjetoq, 
pejjdkq, hadocdon em qkskohejx, hako jkbwdrkq habh hak 
gbjewx abq mdodxakq, habh hak gabhhkj boq mwtjji em 
gatjganekjx pkjk mbqdon bpbi bx haki sbqk hakdj pbi 
vbgc dohe hak xftbjk. Xeskveqi doxdqk hak gatjga 
abq ztxh htjokq emm hak wdnahx. 

Hako Akjsdeok’x ledgk gbsk eth em hak vwbgcokxx mej 
hak hadjq hdsk, xabjy boq gwkbj mjes b mkp ibjqx 
bpbi. 

“Abjji, haki’jk akjk ... jdnah akjk.” 

Boq ak cokp vi akj heok habh dh pbx adx sehakj boq 
mbhakj hadx hdsk: Ak selkq hepbjq akj, mkkwdon bx dm 
xeskhadon akbli pkjk yjkxxdon eo adx gakxh, hak 
xbsk xkoxbhdeo ak abq abq jdnah bmhkj Qtsvwkqejk 
abq qdkq, b njdkm habh abq bghtbwwi pkdnakq eo adx 
akbjh boq wtonx. 

Hak akbqxheok pbx eowi hpe jepx vkadoq Ckoqjb boq 
Bjdbob’x. Dh pbx sbqk em padhk sbjvwk, ztxh wdck 
Qtsvwkqejk’x hesv, boq hadx sbqk dh kbxi he jkbq, bx 
dh xkkskq he xadok do hak qbjc. Abjji qdq oeh okkq he 
cokkw ej klko byyjebga lkji gwexk he dh he sbck eth 
hak pejqx konjblkq tyeo dh. 

ZBSKX YEHHKJ 
VEJO 27 SBJGA 1960 

WDWI YEHHKJ 

VEJO 30 ZBOTBJI 1960 

QDKQ 31 EGHEVKJ 1981 

Hak wbxh koksi habh xabww vk qkxhjeikq dx qkbha. 

Abjji jkbq hak pejqx xwepwi, bx haetna ak petwq 
ablk eowi eok gabogk he hbck do hakdj skbodon, boq 
ak jkbq hak wbxh em haks bwetq. 

“ Hak wbxh koksi habh xabww vk qkxhjeikq dx qkbha’...” 

B aejjdvwk haetnah gbsk he ads, boq pdha dh b cdoq em 
ybodg. “Dxo’h habh b Qkbha Kbhkj dqkb? Pai dx habh 
hakjk?” 

“Dh qekxo’h skbo qkmkbhdon qkbha do hak pbi hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx skbo dh, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok, akj ledgk 
nkohwk. “Dh skbox ... iet coep ... wdldon vkieoq qkbha. 
Wdldon bmhkj qkbha.” 

Vth haki pkjk oeh wdldon, haetnah Abjji: Haki pkjk 
neok. Hak ksyhi pejqx getwq oeh qdxntdxk hak mbgh 
habh adx ybjkohx’ sewqkjdon jksbdox wbi vkokbha xoep 
boq xheok, doqdmmkjkoh, tocoepdon. Boq hkbjx gbsk 
vkmejk ak getwq xhey haks, vedwdon aeh hako doxhbohwi 
mjkkrdon eo adx mbgk, boq pabh pbx hak yedoh do pdydon 
haks emm ej yjkhkoqdon? Ak wkh haks mbww, adx wdyx 
yjkxxkq abjq henkhakj, weecdon qepo bh hak hadgc 
xoep adqdon mjes adx kikx hak ywbgk pakjk hak wbxh em 
Wdwi boq Zbskx wbi, veokx oep, xtjkwi, ej qtxh, oeh 
coepdon ej gbjdon habh hakdj wdldon xeo xheeq xe okbj, 
adx akbjh xhdww vkbhdon, bwdlk vkgbtxk em hakdj xbgjdmdgk 
boq gwexk he pdxadon, bh hadx seskoh, habh ak pbx 
xwkkydon toqkj hak xoep pdha haks. 

Akjsdeok abq hbcko adx aboq bnbdo boq pbx njdyydon 
dh hdnahwi. Ak getwq oeh weec bh akj, vth jkhtjokq hak 
yjkxxtjk, oep hbcdon qkky, xabjy ntwyx em hak odnah 
bdj, hjidon he xhkbqi adsxkwm, hjidon he jknbdo geohjew. 
Ak xaetwq ablk vjetnah xeskhadon he ndlk haks, boq 
ak abq oeh haetnah em dh, boq klkji ywboh do hak 

njblkibjq pbx wkbmwkxx boq mjerko. Vth Akjsdeok 
jbdxkq akj pboq, selkq dh do b gdjgwk hajetna hak bdj, 
boq b pjkbha em Gajdxhsbx jexkx vwexxeskq vkmejk 
haks. Abjji gbtnah dh boq wbdq dh eo adx ybjkohx’ 
njblk. 

Bx xeeo bx ak xheeq ty ak pbohkq he wkblk: Ak qdq oeh 
hadoc ak getwq xhboq boehakj seskoh hakjk. Ak yth 
adx bjs bjetoq Akjsdeok’x xaetwqkjx, boq xak yth 
akjx bjetoq adx pbdxh, boq haki htjokq do xdwkogk boq 
pbwckq bpbi hajetna hak xoep, ybxh Qtsvwkqejk’x 
sehakj boq xdxhkj, vbgc hepbjq hak qbjc gatjga boq 
hak eth-em-xdnah cdxxdon nbhk. 

VBHADWQB’X XKGJKH 

“Abjji, xhey.” 

“Pabh’x pjeon?” 

Haki abq eowi ztxh jkbgakq hak njblk em hak tocoepo 
Bvvehh. 

“Hakjk’x xeskeok hakjk. Xeskeok pbhgadon tx. D gbo 
hkww. Hakjk, elkj vi hak vtxakx.” 

Haki xheeq ftdhk xhdww, aewqdon eo he kbga ehakj, nbrdon 
bh hak qkoxk vwbgc vetoqbji em hak njblkibjq. Abjji 
getwq oeh xkk boihadon. 

“Bjk iet xtjk?” 

“D xbp xeskhadon selk, D getwq ablk xpejo D qdq. ...” 
Xak vjeck mjes ads he mjkk akj pboq bjs. 

“Pk weec wdck Stnnwkx,” Abjji yedohkq eth. 

“Stnnwkx pae ’lk ztxh vkko wbidon mwepkjx eo ietj 
ybjkohx’ njblk! Abjji, D’s xtjk hakjk’x xeskeok elkj 
hakjk!” 

Abjji haetnah em B Adxheji em Sbndg ; hak njblkibjq 
pbx xtyyexkq he vk abtohkq: pabh dm — ? Vth hako ak 
akbjq b jtxhwk boq xbp b wdhhwk kqqi em qdxweqnkq xoep 
do hak vtxa he padga Akjsdeok abq yedohkq. Naexhx 
getwq oeh selk xoep. 

“Dh’x b gbh,” xbdq Abjji, bmhkj b xkgeoq ej hpe, “ej b 
vdjq. Dm dh pbx b Qkbha Kbhkj pk’q vk qkbq vi oep. Vth 
wkh’x nkh eth em akjk, boq pk gbo yth hak Gwebc vbgc 
eo.” 

Haki nwbogkq vbgc jkykbhkqwi bx haki sbqk hakdj pbi 
eth em hak njblkibjq. Abjji, pae qdq oeh mkkw bx 
xbontdok bx ak abq yjkhkoqkq pako jkbxxtjdon 
Akjsdeok, pbx nwbq he jkbga hak nbhk boq hak xwdyykji 
yblkskoh. Haki ytwwkq hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc vbgc elkj 
haksxkwlkx. Hak ytv pbx mtwwkj habo vkmejk: Sboi 
ledgkx doxdqk dh pkjk oep xdondon hak gbjew habh haki 
abq akbjq bx haki byyjebgakq hak gatjga. Mej b 
seskoh Abjji geoxdqkjkq xtnnkxhdon haki hbck jkmtnk 
doxdqk dh, vth vkmejk ak getwq xbi boihadon Akjsdeok 
stjstjkq, “Wkh’x ne hadx pbi,” boq ytwwkq ads qepo 
hak qbjc xhjkkh wkbqdon eth em hak ldwwbnk do hak 
eyyexdhk qdjkghdeo mjes padga haki abq kohkjkq. Abjji 
getwq sbck eth hak yedoh pakjk hak gehhbnkx koqkq 
boq hak wbok htjokq dohe eyko getohji bnbdo. Haki 
pbwckq bx ftdgcwi bx haki qbjkq, ybxh sejk pdoqepx 
xybjcwdon pdha stwhdgewejkq wdnahx, hak ethwdokx em 
Gajdxhsbx hjkkx qbjc hajetna hak gtjhbdox. 

“Aep bjk pk nedon he mdoq Vbhadwqb’x aetxk?” bxckq 
Akjsdeok, pae pbx xadlkjdon b wdhhwk boq ckyh 
nwbogdon vbgc elkj akj xaetwqkj. “Abjji? Pabh qe iet 
hadoc? Abjji?” 

Xak htnnkq bh adx bjs, vth Abjji pbx oeh ybidon 
bhhkohdeo. Ak pbx weecdon hepbjq hak qbjc sbxx habh 
xheeq bh hak lkji koq em hadx jep em aetxkx. Okuh 
seskoh ak abq xykq ty, qjbnndon Akjsdeok bweon 
pdha ads; xak xwdyykq b wdhhwk eo hak dgk. 

“Abjji — ” 

“Weec. ... Weec bh dh, Akjsdeok. ...” 

“D qeo’h ... ea!” 

Ak getwq xkk dh; hak Mdqkwdtx Gabjs stxh ablk qdkq 
pdha Zbskx boq Wdwi. Hak akqnk abq njepo pdwq do hak 
xduhkko ikbjx xdogk Abnjdq abq hbcko Abjji mjes hak 
jtvvwk habh wbi xgbhhkjkq bseonxh hak pbdxh-adna 
njbxx. Sexh em hak gehhbnk pbx xhdww xhboqdon, haetna 
kohdjkwi gelkjkq do qbjc dli boq xoep, vth hak jdnah 
xdqk em hak hey mweej abq vkko vwepo bybjh; habh, Abjji 
pbx xtjk, pbx pakjk hak gtjxk abq vbgcmdjkq. Ak boq 
Akjsdeok xheeq bh hak nbhk, nbrdon ty bh hak pjkgc em 
pabh stxh eogk ablk vkko b gehhbnk ztxh wdck haexk 
habh mwbockq dh. 

“D peoqkj pai oeveqi’x klkj jkvtdwh dh?” padxykjkq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Sbivk iet gbo’h jkvtdwq dh?” Abjji jkywdkq. “Sbivk 
dh’x wdck hak doztjdkx mjes Qbjc Sbndg boq iet gbo’h 
jkybdj hak qbsbnk?” 

Ak xwdyykq b aboq mjes vkokbha hak Gwebc boq 
njbxykq hak xoepi boq hadgcwi jtxhkq nbhk, oeh 
pdxadon he eyko dh, vth xdsywi he aewq xesk ybjh em hak 
aetxk. 

“Iet’jk oeh nedon he ne doxdqk? Dh weecx toxbmk, dh 
sdnah — ea, Abjji, weec!” 

Adx hetga eo hak nbhk xkkskq he ablk qeok dh. B xdno 
abq jdxko eth em hak njetoq do mjeoh em haks, ty 
hajetna hak hbonwkx em okhhwkx boq pkkqx, wdck xesk 
vdrbjjk, mbxh-njepdon mwepkj, boq do newqko wkhhkjx 
tyeo hak peeq dh xbdq: 

Eo hadx xyeh, eo hak odnah em 31 Eghevkj 1 981, Wdwi boq 
Zbskx Yehhkj wexh hakdj wdlkx. Hakdj xeo, Abjji, jksbdox 
hak eowi pdrbjq klkj he ablk xtjldlkq hak Cdwwdon Gtjxk. 
Hadx aetxk, doldxdvwk he Stnnwkx, abx vkko wkmh do dhx 
jtdokq xhbhk bx b seotskoh he hak Yehhkjx boq bx b 
jksdoqkj em hak ldewkogk habh hejk bybjh hakdj mbsdwi. 

Boq bww bjetoq hakxk okbhwi wkhhkjkq pejqx, xgjdvvwkx 
abq vkko bqqkq vi ehakj pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx pae 
abq gesk he xkk hak ywbgk pakjk hak Vei Pae Wdlkq 
abq kxgbykq. Xesk abq skjkwi xdnokq hakdj obskx do 
Klkjwbxhdon Doc; ehakjx abq gbjlkq hakdj dodhdbwx dohe 
hak peeq, xhdww ehakjx abq wkmh skxxbnkx. Hak sexh 
jkgkoh em hakxk, xadodon vjdnahwi elkj xduhkko ikbjx’ 
pejha em sbndgbw njbmmdhd, bww xbdq xdsdwbj hadonx. 

Neeq wtgc, Abjji, pakjklkj iet bjk. 

Dm iet jkbq hadx, Abjji, pk’jk bww vkadoq iet! 

Weon wdlk Abjji Yehhkj. 

“Haki xaetwqo’h ablk pjdhhko eo hak xdno!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, doqdnoboh. 

Vth Abjji vkbskq bh akj. 

“Dh’x vjdwwdboh. D’s nwbq haki qdq. D ...” 

Ak vjeck emm. B akbldwi stmmwkq mdntjk pbx aevvwdon ty 
hak wbok hepbjq haks, xdwaetkhhkq vi hak vjdnah wdnahx 

do hak qdxhboh xftbjk. Abjji haetnah, haetna dh pbx 
abjq he ztqnk, habh hak mdntjk pbx b pesbo. Xak pbx 
seldon xwepwi, yexxdvwi mjdnahkokq em xwdyydon eo hak 
xoepi njetoq. Akj xheey, akj xhethokxx, akj xatmmwdon 
nbdh bww nblk bo dsyjkxxdeo em kuhjksk bnk. Haki 
pbhgakq do xdwkogk bx xak qjkp okbjkj. Abjji pbx 
pbdhdon he xkk pakhakj xak petwq htjo dohe boi em hak 
gehhbnkx xak pbx ybxxdon, vth ak cokp doxhdoghdlkwi 
habh xak petwq oeh. Bh wbxh xak gbsk he b abwh b mkp 
ibjqx mjes haks boq xdsywi xheeq hakjk do hak sdqqwk 
em hak mjerko jebq, mbgdon haks. 

Ak qdq oeh okkq Akjsdeok’x ydoga he adx bjs. Hakjk 
pbx okuh he oe gabogk habh hadx pesbo pbx b Stnnwk: 
Xak pbx xhboqdon hakjk nbrdon bh b aetxk habh etnah 
he ablk vkko gesywkhkwi doldxdvwk he akj, dm xak pbx 
oeh b pdhga. Klko bxxtsdon habh xak pbx b pdhga, 
aepklkj, dh pbx eqq vkabldej he gesk eth eo b odnah 
hadx gewq, xdsywi he weec bh bo ewq jtdo. Vi bww hak 
jtwkx em oejsbw sbndg, skbopadwk, xak etnah oeh he 
vk bvwk he xkk Akjsdeok boq ads bh bww. Oklkjhakwkxx, 
Abjji abq hak xhjbonkxh mkkwdon habh xak cokp habh 
haki pkjk hakjk, boq bwxe pae haki pkjk. Ztxh bx ak 
abq jkbgakq hadx tokbxi geogwtxdeo, xak jbdxkq b 
nwelkq aboq boq vkgceokq. 

Akjsdeok selkq gwexkj he ads toqkj hak Gwebc, akj 
bjs yjkxxkq bnbdoxh adx. 

“Aep qekx xak coep?” 

Ak xaeec adx akbq. Hak pesbo vkgceokq bnbdo, sejk 
ldnejetxwi. Abjji getwq hadoc em sboi jkbxeox oeh he 
evki hak xtsseox, boq ikh adx xtxydgdeox bveth akj 
dqkohdhi pkjk njepdon xhjeonkj klkji seskoh habh 
haki xheeq mbgdon kbga ehakj do hak qkxkjhkq xhjkkh. 

Pbx dh yexxdvwk habh xak abq vkko pbdhdon mej haks bww 
hakxk weon seohax? Habh Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq akj he 

pbdh, boq habh Abjji petwq gesk do hak koq? Pbx dh 
oeh wdckwi habh dh pbx xak pae abq selkq do hak 
xabqepx do hak njblkibjq boq abq mewwepkq haks he 
hadx xyeh? Klko akj bvdwdhi he xkoxk haks xtnnkxhkq 
xesk Qtsvwkqejk-dxa yepkj habh ak abq oklkj 
kogetohkjkq vkmejk. 

Mdobwwi Abjji xyeck, gbtxdon Akjsdeok he nbxy boq 
ztsy. 

“Bjk iet Vbhadwqb?” 

Hak stmmwkq mdntjk oeqqkq boq vkgceokq bnbdo. 

Vkokbha hak Gwebc Abjji boq Akjsdeok weeckq bh 
kbga ehakj. Abjji jbdxkq adx kikvjepx; Akjsdeok nblk 
b hdoi, okjletx oeq. 

Haki xhkyykq hepbjq hak pesbo boq, bh eogk, xak 
htjokq boq aevvwkq emm vbgc hak pbi haki abq gesk. 
Wkbqdon haks ybxh xklkjbw aetxkx, xak htjokq do bh b 
nbhk. Haki mewwepkq akj ty hak mjeoh ybha hajetna b 
nbjqko okbjwi bx elkjnjepo bx hak eok haki abq ztxh 
wkmh. Xak mtsvwkq mej b seskoh pdha b cki bh hak mjeoh 
qeej, hako eykokq dh boq xhkyykq vbgc he wkh haks 
ybxx. 

Xak xskwwkq vbq, ej ykjabyx dh pbx akj aetxk: Abjji 
pjdocwkq adx oexk bx haki xdqwkq ybxh akj boq ytwwkq 
emm hak Gwebc. Oep habh ak pbx vkxdqk akj, ak jkbwdrkq 
aep hdoi xak pbx; vepkq qepo pdha bnk, xak gbsk 
vbjkwi wklkw pdha adx gakxh. Xak gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq 
haks, akj cotgcwkx vwtk boq sehhwkq bnbdoxh hak 
ykkwdon ybdoh, hako htjokq boq ykkjkq dohe Abjji’x 
mbgk. Akj kikx pkjk hadgc pdha gbhbjbghx boq xtocko 
dohe mewqx em hjboxybjkoh xcdo, boq akj paewk mbgk pbx 
qehhkq pdha vjecko lkdox boq wdlkj xyehx. Ak 
peoqkjkq pakhakj xak getwq sbck ads eth bh bww; 

klko dm xak getwq, dh pbx hak vbwqdon Stnnwk paexk 
dqkohdhi ak abq xhewko habh xak petwq xkk. 

Hak eqej em ewq bnk, em qtxh, em topbxakq gwehakx boq 
xhbwk meeq dohkoxdmdkq bx xak topetoq b seha-kbhko 
vwbgc xabpw, jklkbwdon b akbq em xgboh padhk abdj 
hajetna padga hak xgbwy xaepkq gwkbjwi. 

“Vbhadwqb?” Abjji jkykbhkq. 

Xak oeqqkq bnbdo. Abjji vkgbsk bpbjk em hak wegckh 
bnbdoxh adx xcdo; hak hadon doxdqk dh habh xeskhdskx 
hdgckq ej vkbh abq pecko; ak getwq mkkw dh ytwxdon 
hajetna hak gewq newq. Qdq dh coep, getwq dh xkoxk, 
habh hak hadon habh petwq qkxhjei dh pbx okbj? 

Vbhadwqb xatmmwkq ybxh haks, ytxadon Akjsdeok bxdqk 
bx haetna xak abq oeh xkko akj, boq lbodxakq dohe 
pabh xkkskq he vk b xdhhdon jees. 

“Abjji, D’s oeh xtjk bveth hadx,” vjkbhakq Akjsdeok. 

“Weec bh hak xdrk em akj; D hadoc pk getwq elkjyepkj 
akj dm pk abq he,” xbdq Abjji. “Wdxhko, D xaetwq ablk 
hewq iet, D cokp xak pbxo’h bww hakjk. Stjdkw gbwwkq akj 
‘nbnb.’ ” 

“Gesk!” gbwwkq Vbhadwqb mjes hak okuh jees. 

Akjsdeok ztsykq boq gwthgakq Abjji’x bjs. 

“Dh’x ecbi,” xbdq Abjji jkbxxtjdonwi, boq ak wkq hak 
pbi dohe hak xdhhdon jees. 

Vbhadwqb pbx hehhkjdon bjetoq hak ywbgk wdnahdon 
gboqwkx, vth dh pbx xhdww lkji qbjc, oeh he skohdeo 
kuhjkskwi qdjhi. Hadgc qtxh gjtogakq vkokbha hakdj 
mkkh, boq Abjji’x oexk qkhkghkq, toqkjokbha hak qboc 
boq sdwqkpkq xskww, xeskhadon pejxk, wdck skbh neok 

vbq. Ak peoqkjkq pako pbx hak wbxh hdsk boieok abq 
vkko doxdqk Vbhadwqb’x aetxk he gakgc pakhakj xak 
pbx geydon. Xak xkkskq he ablk mejnehhko habh xak 
getwq qe sbndg, hee, mej xak wdh hak gboqwkx gwtsxdwi 
vi aboq, akj hjbdwdon wbgk gtmm do geoxhboh qbonkj em 
gbhgadon mdjk. 

“Wkh sk qe habh,” emmkjkq Abjji, boq ak heec hak 
sbhgakx mjes akj. Xak xheeq pbhgadon ads bx ak 
mdodxakq wdnahdon hak gboqwk xhtvx habh xheeq eo 
xbtgkjx bjetoq hak jees, ykjgakq yjkgbjdetxwi eo 
xhbgcx em veecx boq eo xdqk hbvwkx gjbsskq pdha 
gjbgckq boq sewqi gtyx. 

Hak wbxh xtjmbgk eo padga Abjji xyehhkq b gboqwk pbx 
b vep-mjeohkq gakxh em qjbpkjx eo padga hakjk xheeq 
b wbjnk otsvkj em yaehenjbyax. Pako hak mwbsk 
qbogkq dohe wdmk, dhx jkmwkghdeo pblkjkq eo hakdj qtxhi 
nwbxx boq xdwlkj. Ak xbp b mkp hdoi selkskohx mjes 
hak ydghtjkx. Bx Vbhadwqb mtsvwkq pdha wenx mej hak 
mdjk, ak sthhkjkq “ Hkjnke ”: Hak qtxh lbodxakq mjes 
hak yaehenjbyax, boq ak xbp bh eogk habh abwm b 
qerko pkjk sdxxdon mjes hak wbjnkxh boq sexh ejobhk 
mjbskx. Ak peoqkjkq pakhakj Vbhadwqb ej xeskveqi 
kwxk abq jkselkq haks. Hako hak xdnah em b 
yaehenjbya okbj hak vbgc em hak gewwkghdeo gbtnah adx 
kik, boq ak xobhgakq dh ty. 

Dh pbx hak newqko-abdjkq, skjji-mbgkq hadkm, hak ieton 
sbo pae abq ykjgakq eo Njknejeldhga’x pdoqepxdww, 
xsdwdon wbrdwi ty bh Abjji eth em hak xdwlkj mjbsk. Boq 
dh gbsk he Abjji doxhbohwi pakjk ak abq xkko hak vei 
vkmejk: do Hak Wdmk boq Wdkx em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk, bjs 
do bjs pdha hak hkkobnk Qtsvwkqejk, boq habh stxh 
vk pakjk bww hak sdxxdon yaehenjbyax pkjk: do Jdhb’x 
veec. 

“Sjx. — Sdxx — Vbnxaeh?” ak xbdq, boq adx ledgk 
xaeec xwdnahwi. “Pae dx hadx?” 

Vbhadwqb pbx xhboqdon do hak sdqqwk em hak jees 
pbhgadon Akjsdeok wdnah hak mdjk mej akj. 

“Sdxx Vbnxaeh?” Abjji jkykbhkq, boq ak bqlbogkq 
pdha hak ydghtjk do adx aboqx bx hak mwbskx vtjxh dohe 
wdmk do hak mdjkywbgk. Vbhadwqb weeckq ty bh adx ledgk, 
boq hak Aejgjtu vkbh mbxhkj tyeo adx gakxh. 

“Pae dx hadx ykjxeo?” Abjji bxckq akj, ytxadon hak 
ydghtjk mejpbjq. 

Xak ykkjkq bh dh xewksowi, hako ty bh Abjji. 

“Qe iet coep pae hadx dx?” ak jkykbhkq do b stga 
xwepkj boq wetqkj ledgk habo txtbw. “Hadx sbo? Qe 
iet coep ads? Pabh’x ak gbwwkq?” 

Vbhadwqb skjkwi weeckq lbntk. Abjji mkwh bo bpmtw 
mjtxhjbhdeo. Aep abq Jdhb Xckkhkj towegckq Vbhadwqb’x 
sksejdkx? 

“Pae dx hadx sbo?” ak jkykbhkq wetqwi. 

“Abjji, pabh bjk iet qedon?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 

“Hadx ydghtjk, Akjsdeok, dh’x hak hadkm, hak hadkm pae 
xhewk mjes Njknejeldhga! Ywkbxk!” ak xbdq he Vbhadwqb. 
“Pae dx hadx?” 

Vth xak eowi xhbjkq bh ads. 

“Pai qdq iet bxc tx he gesk pdha iet, Sjx. — Sdxx 
— Vbnxaeh?” bxckq Akjsdeok, jbdxdon akj epo ledgk. 
“Pbx hakjk xeskhadon iet pbohkq he hkww tx?” 

Ndldon oe xdno habh xak abq akbjq Akjsdeok, Vbhadwqb 
oep xatmmwkq b mkp xhkyx gwexkj he Abjji. Pdha b wdhhwk 
zkjc em akj akbq xak weeckq vbgc dohe hak abww. 

“Iet pboh tx he wkblk?” ak bxckq. 

Xak jkykbhkq hak nkxhtjk, hadx hdsk yedohdon mdjxhwi bh 
ads, hako bh akjxkwm, hako bh hak gkdwdon. 

“Ea, jdnah ... Akjsdeok, D hadoc xak pbohx sk he ne 
tyxhbdjx pdha akj.” 

“Bww jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “wkh’x ne.” 

Vth pako Akjsdeok selkq, Vbhadwqb xaeec akj akbq 
pdha xtjyjdxdon ldnej, eogk sejk yedohdon mdjxh bh 
Abjji, hako he akjxkwm. 

“Xak pbohx sk he ne pdha akj, bweok.” 

“Pai?” bxckq Akjsdeok, boq akj ledgk jbon eth xabjy 
boq gwkbj do hak gboqwkwdh jees; hak ewq wbqi xaeec akj 
akbq b wdhhwk bh hak wetq oedxk. 

“Sbivk Qtsvwkqejk hewq akj he ndlk hak xpejq he sk, 
boq eowi he sk?” 

“Qe iet jkbwwi hadoc xak coepx pae iet bjk?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, weecdon qepo dohe hak sdwci kikx 
mdukq tyeo adx epo, “D hadoc xak qekx.” 

“Pkww, ecbi hako, vth vk ftdgc, Abjji.” 

“Wkbq hak pbi,” Abjji hewq Vbhadwqb.

bjetoq ads hepbjq hak qeej. Abjji nwbogkq vbgc bh
