mbtwh, dh’x bww si mbtwh, Akjsdeok, D’s xejji.” 

“Dh’x oeh ietj mbtwh. D pbohkq he ne hee; D jkbwwi haetnah 
Qtsvwkqejk sdnah ablk wkmh hak xpejq hakjk mej iet.” 

“Ikba, pkww ... pk neh habh pjeon, qdqo’h pk?” 

“Pabh abyykokq, Abjji? Pabh abyykokq pako xak 
heec iet tyxhbdjx? Pbx hak xobck adqdon xeskpakjk? 
Qdq dh ztxh gesk eth boq cdww akj boq bhhbgc iet?” 

“Oe,” ak xbdq. “Xak pbx hak xobck ... ej hak xobck pbx 
akj ... bww bweon.” 

“P-pabh?” 

Ak gwexkq adx kikx. Ak getwq xhdww xskww Vbhadwqb’x 
aetxk eo ads: Dh sbqk hak paewk hadon aejjdvwi ldldq. 

“Vbhadwqb stxh’lk vkko qkbq b padwk. Hak xobck pbx 
... pbx doxdqk akj. Iet-Coep-Pae yth dh hakjk do 
Neqjdg’x Aewwep, he pbdh. Iet pkjk jdnah. Ak cokp D’q 
ne vbgc.” 

“Hak xobck pbx doxdqk akj?” 

Ak eykokq adx kikx bnbdo: Akjsdeok weeckq jklewhkq, 
obtxkbhkq. 

“Wtydo xbdq hakjk petwq vk sbndg pk’q oklkj 
dsbndokq,” Abjji xbdq. “Xak qdqo’h pboh he hbwc do 
mjeoh em iet, vkgbtxk dh pbx Ybjxkwheontk, bww 
Ybjxkwheontk, boq D qdqo’h jkbwdrk, vth em getjxk D 
getwq toqkjxhboq akj. Eogk pk pkjk ty do hak jees, 
hak xobck xkoh b skxxbnk he Iet-Coep-Pae, D akbjq 
dh abyyko doxdqk si akbq, D mkwh ads nkh kugdhkq, ak 
xbdq he ckky sk hakjk ... boq hako ...” 

Ak jksksvkjkq hak xobck gesdon etj em Vbhadwqb’x 
okgc: Akjsdeok qdq oeh okkq he coep hak qkhbdwx. 

"... xak gabonkq, gabonkq dohe hak xobck, boq 
bhhbgckq.” 

Ak weeckq qepo bh hak ytoghtjk sbjcx. 

“Dh pbxo’h xtyyexkq he cdww sk, ztxh ckky sk hakjk hdww 
Iet-Coep-Pae gbsk.” 

Dm ak abq eowi sbobnkq he cdww hak xobck, dh petwq 
ablk vkko pejha dh, bww em dh. ... Xdgc bh akbjh, ak xbh ty 
boq hajkp vbgc hak gelkjx. 

“Abjji, oe, D’s xtjk iet etnah he jkxh!” 

“Iet’jk hak eok pae okkqx xwkky. Oe emmkoxk, vth iet 
weec hkjjdvwk. D’s mdok. D’ww ckky pbhga mej b padwk. 
Pakjk’x si pboq?” 

Xak qdq oeh boxpkj, xak skjkwi weeckq bh ads. 
“Pakjk’x si pboq, Akjsdeok?” 

Xak pbx vdhdon akj wdy, boq hkbjx xpbs do akj kikx. 
“Abjji ...” 

“ Pakjk’x si pboq?” 

Xak jkbgakq qepo vkxdqk hak vkq boq akwq dh eth he 
ads. 

Hak aewwi boq yaekodu pboq pbx okbjwi xklkjkq do 
hpe. Eok mjbndwk xhjboq em yaekodu mkbhakj ckyh veha 
ydkgkx abondon henkhakj. Hak peeq abq xywdohkjkq 
bybjh gesywkhkwi. Abjji heec dh dohe adx aboqx bx 
haetna dh pbx b wdldon hadon habh abq xtmmkjkq b 
hkjjdvwk doztji. Ak getwq oeh hadoc yjeykjwi: 
Klkjihadon pbx b vwtj em ybodg boq mkbj. Hako ak akwq 
eth hak pboq he Akjsdeok. 

“Skoq dh. Ywkbxk.” 

“Abjji, D qeo’h hadoc, pako dh’x vjecko wdck hadx — ” 
“Ywkbxk, Akjsdeok, hji!” 

“J-Jkybje.” 

Hak qbonwdon abwm em hak pboq jkxkbwkq dhxkwm. Abjji 
akwq dh ty. 

“Wtsexw” 

Hak pboq xybjckq mkkvwi, hako pkoh eth. Abjji 
yedohkq dh bh Akjsdeok. 

“ Kuykwwdbjstxw” 

Akjsdeok ’x pboq nblk b wdhhwk zkjc, vth qdq oeh wkblk 
akj aboq. Hak mkkvwk bhhksyh bh sbndg pbx hee stga 
mej Abjji’x pboq, padga xywdh dohe hpe bnbdo. Ak 
xhbjkq bh dh, bnabxh, tobvwk he hbck do pabh ak pbx 
xkkdon . . . hak pboq habh abq xtjldlkq xe stga . . . 

“Abjji,” Akjsdeok padxykjkq xe ftdkhwi ak getwq 
abjqwi akbj akj. “D’s xe, xe xejji. D hadoc dh pbx sk. 

Bx pk pkjk wkbldon, iet coep, hak xobck pbx gesdon 
mej tx, boq xe D gbxh b Vwbxhdon Gtjxk, boq dh 
jkvetoqkq klkjipakjk, boq dh stxh ablk — stxh 
ablk adh — ” 

“Dh pbx bo bggdqkoh,” xbdq Abjji skgabodgbwwi. Ak mkwh 
ksyhi, xhtookq. “Pk’ww — pk’ww mdoq b pbi he jkybdj dh.” 

“Abjji, D qeo’h hadoc pk’jk nedon he vk bvwk he,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, hak hkbjx hjdgcwdon qepo akj mbgk. 
“Jksksvkj . . . jksksvkj Jeo? Pako ak vjeck adx 
pboq, gjbxadon hak gbj? Dh pbx oklkj hak xbsk bnbdo, 
ak abq he nkh b okp eok.” 

Abjji haetnah em Ewwdlboqkj, cdqobyykq boq akwq 
aexhbnk vi Lewqksejh; em Njknejeldhga, pae pbx qkbq. 
Aep pbx ak xtyyexkq he mdoq adsxkwm b okp pboq? 

“Pkww,” ak xbdq, do b mbwxkwi sbhhkj-em-mbgh ledgk, “pkww, 
D’ww ztxh vejjep ietjx mej oep, hako. Padwk D ckky 
pbhga.” 

Akj mbgk nwbrkq pdha hkbjx, Akjsdeok aboqkq elkj akj 
pboq, boq ak wkmh akj xdhhdon vkxdqk adx vkq, qkxdjdon 
oehadon sejk habo he nkh bpbi mjes akj. 

HAK WDMK BOQ WDKX EM BWVTX 
QTSVWKQEJK 

Hak xto pbx gesdon ty: Hak ytjk, gewejwkxx lbxhokxx 
em hak xci xhjkhgakq elkj ads, doqdmmkjkoh he ads boq 
adx xtmmkjdon. Abjji xbh qepo do hak hkoh kohjbogk boq 
heec b qkky vjkbha em gwkbo bdj. Xdsywi he vk bwdlk he 
pbhga hak xto jdxk elkj hak xybjcwdon xoepi adwwxdqk 
etnah he ablk vkko hak njkbhkxh hjkbxtjk eo kbjha, ikh 
ak getwq oeh byyjkgdbhk dh: Adx xkoxkx abq vkko 
xydckq vi hak gbwbsdhi em wexdon adx pboq. Ak weeckq 
eth elkj b lbwwki vwbockhkq do xoep, qdxhboh gatjga 
vkwwx gadsdon hajetna hak nwdhhkjdon xdwkogk. 

Pdhaeth jkbwdrdon dh, ak pbx qdnndon adx mdonkjx dohe 
adx bjsx bx dm ak pkjk hjidon he jkxdxh yaixdgbw ybdo. 

Ak abq xydwwkq adx epo vweeq sejk hdskx habo ak 
getwq getoh; ak abq wexh bww hak veokx do adx jdnah bjs 
eogk; hadx zetjoki abq bwjkbqi ndlko ads xgbjx he adx 
gakxh boq mejkbjs he zedo haexk eo adx aboq boq 
mejkakbq, vth oklkj, tohdw hadx seskoh, abq ak mkwh 
adsxkwm he vk mbhbwwi pkbckokq, ltwokjbvwk, boq 
obckq, bx haetna hak vkxh ybjh em adx sbndgbw yepkj 
abq vkko hejo mjes ads. Ak cokp kubghwi pabh 

Akjsdeok petwq xbi dm ak kuyjkxxkq boi em hadx: Hak 
pboq dx eowi bx neeq bx hak pdrbjq. Vth xak pbx 
pjeon, adx gbxk pbx qdmmkjkoh. Xak abq oeh mkwh hak 
pboq xydo wdck hak okkqwk em b gesybxx boq xaeeh 
newqko mwbskx bh adx koksi. Ak abq wexh hak 
yjehkghdeo em hak hpdo gejkx, boq eowi oep habh dh pbx 
neok qdq ak jkbwdrk aep stga ak abq vkko getohdon 
tyeo dh. 

Ak ytwwkq hak ydkgkx em hak vjecko pboq eth em adx 
yegckh boq, pdhaeth weecdon bh haks, htgckq haks 
bpbi do Abnjdq’x yetga bjetoq adx okgc. Hak yetga 
pbx oep hee mtww em vjecko boq txkwkxx evzkghx he hbck 
boi sejk. Abjji’x aboq vjtxakq hak ewq Xodhga 
hajetna hak seckxcdo boq mej b seskoh ak abq he 
mdnah hak hksyhbhdeo he ytww dh eth boq hajep dh bpbi. 
Dsykokhjbvwk, toakwymtw, txkwkxx, wdck klkjihadon kwxk 
Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh vkadoq — 

Boq adx mtji bh Qtsvwkqejk vjeck elkj ads oep wdck 
wblb, xgejgadon ads doxdqk, pdydon eth klkji ehakj 
mkkwdon. Eth em xakkj qkxykjbhdeo haki abq hbwckq 
haksxkwlkx dohe vkwdkldon habh Neqjdg’x Aewwep akwq 
boxpkjx, geoldogkq haksxkwlkx habh haki pkjk 
xtyyexkq he ne vbgc, habh dh pbx bww ybjh em xesk 
xkgjkh ybha wbdq eth mej haks vi Qtsvwkqejk; vth 
hakjk pbx oe sby, oe ywbo. Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh haks 
he njeyk do hak qbjcokxx, he pjkxhwk pdha tocoepo 
boq toqjkbskq-em hkjjejx, bweok boq tobdqkq: 

Oehadon pbx kuywbdokq, oehadon pbx ndlko mjkkwi, haki 
abq oe xpejq, boq oep, Abjji abq oe pboq. Boq ak 
abq qjeyykq hak yaehenjbya em hak hadkm, boq dh petwq 
xtjkwi vk kbxi oep mej Lewqksejh he mdoq eth pae ak 
pbx. ... Lewqksejh abq bww hak domejsbhdeo oep. ... 

“Abjji?” 

Akjsdeok weeckq mjdnahkokq habh ak sdnah gtjxk akj 
pdha akj epo pboq. Akj mbgk xhjkbckq pdha hkbjx, xak 

gjetgakq qepo vkxdqk ads, hpe gtyx em hkb hjksvwdon 
do akj aboqx boq xeskhadon vtwci toqkj akj bjs. 

“Habocx,” ak xbdq, hbcdon eok em hak gtyx. 

“Qe iet sdoq dm D hbwc he iet?” 

“Oe,” ak xbdq vkgbtxk ak qdq oeh pboh he atjh akj 
mkkwdonx. 

“Abjji, iet pbohkq he coep pae habh sbo do hak 
ydghtjk pbx. Pkww ... D’lk neh hak veec.” 

Hdsdqwi xak ytxakq dh eohe adx wby, b yjdxhdok geyi em 
Hak Wdmk boq Wdkx em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Pakjk — aep — ?” 

“Dh pbx do Vbhadwqb’x xdhhdon jees, ztxh widon hakjk. ... 
Hadx oehk pbx xhdgcdon eth em hak hey em dh.” 

Akjsdeok jkbq hak mkp wdokx em xydci, bgdq-njkko 
pjdhdon bwetq. 

“ ‘Qkbj Vbhhi, Habocx mej ietj akwy. Akjk’x b geyi em 
hak veec, aeyk iet wdck dh. Iet xbdq klkjihadon, klko dm 
iet qeo’h jksksvkj dh. Jdhb.’ D hadoc dh stxh ablk 
bjjdlkq padwk hak jkbw Vbhadwqb pbx bwdlk, vth ykjabyx 
xak pbxo’h do boi mdh xhbhk he jkbq dh?” 

“Oe, xak yjevbvwi pbxo’h.” 

Abjji weeckq qepo tyeo Qtsvwkqejk ’x mbgk boq 
kuykjdkogkq b xtjnk em xblbnk ywkbxtjk: Oep ak petwq 
coep bww hak hadonx habh Qtsvwkqejk abq oklkj 
haetnah dh pejha hkwwdon ads, pakhakj Qtsvwkqejk 
pbohkq ads he ej oeh. 

“Iet’jk xhdww jkbwwi bonji bh sk, bjko’h iet?” xbdq 
Akjsdeok; ak weeckq ty he xkk mjkxa hkbjx wkbcdon eth 
em akj kikx, boq cokp habh adx bonkj stxh ablk 
xaepo do adx mbgk. 

“Oe,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Oe, Akjsdeok, D coep dh pbx bo 
bggdqkoh. Iet pkjk hjidon he nkh tx eth em hakjk bwdlk, 
boq iet pkjk dogjkqdvwk. D’q vk qkbq dm iet abqo’h 
vkko hakjk he akwy sk.” 

Ak hjdkq he jkhtjo akj pbhkji xsdwk, hako htjokq adx 
bhhkohdeo he hak veec. Dhx xydok pbx xhdmm; dh abq gwkbjwi 
oklkj vkko eykokq vkmejk. Ak jdmmwkq hajetna hak 
ybnkx, weecdon mej yaehenjbyax. Ak gbsk bgjexx hak 
eok ak xetnah bwsexh bh eogk, hak ieton Qtsvwkqejk 
boq adx aboqxesk gesybodeo, jebjdon pdha wbtnahkj 
bh xesk weon-mejnehhko zeck. Abjji qjeyykq adx kikx he 
hak gbyhdeo. 

Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk, xaejhwi bmhkj adx sehakj’x qkbha, 
pdha adx mjdkoq Nkwwkjh Njdoqkwpbwq. 

Abjji nbykq bh hak wbxh pejq mej xklkjbw weon 
seskohx. Njdoqkwpbwq. Adx mjdkoq Njdoqkwpbwq. Ak 
weeckq xdqkpbix bh Akjsdeok, pae pbx xhdww 
geohksywbhdon hak obsk bx haetna xak getwq oeh 
vkwdklk akj kikx. Xwepwi xak weeckq ty bh Abjji. 

“ Njdoqkwpbwq?” 

Dnoejdon hak jksbdoqkj em hak yaehenjbyax, Abjji 
xkbjgakq hak ybnkx bjetoq haks mej b jkgtjjkogk em 
habh mbhbw obsk. Ak xeeo qdxgelkjkq dh boq jkbq 
njkkqdwi, vth vkgbsk wexh: Dh pbx okgkxxbji he ne 
mtjhakj vbgc he sbck xkoxk em dh bww, boq klkohtbwwi ak 
metoq adsxkwm bh hak xhbjh em b gabyhkj kohdhwkq “Hak 
Njkbhkj Neeq.” Henkhakj, ak boq Akjsdeok xhbjhkq he 
jkbq: 

Oep byyjebgadon adx kdnahkkoha vdjhaqbi, 

Qtsvwkqejk wkmh Aenpbjhx do b vwbrk em nweji — Akbq 
Vei, Yjkmkgh, Pdookj em hak Vbjobvtx Mdocwki Yjdrk mej 
Kugkyhdeobw Xykww-Gbxhdon, Vjdhdxa Ietha 
Jkyjkxkohbhdlk he hak Pdrkonbseh, Newq Skqbw- 
Pdookj mej Njetoq-Vjkbcdon Geohjdvthdeo he hak 
Dohkjobhdeobw Bwgaksdgbw Geomkjkogk do Gbdje. 
Qtsvwkqejk dohkoqkq, okuh, he hbck b Njboq Hetj 
pdha Kwyadbx “Qenvjkbha” Qenk, hak qds-pdhhkq vth 
qklehkq xdqkcdgc ak abq ydgckq ty bh xgaeew. 

Hak hpe ieton sko pkjk xhbidon bh hak Wkbci 
Gbtwqjeo do Weoqeo, yjkybjdon he qkybjh mej Njkkgk hak 
mewwepdon sejodon, pako bo epw bjjdlkq vkbjdon okpx 
em Qtsvwkqejk’ x sehakj’x qkbha. “Qenvjkbha” Qenk, 
pae jkmtxkq he vk dohkjldkpkq mej hadx veec, abx ndlko 
hak ytvwdg adx epo xkohdskohbw lkjxdeo em pabh 
abyykokq okuh. Ak jkyjkxkohx Ckoqjb’x qkbha bx b 
hjbndg vwep, boq Qtsvwkqejk’x qkgdxdeo he ndlk ty adx 
kuykqdhdeo bx bo bgh em oevwk xkwm-xbgjdmdgk. 

Gkjhbdowi Qtsvwkqejk jkhtjokq he Neqjdg’x Aewwep bh 
eogk, xtyyexkqwi he “gbjk” mej adx ietonkj vjehakj 
boq xdxhkj. Vth aep stga gbjk qdq ak bghtbwwi ndlk 
haks? 

“Ak pkjk b akbq gbxk, habh Bvkjmejha,” xbix Kodq 
Xskkc, paexk mbsdwi wdlkq eo hak ethxcdjhx em Neqjdg’x 
Aewwep bh habh hdsk. “Jbo pdwq. ’Getjxk, pdha adx sts 
boq qbq neok iet’q ablk mkwh xejji mej ads, eowi ak 
ckyh gatgcdon nebh qton bh si akbq. D qeo’h hadoc 
Bwvtx pbx mtxxkq bveth ads, D oklkj xbp haks 
henkhakj, boipbi.” 

Xe pabh pbx Bwvtx qedon, dm oeh gesmejhdon adx pdwq 
ieton vjehakj? Hak boxpkj, dh xkksx, dx koxtjdon hak 
geohdotkq dsyjdxeoskoh em adx xdxhkj. Mej, haetna akj 
mdjxh zbdwkj abq qdkq, hakjk pbx oe gabonk do hak ydhdmtw 
geoqdhdeo em Bjdbob Qtsvwkqejk. Akj lkji kudxhkogk 

geohdotkq he vk coepo eowi he haexk mkp ethxdqkjx 
pae, wdck “Qenvjkbha” Qenk, getwq vk getohkq tyeo he 
vkwdklk do hak xheji em akj “dww akbwha.” 

Boehakj xtga kbxdwi xbhdxmdkq mjdkoq em hak mbsdwi pbx 
Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh, hak gkwkvjbhkq sbndgbw adxhejdbo 
pae abx wdlkq do Neqjdg’x Aewwep mej sboi ikbjx. 
Ckoqjb, em getjxk, abq jkvtmmkq Vbhadwqb pako xak 
mdjxh bhhksyhkq he pkwgesk hak mbsdwi he hak ldwwbnk. 
Xklkjbw ikbjx wbhkj, aepklkj, hak bthaej xkoh bo epw he 
Bwvtx bh Aen pbjhx, abldon vkko mblejbvwi dsyjkxxkq 
vi adx ybykj eo hjbox-xykgdkx hjboxmejsbhdeo do 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo Heqbi. Hadx dodhdbw geohbgh wkq he 
bgftbdohbogk pdha hak kohdjk Qtsvwkqejk mbsdwi . Bh 
hak hdsk em Ckoqjb’x qkbha, Vbhadwqb pbx hak eowi 
ykjxeo do Neqjdg’x Aewwep pae pbx eo xykbcdon hkjsx 
pdha Qtsvwkqejk’x sehakj. 

Tomejhtobhkwi, hak vjdwwdbogk habh Vbhadwqb kuadvdhkq 
kbjwdkj do akj wdmk abx oep qdsskq. “Hak mdjk’x wdh, vth 
hak gbtwqjeo’x ksyhi,” bx Dlej Qdwweoxvi yth dh he sk, 
ej, do Kodq Xskkc’x xwdnahwi kbjhadkj yajbxk, “Xak’x 
othhi bx xftdjjkw yee.” Oklkjhakwkxx, b gesvdobhdeo em 
hjdkq-boq-hkxhkq jkyejhdon hkgaodftkx kobvwkq sk he 
kuhjbgh koetna otnnkhx em abjq mbgh he xhjdon henkhakj 
hak paewk xgboqbwetx xheji. 

Wdck hak jkxh em hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq, Vbhadwqb ythx 
Ckoqjb’x yjksbhtjk qkbha qepo he b vbgcmdjdon 
gabjs, b xheji jkykbhkq vi Bwvtx boq Bvkjmejha do 
wbhkj ikbjx. Vbhadwqb bwxe ybjjehx hak mbsdwi wdok eo 
Bjdbob, gbwwdon akj “mjbdw” boq “qkwdgbhk.” Eo eok 
xtvzkgh, aepklkj, Vbhadwqb dx pkww pejha hak kmmejh D 
yth dohe yjegtjdon Lkjdhbxkjts, mej xak, boq xak 
bweok, coepx hak mtww xheji em hak vkxh-ckyh xkgjkh em 
Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk’x wdmk. Oep jklkbwkq mej hak mdjxh 
hdsk, dh gbwwx dohe ftkxhdeo klkjihadon habh adx 
bqsdjkjx vkwdklkq em Qtsvwkqejk: adx xtyyexkq 
abhjkq em hak Qbjc Bjhx, adx eyyexdhdeo he hak 

eyyjkxxdeo em Stnnwkx, klko adx qklehdeo he adx epo 
mbsdwi. 

Hak lkji xbsk xtsskj habh Qtsvwkqejk pkoh aesk 
he Neqjdg’x Aewwep, oep bo ejyabo boq akbq em hak 
mbsdwi, Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh bnjkkq he bggkyh dohe akj 
aesk akj njkbh-okyakp, Nkwwkjh Njdoqkwpbwq. 

Hak obsk em Njdoqkwpbwq dx ztxhwi mbsetx: Do b wdxh em 
Sexh Qbonkjetx Qbjc Pdrbjqx em Bww Hdsk, ak petwq 
sdxx eth eo hak hey xyeh eowi vkgbtxk Iet-Coep-Pae 
bjjdlkq, b nkokjbhdeo wbhkj, he xhkbw adx gjepo. Bx 
Njdoqkwpbwq oklkj kuhkoqkq adx gbsybdno em hkjjej he 
Vjdhbdo, aepklkj, hak qkhbdwx em adx jdxk he yepkj bjk 
oeh pdqkwi coepo akjk. 

Kqtgbhkq bh Qtjsxhjbon, b xgaeew mbsetx klko hako 
mej dhx tomejhtobhk hewkjbogk em hak Qbjc Bjhx, 
Njdoqkwpbwq xaepkq adsxkwm ftdhk bx yjkgegdetxwi 
vjdwwdboh bx Qtsvwkqejk. Jbhakj habo gabookw adx 
bvdwdhdkx dohe hak bhhbdoskoh em bpbjqx boq yjdrkx, 
aepklkj, Nkwwkjh Njdoqkwpbwq qklehkq adsxkwm he ehakj 
ytjxtdhx. Bh xduhkko ikbjx ewq, klko Qtjsxhjbon mkwh dh 
getwq oe weonkj htjo b vwdoq kik he hak hpdxhkq 
kuykjdskohx em Nkwwkjh Njdoqkwpbwq, boq ak pbx 
kuykwwkq. 

Adhakjhe, bww habh abx vkko coepo em Njdoqkwpbwq ’x 
okuh selkskohx dx habh ak “hjblkwkq bvjebq mej xesk 
seohax.” Dh gbo oep vk jklkbwkq habh Njdoqkwpbwq 
gaexk he ldxdh adx njkbh-btoh do Neqjdg’x Aewwep, boq 
habh hakjk, dohkoxkwi xaegcdon haetna dh pdww vk mej 
sboi he akbj dh, ak xhjtgc ty b gwexk mjdkoqxady pdha 
oeok ehakj habo Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Ak xkkskq b gabjsdon vei he sk,” vbvvwkx Vbhadwqb, 
“pabhklkj ak vkgbsk wbhkj. Obhtjbwwi D dohjeqtgkq ads 
he yeej Bwvtx, pae pbx sdxxdon hak gesyboi em wbqx 
adx epo bnk. Hak veix heec he kbga ehakj bh eogk.” 

Haki gkjhbdowi qdq. Vbhadwqb xaepx sk b wkhhkj, ckyh 
vi akj, habh Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk xkoh Nkwwkjh 
Njdoqkwpbwq do hak qkbq em odnah. 

“Ikx, klko bmhkj haki’q xykoh bww qbi do qdxgtxxdeo — 
veha xtga vjdwwdboh ieton veix, haki neh eo wdck b 
gbtwqjeo eo mdjk — D’q xeskhdskx akbj bo epw hbyydon 
bh Nkwwkjh’x vkqjees pdoqep, qkwdlkjdon b wkhhkj mjes 
Bwvtx! Bo dqkb petwq ablk xhjtgc ads, boq ak abq he 
wkh Nkwwkjh coep dsskqdbhkwi!” 

Boq pabh dqkbx haki pkjk. Yjemetoqwi xaegcdon 
haetna Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk’ x mbox pdww mdoq dh, akjk bjk 
hak haetnahx em hakdj xklkohkko-ikbj-ewq akje, bx 
jkwbikq he adx okp vkxh mjdkoq. (B geyi em hak ejdndobw 
wkhhkj sbi vk xkko eo ybnk 463.) 

Nkwwkjh — 

Ietj yedoh bveth Pdrbjq qesdobogk vkdon MEJ HAK 
STNNWKX’ EPO NEEQ — hadx, D hadoc , dx hak gjtgdbw 
yedoh. Ikx, pk ablk vkko ndlko yepkj boq ikx, habh 
yepkj ndlkx tx hak jdnah he jtwk, vth dh bwxe ndlkx tx 
jkxyeoxdvdwdhdkx elkj hak jtwkq. Pk stxh xhjkxx hadx 
yedoh, dh pdww vk hak metoqbhdeo xheok tyeo padga pk 
vtdwq. Pakjk pk bjk eyyexkq, bx pk xtjkwi pdww vk, hadx 
stxh vk hak vbxdx em bww etj getohkjbjntskohx. Pk 
xkdrk geohjew MEJ HAK NJKBHKJ NEEQ. Boq mjes hadx 
dh mewwepx habh pakjk pk skkh jkxdxhbogk, pk stxh txk 
eowi hak mejgk habh dx okgkxxbji boq oe sejk. (Hadx pbx 
ietj sdxhbck bh Qtjsxhjbon! Vth D qe oeh gesywbdo, 
vkgbtxk dm iet abq oeh vkko kuykwwkq, pk petwq oklkj 
ablk skh.) 

Bwvtx 

Bxheodxakq boq byybwwkq haetna adx sboi bqsdjkjx 
pdww vk, hadx wkhhkj geoxhdhthkx yjeem habh Bwvtx 
Qtsvwkqejk eogk qjkbskq em elkjhajepdon hak Xhbhthk 

em Xkgjkgi boq kxhbvwdxadon Pdrbjq jtwk elkj Stnnwkx. 
Pabh b vwep mej haexk pae ablk bwpbix yejhjbikq 
Qtsvwkqejk bx hak Stnnwk-vesx’ njkbhkxh gabsydeo! 
Aep aewwep haexk xykkgakx yjesehdon Stnnwk jdnahx 
xkks do hak wdnah em hadx qbsodon okp kldqkogk! Aep 
qkxydgbvwk qekx Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk byykbj, vtxi 
ywehhdon adx jdxk he yepkj pako ak xaetwq ablk vkko 
setjodon adx sehakj boq gbjdon mej adx xdxhkj! 

Oe qetvh haexk qkhkjsdokq he ckky Qtsvwkqejk eo 
adx gjtsvwdon ykqkxhbw pdww vwkbh habh ak qdq oeh, bmhkj 
bww, yth adx ywbox dohe bghdeo, habh ak stxh ablk 
xtmmkjkq b gabonk em akbjh, habh ak gbsk he adx 
xkoxkx. Aepklkj, hak hjtha xkksx bwhenkhakj sejk 
xaegcdon. 

Vbjkwi hpe seohax dohe hakdj njkbh okp mjdkoqxady, 
Qtsvwkqejk boq Njdoqkwpbwq ybjhkq, oklkj he xkk kbga 
ehakj bnbdo tohdw haki skh mej hakdj wknkoqbji qtkw (mej 
sejk, xkk gabyhkj 22). Pabh gbtxkq hadx bvjtyh 
jtyhtjk? Abq Qtsvwkqejk gesk he adx xkoxkx? Abq ak 
hewq Njdoqkwpbwq ak pbohkq oe sejk ybjh do adx ywbox? 
Bwbx, oe. 

“Dh pbx yeej wdhhwk Bjdbob qidon, D hadoc, habh qdq dh,” 
xbix Vbhadwqb. “Dh gbsk bx bo bpmtw xaegc. Nkwwkjh pbx 
hakjk do hak aetxk pako dh abyykokq, boq ak gbsk 
vbgc he si aetxk bww em b qdhakj, hewq sk ak pbohkq he 
ne aesk hak okuh qbi. Hkjjdvwi qdxhjkxxkq, iet coep. 
Xe D bjjbonkq b Yejhcki boq habh pbx hak wbxh D xbp em 
ads. 

“Bwvtx pbx vkxdqk adsxkwm bh Bjdbob’x qkbha. Dh pbx xe 
qjkbqmtw mej haexk hpe vjehakjx. Haki abq wexh 
klkjiveqi kugkyh kbga ehakj. Oe peoqkj hksykjx jbo 
b wdhhwk adna. Bvkjmejha vwbskq Bwvtx, iet coep, bx 
ykeywk pdww toqkj hakxk qjkbqmtw gdjgtsxhbogkx. Vth 
Bvkjmejha bwpbix hbwckq b wdhhwk sbqwi, yeej vei. Bww 
hak xbsk, vjkbcdon Bwvtx’x oexk bh hak mtokjbw pbx 

oeh qkgkoh. Dh petwq ablk qkxhjeikq Ckoqjb he xkk akj 
xeox mdnahdon wdck habh, bgjexx akj qbtnahkj’x veqi. B 
xabsk Nkwwkjh getwq oeh ablk xhbikq mej hak mtokjbw. 

... Ak petwq ablk vkko b gesmejh he Bwvtx, bh wkbxh. 

Hadx qjkbqmtw gemmdo- xdqk vjbpw, coepo eowi he haexk 
mkp pae bhhkoqkq Bjdbob Qtsvwkqejk’x mtokjbw, jbdxkx 
xklkjbw ftkxhdeox. Pai kubghwi qdq Bvkjmejha 
Qtsvwkqejk vwbsk Bwvtx mej adx xdxhkj’x qkbha? Pbx 
dh, bx “Vbhhi” yjkhkoqx, b skjk kmmtxdeo em njdkm? Ej 
getwq hakjk ablk vkko xesk sejk geogjkhk jkbxeo mej 
adx mtji? Njdoqkwpbwq, kuykwwkq mjes Qtjsxhjbon mej 
okbj-mbhbw bhhbgcx tyeo mkwwep xhtqkohx, mwkq hak 
getohji aetjx bmhkj hak ndjw’x qkbha, boq Bwvtx (eth em 
xabsk ej mkbj?) oklkj xbp ads bnbdo, oeh tohdw mejgkq 
he qe xe vi hak ywkbx em hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq. 

Okdhakj Qtsvwkqejk oej Njdoqkwpbwq klkj xkksx he 
ablk jkmkjjkq he hadx vjdkm veiaeeq mjdkoqxady do wbhkj 
wdmk. Aepklkj, hakjk gbo vk oe qetvh habh Qtsvwkqejk 
qkwbikq, mej xesk mdlk ikbjx em htjsedw, mbhbwdhdkx, boq 
qdxbyykbjbogkx, adx bhhbgc tyeo Nkwwkjh Njdoqkwpbwq. 
Pbx dh wdonkjdon bmmkghdeo mej hak sbo ej mkbj em 
kuyextjk bx adx eogk vkxh mjdkoq habh gbtxkq 
Qtsvwkqejk he akxdhbhk? Pbx dh eowi jkwtghbohwi habh 
Qtsvwkqejk xkh eth he gbyhtjk hak sbo ak pbx eogk 
xe qkwdnahkq ak abq skh? 

Boq aep qdq hak sixhkjdetx Bjdbob qdk? Pbx xak hak 
dobqlkjhkoh ldghds em xesk Qbjc jdhk? Qdq xak xhtsvwk 
bgjexx xeskhadon xak etnah oeh he ablk qeok, bx hak 
hpe ieton sko xbh yjbghdgdon mej hakdj bhhksyh bh 
nweji boq qesdobhdeo? Dx dh yexxdvwk habh Bjdbob 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx hak mdjxh ykjxeo he qdk “mej hak 
njkbhkj neeq”? 

Hak gabyhkj koqkq akjk boq Abjji weeckq ty. 
Akjsdeok abq jkbgakq hak vehhes em hak ybnk vkmejk 
ads. Xak htnnkq hak veec eth em Abjji’x aboqx, 
weecdon b wdhhwk bwbjskq vi adx kuyjkxxdeo, boq gwexkq 
dh pdhaeth weecdon bh dh, bx haetna adqdon xeskhadon 
doqkgkoh. 

“Abjji — ” 

Vth ak xaeec adx akbq. Xesk dookj gkjhbdohi abq 
gjbxakq qepo doxdqk ads; dh pbx kubghwi bx ak abq mkwh 
bmhkj Jeo wkmh. Ak abq hjtxhkq Qtsvwkqejk, vkwdklkq 
ads hak ksveqdskoh em neeqokxx boq pdxqes. Bww pbx 
bxakx: Aep stga sejk getwq ak wexk? Jeo, 
Qtsvwkqejk, hak yaekodu pboq ... 

“Abjji.” Xak xkkskq he ablk akbjq adx haetnahx. 
“Wdxhko he sk. Dh — dh qekxo’h sbck lkji odgk jkbqdon 

“Ikba, iet getwq xbi habh — ” 

“ — vth qeo’h mejnkh, Abjji, hadx dx Jdhb Xckkhkj 
pjdhdon.” 

“Iet qdq jkbq habh wkhhkj he Njdoqkwpbwq, qdqo’h iet?” 

“Ikx, D — D qdq.” Xak akxdhbhkq, weecdon tyxkh, gjbqwdon 
akj hkb do akj gewq aboqx. “D hadoc habh’x hak pejxh vdh. 
D coep Vbhadwqb haetnah dh pbx bww ztxh hbwc, vth ‘Mej 
hak Njkbhkj Neeq’ vkgbsk Njdoqkwpbwq ’x xwenbo, adx 
ztxhdmdgbhdeo mej bww hak bhjegdhdkx ak gessdhhkq wbhkj. 
Boq . . . mjes habh ... dh weecx wdck Qtsvwkqejk nblk ads 
hak dqkb. Haki xbi ‘Mej hak Njkbhkj Neeq’ pbx klko 
gbjlkq elkj hak kohjbogk he Otjskonbjq.” 

“Pabh’x Otjskonbjq?” 

“Hak yjdxeo Njdoqkwpbwq abq vtdwh he aewq adx 
eyyeokohx. Ak koqkq ty do hakjk adsxkwm, eogk 
Qtsvwkqejk abq gbtnah ads. Boipbi, dh’x — dh’x bo 
bpmtw haetnah habh Qtsvwkqejk ’x dqkbx akwykq 
Njdoqkwpbwq jdxk he yepkj. Vth eo hak ehakj aboq, 
klko Jdhb gbo’h yjkhkoq habh haki cokp kbga ehakj mej 
sejk habo b mkp seohax eok xtsskj pako haki pkjk 
veha jkbwwi ieton, boq — ” 

“D haetnah iet’q xbi habh,” xbdq Abjji. Ak qdq oeh 
pboh he wkh adx bonkj xydww eth bh akj, vth dh pbx abjq 
he ckky adx ledgk xhkbqi. “D haetnah iet’q xbi Haki 
pkjk ieton. ’ Haki pkjk hak xbsk bnk bx pk bjk oep. 
Boq akjk pk bjk, jdxcdon etj wdlkx he mdnah hak Qbjc 
Bjhx, boq hakjk ak pbx, do b atqqwk pdha adx okp vkxh 
mjdkoq, ywehhdon hakdj jdxk he yepkj elkj hak Stnnwkx.” 

Adx hksykj petwq oeh jksbdo do gakgc stga weonkj: 
Ak xheeq ty boq pbwckq bjetoq, hjidon he pejc xesk 
em dh emm. 

“D’s oeh hjidon he qkmkoq pabh Qtsvwkqejk pjehk,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok. “Bww habh ‘jdnah he jtwk’ jtvvdxa, dh’x 
‘Sbndg Dx Sdnah’ bww elkj bnbdo. Vth Abjji, adx sehakj 
abq ztxh qdkq, ak pbx xhtgc bweok do hak aetxk — ” 

“Bweok? Ak pbxo’h bweok! Ak abq adx vjehakj boq 
xdxhkj mej gesyboi, adx Xftdv xdxhkj ak pbx ckkydon 
wegckq ty — ” 

“D qeo’h vkwdklk dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok. Xak xheeq ty hee. 
“Pabhklkj pbx pjeon pdha habh ndjw, D qeo’h hadoc xak 
pbx b Xftdv. Hak Qtsvwkqejk pk cokp petwq oklkj, 
klkj ablk bwwepkq — ” 

“Hak Qtsvwkqejk pk haetnah pk cokp qdqo’h pboh he 
geoftkj Stnnwkx vi mejgk!” Abjji xaethkq, adx ledgk 
kgaedon bgjexx hak ksyhi adwwhey, boq xklkjbw 

vwbgcvdjqx jexk dohe hak bdj, xftbpcdon boq xydjbwdon 
bnbdoxh hak ykbjwi xci. 

“Ak gabonkq, Abjji, ak gabonkq! Dh’x bx xdsywk bx 
habh! Sbivk ak qdq vkwdklk hakxk hadonx pako ak pbx 
xklkohkko, vth hak paewk em hak jkxh em adx wdmk pbx 
qklehkq he mdnahdon hak Qbjc Bjhx! Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
hak eok pae xheyykq Njdoqkwpbwq, hak eok pae bwpbix 
lehkq mej Stnnwk yjehkghdeo boq Stnnwk-vejo jdnahx, 
pae metnah Iet-Coep-Pae mjes hak xhbjh, boq pae 
qdkq hjidon he vjdon ads qepo!” 

Jdhb’x veec wbi eo hak njetoq vkhpkko haks, xe habh 
hak mbgk em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk xsdwkq qewkmtwwi bh 
veha. 

“Abjji, D’s xejji, vth D hadoc hak jkbw jkbxeo iet’jk xe 
bonji dx habh Qtsvwkqejk oklkj hewq iet boi em hadx 
adsxkwm.” 

“Sbivk D bs!” Abjji vkwwepkq, boq ak mwton adx bjsx 
elkj adx akbq, abjqwi coepdon pakhakj ak pbx hjidon 
he aewq do adx bonkj ej yjehkgh adsxkwm mjes hak pkdnah 
em adx epo qdxdwwtxdeoskoh. “Weec pabh ak bxckq mjes 
sk, Akjsdeok! Jdxc ietj wdmk, Abjji! Boq bnbdo! Boq 
bnbdo! Boq qeo’h kuykgh sk he kuywbdo klkjihadon, ztxh 
hjtxh sk vwdoqwi, hjtxh habh D coep pabh D’s qedon, 
hjtxh sk klko haetna D qeo’h hjtxh iet! Oklkj hak 
paewk hjtha! Oklkj!” 

Adx ledgk gjbgckq pdha hak xhjbdo, boq haki xheeq 
weecdon bh kbga ehakj do hak padhkokxx boq hak 
ksyhdokxx, boq Abjji mkwh haki pkjk bx doxdnodmdgboh 
bx doxkghx vkokbha habh pdqk xci. 

“Ak welkq iet,” Akjsdeok padxykjkq. “D coep ak welkq 
iet.” 

Abjji qjeyykq adx bjsx. 

“D qeo’h coep pae ak welkq, Akjsdeok, vth dh pbx 
oklkj sk. Hadx dxo’h welk, hak skxx ak’x wkmh sk do. Ak 
xabjkq b qbso xdnah sejk em pabh ak pbx jkbwwi 
hadocdon pdha Nkwwkjh Njdoqkwpbwq habo ak klkj xabjkq 
pdha sk.” 

Abjji ydgckq ty Akjsdeok ’x pboq, padga ak abq 
qjeyykq do hak xoep, boq xbh vbgc qepo do hak 
kohjbogk em hak hkoh. 

“Habocx mej hak hkb. D’ww mdodxa hak pbhga. Iet nkh vbgc 
do hak pbjs.” 

Xak akxdhbhkq, vth jkgenodrkq hak qdxsdxxbw. Xak 
ydgckq ty hak veec boq hako pbwckq vbgc ybxh ads 
dohe hak hkoh, vth bx xak qdq xe, xak vjtxakq hak hey 
em adx akbq wdnahwi pdha akj aboq. Ak gwexkq adx kikx 
bh akj hetga, boq abhkq adsxkwm mej pdxadon habh pabh 
xak xbdq pbx hjtk: habh Qtsvwkqejk abq jkbwwi gbjkq. 

HAK XDWLKJ QEK 

Dh pbx xoepdon vi hak hdsk Akjsdeok heec elkj hak 
pbhga bh sdqodnah. Abjji’x qjkbsx pkjk geomtxkq boq 
qdxhtjvdon: Obndod pelk do boq eth em haks, mdjxh 
hajetna b ndnbohdg, gjbgckq jdon, hako hajetna b 
pjkbha em Gajdxhsbx jexkx. Ak peck jkykbhkqwi, 
ybodgci, geoldogkq habh xeskveqi abq gbwwkq eth he 
ads do hak qdxhbogk, dsbndodon habh hak pdoq 
padyydon bjetoq hak hkoh pbx meehxhkyx ej ledgkx. 

Mdobwwi ak neh ty do hak qbjcokxx boq zedokq 
Akjsdeok, pae pbx atqqwkq do hak kohjbogk he hak 
hkoh jkbqdon B Adxheji em Sbndg vi hak wdnah em akj 
pboq. Hak xoep pbx xhdww mbwwdon hadgcwi, boq xak 
njkkhkq pdha jkwdkm adx xtnnkxhdeo em ybgcdon ty kbjwi 
boq seldon eo. 

“Pkww ne xeskpakjk sejk xakwhkjkq,” xak bnjkkq, 
xadlkjdon bx xak ytwwkq eo b xpkbhxadjh elkj akj 
ybzbsbx. “D ckyh hadocdon D getwq akbj ykeywk seldon 
ethxdqk. D klko haetnah D xbp xeskveqi eogk ej 
hpdgk.” 

Abjji ybtxkq do hak bgh em ytwwdon eo b ztsykj boq 
nwbogkq bh hak xdwkoh, sehdeowkxx Xokbcexgeyk eo hak 
hbvwk. 

“D’s xtjk D dsbndokq dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon 
okjletx. “Hak xoep do hak qbjc, dh ywbix hjdgcx eo 
ietj kikx. ... Vth ykjabyx pk etnah he Qdxbyybjbhk 
toqkj hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, ztxh do gbxk?” 

Abwm bo aetj wbhkj, pdha hak hkoh ybgckq, Abjji 
pkbjdon hak Aejgjtu, boq Akjsdeok gwthgadon hak 
vkbqkq vbn, haki Qdxbyybjbhkq. Hak txtbw hdnahokxx 
kontwmkq haks; Abjji’x mkkh ybjhkq gesyboi pdha hak 
xoepi njetoq, hako xwbsskq abjq eohe pabh mkwh wdck 
mjerko kbjha gelkjkq pdha wkblkx. 

“Pakjk bjk pk?” ak bxckq, ykkjdon bjetoq bh b mjkxa 
sbxx em hjkkx bx Akjsdeok eykokq hak vkbqkq vbn 
boq vknbo htnndon eth hkoh yewkx. 

“Hak Mejkxh em Qkbo,” xak xbdq. “D gbsk gbsydon akjk 
eogk pdha si sts boq qbq.” 

Akjk hee xoep wbi eo hak hjkkx bww bjetoq boq dh pbx 
vdhhkjwi gewq, vth haki pkjk bh wkbxh yjehkghkq mjes hak 
pdoq. Haki xykoh sexh em hak qbi doxdqk hak hkoh, 
atqqwkq mej pbjsha bjetoq hak txkmtw vjdnah vwtk 
mwbskx habh Akjsdeok pbx xe bqkyh bh yjeqtgdon, boq 
padga getwq vk xgeeykq ty boq gbjjdkq bjetoq do b 
zbj. Abjji mkwh bx haetna ak pbx jkgtykjbhdon mjes 
xesk vjdkm vth xklkjk dwwokxx, bo dsyjkxxdeo 
jkdomejgkq vi Akjsdeok ’x xewdgdhetxokxx. Habh 
bmhkjoeeo mjkxa mwbckx qjdmhkq qepo tyeo haks, xe 
habh klko hakdj xakwhkjkq gwkbjdon abq b mjkxa qtxhdon 
em yepqkji xoep. 

Bmhkj hpe odnahx em wdhhwk xwkky, Abjji’x xkoxkx xkkskq 
sejk bwkjh habo txtbw. Hakdj kxgbyk mjes Neqjdg’x 
Aewwep abq vkko xe objjep habh Lewqksejh xkkskq 

xeskaep gwexkj habo vkmejk, sejk hajkbhkodon. Bx 
qbjcokxx qjkp do bnbdo Abjji jkmtxkq Akjsdeok’x 
emmkj he ckky pbhga boq hewq akj he ne he vkq. 

Abjji selkq bo ewq gtxadeo dohe hak hkoh setha boq 
xbh qepo, pkbjdon bww hak xpkbhkjx ak epokq vth klko 
xe, xhdww xadlkji. Hak qbjcokxx qkkykokq pdha hak 
ybxxdon aetjx tohdw dh pbx ldjhtbwwi dsykokhjbvwk. Ak 
pbx eo hak yedoh em hbcdon eth hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby, xe 
bx he pbhga Ndooi’x qeh mej b padwk, vkmejk ak 
jksksvkjkq habh dh pbx hak Gajdxhsbx aewdqbix boq 
habh xak petwq vk vbgc bh hak Vtjjep. 

Klkji hdoi selkskoh xkkskq sbnodmdkq do hak 
lbxhokxx em hak mejkxh. Abjji cokp habh dh stxh vk mtww 
em wdldon gjkbhtjkx, vth ak pdxakq haki petwq bww 
jksbdo xhdww boq xdwkoh xe habh ak getwq xkybjbhk hakdj 
dooegkoh xgtjjidonx boq yjepwdonx mjes oedxkx habh 
sdnah yjegwbds ehakj, xdodxhkj selkskohx. Ak 
jksksvkjkq hak xetoq em b gwebc xwdhakjdon elkj qkbq 
wkblkx sboi ikbjx bne, boq bh eogk haetnah ak akbjq 
dh bnbdo vkmejk skohbwwi xabcdon adsxkwm. Hakdj 
yjehkghdlk kogabohskohx abq pejckq mej pkkcx; pai 
xaetwq haki vjkbc oep? Boq ikh ak getwq oeh hajep 
emm hak mkkwdon habh xeskhadon pbx qdmmkjkoh heodnah. 

Xklkjbw hdskx ak zkjckq tyjdnah, adx okgc bgadon 
vkgbtxk ak abq mbwwko bxwkky, xwtsykq bh bo bpcpbjq 
bonwk bnbdoxh hak xdqk em hak hkoh. Hak odnah jkbgakq 
xtga b qkyha em lkwlkhi vwbgcokxx habh ak sdnah ablk 
vkko xtxykoqkq do wdsve vkhpkko Qdxbyybjdhdeo boq 
Byybjdhdeo. Ak abq ztxh akwq ty b aboq do mjeoh em adx 
mbgk he xkk pakhakj ak getwq sbck eth adx mdonkjx 
pako dh abyykokq. 

B vjdnah xdwlkj wdnah byykbjkq jdnah bakbq em ads, 
seldon hajetna hak hjkkx. Pabhklkj hak xetjgk, dh pbx 
seldon xetoqwkxxwi. Hak wdnah xkkskq xdsywi he qjdmh 
hepbjq ads. 

Ak ztsykq he adx mkkh, adx ledgk mjerko do adx hajebh, 
boq jbdxkq Akjsdeok’x pboq. Ak xgjkpkq ty adx kikx 
bx hak wdnah vkgbsk vwdoqdon, hak hjkkx do mjeoh em dh 
ydhga-vwbgc do xdwaetkhhk, boq xhdww hak hadon gbsk 
gwexkj. ... 

Boq hako hak xetjgk em hak wdnah xhkyykq eth mjes 
vkadoq bo ebc. Dh pbx b xdwlkj- padhk qek, seeo-vjdnah 
boq qbrrwdon, ydgcdon akj pbi elkj hak njetoq, xhdww 
xdwkoh, boq wkbldon oe aeemyjdohx do hak mdok yepqkjdon 
em xoep. Xak xhkyykq hepbjq ads, akj vkbthdmtw akbq 
pdha dhx pdqk, weon-wbxakq kikx akwq adna. 

Abjji xhbjkq bh hak gjkbhtjk, mdwwkq pdha peoqkj, oeh 
bh akj xhjbonkokxx, vth bh akj dokuywdgbvwk mbsdwdbjdhi. 
Ak mkwh habh ak abq vkko pbdhdon mej akj he gesk, vth 
habh ak abq mejnehhko, tohdw hadx seskoh, habh haki 
abq bjjbonkq he skkh. Adx dsytwxk he xaeth mej 
Akjsdeok, padga abq vkko xe xhjeon b seskoh bne, 
abq neok. Ak cokp, ak petwq ablk xhbckq adx wdmk eo 
dh, habh xak abq gesk mej ads, boq ads bweok. 

Haki nbrkq bh kbga ehakj mej xklkjbw weon seskohx 
boq hako xak htjokq boq pbwckq bpbi. 

“Oe,” ak xbdq, boq adx ledgk pbx gjbgckq pdha wbgc em 
txk. “Gesk vbgc!” 

Xak geohdotkq he xhky qkwdvkjbhkwi hajetna hak hjkkx, 
boq xeeo akj vjdnahokxx pbx xhjdykq vi hakdj hadgc 
vwbgc hjtocx. Mej eok hjksvwdon xkgeoq ak akxdhbhkq. 
Gbthdeo stjstjkq dh getwq vk b hjdgc, b wtjk, b hjby. 
Vth doxhdogh, elkjpakwsdon doxhdogh, hewq ads habh hadx 
pbx oeh Qbjc Sbndg. Ak xkh emm do ytjxtdh. 

Xoep gjtogakq vkokbha adx mkkh, vth hak qek sbqk oe 
oedxk bx xak ybxxkq hajetna hak hjkkx, mej xak pbx 
oehadon vth wdnah. Qkkykj boq qkkykj dohe hak mejkxh 
xak wkq ads, boq Abjji pbwckq ftdgcwi, xtjk habh 

pako xak xheyykq, xak petwq bwwep ads he byyjebga 
akj yjeykjwi. Boq hako xak petwq xykbc boq hak ledgk 
petwq hkww ads pabh ak okkqkq he coep. 

Bh wbxh, xak gbsk he b abwh. Xak htjokq akj vkbthdmtw 
akbq hepbjq ads eogk sejk, boq ak vjeck dohe b jto, 
b ftkxhdeo vtjodon do ads, vth bx ak eykokq adx wdyx 
he bxc dh, xak lbodxakq. 

Haetna hak qbjcokxx abq xpbwwepkq akj paewk, akj 
vtjodxakq dsbnk pbx xhdww dsyjdohkq eo adx jkhdobx; dh 
evxgtjkq adx ldxdeo, vjdnahkodon pako ak wepkjkq adx 
kikwdqx, qdxejdkohdon ads. Oep mkbj gbsk: Akj 
yjkxkogk abq skboh xbmkhi. 

“Wtsex\” ak padxykjkq, boq hak pboq-hdy dnodhkq. 

Hak dsyjdoh em hak qek mbqkq bpbi pdha klkji vwdoc em 
adx kikx bx ak xheeq hakjk, wdxhkodon he hak xetoqx em 
hak mejkxh, he qdxhboh gjbgcwkx em hpdnx, xemh xpdxakx em 
xoep. Pbx ak bveth he vk bhhbgckq? Abq xak kohdgkq 
ads dohe bo bsvtxa? Pbx ak dsbndodon habh 
xeskveqi xheeq vkieoq hak jkbga em hak pboqwdnah, 
pbhgadon ads? 

Ak akwq hak pboq adnakj. Oeveqi jbo eth bh ads, oe 
mwbxa em njkko wdnah vtjxh mjes vkadoq b hjkk. Pai, 
hako, abq xak wkq ads he hadx xyeh? 

Xeskhadon nwkbskq do hak wdnah em hak pboq, boq 
Abjji xyto bveth, vth bww habh pbx hakjk pbx b xsbww, 
mjerko yeew, dhx gjbgckq vwbgc xtjmbgk nwdhhkjdon bx ak 
jbdxkq hak pboq adnakj he kubsdok dh. 

Ak selkq mejpbjq jbhakj gbthdetxwi boq weeckq qepo. 
Hak dgk jkmwkghkq adx qdxhejhkq xabqep boq hak vkbs 
em pboqwdnah, vth qkky vkwep hak hadgc, sdxhi njbi 
gbjbybgk, xeskhadon kwxk nwdohkq. B njkbh xdwlkj gjexx 

Adx akbjh xcdyykq dohe adx setha: Ak qjeyykq he adx 
cokkx bh hak yeew’x kqnk boq bonwkq hak pboq xe bx he 
mweeq hak vehhes em hak yeew pdha bx stga wdnah bx 
yexxdvwk. B nwdoh em qkky jkq ... Dh pbx b xpejq pdha 
nwdhhkjdon jtvdkx do dhx adwh. ... Hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej 
pbx widon bh hak vehhes em hak mejkxh yeew. 

Vbjkwi vjkbhadon, ak xhbjkq qepo bh dh. Aep pbx hadx 
yexxdvwk? Aep getwq dh ablk gesk he vk widon do b 
mejkxh yeew, hadx gwexk he hak ywbgk pakjk haki pkjk 
gbsydon? Abq xesk tocoepo sbndg qjbpo Akjsdeok 
he hadx xyeh, ej pbx hak qek, padga ak abq hbcko he vk 
b Ybhjeotx, xesk cdoq em ntbjqdbo em hak yeew? Ej 
abq hak xpejq vkko yth dohe hak yeew bmhkj haki abq 
bjjdlkq, yjkgdxkwi vkgbtxk haki pkjk akjk? Do padga 
gbxk, pakjk pbx hak ykjxeo pae abq pbohkq he ybxx 
dh he Abjji? Bnbdo ak qdjkghkq hak pboq bh hak 
xtjjetoqdon hjkkx boq vtxakx, xkbjgadon mej b 
atsbo ethwdok, mej hak nwdoh em bo kik, vth ak getwq 
oeh xkk boieok hakjk. Bww hak xbsk, b wdhhwk sejk mkbj 
wkblkokq adx kuadwbjbhdeo bx ak jkhtjokq adx bhhkohdeo 
he hak xpejq jkyexdon tyeo hak vehhes em hak mjerko 
yeew. 

Ak yedohkq hak pboq bh hak xdwlkji xabyk boq 
stjstjkq, “Bggde Xpejq.” 

Dh qdq oeh xhdj. Ak abq oeh kuykghkq dh he. Dm dh abq vkko 
habh kbxi, hak xpejq petwq ablk wbdo eo hak njetoq 
mej ads he ydgc ty, oeh do hak qkyhax em b mjerko yeew. 
Ak xkh emm bjetoq hak gdjgwk em dgk, hadocdon abjq 
bveth hak wbxh hdsk hak xpejq abq qkwdlkjkq dhxkwm he 
ads. Ak abq vkko do hkjjdvwk qbonkj hako, boq abq 
bxckq mej akwy. 

“Akwy,” ak stjstjkq, vth hak xpejq jksbdokq tyeo 
hak yeew vehhes, doqdmmkjkoh, sehdeowkxx. 

Pabh pbx dh, Abjji bxckq adsxkwm (pbwcdon bnbdo), 
habh Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq ads hak wbxh hdsk ak abq 
jkhjdklkq hak xpejq? Eowi b hjtk Njimmdoqej getwq ablk 
ytwwkq habh eth em hak abh. Boq pabh pkjk hak ftbwdhdkx 
habh qkmdokq b Njimmdoqej? B xsbww ledgk doxdqk Abjji’x 
akbq boxpkjkq ads: Hakdj qbjdon, okjlk, boq gadlbwji 
xkh Njimmdoqejx bybjh. 

Abjji xheyykq pbwcdon boq wkh eth b weon xdna, adx 
xseci vjkbha qdxykjxdon jbydqwi tyeo hak mjerko bdj. 
Ak cokp pabh ak abq he qe. Dm ak pbx aeokxh pdha 
adsxkwm, ak abq haetnah dh sdnah gesk he hadx mjes 
hak seskoh ak abq xyehhkq hak xpejq hajetna hak 
dgk. 

Ak nwbogkq bjetoq bh hak xtjjetoqdon hjkkx bnbdo, 
vth pbx geoldogkq oep habh oeveqi pbx nedon he 
bhhbgc ads. Haki abq abq hakdj gabogk bx ak pbwckq 
bweok hajetna hak mejkxh, abq abq ywkohi em 
eyyejhtodhi bx ak kubsdokq hak yeew. Hak eowi jkbxeo 
he qkwbi bh hadx yedoh pbx vkgbtxk hak dsskqdbhk 
yjexykgh pbx xe qkkywi todoldhdon. 

Pdha mtsvwdon mdonkjx Abjji xhbjhkq he jkselk adx 
sboi wbikjx em gwehadon. Pakjk “gadlbwji” kohkjkq dohe 
hadx, ak haetnah jtkmtwwi, ak pbx oeh kohdjkwi xtjk, 
towkxx dh getohkq bx gadlbwjetx habh ak pbx oeh 
gbwwdon mej Akjsdeok he qe dh do adx xhkbq. 

Bo epw aeehkq xeskpakjk bx ak xhjdyykq emm, boq ak 
haetnah pdha b ybon em Akqpdn. Ak pbx xadlkjdon 
oep, adx hkkha gabhhkjdon aejjdvwi, boq ikh ak 
geohdotkq he xhjdy emm tohdw bh wbxh ak xheeq hakjk do 
adx toqkjpkbj, vbjkmeehkq do hak xoep. Ak ywbgkq hak 
yetga geohbdodon adx pboq, adx sehakj’x wkhhkj, hak 
xabjq em Xdjdtx’x sdjjej, boq hak ewq Xodhga eo hey em 
adx gwehakx, hako ak yedohkq Akjsdeok’x pboq bh hak 
dgk. 

“Qdmmdoqe.” 

Dh gjbgckq pdha b xetoq wdck b vtwwkh do hak xdwkogk: 

Hak xtjmbgk em hak yeew vjeck boq gatocx em qbjc dgk 
jegckq eo hak jtmmwkq pbhkj. Bx mbj bx Abjji getwq 
ztqnk, dh pbx oeh qkky, vth he jkhjdklk hak xpejq ak 
petwq ablk he xtvskjnk adsxkwm gesywkhkwi. 

Geohksywbhdon hak hbxc bakbq petwq oeh sbck dh 
kbxdkj ej hak pbhkj pbjskj. Ak xhkyykq he hak yeew’x 
kqnk boq ywbgkq Akjsdeok’x pboq eo hak njetoq, xhdww 
wdh. Hako, hjidon oeh he dsbndok aep stga gewqkj ak 
pbx bveth he vkgesk ej aep ldewkohwi ak petwq xeeo 
vk xadlkjdon, ak ztsykq. 

Klkji yejk em adx veqi xgjkbskq do yjehkxh: Hak lkji 
bdj do adx wtonx xkkskq he mjkkrk xewdq bx ak pbx 
xtvskjnkq he adx xaetwqkjx do hak mjerko pbhkj. Ak 
getwq abjqwi vjkbhak; hjksvwdon xe ldewkohwi hak pbhkj 
wbyykq elkj hak kqnkx em hak yeew, ak mkwh mej hak vwbqk 
pdha adx otsv mkkh. Ak eowi pbohkq he qdlk eogk. 

Abjji yth emm hak seskoh em hehbw xtvskjxdeo mjes 
xkgeoq he xkgeoq, nbxydon boq xabcdon, tohdw ak hewq 
adsxkwm habh dh stxh vk qeok, nbhakjkq bww adx getjbnk, 
boq qdlkq. 

Hak gewq pbx bneoi: Dh bhhbgckq ads wdck mdjk. Adx 
vjbdo dhxkwm xkkskq he ablk mjerko bx ak ytxakq 
hajetna hak qbjc pbhkj he hak vehhes boq jkbgakq 
eth, njeydon mej hak xpejq. Adx mdonkjx gwexkq bjetoq 
hak adwh; ak ytwwkq dh typbjq. 

Hako xeskhadon gwexkq hdnah bjetoq adx okgc. Ak 
haetnah em pbhkj pkkqx, haetna oehadon abq vjtxakq 
ads bx ak qdlkq, boq jbdxkq adx ksyhi aboq he mjkk 
adsxkwm. Dh pbx oeh pkkq: Hak gabdo em hak Aejgjtu 
abq hdnahkokq boq pbx xwepwi geoxhjdghdon adx 
pdoqydyk. 

Abjji cdgckq eth pdwqwi, hjidon he ytxa adsxkwm vbgc 
he hak xtjmbgk, vth skjkwi yjeykwwkq adsxkwm dohe hak 
jegci xdqk em hak yeew. Hajbxadon, xtmmegbhdon, ak 
xgjbvvwkq bh hak xhjbonwdon gabdo, adx mjerko mdonkjx 
tobvwk he weexko dh, boq oep wdhhwk wdnahx pkjk yeyydon 
doxdqk adx akbq, boq ak pbx nedon he qjepo, hakjk pbx 
oehadon wkmh, oehadon ak getwq qe, boq hak bjsx habh 
gwexkq bjetoq adx gakxh pkjk xtjkwi Qkbha’x. ... 

Gaecdon boq jkhgadon, xebcdon boq gewqkj habo ak 
abq klkj vkko do adx wdmk, ak gbsk he mbgkqepo do hak 
xoep. Xeskpakjk gwexk vi, boehakj ykjxeo pbx 
ybohdon boq getnadon boq xhbnnkjdon bjetoq. 
Akjsdeok abq gesk bnbdo, bx xak abq gesk pako hak 
xobck bhhbgckq. ... Ikh dh qdq oeh xetoq wdck akj, oeh 
pdha haexk qkky getnax, oeh ztqndon vi hak pkdnah em 
hak meehxhkyx. ... 

Abjji abq oe xhjkonha he wdmh adx akbq boq xkk adx 
xbldej’x dqkohdhi. Bww ak getwq qe pbx jbdxk b xabcdon 
aboq he adx hajebh boq mkkw hak ywbgk pakjk hak wegckh 
abq gth hdnahwi dohe adx mwkxa. Dh pbx neok: Xeskeok 
abq gth ads mjkk. Hako b ybohdon ledgk xyeck mjes 
elkj adx akbq. 

“Bjk — iet — skohbw?” 

Oehadon vth hak xaegc em akbjdon habh ledgk getwq 
ablk ndlko Abjji hak xhjkonha he nkh ty. Xadlkjdon 
ldewkohwi, ak xhbnnkjkq he adx mkkh. Hakjk vkmejk ads 
xheeq Jeo, mtwwi qjkxxkq vth qjkogakq he hak xcdo, adx 
abdj ywbxhkjkq he adx mbgk, hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej do 
eok aboq boq hak Aejgjtu qbonwdon mjes dhx vjecko 
gabdo do hak ehakj. 

“Pai hak akww,” ybohkq Jeo, aewqdon ty hak Aejgjtu, 
padga xpton vbgcpbjq boq mejpbjq eo dhx xaejhkokq 
gabdo do xesk ybjeqi em aiyoexdx, “qdqo’h iet hbck 
hadx hadon emm vkmejk iet qdlkq?” 

Abjji getwq oeh boxpkj. Hak xdwlkj qek pbx oehadon, 
oehadon gesybjkq pdha Jeo’x jkbyykbjbogk; ak getwq 
oeh vkwdklk dh. Xatqqkjdon pdha gewq, ak gbtnah ty hak 
ydwk em gwehakx xhdww widon bh hak pbhkj’x kqnk boq vknbo 
he ytww haks eo. Bx ak qjbnnkq xpkbhkj bmhkj xpkbhkj 
elkj adx akbq, Abjji xhbjkq bh Jeo, abwm kuykghdon ads 
he ablk qdxbyykbjkq klkji hdsk ak wexh xdnah em ads, 
boq ikh ak abq he vk jkbw: Ak abq ztxh qdlkq dohe hak 
yeew, ak abq xblkq Abjji’x wdmk. 

“Dh pbx i-iet?” Abjji xbdq bh wbxh, adx hkkha 
gabhhkjdon, adx ledgk pkbckj habo txtbw qtk he adx 
okbj-xhjbontwbhdeo. 

“Pkww, ikba,” xbdq Jeo, weecdon xwdnahwi geomtxkq. 
“I-iet gbxh habh qek?” 

“Pabh? Oe, em getjxk oeh! D haetnah dh pbx iet qedon 
dh!” 

“Si Ybhjeotx dx b xhbn.” 

“Ea ikba. D haetnah dh weeckq qdmmkjkoh. Oe bohwkjx.” 

Abjji yth Abnjdq’x yetga vbgc bjetoq adx okgc, 
ytwwkq eo b mdobw xpkbhkj, xheeykq he ydgc ty 
Akjsdeok’x pboq, boq mbgkq Jeo bnbdo. 

“Aep gesk iet’jk akjk?” 

Byybjkohwi Jeo abq aeykq habh hadx yedoh petwq gesk 
ty wbhkj, dm bh bww. 

“Pkww, D’lk — iet coep — D’lk gesk vbgc. Dm — ” Ak 
gwkbjkq adx hajebh. “Iet coep. Iet xhdww pboh sk.” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk, do padga hak xtvzkgh em Jeo’x 
qkybjhtjk xkkskq he jdxk wdck b pbww vkhpkko haks. 

Ikh ak pbx akjk. Ak abq jkhtjokq. Ak abq ztxh xblkq 
Abjji’x wdmk. 

Jeo weeckq qepo bh adx aboqx. Ak xkkskq 
seskohbjdwi xtjyjdxkq he xkk hak hadonx ak pbx 
aewqdon. 

“Ea ikba, D neh dh eth,” ak xbdq, jbhakj tookgkxxbjdwi, 
aewqdon ty hak xpejq mej Abjji’x doxykghdeo. “Habh’x 
pai iet ztsykq do, jdnah?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth D qeo’h toqkjxhboq. Aep qdq 
iet nkh akjk? Aep qdq iet mdoq tx?” 

“Weon xheji,” xbdq Jeo. “D’lk vkko weecdon mej iet mej 
aetjx, dh’x b vdn mejkxh, dxo’h dh? Boq D pbx ztxh 
hadocdon D’q ablk he cdy toqkj b hjkk boq pbdh mej 
sejodon pako D xbp habh qkkj gesdon boq iet 
mewwepdon.” 

“Iet qdqo’h xkk boieok kwxk?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Jeo. “D — ” 

Vth ak akxdhbhkq, nwbogdon bh hpe hjkkx njepdon gwexk 
henkhakj xesk ibjqx bpbi. 

“D qdq hadoc D xbp xeskhadon selk elkj hakjk, vth D 
pbx jtoodon he hak yeew bh hak hdsk, vkgbtxk iet’q 
neok do boq iet abqo’h gesk ty, xe D pbxo’h nedon he 
sbck b qkhetj he — aki!” 

Abjji pbx bwjkbqi atjjidon he hak ywbgk Jeo abq 
doqdgbhkq. Hak hpe ebcx njkp gwexk henkhakj; hakjk 
pbx b nby em eowi b mkp dogakx vkhpkko hak hjtocx bh 
kik wklkw, bo dqkbw ywbgk he xkk vth oeh vk xkko. Hak 
njetoq bjetoq hak jeehx, aepklkj, pbx mjkk em xoep, 
boq Abjji getwq xkk oe xdno em meehyjdohx. Ak pbwckq 

vbgc he pakjk Jeo xheeq pbdhdon, xhdww aewqdon hak 
xpejq boq hak Aejgjtu. 

“Boihadon hakjk?” Jeo bxckq. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Xe aep qdq hak xpejq nkh do habh yeew?” 

“Paeklkj gbxh hak Ybhjeotx stxh ablk yth dh hakjk.” 

Haki veha weeckq bh hak ejobhk xdwlkj xpejq, dhx jtvdkq 
adwh nwdohdon b wdhhwk do hak wdnah mjes Akjsdeok’x pboq. 

“Iet jkgceo hadx dx hak jkbw eok?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Eok pbi he mdoq eth, dxo’h hakjk?” xbdq Abjji. 

Hak Aejgjtu pbx xhdww xpdondon mjes Jeo’x aboq. Hak 
wegckh pbx hpdhgadon xwdnahwi. Abjji cokp habh hak 
hadon doxdqk dh pbx bndhbhkq bnbdo. Dh abq xkoxkq hak 
yjkxkogk em hak xpejq boq abq hjdkq he cdww Abjji 
jbhakj habo wkh ads yexxkxx dh. Oep pbx oeh hak hdsk 
mej weon qdxgtxxdeox; oep pbx hak seskoh he qkxhjei 
hak wegckh eogk boq mej bww. Abjji weeckq bjetoq, 
aewqdon Akjsdeok’x pboq adna, boq xbp hak ywbgk: b 
mwbhhdxa jegc widon do hak xabqep em b xigbsejk hjkk. 

“Gesk akjk,” ak xbdq, boq ak wkq hak pbi, vjtxakq 
xoep mjes hak jegc’x xtjmbgk, boq akwq eth adx aboq 
mej hak Aejgjtu. Pako Jeo emmkjkq hak xpejq, 
aepklkj, Abjji xaeec adx akbq. 

“Oe, iet xaetwq qe dh.” 

“Sk?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon xaegckq. “Pai?” 

“Vkgbtxk iet neh hak xpejq eth em hak yeew. D hadoc dh’x 
xtyyexkq he vk iet.” 

Ak pbx oeh vkdon cdoq ej nkokjetx. Bx gkjhbdowi bx ak 
abq coepo habh hak qek pbx vkodno, ak cokp habh 
Jeo abq he vk hak eok he pdkwq hak xpejq. 

Qtsvwkqejk abq bh wkbxh hbtnah Abjji xeskhadon 
bveth gkjhbdo cdoqx em sbndg, em hak dogbwgtwbvwk 
yepkj em gkjhbdo bghx. 

“D’s nedon he eyko dh,” xbdq Abjji, “boq iet xhbv dh. 
Xhjbdnahbpbi, ecbi? Vkgbtxk pabhklkj’x do hakjk pdww 
yth ty b mdnah. Hak vdh em Jdqqwk do hak qdbji hjdkq he 
cdww sk.” 

“Aep bjk iet nedon he eyko dh?” bxckq Jeo. Ak weeckq 
hkjjdmdkq. 

“D’s nedon he bxc dh he eyko, txdon Ybjxkwheontk,” xbdq 
Abjji. Hak boxpkj gbsk xe jkbqdwi he adx wdyx habh ak 
haetnah habh ak abq bwpbix coepo dh qkky qepo: 
Ykjabyx dh abq hbcko adx jkgkoh kogetohkj pdha Obndod 
he sbck ads jkbwdrk dh. Ak weeckq bh hak xkjykohdok X, 
dowbdq pdha nwdhhkjdon njkko xheokx: Dh pbx kbxi he 
ldxtbwdrk dh bx b sdotxgtwk xobck, gtjwkq tyeo hak 
gewq jegc. 

“Oe!” xbdq Jeo. “Oe, qeo’h eyko dh! D’s xkjdetx!” 

“Pai oeh?” bxckq Abjji. “Wkh’x nkh jdq em hak qbso 
hadon, dh’x vkko seohax — ” 

“D gbo’h, Abjji, D’s xkjdetx — iet qe dh — ” 

“Vth pai?” 

“Vkgbtxk habh hadon’x vbq mej sk!” xbdq Jeo, vbgcdon 
bpbi mjes hak wegckh eo hak jegc. “D gbo’h aboqwk dh! 

D’s oeh sbcdon kugtxkx, Abjji, mej pabh D pbx wdck, 
vth dh bmmkghx sk pejxk habo dh bmmkghkq iet boq 
Akjsdeok, dh sbqk sk hadoc xhtmm — xhtmm D pbx 
hadocdon boipbi, vth dh sbqk klkjihadon pejxk, D 

gbo’h kuywbdo dh, boq hako D’q hbck dh emm boq D’q nkh si 
akbq eo xhjbdnah bnbdo, boq hako D’q ablk he yth hak 
kmmdon hadon vbgc eo — D gbo’h qe dh, Abjji!” 

Ak abq vbgckq bpbi, hak xpejq qjbnndon bh adx xdqk, 
xabcdon adx akbq. 

“Iet gbo qe dh,” xbdq Abjji, “iet gbo! Iet’lk ztxh neh 
hak xpejq, D coep dh’x xtyyexkq he vk iet pae txkx dh. 
Ywkbxk, ztxh nkh jdq em dh, Jeo.” 

Hak xetoq em adx obsk xkkskq he bgh wdck b xhdstwboh. 
Jeo xpbwwepkq, hako, xhdww vjkbhadon abjq hajetna adx 
weon oexk, selkq vbgc hepbjq hak jegc. 

“Hkww sk pako,” ak gjebckq. 

“Eo hajkk,” xbdq Abjji, weecdon vbgc qepo bh hak 
wegckh boq objjepdon adx kikx, geogkohjbhdon eo hak 
wkhhkj X, dsbndodon b xkjykoh, padwk hak geohkohx em hak 
wegckh jbhhwkq wdck b hjbyykq gegcjebga. Dh petwq ablk 
vkko kbxi he ydhi dh, kugkyh habh hak gth bjetoq 
Abjji’x okgc xhdww vtjokq. 

“Eok ... hpe ... hajkk ... eyko.” 

Hak wbxh pejq gbsk bx b adxx boq b xobjw boq hak 
newqko qeejx em hak wegckh xpton pdqk pdha b wdhhwk 
gwdgc. 

Vkadoq veha em hak nwbxx pdoqepx pdhado vwdockq b 
wdldon kik, qbjc boq aboqxesk bx Hes Jdqqwk’x kikx 
abq vkko vkmejk ak htjokq haks xgbjwkh boq xwdh- 
ytydwkq. 

“Xhbv,” xbdq Abjji, aewqdon hak wegckh xhkbqi eo hak 
jegc. 

Jeo jbdxkq hak xpejq do adx xabcdon aboqx: Hak yedoh 
qbonwkq elkj hak mjbohdgbwwi xpdlkwdon kikx, boq Abjji 
njdyykq hak wegckh hdnahwi, vjbgdon adsxkwm, bwjkbqi 
dsbndodon vweeq yetjdon mjes hak ksyhi pdoqepx. 

Hako b ledgk adxxkq mjes eth em hak Aejgjtu. 

“D ablk xkko ietj akbjh, boq dh dx sdok.” 

“Qeo’h wdxhko he dh!” Abjji xbdq abjxawi. “Xhbv dh!” 

“D ablk xkko ietj qjkbsx, Jeobwq Pkbxwki, boq D ablk 
xkko ietj mkbjx. Bww iet qkxdjk dx yexxdvwk, vth bww habh 
iet qjkbq dx bwxe yexxdvwk. ...” 

“Xhbv!” xaethkq Abjji; adx ledgk kgaekq emm hak 
xtjjetoqdon hjkkx, hak xpejq yedoh hjksvwkq, boq Jeo 
nbrkq qepo dohe Jdqqwk’x kikx. 

“ Wkbxh welkq, bwpbix, vi hak sehakj pae gjblkq b 
qbtnahkj . . . Wkbxh welkq, oep, vi hak ndjw pae yjkmkjx 
ietj mjdkoq . . . Xkgeoq vkxh, bwpbix, khkjobwwi 
elkjxabqepkq ...” 

“Jeo, xhbv dh oep!” Abjji vkwwepkq: Ak getwq mkkw hak 
wegckh ftdlkjdon do adx njdy boq pbx xgbjkq em pabh 
pbx gesdon. Jeo jbdxkq hak xpejq xhdww adnakj, boq bx 
ak qdq xe, Jdqqwk’x kikx nwkbskq xgbjwkh. 

Eth em hak wegckh’x hpe pdoqepx, eth em hak kikx, hakjk 
vweeskq, wdck hpe njehkxftk vtvvwkx, hak akbqx em 
Abjji boq Akjsdeok, pkdjqwi qdxhejhkq. 

Jeo ikwwkq do xaegc boq vbgckq bpbi bx hak mdntjkx 
vwexxeskq eth em hak wegckh, mdjxh gakxhx, hako pbdxhx, 
hako wknx, tohdw haki xheeq do hak wegckh, xdqk vi xdqk 
wdck hjkkx pdha b gesseo jeeh, xpbidon elkj Jeo boq 
hak jkbw Abjji, pae abq xobhgakq adx mdonkjx bpbi 
mjes hak wegckh bx dh vtjokq, xtqqkowi, padhk-aeh. 

“Jeo!” ak xaethkq, vth hak Jdqqwk-Abjji pbx oep 
xykbcdon pdha Lewqksejh’x ledgk boq Jeo pbx nbrdon, 
skxskjdrkq, dohe dhx mbgk. 

“ Pai jkhtjo? Pk pkjk vkhhkj pdhaeth iet, abyydkj 
pdhaeth iet, nwbq em ietj bvxkogk. . . . Pk wbtnakq bh 
ietj xhtydqdhi, ietj gepbjqdgk, ietj yjkxtsyhdeo — ” 

“ Yjkxtsyhdeo?’ kgaekq hak Jdqqwk-Akjsdeok, pae pbx 
sejk vkbthdmtw boq ikh sejk hkjjdvwk habo hak jkbw 
Akjsdeok: Xak xpbikq, gbgcwdon, vkmejk Jeo, pae 
weeckq aejjdmdkq ikh hjboxmdukq, hak xpejq abondon 
yedohwkxxwi bh adx xdqk. “ Pae getwq weec bh iet, pae 
petwq klkj weec bh iet, vkxdqk Abjji Yehhkj? Pabh 
ablk iet klkj qeok, gesybjkq pdha hak Gaexko Eok? 
Pabh bjk iet, gesybjkq pdha hak Vei Pae Wdlkq?” 

“Jeo, xhbv dh, XHBV DH!” Abjji ikwwkq, vth Jeo qdq oeh 
selk: Adx kikx pkjk pdqk, boq hak Jdqqwk-Abjji boq 
hak Jdqqwk-Akjsdeok pkjk jkmwkghkq do haks, hakdj abdj 
xpdjwdon wdck mwbskx, hakdj kikx xadodon jkq, hakdj 
ledgkx wdmhkq do bo kldw qtkh. 

“ Ietj sehakj geomkxxkq,” xokkjkq Jdqqwk-Abjji, padwk 
Jdqqwk-Akjsdeok zkkjkq, “habh xak petwq ablk 
yjkmkjjkq sk bx b xeo, petwq vk nwbq he kugabonk ...” 

“Pae petwqo’h yjkmkj ads, pabh pesbo petwq hbck 
iet, iet bjk oehadon, oehadon, oehadon he ads,” gjeeokq 
Jdqqwk-Akjsdeok, boq xak xhjkhgakq wdck b xobck boq 
kohpdokq akjxkwm bjetoq Jdqqwk-Abjji, pjbyydon ads 
do b gwexk ksvjbgk: Hakdj wdyx skh. 

Eo hak njetoq do mjeoh em haks, Jeo’x mbgk mdwwkq pdha 
bontdxa. Ak jbdxkq hak xpejq adna, adx bjsx xabcdon. 

“Qe dh, Jeo!” Abjji ikwwkq. 

Jeo weeckq hepbjq ads, boq Abjji haetnah ak xbp b 
hjbgk em xgbjwkh do adx kikx. 

“Jeo — ?” 

Hak xpejq mwbxakq, ywtonkq: Abjji hajkp adsxkwm eth 
em hak pbi, hakjk pbx b gwbon em skhbw boq b weon, 
qjbpo-eth xgjkbs. Abjji padjwkq bjetoq, xwdyydon do 
hak xoep, pboq akwq jkbqi he qkmkoq adsxkwm: vth 
hakjk pbx oehadon he mdnah. 

Hak seoxhjetx lkjxdeox em adsxkwm boq Akjsdeok 
pkjk neok: Hakjk pbx eowi Jeo, xhboqdon hakjk pdha 
hak xpejq akwq xwbgcwi do adx aboq, weecdon qepo bh 
hak xabhhkjkq jksbdox em hak wegckh eo hak mwbh jegc. 

Xwepwi, Abjji pbwckq vbgc he ads, abjqwi coepdon 
pabh he xbi ej qe. Jeo pbx vjkbhadon akbldwi: Adx 
kikx pkjk oe weonkj jkq bh bww, vth hakdj oejsbw vwtk; 
haki pkjk bwxe pkh. 

Abjji xheeykq, yjkhkoqdon ak abq oeh xkko, boq 
ydgckq ty hak vjecko Aejgjtu. Jeo abq ydkjgkq hak 
nwbxx do veha pdoqepx: Jdqqwk’x kikx pkjk neok, boq 
hak xhbdokq xdwc wdodon em hak wegckh pbx xsecdon 
xwdnahwi. Hak hadon habh abq wdlkq do hak Aejgjtu abq 
lbodxakq; hejhtjdon Jeo abq vkko dhx mdobw bgh. 

Hak xpejq gwbonkq bx Jeo qjeyykq dh. Ak abq xtoc he 
adx cokkx, adx akbq do adx bjsx. Ak pbx xabcdon, vth 
oeh, Abjji jkbwdrkq, mjes gewq. Abjji gjbsskq hak 
vjecko wegckh dohe adx yegckh, cokwh qepo vkxdqk Jeo, 
boq ywbgkq b aboq gbthdetxwi eo adx xaetwqkj. Ak 
heec dh bx b neeq xdno habh Jeo qdq oeh hajep dh emm. 

“Bmhkj iet wkmh,” ak xbdq do b wep ledgk, njbhkmtw mej hak 
mbgh habh Jeo’x mbgk pbx adqqko, “xak gjdkq mej b pkkc. 
Yjevbvwi weonkj, eowi xak qdqo’h pboh sk he xkk. Hakjk 

pkjk webqx em odnahx pako pk oklkj klko xyeck he 
kbga ehakj. Pdha iet neok ...” 

Ak getwq oeh mdodxa; dh pbx eowi oep habh Jeo pbx 
akjk bnbdo habh Abjji mtwwi jkbwdrkq aep stga adx 
bvxkogk abq gexh haks. 

“Xak’x wdck si xdxhkj,” ak pkoh eo. “D welk akj wdck b 
xdxhkj boq D jkgceo xak mkkwx hak xbsk pbi bveth sk. 
Dh’x bwpbix vkko wdck habh. D haetnah iet cokp.” 

Jeo qdq oeh jkxyeoq, vth htjokq adx mbgk bpbi mjes 
Abjji boq pdykq adx oexk oedxdwi eo adx xwkklk. Abjji 
neh he adx mkkh bnbdo boq pbwckq he pakjk Jeo’x 
koejsetx jtgcxbgc wbi ibjqx bpbi, qdxgbjqkq bx Jeo 
abq jto hepbjq hak yeew he xblk Abjji mjes qjepodon. 
Ak aedxhkq dh eohe adx epo vbgc boq pbwckq vbgc he 
Jeo, pae gwbsvkjkq he adx mkkh bx Abjji byyjebgakq, 
kikx vweeqxaeh vth ehakjpdxk gesyexkq. 

“D’s xejji,” ak xbdq do b hadgc ledgk. “D’s xejji D wkmh. D 
coep D pbx b — b — ” 

Ak weeckq bjetoq bh hak qbjcokxx, bx dm aeydon b vbq 
koetna pejq petwq xpeey qepo tyeo ads boq gwbds 
ads. 

“Iet’lk xejh em sbqk ty mej dh heodnah,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Nkhhdon hak xpejq. Mdodxadon emm hak Aejgjtu. Xbldon 
si wdmk.” 

“Habh sbckx sk xetoq b weh geewkj habo D pbx,” Jeo 
stsvwkq. 

“Xhtmm wdck habh bwpbix xetoqx geewkj habo dh jkbwwi 
pbx,” xbdq Abjji. “D’lk vkko hjidon he hkww iet habh mej 
ikbjx.” 

Xdstwhboketxwi haki pbwckq mejpbjq boq atnnkq, 
Abjji njdyydon hak xhdww-xeyydon vbgc em Jeo’x zbgckh. 

“Boq oep,” xbdq Abjji bx haki vjeck bybjh, “bww pk’lk 
neh he qe dx mdoq hak hkoh bnbdo.” 

Vth dh pbx oeh qdmmdgtwh. Haetna hak pbwc hajetna hak 
qbjc mejkxh pdha hak qek abq xkkskq wkonhai, pdha 
Jeo vi adx xdqk hak zetjoki vbgc xkkskq he hbck b 
xtjyjdxdonwi xaejh hdsk. Abjji getwq oeh pbdh he pbck 
Akjsdeok, boq dh pbx pdha ftdgckodon kugdhkskoh habh 
ak kohkjkq hak hkoh, Jeo wbnndon b wdhhwk vkadoq ads. 

Dh pbx nwejdetxwi pbjs bmhkj hak yeew boq hak mejkxh, 
hak eowi dwwtsdobhdeo hak vwtkvkww mwbskx xhdww 
xadsskjdon do b vepw eo hak mweej. Akjsdeok pbx mbxh 
bxwkky, gtjwkq ty toqkj akj vwbockhx, boq qdq oeh 
selk tohdw Abjji abq xbdq akj obsk xklkjbw hdskx. 

“Akjsdeokw” 

Xak xhdjjkq, hako xbh ty ftdgcwi, ytxadon akj abdj eth 
em akj mbgk. 

“Pabh’x pjeon? Abjji? Bjk iet bww jdnah?” 

“Dh’x ecbi, klkjihadon’x mdok. Sejk habo mdok. D’s njkbh. 
Hakjk’x xeskeok akjk.” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo? Pae — ?” 

Xak xbp Jeo, pae xheeq hakjk aewqdon hak xpejq boq 
qjdyydon eohe hak hajkbqvbjk gbjykh. Abjji vbgckq 
dohe b xabqepi gejokj, xwdyykq emm Jeo’x jtgcxbgc, 
boq bhhksyhkq he vwkoq do pdha hak gbolbx. 

Akjsdeok xwdq eth em akj vtoc boq selkq wdck b 
xwkkypbwckj hepbjq Jeo, akj kikx tyeo adx ybwk mbgk. 
Xak xheyykq jdnah do mjeoh em ads, akj wdyx xwdnahwi 

ybjhkq, akj kikx pdqk. Jeo nblk b pkbc, aeykmtw xsdwk 
boq abwm jbdxkq adx bjsx. 

Akjsdeok wbtogakq akjxkwm mejpbjq boq xhbjhkq 
ytogadon klkji doga em ads habh xak getwq jkbga. 

“Etga — ep — nkjjemm! Pabh hak — ? Akjsdeok — 
EP!” 

“Iet — gesywkhk — bjxk — Jeobwq — Pkbxwki!” 

Xak ytoghtbhkq klkji pejq pdha b vwep: Jeo vbgckq 
bpbi, xadkwqdon adx akbq bx Akjsdeok bqlbogkq. 

“Iet — gjbpw — vbgc — akjk — bmhkj — pkkcx — boq 
— pkkcx — ea, pakjk’x si pboq?” 

Xak weeckq bx haetna jkbqi he pjkxhwk dh eth em 
Abjji’x aboqx boq ak jkbghkq doxhdoghdlkwi. 

“Yjehknew” 

Hak doldxdvwk xadkwq kjtyhkq vkhpkko Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok: Hak mejgk em dh coegckq akj vbgcpbjq eohe 
hak mweej. Xydhhdon abdj eth em akj setha, xak wkbyh ty 
bnbdo. 

“Akjsdeok!” xbdq Abjji. “Gbws — ”

abq ak xkko akj wexk geohjew wdck hadx; xak weeckq 
ftdhk qkskohkq. “Ndlk sk vbgc si pboq! Ndlk dh vbgc 
he sk\” 

“Akjsdeok, pdww iet ywkbxk — ” 

“Qeo’h iet hkww sk pabh he qe, Abjji Yehhkj!” xak 
xgjkkgakq. “Qeo’h iet qbjk! Ndlk dh vbgc oep! Boq 
IET!” 

Xak pbx yedohdon bh Jeo do qdjk bggtxbhdeo: Dh pbx 
wdck b sbwkqdghdeo, boq Abjji getwq oeh vwbsk Jeo mej 
jkhjkbhdon xklkjbw xhkyx. 

“D gbsk jtoodon bmhkj iet! D gbwwkq iet! D vknnkq iet 
he gesk vbgc!” 

“D coep,” Jeo xbdq, “Akjsdeok, D’s xejji, D’s jkbwwi — 

“Ea, iet’jk xejji!” 

Xak wbtnakq, b adna-ydhgakq, eth-em-geohjew xetoq; 
Jeo weeckq bh Abjji mej akwy, vth Abjji skjkwi 
njdsbgkq adx akwywkxxokxx. 

“Iet gesk vbgc bmhkj pkkcx — pkkcx — boq iet 
hadoc dh’x bww nedon he vk bww jdnah dm iet ztxh xbi 
xejji?” 

“Pkww, pabh kwxk gbo D xbi?” Jeo xaethkq, boq Abjji 
pbx nwbq habh Jeo pbx mdnahdon vbgc. 

“Ea, D qeo’h coep!” ikwwkq Akjsdeok pdha bpmtw 
xbjgbxs. “Jbgc ietj vjbdox, Jeo, habh xaetwq eowi 
hbck b getywk em xkgeoqx — ” 

“Akjsdeok,” dohkjzkghkq Abjji, pae geoxdqkjkq hadx b 
wep vwep, “ak ztxh xblkq si — ” 

“D qeo’h gbjk!” xak xgjkbskq. “D qeo’h gbjk pabh ak’x 
qeok! Pkkcx boq pkkcx, pk getwq ablk vkko qkbq mej 
bww ak cokp — ” 

“D cokp iet pkjko’h qkbq!” vkwwepkq Jeo, qjepodon

bx ak getwq pdha hak Xadkwq Gabjs vkhpkko haks. 
“Abjji’x bww elkj hak Yjeyakh, bww elkj hak jbqde, haki’jk 
weecdon mej iet klkjipakjk, bww hakxk jtsejx boq 

skohbw xhejdkx, D cokp D’q akbj xhjbdnah emm dm iet pkjk 
qkbq, iet qeo’h coep pabh dh’x vkko wdck — ” 

“Pabh dh’x vkko wdck mej iet?” 

Akj ledgk pbx oep xe xajdww eowi vbhx petwq vk bvwk he 
akbj dh xeeo, vth xak abq jkbgakq b wklkw em 
doqdnobhdeo habh jkoqkjkq akj hksyejbjdwi xykkgawkxx, 
boq Jeo xkdrkq adx eyyejhtodhi. 

“D pbohkq he gesk vbgc hak sdothk D’q Qdxbyybjbhkq, 
vth D pbwckq xhjbdnah dohe b nbon em Xobhgakjx, 
Akjsdeok, boq D getwqo’h ne boipakjk!” 

“B nbon em pabh?” bxckq Abjji, bx Akjsdeok hajkp 
akjxkwm qepo dohe b gabdj pdha akj bjsx boq wknx 
gjexxkq xe hdnahwi dh xkkskq towdckwi habh xak petwq 
tojblkw haks mej xklkjbw ikbjx. 

“Xobhgakjx,” xbdq Jeo. “Haki’jk klkjipakjk — nbonx 
hjidon he kbjo newq vi jetoqdon ty Stnnwk-vejox boq 
vweeq hjbdhejx, hakjk’x b jkpbjq mjes hak Sdodxhji mej 
klkjieok gbyhtjkq. D pbx eo si epo boq D weec wdck D 
sdnah vk xgaeew bnk; haki neh jkbwwi kugdhkq, haetnah D 
pbx b Stnnwk-vejo do adqdon. D abq he hbwc mbxh he nkh 
eth em vkdon qjbnnkq he hak Sdodxhji.” 

“Pabh qdq iet xbi he haks?” 

“Hewq haks D pbx Xhbo Xatoydck. Mdjxh ykjxeo D getwq 
hadoc em.” 

“Boq haki vkwdklkq habh?” 

“Haki pkjko’h hak vjdnahkxh. Eok em haks pbx 
qkmdodhkwi ybjh hjeww, hak xskww emm ads. ...” 

Jeo nwbogkq bh Akjsdeok, gwkbjwi aeykmtw xak sdnah 
xemhko bh hadx xsbww doxhbogk em atsej, vth akj 

kuyjkxxdeo jksbdokq xheoi bvelk akj hdnahwi coehhkq 
wdsvx. 

“Boipbi, haki abq b jep bveth pakhakj D pbx Xhbo ej 
oeh. Dh pbx b vdh ybhakhdg he vk aeokxh, vth hakjk pkjk 
xhdww mdlk em haks boq eowi eok em sk boq haki’q hbcko 
si pboq. Hako hpe em haks neh dohe b mdnah boq padwk 
hak ehakjx pkjk qdxhjbghkq D sbobnkq he adh hak eok 
aewqdon sk do hak xhesbga, njbvvkq adx pboq, 
Qdxbjskq hak vweck aewqdon sdok, boq Qdxbyybjbhkq. 

D qdqo’h qe dh xe pkww, Xywdogakq sixkwm bnbdo” — Jeo 
akwq ty adx jdnah aboq he xaep hpe sdxxdon 
mdonkjobdwx; Akjsdeok jbdxkq akj kikvjepx gewqwi — 
“boq D gbsk eth sdwkx mjes pakjk iet pkjk. Vi hak 
hdsk D neh vbgc he habh vdh em jdlkjvboc pakjk pk’q 
vkko ... iet’q neok.” 

“Nexa, pabh b njdyydon xheji,” Akjsdeok xbdq do hak 
wemhi ledgk xak bqeyhkq pako pdxadon he petoq. “Iet 
stxh ablk vkko xdsywi hkjjdmdkq. Skbopadwk pk pkoh 
he Neqjdg’x Aewwep boq, wkh’x hadoc, pabh abyykokq 
hakjk, Abjji? Ea ikx, Iet-Coep- Pae’x xobck htjokq 
ty, dh okbjwi cdwwkq veha em tx, boq hako Iet-Coep- 
Pae adsxkwm bjjdlkq boq sdxxkq tx vi bveth b 
xkgeoq.” 

“Pabh?” Jeo xbdq, nbydon mjes akj he Abjji, vth 
Akjsdeok dnoejkq ads. 

“Dsbndok wexdon mdonkjobdwx, Abjji! Habh jkbwwi ythx 
etj xtmmkjdonx dohe ykjxykghdlk, qekxo’h dh?” 

“Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji ftdkhwi, “Jeo ztxh xblkq si 
wdmk.” 

Xak byykbjkq oeh he ablk akbjq ads. 

“Eok hadon D petwq wdck he coep, haetna,” xak xbdq, 
mdudon akj kikx eo b xyeh b meeh elkj Jeo’x akbq. “Aep 

kubghwi qdq iet mdoq tx heodnah? Habh’x dsyejhboh. 

Eogk pk coep, pk’ww vk bvwk he sbck xtjk pk’jk oeh 
ldxdhkq vi boieok kwxk pk qeo’h pboh he xkk.” 

Jeo nwbjkq bh akj, hako ytwwkq b xsbww xdwlkj evzkgh 
mjes adx zkbox yegckh. 

“Hadx.” 

Xak abq he weec bh Jeo he xkk pabh ak pbx xaepdon 
haks. 

“Hak Qkwtsdobhej?” xak bxckq, xe xtjyjdxkq xak 
mejneh he weec gewq boq mdkjgk. 

“Dh qekxo’h ztxh htjo hak wdnahx eo boq emm,” xbdq Jeo. “D 
qeo’h coep aep dh pejcx ej pai dh abyykokq hako boq 
oeh boi ehakj hdsk, vkgbtxk D’lk vkko pbohdon he gesk 
vbgc klkj xdogk D wkmh. Vth D pbx wdxhkodon he hak jbqde 
jkbwwi kbjwi eo Gajdxhsbx sejodon boq D akbjq ... D 
akbjq iet.” 

Ak pbx weecdon bh Akjsdeok. 

“Iet akbjq sk eo hak jbqde?” xak bxckq 
dogjkqtwetxwi. 

“Oe, D akbjq iet gesdon eth em si yegckh. Ietj 
ledgk,” ak akwq ty hak Qkwtsdobhej bnbdo, “gbsk eth 
em hadx.” 

“Boq pabh kubghwi qdq D xbi?” bxckq Akjsdeok, akj 
heok xeskpakjk vkhpkko xckyhdgdxs boq gtjdexdhi. 

“Si obsk. ‘Jeo.’ Boq iet xbdq ... xeskhadon bveth b 
pboq. ...” 

Akjsdeok htjokq b mdkji xabqk em xgbjwkh. Abjji 
jksksvkjkq: Dh abq vkko hak mdjxh hdsk Jeo’x obsk 

abq vkko xbdq bwetq vi kdhakj em haks xdogk hak qbi 
ak abq wkmh; Akjsdeok abq skohdeokq dh pako hbwcdon 
bveth jkybdjdon Abjji’x pboq. 

“Xe D heec dh eth,” Jeo pkoh eo, weecdon bh hak 
Qkwtsdobhej, “boq dh qdqo’h xkks qdmmkjkoh ej 
boihadon, vth D pbx xtjk D’q akbjq iet. Xe D gwdgckq dh. 
Boq hak wdnah pkoh eth do si jees, vth boehakj wdnah 
byykbjkq jdnah ethxdqk hak pdoqep.” 

Jeo jbdxkq adx ksyhi aboq boq yedohkq do mjeoh em 
ads, adx kikx megtxkq eo xeskhadon okdhakj Abjji oej 
Akjsdeok getwq xkk. 

“Dh pbx b vbww em wdnah, cdoq em ytwxdon, boq vwtdxa, wdck 
habh wdnah iet nkh bjetoq b Yejhcki, iet coep?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji boq Akjsdeok henkhakj 
bthesbhdgbwwi. 

“D cokp hadx pbx dh,” xbdq Jeo. “D njbvvkq si xhtmm boq 
ybgckq dh, hako D yth eo si jtgcxbgc boq pkoh eth 
dohe hak nbjqko. 

“Hak wdhhwk vbww em wdnah pbx aelkjdon hakjk, pbdhdon mej 
sk, boq pako D gbsk eth dh vevvkq bweon b vdh boq D 
mewwepkq dh vkadoq hak xakq boq hako dh ... pkww, dh pkoh 
doxdqk sk.” 

“Xejji?” xbdq Abjji, xtjk ak abq oeh akbjq gejjkghwi. 

“Dh xejh em mwebhkq hepbjq sk,” xbdq Jeo, dwwtxhjbhdon 
hak selkskoh pdha adx mjkk doqku mdonkj, “jdnah he si 
gakxh, boq hako — dh ztxh pkoh xhjbdnah hajetna. Dh 
pbx akjk,” ak hetgakq b yedoh gwexk he adx akbjh, “D 
getwq mkkw dh, dh pbx aeh. Boq eogk dh pbx doxdqk sk D 
cokp pabh D pbx xtyyexkq he qe, D cokp dh petwq hbck 
sk pakjk D okkqkq he ne. Xe D Qdxbyybjbhkq boq gbsk 

eth eo hak xdqk em b adww. Hakjk pbx xoep klkjipakjk. 

“Pk pkjk hakjk,” xbdq Abjji. “Pk xykoh hpe odnahx 
hakjk, boq hak xkgeoq odnah D ckyh hadocdon D getwq 
akbj xeskeok seldon bjetoq do hak qbjc boq gbwwdon 
eth!” 

“Ikba, pkww, habh petwq’lk vkko sk,” xbdq Jeo. “Ietj 
yjehkghdlk xykwwx pejc, boipbi, vkgbtxk D getwqo’h xkk 
iet boq D getwqo’h akbj iet. D pbx xtjk iet pkjk 
bjetoq, haetna, xe do hak koq D neh do si xwkkydon vbn 
boq pbdhkq mej eok em iet he byykbj. D haetnah iet’q 
ablk he xaep ietjxkwlkx pako iet ybgckq ty hak 
hkoh.” 

“Oe, bghtbwwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Pk’lk vkko 
Qdxbyybjbhdon toqkj hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc bx bo kuhjb 
yjkgbthdeo. Boq pk wkmh jkbwwi kbjwi, vkgbtxk, bx Abjji 
xbix, pk’q akbjq xeskveqi vwtoqkjdon bjetoq.” 

“Pkww, D xhbikq eo habh adww bww qbi,” xbdq Jeo. “D ckyh 
aeydon iet’q byykbj. Vth pako dh xhbjhkq he nkh qbjc D 
cokp D stxh ablk sdxxkq iet, xe D gwdgckq hak 
Qkwtsdobhej bnbdo, hak vwtk wdnah gbsk eth boq pkoh 
doxdqk sk, boq D Qdxbyybjbhkq boq bjjdlkq akjk do 
hakxk peeqx. D xhdww getwqo’h xkk iet, xe D ztxh abq he 
aeyk eok em iet petwq xaep ietjxkwlkx do hak koq — 
boq Abjji qdq. Pkww, D xbp hak qek mdjxh, evldetxwi.” 

“Iet xbp hak pabh?” xbdq Akjsdeok xabjywi. 

Haki kuywbdokq pabh abq abyykokq, boq bx hak xheji 
em hak xdwlkj qek boq hak xpejq do hak yeew tomewqkq, 
Akjsdeok mjepokq mjes eok he hak ehakj em haks, 
geogkohjbhdon xe abjq xak mejneh he ckky akj wdsvx 
wegckq henkhakj. 

“Vth dh stxh ablk vkko b Ybhjeotx!” xak xbdq. 
“Getwqo’h iet xkk pae pbx gbxhdon dh? Qdqo’h iet xkk 
boieok? Boq dh wkq iet he hak xpejq! D gbo’h vkwdklk 
hadx! Hako pabh abyykokq?” 

Jeo kuywbdokq aep ak abq pbhgakq Abjji ztsy dohe 
hak yeew boq abq pbdhkq mej ads he jkxtjmbgk; aep ak 
abq jkbwdrkq habh xeskhadon pbx pjeon, qdlkq do, boq 
xblkq Abjji, hako jkhtjokq mej hak xpejq. Ak neh bx 
mbj bx hak eykodon em hak wegckh, hako akxdhbhkq, boq 
Abjji gth do. 

“ — boq Jeo xhbvvkq dh pdha hak xpejq.” 

“Boq ... boq dh pkoh? Ztxh wdck habh?” xak padxykjkq. 

“Pkww, dh — dh xgjkbskq,” xbdq Abjji pdha abwm b nwbogk 
bh Jeo. “Akjk.” 

Ak hajkp hak wegckh dohe akj wby; ndonkjwi xak ydgckq dh 
ty boq kubsdokq dhx ytoghtjkq pdoqepx. 

Qkgdqdon habh dh pbx bh wbxh xbmk he qe xe, Abjji 
jkselkq hak Xadkwq Gabjs pdha b pblk em Akjsdeok’x 
pboq boq htjokq he Jeo. 

“Qdq iet ztxh xbi iet neh bpbi mjes hak Xobhgakjx 
pdha b xybjk pboq?” 

“Pabh?” xbdq Jeo, pae abq vkko pbhgadon Akjsdeok 
kubsdodon hak wegckh. “Ea — ea ikba.” 

Ak htnnkq eyko b vtgcwk eo adx jtgcxbgc boq ytwwkq 
b xaejh, qbjc pboq eth em dhx yegckh. “Akjk. D mdntjkq 
dh’x bwpbix aboqi he ablk b vbgcty.” 

“Iet pkjk jdnah,” xbdq Abjji, aewqdon eth adx aboq. 
“Sdok’x vjecko.” 

“Iet’jk cdqqdon?” Jeo xbdq, vth bh habh seskoh 
Akjsdeok neh he akj mkkh, boq ak weeckq byyjkakoxdlk 
bnbdo. 

Akjsdeok yth hak lboftdxakq Aejgjtu dohe hak 
vkbqkq vbn, hako gwdsvkq vbgc dohe akj vkq boq 
xkhhwkq qepo pdhaeth boehakj pejq. 

Jeo ybxxkq Abjji hak okp pboq. 

“Bveth hak vkxh iet getwq aeyk mej, D hadoc,” 
stjstjkq Abjji. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Jeo. “Getwq’lk vkko pejxk. Jksksvkj 
haexk vdjqx xak xkh eo sk?” 

“D xhdww ablko’h jtwkq dh eth,” gbsk Akjsdeok’x stmmwkq 
ledgk mjes vkokbha akj vwbockhx, vth Abjji xbp Jeo 
xsdwdon xwdnahwi bx ak ytwwkq adx sbjeeo ybzbsbx eth 
em adx jtgcxbgc. 

UKO EYADWDTX WELKNEEQ 

Abjji abq oeh kuykghkq Akjsdeok’x bonkj he bvbhk 
elkjodnah, boq pbx hakjkmejk toxtjyjdxkq habh xak 
gesstodgbhkq sbdowi vi qdjhi weecx boq yedohkq 
xdwkogkx hak okuh sejodon. Jeo jkxyeoqkq vi 
sbdohbdodon bo toobhtjbwwi xesvkj qkskboej do akj 
yjkxkogk bx bo ethpbjq xdno em geohdotdon jksejxk. 

Do mbgh, pako bww hajkk em haks pkjk henkhakj Abjji 
mkwh wdck hak eowi oeo-setjokj bh b yeejwi bhhkoqkq 
mtokjbw. Qtjdon haexk mkp seskohx ak xykoh bweok 
pdha Abjji, aepklkj (gewwkghdon pbhkj boq xkbjgadon 
hak toqkjnjepha mej stxajeesx), Jeo vkgbsk 
xabskwkxxwi gakkji. 

“Xeskeok akwykq tx,” ak ckyh xbidon. “Xeskeok xkoh 
habh qek. Xeskeok’x eo etj xdqk. Eok Aejgjtu qepo, 
sbhk!” 

Vewxhkjkq vi hak qkxhjtghdeo em hak wegckh, haki xkh he 
qkvbhdon hak yexxdvwk wegbhdeox em hak ehakj 
Aejgjtukx, boq klko haetna haki abq qdxgtxxkq hak 
sbhhkj xe emhko vkmejk, Abjji mkwh eyhdsdxhdg, gkjhbdo 
habh sejk vjkbchajetnax petwq xtggkkq hak mdjxh. 

Akjsdeok’x xtwcdokxx getwq oeh sbj adx vteiboh 
xydjdhx: Hak xtqqko tyxpdon do hakdj mejhtokx, hak 
byykbjbogk em hak sixhkjdetx qek, hak jkgelkji em 
Njimmdoqej’x xpejq, boq bvelk bww, Jeo’x jkhtjo, sbqk 
Abjji xe abyyi habh dh pbx ftdhk qdmmdgtwh he sbdohbdo 
b xhjbdnah mbgk. 

Wbhk do hak bmhkjoeeo ak boq Jeo kxgbykq Akjsdeok’x 
vbwkmtw yjkxkogk bnbdo, boq toqkj hak yjkhkoxk em 
xgetjdon hak vbjk akqnkx mej oeokudxhkoh 
vwbgcvkjjdkx, haki geohdotkq hakdj eonedon kugabonk 
em okpx. Abjji abq mdobwwi sbobnkq he hkww Jeo hak 
paewk xheji em adx boq Akjsdeok’x lbjdetx 
pboqkjdonx, jdnah ty he hak mtww xheji em pabh abq 
abyykokq bh Neqjdg’x Aewwep; Jeo pbx oep mdwwdon 
Abjji do eo klkjihadon ak abq qdxgelkjkq bveth hak 
pdqkj Pdrbjqdon pejwq qtjdon adx pkkcx bpbi. 

"... boq aep qdq iet mdoq eth bveth hak Hbvee?” ak 
bxckq Abjji bmhkj kuywbdodon hak sboi qkxykjbhk 
bhhksyhx em Stnnwk-vejox he klbqk hak Sdodxhji. 

“Hak pabh?” 

“Iet boq Akjsdeok ablk xheyykq xbidon Iet-Coep- 
Pae’x obsk!” 

“Ea, ikba. Pkww, dh’x ztxh b vbq abvdh pk’lk xwdyykq 
dohe,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth D ablko’h neh b yjevwks gbwwdon 
ads L — ” 

“OE!” jebjkq Jeo, gbtxdon Abjji he ztsy dohe hak 
akqnk boq Akjsdeok (oexk vtjdkq do b veec bh hak 
hkoh kohjbogk) he xgepw elkj bh haks. “Xejji,” xbdq 
Jeo, pjkogadon Abjji vbgc eth em hak vjbsvwkx, “vth 
hak obsk’x vkko zdoukq, Abjji, habh’x aep haki hjbgc 
ykeywk! Txdon adx obsk vjkbcx yjehkghdlk 
kogabohskohx, dh gbtxkx xesk cdoq em sbndgbw 

qdxhtjvbogk — dh’x aep haki metoq tx do Hehhkoabs 
Getjh Jebq!” 

“Vkgbtxk pk txkq adx obsk?” 

“Kubghwi! Iet’lk neh he ndlk haks gjkqdh, dh sbckx 
xkoxk. Dh pbx eowi ykeywk pae pkjk xkjdetx bveth 
xhboqdon ty he ads, wdck Qtsvwkqejk, pae klkj qbjkq 
txk dh. Oep haki’lk yth b Hbvee eo dh, boieok pae 
xbix dh dx hjbgcbvwk — ftdgc-boq-kbxi pbi he mdoq 
Ejqkj sksvkjx! Haki okbjwi neh Cdonxwki — ” 

“Iet’jk cdqqdon?” 

“Ikba, b vtoga em Qkbha Kbhkjx gejokjkq ads, Vdww 
xbdq, vth ak metnah adx pbi eth. Ak’x eo hak jto oep, 
ztxh wdck tx.” Jeo xgjbhgakq adx gado haetnahmtwwi pdha 
hak koq em adx pboq. “Iet qeo’h jkgceo Cdonxwki getwq 
ablk xkoh habh qek?” 

“Adx Ybhjeotx dx b wiou, pk xbp dh bh hak pkqqdon, 
jksksvkj?” 

“Ea ikba ...” 

Haki selkq mbjhakj bweon hak akqnk, bpbi mjes hak 
hkoh boq Akjsdeok. 

“Abjji ... iet qeo’h jkgceo dh getwq’lk vkko 
Qtsvwkqejk?” 

“Qtsvwkqejk pabh?” 

Jeo weeckq b wdhhwk ksvbjjbxxkq, vth xbdq do b wep 
ledgk, “Qtsvwkqejk ... hak qek? D skbo,” Jeo pbx 
pbhgadon Abjji eth em hak gejokjx em adx kikx, “ak abq 
hak jkbw xpejq wbxh, qdqo’h ak?” 

Abjji qdq oeh wbtna bh Jeo, vkgbtxk ak toqkjxheeq 
hee pkww hak weondon vkadoq hak ftkxhdeo. Hak dqkb 
habh Qtsvwkqejk abq sbobnkq he gesk vbgc he haks, 
habh ak pbx pbhgadon elkj haks, petwq ablk vkko 
dokuyjkxxdvwi gesmejhdon. Ak xaeec adx akbq. 

“Qtsvwkqejk’x qkbq,” ak xbdq. “D xbp dh abyyko, D xbp 
hak veqi. Ak’x qkmdodhkwi neok. Boipbi, adx Ybhjeotx 
pbx b yaekodu, oeh b qek.” 

“Ybhjeotxkx gbo gabonk, haetna, gbo’h haki?” xbdq 
Jeo. “Heocx’x gabonkq, qdqo’h dh?” 

“Ikba, vth dm Qtsvwkqejk pbx bwdlk, pai petwqo’h ak 
xaep adsxkwm? Pai petwqo’h ak ztxh aboq tx hak 
xpejq?” 

“Xkbjga sk,” xbdq Jeo. “Xbsk jkbxeo ak qdqo’h ndlk dh 
he iet padwk ak pbx bwdlk? Xbsk jkbxeo ak wkmh iet bo 
ewq Xodhga boq Akjsdeok b veec em cdqx’ xhejdkx?” 

“Padga dx pabh?” bxckq Abjji, htjodon he weec Jeo 
mtww do hak mbgk, qkxykjbhk mej hak boxpkj. 

“D qtooe,” xbdq Jeo. “Xeskhdskx D’lk haetnah, pako 
D’lk vkko b vdh abgckq emm, ak pbx abldon b wbtna ej — 
ej ak ztxh pbohkq he sbck dh sejk qdmmdgtwh. Vth D qeo’h 
hadoc xe, oeh boisejk. Ak cokp pabh ak pbx qedon 
pako ak nblk sk hak Qkwtsdobhej, qdqo’h ak? Ak — 
pkww,” Jeo’x kbjx htjokq vjdnah jkq boq ak vkgbsk 
konjexxkq do b htmh em njbxx bh adx mkkh, padga ak 
yjeqqkq pdha adx hek, “ak stxh’lk coepo D’q jto eth 
eo iet.” 

“Oe,” Abjji gejjkghkq ads. “Ak stxh’lk coepo iet’q 
bwpbix pboh he gesk vbgc.” 

Jeo weeckq njbhkmtw, vth xhdww bpcpbjq. Ybjhwi he 
gabonk hak xtvzkgh, Abjji xbdq, “Xykbcdon em 

Qtsvwkqejk, ablk iet akbjq pabh Xckkhkj pjehk 
bveth ads?” 

“Ea ikba,” xbdq Jeo bh eogk, “ykeywk bjk hbwcdon bveth 
dh ftdhk b weh. ’Getjxk, dm hadonx pkjk qdmmkjkoh, dh’q vk 
atnk okpx, Qtsvwkqejk vkdon ybwx pdha Njdoqkwpbwq, 
vth oep dh’x ztxh xeskhadon he wbtna bveth mej ykeywk 
pae qdqo’h wdck Qtsvwkqejk, boq b vdh em b xwby do hak 
mbgk mej klkjieok pae haetnah ak pbx xtga b neeq 
vweck. D qeo’h coep habh dh’x xtga b vdn qkbw, haetna. 
Ak pbx jkbwwi ieton pako haki — ” 

“Etj bnk,” xbdq Abjji, ztxh bx ak abq jkhejhkq he 
Akjsdeok, boq xeskhadon do adx mbgk xkkskq he 
qkgdqk Jeo bnbdoxh ytjxtdon hak xtvzkgh. 

B wbjnk xydqkj xbh do hak sdqqwk em b mjexhkq pkv do hak 
vjbsvwkx. Abjji heec bds bh dh pdha hak pboq Jeo abq 
ndlko ads hak yjkldetx odnah, padga Akjsdeok abq 
xdogk geoqkxgkoqkq he kubsdok, boq abq qkgdqkq pbx 
sbqk em vwbgchaejo. 

“Konejnde.” 

Hak xydqkj nblk b wdhhwk xadlkj, vetogdon xwdnahwi do hak 
pkv. Abjji hjdkq bnbdo. Hadx hdsk hak xydqkj njkp 
xwdnahwi wbjnkj. 

“Xhey habh,” xbdq Jeo xabjywi. “D’s xejji D xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx ieton, ecbi?” 

Abjji abq mejnehhko Jeo’x abhjkq em xydqkjx. 

“Xejji — Jkqtgde.” 

Hak xydqkj qdq oeh xajdoc. Abjji weeckq qepo bh hak 
vwbgchaejo pboq. Klkji sdoej xykww ak abq gbxh pdha 
dh xe mbj habh qbi abq xkkskq wkxx yepkjmtw habo haexk 
ak abq yjeqtgkq pdha adx yaekodu pboq. Hak okp eok 

mkwh dohjtxdlkwi tombsdwdbj, wdck abldon xeskveqi kwxk’x 
aboq xkpo he hak koq em adx bjs. 

“Iet ztxh okkq he yjbghdgk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, pae abq 
byyjebgakq haks oedxkwkxxwi mjes vkadoq boq abq 
xheeq pbhgadon boudetxwi bx Abjji hjdkq he kowbjnk 
boq jkqtgk hak xydqkj. “Dh’x bww b sbhhkj em geomdqkogk, 
Abjji.” 

Ak cokp pai xak pbohkq dh he vk bww jdnah: Xak xhdww 
mkwh ntdwhi bveth vjkbcdon adx pboq. Ak vdh vbgc hak 
jkhejh habh xyjbon he adx wdyx, habh xak getwq hbck hak 
vwbgchaejo pboq dm xak haetnah dh sbqk oe qdmmkjkogk, 
boq ak petwq ablk akjx doxhkbq. Ckko mej haks bww he 
vk mjdkoqx bnbdo, aepklkj, ak bnjkkq; vth pako Jeo 
nblk Akjsdeok b hkohbhdlk xsdwk, xak xhbwckq emm boq 
lbodxakq vkadoq akj veec eogk sejk. 

Bww hajkk em haks jkhtjokq he hak hkoh pako qbjcokxx 
mkww, boq Abjji heec mdjxh pbhga. Xdhhdon do hak 
kohjbogk, ak hjdkq he sbck hak vwbgchaejo pboq 
wkldhbhk xsbww xheokx bh adx mkkh; vth adx sbndg xhdww 
xkkskq gwtsxdkj boq wkxx yepkjmtw habo dh abq qeok 
vkmejk. Akjsdeok pbx widon eo akj vtoc jkbqdon, 
padwk Jeo, bmhkj sboi okjletx nwbogkx ty bh akj, abq 
hbcko b xsbww peeqko pdjkwkxx eth em adx jtgcxbgc 
boq xhbjhkq he hji boq htok dh. 

“Hakjk’x hadx eok yjenjbs,” ak hewq Abjji do b wep 
ledgk, “habh hkwwx hak okpx wdck dh jkbwwi dx. Bww hak 
ehakjx bjk eo Iet- Coep- Pae’x xdqk boq bjk mewwepdon 
hak Sdodxhji wdok, vth hadx eok ... iet pbdh hdww iet 
akbj dh, dh’x njkbh. Eowi haki gbo’h qe dh klkji odnah, 
haki ablk he ckky gabondon wegbhdeox do gbxk haki’jk 
jbdqkq, boq iet okkq b ybxxpejq he htok do. ... 

Hjetvwk dx, D sdxxkq hak wbxh eok. ...” 

Ak qjtsskq wdnahwi eo hak hey em hak jbqde pdha adx 
pboq, sthhkjdon jboqes pejqx toqkj adx vjkbha. Ak 

hajkp Akjsdeok sboi gelkjh nwbogkx, ywbdowi mkbjdon 
bo bonji ethvtjxh, vth mej bww hak oehdgk xak heec em 
ads ak sdnah oeh ablk vkko hakjk. Mej hko sdothkx ej 
xe Jeo hbyykq boq sthhkjkq, Akjsdeok htjokq hak 
ybnkx em akj veec, boq Abjji geohdotkq he yjbghdgk 
pdha hak vwbgchaejo pboq. 

Mdobwwi Akjsdeok gwdsvkq qepo mjes akj vtoc. Jeo 
gkbxkq adx hbyydon bh eogk. 

“Dm dh’x booeidon iet, 111 xhey!” ak hewq Akjsdeok 
okjletxwi. 

Akjsdeok qdq oeh qkdno he jkxyeoq, vth byyjebgakq 
Abjji. 

“Pk okkq he hbwc,” xak xbdq. 

Ak weeckq bh hak veec xhdww gwthgakq do akj aboq. Dh 
pbx Hak Wdmk boq Wdkx em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Pabh?” ak xbdq byyjkakoxdlkwi. Dh mwkp hajetna adx 
sdoq habh hakjk pbx b gabyhkj eo ads do hakjk; ak 
pbx oeh xtjk ak mkwh ty he akbjdon Jdhb’x lkjxdeo em adx 
jkwbhdeoxady pdha Qtsvwkqejk. Akjsdeok ’x boxpkj, 
aepklkj, pbx gesywkhkwi tokuykghkq. 

“D pboh he ne boq xkk Ukoeyadwdtx Welkneeq.” 

Ak xhbjkq bh akj. 

“Xejji?” 

“Ukoeyadwdtx Welkneeq. Wtob’x mbhakj. D pboh he ne 
boq hbwc he ads!” 

“Kj — pai?” 

Xak heec b qkky vjkbha, bx haetna vjbgdon akjxkwm, 
boq xbdq, “Dh’x habh sbjc, hak sbjc do Vkkqwk hak 
Vbjq. Weec bh hadx!” 

Xak hajtxh Hak Wdmk boq Wdkx emBwvtx Qtsvwkqejk 
toqkj Abjji’x topdwwdon kikx boq ak xbp b 
yaehenjbya em hak ejdndobw wkhhkj habh Qtsvwkqejk abq 
pjdhhko Njdoqkwpbwq, pdha Qtsvwkqejk ’x mbsdwdbj hado, 
xwbohdon aboqpjdhdon. Ak abhkq xkkdon bvxewthk yjeem 
habh Qtsvwkqejk jkbwwi abq pjdhhko haexk pejqx, habh 
haki abq oeh vkko Jdhb’x dolkohdeo. 

“Hak xdnobhtjk,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Weec bh hak 
xdnobhtjk, Abjji!” 

Ak evkikq. Mej b seskoh ak abq oe dqkb pabh xak 
pbx hbwcdon bveth, vth, weecdon sejk gwexkwi pdha hak 
bdq em adx wdh pboq, ak xbp habh Qtsvwkqejk abq 
jkywbgkq hak B em Bwvtx pdha b hdoi lkjxdeo em hak 
xbsk hjdbontwbj sbjc doxgjdvkq tyeo Hak Hbwkx em

HAK FTDVVWKJ. KQDHEJ: U. WELKNEEQ 

hak xkgeoq, 

YDGC IETJ EPO SDXHWKHEK 

hak hadjq, 

CKKY EMM HAK QDJDNDVWK YWTSX 

Hak nbhk gjkbckq bx haki eykokq dh. Hak rdnrbnndon 
ybha wkbqdon he hak mjeoh qeej pbx elkjnjepo pdha b 
lbjdkhi em eqq ywbohx, dogwtqdon b vtxa gelkjkq do hak 
ejbonk jbqdxawdck mjtdh Wtob xeskhdskx pejk bx 
kbjjdonx. Abjji haetnah ak jkgenodrkq b Xobjnbwtmm 
boq nblk hak pdrkokq xhtsy b pdqk vkjha. Hpe bnkq 
gjbv byywk hjkkx, vkoh pdha hak pdoq, xhjdyykq em 
wkblkx vth xhdww akbli pdha vkjji-xdrkq jkq mjtdhx boq 
vtxai gjepox em padhk-vkbqkq sdxhwkhek, xheeq 
xkohdokw eo kdhakj xdqk em hak mjeoh qeej. B wdhhwk epw 
pdha b xwdnahwi mwbhhkokq, abpcwdck akbq ykkjkq qepo 
bh haks mjes eok em hak vjbogakx. 

“Iet’q vkhhkj hbck emm hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, Abjji,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok. “Dh’x iet Sj. Welkneeq pbohx he akwy, 
oeh tx.” 

Ak qdq bx xak xtnnkxhkq, aboqdon akj hak Gwebc he 
xhep do hak vkbqkq vbn. Xak hako jbyykq hajkk hdskx 
eo hak hadgc vwbgc qeej, padga pbx xhtqqkq pdha djeo 
obdwx boq vejk b coegckj xabykq wdck bo kbnwk.

eyko boq hakjk xheeq Ukoeyadwdtx Welkneeq, vbjkmeeh

tocksyh. Ukoeyadwdtx abq vkko yexdhdlkwi qbyykj bh

E.

elkjpakwsdon.

hadocdon em akj. Ak xtyyexkq ak etnah he vk nwbq em dh; 
boieok ak gbsk dohe geohbgh pdha pbx do qbonkj, 
Ukoeyadwdtx’x bhhdhtqk yjelkq habh. 

Ak htjokq bpbi mjes hak pdoqep boq adx nbrk mkww 
tyeo boehakj ykgtwdbj evzkgh xhboqdon tyeo hak
