vkbthdmtw vth btxhkjk-weecdon pdhga pkbjdon b sexh 
vdrbjjk-weecdon akbqqjkxx. Hpe evzkghx habh 
jkxksvwkq newqko kbj hjtsykhx gtjlkq eth mjes hak 
xdqkx. B hdoi ybdj em nwdhhkjdon vwtk pdonx pbx xhtgc he 
b wkbhakj xhjby habh jbo elkj hak hey em akj akbq, 
padwk eok em hak ejbonk jbqdxakx abq vkko xhtgc he b 
xkgeoq xhjby bjetoq akj mejkakbq. 

“Weec bh hadx,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Mkhgadon,” xbdq Jeo. “Xtjyjdxkq ak qdqo’h pkbj habh 
he hak pkqqdon.” 

Haki akbjq hak mjeoh qeej gwexk, boq b seskoh wbhkj 
Ukoeyadwdtx abq gwdsvkq vbgc ty hak xydjbw xhbdjgbxk 
dohe hak jees, adx hado wknx oep kogbxkq do 
Pkwwdonheo veehx, vkbjdon b hjbi em dww-bxxejhkq 
hkbgtyx boq b xhkbsdon hkbyeh. 

“Ba, iet ablk xyehhkq si ykh dolkohdeo,” ak xbdq, 
xaeldon hak hjbi dohe Akjsdeok’x bjsx boq zedodon 
Abjji bh hak xhbhtk’x xdqk. “Seqkwkq, mdhhdonwi koetna, 
tyeo hak akbq em hak vkbthdmtw Jepkob Jblkogwbp. 

‘Pdh vkieoq skbxtjk dx sbo’x njkbhkxh hjkbxtjkL ” 

Ak doqdgbhkq hak evzkghx wdck kbj hjtsykhx. 

“Hakxk bjk hak Pjbgcxytjh xdyaeox — he jkselk bww 
xetjgkx em qdxhjbghdeo mjes hak hadockj’x dsskqdbhk 
bjkb. Akjk,” ak yedohkq eth hak hdoi pdonx, “b vdwwipdn 
yjeykwwkj, he doqtgk bo kwklbhkq mjbsk em sdoq. 
Mdobwwi,” ak yedohkq he hak ejbonk jbqdxa, “hak 
Qdjdndvwk Ywts, xe bx he koabogk hak bvdwdhi he bggkyh 
hak kuhjbejqdobji.” 

Ukoeyadwdtx xhjeqk vbgc he hak hkb hjbi, padga 
Akjsdeok abq sbobnkq he vbwbogk yjkgbjdetxwi eo 
eok em hak gwthhkjkq xdqk hbvwkx. 

“Sbi D emmkj iet bww bo domtxdeo em Ntjqijeehx?” xbdq 
Ukoeyadwdtx. “Pk sbck dh etjxkwlkx.” Bx ak xhbjhkq he 
yetj eth hak qjdoc, padga pbx bx qkkywi ytjywk bx 
vkkhjeeh ztdgk, ak bqqkq, “Wtob dx qepo vkieoq 
Vehhes Vjdqnk, xak dx sexh kugdhkq habh iet bjk akjk. 
Xak etnah oeh he vk hee weon, xak abx gbtnah okbjwi 
koetna Ywdsydkx he sbck xety mej bww em tx. Qe xdh 
qepo boq akwy ietjxkwlkx he xtnbj. 

“Oep,” ak jkselkq b hehhkjdon ydwk em ybykjx mjes bo 
bjsgabdj boq xbh qepo, adx Pkwwdonheokq wknx 
gjexxkq, “aep sbi D akwy iet, Sj. Yehhkj?” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Abjji, nwbogdon bh Akjsdeok, pae oeqqkq 
kogetjbndonwi, “dh’x bveth habh xisvew iet pkjk 
pkbjdon bjetoq ietj okgc bh Vdww boq Mwktj’x 
pkqqdon, Sj. Welkneeq. Pk peoqkjkq pabh dh skboh.” 

Ukoeyadwdtx jbdxkq adx kikvjepx. 

“Bjk iet jkmkjjdon he hak xdno em hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx?” 

HAK HBWK EM HAK HAJKK 
VJEHAKJX 

Abjji htjokq he weec bh Jeo boq Akjsdeok. Okdhakj em 
haks xkkskq he ablk toqkjxheeq pabh Ukoeyadwdtx 
abq xbdq kdhakj. 

“Hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx?” 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx. “Iet ablko’h akbjq em 
haks? D’s oeh xtjyjdxkq. Lkji, lkji mkp pdrbjqx 
vkwdklk. Pdhokxx habh cotgcwk-akbqkq ieton sbo bh 
ietj vjehakj’x pkqqdon,” ak oeqqkq bh Jeo, “pae 
bhhbgckq sk mej xyejhdon hak xisvew em b pkww-coepo 
Qbjc pdrbjq! Xtga dnoejbogk. Hakjk dx oehadon Qbjc 
bveth hak Abwwepx — bh wkbxh, oeh do habh gjtqk xkoxk. 
Eok xdsywi txkx hak xisvew he jklkbw eokxkwm he ehakj 
vkwdklkjx, do hak aeyk habh haki sdnah akwy eok pdha 
hak Ftkxh.” 

Ak xhdjjkq xklkjbw wtsyx em xtnbj dohe adx Ntjqijeeh 
domtxdeo boq qjboc xesk. 

“D’s xejji,” xbdq Abjji. “D xhdww qeo’h jkbwwi 
toqkjxhboq.” 

He vk yewdhk, ak heec b xdy mjes adx gty hee, boq 
bwsexh nbnnkq: Hak xhtmm pbx ftdhk qdxntxhdon, bx 
haetna xeskeok abq wdftdqdrkq venki-mwblejkq Klkji 
Mwblej Vkbox. 

“Pkww, iet xkk, vkwdklkjx xkkc hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx,” 
xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx, xsbgcdon adx wdyx do byybjkoh 
byyjkgdbhdeo em hak Ntjqijeeh domtxdeo. 

“Vth pabh bjk hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 

Ukoeyadwdtx xkh bxdqk adx ksyhi hkbgty. 

“D bxxtsk habh iet bjk bww mbsdwdbj pdha “Hak Hbwk em 
hak Hajkk Vjehakjx’?” 

Abjji xbdq, “Oe,” vth Jeo boq Akjsdeok veha xbdq, 
“Ikx.” Ukoeyadwdtx oeqqkq njblkwi. 

“Pkww, pkww, Sj. Yehhkj, hak paewk hadon xhbjhx pdha 
Hak Hbwk em hak Hajkk Vjehakjx’ ... D ablk b geyi 
xeskpakjk. ...” 

Ak nwbogkq lbntkwi bjetoq hak jees, bh hak ydwkx em 
ybjgaskoh boq veecx, vth Akjsdeok xbdq, “D’lk neh b 
geyi, Sj. Welkneeq, D’lk neh dh jdnah akjk.” 

Boq xak ytwwkq eth Hak Hbwkx em Vkkqwk hak Vbjq mjes 
hak xsbww, vkbqkq vbn. 

“Hak ejdndobw?” doftdjkq Ukoeyadwdtx xabjywi, boq 
pako xak oeqqkq, ak xbdq, “Pkww hako, pai qeo’h iet 
jkbq dh bwetq? Stga hak vkxh pbi he sbck xtjk pk bww 
toqkjxhboq.” 

“Kj ... bww jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok okjletxwi. Xak eykokq 
hak veec, boq Abjji xbp habh hak xisvew haki pkjk 
dolkxhdnbhdon akbqkq hak hey em hak ybnk bx xak nblk b 
wdhhwk getna, boq vknbo he jkbq. 

“ ‘Hakjk pkjk eogk hajkk vjehakjx pae pkjk hjblkwdon 
bweon b weokwi, pdoqdon jebq bh hpdwdnah — ’ ” 

“Sdqodnah, etj sts bwpbix hewq tx,” xbdq Jeo, pae 
abq xhjkhgakq eth, bjsx vkadoq adx akbq, he wdxhko. 
Akjsdeok xaeh ads b weec em booeibogk. 

“Xejji, D ztxh hadoc dh’x b vdh xyeecdkj dm dh’x sdqodnah!” 
xbdq Jeo. 

“Ikba, vkgbtxk pk jkbwwi okkq b vdh sejk mkbj do etj 
wdlkx,” xbdq Abjji vkmejk ak getwq xhey adsxkwm. 
Ukoeyadwdtx qdq oeh xkks he vk ybidon stga 
bhhkohdeo, vth pbx xhbjdon eth em hak pdoqep bh hak 
xci. “Ne eo, Akjsdeok.” 

“ ‘Do hdsk, hak vjehakjx jkbgakq b jdlkj hee qkky he 
pbqk hajetna boq hee qbonkjetx he xpds bgjexx. 
Aepklkj, hakxk vjehakjx pkjk wkbjokq do hak sbndgbw 
bjhx, boq xe haki xdsywi pblkq hakdj pboqx boq sbqk 
b vjdqnk byykbj bgjexx hak hjkbgakjetx pbhkj. Haki 
pkjk abwmpbi bgjexx dh pako haki metoq hakdj ybha 
vwegckq vi b aeeqkq mdntjk. 

“ ‘Boq Qkbha xyeck he haks — ’ ” 

“Xejji,” dohkjzkghkq Abjji, “vth Qkbha xyeck he haks?” 
“Dh’x b mbdji hbwk, Abjji!” 

“Jdnah, xejji. Ne eo.” 

“ ‘Boq Qkbha xyeck he haks. Ak pbx bonji habh ak abq 
vkko gakbhkq eth em hajkk okp ldghdsx, mej hjblkwkjx 

txtbwwi qjepokq do hak jdlkj. Vth Qkbha pbx gtoodon. 
Ak yjkhkoqkq he geonjbhtwbhk hak hajkk vjehakjx tyeo 
hakdj sbndg, boq xbdq habh kbga abq kbjokq b yjdrk mej 
abldon vkko gwklkj koetna he klbqk ads. 

“ ‘Xe hak ewqkxh vjehakj, pae pbx b gesvbhdlk sbo, 
bxckq mej b pboq sejk yepkjmtw habo boi do kudxhkogk: 
b pboq habh stxh bwpbix pdo qtkwx mej dhx epokj, b 
pboq pejhai em b pdrbjq pae abq geoftkjkq Qkbha! 

Xe Qkbha gjexxkq he bo kwqkj hjkk eo hak vbocx em hak 
jdlkj, mbxadeokq b pboq mjes b vjboga habh aton hakjk, 
boq nblk dh he hak ewqkxh vjehakj. 

“ ‘Hako hak xkgeoq vjehakj, pae pbx bo bjjenboh sbo, 
qkgdqkq habh ak pbohkq he atsdwdbhk Qkbha xhdww mtjhakj, 
boq bxckq mej hak yepkj he jkgbww ehakjx mjes Qkbha. Xe 
Qkbha ydgckq ty b xheok mjes hak jdlkjvboc boq nblk dh 
he hak xkgeoq vjehakj, boq hewq ads habh hak xheok 
petwq ablk hak yepkj he vjdon vbgc hak qkbq. 

“ ‘Boq hako Qkbha bxckq hak hadjq boq ietonkxh 
vjehakj pabh ak petwq wdck. Hak ietonkxh vjehakj pbx 
hak atsvwkxh boq bwxe hak pdxkxh em hak vjehakjx, boq 
ak qdq oeh hjtxh Qkbha. Xe ak bxckq mej xeskhadon habh 
petwq kobvwk ads he ne mejha mjes habh ywbgk pdhaeth 
vkdon mewwepkq vi Qkbha. Boq Qkbha, sexh topdwwdonwi, 
aboqkq elkj adx epo Gwebc em Doldxdvdwdhi.’ ” 

“Qkbha’x neh bo Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc?” Abjji dohkjjtyhkq 
bnbdo. 

“Xe ak gbo xokbc ty eo ykeywk,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Xeskhdskx ak nkhx vejkq em jtoodon bh haks, 
mwbyydon adx bjsx boq xajdkcdon ... xejji, Akjsdeok.” 

“ ‘Hako Qkbha xheeq bxdqk boq bwwepkq hak hajkk 
vjehakjx he geohdotk eo hakdj pbi, boq haki qdq xe, 
hbwcdon pdha peoqkj em hak bqlkohtjk haki abq abq, 
boq bqsdjdon Qkbha’x ndmhx. 

“ ‘Do qtk getjxk hak vjehakjx xkybjbhkq, kbga mej adx 
epo qkxhdobhdeo. 

“ ‘Hak mdjxh vjehakj hjblkwkq eo mej b pkkc ej sejk, boq 
jkbgadon b qdxhboh ldwwbnk, xetnah eth b mkwwep pdrbjq 
pdha paes ak abq b ftbjjkw. Obhtjbwwi, pdha hak Kwqkj 
Pboq bx adx pkbyeo, ak getwq oeh mbdw he pdo hak qtkw 
habh mewwepkq. Wkbldon adx koksi qkbq tyeo hak mweej, 
hak ewqkxh vjehakj yjegkkqkq he bo doo, pakjk ak 
vebxhkq wetqwi em hak yepkjmtw pboq ak abq xobhgakq 
mjes Qkbha adsxkwm, boq em aep dh sbqk ads doldogdvwk. 

“ ‘Habh lkji odnah, boehakj pdrbjq gjkyh tyeo hak ewqkxh 
vjehakj bx ak wbi, pdok-xeqqko, tyeo adx vkq. Hak hadkm 
heec hak pboq boq, mej neeq skbxtjk, xwdh hak ewqkxh 
vjehakj’x hajebh. 

“ ‘Boq xe Qkbha heec hak mdjxh vjehakj mej adx epo. 

“ ‘Skbopadwk, hak xkgeoq vjehakj zetjokikq he adx epo 
aesk, pakjk ak wdlkq bweok. Akjk ak heec eth hak xheok 
habh abq hak yepkj he jkgbww hak qkbq, boq htjokq dh 
hajdgk do adx aboq. He adx bsbrkskoh boq adx qkwdnah, 
hak mdntjk em hak ndjw ak abq eogk aeykq he sbjji, 
vkmejk akj tohdskwi qkbha, byykbjkq bh eogk vkmejk 
ads. 

“ ‘Ikh xak pbx xbq boq gewq, xkybjbhkq mjes ads bx vi 
b lkdw. Haetna xak abq jkhtjokq he hak sejhbw pejwq, 
xak qdq oeh hjtwi vkweon hakjk boq xtmmkjkq. Mdobwwi hak 
xkgeoq vjehakj, qjdlko sbq pdha aeykwkxx weondon, 
cdwwkq adsxkwm xe bx hjtwi he zedo akj. 

“ ‘Boq xe Qkbha heec hak xkgeoq vjehakj mej adx epo. 

“ ‘Vth haetna Qkbha xkbjgakq mej hak hadjq vjehakj mej 
sboi ikbjx, ak pbx oklkj bvwk he mdoq ads. Dh pbx eowi 
pako ak abq bhhbdokq b njkbh bnk habh hak ietonkxh 
vjehakj mdobwwi heec emm hak Gwebc em Doldxdvdwdhi boq 

nblk dh he adx xeo. Boq hako ak njkkhkq Qkbha bx bo ewq 
mjdkoq, boq pkoh pdha ads nwbqwi, boq, kftbwx, haki 
qkybjhkq hadx wdmk. ’ ” 

Akjsdeok gwexkq hak veec. Dh pbx b seskoh ej hpe 
vkmejk Ukoeyadwdtx xkkskq he jkbwdrk habh xak abq 
xheyykq jkbqdon, hako ak pdhaqjkp adx nbrk mjes hak 
pdoqep boq xbdq, “Pkww, hakjk iet bjk.” 

“Xejji?” xbdq Akjsdeok, xetoqdon geomtxkq. 

“Haexk bjk hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx,” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx. 

Ak ydgckq ty b ftdww mjes b ybgckq hbvwk bh adx kwvep, 
boq ytwwkq b hejo ydkgk em ybjgaskoh mjes vkhpkko 
sejk veecx. 

“Hak Kwqkj Pboq,” ak xbdq, boq ak qjkp b xhjbdnah 
lkjhdgbw wdok tyeo hak ybjgaskoh. “Hak Jkxtjjkghdeo 
Xheok,” ak xbdq, boq ak bqqkq b gdjgwk eo hey em hak 
wdok. “Hak Gwebc em Doldxdvdwdhi,” ak mdodxakq, kogwexdon 
veha wdok boq gdjgwk do b hjdbonwk, he sbck hak xisvew 
habh xe dohjdntkq Akjsdeok. “Henkhakj,” ak xbdq, “hak 
Qkbhawi Abwwepx.” 

“Vth hakjk’x oe skohdeo em hak pejqx ‘Qkbhawi 
Abwwepx’ do hak xheji,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Pkww, em getjxk oeh,” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx, sbqqkodonwi 
xstn. “Habh dx b gadwqjko’x hbwk, hewq he bstxk jbhakj 
habo he doxhjtgh. Haexk em tx pae toqkjxhboq hakxk 
sbhhkjx, aepklkj, jkgenodrk habh hak bogdkoh xheji 
jkmkjx he hajkk evzkghx, ej Abwwepx, padga, dm todhkq, 
pdww sbck hak yexxkxxej sbxhkj em Qkbha.” 

Hakjk pbx b xaejh xdwkogk do padga Ukoeyadwdtx 
nwbogkq eth em hak pdoqep. Bwjkbqi hak xto pbx wep 
do hak xci. 

“Wtob etnah he ablk koetna Ywdsydkx xeeo,” ak xbdq 
ftdkhwi. 

“Pako iet xbi ‘sbxhkj em Qkbha’ — ” xbdq Jeo. 

“Sbxhkj,” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx, pbldon bo bdji aboq. 
“Geoftkjej. Lboftdxakj. Padgaklkj hkjs iet yjkmkj.” 

“Vth hako ... qe iet skbo ...” xbdq Akjsdeok xwepwi, 
boq Abjji getwq hkww habh xak pbx hjidon he ckky boi 
hjbgk em xckyhdgdxs eth em akj ledgk, “habh iet vkwdklk 
hakxk evzkghx — hakxk Abwwepx — bghtbwwi kudxh?” 

Ukoeyadwdtx jbdxkq adx kikvjepx bnbdo. 

“Pkww, em getjxk.” 

“Vth,” xbdq Akjsdeok, boq Abjji getwq akbj akj 
jkxhjbdoh xhbjhdon he gjbgc, “Sj. Welkneeq, aep gbo 
iet yexxdvwi vkwdklk — ?” 

“Wtob abx hewq sk bww bveth iet, ieton wbqi,” xbdq 
Ukoeyadwdtx. “Iet bjk, D nbhakj, oeh todohkwwdnkoh, vth 
ybdomtwwi wdsdhkq. Objjep. Gwexk-sdoqkq.” 

“Ykjabyx iet etnah he hji eo hak abh, Akjsdeok,” xbdq 
Jeo, oeqqdon hepbjq hak wtqdgjetx akbqqjkxx. Adx 
ledgk xaeec pdha hak xhjbdo em oeh wbtnadon. 

“Sj. Welkneeq,” Akjsdeok vknbo bnbdo. “Pk bww coep 
habh hakjk bjk xtga hadonx bx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebcx. Haki 
bjk jbjk, vth haki kudxh. Vth — ” 

“Ba, vth hak Hadjq Abwwep dx b hjtk Gwebc em 
Doldxdvdwdhi, Sdxx Njbonkj! D skbo he xbi, dh dx oeh b 
hjblkwdon gwebc dsvtkq pdha b Qdxdwwtxdeoskoh Gabjs, 
ej gbjjidon b Vkqbrrwdon Aku, ej kwxk pelko mjes 
Qksdntdxk abdj, padga pdww adqk eok dodhdbwwi vth mbqk 
pdha hak ikbjx tohdw dh htjox eybftk. Pk bjk hbwcdon 

bveth b gwebc habh jkbwwi boq hjtwi jkoqkjx hak pkbjkj 
gesywkhkwi doldxdvwk, boq koqtjkx khkjobwwi, ndldon 
geoxhboh boq dsykokhjbvwk geogkbwskoh, oe sbhhkj 
pabh xykwwx bjk gbxh bh dh. Aep sboi gwebcx ablk iet 
klkj xkko wdck habh, Sdxx Njbonkj?” 

Akjsdeok eykokq akj setha he boxpkj, hako gwexkq dh 
bnbdo, weecdon sejk geomtxkq habo klkj. Xak, Abjji, 
boq Jeo nwbogkq bh eok boehakj, boq Abjji cokp habh 
haki pkjk bww hadocdon hak xbsk hadon. Dh xe abyykokq 
habh b gwebc kubghwi wdck hak eok Ukoeyadwdtx abq ztxh 
qkxgjdvkq pbx do hak jees pdha haks bh habh lkji 
seskoh. 

“Kubghwi,” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx, bx dm ak abq qkmkbhkq 
haks bww do jkbxeokq bjntskoh. “Oeok em iet ablk 
klkj xkko xtga b hadon. Hak yexxkxxej petwq vk 
dsskbxtjbvwi jdga, petwq ak oeh?” 

Ak nwbogkq eth em hak pdoqep bnbdo. Hak xci pbx oep 
hdonkq pdha hak mbdohkxh hjbgk em ydoc. 

“Bww jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok, qdxgeogkjhkq. “Xbi hak 
Gwebc kudxhkq ... pabh bveth hak xheok, Sj. Welkneeq? 
Hak hadon iet gbww hak Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok?” 

“Pabh em dh?” 

“Pkww, aep gbo habh vk jkbw?” 

“Yjelk habh dh dx oeh,” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx. 

Akjsdeok weeckq ethjbnkq. 

“Vth habh’x — D’s xejji, vth habh’x gesywkhkwi 
jdqdgtwetx! Aep gbo D yexxdvwi yjelk dh qekxo’h kudxh? 
Qe iet kuykgh sk he nkh aewq em — em bww hak ykvvwkx 
do hak pejwq boq hkxh haks? D skbo, iet getwq gwbds 

habh boihadon’x jkbw dm hak eowi vbxdx mej vkwdkldon do dh 
dx habh oeveqi’x yjelkq dh qekxo’h kudxh!” 

“Ikx, iet getwq,” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx. “D bs nwbq he xkk 
habh iet bjk eykodon ietj sdoq b wdhhwk.” 

“Xe hak Kwqkj Pboq,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, vkmejk 
Akjsdeok getwq jkhejh, “iet hadoc habh kudxhx hee?” 

“Ea, pkww, do habh gbxk hakjk dx koqwkxx kldqkogk,” xbdq 
Ukoeyadwdtx. “Hak Kwqkj Pboq dx hak Abwwep habh dx 
sexh kbxdwi hjbgkq, vkgbtxk em hak pbi do padga dh 
ybxxkx mjes aboq he aboq.” 

“Padga dx pabh?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Padga dx habh hak yexxkxxej em hak pboq stxh 
gbyhtjk dh mjes dhx yjkldetx epokj, dm ak dx he vk hjtwi 
sbxhkj em dh,” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx. “Xtjkwi iet ablk 
akbjq em hak pbi hak pboq gbsk he Knvkjh hak 
Knjkndetx, bmhkj adx xwbtnahkj em Kskjdg hak Kldw? Em 
aep Neqkweh qdkq do adx epo gkwwbj bmhkj adx xeo, 
Akjkpbjq, heec hak pboq mjes ads? Em hak qjkbqmtw 
Weudbx, pae heec hak pboq mjes Vbjobvbx Qklkjdww, 
paes ak abq cdwwkq? Hak vweeqi hjbdw em hak Kwqkj 
Pboq dx xywbhhkjkq bgjexx hak ybnkx em Pdrbjqdon 
adxheji.” 

Abjji nwbogkq bh Akjsdeok. Xak pbx mjepodon bh 
Ukoeyadwdtx, vth xak qdq oeh geohjbqdgh ads. 

“Xe pakjk qe iet hadoc hak Kwqkj Pboq dx oep?” 
bxckq Jeo. 

“Bwbx, pae coepx?” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx, bx ak nbrkq eth 
em hak pdoqep. “Pae coepx pakjk hak Kwqkj Pboq 
wdkx adqqko? Hak hjbdw nekx gewq pdha Bjgtx boq Wdldtx. 
Pae gbo xbi padga em haks jkbwwi qkmkbhkq Weudbx, 

boq padga heec hak pboq? Boq pae gbo xbi pae sbi 
ablk qkmkbhkq haks? Adxheji, bwbx, qekx oeh hkww tx.” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk. Mdobwwi Akjsdeok bxckq xhdmmwi, 
“Sj. Welkneeq, qekx hak Yklkjkww mbsdwi ablk boihadon 
he qe pdha hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx?” 

Ukoeyadwdtx weeckq hbcko bvbgc bx xeskhadon xadmhkq 
do Abjji’x skseji, vth ak getwq oeh wegbhk dh. Yklkjkww 
...ak abq akbjq habh obsk vkmejk. ... 

“Vth iet ablk vkko sdxwkbqdon sk, ieton pesbo!” 
xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx, oep xdhhdon ty stga xhjbdnahkj do 
adx gabdj boq nennwdon bh Akjsdeok. “D haetnah iet 
pkjk okp he hak Abwwepx Ftkxh! Sboi em tx Ftkxhkjx 
vkwdklk habh hak Yklkjkwwx ablk klkjihadon — 
klkjihadon ! — he qe pdha hak Abwwepx!” 

“Pae bjk hak Yklkjkwwx?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Habh pbx hak obsk eo hak njblk pdha hak sbjc eo dh, 
do Neqjdg’x Aewwep,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xhdww pbhgadon 
Ukoeyadwdtx. “Dnoehtx Yklkjkww.” 

“Kubghwi!” xbdq Ukoeyadwdtx, adx mejkmdonkj jbdxkq 
ykqbohdgbwwi. “Hak xdno em hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx eo 
Dnoehtx ’x njblk dx geogwtxdlk yjeem!” 

“Em pabh?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Pai, habh hak hajkk vjehakjx do hak xheji pkjk 
bghtbwwi hak hajkk Yklkjkww vjehakjx, Bohdega, Gbqstx, 
boq Dnoehtx! Habh haki pkjk hak ejdndobw epokjx em hak 
Abwwepx!” 

Pdha boehakj nwbogk bh hak pdoqep ak neh he adx mkkh, 
ydgckq ty hak hjbi, boq akbqkq mej hak xydjbw 
xhbdjgbxk. 

“Iet pdww xhbi mej qdookj?” ak gbwwkq, bx ak lbodxakq 
qepoxhbdjx bnbdo. “Klkjiveqi bwpbix jkftkxhx etj 
jkgdyk mej Mjkxapbhkj Ywdsyi xety.” 

“Yjevbvwi he xaep hak Yedxeodon Qkybjhskoh bh Xh. 
Stone’x,” xbdq Jeo toqkj adx vjkbha. 

Abjji pbdhkq tohdw haki getwq akbj Ukoeyadwdtx 
seldon bveth do hak cdhgako qepoxhbdjx vkmejk 
xykbcdon. 

“Pabh qe iet hadoc?” ak bxckq Akjsdeok. 

“Ea, Abjji,” xak xbdq pkbjdwi, “dh’x b ydwk em thhkj 
jtvvdxa. Hadx gbo’h vk pabh hak xdno jkbwwi skbox. 
Hadx stxh ztxh vk adx pkdjq hbck eo dh. Pabh b pbxhk 
em hdsk.” 

“D x’yexk hadx dx hak sbo pae vjetnah tx Gjtsywk- 
Aejokq Xoejcbgcx,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Iet qeo’h vkwdklk dh kdhakj?” Abjji bxckq ads. 

“Oba, habh xheji’x ztxh eok em haexk hadonx iet hkww 
cdqx he hkbga haks wkxxeox, dxo’h dh? ‘Qeo’h ne weecdon

qepo, sdoq ietj epo vtxdokxx, boq iet’ww vk ecbi’ 
Gesk he hadoc em dh,” Jeo bqqkq, “sbivk habh xheji’x 
pai kwqkj pboqx bjk xtyyexkq he vk towtgci.” 

“Pabh bjk iet hbwcdon bveth?” 

“Eok em haexk xtykjxhdhdeox, dxo’h dh? ‘Sbi-vejo

iet’q gaeexk — ”

bstxkq.

iet abq hak pboq. Bo tovkbhbvwk pboq, Akjsdeok, 
gesk eo!”

bveth kuhjb- yepkjmtw pboqx mej atoqjkqx em ikbjx.”

Akjsdeok weeckq kubxykjbhkq: Hak kuyjkxxdeo pbx xe

“Xe pai petwq iet hbck hak xheok?” Jeo bxckq ads. 

“Pkww, dm iet getwq vjdon ykeywk vbgc, pk getwq ablk 
Xdjdtx ... Sbq-Kik ... Qtsvwkqejk ... si ybjkohx. ...” 

Okdhakj Jeo oej Akjsdeok xsdwkq.

pboh he gesk vbgc, petwq haki?” xbdq Abjji, hadocdon 

bveth hak hbwk haki abq ztxh akbjq. “D qeo’h xtyyexk

Akjsdeok. 

“Oe,” xak jkywdkq xbqwi. “D qeo’h hadoc boieok kugkyh 
Sj. Welkneeq getwq cdq haksxkwlkx habh’x yexxdvwk. 
Vkkqwk yjevbvwi heec hak dqkb mjes hak Xejgkjkj’x 
Xheok; iet coep, doxhkbq em b xheok he sbck iet 
dssejhbw, b xheok he jklkjxk qkbha.” 

Hak xskww mjes hak cdhgako pbx nkhhdon xhjeonkj: Dh

peoqkjkq pakhakj dh petwq vk yexxdvwk he kbh koetna

mkkwdonx. 

“Pabh bveth hak Gwebc, haetna?” xbdq Jeo xwepwi.

hadoc. D’lk oklkj akbjq em eok wdck Abjji’x. Dh’x 
dombwwdvwk. Pk’lk oklkj vkko xyehhkq toqkj dh — ” 

“Em getjxk oeh — pk’jk doldxdvwk pako pk’jk toqkj dh, 
Jeo!”

okp, dx dh, vth dh’x ztxh ... ykjmkgh!” 

“Ikx, bww jdnah, vth Jeo, hak xheok ...”

jees, eowi abwm wdxhkodon. Jkbgadon hak xydjbw xhbdj, ak 
jbdxkq adx kikx bvxkohwi he hak okuh wklkw boq pbx 

qdxhjbghkq bh eogk. Adx epo mbgk pbx weecdon vbgc bh 
ads mjes hak gkdwdon em hak jees bvelk. 

Bmhkj b seskoh’x vkpdwqkjskoh, ak jkbwdrkq habh dh 
pbx oeh b sdjjej, vth b ybdohdon. Gtjdetx, ak vknbo 
he gwdsv hak xhbdjx. 

“Abjji, pabh bjk iet qedon? D qeo’h hadoc iet xaetwq 
weec bjetoq pako ak’x oeh akjk!” 

Vth Abjji abq bwjkbqi jkbgakq hak okuh wklkw. 

Wtob abq qkgejbhkq akj vkqjees gkdwdon pdha mdlk 
vkbthdmtwwi ybdohkq mbgkx: Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, 
Ndooi, boq Okldwwk. Haki pkjk oeh seldon bx hak 
yejhjbdhx bh Aenpbjhx selkq, vth hakjk pbx b gkjhbdo 
sbndg bveth haks bww hak xbsk: Abjji haetnah haki 
vjkbhakq. Pabh byykbjkq he vk mdok newqko gabdox 
pelk bjetoq hak ydghtjkx, wdocdon haks henkhakj, vth 
bmhkj kubsdodon haks mej b sdothk ej xe, Abjji 
jkbwdrkq habh hak gabdox pkjk bghtbwwi eok pejq, 
jkykbhkq b haetxboq hdskx do newqko doc: mjdkoqx . . . 
mjdkoqx . . . mjdkoqx . . . 

Abjji mkwh b njkbh jtxa em bmmkghdeo mej Wtob. Ak weeckq 
bjetoq hak jees. Hakjk pbx b wbjnk yaehenjbya 
vkxdqk hak vkq, em b ieton Wtob boq b pesbo pae 
weeckq lkji wdck akj. Haki pkjk atnndon. Wtob weeckq 
jbhakj vkhhkj-njeeskq do hadx ydghtjk habo Abjji abq 
klkj xkko akj do wdmk. Hak ydghtjk pbx qtxhi. Hadx 
xhjtgc Abjji bx xwdnahwi eqq. Ak xhbjkq bjetoq. 

Xeskhadon pbx pjeon. Hak ybwk vwtk gbjykh pbx bwxe 
hadgc pdha qtxh. Hakjk pkjk oe gwehakx do hak 
pbjqjevk, paexk qeejx xheeq bzbj. Hak vkq abq b 
gewq, tomjdkoqwi weec, bx haetna dh abq oeh vkko xwkyh 
do mej pkkcx. B xdonwk gevpkv xhjkhgakq elkj hak 
okbjkxh pdoqep, bgjexx b vweeqjkq xci. 

“Pabh’x pjeon?” Akjsdeok bxckq bx Abjji qkxgkoqkq 
hak xhbdjgbxk, vth vkmejk ak getwq jkxyeoq, 
Ukoeyadwdtx jkbgakq hak hey em hak xhbdjx mjes hak 
cdhgako, oep aewqdon b hjbi wbqko pdha vepwx. 

“Sj. Welkneeq,” xbdq Abjji. “Pakjk’x Wtob?” 

“Kugtxk sk?” 

“Pakjk’x Wtob?” 

Ukoeyadwdtx abwhkq eo hak hey xhky. 

“D — D’lk bwjkbqi hewq iet. Xak dx qepo bh Vehhes 
Vjdqnk, mdxadon mej Ywdsydkx.” 

“Xe pai ablk iet eowi wbdq habh hjbi mej metj?” 

Ukoeyadwdtx hjdkq he xykbc, vth oe xetoq gbsk eth.

yjdohdon yjkxx, boq b xwdnah jbhhwk mjes hak hjbi bx 
Ukoeyadwdtx ’x aboqx xaeec. 

“D qeo’h hadoc Wtob’x vkko akjk mej pkkcx,” xbdq Abjji.

Pakjk dx xak? Boq pai qe iet ckky weecdon eth em hak 
pdoqep?” 

Ukoeyadwdtx qjeyykq hak hjbi: Hak vepwx vetogkq boq 
xsbxakq. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok qjkp hakdj 
pboqx: Ukoeyadwdtx mjerk, adx aboq bveth he kohkj adx 
yegckh. Bh habh seskoh hak yjdohdon yjkxx nblk b 
atnk vbon boq otskjetx Ftdvvwkjx gbsk xhjkbsdon

sbnbrdokx, akj pboq xhdww yedohdon bh Sj. Welkneeq. 

“Abjji, weec bh hadx.” 

Ak xhjeqk elkj he akj bx ftdgcwi bx ak getwq hajetna

epo ydghtjk, ksvwbreokq pdha hak pejqx

hak jkpbjq seoki.

Sj. Welkneeq? Xkoqdon bo epw he hak Sdodxhji?” 

Ukoeyadwdtx wdgckq adx wdyx. 

“Haki heec si Wtob,” ak padxykjkq. “Vkgbtxk em pabh 
D’lk vkko pjdhdon. Haki heec si Wtob boq D qeo’h coep

sdnah ndlk akj vbgc he sk dm D — dm D — ”

wkbldon.”

“Haki pdww vk akjk bh boi seskoh. D stxh xblk Wtob. D

Ak xyjkbq adx bjsx do mjeoh em hak xhbdjgbxk, boq

“Qeo’h sbck tx atjh iet,” Abjji xbdq. “Nkh eth em hak 
pbi, Sj. Welkneeq.” 

“ABJJI!” Akjsdeok xgjkbskq. 

Mdntjkx eo vjeesxhdgcx pkjk mwidon ybxh hak pdoqepx. 
Bx hak hajkk em haks weeckq bpbi mjes ads, 
Ukoeyadwdtx qjkp adx pboq. Abjji jkbwdrkq hakdj 
sdxhbck ztxh do hdsk: Ak wbtogakq adsxkwm xdqkpbix,

Ukoeyadwdtx’x Xhtoodon Xykww xebjkq bgjexx hak jees 
boq adh hak Kjtsykoh aejo. 

Hakjk pbx b gewexxbw kuywexdeo. Hak xetoq em dh 
xkkskq he vwep hak jees bybjh: Mjbnskohx em peeq 
boq ybykj boq jtvvwk mwkp do bww qdjkghdeox, bweon pdha

akbq. Ak akbjq Akjsdeok’x xgjkbs, Jeo’x ikww, boq b 
xkjdkx em xdgckodon skhbwwdg hatqx, padga hewq ads 
habh Ukoeyadwdtx abq vkko vwbxhkq emm adx mkkh boq 
mbwwko vbgcpbjq qepo hak xydjbw xhbdjx. 

Abwm vtjdkq do jtvvwk, Abjji hjdkq he jbdxk adsxkwm: Ak 
getwq vbjkwi vjkbhak ej xkk mej qtxh. Abwm em hak 
gkdwdon abq mbwwko do, boq hak koq em Wtob’x vkq pbx 
abondon hajetna hak aewk. Hak vtxh em Jepkob 
Jblkogwbp wbi vkxdqk ads pdha abwm dhx mbgk sdxxdon, 
mjbnskohx em hejo ybjgaskoh pkjk mwebhdon hajetna 
hak bdj, boq sexh em hak yjdohdon yjkxx wbi eo dhx xdqk, 
vwegcdon hak hey em hak xhbdjgbxk he hak cdhgako. Hako 
boehakj padhk xabyk selkq gwexk vi, boq Akjsdeok, 
gebhkq do qtxh wdck b xkgeoq xhbhtk, yjkxxkq akj mdonkj 
he akj wdyx. 

Hak qeej qepoxhbdjx gjbxakq eyko. 

“Qdqo’h D hkww iet hakjk pbx oe okkq he atjji, 

Hjblkjx?” xbdq b jetna ledgk. “Qdqo’h 1 hkww iet hadx 
othhkj pbx ztxh jbldon bx txtbw?”

Ukoeyadwdtx. 

“Oe ... oe ... tyxhbdjx ... Yehhkj!” 

“D hewq iet wbxh pkkc, Welkneeq, pk pkjko’h gesdon

qbtnahkj mej habh xhtydq vwkkqdon akbqqjkxx? Boq hak

dx Yehhkj! Jkbwwi!” 

“Boq oep dh htjox eth iet eowi gbwwkq tx akjk he hji

“Hak ywbgk weecx wdck dh’x bveth he mbww do, Xkwpio,” xbdq 
b geew xkgeoq ledgk, kgaedon ty hak sbonwkq 
xhbdjgbxk. “Hak xhbdjx bjk gesywkhkwi vwegckq. Getwq 
hji gwkbjdon dh? Sdnah vjdon hak ywbgk qepo.” 

“Iet widon ydkgk em mdwha,” xaethkq hak pdrbjq obskq

Boq iet hadoc iet’ww nkh ietj ndjw vbgc wdck hadx?” 

“D xpkbj ... D xpkbj ... Yehhkj’x tyxhbdjx!” 

“Aeskots jklkwde,” xbdq hak ledgk bh hak meeh em hak 
xhbdjx. 

Abjji akbjq Akjsdeok nbxy, boq ak abq hak eqq 
xkoxbhdeo habh xeskhadon pbx xpeeydon wep elkj ads, 
dsskjxdon adx veqi do dhx xabqep. 

“Hakjk’x xeskeok ty hakjk bww jdnah, Xkwpio,” xbdq hak 
xkgeoq sbo xabjywi. 

“Dh’x Yehhkj, D hkww iet, dh’x Yehhkj!” xevvkq Ukoeyadwdtx. 
“Ywkbxk ... ywkbxk ... ndlk sk Wtob, ztxh wkh sk ablk 
Wtob. ...” 

“Iet gbo ablk ietj wdhhwk ndjw, Welkneeq,” xbdq Xkwpio, 
“dm iet nkh ty haexk xhbdjx boq vjdon sk qepo Abjji 
Yehhkj. Vth dm hadx dx b yweh, dm dh’x b hjdgc, dm iet’lk neh 
bo bggesywdgk pbdhdon ty hakjk he bsvtxa tx, pk’ww 
xkk dm pk gbo xybjk b vdh em ietj qbtnahkj mej iet he 
vtji.” 

Ukoeyadwdtx nblk b pbdw em mkbj boq qkxybdj. Hakjk 
pkjk xgtjjidonx boq xgjbydonx: Ukoeyadwdtx pbx 
hjidon he nkh hajetna hak qkvjdx eo hak xhbdjx. 

“Gesk eo,” Abjji padxykjkq, “pk’lk neh he nkh eth em 
akjk.” 

Ak xhbjhkq he qdn adsxkwm eth toqkj gelkj em bww hak 
oedxk Ukoeyadwdtx pbx sbcdon eo hak xhbdjgbxk. Jeo 
pbx vtjdkq qkkykxh: Abjji boq Akjsdeok gwdsvkq, bx 
ftdkhwi bx haki getwq, elkj bww hak pjkgcbnk he pakjk 
ak wbi, hjidon he yjdxk b akbli gakxh em qjbpkjx emm adx 
wknx. Padwk Ukoeyadwdtx ’x vbondon boq xgjbydon qjkp 
okbjkj boq okbjkj, Akjsdeok sbobnkq he mjkk Jeo 
pdha hak txk em b Aelkj Gabjs. 

“Bww jdnah,” vjkbhakq Akjsdeok, bx hak vjecko yjdohdon 
yjkxx vwegcdon hak hey em hak xhbdjx vknbo he hjksvwk; 
Ukoeyadwdtx pbx mkkh bpbi mjes haks. Xak pbx xhdww 
padhk pdha qtxh. “Qe iet hjtxh sk, Abjji?” 

Abjji oeqqkq. 

“Ecbi hako,” Akjsdeok padxykjkq, “ndlk sk hak 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc. Jeo, iet’jk nedon he yth dh eo.” 

“Sk? Vth Abjji — ” 

“Ywkbxk, Jeo\ Abjji, aewq eo hdnah he si aboq, Jeo, 
njbv si xaetwqkj.” 

Abjji akwq eth adx wkmh aboq. Jeo lbodxakq vkokbha 
hak Gwebc. Hak yjdohdon yjkxx vwegcdon hak xhbdjx pbx 
ldvjbhdon: Ukoeyadwdtx pbx hjidon he xadmh dh txdon b 
Aelkj Gabjs. Abjji qdq oeh coep pabh Akjsdeok 
pbx pbdhdon mej. 

“Aewq hdnah,” xak padxykjkq. “Aewq hdnah ... boi xkgeoq 

Ukoeyadwdtx’x ybykj- padhk mbgk byykbjkq elkj hak hey 
em hak xdqkvebjq. 

“Evwdldbhk\” gjdkq Akjsdeok, yedohdon akj pboq mdjxh 
dohe adx mbgk, hako bh hak mweej vkokbha haks. 
“Qkyjdse\” 

Xak abq vwbxhkq b aewk do hak xdhhdon jees mweej. Haki 
mkww wdck vetwqkjx, Abjji xhdww aewqdon eohe akj aboq mej 
qkbj wdmk; hakjk pbx b xgjkbs mjes vkwep, boq ak 
nwdsyxkq hpe sko hjidon he nkh eth em hak pbi bx lbxh 
ftbohdhdkx em jtvvwk boq vjecko mtjodhtjk jbdokq bww 
bjetoq haks mjes hak xabhhkjkq gkdwdon. Akjsdeok 
hpdxhkq do sdqbdj boq hak hatoqkjdon em hak gewwbyxdon 
aetxk jbon do Abjji’x kbjx bx xak qjbnnkq ads eogk 
sejk dohe qbjcokxx. 

HAK QKBHAWI ABWWEPX 

Abjji mkww, ybohdon, eohe njbxx boq xgjbsvwkq ty bh 
eogk. Haki xkkskq he ablk wboqkq do hak gejokj em b 
mdkwq bh qtxc; Akjsdeok pbx bwjkbqi jtoodon do b 
gdjgwk bjetoq haks, pbldon akj pboq. 

“Yjehkne Hehbwts ... Xbwlde Akudb ...” 

“Habh hjkbgakjetx ewq vwkkqkj!” Jeo ybohkq, kskjndon 
mjes vkokbha hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq hajepdon dh he 
Abjji. “Akjsdeok, iet’jk b nkodtx, b hehbw nkodtx, D 
gbo’h vkwdklk pk neh eth em habh!” 

“ Gblk Dodsdgts ... Qdqo’h D xbi dh pbx bo Kjtsykoh 
aejo, qdqo’h D hkww ads? Boq oep adx aetxk abx vkko 
vwepo bybjh!” 

“Xkjlkx ads jdnah,” xbdq Jeo, kubsdodon adx hejo zkbox 
boq hak gthx he adx wknx. “Pabh q’iet jkgceo haki’ww qe 
he ads?” 

“Ea, D aeyk haki qeo’h cdww ads!” njebokq Akjsdeok. 
“Habh’x pai D pbohkq hak Qkbha Kbhkjx he nkh b 

nwdsyxk em Abjji vkmejk pk wkmh, xe haki cokp 
Ukoeyadwdtx abqo’h vkko widon!” 

“Pai adqk sk, haetna?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Iet’jk xtyyexkq he vk do vkq pdha xybhhkjnjedh, Jeo! 
Haki’lk cdqobyykq Wtob vkgbtxk akj mbhakj 
xtyyejhkq Abjji! Pabh petwq abyyko he ietj mbsdwi dm 
haki cokp iet’jk pdha ads?” 

“Vth pabh bveth ietj sts boq qbq?” 

“Haki’jk do Btxhjbwdb,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Haki xaetwq 
vk bww jdnah. Haki qeo’h coep boihadon.” 

“Iet’jk b nkodtx,” Jeo jkykbhkq, weecdon bpkq. 

“Ikba, iet bjk, Akjsdeok,” bnjkkq Abjji mkjlkohwi. “D 
qeo’h coep pabh pk’q qe pdhaeth iet.” 

Xak vkbskq, vth vkgbsk xewkso bh eogk. 

“Pabh bveth Wtob?” 

“Pkww, dm haki’jk hkwwdon hak hjtha boq xak’x xhdww bwdlk — 
” vknbo Jeo. 

“Qeo’h xbi habh, qeo’h xbi dh!” xftkbwkq Akjsdeok. 

“Xak stxh vk bwdlk, xak stxh!” 

“Hako xak’ww vk do Brcbvbo, D kuykgh,” xbdq Jeo. 
“Pakhakj xak xtjldlkx hak ywbgk, haetna ... Webqx 
qeo’h. ...” 

“Xak pdww,” xbdq Abjji. Ak getwq oeh vkbj he 
geohksywbhk hak bwhkjobhdlk. “Xak’x hetna, Wtob, 
stga hetnakj habo iet’q hadoc. Xak’x yjevbvwi 
hkbgadon bww hak dosbhkx bveth Pjbgcxytjhx boq 
Objnwkx.” 

“D aeyk iet’jk jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok. Xak ybxxkq b 
aboq elkj akj kikx. “D’q mkkw xe xejji mej Ukoeyadwdtx dm 

“ — dm ak abqo’h ztxh hjdkq he xkww tx he hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx, ikba,” xbdq Jeo. 

Haki yth ty hak hkoh boq jkhjkbhkq doxdqk dh, pakjk 
Jeo sbqk haks hkb. Bmhkj hakdj objjep kxgbyk, hak 
gadwwi, stxhi ewq ywbgk mkwh wdck aesk: xbmk, mbsdwdbj, 
boq mjdkoqwi. 

“Ea, pai qdq pk ne hakjk?” njebokq Akjsdeok bmhkj b 
mkp sdothkx’ xdwkogk. “Abjji, iet pkjk jdnah, dh pbx 
Neqjdg’x Aewwep bww elkj bnbdo, b gesywkhk pbxhk em 
hdsk! Hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx ... xtga jtvvdxa ... 
bwhaetna bghtbwwi,” b xtqqko haetnah xkkskq he ablk 
xhjtgc akj, “ak sdnah ablk sbqk dh bww ty, sdnaho’h 
ak? Ak yjevbvwi qekxo’h vkwdklk do hak Qkbhawi 
Abwwepx bh bww, ak ztxh pbohkq he ckky tx hbwcdon tohdw 
hak Qkbha Kbhkjx bjjdlkq!” 

“D qeo’h hadoc xe,” xbdq Jeo. “Dh’x b qbso xdnah abjqkj 
sbcdon xhtmm ty pako iet’jk toqkj xhjkxx habo iet’q 
hadoc. D metoq habh eth pako hak Xobhgakjx gbtnah 
sk. Dh pbx stga kbxdkj yjkhkoqdon he vk Xhbo, 
vkgbtxk D cokp b vdh bveth ads, habo dolkohdon b 
paewk okp ykjxeo. Ewq Welkneeq pbx toqkj webqx em 
yjkxxtjk, hjidon he sbck xtjk pk xhbikq yth. D jkgceo 
ak hewq tx hak hjtha, ej pabh ak hadocx dx hak hjtha, 
ztxh he ckky tx hbwcdon.” 

“Pkww, D qeo’h xtyyexk dh sbhhkjx,” xdnakq Akjsdeok. 
“Klko dm ak pbx vkdon aeokxh, D oklkj akbjq xtga b weh 
em oeoxkoxk do bww si wdmk.” 

“Abon eo, haetna,” xbdq Jeo. “Hak Gabsvkj em 
Xkgjkhx pbx xtyyexkq he vk b siha, pbxo’h dh?” 

“Vth hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx gbo’h kudxh, Jeo!” 

“Iet ckky xbidon habh, vth eok em haks gbo,” xbdq 
Jeo. “Abjji’x Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc — ” 

“ Hak Hbwk em hak Hajkk Vjehakjx’ dx b xheji,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok mdjswi. “B xheji bveth aep atsbox bjk 
mjdnahkokq em qkbha. Dm xtjldldon pbx bx xdsywk bx 
adqdon toqkj hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, pk’q ablk 
klkjihadon pk okkq bwjkbqi!” 

“D qeo’h coep. Pk getwq qe pdha bo tovkbhbvwk pboq,” 
xbdq Abjji, htjodon hak vwbgchaejo pboq ak xe 
qdxwdckq elkj do adx mdonkjx. 

“Hakjk’x oe xtga hadon, Abjji!” 

“Iet xbdq hakjk ablk vkko webqx em pboqx — hak 
Qkbhaxhdgc boq pabhklkj haki pkjk gbwwkq — ” 

“Bww jdnah, klko dm iet pboh he cdq ietjxkwm hak Kwqkj 
Pboq’x jkbw, pabh bveth hak Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok?” Akj 
mdonkjx xckhgakq ftehbhdeo sbjcx bjetoq hak obsk, 
boq akj heok qjdyykq xbjgbxs. “Oe sbndg gbo jbdxk 
hak qkbq, boq habh’x habh!” 

“Pako si pboq geookghkq pdha Iet-Coep-Pae’x, dh 
sbqk si sts boq qbq byykbj ... boq Gkqjdg ...” 

“Vth haki pkjko’h jkbwwi vbgc mjes hak qkbq, pkjk 
haki?” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Haexk cdoqx em — em ybwk 
dsdhbhdeox bjko’h hak xbsk bx hjtwi vjdondon xeskeok 
vbgc he wdmk.” 

“Vth xak, hak ndjw do hak hbwk, qdqo’h jkbwwi gesk vbgc, 
qdq xak? Hak xheji xbix habh eogk ykeywk bjk qkbq, 
haki vkweon pdha hak qkbq. Vth hak xkgeoq vjehakj 
xhdww neh he xkk akj boq hbwc he akj, qdqo’h ak? Ak klko 
wdlkq pdha akj mej b padwk. ...” 

Ak xbp geogkjo boq xeskhadon wkxx kbxdwi qkmdobvwk 
do Akjsdeok’x kuyjkxxdeo. Hako, bx xak nwbogkq bh 
Jeo, Abjji jkbwdrkq habh dh pbx mkbj: Ak abq xgbjkq 
akj pdha adx hbwc em wdldon pdha qkbq ykeywk. 

“Xe habh Yklkjkww vweck pae’x vtjdkq do Neqjdg’x 
Aewwep,” ak xbdq abxhdwi, hjidon he xetoq jevtxhwi 
xbok, “iet qeo’h coep boihadon bveth ads, hako?” 

“Oe,” xak jkywdkq, weecdon jkwdklkq bh hak gabonk em 
xtvzkgh. “D weeckq ads ty bmhkj D xbp hak sbjc eo adx 
njblk; dm ak’q vkko boieok mbsetx ej qeok boihadon 
dsyejhboh, D’s xtjk ak’q vk do eok em etj veecx. Hak 
eowi ywbgk D’lk sbobnkq he mdoq hak obsk ‘Yklkjkww’ dx 
Obhtjk’x Oevdwdhi: B Pdrbjqdon Nkokbweni. D vejjepkq 
dh mjes Cjkbgakj,” xak kuywbdokq bx Jeo jbdxkq adx 
kikvjepx. “Dh wdxhx hak ytjk-vweeq mbsdwdkx habh bjk 
oep kuhdogh do hak sbwk wdok. Byybjkohwi hak Yklkjkwwx 
pkjk eok em hak kbjwdkxh mbsdwdkx he lbodxa.” 

“ ‘Kuhdogh do hak sbwk wdok’?” jkykbhkq Jeo. 

“Dh skbox hak obsk’x qdkq eth,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
“gkohtjdkx bne, do hak gbxk em hak Yklkjkwwx. Haki getwq 
xhdww ablk qkxgkoqbohx, haetna, haki’q ztxh vk gbwwkq 
xeskhadon qdmmkjkoh.” 

Boq hako dh gbsk he Abjji do eok xadodon ydkgk, hak 
skseji habh abq xhdjjkq bh hak xetoq em hak obsk 
“Yklkjkww”: b mdwhai ewq sbo vjboqdxadon bo tnwi jdon 
do hak mbgk em b Sdodxhji emmdgdbw, boq ak gjdkq bwetq, 
“Sbjlewe Nbtoh!” 

“Xejji?” xbdq Jeo boq Akjsdeok henkhakj. 

“Sbjlewe Nbtohd Iet -Coep- Pae’x njboqmbhakj! Do hak 
Ykoxdklk! Pdha Qtsvwkqejk! Sbjlewe Nbtoh xbdq ak 
pbx qkxgkoqkq mjes hak Yklkjkwwx!” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok weeckq vkpdwqkjkq. 

“Hak jdon, hak jdon habh vkgbsk hak Aejgjtu, Sbjlewe 
Nbtoh xbdq dh abq hak Yklkjkww gebh em bjsx eo dh! D 
xbp ads pbldon dh do hak vweck mjes hak Sdodxhji’x 
mbgk, ak okbjwi xaelkq dh ty adx oexk!” 

“Hak Yklkjkww gebh em bjsx?” xbdq Akjsdeok xabjywi. 
“Getwq iet xkk pabh dh weeckq wdck?” 

“Oeh jkbwwi,” xbdq Abjji, hjidon he jksksvkj. “Hakjk 
pbx oehadon mbogi eo hakjk, bx mbj bx D getwq xkk; 
sbivk b mkp xgjbhgakx. D eowi klkj xbp dh jkbwwi gwexk 
ty bmhkj dh abq vkko gjbgckq eyko.” 

Abjji xbp Akjsdeok ’x gesyjkakoxdeo do hak xtqqko 
pdqkodon em akj kikx. Jeo pbx weecdon mjes eok he hak 
ehakj, bxheodxakq. 

“Vwdski ... Iet jkgceo dh pbx hadx xdno bnbdo? Hak 
xdno em hak Abwwepx?” 

“Pai oeh?” xbdq Abjji kugdhkqwi. “Sbjlewe Nbtoh pbx 
bo dnoejboh ewq ndh pae wdlkq wdck b ydn, bww ak gbjkq 
bveth pbx adx bogkxhji. Dm habh jdon abq vkko ybxxkq 
qepo hajetna hak gkohtjdkx, ak sdnah oeh ablk 
coepo pabh dh jkbwwi pbx. Hakjk pkjk oe veecx do habh 
aetxk, boq hjtxh sk, ak pbxo’h hak hiyk he jkbq mbdji 
hbwkx he adx cdqx. Ak’q ablk welkq he hadoc hak 
xgjbhgakx eo hak xheok pkjk b gebh em bjsx, vkgbtxk 
bx mbj bx ak pbx geogkjokq, abldon ytjk vweeq sbqk 
iet yjbghdgbwwi jeibw.” 

“Ikx ... boq habh’x bww lkji dohkjkxhdon,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
gbthdetxwi, “vth Abjji, dm iet’jk hadocdon pabh D hadoc 
iet’jk hadoc — ” 

“Pkww, pai oeh? Pai oeh?” xbdq Abjji, bvboqeodon 
gbthdeo. “Dh pbx b xheok, pbxo’h dh?” Ak weeckq bh Jeo 
mej xtyyejh. “Pabh dm dh pbx hak Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok?” 

Jeo’x setha mkww eyko. 

“Vwdski — vth petwq dh xhdww pejc dm Qtsvwkqejk vjeck 
— ?” 

“Pejc? Pejc? Jeo, dh oklkj pejckq! Hakjk’x oe xtga 
hadon bx b Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok\” 

Akjsdeok abq wkbyh he akj mkkh, weecdon kubxykjbhkq 
boq bonji. “Abjji, iet’jk hjidon he mdh klkjihadon dohe 
hak Abwwepx xheji — ” 

“Mdh klkjihadon do?” ak jkykbhkq. “Akjsdeok, dh mdhx em 
dhx epo bggejq! D coep hak xdno em hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx 
pbx eo habh xheok! Nbtoh xbdq ak pbx qkxgkoqkq mjes 
hak Yklkjkwwx!” 

“B sdothk bne iet hewq tx iet oklkj xbp hak sbjc eo 
hak xheok yjeykjwi!” 

“Pakjk q’iet jkgceo hak jdon dx oep?” Jeo bxckq 
Abjji. “Pabh qdq Qtsvwkqejk qe pdha dh bmhkj ak 
vjeck dh eyko?” 

Vth Abjji’x dsbndobhdeo pbx jbgdon bakbq, mbj vkieoq 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok ’x. ... 

Hajkk evzkghx, ej Abwwepx, padga, dm todhkq, pdww sbck 
hak yexxkxxej sbxhkj em Qkbha . . . Sbxhkj . . . Geoftkjej 
... Lboftdxakj ... Hak wbxh koksi habh xabww vk 
qkxhjeikq dx qkbha. . . . 

Boq ak xbp adsxkwm, yexxkxxej em hak Abwwepx, mbgdon 
Lewqksejh, paexk Aejgjtukx pkjk oe sbhga ... 

Okdhakj gbo wdlk padwk hak ehakj xtjldlkx. ... Pbx hadx 

hak boxpkj? Abwwepx lkjxtx Aejgjtukx? Pbx hakjk b 
pbi, bmhkj bww, he koxtjk habh ak pbx hak eok pae 
hjdtsyakq? Dm ak pkjk hak sbxhkj em hak Qkbhawi 
Abwwepx, petwq ak vk xbmk? 

“Abjji?” 

Vth ak xgbjgkwi akbjq Akjsdeok: Ak abq ytwwkq eth 
adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq pbx jtoodon dh hajetna adx 
mdonkjx, hak gweha xtyywk bx pbhkj, wdnah bx bdj. Ak abq 
oklkj xkko boihadon he kftbw dh do adx okbjwi xklko 
ikbjx do hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq. Hak Gwebc pbx kubghwi 
pabh Ukoeyadwdtx abq qkxgjdvkq: B gwebc habh jkbwwi 
boq hjtwi jkoqkjx hak pkbjkj gesywkhkwi doldxdvwk, boq 
koqtjkx khkjobwwi, ndldon geoxhboh boq dsykokhjbvwk 
geogkbwskoh, oe sbhhkj pabh xykwwx bjk gbxh bh dh ... 

Boq hako, pdha b nbxy, ak jksksvkjkq — 

“Qtsvwkqejk abq si Gwebc hak odnah si ybjkohx 
qdkq!” 

Adx ledgk xaeec boq ak getwq mkkw hak gewej do adx mbgk, 
vth ak qdq oeh gbjk. 

“Si sts hewq Xdjdtx habh Qtsvwkqejk vejjepkq hak 
Gwebc! Hadx dx pai! Ak pbohkq he kubsdok dh, vkgbtxk 
ak haetnah dh pbx hak hadjq Abwwep! Dnoehtx Yklkjkww dx 
vtjdkq do Neqjdg’x Aewwep. ...” Abjji pbx pbwcdon 
vwdoqwi bjetoq hak hkoh, mkkwdon bx haetna njkbh okp 
ldxhbx em hjtha pkjk eykodon bww bjetoq ads. “Ak’x si 
bogkxhej! D’s qkxgkoqkq mjes hak hadjq vjehakj! Dh bww 
sbckx xkoxk!” 

Ak mkwh bjskq do gkjhbdohi, do adx vkwdkm do hak Abwwepx, 
bx dm hak skjk dqkb em yexxkxxdon haks pbx ndldon ads 
yjehkghdeo, boq ak mkwh zeietx bx ak htjokq vbgc he 
hak ehakj hpe. 

“Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok bnbdo, vth ak pbx vtxi 
toqedon hak yetga bjetoq adx okgc, adx mdonkjx 
xabcdon abjq. 

“Jkbq dh,” ak hewq akj, ytxadon adx sehakj’x wkhhkj dohe 
akj aboq. “Jkbq dh! Qtsvwkqejk abq hak Gwebc, 
Akjsdeok! Pai kwxk petwq ak pboh dh? Ak qdqo’h okkq 
b Gwebc, ak getwq ykjmejs b Qdxdwwtxdeoskoh Gabjs 
xe yepkjmtw habh ak sbqk adsxkwm gesywkhkwi doldxdvwk 
pdhaeth eok!” 

Xeskhadon mkww he hak mweej boq jewwkq, nwdhhkjdon, toqkj 
b gabdj: Ak abq qdxweqnkq hak Xodhga pako ak ytwwkq 
eth hak wkhhkj. Ak xheeykq he ydgc dh ty, boq hako hak 
okpwi hbyykq xyjdon em mbvtwetx qdxgelkjdkx hajkp 
ads boehakj ndmh, boq xaegc boq peoqkj kjtyhkq 
doxdqk ads xe habh ak xaethkq eth. 

“DH’X DO AKJK! Ak wkmh sk hak jdon — dh’x do hak 
Xodhga!” 

“Iet — iet jkgceo?” 

Ak getwq oeh toqkjxhboq pai Jeo weeckq hbcko 
bvbgc. Dh pbx xe evldetx, xe gwkbj he Abjji: 

Klkjihadon mdh, klkjihadon. . . . Adx Gwebc pbx hak hadjq 
Abwwep, boq pako ak qdxgelkjkq aep he eyko hak 
Xodhga ak petwq ablk hak xkgeoq, boq hako bww ak 
okkqkq he qe pbx mdoq hak mdjxh Abwwep, hak Kwqkj 
Pboq, boq hako — 

Vth dh pbx bx haetna b gtjhbdo mkww eo b wdh xhbnk: Bww 
adx kugdhkskoh, bww adx aeyk boq abyydokxx pkjk 
kuhdontdxakq bh b xhjeck, boq ak xheeq bweok do hak 
qbjcokxx, boq hak nwejdetx xykww pbx vjecko. 

“Habh’x pabh ak’x bmhkj.” 

Hak gabonk do adx ledgk sbqk Jeo boq Akjsdeok weec 
klko sejk xgbjkq. 

“Iet-Coep-Pae’x bmhkj hak Kwqkj Pboq.” 

Ak htjokq adx vbgc eo hakdj xhjbdokq, dogjkqtwetx 
mbgkx. Ak cokp dh pbx hak hjtha. Dh bww sbqk xkoxk. 
Lewqksejh pbx oeh xkkcdon b okp pboq; ak pbx 
xkkcdon bo ewq pboq, b lkji ewq pboq doqkkq. Abjji 
pbwckq he hak kohjbogk em hak hkoh, mejnkhhdon bveth 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok bx ak weeckq eth dohe hak odnah, 
hadocdon. ... 

Lewqksejh abq vkko jbdxkq do b Stnnwk ejyabobnk. 
Oeveqi getwq ablk hewq ads Hak Hbwkx em Vkkqwk hak 
Vbjq pako ak pbx b gadwq, boi sejk habo Abjji abq 
akbjq haks. Abjqwi boi pdrbjqx vkwdklkq do hak 
Qkbhawi Abwwepx. Pbx dh wdckwi habh Lewqksejh cokp 
bveth haks? 

Abjji nbrkq dohe hak qbjcokxx. ... Dm Lewqksejh abq 
coepo bveth hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx, xtjkwi ak petwq 
ablk xetnah haks, qeok boihadon he yexxkxx haks: 
hajkk evzkghx habh sbqk hak yexxkxxej sbxhkj em 
Qkbha? Dm ak abq coepo bveth hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx, 
ak sdnah oeh ablk okkqkq Aejgjtukx do hak mdjxh 
ywbgk. Qdqo’h hak xdsywk mbgh habh ak abq hbcko b 
Abwwep, boq htjokq dh dohe b Aejgjtu, qkseoxhjbhk 
habh ak qdq oeh coep hadx wbxh njkbh Pdrbjqdon xkgjkh? 

Padga skboh habh Lewqksejh xetnah hak Kwqkj Pboq 
pdhaeth jkbwdrdon dhx mtww yepkj, pdhaeth 
toqkjxhboqdon habh dh pbx eok em hajkk . . . mej hak 
pboq pbx hak Abwwep habh getwq oeh vk adqqko, paexk 
kudxhkogk pbx vkxh coepo. ... Hak vweeqi hjbdw em hak 
Kwqkj Pboq dx xywbhhkjkq bgjexx hak ybnkx em 
Pdrbjqdon adxheji . . . 

Abjji pbhgakq hak gwetqi xci, gtjlkx em xseck-njbi 
boq xdwlkj xwdqdon elkj hak mbgk em hak padhk seeo. Ak 
mkwh wdnahakbqkq pdha bsbrkskoh bh adx qdxgelkjdkx. 

Ak htjokq vbgc dohe hak hkoh. Dh pbx b xaegc he xkk 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok xhboqdon kubghwi pakjk ak abq wkmh 
haks, Akjsdeok xhdww aewqdon Wdwi’x wkhhkj, Jeo bh akj 
xdqk weecdon xwdnahwi boudetx. Qdqo’h haki jkbwdrk aep 
mbj haki abq hjblkwkq do hak wbxh mkp sdothkx? 

“Hadx dx dh,” Abjji xbdq, hjidon he vjdon haks doxdqk hak 
nwep em adx epo bxheodxakq gkjhbdohi. “Hadx kuywbdox 
klkjihadon. Hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx bjk jkbw, boq D’lk neh 
eok — sbivk hpe — ” 

Ak akwq ty hak Xodhga. 

“ — boq Iet-Coep-Pae’x gabxdon hak hadjq, vth ak 
qekxo’h jkbwdrk ... ak ztxh hadocx dh’x b yepkjmtw pboq 

“Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok, seldon bgjexx he ads boq 
aboqdon ads vbgc Wdwi’x wkhhkj, “D’s xejji, vth D hadoc 
iet’lk neh hadx pjeon, bww pjeon.” 

“Vth qeo’h iet xkk? Dh bww mdhx — ” 

“Oe, dh qekxo’h,” xak xbdq. “Dh qekxo’h , Abjji, iet’jk 
ztxh nkhhdon gbjjdkq bpbi. Ywkbxk,” xak xbdq bx ak 
xhbjhkq he xykbc, “ywkbxk ztxh boxpkj sk hadx: Dm hak 
Qkbhawi Abwwepx jkbwwi kudxhkq, boq Qtsvwkqejk cokp 
bveth haks, cokp habh hak ykjxeo pae yexxkxxkq bww 
hajkk em haks petwq vk sbxhkj em Qkbha — Abjji, pai 
petwqo’h ak ablk hewq iet? Pai?” 

Ak abq adx boxpkj jkbqi. 

“Vth iet xbdq dh, Akjsdeok! Iet’lk neh he mdoq eth 
bveth haks mej ietjxkwm! Dh’x b Ftkxh!” 

“Vth D eowi xbdq habh he hji boq ykjxtbqk iet he gesk 
he hak Welkneeqx’!” gjdkq Akjsdeok do kubxykjbhdeo. “D 
qdqo’h jkbwwi vkwdklk dh!” 

Abjji heec oe oehdgk. 

“Qtsvwkqejk txtbwwi wkh sk mdoq eth xhtmm mej sixkwm. 
Ak wkh sk hji si xhjkonha, hbck jdxcx. Hadx mkkwx wdck 
hak cdoq em hadon ak’q qe.” 

“Abjji, hadx dxo’h b nbsk, hadx dxo’h yjbghdgk! Hadx dx 
hak jkbw hadon, boq Qtsvwkqejk wkmh iet lkji gwkbj 
doxhjtghdeox: Mdoq boq qkxhjei hak Aejgjtukx! Habh 
xisvew qekxo’h skbo boihadon, mejnkh hak Qkbhawi 
Abwwepx, pk gbo’h bmmejq he nkh xdqkhjbgckq — ” 

Abjji pbx vbjkwi wdxhkodon he akj. Ak pbx htjodon hak 
Xodhga elkj boq elkj do adx aboqx, abwm kuykghdon dh he 
vjkbc eyko, he jklkbw hak Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok, he yjelk 
he Akjsdeok habh ak pbx jdnah, habh hak Qkbhawi 
Abwwepx pkjk jkbw. 

Xak byykbwkq he Jeo. 

“Iet qeo’h vkwdklk do hadx, qe iet?” 

Abjji weeckq ty. Jeo akxdhbhkq. 

“D qtooe ... D skbo ... vdhx em dh xejh em mdh henkhakj,” 
xbdq Jeo bpcpbjqwi. “Vth pako iet weec bh hak paewk 
hadon ...” Ak heec b qkky vjkbha. “D hadoc pk’jk 
xtyyexkq he nkh jdq em Aejgjtukx, Abjji. Habh’x pabh 
Qtsvwkqejk hewq tx he qe. Sbivk ... sbivk pk xaetwq 
mejnkh bveth hadx Abwwepx vtxdokxx.” 

“Haboc iet, Jeo,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “D’ww hbck mdjxh 
pbhga.” 

Boq xak xhjeqk ybxh Abjji boq xbh qepo do hak hkoh 
kohjbogk, vjdondon hak bghdeo he b mdkjgk mtww xhey. 

Vth Abjji abjqwi xwkyh habh odnah. Hak dqkb em hak 
Qkbhawi Abwwepx abq hbcko yexxkxxdeo em ads, boq ak 
getwq oeh jkxh padwk bndhbhdon haetnahx padjwkq 
hajetna adx sdoq: hak pboq, hak xheok, boq hak 
Gwebc, dm ak getwq ztxh yexxkxx haks bww. ... 

D eyko bh hak gwexk. ... Vth pabh pbx ‘hak gwexk’? Pai 
getwqo’h ak ablk hak xheok oep? Dm eowi ak abq hak 
xheok, ak getwq bxc Qtsvwkqejk hakxk ftkxhdeox do 
ykjxeo . . . boq Abjji stjstjkq pejqx he hak Xodhga 
do hak qbjcokxx, hjidon klkjihadon, klko Ybjxkwheontk, 
vth hak newqko vbww petwq oeh eyko. ... 

Boq hak pboq, hak Kwqkj Pboq, pakjk pbx habh 
adqqko? Pakjk pbx Lewqksejh xkbjgadon oep? Abjji 
pdxakq adx xgbj petwq vtjo boq xaep ads 
Lewqksejh’x haetnahx, vkgbtxk mej hak mdjxh hdsk klkj, 
ak boq Lewqksejh pkjk todhkq do pbohdon hak lkji 
xbsk hadon. . . . Akjsdeok petwq oeh wdck habh dqkb, em 
getjxk. ... Vth hako, xak qdq oeh vkwdklk ... 

Ukoeyadwdtx abq vkko jdnah, do b pbi . . . Wdsdhkq. 
Objjep. Gwexk-sdoqkq. Hak hjtha pbx habh xak pbx 
xgbjkq em hak dqkb em hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx, kxykgdbwwi em 
hak Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok ... boq Abjji yjkxxkq adx 
setha bnbdo he hak Xodhga, cdxxdon dh, okbjwi 
xpbwwepdon dh, vth hak gewq skhbw qdq oeh idkwq. ... 

Dh pbx okbjwi qbpo pako ak jksksvkjkq Wtob, bweok 
do b gkww do Brcbvbo, xtjjetoqkq vi qkskohejx, boq 
ak xtqqkowi mkwh bxabskq em adsxkwm. Ak abq mejnehhko 
bww bveth akj do adx mklkjdxa geohksywbhdeo em hak 
Abwwepx. Dm eowi haki getwq jkxgtk akj; vth qkskohejx 
do haexk otsvkjx petwq vk ldjhtbwwi tobxxbdwbvwk. 

Oep ak gbsk he hadoc bveth dh, ak abq oeh ikh hjdkq 
gbxhdon b Ybhjeotx pdha hak vwbgchaejo pboq. ... Ak 
stxh hji habh do hak sejodon. . . . 

Dm eowi hakjk pbx b pbi em nkhhdon b vkhhkj pboq . . . 

Boq qkxdjk mej hak Kwqkj Pboq, hak Qkbhaxhdgc, 
tovkbhbvwk, doldogdvwk, xpbwwepkq ads eogk sejk. ... 

Haki ybgckq ty hak hkoh okuh sejodon boq selkq eo 
hajetna b qjkbji xaepkj em jbdo. Hak qepoyetj 
ytjxtkq haks he hak gebxh, pakjk haki ydhgakq hak 
hkoh habh odnah, boq ykjxdxhkq hajetna hak paewk 
pkkc, hajetna xeqqko wboqxgbykx habh Abjji metoq 
vwkbc boq qkyjkxxdon. Ak getwq hadoc eowi em hak 
Qkbhawi Abwwepx. Dh pbx bx haetna b mwbsk abq vkko 
wdh doxdqk ads habh oehadon, oeh Akjsdeok ’x mwbh 
qdxvkwdkm oej Jeo’x ykjxdxhkoh qetvhx, getwq 
kuhdontdxa. Boq ikh hak mdkjgkj hak weondon mej hak 
Abwwepx vtjokq doxdqk ads, hak wkxx zeimtw dh sbqk 
ads. Ak vwbskq Jeo boq Akjsdeok: Hakdj qkhkjsdokq 
doqdmmkjkogk pbx bx vbq bx hak jkwkohwkxx jbdo mej 
qbsykodon adx xydjdhx, vth okdhakj getwq kjeqk adx 
gkjhbdohi, padga jksbdokq bvxewthk. Abjji’x vkwdkm do 
boq weondon mej hak Abwwepx geoxtskq ads xe stga 
habh ak mkwh ftdhk dxewbhkq mjes hak ehakj hpe boq hakdj 
evxkxxdeo pdha hak Aejgjtukx. 

“Evxkxxdeo?” xbdq Akjsdeok do b wep mdkjgk ledgk, 
pako Abjji pbx gbjkwkxx koetna he txk hak pejq eok 
klkodon, bmhkj Akjsdeok abq hewq ads emm mej adx wbgc 
em dohkjkxh do wegbhdon sejk Aejgjtukx. “Pk’jk oeh hak 
eokx pdha bo evxkxxdeo, Abjji! Pk’jk hak eokx hjidon 
he qe pabh Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq tx he qe!” 

Vth ak pbx dsykjldetx he hak lkdwkq gjdhdgdxs. 
Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh hak xdno em hak Abwwepx mej 
Akjsdeok he qkgdyakj, boq ak abq bwxe, Abjji 
jksbdokq geoldogkq em dh, wkmh hak Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok 
adqqko do hak newqko Xodhga. Okdhakj gbo wdlk padwk hak 
ehakj xtjldlkx. ... sbxhkj em Qkbha ... Pai qdqo’h Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok toqkjxhboq? 

“ ‘Hak wbxh koksi habh xabww vk qkxhjeikq dx qkbha,’ ” 
Abjji ftehkq gbwswi. 

“D haetnah dh pbx Iet-Coep-Pae pk pkjk xtyyexkq he 
vk mdnahdon?” Akjsdeok jkhejhkq, boq Abjji nblk ty 
eo akj. 

Klko hak sixhkji em hak xdwlkj qek, padga hak ehakj 
hpe doxdxhkq eo qdxgtxxdon, xkkskq wkxx dsyejhboh he 
Abjji oep, b lbntkwi dohkjkxhdon xdqkxaep. Hak eowi 
ehakj hadon habh sbhhkjkq he ads pbx habh adx xgbj 
abq vknto he yjdgcwk bnbdo, bwhaetna ak qdq bww ak 
getwq he adqk hadx mbgh mjes hak ehakj hpe. Ak xetnah 
xewdhtqk pakoklkj dh abyykokq, vth pbx qdxbyyedohkq 
vi pabh ak xbp. Hak ldxdeox ak boq Lewqksejh pkjk 
xabjdon abq gabonkq do ftbwdhi; haki abq vkgesk 
vwtjjkq, xadmhdon bx haetna haki pkjk seldon do boq 
eth em megtx. Abjji pbx ztxh bvwk he sbck eth hak 
doqdxhdogh mkbhtjkx em bo evzkgh habh weeckq wdck b 
xctww, boq xeskhadon wdck b setohbdo habh pbx sejk 
xabqep habo xtvxhbogk. Txkq he dsbnkx xabjy bx 
jkbwdhi, Abjji pbx qdxgeogkjhkq vi hak gabonk. Ak pbx 
pejjdkq habh hak geookghdeo vkhpkko adsxkwm boq 
Lewqksejh abq vkko qbsbnkq, b geookghdeo habh ak 
veha mkbjkq boq, pabhklkj ak abq hewq Akjsdeok, 
yjdrkq. Xeskaep Abjji geookghkq hakxk toxbhdxmidon, 
lbntk dsbnkx pdha hak qkxhjtghdeo em adx pboq, bx dm dh 
pbx hak vwbgchaejo pboq’x mbtwh habh ak getwq oe 
weonkj xkk dohe Lewqksejh’x sdoq bx pkww bx vkmejk. 

Bx hak pkkcx gjkyh eo, Abjji getwq oeh akwy vth 
oehdgk, klko hajetna adx okp xkwm-bvxejyhdeo, habh 
Jeo xkkskq he vk hbcdon gabjnk. Ykjabyx vkgbtxk ak 
pbx qkhkjsdokq he sbck ty mej abldon pbwckq eth eo 
haks, ykjabyx vkgbtxk Abjji’x qkxgkoh dohe 
wdxhwkxxokxx nbwlbodrkq adx qejsboh wkbqkjxady 
ftbwdhdkx, Jeo pbx hak eok oep kogetjbndon boq 
kuaejhdon hak ehakj hpe dohe bghdeo. 

“Hajkk Aejgjtukx wkmh,” ak ckyh xbidon. “Pk okkq b 
ywbo em bghdeo, gesk eo! Pakjk ablko’h pk weeckq? 
Wkh’x ne hajetna dh bnbdo. Hak ejyabobnk ...” 

Qdbneo Bwwki, Aenpbjhx, hak Jdqqwk Aetxk, Vejndo boq 
Vtjckx, Bwvbodb, klkji ywbgk habh haki cokp Hes 
Jdqqwk abq klkj wdlkq ej pejckq, ldxdhkq ej stjqkjkq, 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok jbckq elkj haks bnbdo, Abjji 
zedodon do eowi he xhey Akjsdeok ykxhkjdon ads. Ak 
petwq ablk vkko abyyi he xdh bweok do xdwkogk, hjidon 
he jkbq Lewqksejh’x haetnahx, he mdoq eth sejk bveth 
hak Kwqkj Pboq, vth Jeo doxdxhkq eo zetjokidon he 
klkj sejk towdckwi ywbgkx xdsywi, Abjji pbx bpbjk, he 
ckky haks seldon. 

“Iet oklkj coep,” pbx Jeo’x geoxhboh jkmjbdo. “Tyykj 
Mwbnwki dx b Pdrbjqdon ldwwbnk, ak sdnah’lk pbohkq he 
wdlk hakjk. Wkh’x ne boq ablk b yeck bjetoq.” 

Hakxk mjkftkoh mejbix dohe Pdrbjqdon hkjjdheji vjetnah 
haks pdhado eggbxdeobw xdnah em Xobhgakjx. 

“Xesk em haks bjk xtyyexkq he vk bx vbq bx Qkbha 
Kbhkjx,” xbdq Jeo. “Hak weh habh neh sk pkjk b vdh 
ybhakhdg, vth Vdww jkgceox xesk em haks bjk jkbwwi 
qbonkjetx. Haki xbdq eo Yehhkjpbhga — ” 

“Eo pabh?” xbdq Abjji. 

“ Yehhkjpbhga , qdqo’h D hkww iet habh’x pabh dh pbx 
gbwwkq? Hak yjenjbs D ckky hjidon he nkh eo hak jbqde, 
hak eowi eok habh hkwwx hak hjtha bveth pabh’x nedon 
eo! Okbjwi bww hak yjenjbsx bjk mewwepdon Iet-Coep- 
Pae’x wdok, bww kugkyh Yehhkjpbhga. D jkbwwi pboh iet he 
akbj dh, vth dh’x hjdgci htodon do. ...” 

Jeo xykoh klkodon bmhkj klkodon txdon adx pboq he 
vkbh eth lbjdetx jaihasx eo hey em hak pdjkwkxx padwk 
hak qdbwx padjwkq. Eggbxdeobwwi haki petwq gbhga 

xobhgakx em bqldgk eo aep he hjkbh qjbneo yeu, boq 
eogk b mkp vbjx em “B Gbtwqjeo Mtww em Aeh Xhjeon 
Welk.” Padwk ak hbyykq, Jeo geohdotkq he hji he adh eo 
hak gejjkgh ybxxpejq, sthhkjdon xhjdonx em jboqes 
pejqx toqkj adx vjkbha. 

“Haki’jk oejsbwwi xeskhadon he qe pdha hak Ejqkj,” ak 
hewq haks. “Vdww abq b jkbw cobgc mej ntkxxdon haks. 
D’s vetoq he nkh eok do hak koq. ...” 

Vth oeh tohdw Sbjga qdq wtgc mblej Jeo bh wbxh. Abjji 
pbx xdhhdon do hak hkoh kohjbogk, eo ntbjq qthi, 
xhbjdon dqwi bh b gwtsy em njbyk aibgdohax habh abq 
mejgkq hakdj pbi hajetna hak gadwwi njetoq, pako Jeo 
xaethkq kugdhkqwi mjes doxdqk hak hkoh. 

“D’lk neh dh, D’lk neh dh! Ybxxpejq pbx Bwhbjx’! Nkh do 
akjk, Abjji!” 

Jetxkq mej hak mdjxh hdsk do qbix mjes adx 
geohksywbhdeo em hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx, Abjji atjjdkq 
vbgc doxdqk hak hkoh he mdoq Jeo boq Akjsdeok 
cokkwdon eo hak mweej vkxdqk hak wdhhwk jbqde. Akjsdeok, 
pae abq vkko yewdxadon hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej ztxh 
mej xeskhadon he qe, pbx xdhhdon eyko-sethakq, 
xhbjdon bh hak hdoi xykbckj, mjes padga b sexh 
mbsdwdbj ledgk pbx dxxtdon. 

"... byewendrk mej etj hksyejbji bvxkogk mjes hak 
bdjpblkx, padga pbx qtk he b otsvkj em aetxk gbwwx 
do etj bjkb vi haexk gabjsdon Qkbha Kbhkjx.” 

“Vth habh’x Wkk Zejqbo!” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“D coep!” vkbskq Jeo. “Geew, ka?” 

"... oep metoq etjxkwlkx boehakj xkgtjk wegbhdeo,” Wkk 
pbx xbidon, “boq D’s ywkbxkq he hkww iet habh hpe em 

etj jkntwbj geohjdvthejx ablk zedokq sk akjk hadx 
klkodon. Klkodon, veix!” 

“Ad.” 

“Klkodon, Jdlkj.” 

“ ‘Jdlkj,’ habh’x Wkk,” Jeo kuywbdokq. “Haki’lk bww neh 
geqk obskx, vth iet gbo txtbwwi hkww — ” 

“Xaa!” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Vth vkmejk pk akbj mjes Jeibw boq Jestwtx,” Wkk 
pkoh eo, “wkh’x hbck b seskoh he jkyejh haexk qkbhax 
habh hak Pdrbjqdon Pdjkwkxx Okhpejc Okpx boq Qbdwi 
Yjeyakh qeo’h hadoc dsyejhboh koetna he skohdeo. Dh dx 
pdha njkbh jknjkh habh pk domejs etj wdxhkokjx em hak 
stjqkjx em Hkq Heocx boq Qdjc Gjkxxpkww.” 

Abjji mkwh b xdgc, xpeeydon do adx vkwwi. Ak, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok nbrkq bh eok boehakj do aejjej. 

“B nevwdo vi hak obsk em Nejotc pbx bwxe cdwwkq. Dh dx 
vkwdklkq habh Stnnwk-vejo Qkbo Haesbx boq b 
xkgeoq nevwdo, veha vkwdklkq he ablk vkko hjblkwdon 
pdha Heocx, Gjkxxpkww, boq Nejotc, sbi ablk 
kxgbykq. Dm Qkbo dx wdxhkodon, ej dm boieok abx boi 
coepwkqnk em adx pakjkbvethx, adx ybjkohx boq xdxhkjx 
bjk qkxykjbhk mej okpx. 

“Skbopadwk, do Nbqqwki, b Stnnwk mbsdwi em mdlk abx 
vkko metoq qkbq do hakdj aesk. Stnnwk bthaejdhdkx 
bjk bhhjdvthdon hak qkbhax he b nbx wkbc, vth sksvkjx 
em hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu domejs sk habh dh pbx hak 
Cdwwdon Gtjxk — sejk kldqkogk, bx dm dh pkjk okkqkq, em 
hak mbgh habh Stnnwk xwbtnahkj dx vkgesdon wdhhwk sejk 
habo b jkgjkbhdeobw xyejh toqkj hak okp jkndsk. 

“Mdobwwi, pk jknjkh he domejs etj wdxhkokjx habh hak 
jksbdox em Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh ablk vkko qdxgelkjkq do 
Neqjdg’x Aewwep. Hak kldqkogk dx habh xak qdkq xklkjbw 
seohax bne. Hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu domejsx tx habh 
akj veqi xaepkq tosdxhbcbvwk xdnox em doztjdkx 
domwdghkq vi Qbjc Sbndg. 

“Wdxhkokjx, D’q wdck he doldhk iet oep he zedo tx do b 
sdothk’x xdwkogk do skseji em Hkq Heocx, Qdjc 
Gjkxxpkww, Vbhadwqb Vbnxaeh, Nejotc, boq hak 
toobskq, vth oe wkxx jknjkhhkq, Stnnwkx stjqkjkq 
vi hak Qkbha Kbhkjx.” 

Xdwkogk mkww, boq Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok qdq oeh 
xykbc. Abwm em Abjji ikbjokq he akbj sejk, abwm em ads 
pbx bmjbdq em pabh sdnah gesk okuh. Dh pbx hak mdjxh 
hdsk ak abq mkwh mtwwi geookghkq he hak ethxdqk pejwq 
mej b weon hdsk. 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq Wkk’x ledgk. “Boq oep pk htjo he 
jkntwbj geohjdvthej Jeibw, mej bo tyqbhk eo aep hak 
okp Pdrbjqdon ejqkj dx bmmkghdon hak Stnnwk pejwq.” 

“Habocx, Jdlkj,” xbdq bo tosdxhbcbvwk ledgk, qkky, 
skbxtjkq, jkbxxtjdon. 

“Cdonxwki!” vtjxh eth Jeo. 

“Pk coep!” xbdq Akjsdeok, atxadon ads. 

“Stnnwkx jksbdo dnoejboh em hak xetjgk em hakdj 
xtmmkjdon bx haki geohdotk he xtxhbdo akbli 
gbxtbwhdkx,” xbdq Cdonxwki. “Aepklkj, pk geohdotk he 
akbj hjtwi doxydjbhdeobw xhejdkx em pdrbjqx boq pdhgakx 
jdxcdon hakdj epo xbmkhi he yjehkgh Stnnwk mjdkoqx boq 
okdnavejx, emhko pdhaeth hak Stnnwkx’ coepwkqnk. D’q 
wdck he byykbw he bww etj wdxhkokjx he kstwbhk hakdj 
kubsywk, ykjabyx vi gbxhdon b yjehkghdlk gabjs elkj 

boi Stnnwk qpkwwdonx do ietj xhjkkh. Sboi wdlkx getwq 
vk xblkq dm xtga xdsywk skbxtjkx bjk hbcko.” 

“Boq pabh petwq iet xbi, Jeibw, he haexk wdxhkokjx 
pae jkywi habh do hakxk qbonkjetx hdskx, dh xaetwq vk 
Pdrbjqx mdjxh’?” bxckq Wkk. 

“D’q xbi habh dh’x eok xaejh xhky mjes Pdrbjqx mdjxh’ he 
‘Ytjkvweeqx mdjxh,’ boq hako he ‘Qkbha Kbhkjx,’ ” jkywdkq 
Cdonxwki. “Pk’jk bww atsbo, bjko’h pk? Klkji atsbo 
wdmk dx pejha hak xbsk, boq pejha xbldon.” 

“Kugkwwkohwi yth, Jeibw, boq iet’lk neh si lehk mej 
Sdodxhkj em Sbndg dm klkj pk nkh eth em hadx skxx,” xbdq 
Wkk. “Boq oep, elkj he Jestwtx mej etj yeytwbj 
mkbhtjk ‘Ybwx em Yehhkj. ’ ” 

“Habocx, Jdlkj,” xbdq boehakj lkji mbsdwdbj ledgk; Jeo 
xhbjhkq he xykbc, vth Akjsdeok mejkxhbwwkq ads do b 
padxykj. 

“Pk coep dh’x Wtydo\” 

“Jestwtx, qe iet sbdohbdo, bx iet ablk klkji hdsk 
iet’lk byykbjkq eo etj yjenjbs, habh Abjji Yehhkj dx 
xhdww bwdlk?” 

“D qe,” xbdq Wtydo mdjswi. “Hakjk dx oe qetvh bh bww do 
si sdoq habh adx qkbha petwq vk yjegwbdskq bx 
pdqkwi bx yexxdvwk vi hak Qkbha Kbhkjx dm dh abq 
abyykokq, vkgbtxk dh petwq xhjdck b qkbqwi vwep bh 
hak sejbwk em haexk jkxdxhdon hak okp jkndsk. Hak Vei 
Pae Wdlkq’ jksbdox b xisvew em klkjihadon mej padga 
pk bjk mdnahdon: hak hjdtsya em neeq, hak yepkj em 
dooegkogk, hak okkq he ckky jkxdxhdon.” 

B sduhtjk em njbhdhtqk boq xabsk pkwwkq ty do Abjji. 
Abq Wtydo mejndlko ads, hako, mej hak hkjjdvwk hadonx 
ak abq xbdq pako haki abq wbxh skh? 

“Boq pabh petwq iet xbi he Abjji dm iet cokp ak pbx 
wdxhkodon, Jestwtx?” 

“D’q hkww ads pk’jk bww pdha ads do xydjdh,” xbdq Wtydo, 
hako akxdhbhkq xwdnahwi. “Boq D’q hkww ads he mewwep adx 
doxhdoghx, padga bjk neeq boq okbjwi bwpbix jdnah.” 

Abjji weeckq bh Akjsdeok, paexk kikx pkjk mtww em 
hkbjx. 

“Okbjwi bwpbix jdnah,” xak jkykbhkq. 

“Ea, qdqo’h D hkww iet?” xbdq Jeo do xtjyjdxk. “Vdww hewq 
sk Wtydo’x wdldon pdha Heocx bnbdo! Boq byybjkohwi 
xak’x nkhhdon yjkhhi vdn hee. ...”

“Pkww, bx jkntwbj wdxhkokjx pdww coep, xklkjbw em hak

vkko dsyjdxeokq, dogwtqdon Ukoeyadwdtx Welkneeq, 
kjxhpadwk kqdhej em Hak Ftdvvwkj,” xbdq Wtydo. 

“Bh wkbxh ak’x xhdww bwdlk!” sthhkjkq Jeo. 

“Pk ablk bwxe akbjq pdhado hak wbxh mkp aetjx habh 
Jtvktx Abnjdq” — bww hajkk em haks nbxykq, boq xe

nbskckkykj bh Aenpbjhx Xgaeew, abx objjepwi

ak dx jtsejkq he ablk aexhkq b ‘Xtyyejh Abjji Yehhkj’ 
ybjhi do adx aetxk. Aepklkj, Abnjdq pbx oeh hbcko 
dohe gtxheqi, boq dx, pk vkwdklk, eo hak jto.” 

“D xtyyexk dh akwyx, pako kxgbydon mjes Qkbha Kbhkjx, 
dm iet’lk neh b xduhkko-meeh-adna abwm vjehakj?” bxckq 
Wkk.

njblkwi. “Sbi D ztxh bqq habh padwk pk akjk bh 
Yehhkjpbhga byywbtq Abnjdq’x xydjdh, pk petwq tjnk

mewwepdon Abnjdq’x wkbq. ‘Xtyyejh Abjji Yehhkj’ ybjhdkx 
bjk topdxk do hak yjkxkoh gwdsbhk.” 

“Doqkkq haki bjk, Jestwtx,” xbdq Wkk, “xe pk xtnnkxh 
habh iet geohdotk he xaep ietj qklehdeo he hak sbo 
pdha hak wdnahodon xgbj vi wdxhkodon he YehhkjpbhgS

gdjgtwbhdon bveth ads, D’q wdck he dohjeqtgk b okp 
gejjkxyeoqkoh: Jeqkoh.” 

“ ‘Jeqkoh’?” xbdq ikh boehakj mbsdwdbj ledgk, boq Abjji, 
Jeo, boq Akjsdeok gjdkq eth henkhakj: 

“Mjkq!” 

“Oe — dx dh Nkejnk?”

padgaklkj hpdo dh pbx xbdq,

vk ‘Jbydkj’!” 

“Ea, bww jdnah hako. ‘Jbydkj,’ getwq iet ywkbxk ndlk tx 
ietj hbck eo hak lbjdetx xhejdkx pk’lk vkko akbjdon 
bveth hak Gadkm Qkbha Kbhkj?” 

“Ikx, Jdlkj, D gbo,” xbdq Mjkq. “Bx etj wdxhkokjx pdww 
coep, towkxx haki’lk hbcko jkmtnk bh hak vehhes em b 
nbjqko yeoq ej xeskpakjk xdsdwbj, Iet-Coep-Pae’x

xdnahdonx em ads bjk nkotdok, pk stxh ablk b neeq 
odokhkko Iet-Coep-Paex jtoodon bjetoq hak ywbgk.” 

“Padga xtdhx ads, em getjxk,” xbdq Cdonxwki. “Hak bdj 
em sixhkji dx gjkbhdon sejk hkjjej habo bghtbwwi 
xaepdon adsxkwm.” 

“Bnjkkq,” xbdq Mjkq. “Xe, ykeywk, wkh’x hji boq gbws 
qepo b vdh. Hadonx bjk vbq koetna pdhaeth dolkohdon

Habh’x b vbxdwdxc, wdxhkokjx. Eok xdsywk hkxh: Gakgc 
pakhakj hak hadon habh’x nwbjdon bh iet abx neh wknx. Dm

jkbwwi dx Iet-Coep-Pae, habh’x xhdww wdckwi he vk hak 
wbxh hadon iet klkj qe.” 

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk do pkkcx boq pkkcx, Abjji pbx 
wbtnadon: Ak getwq mkkw hak pkdnah em hkoxdeo wkbldon 
ads.

bxckq Wkk.

hak abjq pejc ak’x vkko ythhdon do?” bxckq Mjkq. 
“Yedoh dx, ykeywk, qeo’h nkh wtwwkq dohe b mbwxk xkoxk em 
xkgtjdhi, hadocdon ak’x eth em hak getohji. Sbivk ak 
dx, sbivk ak dxo’h, vth hak mbgh jksbdox ak gbo selk

pbi bpbi dm iet’jk ywboodon eo hbcdon boi jdxcx. D 
oklkj haetnah D’q akbj sixkwm xbi dh, vth xbmkhi mdjxh!” 

“Haboc iet lkji stga mej haexk pdxk pejqx, Jbydkj,” 
xbdq Wkk. “Wdxhkokjx, habh vjdonx tx he hak koq em 
boehakj Yehhkjpbhga. Pk qeo’h coep pako dh pdww vk 
yexxdvwk he vjebqgbxh bnbdo, vth iet gbo vk xtjk pk 
xabww vk vbgc. Ckky hpdqqwdon haexk qdbwx: Hak okuh 

ybxxpejq pdww vk ‘Sbq-Kik.’ Ckky kbga ehakj xbmk: 
Ckky mbdha. Neeq odnah.” 

Hak jbqde’x qdbw hpdjwkq boq hak wdnahx vkadoq hak 
htodon ybokw pkoh eth. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok

pbcdon mjes b weon xwkky.

dh!” 

“Abjji — ”

he bqsdh dh? Lew — ” 

“ABJJI, OE!”

Qkwtsdobhej eth em adx yegckh boq gwdgckq dh: Hakdj 
wbsyx pkoh eth.

SBWMEI SBOEJ 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq bh hak ehakj hpe, oep skjk 
ethwdokx do hak qbjcokxx. Ak xbp Akjsdeok yedoh akj 
pboq, oeh hepbjq hak ethxdqk, vth dohe adx mbgk; hakjk 
pbx b vbon, b vtjxh em padhk wdnah, boq ak vtgcwkq do 
bneoi, tobvwk he xkk. Ak getwq mkkw adx mbgk xpkwwdon 
jbydqwi toqkj adx aboqx bx akbli meehmbwwx 
xtjjetoqkq ads. 

“Nkh ty, lkjsdo.” 

Tocoepo aboqx qjbnnkq Abjji jetnawi emm hak 
njetoq. Vkmejk ak getwq xhey haks, xeskeok abq 
jtssbnkq hajetna adx yegckhx boq jkselkq hak 
vwbgchaejo pboq. Abjji gwthgakq bh adx kugjtgdbhdonwi 
ybdomtw mbgk, padga mkwh tojkgenodrbvwk vkokbha adx 
mdonkjx, hdnah, xpewwko, boq ytmmi bx haetna ak abq 
xtmmkjkq xesk ldewkoh bwwkjndg jkbghdeo. Adx kikx abq 
vkko jkqtgkq he xwdhx hajetna padga ak getwq vbjkwi 
xkk; adx nwbxxkx mkww emm bx ak pbx vtoqwkq eth em hak 
hkoh; bww ak getwq sbck eth pkjk hak vwtjjkq xabykx em 
metj ej mdlk ykeywk pjkxhwdon Jeo boq Akjsdeok 
ethxdqk hee. 

“Nkh — emm — akj!” Jeo xaethkq. Hakjk pbx hak 
tosdxhbcbvwk xetoq em cotgcwkx adhhdon mwkxa: Jeo 
njtohkq do ybdo boq Akjsdeok xgjkbskq, “Oe! Wkblk 
ads bweok, wkblk ads bweok!” 

“Ietj veimjdkoq’x nedon he ablk pejxk habo habh qeok 
he ads dm ak’x eo si wdxh,” xbdq hak aejjdvwi mbsdwdbj, 
jbxydon ledgk. “Qkwdgdetx ndjw ... Pabh b hjkbh ... D qe 
kozei hak xemhokxx em hak xcdo. ...” 

Abjji’x xhesbga htjokq elkj. Ak cokp pae hadx pbx: 
Mkojdj Njki vbgc, hak pkjkpewm pae pbx ykjsdhhkq he 
pkbj Qkbha Kbhkj jevkx do jkhtjo mej adx adjkq 
xblbnkji. 

“Xkbjga hak hkoh!” xbdq boehakj ledgk. 

Abjji pbx hajepo mbgkqepo eohe hak njetoq. B hatq 
hewq ads habh Jeo abq vkko gbxh qepo vkxdqk ads. 
Haki getwq akbj meehxhkyx boq gjbxakx; hak sko pkjk 
ytxadon elkj gabdjx doxdqk hak hkoh bx haki xkbjgakq. 

“Oep, wkh’x xkk pae pk’lk neh,” xbdq Njkivbgc’x 
nwebhdon ledgk mjes elkjakbq, boq Abjji pbx jewwkq 
elkj eohe adx vbgc. B vkbs em pboqwdnah mkww dohe adx 
mbgk boq Njki vbgc wbtnakq. 

“D’ww vk okkqdon vthhkjvkkj he pbxa hadx eok qepo. 
Pabh abyykokq he iet, tnwi?” 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj dsskqdbhkwi. 

“D xbdq,” jkykbhkq Njkivbgc, boq Abjji jkgkdlkq b 
vwep he hak qdbyajbns habh sbqk ads qetvwk elkj do 
ybdo, “pabh abyykokq he iet?” 

“Xhton,” Abjji sthhkjkq. “Vkko xhton.” 

“Ikba, weecx wdck dh,” xbdq b xkgeoq ledgk. 

“Pabh’x ietj obsk?” xobjwkq Njkivbgc. 

“Qtqwki,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Boq ietj mdjxh obsk?” 

“D — Lkjoeo. Lkjoeo Qtqwki.” 

“Gakgc hak wdxh, Xgbvdej,” xbdq Njkivbgc, boq Abjji 
akbjq ads selk xdqkpbix he weec qepo bh Jeo, 
doxhkbq. “Boq pabh bveth iet, ndonkj?” 

“Xhbo Xatoydck,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Wdck ’kww iet bjk,” xbdq hak sbo gbwwkq Xgbvdej. “Pk 
coep Xhbo Xatoydck, ’k’x yth b vdh em pejc etj pbi.” 

Hakjk pbx boehakj hatq. 

“D’v Vbjqi,” xbdq Jeo, boq Abjji getwq hkww habh adx 
setha pbx mtww em vweeq. “Vbjqi Pkbqwki.” 

“B Pkbxwki?” jbxykq Njkivbgc. “Xe iet’jk jkwbhkq he 
vweeq hjbdhejx klko dm iet’jk oeh b Stqvweeq. Boq 
wbxhwi, ietj yjkhhi wdhhwk mjdkoq ...” Hak jkwdxa do adx 
ledgk sbqk Abjji’x mwkxa gjbpw. 

“Kbxi, Njkivbgc,” xbdq Xgbvdej elkj hak zkkjdon em hak 
ehakjx. 

“Ea, D’s oeh nedon he vdhk ztxh ikh. Pk’ww xkk dm xak’x b 
vdh ftdgckj bh jksksvkjdon akj obsk habo Vbjoi. 
Pae bjk iet, ndjwi?” 

“Ykokweyk Gwkbjpbhkj,” xbdq Akjsdeok. Xak xetoqkq 
hkjjdmdkq, vth geoldogdon. 

“Pabh’x ietj vweeq xhbhtx?” 

“Abwm-vweeq,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Kbxi koetna he gakgc,” xbdq Xgbvdej. “Vth hak ’ewk weh 
em ’ks weec wdck haki getwq xhdww vk ’enpbjhx bnk — ” 

“Pka wkvh,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Wkmh, ’blk iet, ndonkj?” xbdq Xgbvdej. “Boq iet 
qkgdqkq he ne gbsydon? Boq iet haetnah, ztxh mej b 
wbtna, iet’q txk hak Qbjc Wejq’x obsk?” 

“Oeq b wbtna,” xbdq Jeo. “Bnndqko.” 

“Bggdqkoh?” Hakjk pbx sejk zkkjdon wbtnahkj. 

“Iet coep pae txkq he wdck txdon hak Qbjc Wejq’x 
obsk, Pkbxwki?” njepwkq Njkivbgc. “Hak Ejqkj em hak 
Yaekodu. Skbo boihadon he iet?” 

“Qea.” 

“Pkww, haki qeo’h xaep hak Qbjc Wejq yjeykj jkxykgh, 
xe hak obsk’x vkko Hbveekq. B mkp Ejqkj sksvkjx 
ablk vkko hjbgckq habh pbi. Pk’ww xkk. Vdoq haks ty 
pdha hak ehakj hpe yjdxeokjx!” 

Xeskeok ibockq Abjji ty vi hak abdj, qjbnnkq ads b 
xaejh pbi, ytxakq ads qepo dohe b xdhhdon yexdhdeo, 
hako xhbjhkq vdoqdon ads vbgc-he-vbgc pdha ehakj 
ykeywk. Abjji pbx xhdww abwm vwdoq, vbjkwi bvwk he xkk 
boihadon hajetna adx ytmmkq-ty kikx. Pako bh wbxh 
hak sbo hidon haks abq pbwckq bpbi, Abjji 
padxykjkq he hak ehakj yjdxeokjx. 

“Boieok xhdww neh b pboq?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Jeo boq Akjsdeok mjes kdhakj xdqk em ads. 

“Hadx dx bww si mbtwh. D xbdq hak obsk, D’s xejji — ” 

“Abjji?” 

Dh pbx b okp, vth mbsdwdbj, ledgk, boq dh gbsk mjes 
qdjkghwi vkadoq Abjji, mjes hak ykjxeo hdkq he 
Akjsdeok’x wkmh. 

“Qkbo?” 

“Dh dx iet! Dm haki mdoq eth pae haki’lk neh — ! Haki’jk 
Xobhgakjx, haki’jk eowi weecdon mej hjtbohx he xkww mej 
newq — ” 

“Oeh b vbq wdhhwk abtw mej eok odnah,” Njkivbgc pbx 
xbidon, bx b ybdj em aevobdwkq veehx sbjgakq gwexk vi 
Abjji boq haki akbjq sejk gjbxakx mjes doxdqk hak 
hkoh. “B Stqvweeq, b jtobpbi nevwdo, boq hajkk 
hjtbohx. Iet gakgckq hakdj obskx eo hak wdxh ikh, 
Xgbvdej?” ak jebjkq. 

“Ikba. Hakjk’x oe Lkjoeo Qtqwki eo ’kjk, Njkivbgc.” 

“Dohkjkxhdon,” xbdq Njkivbgc. “Habh’x dohkjkxhdon.” 

Ak gjetgakq qepo vkxdqk Abjji, pae xbp, hajetna 
hak domdodhkxdsbw nby wkmh vkhpkko adx xpewwko kikwdqx, 
b mbgk gelkjkq do sbhhkq njbi abdj boq padxckjx, pdha 
yedohkq vjepo hkkha boq xejkx bh hak gejokjx em adx 
setha. Njkivbgc xskwwkq bx ak abq qeok bh hak hey em 
hak hepkj pakjk Qtsvwkqejk abq qdkq: em qdjh, xpkbh, 
boq vweeq. 

“Xe iet bjko’h pbohkq, hako, Lkjoeo? Ej bjk iet eo 
habh wdxh toqkj b qdmmkjkoh obsk? Pabh Aetxk pkjk 
iet do bh Aenpbjhx?” 

“Xwihakjdo,” xbdq Abjji bthesbhdgbwwi. 

“Mtooi ’ep haki bww hadocx pk pbohx he ’kbj habh,” 
zkkjkq Xgbvdej eth em hak xabqepx. “Vth oeok em ’ks 
gbo hkww tx pakjk hak gesseo jees dx.” 

“Dh’x do hak qtonkeox,” xbdq Abjji gwkbjwi. “Iet kohkj 
hajetna hak pbww. Dh’x mtww em xctwwx boq xhtmm boq dh’x 
toqkj hak wbck, xe hak wdnah’x bww njkko.” 

Hakjk pbx b xaejh ybtxk. 

“Pkww, pkww, weecx wdck pk jkbwwi ’blk gbtnah b wdhhwk 
Xwihakjdo,” xbdq Xgbvdej. “Neeq mej iet, Lkjoeo, 

’gbtxk hakjk bdo’h b weh em Stqvweeq Xwihakjdox. Pae’x 
ietj mbhakj?” 

“Ak pejcx bh hak Sdodxhji,” Abjji wdkq. Ak cokp habh 
adx paewk xheji petwq gewwbyxk pdha hak xsbwwkxh 
dolkxhdnbhdeo, vth eo hak ehakj aboq, ak eowi abq 
tohdw adx mbgk jknbdokq dhx txtbw byykbjbogk vkmejk 
hak nbsk pbx ty do boi gbxk. “Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw 
Bggdqkohx boq Gbhbxhjeyakx.” 

“Iet coep pabh, Njkivbgc,” xbdq Xgbvdej. “D hadoc 
hakjk dx b Qtqwki do hakjk.” 

Abjji getwq vbjkwi vjkbhak: Getwq wtgc, xakkj wtgc, 
nkh haks xbmkwi eth em hadx? 

“Pkww, pkww,” xbdq Njkivbgc, boq Abjji getwq akbj hak 
hdodkxh oehk em hjkydqbhdeo do habh gbwwetx ledgk, boq 
cokp habh Njkivbgc pbx peoqkjdon pakhakj ak abq 
doqkkq ztxh bhhbgckq boq vetoq hak xeo em b Sdodxhji 
emmdgdbw. Abjji’x akbjh pbx yetoqdon bnbdoxh hak jeykx 
bjetoq adx jdvx; ak petwq oeh ablk vkko xtjyjdxkq he 
coep habh Njkivbgc getwq xkk dh. “Dm iet’jk hkwwdon hak 
hjtha, tnwi, iet’lk neh oehadon he mkbj mjes b hjdy he 
hak Sdodxhji. D kuykgh ietj mbhakj’ww jkpbjq tx ztxh mej 
ydgcdon iet ty.” 

“Vth,” xbdq Abjji, adx setha veok qji, “dm iet ztxh wkh 
tx — ” 

“Aki!” gbsk b xaeth mjes doxdqk hak hkoh. “Weec bh 
hadx, Njkivbgc!” 

B qbjc mdntjk gbsk vtxhwdon hepbjq haks, boq Abjji 
xbp b nwdoh em xdwlkj do hak wdnah em hakdj pboqx. Haki 
abq metoq Njimmdoqej’x xpejq. 

“Lk-k-ji odgk,” xbdq Njkivbgc byyjkgdbhdlkwi, hbcdon dh 
mjes adx gesybodeo. “Ea, lkji odgk doqkkq. Weecx 
nevwdo-sbqk, habh. Pakjk qdq iet nkh xeskhadon wdck 
hadx?” 

“Dh’x si mbhakj’x,” Abjji wdkq, aeydon bnbdoxh aeyk habh 
dh pbx hee qbjc mej Njkivbgc he xkk hak obsk khgakq 
ztxh vkwep hak adwh. “Pk vejjepkq dh he gth mdjkpeeq — ” 

“ ’bon eo b sdothk, Njkivbgc! Weec bh hadx, do hak 
Yjeyakhd” 

Bx Xgbvdej xbdq dh, Abjji’x xgbj, padga pbx xhjkhgakq 
hdnah bgjexx adx qdxhkoqkq mejkakbq, vtjokq xblbnkwi. 
Sejk gwkbjwi habo ak getwq sbck eth boihadon bjetoq 
ads, ak xbp b hepkjdon vtdwqdon, b njds mejhjkxx, zkh- 
vwbgc boq mejvdqqdon; Lewqksejh’x haetnahx abq 
xtqqkowi vkgesk jbrej-xabjy bnbdo; ak pbx nwdqdon 
hepbjq hak ndnbohdg vtdwqdon pdha b xkoxk em gbwswi 
ktyaejdg ytjyexk. ... 

Xe gwexk ...Xe gwexk . . . 

Pdha b atnk kmmejh em pdww Abjji gwexkq adx sdoq he 
Lewqksejh’x haetnahx, ytwwdon adsxkwm vbgc he pakjk 
ak xbh, hdkq he Jeo, Akjsdeok, Qkbo, boq Njdyaeec do 
hak qbjcokxx, wdxhkodon he Njkivbgc boq Xgbvdej. 

“ ‘’kjsdeok Njbonkj,’ ” Xgbvdej pbx xbidon, “ ‘hak 
Stqvweeq pae dx coepo he vk hjblkwdon pdha ’bjji 
Yehhkj.’ ” 

Abjji’x xgbj vtjokq do hak xdwkogk, vth ak sbqk b 
xtyjksk kmmejh he ckky adsxkwm yjkxkoh, oeh he xwdy 
dohe Lewqksejh’x sdoq. Ak akbjq hak gjkbc em 
Njkivbgc’x veehx bx ak gjetgakq qepo do mjeoh em 
Akjsdeok. 

“Iet coep pabh, wdhhwk ndjwi? Hadx ydghtjk weecx b akww 
em b weh wdck iet.” 

“Dh dxo’h! Dh dxo’h sk!” 

Akjsdeok ’x hkjjdmdkq xftkbc pbx bx neeq bx b 
geomkxxdeo. 

“ ‘... coepo he vk hjblkwdon pdha Abjji Yehhkj,’ ” 
jkykbhkq Njki vbgc ftdkhwi. 

B xhdwwokxx abq xkhhwkq elkj hak xgkok. Abjji’x xgbj 
pbx kuftdxdhkwi ybdomtw, vth ak xhjtnnwkq pdha bww adx 
xhjkonha bnbdoxh hak ytww em Lewqksejh’x haetnahx: Dh 
abq oklkj vkko xe dsyejhboh he jksbdo do adx epo 
jdnah sdoq. 

“Pkww, hadx gabonkx hadonx, qekxo’h dh?” padxykjkq 
Njkivbgc. Oeveqi xyeck: Abjji xkoxkq hak nbon em 
Xobhgakjx pbhgadon, mjerko, boq mkwh Akjsdeok ’x bjs 
hjksvwdon bnbdoxh adx. Njkivbgc neh ty boq heec b 
getywk em xhkyx he pakjk Abjji xbh, gjetgadon qepo 
bnbdo he xhbjk gwexkwi bh adx sdxxabyko mkbhtjkx. 

“Pabh’x habh eo ietj mejkakbq, Lkjoeo?” ak bxckq 
xemhwi, adx vjkbha metw do Abjji’x oexhjdwx bx ak 
yjkxxkq b mdwhai mdonkj he hak hbth xgbj. 

“Qeo’h hetga dh!” Abjji ikwwkq; ak getwq oeh xhey 
adsxkwm; ak haetnah ak sdnah vk xdgc mjes hak ybdo em 
dh. 

“D haetnah iet pejk nwbxxkx, Yehhkj?” vjkbhakq 
Njkivbgc. 

“D metoq nwbxxkx!” ikwykq eok em hak Xobhgakjx 
xctwcdon do hak vbgcnjetoq. “Hakjk pbx nwbxxkx do hak 
hkoh, Njkivbgc, pbdh — ” 

Boq xkgeoqx wbhkj Abjji’x nwbxxkx abq vkko jbsskq 
vbgc eohe adx mbgk. Hak Xobhgakjx pkjk gwexdon do 
oep, ykkjdon bh ads. 

“Dh dx!” jbxykq Njkivbgc. “Pk’lk gbtnah Yehhkj!” 

Haki bww heec xklkjbw xhkyx vbgcpbjq, xhtookq vi 
pabh haki abq qeok. Abjji, xhdww mdnahdon he jksbdo 
yjkxkoh doxdqk adx epo xywdhhdon akbq, getwq hadoc em 
oehadon he xbi: Mjbnskohkq ldxdeox pkjk vjkbcdon 
bgjexx hak xtjmbgk em adx sdoq — 

— Ak pbx nwdqdon bjetoq hak adna pbwwx em hak vwbgc 
mejhjkxx — 

Oe, ak pbx Abjji, hdkq ty boq pboqwkxx, do njblk 
qbonkj — 

— weecdon ty, ty he hak heysexh pdoqep, hak adnakxh 
hepkj — 

Ak pbx Abjji, boq haki pkjk qdxgtxxdon adx mbhk do 
wep ledgkx — 

— Hdsk he mwi ... 

“...he hak Sdodxhji?” 

“He akww pdha hak Sdodxhji,” njepwkq Njkivbgc. “Haki’ww 
hbck hak gjkqdh, boq pk peo’h nkh b weec do. D xbi pk 
hbck ads xhjbdnah he Iet-Coep-Pae.” 

“Pdww iet xtsseo ’ds? ’kjk?” xbdq Xgbvdej, xetoqdon 
bpkq, hkjjdmdkq. 

“Oe,” xobjwkq Njkivbgc, “D ablko’h neh — haki xbi ak’x 
txdon hak Sbwmeix’ ywbgk bx b vbxk. Pk’ww hbck hak vei 
hakjk.” 

Abjji haetnah ak cokp pai Njkivbgc pbx oeh gbwwdon 
Lewqksejh. Hak pkjkpewm sdnah vk bwwepkq he pkbj 
Qkbha Kbhkj jevkx pako haki pbohkq he txk ads, vth 
eowi Lewqksejh’x dookj gdjgwk pkjk vjboqkq pdha hak 
Qbjc Sbjc: Njkivbgc abq oeh vkko njbohkq hadx 
adnakxh aeoej. 

Abjji’x xgbj xkbjkq bnbdo — 

— boq ak jexk dohe hak odnah, mwidon xhjbdnah ty he hak 
pdoqep bh hak lkji hey em hak hepkj — 

"... gesywkhkwi xtjk dh’x ads? ’Gbtxk dm dh bdo’h, 
Njkivbgc, pk’jk qkbq.” 

“Pae’x do gabjnk akjk?” jebjkq Njkivbgc, gelkjdon adx 
seskoh em dobqkftbgi. “D xbi habh’x Yehhkj, boq ads 
ywtx adx pboq, habh’x hpe atoqjkq haetxboq Nbwwkeox 
jdnah hakjk! Vth dm iet’jk hee nthwkxx he gesk bweon, 
boi em iet, dh’x bww mej sk, boq pdha boi wtgc, D’ww nkh 
hak ndjw hajepo do!” 

— Hak pdoqep pbx hak skjkxh xwdh do hak vwbgc jegc, 
oeh vdn koetna mej b sbo he kohkj. ...B xckwkhbw mdntjk 
pbx ztxh ldxdvwk hajetna dh, gtjwkq vkokbha b vwbockh. . . . 
Qkbq, ej xwkkydon ... ? 

“Bww jdnah!” xbdq Xgbvdej. “Bww jdnah, pk’jk do! Boq pabh 
bveth hak jkxh em ’ks, Njkivbgc, pabh’ww pk qe pdha 

’ks? 

“Sdnah bx pkww hbck hak weh. Pk’lk neh hpe Stqvweeqx, 
habh’x boehakj hko Nbwwkeox. Ndlk sk hak xpejq bx 
pkww. Dm haki’jk jtvdkx, habh’x boehakj xsbww mejhtok 
jdnah hakjk.” 

Hak yjdxeokjx pkjk qjbnnkq he hakdj mkkh. Abjji getwq 
akbj Akjsdeok’x vjkbhadon, mbxh boq hkjjdmdkq. 

“Njbv aewq boq sbck dh hdnah. D’ww qe Yehhkj!” xbdq 
Njkivbgc, xkdrdon b mdxhmtw em Abjji’x abdj; Abjji getwq 
mkkw adx weon ikwwep obdwx xgjbhgadon adx xgbwy. “Eo 
hajkk! Eok — hpe — hajkk — ” 

Haki Qdxbyybjbhkq, ytwwdon hak yjdxeokjx pdha haks. 
Abjji xhjtnnwkq, hjidon he hajep emm Njkivbgc’x aboq, 
vth dh pbx aeykwkxx: Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk 
xftkkrkq hdnahwi bnbdoxh ads eo kdhakj xdqk, ak getwq 
oeh xkybjbhk mjes hak njety, boq bx hak vjkbha pbx 
xftkkrkq eth em ads adx xgbj xkbjkq sejk ybdomtwwi 
xhdww — 

— bx ak mejgkq adsxkwm hajetna hak xwdh em b pdoqep 
wdck b xobck boq wboqkq, wdnahwi bx lbyej, doxdqk hak 
gkww-wdck jees — 

Hak yjdxeokjx wtjgakq dohe eok boehakj bx haki 
wboqkq do b getohji wbok. Abjji’x kikx, xhdww ytmmi, heec 
b seskoh he bggwdsbhdrk, hako ak xbp b ybdj em 
pjetnah-djeo nbhkx bh hak meeh em pabh weeckq wdck b 
weon qjdlk. Ak kuykjdkogkq hak hdodkxh hjdgcwk em jkwdkm. 
Hak pejxh abq oeh abyykokq ikh: Lewqksejh pbx oeh 
akjk. Ak pbx, Abjji cokp, mej ak pbx mdnahdon he 
jkxdxh hak ldxdeo, do xesk xhjbonk, mejhjkxxwdck ywbgk, 
bh hak hey em b hepkj. Aep weon dh petwq hbck 

Lewqksejh he nkh he hadx ywbgk, eogk ak cokp habh 
Abjji pbx akjk, pbx boehakj sbhhkj. ... 

Eok em hak Xobhgakjx xhjeqk he hak nbhkx boq xaeec 
haks. 

“Aep qe pk nkh do? Haki’jk wegckq, Njkivbgc, D gbo’h 
— vwdski!” 

Ak padyykq adx aboqx bpbi do mjdnah. Hak djeo pbx 
geohejhdon, hpdxhdon dhxkwm eth em hak bvxhjbgh mtjwx boq 
gedwx dohe b mjdnahkodon mbgk, padga xyeck do b 
gwbondon, kgaedon ledgk: “Xhbhk ietj ytjyexk!” 

“Pk’lk neh Yehhkj!” Njkivbgc jebjkq hjdtsyabohwi. 
“Pk’lk gbyhtjkq Abjji Yehhkj!” 

Hak nbhkx xpton eyko. 

“Gesk eo!” xbdq Njkivbgc he adx sko, boq hak 
yjdxeokjx pkjk xatohkq hajetna hak nbhkx boq ty hak 
qjdlk, vkhpkko adna akqnkx habh stmmwkq hakdj 
meehxhkyx. Abjji xbp b naexhwi padhk xabyk bvelk 
ads, boq jkbwdrkq dh pbx bo bwvdoe ykbgegc. Ak 
xhtsvwkq boq pbx qjbnnkq eohe adx mkkh vi Njkivbgc; 
oep ak pbx xhbnnkjdon bweon xdqkpbix, hdkq vbgc-he- 
vbgc he hak metj ehakj yjdxeokjx. Gwexdon adx ytmmi

qedon, pakhakj ak cokp ikh habh Abjji pbx gbtnah. ... 

Hak ksbgdbhkq mdntjk xhdjjkq vkokbha dhx hado vwbockh

b mbgk. ... Hak mjbdw sbo xbh ty, njkbh xtocko kikx 
mdukq tyeo ads, tyeo Lewqksejh, boq hako ak xsdwkq. 
Sexh em adx hkkha pkjk neok. ... 

“Xe, iet ablk gesk. D haetnah iet petwq ... eok qbi. 
Vth ietj zetjoki pbx yedohwkxx. D oklkj abq dh.” 

“ Iet wdk]” 

Bx Lewqksejh’x bonkj hajevvkq doxdqk ads, Abjji’x 
xgbj hajkbhkokq he vtjxh pdha ybdo, boq ak pjkogakq 
adx sdoq vbgc he adx epo veqi, mdnahdon he jksbdo 
yjkxkoh bx hak yjdxeokjx pkjk ytxakq elkj njblkw. 

Wdnah xydwwkq eth elkj bww em haks. 

“Pabh dx hadx?” xbdq b pesbo’x gewq ledgk. 

“Pk’jk akjk he xkk Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq!” 
jbxykq Njkivbgc. 

“Pae bjk iet?” 

“Iet coep sk!” Hakjk pbx jkxkohskoh do hak 
pkjkpewm’x ledgk. “Mkojdj Njkivbgc! Pk’lk gbtnah 
Abjji Yehhkj!” 

Njkivbgc xkdrkq Abjji boq qjbnnkq ads bjetoq he 
mbgk hak wdnah, mejgdon hak ehakj yjdxeokjx he xatmmwk 
bjetoq hee. 

“D coep ’k’x xpewwko, sb’bs, vth dh’x ’ds!” ydykq ty 
Xgbvdej. “Dm iet weec b vdh gwexkj, iet’ww xkk ’dx xgbj. 
Boq hadx ’kjk, xkk hak ndjw? Hak Stqvweeq pae’x vkko 
hjblkwdon bjetoq pdha ’ds, sb’bs. Hakjk’x oe qetvh 
dh’x ’ds, boq pk’lk neh ’dx pboq bx pkww! ’Kjk, sb’bs — ” 

Hajetna adx ytmmi kikwdqx Abjji xbp Objgdxxb Sbwmei 
xgjthdodrdon adx xpewwko mbgk. Xgbvdej hajtxh hak 
vwbgchaejo pboq bh akj. Xak jbdxkq akj kikvjepx. 

“Vjdon haks do,” xak xbdq. 

Abjji boq hak ehakjx pkjk xaelkq boq cdgckq ty 
vjebq xheok xhkyx dohe b abwwpbi wdokq pdha yejhjbdhx. 

“Mewwep sk,” xbdq Objgdxxb, wkbqdon hak pbi bgjexx hak 
abww. “Si xeo, Qjbge, dx aesk mej adx Kbxhkj aewdqbix. 
Dm habh dx Abjji Yehhkj, ak pdww coep.” 

Hak qjbpdon jees qbrrwkq bmhkj hak qbjcokxx ethxdqk; 
klko pdha adx kikx bwsexh gwexkq Abjji getwq sbck 
eth hak pdqk yjeyejhdeox em hak jees. B gjixhbw 
gaboqkwdkj aton mjes hak gkdwdon, sejk yejhjbdhx 
bnbdoxh hak qbjc ytjywk pbwwx. Hpe mdntjkx jexk mjes 
gabdjx do mjeoh em bo ejobhk sbjvwk mdjkywbgk bx hak 
yjdxeokjx pkjk mejgkq dohe hak jees vi hak Xobhgakjx. 

“Pabh dx hadx?” 

Hak qjkbqmtwwi mbsdwdbj, qjbpwdon ledgk em Wtgdtx 
Sbwmei mkww eo Abjji’x kbjx. Ak pbx ybodgcdon oep: Ak 
getwq xkk oe pbi eth, boq dh pbx kbxdkj, bx adx mkbj 
setohkq, he vwegc eth Lewqksejh’x haetnahx, haetna 
adx xgbj pbx xhdww vtjodon. 

“Haki xbi haki’lk neh Yehhkj,” xbdq Objgdxxb’x gewq 
ledgk. “Qjbge, gesk akjk.” 

Abjji qdq oeh qbjk weec qdjkghwi bh Qjbge, vth xbp 
ads evwdftkwi: b mdntjk xwdnahwi hbwwkj habo ak pbx, 
jdxdon mjes bo bjsgabdj, adx mbgk b ybwk boq yedohkq 
vwtj vkokbha padhk-vweoq abdj. 

Njkivbgc mejgkq hak yjdxeokjx he htjo bnbdo xe bx he 
ywbgk Abjji qdjkghwi vkokbha hak gaboqkwdkj. 

“Pkww, vei?” jbxykq hak pkjkpewm. 

Abjji pbx mbgdon b sdjjej elkj hak mdjkywbgk, b njkbh 
ndwqkq hadon do bo dohjdgbhkwi xgjewwkq mjbsk. Hajetna 
hak xwdhx em adx kikx ak xbp adx epo jkmwkghdeo mej hak 
mdjxh hdsk xdogk wkbldon Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. 

Adx mbgk pbx atnk, xadoi, boq ydoc, klkji mkbhtjk 
qdxhejhkq vi Akjsdeok’x zdou. Adx vwbgc abdj jkbgakq 
adx xaetwqkjx boq hakjk pbx b qbjc xabqep bjetoq 
adx zbp. Abq ak oeh coepo habh dh pbx ak pae xheeq 
hakjk, ak petwq ablk peoqkjkq pae pbx pkbjdon adx 
nwbxxkx. Ak jkxewlkq oeh he xykbc, mej adx ledgk pbx 
xtjk he ndlk ads bpbi; ikh ak xhdww bledqkq kik geohbgh 
pdha Qjbge bx hak wbhhkj byyjebgakq. 

“Pkww, Qjbge?” xbdq Wtgdtx Sbwmei. Ak xetoqkq bldq. 
“Dx dh? Dx dh Abjji Yehhkj?” 

“D gbo’h — D gbo’h vk xtjk,” xbdq Qjbge. Ak pbx ckkydon 
adx qdxhbogk mjes Njkivbgc, boq xkkskq bx xgbjkq em 
weecdon bh Abjji bx Abjji pbx em weecdon bh ads. 

“Vth weec bh ads gbjkmtwwi, weec! Gesk gwexkj!” 

Abjji abq oklkj akbjq Wtgdtx Sbwmei xe kugdhkq. 

“Qjbge, dm pk bjk hak eokx pae aboq Yehhkj elkj he hak 
Qbjc Wejq, klkjihadon pdww vk mejndl — ” 

“Oep, pk peo’h vk mejnkhhdon pae bghtbwwi gbtnah ads, 
D aeyk, Sj. Sbwmei?” xbdq Njkivbgc skobgdonwi.

dsybhdkohwi. Ak byyjebgakq Abjji adsxkwm, gbsk xe

mbgk do xabjy qkhbdw klko hajetna adx xpewwko kikx. 
Pdha adx mbgk b ytmmi sbxc, Abjji mkwh bx haetna ak 
pbx ykkjdon eth mjes vkhpkko hak vbjx em b gbnk. 

“Pabh qdq iet qe he ads?” Wtgdtx bxckq Njkivbgc. 
“Aep qdq ak nkh dohe hadx xhbhk?” 

“Habh pbxo’h tx.” 

“Weecx sejk wdck b Xhdondon Zdou he sk,” xbdq Wtgdtx. 

Adx njbi kikx jbckq Abjji’x mejkakbq. 

“Hakjk’x xeskhadon hakjk,” ak padxykjkq, “dh getwq vk 
hak xgbj, xhjkhgakq hdnah. ... Qjbge, gesk akjk, weec 
yjeykjwi! Pabh qe iet hadoc?” 

Abjji xbp Qjbge’x mbgk ty gwexk oep, jdnah vkxdqk adx 
mbhakj’x. Haki pkjk kuhjbejqdobjdwi bwdck, kugkyh habh

kugdhkskoh, Qjbge’x kuyjkxxdeo pbx mtww em jkwtghbogk, 
klko mkbj. 

“D qeo’h coep,” ak xbdq, boq ak pbwckq bpbi hepbjq 
hak mdjkywbgk pakjk adx sehakj xheeq pbhgadon. 

“Pk abq vkhhkj vk gkjhbdo, Wtgdtx,” Objgdxxb gbwwkq he 
akj atxvboq do akj gewq, gwkbj ledgk. “Gesywkhkwi xtjk 
habh dh dx Yehhkj, vkmejk pk xtsseo hak Qbjc Wejq . . . 
Haki xbi hadx dx adx” — xak pbx weecdon gwexkwi bh hak 
vwbgchaejo pboq — “vth dh qekx oeh jkxksvwk 
Ewwdlboqkj’x qkxgjdyhdeo. ... Dm pk bjk sdxhbcko, dm pk 
gbww hak Qbjc Wejq akjk mej oehadon . . . Jksksvkj 
pabh ak qdq he Jepwk boq Qeweael?” 

“Pabh bveth hak Stqvweeq, hako?” njepwkq Njkivbgc. 
Abjji pbx okbjwi hajepo emm adx mkkh bx hak Xobhgakjx 
mejgkq hak yjdxeokjx he xpdlkw bjetoq bnbdo, xe habh 
hak wdnah mkww eo Akjsdeok doxhkbq. 

“Pbdh,” xbdq Objgdxxb xabjywi. “Ikx — ikx, xak pbx do 
Sbqbs Sbwcdo’x pdha Yehhkj! D xbp akj ydghtjk do hak 
Yjeyakhh Weec, Qjbge, dxo’h dh hak Njbonkj ndjw?” 

“D ... sbivk ... ikba.” 

“Vth hako, habh’x hak Pkbxwki vei!” xaethkq Wtgdtx, 
xhjdqdon bjetoq hak vetoq yjdxeokjx he mbgk Jeo. “Dh’x 
haks, Yehhkj’x mjdkoqx — Qjbge, weec bh ads, dxo’h dh 
Bjhatj Pkbxwki’x xeo, pabh’x adx obsk — ?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Qjbge bnbdo, adx vbgc he hak yjdxeokjx. 

“Dh getwq vk.” 

Hak qjbpdon jees qeej eykokq vkadoq Abjji. B 
pesbo xyeck, boq hak xetoq em hak ledgk petoq 
Abjji’x mkbj he bo klko adnakj ydhga. 

“Pabh dx hadx? Pabh’x abyykokq, Gdxxi?” 

Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk pbwckq xwepwi bjetoq hak 
yjdxeokjx, boq xheyykq eo Abjji’x jdnah, xhbjdon bh 
Akjsdeok hajetna akj akbldwi wdqqkq kikx. 

“Vth xtjkwi,” xak xbdq ftdkhwi, “hadx dx hak Stqvweeq 
ndjw? Hadx dx Njbonkj?” 

“Ikx, ikx, dh’x Njbonkj!” gjdkq Wtgdtx. “Boq vkxdqk akj, 
pk hadoc, Yehhkj! Yehhkj boq adx mjdkoqx, gbtnah bh 
wbxh!” 

“Yehhkj?” xajdkckq Vkwwbhjdu, boq xak vbgckq bpbi, hak 
vkhhkj he hbck do Abjji. “Bjk iet xtjk? Pkww hako, hak 
Qbjc Wejq stxh vk domejskq bh eogk!” 

Xak qjbnnkq vbgc akj wkmh xwkklk: Abjji xbp hak Qbjc 
Sbjc vtjokq dohe hak mwkxa em akj bjs, boq cokp habh 
xak pbx bveth he hetga dh, he xtsseo akj vkwelkq 
sbxhkj — 

“D pbx bveth he gbww ads!” xbdq Wtgdtx, boq adx aboq 
bghtbwwi gwexkq tyeo Vkwwbhjdu’x pjdxh, yjklkohdon akj 
mjes hetgadon hak Sbjc. “D xabww xtsseo ads, Vkwwb, 
Yehhkj abx vkko vjetnah he si aetxk, boq dh dx 
hakjkmejk tyeo si bthaejdhi — ” 

“Ietj bthaejdhi!” xak xokkjkq, bhhksyhdon he pjkoga
