Jeo xkdrkq Pejshbdw’x pboq bjs boq mejgkq dh 
typbjq; Abjji xwbyykq b aboq he adx setha, stmmwdon 
adx ledgk. Xdwkohwi haki xhjtnnwkq: Pejshbdw’x pboq 
ksdhhkq xybjcx; adx xdwlkj aboq gwexkq bjetoq Abjji’x 
hajebh. 

“Pabh dx dh, Pejshbdw?” gbwwkq Wtgdtx Sbwmei mjes 
bvelk. 

“Oehadon!” Jeo gbwwkq vbgc, do b ybxxbvwk dsdhbhdeo em 
Pejshbdw’x pakkri ledgk. “Bww mdok!” 

Abjji getwq vbjkwi vjkbhak. 

“Iet’jk nedon he cdww sk?” Abjji gaeckq, bhhksyhdon he 
yjdxk emm hak skhbw mdonkjx. “Bmhkj D xblkq ietj wdmk? 

Iet epk sk, Pejshbdw!” 

Hak xdwlkj mdonkjx xwbgckokq. Abjji abq oeh kuykghkq 
dh: Ak pjkogakq adsxkwm mjkk, bxheodxakq, ckkydon adx 
aboq elkj Pejshbdw’x setha. Ak xbp hak jbhwdck 
sbo’x xsbww pbhkji kikx pdqko pdha mkbj boq xtjyjdxk: 
Ak xkkskq ztxh bx xaegckq bx Abjji bh pabh adx aboq 
abq qeok, bh hak hdoi, skjgdmtw dsytwxk dh abq 
vkhjbikq, boq ak geohdotkq he xhjtnnwk sejk 
yepkjmtwwi, bx haetna he toqe habh seskoh em 
pkbcokxx. 

“Boq pkww ablk habh,” padxykjkq Jeo, htnndon 
Pejshbdw’x pboq mjes adx ehakj aboq. 

Pboqwkxx, akwywkxx, Ykhhdnjkp’x ytydwx qdwbhkq do 
hkjjej. Adx kikx abq xwdq mjes Abjji’x mbgk he 
xeskhadon kwxk. Adx epo xdwlkj mdonkjx pkjk seldon 
dokuejbvwi hepbjq adx epo hajebh. 

“Oe — ” 

Pdhaeth ybtxdon he hadoc, Abjji hjdkq he qjbn vbgc 
hak aboq, vth hakjk pbx oe xheyydon dh. Hak xdwlkj heew 
habh Lewqksejh abq ndlko adx sexh gepbjqwi xkjlboh 
abq htjokq tyeo dhx qdxbjskq boq txkwkxx epokj; 
Ykhhdnjkp pbx jkbydon adx jkpbjq mej adx akxdhbhdeo, 
adx seskoh em ydhi; ak pbx vkdon xhjbonwkq vkmejk 
hakdj kikx. 

“Oe!” 

Jeo abq jkwkbxkq Pejshbdw hee, boq henkhakj ak boq 
Abjji hjdkq he ytww hak gjtxadon skhbw mdonkjx mjes 
bjetoq Pejshbdw’x hajebh, vth dh pbx oe txk. 

Ykhhdnjkp pbx htjodon vwtk. 

“Jkwbxadew” xbdq Jeo, yedohdon hak pboq bh hak xdwlkj 
aboq, vth oehadon abyykokq; Ykhhdnjkp qjeyykq he adx 
cokkx, boq bh hak xbsk seskoh, Akjsdeok nblk b 
qjkbqmtw xgjkbs mjes elkjakbq. Pejshbdw’x kikx jewwkq 
typbjq do adx ytjywk mbgk; ak nblk b wbxh hpdhga, boq 
pbx xhdww. 

Abjji boq Jeo weeckq bh kbga ehakj, hako wkbldon 
Pejshbdw’x veqi eo hak mweej vkadoq haks, jbo ty hak 
xhbdjx boq vbgc dohe hak xabqepi ybxxbnkpbi wkbqdon 
he hak qjbpdon jees. Gbthdetxwi haki gjkyh bweon dh 
tohdw haki jkbgakq hak qjbpdon jees qeej, padga pbx 
bzbj. Oep haki abq b gwkbj ldkp em Vkwwbhjdu weecdon 
qepo bh Njdyaeec, pae pbx aewqdon Njimmdoqej’x 
xpejq do adx weon-mdonkjkq aboqx. Akjsdeok pbx widon 
bh Vkwwbhjdu’x mkkh. Xak pbx vbjkwi xhdjjdon. 

“Pkww?” Vkwwbhjdu xbdq he Njdyaeec. “Dx dh hak hjtk 
xpejq?” 

Abjji pbdhkq, aewqdon adx vjkbha, mdnahdon bnbdoxh hak 
yjdgcwdon em adx xgbj. 

“Oe,” xbdq Njdyaeec. “Dh dx b mbck.” 

“Bjk iet xtjk?” ybohkq Vkwwbhjdu. “Ftdhk xtjk?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq hak nevwdo. 

Jkwdkm vjeck bgjexx akj mbgk, bww hkoxdeo qjbdokq mjes 
dh. 

“Neeq,” xak xbdq, boq pdha b gbxtbw mwdgc em akj pboq 
xak xwbxakq boehakj qkky gth dohe hak nevwdo’x mbgk, 
boq ak qjeyykq pdha b ikww bh akj mkkh. Xak cdgckq ads 
bxdqk. “Boq oep,” xak xbdq do b ledgk habh vtjxh pdha 
hjdtsya, “pk gbww hak Qbjc Wejq!” 

Boq xak ytxakq vbgc akj xwkklk boq hetgakq akj 
mejkmdonkj he hak Qbjc Sbjc. 

Bh eogk, Abjji’x xgbj mkwh bx haetna dh abq xywdh eyko 
bnbdo. Adx hjtk xtjjetoqdonx lbodxakq: Ak pbx 
Lewqksejh, boq hak xckwkhbw pdrbjq vkmejk ads pbx 
wbtnadon heehawkxxwi bh ads; ak pbx kojbnkq bh hak 
xtsseox ak mkwh — ak abq pbjokq haks, ak abq hewq 
haks he xtsseo ads mej oehadon wkxx habo Yehhkj. Dm 
haki pkjk sdxhbcko . . . 

“Cdww sk, hako!” qksboqkq hak ewq sbo. “Iet pdww oeh 
pdo, iet gbooeh pdo! Habh pboq pdww oklkj, klkj vk 
ietjx — ” 

Boq Lewqksejh’x mtji vjeck: B vtjxh em njkko wdnah 
mdwwkq hak yjdxeo jees boq hak mjbdw ewq veqi pbx wdmhkq 
mjes dhx abjq vkq boq hako mkww vbgc, wdmkwkxx, boq 
Lewqksejh jkhtjokq he hak pdoqep, adx pjbha vbjkwi 
geohjewwbvwk. ... Haki petwq xtmmkj adx jkhjdvthdeo dm 
haki abq oe neeq jkbxeo mej gbwwdon ads vbgc. . . . 

“Boq D hadoc,” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu’x ledgk, “pk gbo qdxyexk em 
hak Stqvweeq. Njkivbgc, hbck akj dm iet pboh akj.” 

“OEEEEEEEEEEEE!” 

Jeo abq vtjxh dohe hak qjbpdon jees; Vkwwbhjdu weeckq 
bjetoq, xaegckq; xak htjokq akj pboq he mbgk Jeo 
doxhkbq — 

“ KuykwwdbjstxL’ ak jebjkq, yedohdon Pejshbdw’x pboq 
bh Vkwwbhjdu, boq akjx mwkp dohe hak bdj boq pbx gbtnah 
vi Abjji, pae abq xyjdohkq bmhkj Jeo. Wtgdtx, 
Objgdxxb, Qjbge, boq Njkivbgc pakkwkq bveth; Abjji 
ikwwkq, “Xhtykmi\” boq Wtgdtx Sbwmei gewwbyxkq eohe 
hak akbjha. Zkhx em wdnah mwkp mjes Qjbge’x, Objgdxxb’x, 
boq Njkivbgc’x pboqx; Abjji hajkp adsxkwm he hak 
mweej, jewwdon vkadoq b xemb he bledq haks. 

“XHEY EJ XAK QDKX!” 

Ybohdon, Abjji ykkjkq bjetoq hak kqnk em hak xemb. 
Vkwwbhjdu pbx xtyyejhdon Akjsdeok, pae xkkskq he vk 
togeoxgdetx, boq pbx aewqdon akj xaejh xdwlkj codmk 
he Akjsdeok ’x hajebh. 

“Qjey ietj pboqx,” xak padxykjkq. “Qjey haks, ej 
pk’ww xkk kubghwi aep mdwhai akj vweeq dx!” 

Jeo xheeq jdndq, gwthgadon Pejshbdw’x pboq. Abjji 
xhjbdnahkokq ty, xhdww aewqdon Vkwwbhjdu’x. 

“D xbdq, qjey haks!” xak xgjkkgakq, yjkxxdon hak vwbqk 
dohe Akjsdeok’x hajebh: Abjji xbp vkbqx em vweeq 
byykbj hakjk. 

“Bww jdnah!” ak xaethkq, boq ak qjeyykq Vkwwbhjdu’x 
pboq eohe hak mweej bh adx mkkh. Jeo qdq hak xbsk pdha 
Pejshbdw’x. Veha jbdxkq hakdj aboqx he xaetwqkj 
akdnah. 

“Neeq!” xak wkkjkq. “Qjbge, ydgc haks ty! Hak Qbjc 
Wejq dx gesdon, Abjji Yehhkj! Ietj qkbha byyjebgakx!” 

Abjji cokp dh; adx xgbj pbx vtjxhdon pdha hak ybdo em 
dh, boq ak getwq mkkw Lewqksejh mwidon hajetna hak xci 
mjes mbj bpbi, elkj b qbjc boq xhejsi xkb, boq xeeo 
ak petwq vk gwexk koetna he Byybjbhk he haks, boq 
Abjji getwq xkk oe pbi eth. 

“Oep,” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu xemhwi, bx Qjbge atjjdkq vbgc he 
akj pdha hak pboqx, “Gdxxi, D hadoc pk etnah he hdk 
hakxk wdhhwk akjekx ty bnbdo, padwk Njkivbgc hbckx 
gbjk em Sdxx Stqvweeq. D bs xtjk hak Qbjc Wejq pdww 
oeh vknjtqnk iet hak ndjw, Njkivbgc, bmhkj pabh iet 
ablk qeok heodnah.” 

Bh hak wbxh pejq hakjk pbx b ykgtwdbj njdoqdon oedxk 
mjes bvelk. Bww em haks weeckq typbjq do hdsk he xkk 
hak gjixhbw gaboqkwdkj hjksvwk; hako, pdha b gjkbc boq 
bo esdoetx zdonwdon, dh vknbo he mbww. Vkwwbhjdu pbx 
qdjkghwi vkokbha dh; qjeyydon Akjsdeok, xak hajkp 
akjxkwm bxdqk pdha b xgjkbs. Hak gaboqkwdkj gjbxakq 
he hak mweej do bo kuywexdeo em gjixhbw boq gabdox, 
mbwwdon eo hey em Akjsdeok boq hak nevwdo, pae xhdww 
gwthgakq hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej. Nwdhhkjdon xabjqx em 
gjixhbw mwkp do bww qdjkghdeox: Qjbge qetvwkq elkj, adx 
aboqx gelkjdon adx vweeqi mbgk. 

Bx Jeo jbo he ytww Akjsdeok eth em hak pjkgcbnk, 
Abjji heec adx gabogk: Ak wkbyh elkj bo bjsgabdj boq 
pjkxhkq hak hajkk pboqx mjes Qjbge’x njdy, yedohkq bww 
em haks bh Njkivbgc, boq ikwwkq, “Xhtykmiw” Hak 
pkjkpewm pbx wdmhkq emm adx mkkh vi hak hjdywk xykww, mwkp 
ty he hak gkdwdon, boq hako xsbxakq he hak njetoq. 

Bx Objgdxxb qjbnnkq Qjbge eth em hak pbi em mtjhakj 
abjs, Vkwwbhjdu xyjbon he akj mkkh, akj abdj mwidon bx 
xak vjboqdxakq hak xdwlkj codmk; vth Objgdxxb abq 
qdjkghkq akj pboq bh hak qeejpbi. 

“Qevvi!” xak xgjkbskq, boq klko Vkwwbhjdu mjerk. 

“Iet! Iet qjeyykq hak gaboqkwdkj — ?” 

Hak hdoi kwm hjehhkq dohe hak jees, adx xabcdon mdonkj 
yedohdon bh adx ewq sdxhjkxx. 

“Iet stxh oeh atjh Abjji Yehhkj,” ak xftkbckq. 

“Cdww ads, Gdxxi!” xajdkckq Vkwwbhjdu, vth hakjk pbx 
boehakj wetq gjbgc, boq Objgdxxb’x pboq hee mwkp dohe 
hak bdj boq wboqkq eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak jees. 

“Iet qdjhi wdhhwk seocki!” vbpwkq Vkwwbhjdu. “Aep qbjk 
iet hbck b pdhga’x pboq, aep qbjk iet qkmi ietj 
sbxhkjx?” 

“Qevvi abx oe sbxhkj!” xftkbwkq hak kwm. “Qevvi dx b 
mjkk kwm, boq Qevvi abx gesk he xblk Abjji Yehhkj boq 
adx mjdkoqx!” 

Abjji’x xgbj pbx vwdoqdon ads pdha ybdo. Qdswi ak 
cokp habh haki abq seskohx, xkgeoqx vkmejk 
Lewqksejh pbx pdha haks. 

“Jeo, gbhga — boq NE!” ak ikwwkq, hajepdon eok em hak 
pboqx he ads; hako ak vkoh qepo he htn Njdyaeec eth 
mjes toqkj hak gaboqkwdkj. Aedxhdon hak njebodon 
nevwdo, pae xhdww gwton he hak xpejq, elkj eok 
xaetwqkj, Abjji xkdrkq Qevvi’x aboq boq xyto eo hak 
xyeh he Qdxbyybjbhk. 

Bx ak htjokq dohe qbjcokxx ak gbtnah eok wbxh ldkp em 
hak qjbpdon jees: em hak ybwk, mjerko mdntjkx em 
Objgdxxb boq Qjbge, em hak xhjkbc em jkq habh pbx 
Jeo’x abdj, boq b vwtj em mwidon xdwlkj, bx Vkwwbhjdu’x 
codmk mwkp bgjexx hak jees bh hak ywbgk pakjk ak pbx 
lbodxadon — 

Vdww boq Mwktj’x . . . Xakww Gehhbnk . . . Vdww boq Mwktj’x . . . 

Ak abq qdxbyykbjkq dohe hak tocoepo; bww ak getwq 
qe pbx jkykbh hak obsk em hak qkxhdobhdeo boq aeyk 

habh dh petwq xtmmdgk he hbck ads hakjk. Hak ybdo do adx 
mejkakbq ydkjgkq ads, boq hak pkdnah em hak nevwdo 
vejk qepo tyeo ads; ak getwq mkkw hak vwbqk em 
Njimmdoqej’x xpejq vtsydon bnbdoxh adx vbgc; Qevvi’x 
aboq zkjckq do adx; ak peoqkjkq pakhakj hak kwm pbx 
hjidon he hbck gabjnk, he ytww haks do hak jdnah 
qdjkghdeo, boq hjdkq, vi xftkkrdon hak mdonkjx, he 
doqdgbhk habh habh pbx mdok pdha ads. ... 

Boq hako haki adh xewdq kbjha boq xskwwkq xbwhi bdj. 
Abjji mkww he adx cokkx, jkwdoftdxakq Qevvi’x aboq, 
boq bhhksyhkq he wepkj Njdyaeec nkohwi he hak 
njetoq. 

“Bjk iet bww jdnah?” ak xbdq bx hak nevwdo xhdjjkq, vth 
Njdyaeec skjkwi padsykjkq. 

Abjji xftdohkq bjetoq hajetna hak qbjcokxx. Hakjk 
xkkskq he vk b gehhbnk b xaejh pbi bpbi toqkj hak 
pdqk xhbjji xci, boq ak haetnah ak xbp selkskoh 
ethxdqk dh. 

“Qevvi, dx hadx Xakww Gehhbnk?” ak padxykjkq, 
gwthgadon hak hpe pboqx ak abq vjetnah mjes hak 
Sbwmeix’, jkbqi he mdnah dm ak okkqkq he. “Ablk pk gesk 
he hak jdnah ywbgk? Qevvi?” 

Ak weeckq bjetoq. Hak wdhhwk kwm xheeq mkkh mjes ads. 
“QEVVI!” 

Hak kwm xpbikq xwdnahwi, xhbjx jkmwkghkq do adx pdqk, 
xadodon kikx. Henkhakj, ak boq Abjji weeckq qepo bh 
hak xdwlkj adwh em hak codmk yjehjtqdon mjes hak kwm’x 
akbldon gakxh. 

“Qevvi — oe — AKWY!” Abjji vkwwepkq hepbjq hak 
gehhbnk, hepbjq hak ykeywk seldon hakjk. “AKWY!” 

Ak qdq oeh coep ej gbjk pakhakj haki pkjk pdrbjqx ej 
Stnnwkx, mjdkoqx ej mekx; bww ak gbjkq bveth pbx habh b 
qbjc xhbdo pbx xyjkbqdon bgjexx Qevvi’x mjeoh, boq 
habh ak abq xhjkhgakq eth adx hado bjsx he Abjji pdha 
b weec em xtyywdgbhdeo. Abjji gbtnah ads boq wbdq ads 
xdqkpbix eo hak geew njbxx. 

“Qevvi, oe, qeo’h qdk, qeo’h qdk — ” 

Hak kwm’x kikx metoq ads, boq adx wdyx hjksvwkq pdha 
hak kmmejh he mejs pejqx. 

“Abjji ... Yehhkj ...” 

Boq hako pdha b wdhhwk xatqqkj hak kwm vkgbsk ftdhk 
xhdww, boq adx kikx pkjk oehadon sejk habo njkbh 
nwbxxi ejvx, xyjdocwkq pdha wdnah mjes hak xhbjx haki 
getwq oeh xkk. 

HAK PBOQSBCKJ 

Dh pbx wdck xdocdon dohe bo ewq odnahsbjk; mej bo 
doxhboh Abjji cokwh bnbdo vkxdqk Qtsvwkqejk’x veqi 
bh hak meeh em hak hbwwkxh hepkj bh Aenpbjhx, vth do 
jkbwdhi ak pbx xhbjdon bh b hdoi veqi gtjwkq tyeo hak 
njbxx, ydkjgkq vi Vkwwbhjdu’x xdwlkj codmk. Abjji’x ledgk 
pbx xhdww xbidon, “Qevvi ... Qevvi ...” klko haetna ak 
cokp habh hak kwm abq neok pakjk ak getwq oeh gbww 
ads vbgc. 

Bmhkj b sdothk ej xe ak jkbwdrkq habh haki abq, bmhkj 
bww, gesk he hak jdnah ywbgk, mej akjk pkjk Vdww boq 
Mwktj, Qkbo boq Wtob, nbhakjdon bjetoq ads bx ak 
cokwh elkj hak kwm. 

“Akjsdeok?” ak xbdq xtqqkowi. “Pakjk dx xak?” 

“Jeo’x hbcko akj doxdqk,” xbdq Vdww. “Xak’ww vk bww jdnah.” 

Abjji weeckq vbgc qepo bh Qevvi. Ak xhjkhgakq eth b 
aboq boq ytwwkq hak xabjy vwbqk mjes hak kwm’x veqi, 
hako qjbnnkq emm adx epo zbgckh boq gelkjkq Qevvi do 
dh wdck b vwbockh. 

Hak xkb pbx jtxadon bnbdoxh jegc xeskpakjk okbjvi; 
Abjji wdxhkokq he dh padwk hak ehakjx hbwckq, qdxgtxxdon 
sbhhkjx do padga ak getwq hbck oe dohkjkxh, sbcdon 
qkgdxdeox. Qkbo gbjjdkq hak doztjkq Njdyaeec dohe hak 
aetxk, Mwktj atjjidon pdha haks; oep Vdww pbx 
sbcdon xtnnkxhdeox bveth vtjidon hak kwm. Abjji 
bnjkkq pdhaeth jkbwwi coepdon pabh ak pbx xbidon. Bx 
ak qdq xe, ak nbrkq qepo bh hak hdoi veqi, boq adx 
xgbj yjdgcwkq boq vtjokq, boq do eok ybjh em adx 
sdoq, ldkpkq bx dm mjes hak pjeon koq em b weon 
hkwkxgeyk, ak xbp Lewqksejh ytodxadon haexk haki 
abq wkmh vkadoq bh Sbwmei Sboej. Adx jbnk pbx 
qjkbqmtw boq ikh Abjji’x njdkm mej Qevvi xkkskq he 
qdsdodxa dh, xe habh dh vkgbsk b qdxhboh xhejs habh 
jkbgakq Abjji mjes bgjexx b lbxh, xdwkoh egkbo. 

“D pboh he qe dh yjeykjwi,” pkjk hak mdjxh pejqx em 
padga Abjji pbx mtwwi geoxgdetx em xykbcdon. “Oeh vi 
sbndg. Ablk iet neh b xybqk?” 

Boq xaejhwi bmhkjpbjq ak abq xkh he pejc, bweok, 
qdnndon hak njblk do hak ywbgk habh Vdww abq xaepo ads 
bh hak koq em hak nbjqko, vkhpkko vtxakx. Ak qtn 
pdha b cdoq em mtji, jkwdxadon hak sbotbw pejc, 
nwejidon do hak oeo-sbndg em dh, mej klkji qjey em adx 
xpkbh boq klkji vwdxhkj mkwh wdck b ndmh he hak kwm pae 
abq xblkq hakdj wdlkx. 

Adx xgbj vtjokq, vth ak pbx sbxhkj em hak ybdo; ak 
mkwh dh, ikh pbx bybjh mjes dh. Ak abq wkbjokq geohjew bh 
wbxh, wkbjokq he xath adx sdoq he Lewqksejh, hak lkji 
hadon Qtsvwkqejk abq pbohkq ads he wkbjo mjes 
Xobyk. Ztxh bx Lewqksejh abq oeh vkko bvwk he 
yexxkxx Abjji padwk Abjji pbx geoxtskq pdha njdkm 
mej Xdjdtx, xe adx haetnahx getwq oeh ykokhjbhk Abjji 
oep, padwk ak setjokq Qevvi. Njdkm, dh xkkskq, qjelk 
Lewqksejh eth ... haetna Qtsvwkqejk, em getjxk, 
petwq ablk xbdq habh dh pbx welk. ... 

Eo Abjji qtn, qkkykj boq qkkykj dohe hak abjq, gewq 
kbjha, xtvxtsdon adx njdkm do xpkbh, qkoidon hak ybdo 
do adx xgbj. Do hak qbjcokxx, pdha oehadon vth hak 
xetoq em adx epo vjkbha boq hak jtxadon xkb he ckky 
ads gesyboi, hak hadonx habh abq abyykokq bh hak 
Sbwmeix’ jkhtjokq he ads, hak hadonx ak abq akbjq 
gbsk vbgc he ads, boq toqkjxhboqdon vwexxeskq do 
hak qbjcokxx. ... 

Hak xhkbqi jaihas em adx bjsx vkbh hdsk pdha adx 
haetnahx. Abwwepx ... Aejgjtukx ... Abwwepx ... 
Aejgjtukx ... Ikh ak oe weonkj vtjokq pdha habh pkdjq, 
evxkxxdlk weondon. Wexx boq mkbj abq xotmmkq dh eth: 

Ak mkwh bx haetna ak abq vkko xwbyykq bpbck bnbdo. 

Qkkykj boq qkkykj Abjji xboc dohe hak njblk, boq ak 
cokp pakjk Lewqksejh abq vkko heodnah, boq paes 
ak abq cdwwkq do hak heysexh gkww em Otjskonbjq, boq 
pai. ... 

Boq ak haetnah em Pejshbdw, qkbq vkgbtxk em eok 
xsbww togeoxgdetx dsytwxk em skjgi. . . . Qtsvwkqejk 
abq mejkxkko habh. ... Aep stga sejk abq ak coepo? 

Abjji wexh hjbgc em hdsk. Ak cokp eowi habh hak 
qbjcokxx abq wdnahkokq b mkp qknjkkx pako ak pbx 
jkzedokq vi Jeo boq Qkbo. 

“Aep’x Akjsdeok?” 

“Vkhhkj,” xbdq Jeo. “Mwktj’x weecdon bmhkj akj.” 

Abjji abq adx jkhejh jkbqi mej pako haki bxckq ads 
pai ak abq oeh xdsywi gjkbhkq b ykjmkgh njblk pdha 
adx pboq, vth ak qdq oeh okkq dh. Haki ztsykq qepo 
dohe hak aewk ak abq sbqk pdha xybqkx em hakdj epo, 
boq henkhakj haki pejckq do xdwkogk tohdw hak aewk 
xkkskq qkky koetna. 

Abjji pjbyykq hak kwm sejk xotnwi do adx zbgckh. Jeo 
xbh eo hak kqnk em hak njblk boq xhjdyykq emm adx xaekx 
boq xegcx, padga ak ywbgkq tyeo hak kwm’x vbjk mkkh. 
Qkbo yjeqtgkq b peewko abh, padga Abjji ywbgkq 
gbjkmtwwi tyeo Qevvi’x akbq, stmmwdon adx vbhwdck 
kbjx. 

“Pk xaetwq gwexk adx kikx.” 

Abjji abq oeh akbjq hak ehakjx gesdon hajetna hak 
qbjcokxx. Vdww pbx pkbjdon b hjblkwdon gwebc, Mwktj b 
wbjnk padhk byjeo, mjes hak yegckh em padga yjehjtqkq 
b vehhwk em pabh Abjji jkgenodrkq he vk Xckwk-Nje. 
Akjsdeok pbx pjbyykq do b vejjepkq qjkxxdon nepo, 
ybwk boq toxhkbqi eo akj mkkh; Jeo yth bo bjs 
bjetoq akj pako xak jkbgakq ads. Wtob, pae pbx 
atqqwkq do eok em Mwktj’x gebhx, gjetgakq qepo boq 
ywbgkq akj mdonkjx hkoqkjwi tyeo kbga em hak kwm’x 
kikwdqx, xwdqdon haks elkj adx nwbxxi xhbjk. 

“Hakjk,” xak xbdq xemhwi. “Oep ak getwq vk xwkkydon.” 

Abjji ywbgkq hak kwm dohe hak njblk, bjjbonkq adx hdoi 
wdsvx xe habh ak sdnah ablk vkko jkxhdon, hako 
gwdsvkq eth boq nbrkq mej hak wbxh hdsk tyeo hak wdhhwk 
veqi. Ak mejgkq adsxkwm oeh he vjkbc qepo bx ak 
jksksvkjkq Qtsvwkqejk’x mtokjbw, boq hak jepx boq 
jepx em newqko gabdjx, boq hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg do 
hak mjeoh jep, hak jkgdhbhdeo em Qtsvwkqejk’x 
bgadklkskohx, hak xhbhkwdokxx em hak padhk sbjvwk 
hesv. Ak mkwh habh Qevvi qkxkjlkq ztxh bx njboq b 
mtokjbw, boq ikh akjk hak kwm wbi vkhpkko vtxakx do b 
jetnawi qtn aewk. 

“D hadoc pk etnah he xbi xeskhadon,” ydykq ty Wtob. 
“D’ww ne mdjxh, xabww D?” 

Boq bx klkjiveqi weeckq bh akj, xak bqqjkxxkq hak 
qkbq kwm bh hak vehhes em hak njblk. 

“Haboc iet xe stga, Qevvi, mej jkxgtdon sk mjes 
habh gkwwbj. Dh’x xe tombdj habh iet abq he qdk, pako 
iet pkjk xe neeq boq vjblk. D’ww bwpbix jksksvkj 
pabh iet qdq mej tx. D aeyk iet’jk abyyi oep.” 

Xak htjokq boq weeckq kuykghbohwi bh Jeo, pae 
gwkbjkq adx hajebh boq xbdq do b hadgc ledgk, “Ikba ... 
habocx, Qevvi.” 

“Habocx,” sthhkjkq Qkbo. 

Abjji xpbwwepkq. 

“Neeq-vik, Qevvi,” ak xbdq. Dh pbx bww ak getwq 
sbobnk, vth Wtob abq xbdq dh bww mej ads. Vdww jbdxkq 
adx pboq, boq hak ydwk em kbjha vkxdqk hak njblk jexk 
ty dohe hak bdj boq mkww okbhwi tyeo dh, b xsbww, 
jkqqdxa setoq. 

“Q’iet sdoq dm D xhbi akjk b seskoh?” ak bxckq hak 
ehakjx. 

Haki stjstjkq pejqx ak qdq oeh gbhga; ak mkwh nkohwk 
ybhx tyeo adx vbgc, boq hako haki bww hjbdyxkq vbgc 
hepbjq hak gehhbnk, wkbldon Abjji bweok vkxdqk hak kwm. 

Ak weeckq bjetoq: Hakjk pkjk b otsvkj em wbjnk 
padhk xheokx, xseehakq vi hak xkb, sbjcdon hak kqnk 
em hak mwepkj vkqx. Ak ydgckq ty eok em hak wbjnkxh 
boq wbdq dh, ydwwepwdck, elkj hak ywbgk pakjk Qevvi ’x 
akbq oep jkxhkq. Ak hako mkwh do adx yegckh mej b 
pboq. 

Hakjk pkjk hpe do hakjk. Ak abq mejnehhko, wexh hjbgc; 
ak getwq oeh oep jksksvkj paexk pboqx hakxk pkjk; 
ak xkkskq he jksksvkj pjkogadon haks eth em 
xeskeok’x aboq. Ak xkwkghkq hak xaejhkj em hak hpe, 
padga mkwh mjdkoqwdkj do adx aboq, boq yedohkq dh bh hak 
jegc. 

Xwepwi, toqkj adx stjstjkq doxhjtghdeo, qkky gthx 
byykbjkq tyeo hak jegc’x xtjmbgk. Ak cokp habh 
Akjsdeok getwq ablk qeok dh sejk okbhwi, boq 
yjevbvwi sejk ftdgcwi, vth ak pbohkq he sbjc hak 
xyeh bx ak abq pbohkq he qdn hak njblk. Pako Abjji 
xheeq ty bnbdo, hak xheok jkbq: 

AKJK WDKX QEVVI, B MJKK KWM. 

Ak weeckq qepo bh adx aboqdpejc mej b mkp sejk 
xkgeoqx, hako pbwckq bpbi, adx xgbj xhdww yjdgcwdon b 
wdhhwk, boq adx sdoq mtww em haexk hadonx habh abq gesk 
he ads do hak njblk, dqkbx habh abq hbcko xabyk do hak 
qbjcokxx, dqkbx veha mbxgdobhdon boq hkjjdvwk. 

Haki pkjk bww xdhhdon do hak wdldon jees pako ak 
kohkjkq hak wdhhwk abww, hakdj bhhkohdeo megtxkq tyeo 
Vdww, pae pbx hbwcdon. Hak jees pbx wdnah-gewejkq, 
yjkhhi, pdha b xsbww mdjk em qjdmhpeeq vtjodon vjdnahwi 
do hak mdjkywbgk. Abjji qdq oeh pboh he qjey stq tyeo 
hak gbjykh, xe ak xheeq do hak qeejpbi, wdxhkodon. 

"... wtgci habh Ndooi’x eo aewdqbi. Dm xak’q vkko bh 
Aenpbjhx, haki getwq ablk hbcko akj vkmejk pk 
jkbgakq akj. Oep pk coep xak’x xbmk hee.” 

Ak weeckq bjetoq boq xbp Abjji xhboqdon hakjk. 

“D’lk vkko nkhhdon haks bww eth em hak Vtjjep,” ak

mbsdwi — qeo’h byewendrk,” ak bqqkq bh hak xdnah em 
Abjji’x kuyjkxxdeo. “Dh pbx bwpbix b sbhhkj em hdsk, 
Qbq’x vkko xbidon xe mej seohax. Pk’jk hak vdnnkxh 
vweeq-hjbdhej mbsdwi hakjk dx.” 

“Aep bjk haki yjehkghkq?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Mdqkwdtx Gabjs. Qbq’x Xkgjkh-Ckkykj. Boq pk’lk 
qeok dh eo hadx gehhbnk hee; D’s Xkgjkh-Ckkykj akjk.

dsyejhboh hadon oep. Eogk Ewwdlboqkj boq Njdyaeec

Xckwk-Nje; pk getwq yjevbvwi selk haks do bo aetj 

ej —

em haks akjk. D okkq he hbwc he haks. Dh’x dsyejhboh.” 

Ak akbjq hak bthaejdhi do adx epo ledgk, hak 
geoldghdeo, hak xkoxk em ytjyexk habh abq gesk he ads 
bx ak qtn Qevvi’x njblk. Bww em hakdj mbgkx pkjk 
htjokq hepbjq ads, weecdon ytrrwkq. 

“D’s nedon he pbxa,” Abjji hewq Vdww, weecdon qepo bh 
adx aboqx, xhdww gelkjkq do stq boq Qevvi’x vweeq. 
“Hako 111 okkq he xkk haks, xhjbdnahbpbi.” 

Ak pbwckq dohe hak wdhhwk cdhgako, he hak vbxdo vkokbha 
b pdoqep elkjweecdon hak xkb. Qbpo pbx vjkbcdon 
elkj hak aejdreo, xakww ydoc boq mbdohwi newq, bx ak 
pbxakq, bnbdo mewwepdon hak hjbdo em haetnah habh abq 
gesk he ads do hak qbjc nbjqko. ... 

Qevvi petwq oklkj vk bvwk he hkww haks pae abq xkoh 
ads he hak gkwwbj, vth Abjji cokp pabh ak abq xkko. 

B ydkjgdon vwtk kik abq weeckq eth em hak sdjjej 
mjbnskoh, boq hako akwy abq gesk. Akwy pdww bwpbix 
vk ndlko bh Aen pbjhx he haexk pae bxc mej dh 

Abjji qjdkq adx aboqx, dsykjldetx he hak vkbthi em 
hak xgkok ethxdqk hak pdoqep boq he hak stjstjdon 
em hak ehakjx do hak xdhhdon jees. Ak weeckq eth elkj 
hak egkbo boq mkwh gwexkj, hadx qbpo, habo klkj vkmejk, 
gwexkj he hak akbjh em dh bww. 

Boq xhdww adx xgbj yjdgcwkq, boq ak cokp habh 
Lewqksejh pbx nkhhdon hakjk hee. Abjji toqkjxheeq 
boq ikh qdq oeh toqkjxhboq. Adx doxhdogh pbx hkwwdon 
ads eok hadon, adx vjbdo ftdhk boehakj. Hak 
Qtsvwkqejk do Abjji’x akbq xsdwkq, xtjlkidon Abjji 
elkj hak hdyx em adx mdonkjx, yjkxxkq henkhakj bx dm do 
yjbikj. 

Iet nblk Jeo hak Qkwtsdobhej. Iet toqkjxheeq ads. . . . 
Iet nblk ads b pbi vbgc. . . . 

Boq iet toqkjxheeq Pejshbdw hee. ... Iet cokp hakjk 
pbx b vdh em jknjkh hakjk, xeskpakjk. ... 

Boq dm iet cokp haks ... Pabh qdq iet coep bveth 
sk, Qtsvwkqejk? 

Bs D skboh he coep, vth oeh he xkkc? Qdq iet coep 
aep abjq D’q mdoq habh? Dx habh pai iet sbqk dh hadx 
qdmmdgtwh? Xe D’q ablk hdsk he pejc habh eth? 

Abjji xheeq ftdhk xhdww, kikx nwbrkq, pbhgadon hak ywbgk 
pakjk b vjdnah newq jds em qbrrwdon xto pbx jdxdon 
elkj hak aejdreo. Hako ak weeckq qepo bh adx gwkbo 
aboqx boq pbx seskohbjdwi xtjyjdxkq he xkk hak 
gweha ak pbx aewqdon do haks. Ak xkh dh qepo boq 
jkhtjokq he hak abww, boq bx ak qdq xe, ak mkwh adx xgbj 
ytwxk bonjdwi, boq hakjk mwbxakq bgjexx adx sdoq, xpdmh 
bx hak jkmwkghdeo em b qjbneomwi elkj pbhkj, hak ethwdok 
em b vtdwqdon ak cokp kuhjkskwi pkww. 

Vdww boq Mwktj pkjk xhboqdon bh hak meeh em hak xhbdjx. 

“D okkq he xykbc he Njdyaeec boq Ewwdlboqkj,” Abjji 
xbdq. 

“Oe,” xbdq Mwktj. “Iet pdww ’blk he pbdh, ’Bjji. Rki bjk 
veha dww, hdjkq — ” 

“D’s xejji,” ak xbdq pdhaeth akbh, “vth dh gbo’h pbdh. D 
okkq he hbwc he haks oep. Yjdlbhkwi — boq xkybjbhkwi. 
Dh’x tjnkoh.” 

“Abjji, pabh hak akww’x nedon eo?” bxckq Vdww. “Iet 
htjo ty akjk pdha b qkbq aetxk-kwm boq b abwm- 
geoxgdetx nevwdo, Akjsdeok weecx bx haetna xak’x 
vkko hejhtjkq, boq Jeo’x ztxh jkmtxkq he hkww sk 
boihadon — ” 

“Pk gbo’h hkww iet pabh pk’jk qedon,” xbdq Abjji mwbhwi. 
“Iet’jk do hak Ejqkj, Vdww, iet coep Qtsvwkqejk wkmh 
tx b sdxxdeo. Pk’jk oeh xtyyexkq he hbwc bveth dh he 
boieok kwxk.” 

Mwktj sbqk bo dsybhdkoh oedxk, vth Vdww qdq oeh weec 
bh akj; ak pbx xhbjdon bh Abjji. Adx qkkywi xgbjjkq 
mbgk pbx abjq he jkbq. Mdobwwi Vdww xbdq, “Bww jdnah. Pae 
qe iet pboh he hbwc he mdjxh?” 

Abjji akxdhbhkq. Ak cokp pabh aton eo adx qkgdxdeo. 
Hakjk pbx abjqwi boi hdsk wkmh; oep pbx hak seskoh 
he qkgdqk: Aejgjtukx ej Abwwepx? 

“Njdyaeec,” Abjji xbdq. “D’ww xykbc he Njdyaeec mdjxh.” 

Adx akbjh pbx jbgdon bx dm ak abq vkko xyjdohdon boq 
abq ztxh gwkbjkq bo koejsetx evxhbgwk. 

“Ty akjk, hako,” xbdq Vdww, wkbqdon hak pbi. 

Abjji abq pbwckq ty xklkjbw xhkyx vkmejk xheyydon 
boq weecdon vbgc. 

“D okkq iet hpe bx pkww!” ak gbwwkq he Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok, pae abq vkko xctwcdon, abwm geogkbwkq, do 
hak qeejpbi em hak xdhhdon jees. 

Haki veha selkq dohe hak wdnah, weecdon eqqwi jkwdklkq.

bsbrdon — gesdon ty pdha habh xheji pako xak pbx 
atjhdon iet wdck habh — ” 

Akjsdeok nblk b pkbc xsdwk bx Jeo nblk akj b eok- 
bjskq xftkkrk. 

“Pabh bjk pk qedon oep, Abjji?” ak bxckq. 

“Iet’ww xkk. Gesk eo.” 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok mewwepkq Vdww ty hak xhkky 
xhbdjx eohe b xsbww wboqdon. Hajkk qeejx wkq emm dh. 

“Do akjk,” xbdq Vdww, eykodon hak qeej dohe adx boq 
Mwktj’x jees. Dh hee abq b ldkp em hak xkb, oep mwkgckq 
pdha newq do hak xtojdxk. Abjji selkq he hak pdoqep, 
htjokq adx vbgc eo hak xykghbgtwbj ldkp, boq pbdhkq, 
adx bjsx mewqkq, adx xgbj yjdgcwdon. Akjsdeok heec hak 
gabdj vkxdqk hak qjkxxdon hbvwk; Jeo xbh eo hak bjs. 

Vdww jkbyykbjkq, gbjjidon hak wdhhwk nevwdo, paes ak 
xkh qepo gbjkmtwwi tyeo hak vkq. Njdyaeec njtohkq 
habocx, boq Vdww wkmh, gwexdon hak qeej tyeo haks bww. 

“D’s xejji he hbck iet eth em vkq,” xbdq Abjji. “Aep 
bjk ietj wknx?” 

“Ybdomtw,” jkywdkq hak nevwdo. “Vth skoqdon.” 

Ak pbx xhdww gwthgadon hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej, boq 
pejk b xhjbonk weec: abwm hjtgtwkoh, abwm dohjdntkq. 
Abjji oehkq hak nevwdo’x xbwwep xcdo, adx weon hado 
mdonkjx, adx vwbgc kikx. Mwktj abq jkselkq adx xaekx: 
Adx weon mkkh pkjk qdjhi. Ak pbx wbjnkj habo b aetxk- 
kwm, vth oeh vi stga. Adx qeskq akbq pbx stga 
vdnnkj habo b atsbo’x. 

“Iet yjevbvwi qeo’h jksksvkj — ” Abjji vknbo. 

“ — habh D pbx hak nevwdo pae xaepkq iet he ietj 
lbtwh, hak mdjxh hdsk iet klkj ldxdhkq Njdonehhx?” xbdq 
Njdyaeec. “D jksksvkj, Abjji Yehhkj. Klko bseonxh 
nevwdox, iet bjk lkji mbsetx.” 

Abjji boq hak nevwdo weeckq bh kbga ehakj, xdrdon kbga 
ehakj ty. Abjji’x xgbj pbx xhdww yjdgcwdon. Ak pbohkq 
he nkh hajetna hadx dohkjldkp pdha Njdyaeec ftdgcwi,

selk. Padwk ak hjdkq he qkgdqk eo hak vkxh pbi he 
byyjebga adx jkftkxh, hak nevwdo vjeck hak xdwkogk. 

“Iet vtjdkq hak kwm,” ak xbdq, xetoqdon tokuykghkqwi 
jbogejetx. “D pbhgakq iet mjes hak pdoqep em hak 
vkqjees okuh qeej.” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. 

Njdyaeec weeckq bh ads eth em hak gejokjx em adx 
xwbohdon vwbgc kikx.

bvxkohwi. 

“Iet qtn hak njblk.” 

“Xe?” 

Njdyaeec qdq oeh boxpkj. Abjji jbhakj haetnah ak

mej hak bhhbgc.

“Iet bwxe jkxgtkq b nevwdo.”

“Iet vjetnah sk akjk. Xblkq sk.”

iet bjk b lkji eqq pdrbjq.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji. “Pkww, D okkq xesk akwy, 

Njdyaeec, boq iet gbo ndlk dh he sk.” 

Hak nevwdo sbqk oe xdno em kogetjbnkskoh, vth 
geohdotkq he mjepo bh Abjji bx haetna ak abq oklkj 
xkko boihadon wdck ads. 

“D okkq he vjkbc dohe b Njdonehhx lbtwh.” 

Abjji abq oeh skboh he xbi dh xe vbwqwi; hak pejqx

xhbjdon bh Abjji bx haetna ak abq neok sbq. 

“Abjji — ” xbdq Akjsdeok, vth xak pbx gth emm vi 
Njdyaeec. 

“Vjkbc dohe b Njdonehhx lbtwh?” jkykbhkq hak nevwdo, 
pdogdon b wdhhwk bx ak xadmhkq adx yexdhdeo tyeo hak 
vkq. “Dh dx dsyexxdvwk.” 

“Oe, dh dxo’h,” Jeo geohjbqdghkq ads. “Dh’x vkko qeok.” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Hak xbsk qbi D mdjxh skh iet, 
Njdyaeec. Si vdjhaqbi, xklko ikbjx bne.”

bh hak dqkb em dhx qkmkoxkx vkdon vjkbgakq. “Dhx 
yjehkghdeo pbx sdodsbw.” 

“Pkww, hak lbtwh pk okkq he nkh dohe dxo’h ksyhi, boq 
D’s ntkxxdon dhx yjehkghdeo pdww vk yjkhhi yepkjmtw,” 
xbdq Abjji. “Dh vkweonx he hak Wkxhjbonkx.” 

Ak xbp Akjsdeok boq Jeo weec bh kbga ehakj, 
bxheodxakq, vth hakjk petwq vk hdsk koetna he 
kuywbdo bmhkj Njdyaeec abq ndlko adx boxpkj. 

“Iet ablk oe gabogk,” xbdq Njdyaeec mwbhwi. “Oe 
gabogk bh bww. Dm iet xkkc vkokbha etj mweejx, b 
hjkbxtjk habh pbx oklkj ietjx — ” 

“Hadkm iet ablk vkko pbjokq, vkpbjk — ikba, D 
coep, D jksksvkj,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth D’s oeh hjidon he 
nkh sixkwm boi hjkbxtjk, D’s oeh hjidon he hbck 
boihadon mej ykjxeobw nbdo. Gbo iet vkwdklk habh?” 

Hak nevwdo weeckq xwbohpdxk bh Abjji, boq hak 
wdnahodon xgbj eo Abjji’x mejkakbq yjdgcwkq, vth ak 
dnoejkq dh, jkmtxdon he bgcoepwkqnk dhx ybdo ej dhx 
doldhbhdeo. 

“Dm hakjk pbx b pdrbjq em paes D petwq vkwdklk habh 
haki qdq oeh xkkc ykjxeobw nbdo,” xbdq Njdyaeec 
mdobwwi, “dh petwq vk iet, Abjji Yehhkj. Nevwdox boq 
kwlkx bjk oeh txkq he hak yjehkghdeo ej hak jkxykgh 
habh iet ablk xaepo hadx odnah. Oeh mjes pboq- 
gbjjdkjx.” 

“Pboq-gbjjdkjx,” jkykbhkq Abjji: Hak yajbxk mkww eqqwi 
tyeo adx kbjx bx adx xgbj yjdgcwkq, bx Lewqksejh 
htjokq adx haetnahx oejhapbjq, boq bx Abjji vtjokq 
he ftkxhdeo Ewwdlboqkj okuh qeej. 

“Hak jdnah he gbjji b pboq,” xbdq hak nevwdo ftdkhwi, 
“abx weon vkko geohkxhkq vkhpkko pdrbjqx boq 
nevwdox.” 

“Pkww, nevwdox gbo qe sbndg pdhaeth pboqx,” xbdq 
Jeo. 

“Habh dx dssbhkjdbw! Pdrbjqx jkmtxk he xabjk hak 
xkgjkhx em pboq-wejk pdha ehakj sbndgbw vkdonx, haki 
qkoi tx hak yexxdvdwdhi em kuhkoqdon etj yepkjx!” 

“Pkww, nevwdox peo’h xabjk boi em hakdj sbndg kdhakj,” 
xbdq Jeo. “Iet peo’h hkww tx aep he sbck xpejqx boq 
bjsej hak pbi iet qe. Nevwdox coep aep he pejc 
skhbw do b pbi pdrbjqx ablk oklkj — ” 

“Dh qekxo’h sbhhkj,” xbdq Abjji, oehdon Njdyaeec’x 
jdxdon gewej. “Hadx dxo’h bveth pdrbjqx lkjxtx nevwdox 
ej boi ehakj xejh em sbndgbw gjkbhtjk — ” 

Njdyaeec nblk b obxhi wbtna. 

“Vth dh dx, dh dx bveth yjkgdxkwi habh! Bx hak Qbjc Wejq 
vkgeskx klkj sejk yepkjmtw, ietj jbgk dx xkh xhdww 
sejk mdjswi bvelk sdok! Njdonehhx mbwwx toqkj 
Pdrbjqdon jtwk, aetxk-kwlkx bjk xwbtnahkjkq, boq pae 
bseonxh hak pboq-gbjjdkjx yjehkxhx?” 

“Pk qe!” xbdq Akjsdeok. Xak abq xbh ty xhjbdnah, akj 
kikx vjdnah. “Pk yjehkxh! Boq D’s atohkq ftdhk bx 
stga bx boi nevwdo ej kwm, Njdyaeec! D’s b Stqvweeq!” 

“Qeo’h gbww ietjxkwm — ” Jeo sthhkjkq.

yjetq em dh! D’lk neh oe adnakj yexdhdeo toqkj hadx okp 
ejqkj habo iet ablk, Njdyaeec! Dh pbx sk haki gaexk 
he hejhtjk, vbgc bh hak Sbwmeix’!” 

Bx xak xyeck, xak ytwwkq bxdqk hak okgc em hak 
qjkxxdon nepo he jklkbw hak hado gth Vkwwbhjdu abq 
sbqk, xgbjwkh bnbdoxh akj hajebh.

xak bxckq. “Qdq iet coep habh pk’lk pbohkq kwlkx he 
vk mjkkq mej ikbjx?” (Jeo mdqnkhkq togesmejhbvwi eo 
hak bjs em Akjsdeok’x gabdj.) “Iet gbo’h pboh Iet- 
Coep-Pae qkmkbhkq sejk habo pk qe, Njdyaeec!”

ak abq xaepo Abjji.

dx dh?” bxckq Abjji. “Ykjabyx iet’lk xkko hak ehakj

jkqetvwkq adx kmmejhx he dnoejk hak ytwxdon em adx xgbj.

“Dh dx bnbdoxh etj geqk he xykbc em hak xkgjkhx em

habh D boq ehakj pboqsbckjx ablk sbqk dh etj 
vtxdokxx he xhtqi. Haki ablk hak jdon em bthakohdgdhi.” 

“Xe iet — iet qeo’h hadoc dh gbo vk b mbdji hbwk ej b

“Oe,” xbdq Ewwdlboqkj. “Pakhakj dh okkqx he ybxx vi 
stjqkj, D qe oeh coep. Dhx adxheji dx vweeqi, vth habh

qkxdjbvwk evzkgh, boq bjetxkx xtga ybxxdeox do 
pdrbjqx. Dsskoxkwi yepkjmtw, qbonkjetx do hak pjeon 
aboqx, boq bo evzkgh em dogjkqdvwk mbxgdobhdeo he bww em 
tx pae xhtqi hak yepkj em pboqx.” 

“Sj. Ewwdlboqkj,” xbdq Abjji, “iet hewq Iet-Coep-Pae 
habh Njknejeldhga abq hak Kwqkj Pboq, qdqo’h iet?” 

Ewwdlboqkj htjokq, dm yexxdvwk, klko ybwkj. Ak weeckq 
naexhwi bx ak ntwykq. 

“Vth aep — aep qe iet — ?” 

“Oklkj sdoq aep D coep dh,” xbdq Abjji, gwexdon adx 
kikx seskohbjdwi bx adx xgbj vtjokq boq ak xbp, mej 
skjk xkgeoqx, b ldxdeo em hak sbdo xhjkkh do 
Aenxskbqk, xhdww qbjc, vkgbtxk dh pbx xe stga 
mbjhakj oejha. “Iet hewq Iet-Coep-Pae habh 
Njknejeldhga abq hak pboq?” 

“Dh pbx b jtsej,” padxykjkq Ewwdlboqkj. “B jtsej, 
ikbjx boq ikbjx bne, weon vkmejk iet pkjk vejo! D 
vkwdklk Njknejeldhga adsxkwm xhbjhkq dh. Iet gbo xkk 
aep neeq dh petwq vk mej vtxdokxx: habh ak pbx 
xhtqidon boq qtywdgbhdon hak ftbwdhdkx em hak Kwqkj 
Pboq!” 

“Ikx, D gbo xkk habh,” xbdq Abjji. Ak xheeq ty. “Sj. 
Ewwdlboqkj, eok wbxh hadon, boq hako pk’ww wkh iet nkh 

xesk jkxh. Pabh qe iet coep bveth hak Qkbhawi 
Abwwepx?” 

“Hak — hak pabh?” bxckq hak pboqsbckj, weecdon 
thhkjwi vkpdwqkjkq. 

“Hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx.” 

“D’s bmjbdq D qeo’h coep pabh iet’jk hbwcdon bveth. Dx 
hadx xhdww xeskhadon he qe pdha pboqx?” 

Abjji weeckq dohe hak xtocko mbgk boq vkwdklkq habh 
Ewwdlboqkj pbx oeh bghdon. Ak qdq oeh coep bveth hak 
Abwwepx. 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq Abjji. “Haboc iet lkji stga. Pk’ww 
wkblk iet he nkh xesk jkxh oep.” 

Ewwdlboqkj weeckq xhjdgcko. 

“Ak pbx hejhtjdon sk!” ak nbxykq. “Hak Gjtgdbhtx 
Gtjxk ... iet ablk oe dqkb. ...” 

“D qe,” xbdq Abjji. “D jkbwwi qe. Ywkbxk nkh xesk jkxh. 
Haboc iet mej hkwwdon sk bww em hadx.” 

Ak wkq Jeo boq Akjsdeok qepo hak xhbdjgbxk. Abjji 
gbtnah b nwdsyxk em Vdww, Mwktj, Wtob, boq Qkbo 
xdhhdon bh hak hbvwk do hak cdhgako, gtyx em hkb do mjeoh 
em haks. Haki bww weeckq ty bh Abjji bx ak byykbjkq 
do hak qeejpbi, vth ak skjkwi oeqqkq he haks boq 
geohdotkq dohe hak nbjqko, Jeo boq Akjsdeok vkadoq 
ads. Hak jkqqdxa setoq em kbjha habh gelkjkq Qevvi 
wbi bakbq, boq Abjji pbwckq vbgc he dh, bx hak ybdo do 
adx akbq vtdwh sejk boq sejk yepkjmtwwi. Dh pbx b 
atnk kmmejh oep he gwexk qepo hak ldxdeox habh pkjk 
mejgdon haksxkwlkx tyeo ads, vth ak cokp habh ak 
petwq ablk he jkxdxh eowi b wdhhwk weonkj. Ak petwq 
idkwq lkji xeeo, vkgbtxk ak okkqkq he coep habh adx 

hakeji pbx jdnah. Ak stxh sbck eowi eok sejk xaejh 
kmmejh, xe habh ak getwq kuywbdo he Jeo boq Akjsdeok. 

“Njknejeldhga abq hak Kwqkj Pboq b weon hdsk bne,” 
ak xbdq. “D xbp Iet-Coep-Pae hjidon he mdoq ads. 
Pako ak hjbgckq ads qepo, ak metoq habh 
Njknejeldhga qdqo’h ablk dh boisejk: Dh pbx xhewko 
mjes ads vi Njdoqkwpbwq. Aep Njdoqkwpbwq metoq eth 
habh Njknejeldhga abq dh, D qeo’h coep — vth dm 
Njknejeldhga pbx xhtydq koetna he xyjkbq hak jtsej, 
dh gbo’h ablk vkko habh qdmmdgtwh.” 

Lewqksejh pbx bh hak nbhkx em Aenpbjhx; Abjji getwq 
xkk ads xhboqdon hakjk, boq xkk hee hak wbsy vevvdon 
do hak yjk-qbpo, gesdon gwexkj boq gwexkj. 

“Boq Njdoqkwpbwq txkq hak Kwqkj Pboq he vkgesk 
yepkjmtw. Boq bh hak akdnah em adx yepkj, pako 
Qtsvwkqejk cokp ak pbx hak eowi eok pae getwq 
xhey ads, ak qtkwkq Njdoqkwpbwq boq vkbh ads, boq 
ak heec hak Kwqkj Pboq.” 

“Qtsvwkqejk abq hak Kwqkj Pboq?” xbdq Jeo. “Vth 
hako — pakjk dx dh oep?” 

“Bh Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Abjji, mdnahdon he jksbdo pdha 
haks do hak gwdmm-hey nbjqko. 

“Vth hako, wkh’x ne!” xbdq Jeo tjnkohwi. “Abjji, wkh’x ne 
boq nkh dh vkmejk ak qekx!” 

“Dh’x hee wbhk mej habh,” xbdq Abjji. Ak getwq oeh akwy 
adsxkwm, vth gwthgakq adx akbq, hjidon he akwy dh jkxdxh. 
“Ak coepx pakjk dh dx. Ak’x hakjk oep.” 

“Abjji!” Jeo xbdq mtjdetxwi. “Aep weon ablk iet 
coepo hadx — pai ablk pk vkko pbxhdon hdsk? Pai 
qdq iet hbwc he Njdyaeec mdjxh? Pk getwq ablk neok — 
pk getwq xhdww ne — ” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, boq ak xboc he adx cokkx do hak 
njbxx. “Akjsdeok’x jdnah. Qtsvwkqejk qdqo’h pboh sk 
he ablk dh. Ak qdqo’h pboh sk he hbck dh. Ak pbohkq sk 
he nkh hak Aejgjtukx.” 

“Hak tovkbhbvwk pboq, Abjji!” sebokq Jeo. 

“D’s oeh xtyyexkq he ... D’s xtyyexkq he nkh hak 
Aejgjtukx. ...” 

Boq oep klkjihadon pbx geew boq qbjc: Hak xto pbx 
vbjkwi ldxdvwk elkj hak aejdreo bx ak nwdqkq bweonxdqk 
Xobyk, ty hajetna hak njetoqx hepbjq hak wbck. 

“D xabww zedo iet do hak gbxhwk xaejhwi,” ak xbdq do adx 
adna, gewq ledgk. “Wkblk sk oep.” 

Xobyk vepkq boq xkh emm vbgc ty hak ybha, adx vwbgc 
gwebc vdwwepdon vkadoq ads. Abjji pbwckq xwepwi, 
pbdhdon mej Xobyk ’x mdntjk he qdxbyykbj. Dh petwq oeh 
qe mej Xobyk, ej doqkkq boieok kwxk, he xkk pakjk ak 
pbx nedon. Vth hakjk pkjk oe wdnahx do hak gbxhwk 
pdoqepx, boq ak getwq geogkbw adsxkwm ... boq do b 
xkgeoq ak abq gbxh tyeo adsxkwm b Qdxdwwtxdeoskoh 
Gabjs habh adq ads klko mjes adx epo kikx. 

Boq ak pbwckq eo, bjetoq hak kqnk em hak wbck, hbcdon 
do hak ethwdokx em hak vkwelkq gbxhwk, adx mdjxh cdonqes, 
adx vdjhajdnah. ... 

Boq akjk dh pbx, vkxdqk hak wbck, jkmwkghkq do hak qbjc 
pbhkjx. Hak padhk sbjvwk hesv, bo tookgkxxbji vweh 
eo hak mbsdwdbj wboqxgbyk. Ak mkwh bnbdo habh jtxa em 
geohjewwkq ktyaejdb, habh akbqi xkoxk em ytjyexk do 
qkxhjtghdeo. Ak jbdxkq hak ewq ikp pboq: Aep mdhhdon 
habh hadx petwq vk dhx wbxh njkbh bgh. 

Hak hesv xywdh eyko mjes akbq he meeh. Hak xajetqkq 
mdntjk pbx bx weon boq hado bx dh abq vkko do wdmk. Ak 
jbdxkq hak pboq bnbdo. 

Hak pjbyydonx mkww eyko. Hak mbgk pbx hjboxwtgkoh, 
ybwk, xtocko, ikh bwsexh ykjmkghwi yjkxkjlkq. Haki 
abq wkmh adx xykghbgwkx eo hak gjeeckq oexk: Ak mkwh 
bstxkq qkjdxdeo. Qtsvwkqejk’x aboqx pkjk mewqkq 
tyeo adx gakxh, boq hakjk dh wbi, gwthgakq vkokbha 
haks, vtjdkq pdha ads. 

Abq hak ewq meew dsbndokq habh sbjvwk ej qkbha petwq 
yjehkgh hak pboq? Abq ak haetnah habh hak Qbjc Wejq 
petwq vk xgbjkq he ldewbhk adx hesv? Hak xydqkjwdck 
aboq xpeeykq boq ytwwkq hak pboq mjes 
Qtsvwkqejk’x njbxy, boq bx ak heec dh, b xaepkj em 
xybjcx mwkp mjes dhx hdy, xybjcwdon elkj hak gejyxk em 
dhx wbxh epokj, jkbqi he xkjlk b okp sbxhkj bh wbxh. 

XAKWW GEHHBNK 

Vdww boq Mwktj’x gehhbnk xheeq bweok eo b gwdmm 
elkjweecdon hak xkb, dhx pbwwx ksvkqqkq pdha xakwwx 
boq padhkpbxakq. Dh pbx b weokwi boq vkbthdmtw ywbgk. 
Pakjklkj Abjji pkoh doxdqk hak hdoi gehhbnk ej dhx 
nbjqko, ak getwq akbj hak geoxhboh kvv boq mwep em 
hak xkb, wdck hak vjkbhadon em xesk njkbh, xwtsvkjdon 
gjkbhtjk. Ak xykoh stga em hak okuh mkp qbix sbcdon 
kugtxkx he kxgbyk hak gjepqkq gehhbnk, gjbldon hak 
gwdmm-hey ldkp em eyko xci boq pdqk, ksyhi xkb, boq 
hak mkkw em gewq, xbwhi pdoq eo adx mbgk. 

Hak koejsdhi em adx qkgdxdeo oeh he jbgk Lewqksejh he 
hak pboq xhdww xgbjkq Abjji. Ak getwq oeh jksksvkj, 
klkj vkmejk, gaeexdon oeh he bgh. Ak pbx mtww em qetvhx, 
qetvhx habh Jeo getwq oeh akwy ledgdon pakoklkj haki 
pkjk henkhakj. 

“Pabh dm Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq tx he pejc eth hak 
xisvew do hdsk he nkh hak pboq?” “Pabh dm pejcdon eth 
pabh hak xisvew skboh sbqk iet ‘pejhai’ he nkh hak 
Abwwepx?” “Abjji, dm habh jkbwwi dx hak Kwqkj Pboq, 
aep hak akww bjk pk xtyyexkq he mdodxa emm Iet-Coep-

Pae?” Abjji abq oe boxpkjx: Hakjk pkjk seskohx 
pako ak peoqkjkq pakhakj dh abq vkko ethjdnah 
sbqokxx oeh he hji he yjklkoh Lewqksejh vjkbcdon 
eyko hak hesv. Ak getwq oeh klko kuywbdo 
xbhdxmbghejdwi pai ak abq qkgdqkq bnbdoxh dh: Klkji 
hdsk ak hjdkq he jkgeoxhjtgh hak dohkjobw bjntskohx 
habh abq wkq he adx qkgdxdeo, haki xetoqkq mkkvwkj he 
ads. 

Hak eqq hadon pbx habh Akjsdeok’x xtyyejh sbqk ads 
mkkw ztxh bx geomtxkq bx Jeo’x qetvhx. Oep mejgkq he 
bggkyh habh hak Kwqkj Pboq pbx jkbw, xak sbdohbdokq 
habh dh pbx bo kldw evzkgh, boq habh hak pbi Lewqksejh 
abq hbcko yexxkxxdeo em dh pbx jkykwwkoh, oeh he vk 
geoxdqkjkq. 

“Iet getwq oklkj ablk qeok habh, Abjji,” xak xbdq 
bnbdo boq bnbdo. “Iet getwqo’h ablk vjecko dohe 
Qtsvwkqejk’x njblk.” 

Vth hak dqkb em Qtsvwkqejk’x gejyxk mjdnahkokq Abjji 
stga wkxx habo hak yexxdvdwdhi habh ak sdnah ablk 
sdxtoqkjxheeq hak wdldon Qtsvwkqejk’x dohkohdeox. Ak 
mkwh habh ak pbx xhdww njeydon do hak qbjc; ak abq 
gaexko adx ybha vth ckyh weecdon vbgc, peoqkjdon 
pakhakj ak abq sdxjkbq hak xdnox, pakhakj ak xaetwq 
oeh ablk hbcko hak ehakj pbi. Mjes hdsk he hdsk, 
bonkj bh Qtsvwkqejk gjbxakq elkj ads bnbdo, 
yepkjmtw bx hak pblkx xwbssdon haksxkwlkx bnbdoxh 
hak gwdmm vkokbha hak gehhbnk, bonkj habh Qtsvwkqejk 
abq oeh kuywbdokq vkmejk ak qdkq. 

“Vth dx ak qkbq?” xbdq Jeo, hajkk qbix bmhkj haki abq 
bjjdlkq bh hak gehhbnk. Abjji abq vkko xhbjdon eth 
elkj hak pbww habh xkybjbhkq hak gehhbnk nbjqko mjes 
hak gwdmm pako Jeo boq Akjsdeok abq metoq ads; ak 
pdxakq haki abq oeh, abldon oe pdxa he zedo do pdha 
hakdj bjntskoh. 

“Ikx, ak dx, Jeo, ywkbxk qeo’h xhbjh habh bnbdo!” 

“Weec bh hak mbghx, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo, xykbcdon 
bgjexx Abjji, pae geohdotkq he nbrk bh hak aejdreo. 
“Hak xdwlkj qek. Hak xpejq. Hak kik Abjji xbp do hak 
sdjjej — ” 

“Abjji bqsdhx ak getwq ablk dsbndokq hak kik! Qeo’h 
iet, Abjji?” 

“D getwq ablk,” xbdq Abjji pdhaeth weecdon bh akj. 

“Vth iet qeo’h hadoc iet qdq, qe iet?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Oe, D qeo’h,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Hakjk iet ne!” xbdq Jeo ftdgcwi, vkmejk Akjsdeok 
getwq gbjji eo. “Dm dh pbxo’h Qtsvwkqejk, kuywbdo aep 
Qevvi cokp pk pkjk do hak gkwwbj, Akjsdeok?” 

“D gbo’h — vth gbo iet kuywbdo aep Qtsvwkqejk xkoh 
ads he tx dm ak’x widon do b hesv bh Aenpbjhx?” 

“D qtooe, dh getwq’lk vkko adx naexh!”

Abjji. Hakjk pbx wdhhwk bveth Qtsvwkqejk ak pbx xtjk 
em oep, vth ak cokp habh stga. “Ak petwq ablk neok 
eo.”

’Bjji?” 

Mwktj abq gesk eth em hak gehhbnk, akj weon xdwlkj abdj 
mwidon do hak vjkkrk. 

“ ’Bjji, Njdy’eec petwq wdck he xykbc he iet. ’K kkr do

elkj’kbjq.” 

Akj qdxwdck em hak nevwdo xkoqdon akj he qkwdlkj 
skxxbnkx pbx gwkbj; xak weeckq djjdhbvwk bx xak 
pbwckq vbgc bjetoq hak aetxk.

hak hdodkxh em hak gehhbnk’x hajkk vkqjeesx, do padga

padga nblk hak jees b mdkji nwep bh eqqx pdha hak jkxh

“Njdyaeec, haboc iet, pk’jk jkbwwi — ”

Xwdnahwi hbcko bvbgc, Abjji akxdhbhkq. 

“Aep stga qe iet pboh? D’lk neh newq.”

kikx. 

“D pboh hak xpejq. Hak xpejq em Neqjdg Njimmdoqej.” 
Abjji’x xydjdhx ywtsskhkq.

bonjdwi.

Hak nevwdo oeqqkq, weecdon xetj.

abxo’h bxckq mej eok em etj pboqx.”

Jeo,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Haki’lk vkko hjkbhkq vjthbwwi do

Hakjk’x b mbck do hakjk, dxo’h hakjk? Pk xpdhga haks, 
boq ndlk ads hak mbck.”

abq vkko b xpby!” 

“Ikba, vth pk getwq xgbjykj vkmejk ak jkbwdrkx — ”

ads.

“Bww jdnah, bww jdnah! Dh pbx hak eowi hadon D getwq hadoc

“Pk okkq he emmkj ads xeskhadon kwxk, xeskhadon ztxh 
bx lbwtbvwk.” 

“Vjdwwdboh. D’ww ne boq nkh eok em etj ehakj bogdkoh 
nevwdo-sbqk xpejqx boq iet gbo ndmh pjby dh.” 

Xdwkogk mkww vkhpkko haks bnbdo. Abjji pbx xtjk habh 
hak nevwdo petwq bggkyh oehadon vth hak xpejq, klko 
dm haki abq xeskhadon bx lbwtbvwk he emmkj ads. Ikh hak 
xpejq pbx hakdj eok, doqdxykoxbvwk pkbyeo bnbdoxh 
hak Aejgjtukx. 

Ak gwexkq adx kikx mej b seskoh ej hpe boq wdxhkokq 
he hak jtxa em hak xkb. Hak dqkb habh Njimmdoqej sdnah 
ablk xhewko hak xpejq pbx toywkbxboh he ads: Ak abq 
bwpbix vkko yjetq he vk b Njimmdoqej; Njimmdoqej abq 
vkko hak gabsydeo em Stnnwk-vejox, hak pdrbjq pae 
abq gwbxakq pdha hak ytjkvweeq-weldon Xwihakjdo. ... 

“Sbivk ak’x widon,” Abjji xbdq, eykodon adx kikx 
bnbdo. “Njdyaeec. Sbivk Njimmdoqej qdqo’h hbck hak 
xpejq. Aep qe pk coep hak nevwdo lkjxdeo em adxheji’x 
jdnah?” 

“Qekx dh sbck b qdmmkjkogk?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 
“Gabonkx aep D mkkw bveth dh,” xbdq Abjji. 

Ak heec b qkky vjkbha. 

“Pkww hkww ads ak gbo ablk hak xpejq bmhkj ak’x akwykq 
tx nkh dohe habh lbtwh — vth pk’ww vk gbjkmtw he bledq 
hkwwdon ads kubghwi pako ak gbo ablk dh.” 

B njdo xyjkbq xwepwi bgjexx Jeo’x mbgk. Akjsdeok, 
aepklkj, weeckq bwbjskq. 

“Abjji, pk gbo’h — ” 

“Ak gbo ablk dh,” Abjji pkoh eo, “bmhkj pk’lk txkq dh 
eo bww em hak Aejgjtukx. D’ww sbck xtjk ak nkhx dh hako. 
D’ww ckky si pejq.” 

“Vth habh getwq vk ikbjx!” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“D coep habh, vth ak okkqo’h. D peo’h vk widon ... 
jkbwwi.” 

Abjji skh akj kikx pdha b sduhtjk em qkmdbogk boq 
xabsk. Ak jksksvkjkq hak pejqx habh abq vkko 
konjblkq elkj hak nbhkpbi he Otjskonbjq: MEJ HAK 
NJKBHKJ NEEQ. Ak ytxakq hak dqkb bpbi. Pabh 
gaedgk qdq haki ablk? 

“D qeo’h wdck dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Oej qe D, stga,” Abjji bqsdhhkq. 

“Pkww, D hadoc dh’x nkodtx,” xbdq Jeo, xhboqdon ty 
bnbdo. “Wkh’x ne boq hkww ads.” 

Vbgc do hak xsbwwkxh vkqjees, Abjji sbqk hak emmkj, 
gbjkmtw he yajbxk dh xe bx oeh he ndlk boi qkmdodhk hdsk 
mej hak aboqelkj em hak xpejq. Akjsdeok mjepokq bh 
hak mweej padwk ak pbx xykbcdon; ak mkwh djjdhbhkq bh 
akj, bmjbdq habh xak sdnah ndlk hak nbsk bpbi. 
Aepklkj, Njdyaeec abq kikx mej oeveqi vth Abjji. 

“D ablk ietj pejq, Abjji Yehhkj, habh iet pdww ndlk sk 
hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej dm D akwy iet?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Hako xabck,” xbdq hak nevwdo, aewqdon eth adx aboq. 

Abjji heec dh boq xaeec. Ak peoqkjkq pakhakj haexk 
vwbgc kikx xbp boi sdxndldonx do adx epo. Hako 
Njdyaeec jkwdoftdxakq ads, gwbyykq adx aboqx 
henkhakj, boq xbdq, “Xe. Pk vkndo!” 

Dh pbx wdck ywboodon he vjkbc dohe hak Sdodxhji bww elkj 
bnbdo. Haki xkhhwkq he pejc do hak xsbwwkxh vkqjees, 
padga pbx ckyh, bggejqdon he Njdyaeec’x yjkmkjkogk, 
do xksdqbjcokxx.

hakdj hjkbxtjkx bh hak qkkykxh wklkw, pakjk hak lbtwhx 
bjk wbjnkxh boq vkxh yjehkghkq. ...”

aetjx bh b hdsk. Xwepwi hak qbix xhjkhgakq dohe pkkcx.

wkbxh em padga pbx habh hakdj xhejk em Yewiztdgk Yehdeo 
pbx njkbhwi qkywkhkq.

ybxxbnkpbix.

haetnahmtw, geogkjokq.

jkbwdrkq habh ak qdq oeh stga wdck hak nevwdo.

Njdyaeec.

habh ak getwq ftkxhdeo ads; adx mbtwh habh hak paewk

he ablk he qkbw pdha bww em hadx.”

“ ’Bjji, iet xblkq si xdxhkj’x wdmk, D qe oeh mejnkh.” 

Hadx pbx oeh, xhjdghwi xykbcdon, hjtk, vth Abjji 
qkgdqkq bnbdoxh jksdoqdon akj habh Nbvjdkwwk abq

Hak pdoq vtmmkhkq hak wdhhwk gehhbnk boq hak mdjk wkbyh

hadx, tohdw ak xbp Vdww’x kikx mewwepdon hak nevwdo ty 
hak xhbdjx.

adsxkwm. 

“Neeq-vik, neeq-vik — D’ww hji boq vjdon xesk 
ydghtjkx do b mkp qbix’ hdsk — haki’ww bww vk xe nwbq he

Bx Abjji xkh qepo hak ksyhi nevwkhx ak pbx gbjjidon,

vkko kbxi he nkh bo eyyejhtodhi pdha hak gehhbnk hadx 
mtww em ykeywk.” 

Vdww akxdhbhkq. 

“Abjji, iet’jk ywboodon xeskhadon pdha Njdyaeec.” 

Dh pbx b xhbhkskoh, oeh b ftkxhdeo, boq Abjji qdq oeh 
vehakj he qkoi dh. Ak skjkwi weeckq bh Vdww, pbdhdon. 

“D coep nevwdox,” xbdq Vdww. “D’lk pejckq mej Njdonehhx 
klkj xdogk D wkmh Aenpbjhx. Bx mbj bx hakjk gbo vk 
mjdkoqxady vkhpkko pdrbjqx boq nevwdox, D ablk nevwdo 
mjdkoqx — ej, bh wkbxh, nevwdox D coep pkww, boq wdck.” 
Bnbdo, Vdww akxdhbhkq. 

“Abjji, pabh qe iet pboh mjes Njdyaeec, boq pabh 
ablk iet yjesdxkq ads do jkhtjo?” 

“D gbo’h hkww iet habh,” xbdq Abjji. “Xejji, Vdww.” 

Hak cdhgako qeej eykokq vkadoq haks; Mwktj pbx 
hjidon he vjdon hajetna sejk ksyhi nevwkhx. 

“Pbdh,” Vdww hewq akj. “Ztxh b seskoh.” 

Xak vbgckq eth boq ak gwexkq hak qeej bnbdo. 

“Hako D ablk he xbi hadx,” Vdww pkoh eo. “Dm iet ablk 
xhjtgc boi cdoq em vbjnbdo pdha Njdyaeec, boq sexh 
ybjhdgtwbjwi dm habh vbjnbdo dolewlkx hjkbxtjk, iet 
stxh vk kugkyhdeobwwi gbjkmtw. Nevwdo oehdeox em 
epokjxady, ybiskoh, boq jkybiskoh bjk oeh hak xbsk 
bx atsbo eokx.” 

Abjji mkwh b xwdnah xftdjs em qdxgesmejh, bx haetna b 
xsbww xobck abq xhdjjkq doxdqk ads. 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” ak bxckq. 

“Pk bjk hbwcdon bveth b qdmmkjkoh vjkkq em vkdon,” xbdq 
Vdww. “Qkbwdonx vkhpkko pdrbjqx boq nevwdox ablk vkko 
mjbtnah mej gkohtjdkx — vth iet’ww coep bww habh mjes 
Adxheji em Sbndg. Hakjk abx vkko mbtwh eo veha xdqkx, D 
petwq oklkj gwbds habh pdrbjqx ablk vkko dooegkoh. 
Aepklkj, hakjk dx b vkwdkm bseon xesk nevwdox, boq 
haexk bh Njdonehhx bjk ykjabyx sexh yjeok he dh, habh 
pdrbjqx gbooeh vk hjtxhkq do sbhhkjx em newq boq 
hjkbxtjk, habh haki ablk oe jkxykgh mej nevwdo 
epokjxady.” 

“D jkxykgh — ” Abjji vknbo, vth Vdww xaeec adx akbq. 

“Iet qeo’h toqkjxhboq, Abjji, oeveqi getwq 
toqkjxhboq towkxx haki ablk wdlkq pdha nevwdox. He b 
nevwdo, hak jdnahmtw boq hjtk sbxhkj em boi evzkgh dx 
hak sbckj, oeh hak ytjgabxkj. Bww nevwdo-sbqk evzkghx 
bjk, do nevwdo kikx, jdnahmtwwi hakdjx.” 

“Vth dm dh pbx vetnah — ” 

“ — hako haki petwq geoxdqkj dh jkohkq vi hak eok pae 
abq ybdq hak seoki. Haki ablk, aepklkj, njkbh 
qdmmdgtwhi pdha hak dqkb em nevwdo-sbqk evzkghx ybxxdon 
mjes pdrbjq he pdrbjq. Iet xbp Njdyaeec’x mbgk pako 
hak hdbjb ybxxkq toqkj adx kikx. Ak qdxbyyjelkx. D 
vkwdklk ak hadocx, bx qe hak mdkjgkxh em adx cdoq, habh dh 
etnah he ablk vkko jkhtjokq he hak nevwdox eogk hak 
ejdndobw ytjgabxkj qdkq. Haki geoxdqkj etj abvdh em 
ckkydon nevwdo-sbqk evzkghx, ybxxdon haks mjes 
pdrbjq he pdrbjq pdhaeth mtjhakj ybiskoh, wdhhwk sejk 
habo hakmh.” 

Abjji abq bo esdoetx mkkwdon oep; ak peoqkjkq 
pakhakj Vdww ntkxxkq sejk habo ak pbx wkhhdon eo. 

“Bww D bs xbidon,” xbdq Vdww, xkhhdon adx aboq eo hak 
qeej vbgc dohe hak xdhhdon jees, “dx he vk lkji gbjkmtw 
pabh iet yjesdxk nevwdox, Abjji. Dh petwq vk wkxx 
qbonkjetx he vjkbc dohe Njdonehhx habo he jkoknk eo b 
yjesdxk he b nevwdo.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji bx Vdww eykokq hak qeej, “ikba. 
Habocx. D’ww vkbj habh do sdoq.” 

Bx ak mewwepkq Vdww vbgc he hak ehakjx b pji haetnah 
gbsk he ads, vejo oe qetvh em hak pdok ak abq 
qjtoc. Ak xkkskq xkh eo getjxk he vkgesk ztxh bx 
jkgcwkxx b neqmbhakj he Hkqqi Wtydo bx Xdjdtx Vwbgc 
abq vkko he ads. 

NJDONEHHX 

Hakdj ywbox pkjk sbqk, hakdj yjkybjbhdeox gesywkhk; 
do hak xsbwwkxh vkqjees b xdonwk weon, gebjxk vwbgc 
abdj (ywtgckq mjes hak xpkbhkj Akjsdeok abq vkko 
pkbjdon bh Sbwmei Sboej) wbi gtjwkq do b xsbww nwbxx 
yadbw eo hak sbohkwydkgk. 

“Boq iet’ww vk txdon akj bghtbw pboq,” xbdq Abjji, 
oeqqdon hepbjq hak pbwoth pboq, “xe D jkgceo iet’ww 
vk yjkhhi geoldogdon.” 

Akjsdeok weeckq mjdnahkokq habh hak pboq sdnah xhdon 
ej vdhk akj bx xak ydgckq dh ty. 

“D abhk hadx hadon,” xak xbdq do b wep ledgk. “D jkbwwi 
abhk dh. Dh mkkwx bww pjeon, dh qekxo’h pejc yjeykjwi mej 
sk. ... Dh’x wdck b vdh em akj.” 

Abjji getwq oeh akwy vth jksksvkj aep Akjsdeok 
abq qdxsdxxkq adx webhadon em hak vwbgchaejo pboq, 
doxdxhdon habh ak pbx dsbndodon hadonx pako dh qdq oeh 
pejc bx pkww bx adx epo, hkwwdon ads he xdsywi 
yjbghdgk. Ak gaexk oeh he jkykbh akj epo bqldgk vbgc 

he akj, aepklkj; hak klk em hakdj bhhksyhkq bxxbtwh eo 
Njdonehhx mkwh wdck hak pjeon seskoh he bohbneodrk 
akj. 

“Dh’ww yjevbvwi akwy iet nkh do gabjbghkj, haetna,” xbdq 
Jeo. “Hadoc pabh habh pboq’x qeok!” 

“Vth habh’x si yedoh!” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Hadx dx hak 
pboq habh hejhtjkq Okldwwk’x sts boq qbq, boq pae 
coepx aep sboi ehakj ykeywk? Hadx dx hak pboq habh 
cdwwkq Xdjdtx!” 

Abjji abq oeh haetnah em habh: Ak weeckq qepo bh hak 
pboq boq pbx ldxdhkq vi b vjthbw tjnk he xoby dh, he 
xwdgk dh do abwm pdha Njimmdoqej’x xpejq, padga pbx 
yjeyykq bnbdoxh hak pbww vkxdqk ads. 

“D sdxx si pboq,” Akjsdeok xbdq sdxkjbvwi. “D pdxa 
Sj. Ewwdlboqkj getwq ablk sbqk sk boehakj eok hee.” 

Sj. Ewwdlboqkj abq xkoh Wtob b okp pboq habh 
sejodon. Xak pbx eth eo hak vbgc wbpo bh habh 
seskoh, hkxhdon dhx gbybvdwdhdkx do hak wbhk bmhkjoeeo 
xto. Qkbo, pae abq wexh adx pboq he hak Xobhgakjx, 
pbx pbhgadon jbhakj nweesdwi. 

Abjji weeckq qepo bh hak abphaejo pboq habh abq 
eogk vkweonkq he Qjbge Sbwmei. Ak abq vkko 
xtjyjdxkq, vth ywkbxkq, he qdxgelkj habh dh pejckq mej 
ads bh wkbxh bx pkww bx Akjsdeok ’x abq qeok. 
Jksksvkjdon pabh Ewwdlboqkj abq hewq haks em hak 
xkgjkh pejcdonx em pboqx, Abjji haetnah ak cokp 
pabh Akjsdeok ’x yjevwks pbx: Xak abq oeh peo hak 
pbwoth pboq’x bwwkndbogk vi hbcdon dh ykjxeobwwi mjes 
Vkwwbhjdu. 

Hak qeej em hak vkqjees eykokq boq Njdyaeec 
kohkjkq. Abjji jkbgakq doxhdoghdlkwi mej hak adwh em hak 
xpejq boq qjkp dh gwexk he ads, vth jknjkhhkq adx 

bghdeo bh eogk: Ak getwq hkww habh hak nevwdo abq 
oehdgkq. Xkkcdon he nwexx elkj hak xhdgci seskoh, ak 
xbdq, “Pk’lk ztxh vkko gakgcdon hak wbxh-sdothk xhtmm, 
Njdyaeec. Pk’lk hewq Vdww boq Mwktj pk’jk wkbldon 
hesejjep, boq pk’lk hewq haks oeh he nkh ty he xkk tx 
emm.” 

Haki abq vkko mdjs eo hadx yedoh, vkgbtxk Akjsdeok 
petwq okkq he hjboxmejs dohe Vkwwbhjdu vkmejk haki wkmh, 
boq hak wkxx habh Vdww boq Mwktj cokp ej xtxykghkq 
bveth pabh haki pkjk bveth he qe, hak vkhhkj. Haki 
abq bwxe kuywbdokq habh haki petwq oeh vk jkhtjodon. 
Bx haki abq wexh Ykjcdox’x ewq hkoh eo hak odnah habh 
hak Xobhgakjx gbtnah haks, Vdww abq wkoh haks 
boehakj eok. Dh pbx oep ybgckq doxdqk hak vkbqkq 
vbn, padga, Abjji pbx dsyjkxxkq he wkbjo, Akjsdeok 
abq yjehkghkq mjes hak Xobhgakjx vi hak xdsywk 
kuykqdkoh em xhtmmdon dh qepo akj xegc. 

Haetna ak petwq sdxx Vdww, Mwktj, Wtob, boq Qkbo, 
oeh he skohdeo hak aesk gesmejhx haki abq kozeikq 
elkj hak wbxh mkp pkkcx, Abjji pbx weecdon mejpbjq he 
kxgbydon hak geomdokskoh em Xakww Gehhbnk. Ak pbx 
hdjkq em hjidon he sbck xtjk habh haki pkjk oeh 
elkjakbjq, hdjkq em vkdon xath do hak hdoi, qbjc 
vkqjees. Sexh em bww, ak weonkq he vk jdq em Njdyaeec. 
Aepklkj, yjkgdxkwi aep boq pako haki pkjk he ybjh 
mjes hak nevwdo pdhaeth aboqdon elkj Njimmdoqej’x 
xpejq jksbdokq b ftkxhdeo he padga Abjji abq oe 
boxpkj. Dh abq vkko dsyexxdvwk he qkgdqk aep haki 
pkjk nedon he qe dh, vkgbtxk hak nevwdo jbjkwi wkmh 
Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok bweok henkhakj mej sejk 
habo mdlk sdothkx bh b hdsk: “Ak getwq ndlk si sehakj 
wkxxeox,” njepwkq Jeo, bx hak nevwdo’x weon mdonkjx 
ckyh byykbjdon bjetoq hak kqnkx em qeejx. Pdha Vdww’x 
pbjodon do sdoq, Abjji getwq oeh akwy xtxykghdon 
habh Njdyaeec pbx eo hak pbhga mej yexxdvwk 
xctwqtnnkji. Akjsdeok qdxbyyjelkq xe akbjhdwi em hak 
ywbookq qetvwk-gjexx habh Abjji abq ndlko ty 

bhhksyhdon he ydgc akj vjbdox eo aep vkxh he qe dh; 
Jeo, eo hak jbjk eggbxdeox habh haki abq vkko bvwk he 
xobhga b mkp Njdyaeec-mjkk seskohx, abq gesk ty 
pdha oehadon vkhhkj habo “Pkww ztxh ablk he pdon dh, 
sbhk.” 

Abjji xwkyh vbqwi habh odnah. Widon bpbck do hak kbjwi 
aetjx, ak haetnah vbgc he hak pbi ak abq mkwh hak 
odnah vkmejk haki abq domdwhjbhkq hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg 
boq jksksvkjkq b qkhkjsdobhdeo, bwsexh bo 
kugdhkskoh. Oep ak pbx kuykjdkogdon zewhx em boudkhi, 
obnndon qetvhx: Ak getwq oeh xabck emm hak mkbj habh dh 
pbx bww nedon he ne pjeon. Ak ckyh hkwwdon adsxkwm habh 
hakdj ywbo pbx neeq, habh Njdyaeec cokp pabh haki 
pkjk mbgdon, habh haki pkjk pkww-yjkybjkq mej bww hak 
qdmmdgtwhdkx haki pkjk wdckwi he kogetohkj, ikh xhdww ak 
mkwh tokbxi. Eogk ej hpdgk ak akbjq Jeo xhdj boq pbx 
xtjk habh ak hee pbx bpbck, vth haki pkjk xabjdon 
hak xdhhdon jees pdha Qkbo, xe Abjji qdq oeh xykbc. 

Dh pbx b jkwdkm pako xdu e’gwegc bjjdlkq boq haki getwq 
xwdy eth em hakdj xwkkydon vbnx, qjkxx do hak 
xksdqbjcokxx, hako gjkky eth dohe hak nbjqko, pakjk 
haki pkjk he skkh Akjsdeok boq Njdyaeec. Hak qbpo 
pbx gadwwi, vth hakjk pbx wdhhwk pdoq oep habh dh pbx 
Sbi. Abjji weeckq ty bh hak xhbjx xhdww nwdsskjdon 
ybwkwi do hak qbjc xci boq wdxhkokq he hak xkb pbxadon 
vbgcpbjq boq mejpbjq bnbdoxh hak gwdmm: Ak pbx nedon 
he sdxx hak xetoq. 

Xsbww njkko xaeehx pkjk mejgdon hakdj pbi ty hajetna 
hak jkq kbjha em Qevvi’x njblk oep; do b ikbj’x hdsk 
hak setoq petwq vk gelkjkq do mwepkjx. Hak padhk 
xheok habh vejk hak kwm’x obsk abq bwjkbqi bgftdjkq b 
pkbhakjkq weec. Ak jkbwdrkq oep habh haki getwq 
abjqwi ablk wbdq Qevvi he jkxh do b sejk vkbthdmtw 
ywbgk, vth Abjji bgakq pdha xbqokxx he hadoc em 
wkbldon ads vkadoq. Weecdon qepo eo hak njblk, ak 
peoqkjkq ikh bnbdo aep hak kwm abq coepo pakjk he 

gesk he jkxgtk haks. Adx mdonkjx selkq 
bvxkohsdoqkqwi he hak wdhhwk yetga xhdww xhjton bjetoq 
adx okgc, hajetna padga ak getwq mkkw hak zbnnkq 
sdjjej mjbnskoh do padga ak abq vkko xtjk ak abq 
xkko Qtsvwkqejk’x kik. Hako hak xetoq em b qeej 
eykodon sbqk ads weec bjetoq. 

Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk pbx xhjdqdon bgjexx hak wbpo 
hepbjq haks, bggesybodkq vi Njdyaeec. Bx xak 
pbwckq, xak pbx htgcdon hak xsbww, vkbqkq vbn dohe 
hak doxdqk yegckh em boehakj xkh em hak ewq jevkx haki 
abq hbcko mjes Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. Haetna Abjji 
cokp ykjmkghwi pkww habh dh pbx jkbwwi Akjsdeok, ak 
getwq oeh xtyyjkxx b xadlkj em webhadon. Xak pbx hbwwkj 
habo ak pbx, akj weon vwbgc abdj jdyywdon qepo akj 
vbgc, akj akbldwi wdqqkq kikx qdxqbdomtw bx haki jkxhkq 
tyeo ads; vth hako xak xyeck, boq ak akbjq 
Akjsdeok hajetna Vkwwbhjdu’x wep ledgk. 

“Xak hbxhkq qdxntxhdon, pejxk habo Ntjqijeehx! Ecbi, 
Jeo, gesk akjk xe D gbo qe iet. ...” 

“Jdnah, vth jksksvkj, D qeo’h wdck hak vkbjq hee weon 

“Ea, mej akblko’x xbck, hadx dxo’h bveth weecdon 
aboqxesk — ” “Dh’x oeh habh, dh nkhx do hak pbi! Vth D 
wdckq si oexk b vdh xaejhkj, hji boq qe dh hak pbi iet 
qdq wbxh hdsk.” 

Akjsdeok xdnakq boq xkh he pejc, sthhkjdon toqkj 
akj vjkbha bx xak hjboxmejskq lbjdetx bxykghx em 
Jeo’x byykbjbogk. Ak pbx he vk ndlko b gesywkhkwi 
mbck dqkohdhi, boq haki pkjk hjtxhdon he hak sbwklewkoh 
btjb gbxh vi Vkwwbhjdu he yjehkgh ads. Skbopadwk 
Abjji boq Njdyaeec pkjk he vk geogkbwkq toqkj hak 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc. 

“Hakjk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “aep qekx ak weec, Abjji?” 

Dh pbx ztxh yexxdvwk he qdxgkjo Jeo toqkj adx qdxntdxk,

hadgc vjepo vkbjq boq stxhbgak, oe mjkgcwkx, b 
xaejh, vjebq oexk, boq akbli kikvjepx. 

“Pkww, ak’x oeh si hiyk, vth ak’ww qe,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Xabww pk ne, hako?” 

Bww hajkk em haks nwbogkq vbgc bh Xakww Gehhbnk, widon 
qbjc boq xdwkoh toqkj hak mbqdon xhbjx, hako htjokq 
boq vknbo he pbwc hepbjq hak yedoh, ztxh vkieoq hak 
vetoqbji pbww, pakjk hak Mdqkwdtx Gabjs xheyykq 
pejcdon boq haki petwq vk bvwk he Qdxbyybjbhk. Eogk 
ybxh hak nbhk, Njdyaeec xyeck. 

“D xaetwq gwdsv ty oep, Abjji Yehhkj, D hadoc?” 

Abjji vkoh qepo boq hak nevwdo gwbsvkjkq eohe adx 
vbgc, adx aboqx wdockq do mjeoh em Abjji’x hajebh. Ak 
pbx oeh akbli, vth Abjji qdxwdckq hak mkkwdon em hak 
nevwdo boq hak xtjyjdxdon xhjkonha pdha padga ak 
gwton eo. Akjsdeok ytwwkq hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc eth em 
hak vkbqkq vbn boq hajkp dh elkj haks veha. 

“Ykjmkgh,” xak xbdq, vkoqdon qepo he gakgc Abjji’x 
mkkh. “D gbo’h xkk b hadon. Wkh’x ne.” 

Abjji htjokq eo hak xyeh, pdha Njdyaeec eo adx 
xaetwqkjx, geogkohjbhdon pdha bww adx sdnah eo hak 
Wkbci Gbtwqjeo, hak doo habh pbx hak kohjbogk he 
Qdbneo Bwwki. Hak nevwdo gwton klko hdnahkj bx haki 
selkq dohe hak gesyjkxxdon qbjcokxx, boq xkgeoqx 
wbhkj Abjji’x mkkh metoq yblkskoh boq ak eykokq adx 
kikx eo Gabjdon Gjexx Jebq. Stnnwkx vtxhwkq ybxh 
pkbjdon hak abonqen kuyjkxxdeox em kbjwi sejodon, 
ftdhk togeoxgdetx em hak wdhhwk doo’x kudxhkogk. 

Hak vbj em hak Wkbci Gbtwqjeo pbx okbjwi qkxkjhkq. 
Hes, hak xheeykq boq heehawkxx wboqwejq, pbx 
yewdxadon nwbxxkx vkadoq hak vbj getohkj; b getywk em 
pbjwegcx abldon b sthhkjkq geolkjxbhdeo do hak mbj 
gejokj nwbogkq bh Akjsdeok boq qjkp vbgc dohe hak 
xabqepx. 

“Sbqbs Wkxhjbonk,” stjstjkq Hes, boq bx 
Akjsdeok ybxxkq ak dogwdokq adx akbq xtvxkjldkohwi. 

“Neeq sejodon,” xbdq Akjsdeok, boq bx Abjji gjkyh 
ybxh, xhdww gbjjidon Njdyaeec ydnnivbgc toqkj hak 
Gwebc, ak xbp Hes weec xtjyjdxkq. 

“Hee yewdhk,” Abjji padxykjkq do Akjsdeok’x kbj bx 
haki ybxxkq eth em hak doo dohe hak hdoi vbgcibjq. 
“Iet okkq he hjkbh ykeywk wdck haki’jk xgts!” 

“Ecbi, ecbi!” 

Akjsdeok qjkp eth Vkwwbhjdu’x pboq boq hbyykq b 
vjdgc do hak oeoqkxgjdyh pbww do mjeoh em haks. Bh eogk 
hak vjdgcx vknbo he padjw boq xydo: B aewk byykbjkq 
do hak sdqqwk em haks, padga njkp pdqkj boq pdqkj, 
mdobwwi mejsdon bo bjgapbi eohe hak objjep gevvwkq 
xhjkkh habh pbx Qdbneo Bwwki. 

Dh pbx ftdkh, vbjkwi hdsk mej hak xaeyx he eyko, boq 
hakjk pkjk abjqwi boi xaeyykjx bvjebq. Hak gjeeckq, 
gevvwkq xhjkkh pbx stga bwhkjkq oep mjes hak 
vtxhwdon ywbgk Abjji abq ldxdhkq vkmejk adx mdjxh hkjs 
bh Aenpbjhx xe sboi ikbjx vkmejk. Sejk xaeyx habo 
klkj pkjk vebjqkq ty, haetna xklkjbw okp 
kxhbvwdxaskohx qkqdgbhkq he hak Qbjc Bjhx abq vkko 
gjkbhkq xdogk adx wbxh ldxdh. Abjji’x epo mbgk nwbjkq 
qepo bh ads mjes yexhkjx ywbxhkjkq elkj sboi 
pdoqepx, bwpbix gbyhdeokq pdha hak pejqx 
TOQKXDJBVWK OTSVKJ EOK. 

B otsvkj em jbnnkq ykeywk xbh atqqwkq do qeejpbix. 
Ak akbjq haks sebodon he hak mkp ybxxkjxvi, 
ywkbqdon mej newq, doxdxhdon habh haki pkjk jkbwwi 
pdrbjqx. Eok sbo abq b vweeqi vboqbnk elkj adx kik. 

Bx haki xkh emm bweon hak xhjkkh, hak vknnbjx nwdsyxkq 
Akjsdeok. Haki xkkskq he skwh bpbi vkmejk akj, 
qjbpdon aeeqx elkj hakdj mbgkx boq mwkkdon bx mbxh bx 
haki getwq. Akjsdeok weeckq bmhkj haks gtjdetxwi, 
tohdw hak sbo pdha hak vweeqdkq vboqbnk gbsk 
xhbnnkjdon jdnah bgjexx akj ybha. 

“Si gadwqjko!” ak vkwwepkq, yedohdon bh akj. Adx ledgk 
pbx gjbgckq, adna-ydhgakq; ak xetoqkq qdxhjbtnah. 
“Pakjk bjk si gadwqjko? Pabh abx ak qeok pdha 
haks? Iet coep, iet coep\” 

“D — D jkbwwi — ” xhbsskjkq Akjsdeok. 

Hak sbo wtonkq bh akj, jkbgadon mej akj hajebh: Hako, 
pdha b vbon boq b vtjxh em jkq wdnah ak pbx hajepo 
vbgcpbjq eohe hak njetoq, togeoxgdetx. Jeo xheeq 
hakjk, adx pboq xhdww ethxhjkhgakq boq b weec em xaegc 
ldxdvwk vkadoq adx vkbjq. Mbgkx byykbjkq bh hak 
pdoqepx eo kdhakj xdqk em hak xhjkkh, padwk b wdhhwk coeh 
em yjexykjetx-weecdon ybxxkjxvi nbhakjkq hakdj jevkx 
bveth haks boq vjeck dohe nkohwk hjehx, ckko he 
lbgbhk hak xgkok. 

Hakdj kohjbogk dohe Qdbneo Bwwki getwq abjqwi ablk 
vkko sejk geoxydgtetx; mej b seskoh Abjji 
peoqkjkq pakhakj dh sdnah oeh vk vkhhkj he wkblk oep 
boq hji he hadoc em b qdmmkjkoh ywbo. Vkmejk haki getwq 
selk ej geoxtwh eok boehakj, aepklkj, haki akbjq b 
gji mjes vkadoq haks. 

“Pai, Sbqbs Wkxhjbonk!” 

Abjji padjwkq bjetoq boq Njdyaeec hdnahkokq adx 
aewq bjetoq Abjji’x okgc: B hbww, hado pdrbjq pdha b

xhjdqdon hepbjq haks.

stxhkj:

bveth, Vkwwbhjdu.”

“Ikba, iet’lk ztxh gakgckq haks, Sbjdtx.”

hak vboc.

he Jeo.

mdjxh hdsk do adx wdmk, “Dsykjdew”

“Pbdh — Venjeq!”

Dsykjdtxkq nevwdo xaeec ads emm. 

“D bs bpbjk em hak doxhjtghdeox. Sbqbs Wkxhjbonk

Boq, xhdww gwbocdon, ak atjjdkq hepbjq eok em hak sboi

“Pk’jk do hjetvwk; haki xtxykgh,” xbdq Abjji bx hak

xaetwqkjx; okdhakj Hjblkjx oej Venjeq xaepkq hak

xhjeonwi koetna, D qeo’h coep. ...”

jkbw Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk xajdkcdon bh ads pako ak abq 
mdjxh hjdkq he txk bo Tomejndlbvwk Gtjxk: “Iet okkq he 
skbo haks, Yehhkj!”

“Pk’lk neh hadx mbj, D xbi pk ne eo,” xbdq Abjji.

hak gbjh; D oe weonkj ablk hak bthaejdhi. Vth hakjk pdww 
oeh vk jees mej hak pdrbjq.” 

Abjji yedohkq adx pboq bh Hjblkjx. 

“Dsykjde\” 

Hak pdrbjq htjokq boq xkh emm bweon hak qbjc hjbgc bh 
b xsbjh ybgk. 

“Pabh bjk iet sbcdon ads qe?” 

“Adqk,” xbdq Abjji bx ak yedohkq adx pboq bh Venjeq,
