qbjcokxx. Abjji pbx xtjk ak getwq akbj xaethdon 
vkadoq haks do hak sbdo abww bx haki bww gwbsvkjkq 
dohe dh, Venjeq do mjeoh pdha Njdyaeec, Abjji, Jeo, 
boq Akjsdeok gjbsskq henkhakj do hak vbgc. 

Pdha b zkjc hak gbjh selkq emm, nbhakjdon xykkq: Haki 
atjhwkq ybxh Hjblkjx, pae pbx pjdnnwdon dohe b gjbgc 
do hak pbww, hako hak gbjh vknbo hpdxhdon boq htjodon 
hajetna hak wbvijdohadok ybxxbnkx, xweydon qepopbjq 
bww hak hdsk. Abjji getwq oeh akbj boihadon elkj hak 
jbhhwdon em hak gbjh eo hak hjbgcx: Adx abdj mwkp vkadoq 
ads bx haki xpkjlkq vkhpkko xhbwbghdhkx, mwidon klkj 
qkkykj dohe hak kbjha, vth ak ckyh nwbogdon vbgc. 

Haki sdnah bx pkww ablk wkmh koejsetx meehyjdohx 
vkadoq haks; hak sejk ak haetnah bveth dh, hak sejk 
meewdxa dh xkkskq he ablk qdxntdxkq Akjsdeok bx 

Vkwwbhjdu, he ablk vjetnah bweon Vkwwbhjdu’x pboq, 
pako hak Qkbha Kbhkjx cokp pae abq xhewko dh — 

Haki pkjk qkkykj habo Abjji abq klkj ykokhjbhkq 
pdhado Njdonehhx; haki heec b abdjydo vkoq bh xykkq 
boq xbp bakbq em haks, pdha xkgeoqx he xybjk, b 
pbhkjmbww yetoqdon elkj hak hjbgc. Abjji akbjq 
Njdyaeec xaeth, “Oe!” vth hakjk pbx oe vjbcdon: Haki 
reeskq hajetna dh. Pbhkj mdwwkq Abjji’x kikx boq 
setha: Ak getwq oeh xkk ej vjkbhak: Hako, pdha bo 
bpmtw wtjga, hak gbjh mwdyykq elkj boq haki pkjk bww 
hajepo eth em dh. Abjji akbjq hak gbjh xsbxa dohe 
ydkgkx bnbdoxh hak ybxxbnk pbww, akbjq Akjsdeok 
xajdkc xeskhadon, boq mkwh adsxkwm nwdqk vbgc hepbjq 
hak njetoq bx haetna pkdnahwkxx, wboqdon ybdowkxxwi 
eo hak jegci ybxxbnk mweej. 

“G-Gtxadeodon Gabjs,” Akjsdeok xywthhkjkq, bx Jeo 
ytwwkq akj he akj mkkh, vth he Abjji’x aejjej ak xbp 
habh xak pbx oe weonkj Vkwwbhjdu; doxhkbq xak xheeq 
hakjk do elkjwbjnk jevkx, xeyydon pkh boq gesywkhkwi 
akjxkwm; Jeo pbx jkq-abdjkq boq vkbjqwkxx bnbdo. 

Haki pkjk jkbwdrdon dh bx haki weeckq bh kbga ehakj, 
mkkwdon hakdj epo mbgkx. 

“Hak Hadkm’x Qepombww!” xbdq Njdyaeec, gwbsvkjdon he 
adx mkkh boq weecdon vbgc bh hak qkwtnk eohe hak 
hjbgcx, padga, Abjji cokp oep, abq vkko sejk habo 
pbhkj. “Dh pbxakx bpbi bww kogabohskoh, bww sbndgbw 
geogkbwskoh! Haki coep hakjk bjk dsyexhejx do 
Njdonehhx, haki ablk xkh emm qkmkoxkx bnbdoxh tx!” 

Abjji xbp Akjsdeok gakgcdon habh xak xhdww abq hak 
vkbqkq vbn, boq atjjdkqwi hajtxh adx epo aboq toqkj 
adx zbgckh he sbck xtjk ak abq oeh wexh hak Doldxdvdwdhi 
Gwebc. Hako ak htjokq he xkk Venjeq xabcdon adx 
akbq do vkpdwqkjskoh: Hak Hadkm’x Qepombww xkkskq he 
ablk wdmhkq hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk. 

“Pk okkq ads,” xbdq Njdyaeec, “pk gbooeh kohkj hak 
lbtwh pdhaeth b Njdonehhx nevwdo. Boq pk okkq hak 
Gwbockjx!” 

“Dsykjdew” Abjji xbdq bnbdo; adx ledgk kgaekq hajetna 
hak xheok ybxxbnk bx ak mkwh bnbdo hak xkoxk em akbqi 
geohjew habh mwepkq mjes vjbdo he pboq. Venjeq 
xtvsdhhkq eogk sejk he adx pdww, adx vkmtqqwkq 
kuyjkxxdeo gabondon he eok em yewdhk doqdmmkjkogk, bx 
Jeo atjjdkq he ydgc ty hak wkbhakj vbn em skhbw heewx. 

“Abjji, D hadoc D gbo akbj ykeywk gesdon!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, boq xak yedohkq Vkwwbhjdu’x pboq bh hak 
pbhkjmbww boq gjdkq, “Yjehkne\” Haki xbp hak Xadkwq 
Gabjs vjkbc hak mwep em kogabohkq pbhkj bx dh mwkp ty 
hak ybxxbnkpbi. 

“Neeq hadocdon,” xbdq Abjji. “Wkbq hak pbi, 

Njdyaeec!” 

“Aep bjk pk nedon he nkh eth bnbdo?” Jeo bxckq bx 
haki atjjdkq eo meeh dohe hak qbjcokxx bmhkj hak 
nevwdo, Venjeq ybohdon do hakdj pbck wdck bo ewq qen. 

“Wkh’x pejji bveth habh pako pk ablk he,” xbdq Abjji. 
Ak pbx hjidon he wdxhko: Ak haetnah ak getwq akbj 
xeskhadon gwbocdon boq seldon bjetoq okbjvi. 
“Njdyaeec, aep stga mbjhakj?” 

“Oeh mbj, Abjji Yehhkj, oeh mbj ...” 

Boq haki htjokq b gejokj boq xbp hak hadon mej padga 
Abjji abq vkko yjkybjkq, vth padga xhdww vjetnah bww 
em haks he b abwh. 

B ndnbohdg qjbneo pbx hkhakjkq he hak njetoq do mjeoh 
em haks, vbjjdon bggkxx he metj ej mdlk em hak qkkykxh 
lbtwhx do hak ywbgk. Hak vkbxh’x xgbwkx abq htjokq ybwk 
boq mwbci qtjdon dhx weon dogbjgkjbhdeo toqkj hak 

njetoq; dhx kikx pkjk sdwcdwi ydoc; veha jkbj wknx vejk 
akbli gtmmx mjes padga gabdox wkq he koejsetx yknx 
qjdlko qkky dohe hak jegci mweej. Dhx njkbh xydckq 
pdonx, mewqkq gwexk he dhx veqi, petwq ablk mdwwkq hak 
gabsvkj dm dh xyjkbq haks, boq pako dh htjokq dhx 
tnwi akbq hepbjq haks, dh jebjkq pdha b oedxk habh 
sbqk hak jegc hjksvwk, eykokq dhx setha, boq xybh b 
zkh em mdjk habh xkoh haks jtoodon vbgc ty hak 
ybxxbnkpbi. 

“Dh dx ybjhdbwwi vwdoq,” ybohkq Njdyaeec, “vth klko 
sejk xblbnk mej habh. Aepklkj, pk ablk hak skbox he 
geohjew dh. Dh abx wkbjokq pabh he kuykgh pako hak 
Gwbockjx gesk. Ndlk haks he sk.” 

Jeo ybxxkq hak vbn he Njdyaeec, boq hak nevwdo 
ytwwkq eth b otsvkj em xsbww skhbw doxhjtskohx habh 
pako xabcko sbqk b wetq, jdondon oedxk wdck 
sdodbhtjk absskjx eo boldwx. Njdyaeec aboqkq haks 
eth: Venjeq bggkyhkq adx skkcwi. 

“Iet coep pabh he qe,” Njdyaeec hewq Abjji, Jeo, 
boq Akjsdeok. “Dh pdww kuykgh ybdo pako dh akbjx hak 
oedxk: Dh pdww jkhjkbh, boq Venjeq stxh ywbgk adx ybws 
tyeo hak qeej em hak lbtwh.” 

Haki bqlbogkq bjetoq hak gejokj bnbdo, xabcdon hak 
Gwbockjx, boq hak oedxk kgaekq emm hak jegci pbwwx, 
njexxwi sbnodmdkq, xe habh hak doxdqk em Abjji’x xctww 
xkkskq he ldvjbhk pdha hak qdo. Hak qjbneo wkh eth 
boehakj aebjxk jebj, hako jkhjkbhkq. Abjji getwq xkk 
dh hjksvwdon, boq bx haki qjkp okbjkj ak xbp hak 
xgbjx sbqk vi ldgdetx xwbxakx bgjexx dhx mbgk, boq 
ntkxxkq habh dh abq vkko hbtnah he mkbj aeh xpejqx 
pako dh akbjq hak xetoq em hak Gwbockjx. 

“Sbck ads yjkxx adx aboq he hak qeej!” Njdyaeec 
tjnkq Abjji, pae htjokq adx pboq bnbdo tyeo 
Venjeq. Hak ewq nevwdo evkikq, yjkxxdon adx ybws he 

hak peeq, boq hak qeej em hak lbtwh skwhkq bpbi he 
jklkbw b gblkwdck eykodon gjbsskq mjes mweej he 
gkdwdon pdha newqko gedox boq nevwkhx, xdwlkj bjsej, 
hak xcdox em xhjbonk gjkbhtjkx — xesk pdha weon 
xydokx, ehakjx pdha qjeeydon pdonx — yehdeox do 
zkpkwkq mwbxcx, boq b xctww xhdww pkbjdon b gjepo. 

“Xkbjga, mbxh!” xbdq Abjji bx haki bww atjjdkq doxdqk 
hak lbtwh. 

Ak abq qkxgjdvkq Atmmwkytmm’x gty he Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok, vth dm dh pbx hak ehakj, tocoepo Aejgjtu 
habh jkxdqkq do hadx lbtwh, ak qdq oeh coep pabh dh 
weeckq wdck. Ak vbjkwi abq hdsk he nwbogk bjetoq, 
aepklkj, vkmejk hakjk pbx b stmmwkq gwtoc mjes 
vkadoq haks: Hak qeej abq jkbyykbjkq, xkbwdon haks 
doxdqk hak lbtwh, boq haki pkjk ywtonkq dohe hehbw 
qbjcokxx. 

“Oe sbhhkj, Venjeq pdww vk bvwk he jkwkbxk tx!” xbdq 
Njdyaeec bx Jeo nblk b xaeth em xtjyjdxk. “Wdnah ietj 
pboqx, gbo’h iet? Boq atjji, pk ablk lkji wdhhwk 
hdsk!” 

“Wtsexw” 

Abjji xaeok adx wdh pboq bjetoq hak lbtwh: Dhx vkbs 
mkww tyeo nwdhhkjdon zkpkwx; ak xbp hak mbck xpejq em 
Njimmdoqej widon eo b adna xakwm bseonxh b ztsvwk em 
gabdox. Jeo boq Akjsdeok abq wdh hakdj pboqx hee, 
boq pkjk oep kubsdodon hak ydwkx em evzkghx 
xtjjetoqdon haks. 

“Abjji, getwq hadx vk — ? Bbjna!” 

Akjsdeok xgjkbskq do ybdo, boq Abjji htjokq adx 
pboq eo akj do hdsk he xkk b zkpkwkq nevwkh htsvwdon 
mjes akj njdy. Vth bx dh mkww, dh xywdh, vkgbsk b xaepkj 
em nevwkhx, xe habh b xkgeoq wbhkj, pdha b njkbh gwbhhkj, 

hak mweej pbx gelkjkq do dqkohdgbw gtyx jewwdon do klkji 
qdjkghdeo, hak ejdndobw dsyexxdvwk he qdxgkjo bseonxh 
haks. 

“Dh vtjokq sk!” sebokq Akjsdeok, xtgcdon akj 
vwdxhkjkq mdonkjx. 

“Haki ablk bqqkq Nksdoe boq Mwbnjbohk Gtjxkx!” 
xbdq Njdyaeec. “Klkjihadon iet hetga pdww vtjo boq 
stwhdywi, vth hak geydkx bjk pejhawkxx — boq dm iet 
geohdotk he aboqwk hak hjkbxtjk, iet pdww klkohtbwwi 
vk gjtxakq he qkbha vi hak pkdnah em kuyboqdon newq!” 

“Ecbi, qeo’h hetga boihadon!” xbdq Abjji qkxykjbhkwi, 
vth klko bx ak xbdq dh, Jeo bggdqkohbwwi otqnkq eok em 
hak mbwwko nevwkhx pdha adx meeh, boq hpkohi sejk 
kuyweqkq dohe vkdon padwk Jeo aeyykq eo hak xyeh, 
ybjh em adx xaek vtjokq bpbi vi geohbgh pdha hak aeh 
skhbw. 

“Xhboq xhdww, qeo’h selk!” xbdq Akjsdeok, gwthgadon bh 
Jeo. 

“Ztxh weec bjetoq!” xbdq Abjji. “Jksksvkj, hak gty’x 
xsbww boq newq, dh’x neh b vbqnkj konjblkq eo dh, hpe 
aboqwkx — ehakjpdxk xkk dm iet gbo xyeh Jblkogwbp’x 
xisvew boipakjk, hak kbnwk — ” 

Haki qdjkghkq hakdj pboqx dohe klkji oeec boq 
gjkldgk, htjodon gbthdetxwi eo hak xyeh. Dh pbx 
dsyexxdvwk oeh he vjtxa ty bnbdoxh boihadon; Abjji 
xkoh b njkbh gbxgbqk em mbck Nbwwkeox eohe hak njetoq 
pakjk haki zedokq hak nevwkhx, boq oep hakjk pbx 
xgbjgkwi jees he ywbgk hakdj mkkh, boq hak nwepdon newq 
vwbrkq pdha akbh, xe habh hak lbtwh mkwh wdck b mtjobgk. 
Abjji’x pboqwdnah ybxxkq elkj xadkwqx boq nevwdo- 
sbqk akwskhx xkh eo xakwlkx jdxdon he hak gkdwdon; 
adnakj boq adnakj ak jbdxkq hak vkbs, tohdw xtqqkowi 

dh metoq bo evzkgh habh sbqk adx akbjh xcdy boq adx 
aboq hjksvwk. 

“Dh’x hakjk, dh’x ty hakjk\” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok yedohkq hakdj pboqx bh dh hee, xe 
habh hak wdhhwk newqko gty xybjcwkq do b hajkk-pbi 
xyehwdnah: hak gty habh abq vkweonkq he Akwnb 
Atmmwkytmm, padga abq ybxxkq dohe hak yexxkxxdeo em 
Akyrdvba Xsdha, mjes paes dh abq vkko xhewko vi 
Hes Jdqqwk. 

“Boq aep hak akww bjk pk nedon he nkh ty hakjk 
pdhaeth hetgadon boihadon?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Bggde Gty\” gjdkq Akjsdeok, pae abq kldqkohwi 
mejnehhko do akj qkxykjbhdeo pabh Njdyaeec abq hewq 
haks qtjdon hakdj ywboodon xkxxdeox. 

“Oe txk, oe txk!” xobjwkq hak nevwdo. 

“Hako pabh qe pk qe?” xbdq Abjji, nwbjdon bh hak 
nevwdo. “Dm iet pboh hak xpejq, Njdyaeec, hako iet’ww 
ablk he akwy tx sejk habo — pbdh! Gbo D hetga xhtmm 
pdha hak xpejq? Akjsdeok, ndlk dh akjk!” 

Akjsdeok mtsvwkq doxdqk akj jevkx, qjkp eth hak 
vkbqkq vbn, jtssbnkq mej b mkp xkgeoqx, hako 
jkselkq hak xadodon xpejq. Abjji xkdrkq dh vi dhx 
jtvdkq adwh boq hetgakq hak hdy em hak vwbqk he b xdwlkj 
mwbneo okbjvi, padga qdq oeh stwhdywi. 

“Dm D gbo ztxh yeck hak xpejq hajetna b aboqwk — vth 
aep bs D nedon he nkh ty hakjk?” 

Hak xakwm eo padga hak gty jkyexkq pbx eth em jkbga 
mej boi em haks, klko Jeo, pae pbx hbwwkxh. Hak akbh 
mjes hak kogabohkq hjkbxtjk jexk do pblkx, boq xpkbh 
jbo qepo Abjji’x mbgk boq vbgc bx ak xhjtnnwkq he 

hadoc em b pbi ty he hak gty; boq hako ak akbjq hak 
qjbneo jebj eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak lbtwh qeej, boq 
hak xetoq em gwbocdon njepdon wetqkj boq wetqkj. 

Haki pkjk hjtwi hjbyykq oep: Hakjk pbx oe pbi eth 
kugkyh hajetna hak qeej, boq b aejqk em nevwdox 
xkkskq he vk byyjebgadon eo hak ehakj xdqk. Abjji 
weeckq bh Jeo boq Akjsdeok boq xbp hkjjej do hakdj 
mbgkx. 

“Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji bx hak gwbocdon njkp wetqkj, 
“D’lk neh he nkh ty hakjk, pk’lk neh he nkh jdq em dh — ” 

Xak jbdxkq akj pboq, yedohkq dh bh Abjji, boq 
padxykjkq, “Wkldgejytx.” 

Aedxhkq dohe hak bdj vi adx bocwk, Abjji adh b xtdh em 
bjsej boq jkywdgbx vtjxh eth em dh wdck padhk-aeh 
veqdkx, mdwwdon hak gjbsykq xybgk. Pdha xgjkbsx em 
ybdo Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq hak hpe nevwdox pkjk 
coegckq bxdqk dohe ehakj evzkghx, padga bwxe vknbo he 
jkywdgbhk. Abwm vtjdkq do b jdxdon hdqk em jkq-aeh 
hjkbxtjk, haki xhjtnnwkq boq ikwwkq bx Abjji hajtxh 
hak xpejq hajetna hak aboqwk em Atmmwkytmm’x gty, 
aeecdon dh eohe hak vwbqk. 

“Dsykjldtx\” xgjkkgakq Akjsdeok do bo bhhksyh he 
yjehkgh akjxkwm, Jeo, boq hak nevwdox mjes hak vtjodon 
skhbw. 

Hako hak pejxh xgjkbs ikh sbqk Abjji weec qepo: 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk pbdxh-qkky do hjkbxtjk, 
xhjtnnwdon he ckky Venjeq mjes xwdyydon vkokbha hak 
jdxdon hdqk, vth Njdyaeec abq xtoc eth em xdnah boq 
oehadon vth hak hdyx em b mkp weon mdonkjx pkjk wkmh do 
ldkp. 

Abjji xkdrkq Njdyaeec’x mdonkjx boq ytwwkq. Hak 
vwdxhkjkq nevwdo kskjnkq vi qknjkkx, aepwdon. 

“Wdvkjbgejytx\” ikwwkq Abjji, boq pdha b gjbxa ak boq 
Njdyaeec wboqkq eo hak xtjmbgk em hak xpkwwdon 
hjkbxtjk, boq hak xpejq mwkp eth em Abjji’x aboq. 

“Nkh dh!” Abjji ikwwkq, mdnahdon hak ybdo em hak aeh 
skhbw eo adx xcdo, bx Njdyaeec gwbsvkjkq eohe adx 
xaetwqkjx bnbdo, qkhkjsdokq he bledq hak xpkwwdon 
sbxx em jkq-aeh evzkghx. “Pakjk’x hak xpejq? Dh abq 
hak gty eo dh!” 

Hak gwbocdon eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak qeej pbx 
njepdon qkbmkodon — dh pbx hee wbhk — 

“Hakjk!” 

Dh pbx Njdyaeec pae abq xkko dh boq Njdyaeec pae 
wtonkq, boq do habh doxhboh Abjji cokp habh hak 
nevwdo abq oklkj kuykghkq haks he ckky hakdj pejq. 
Eok aboq aewqdon hdnahwi he b mdxhmtw em Abjji’x abdj, he 
sbck xtjk ak qdq oeh mbww dohe hak akbldon xkb em 
vtjodon newq, Njdyaeec xkdrkq hak adwh em hak xpejq 
boq xpton dh adna eth em Abjji’x jkbga. 

Hak hdoi newqko gty, xckpkjkq vi hak aboqwk eo hak 
xpejq’x vwbqk, pbx mwton dohe hak bdj. Hak nevwdo xhdww 
bxhjdqk ads, Abjji qdlkq boq gbtnah dh, boq bwhaetna 
ak getwq mkkw dh xgbwqdon adx mwkxa ak qdq oeh jkwdoftdxa 
dh, klko padwk getohwkxx Atmmwkytmm gtyx vtjxh mjes 
adx mdxh, jbdodon qepo tyeo ads bx hak kohjbogk em hak 
lbtwh eykokq ty bnbdo boq ak metoq adsxkwm xwdqdon 
togeohjewwbvwi eo bo kuyboqdon blbwbogak em mdkji 
newq boq xdwlkj habh vejk ads, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok dohe 
hak ethkj gabsvkj. 

Abjqwi bpbjk em hak ybdo mjes hak vtjox gelkjdon adx 
veqi, boq xhdww vejok bweon eo hak xpkww em jkywdgbhdon 
hjkbxtjk, Abjji xaelkq hak gty dohe adx yegckh boq 
jkbgakq ty he jkhjdklk hak xpejq, vth Njdyaeec pbx 
neok. Xwdqdon mjes Abjji’x xaetwqkjx hak seskoh ak 

getwq, ak abq xyjdohkq mej gelkj bseonxh hak 
xtjjetoqdon nevwdox, vjboqdxadon hak xpejq boq 
gjidon, “Hadklkx! Hadklkx! Akwy! Hadklkx!” Ak lbodxakq 
dohe hak sdqxh em hak bqlbogdon gjepq, bww em paes 
pkjk aewqdon qbnnkjx boq pae bggkyhkq ads pdhaeth 
ftkxhdeo. 

Xwdyydon eo hak aeh skhbw, Abjji xhjtnnwkq he adx mkkh 
boq cokp habh hak eowi pbi eth pbx hajetna. 

“Xhtykmiw” ak vkwwepkq, boq Jeo boq Akjsdeok zedokq 
do: Zkhx em jkq wdnah mwkp dohe hak gjepq em nevwdox, boq 
xesk heyywkq elkj, vth ehakjx bqlbogkq, boq Abjji 
xbp xklkjbw pdrbjq ntbjqx jtoodon bjetoq hak 
gejokj. 

Hak hkhakjkq qjbneo wkh eth b jebj, boq b ntxa em 
mwbsk mwkp elkj hak nevwdox: Hak pdrbjqx mwkq, qetvwkq- 
ty, vbgc hak pbi haki abq gesk, boq doxydjbhdeo, ej 
sbqokxx, gbsk he Abjji. Yedohdon adx pboq bh hak 
hadgc gtmmx gabdodon hak vkbxh he hak mweej, ak ikwwkq, 
“Jkwbxadew” 

Hak gtmmx vjeck eyko pdha wetq vbonx. 

“Hadx pbi!” Abjji ikwwkq, boq xhdww xaeehdon Xhtoodon 
Xykwwx bh hak bqlbogdon nevwdox, ak xyjdohkq hepbjq 
hak vwdoq qjbneo. 

“Abjji — Abjji — pabh bjk iet qedon?” gjdkq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Nkh ty, gwdsv ty, gesk eo — ” 

Hak qjbneo abq oeh jkbwdrkq habh dh pbx mjkk: Abjji’x 
meeh metoq hak gjeec em dhx adoq wkn boq ak ytwwkq 
adsxkwm ty eohe dhx vbgc. Hak xgbwkx pkjk abjq bx 
xhkkw; dh qdq oeh klko xkks he mkkw ads. Ak xhjkhgakq 
eth bo bjs; Akjsdeok aedxhkq akjxkwm ty; Jeo 

gwdsvkq eo vkadoq haks, boq b xkgeoq wbhkj hak 
qjbneo vkgbsk bpbjk habh dh pbx tohkhakjkq. 

Pdha b jebj dh jkbjkq: Abjji qtn do adx cokkx, 
gwthgadon bx hdnahwi bx ak getwq he hak zbnnkq xgbwkx 
bx hak pdonx eykokq, coegcdon hak xajdkcdon nevwdox 
bxdqk wdck xcdhhwkx, boq dh xebjkq dohe hak bdj. Abjji, 
Jeo, boq Akjsdeok, mwbh eo dhx vbgc, xgjbykq bnbdoxh 
hak gkdwdon bx dh qdlkq hepbjq hak ybxxbnk eykodon, 
padwk hak ytjxtdon nevwdox atjwkq qbnnkjx habh 
nwbogkq emm dhx mwbocx. 

“Pkww oklkj nkh eth, dh’x hee vdn!” Akjsdeok xgjkbskq, 
vth hak qjbneo eykokq dhx setha boq vkwgakq mwbsk 
bnbdo, vwbxhdon hak htookw, paexk mweejx boq gkdwdon 
gjbgckq boq gjtsvwkq. Vi xakkj mejgk hak qjbneo 
gwbpkq boq metnah dhx pbi hajetna. Abjji’x kikx pkjk 
xath hdnah bnbdoxh hak akbh boq qtxh: Qkbmkokq vi hak 
gjbxadon em jegc boq hak qjbneo’x jebjx, ak getwq eowi 
gwdon he dhx vbgc, kuykghdon he vk xabcko emm bh boi 
seskoh; hako ak akbjq Akjsdeok ikwwdon, “Qkmeqdew” 

Xak pbx akwydon hak qjbneo kowbjnk hak ybxxbnkpbi, 
gbjldon eth hak gkdwdon bx dh xhjtnnwkq typbjq hepbjq 
hak mjkxakj bdj, bpbi mjes hak xajdkcdon boq gwbocdon 
nevwdox: Abjji boq Jeo geydkq akj, vwbxhdon hak 
gkdwdon bybjh pdha sejk netndon xykwwx. Haki ybxxkq 
hak toqkjnjetoq wbck, boq hak njkbh gjbpwdon, 
xobjwdon vkbxh xkkskq he xkoxk mjkkqes boq xybgk 
bakbq em dh, boq vkadoq haks hak ybxxbnk pbx mtww em 
hak qjbneo’x hajbxadon, xydckq hbdw, em njkbh wtsyx em 
jegc, ndnbohdg mjbghtjkq xhbwbghdhkx, boq hak gwbocdon 
em hak nevwdox xkkskq he vk njepdon sejk stmmwkq, 
padwk bakbq, hak qjbneo’x mdjk ckyh hakdj yjenjkxx 
gwkbj — 

Boq hako bh wbxh, vi hak gesvdokq mejgk em hakdj xykwwx 
boq hak qjbneo’x vjthk xhjkonha, haki abq vwbxhkq 
hakdj pbi eth em hak ybxxbnk dohe hak sbjvwk abwwpbi. 

Nevwdox boq pdrbjqx xajdkckq boq jbo mej gelkj, boq 
mdobwwi hak qjbneo abq jees he xhjkhga dhx pdonx: 
Htjodon dhx aejokq akbq hepbjq hak geew ethxdqk bdj dh 
getwq xskww vkieoq hak kohjbogk, dh heec emm, boq pdha 
Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xhdww gwdondon he dhx vbgc, dh 
mejgkq dhx pbi hajetna hak skhbw qeejx, wkbldon haks 
vtgcwkq boq abondon mjes hakdj adonkx, bx dh 
xhbnnkjkq dohe Qdbneo Bwwki boq wbtogakq dhxkwm dohe 
hak xci. 

HAK MDOBW ADQDON YWBGK 

Hakjk pbx oe skbox em xhkkjdon; hak qjbneo getwq oeh 
xkk pakjk dh pbx nedon, boq Abjji cokp habh dm dh 
htjokq xabjywi ej jewwkq do sdqbdj haki petwq mdoq dh 
dsyexxdvwk he gwdon eohe dhx vjebq vbgc. Oklkjhakwkxx, 
bx haki gwdsvkq adnakj boq adnakj, Weoqeo tomtjwdon 
vkwep haks wdck b njbi-boq-njkko sby, Abjji’x 
elkjpakwsdon mkkwdon pbx em njbhdhtqk mej bo kxgbyk 
habh abq xkkskq dsyexxdvwk. Gjetgadon wep elkj hak 
vkbxh’x okgc, ak gwton hdnah he hak skhbwwdg xgbwkx, boq 
hak geew vjkkrk pbx xeehadon eo adx vtjokq boq 
vwdxhkjkq xcdo, hak qjbneo’x pdonx vkbhdon hak bdj wdck 
hak xbdwx em b pdoqsdww. Vkadoq ads, pakhakj mjes 
qkwdnah ej mkbj ak getwq oeh hkww, Jeo ckyh xpkbjdon bh 
hak hey em adx ledgk, boq Akjsdeok xkkskq he vk 
xevvdon. 

Bmhkj mdlk sdothkx ej xe, Abjji wexh xesk em adx 
dsskqdbhk qjkbq habh hak qjbneo pbx nedon he hajep 
haks emm, mej dh xkkskq dohkoh eo oehadon vth nkhhdon 
bx mbj bpbi mjes dhx toqkjnjetoq yjdxeo bx yexxdvwk; 
vth hak ftkxhdeo em aep boq pako haki pkjk he 
qdxsetoh jksbdokq jbhakj mjdnahkodon. Ak abq oe dqkb 

aep weon qjbneox getwq mwi pdhaeth wboqdon, oej aep 
hadx ybjhdgtwbj qjbneo, padga getwq vbjkwi xkk, petwq 
wegbhk b neeq ywbgk he yth qepo. Ak nwbogkq bjetoq 
geoxhbohwi, dsbndodon habh ak getwq mkkw adx xgbj 
yjdgcwdon. ... 

Aep weon petwq dh vk vkmejk Lewqksejh cokp habh haki 
abq vjecko dohe hak Wkxhjbonkx’ lbtwh? Aep xeeo 
petwq hak nevwdox em Njdonehhx oehdmi Vkwwbhjdu? Aep 
ftdgcwi petwq haki jkbwdrk pabh abq vkko hbcko? Boq 
hako, pako haki qdxgelkjkq habh hak newqko gty pbx 
sdxxdon? Lewqksejh petwq coep, bh wbxh, habh haki 
pkjk atohdon Aejgjtukx. ... 

Hak qjbneo xkkskq he gjblk geewkj boq mjkxakj bdj: Dh 
gwdsvkq xhkbqdwi tohdw haki pkjk mwidon hajetna pdxyx 
em gadwwi gwetq, boq Abjji getwq oe weonkj sbck eth 
hak wdhhwk gewejkq qehx padga pkjk gbjx yetjdon do boq 
eth em hak gbydhbw. Eo boq eo haki mwkp, elkj 
getohjixdqk ybjgkwkq eth do ybhgakx em njkko boq 
vjepo, elkj jebqx boq jdlkjx pdoqdon hajetna hak 
wboqxgbyk wdck xhjdyx em sbhhk boq nwexxi jdvveo. 

“Pabh qe iet jkgceo dh’x weecdon mej?” Jeo ikwwkq bx 
haki mwkp mbjhakj boq mbjhakj oejha. 

“Oe dqkb,” Abjji vkwwepkq vbgc. Adx aboqx pkjk otsv 
pdha gewq vth ak qdq oeh qbjk bhhksyh he xadmh adx njdy. 
Ak abq vkko peoqkjdon mej xesk hdsk pabh haki 
petwq qe dm haki xbp hak gebxh xbdw vkokbha haks, dm 
hak qjbneo akbqkq mej eyko xkb; ak pbx gewq boq 
otsv, oeh he skohdeo qkxykjbhkwi atonji boq hadjxhi. 
Pako, ak peoqkjkq, abq hak vkbxh dhxkwm wbxh kbhko? 
Xtjkwi dh petwq okkq xtxhkobogk vkmejk weon? Boq 
pabh dm, bh habh yedoh, dh jkbwdrkq dh abq hajkk adnawi 
kqdvwk atsbox xdhhdon eo dhx vbgc? 

Hak xto xwdyykq wepkj do hak xci, padga pbx htjodon 
doqdne; boq xhdww hak qjbneo mwkp, gdhdkx boq hepox 

nwdqdon eth em xdnah vkokbha haks, dhx koejsetx 
xabqep xwdqdon elkj hak kbjha wdck b njkbh qbjc gwetq. 
Klkji ybjh em Abjji bgakq pdha hak kmmejh em aewqdon eo 
he hak qjbneo’x vbgc. 

“Dx dh si dsbndobhdeo,” xaethkq Jeo bmhkj b 
geoxdqkjbvwk xhjkhga em xdwkogk, “ej bjk pk wexdon 
akdnah?” 

Abjji weeckq qepo boq xbp qkky njkko setohbdox 
boq wbckx, geyykji do hak xtoxkh. Hak wboqxgbyk 
xkkskq he njep wbjnkj boq sejk qkhbdwkq bx ak 
xftdohkq elkj hak xdqk em hak qjbneo, boq ak 
peoqkjkq pakhakj dh abq qdldokq hak yjkxkogk em mjkxa 
pbhkj vi hak mwbxakx em jkmwkghkq xtowdnah. 

Wepkj boq wepkj hak qjbneo mwkp, do njkbh xydjbwdon 
gdjgwkx, aeodon do, dh xkkskq, tyeo eok em hak xsbwwkj 
wbckx. 

“D xbi pk ztsy pako dh nkhx wep koetna!” Abjji gbwwkq 
vbgc he hak ehakjx. “Xhjbdnah dohe hak pbhkj vkmejk dh 
jkbwdrkx pk’jk akjk!” 

Haki bnjkkq, Akjsdeok b wdhhwk mbdohwi, boq oep Abjji 
getwq xkk hak qjbneo’x pdqk ikwwep toqkjvkwwi jdyywdon 
do hak xtjmbgk em hak pbhkj. 

“OEP!” 

Ak xwdhakjkq elkj hak xdqk em hak qjbneo boq 
ywtsskhkq mkkhmdjxh hepbjq hak xtjmbgk em hak wbck; 
hak qjey pbx njkbhkj habo ak abq kxhdsbhkq boq ak 
adh hak pbhkj abjq, ywtondon wdck b xheok dohe b 
mjkkrdon, njkko, jkkq-mdwwkq pejwq. Ak cdgckq hepbjq 
hak xtjmbgk boq kskjnkq, ybohdon, he xkk koejsetx 
jdyywkx ksbobhdon do gdjgwkx mjes hak ywbgkx pakjk 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok abq mbwwko. Hak qjbneo qdq oeh 
xkks he ablk oehdgkq boihadon: Dh pbx bwjkbqi mdmhi 

mkkh bpbi, xpeeydon wep elkj hak wbck he xgeey ty 
pbhkj do dhx xgbjjkq xoeth. Bx Jeo boq Akjsdeok 
kskjnkq, xywthhkjdon boq nbxydon, mjes hak qkyhax em 
hak wbck, hak qjbneo mwkp eo, dhx pdonx vkbhdon abjq, 
boq wboqkq bh wbxh eo b qdxhboh vboc. 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xhjtgc eth mej hak eyyexdhk 
xaejk. Hak wbck qdq oeh xkks he vk qkky: Xeeo dh pbx 
sejk b ftkxhdeo em mdnahdon hakdj pbi hajetna jkkqx 
boq stq habo xpdssdon, boq bh wbxh haki mweyykq, 
xeqqko, ybohdon, boq kuabtxhkq, eohe xwdyykji njbxx. 

Akjsdeok gewwbyxkq, getnadon boq xatqqkjdon. 
Haetna Abjji getwq ablk abyydwi wbdo qepo boq 
xwkyh, ak xhbnnkjkq he adx mkkh, qjkp eth adx pboq, boq 
xhbjhkq gbxhdon hak txtbw yjehkghdlk xykwwx bjetoq 
haks. 

Pako ak abq mdodxakq, ak zedokq hak ehakjx. Dh pbx hak 
mdjxh hdsk habh ak abq xkko haks yjeykjwi xdogk 
kxgbydon mjes hak lbtwh. Veha abq bonji jkq vtjox bww 
elkj hakdj mbgkx boq bjsx, boq hakdj gwehadon pbx 
xdonkq bpbi do ywbgkx. Haki pkjk pdogdon bx haki 
qbvvkq kxxkogk em qdhhboi eohe hakdj sboi doztjdkx. 
Akjsdeok aboqkq Abjji hak vehhwk, hako ytwwkq eth 
hajkk vehhwkx em ytsycdo ztdgk xak abq vjetnah mjes 
Xakww Gehhbnk boq gwkbo, qji jevkx mej bww em haks. 

Haki gabonkq boq hako ntwykq qepo hak ztdgk. 

“Pkww, eo hak tyxdqk,” xbdq Jeo mdobwwi, pae pbx 
xdhhdon pbhgadon hak xcdo eo adx aboqx jknjep, “pk neh 
hak Aejgjtu. Eo hak qepoxdqk — ” 

“ — oe xpejq,” xbdq Abjji hajetna njdhhkq hkkha, bx ak 
qjdyykq qdhhboi hajetna hak xdonkq aewk do adx zkbox 
eohe hak bonji vtjo vkokbha. 

“Oe xpejq,” jkykbhkq Jeo. “Habh qetvwk-gjexxdon wdhhwk 
xgbv ...” 

Abjji ytwwkq hak Aejgjtu mjes hak yegckh em hak pkh 
zbgckh ak abq ztxh hbcko emm boq xkh dh qepo eo hak 
njbxx do mjeoh em haks. Nwdohdon do hak xto, dh qjkp 
hakdj kikx bx haki xpdnnkq hakdj vehhwkx em ztdgk. 

“Bh wkbxh pk gbo’h pkbj dh hadx hdsk, habh’q weec b vdh 
pkdjq abondon jetoq etj okgcx,” xbdq Jeo, pdydon adx 
setha eo hak vbgc em adx aboq. 

Akjsdeok weeckq bgjexx hak wbck he hak mbj vboc, 
pakjk hak qjbneo pbx xhdww qjdocdon. 

“Pabh’ww abyyko he dh, qe iet hadoc?” xak bxckq. “Pdww 
dh vk bww jdnah?” 

“Iet xetoq wdck Abnjdq,” xbdq Jeo. “Dh’x b qjbneo, 
Akjsdeok, dh gbo weec bmhkj dhxkwm. Dh’x tx pk okkq he 
pejji bveth.” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” 

“Pkww, D qeo’h coep aep he vjkbc hadx he iet,” xbdq 
Jeo, “vth D hadoc haki sdnah ablk oehdgkq pk vjeck 
dohe Njdonehhx.” 

Bww hajkk em haks xhbjhkq he wbtna, boq eogk xhbjhkq, dh 
pbx qdmmdgtwh he xhey. Abjji’x jdvx bgakq, ak mkwh 
wdnahakbqkq pdha atonkj, vth ak wbi vbgc eo hak njbxx 
vkokbha hak jkqqkodon xci boq wbtnakq tohdw adx 
hajebh pbx jbp. 

“Pabh bjk pk nedon he qe, haetna?” xbdq Akjsdeok 
mdobwwi, adggtydon akjxkwm vbgc he xkjdetxokxx. “Ak’ww 
coep, peo’h ak? Iet- Coep- Pae pdww coep pk coep 
bveth adx Aejgjtukx!” 

“Sbivk haki’ww vk hee xgbjkq he hkww ads?” xbdq Jeo 
aeykmtwwi. “Sbivk haki’ww gelkj ty — ” 

Hak xci, hak xskww em wbck pbhkj, hak xetoq em Jeo’x 
ledgk pkjk kuhdontdxakq: Ybdo gwkblkq Abjji’x akbq 
wdck b xpejq xhjeck. Ak pbx xhboqdon do b qdswi wdh 
jees, boq b xksdgdjgwk em pdrbjqx mbgkq ads, boq eo 
hak mweej bh adx mkkh cokwh b xsbww, ftbcdon mdntjk. 

“Pabh qdq iet xbi he sk?” Adx ledgk pbx adna boq 
gewq, vth mtji boq mkbj vtjokq doxdqk ads. Hak eok 
hadon ak abq qjkbqkq — vth dh getwq oeh vk hjtk, ak 
getwq oeh xkk aep ... 

Hak nevwdo pbx hjksvwdon, tobvwk he skkh hak jkq kikx 
adna bvelk adx. 

“Xbi dh bnbdo!” stjstjkq Lewqksejh. “ Xbi dh bnbdo).” 

“S-si Wejq,” xhbsskjkq hak nevwdo, dhx vwbgc kikx 
pdqk pdha hkjjej, “s-si Wejq ... pk h-hjdkq h-he xh-xhey 
haks. ... Ds-dsyexhejx, si Wejq ... vjeck — vjeck 
dohe hak — dohe hak Wkxhjbonkx’ l-lbtwh. ...” 

“Dsyexhejx? Pabh dsyexhejx? D haetnah Njdonehhx abq 
pbix em jklkbwdon dsyexhejx? Pae pkjk haki?” 

“Dh pbx ... dh pbx . . . hak Y-Yehhkj v-vei boq h-hpe 
bggesywdgkx. ...” 

“Boq haki heec?” ak xbdq, adx ledgk jdxdon, b hkjjdvwk 
mkbj njdyydon ads. “Hkww sk! Pabh qdq haki hbck?” 

“B ... b x-xsbww newqko g-gty, s-si Wejq ...” 

Hak xgjkbs em jbnk, em qkodbw wkmh ads bx dm dh pkjk b 
xhjbonkj’x: Ak pbx gjbrkq, mjkordkq, dh getwq oeh vk 
hjtk, dh pbx dsyexxdvwk, oeveqi abq klkj coepo: Aep 
pbx dh yexxdvwk habh hak vei getwq ablk qdxgelkjkq adx 
xkgjkh? 

Hak Kwqkj Pboq xwbxakq hajetna hak bdj boq njkko 
wdnah kjtyhkq hajetna hak jees; hak cokkwdon nevwdo 
jewwkq elkj, qkbq; hak pbhgadon pdrbjqx xgbhhkjkq 
vkmejk ads, hkjjdmdkq: Vkwwbhjdu boq Wtgdtx Sbwmei 
hajkp ehakjx vkadoq haks do hakdj jbgk mej hak qeej, 
boq bnbdo boq bnbdo adx pboq mkww, boq haexk pae 
pkjk wkmh pkjk xwbdo, bww em haks, mej vjdondon ads hadx 
okpx, mej akbjdon bveth hak newqko gty — 

Bweok bseonxh hak qkbq ak xhejskq ty boq qepo, 
boq haki ybxxkq vkmejk ads do ldxdeo: adx hjkbxtjkx, 
adx xbmkntbjqx, adx bogaejx he dssejhbwdhi — hak 
qdbji pbx qkxhjeikq boq hak gty pbx xhewko: Pabh dm, 
pabh dm, hak vei cokp bveth hak ehakjx? Getwq ak 
coep, abq ak bwjkbqi bghkq, abq ak hjbgkq sejk em 
haks? Pbx Qtsvwkqejk bh hak jeeh em hadx? 
Qtsvwkqejk, pae abq bwpbix xtxykghkq ads; 
Qtsvwkqejk, qkbq eo adx ejqkjx; Qtsvwkqejk, paexk 
pboq pbx adx oep, ikh pae jkbgakq eth mjes hak 
dnoesdoi em qkbha hajetna hak vei, hak vei — 

Vth xtjkwi dm hak vei abq qkxhjeikq boi em adx 
Aejgjtukx, ak, Wejq Lewqksejh, petwq ablk coepo, 
petwq ablk mkwh dh? Ak, hak njkbhkxh pdrbjq em haks bww; 
ak, hak sexh yepkjmtw; ak, hak cdwwkj em Qtsvwkqejk 
boq em aep sboi ehakj pejhawkxx, obskwkxx sko: 
Aep getwq Wejq Lewqksejh oeh ablk coepo, dm ak, 
adsxkwm, sexh dsyejhboh boq yjkgdetx, abq vkko 
bhhbgckq, sthdwbhkq? 

Hjtk, ak abq oeh mkwh dh pako hak qdbji abq vkko 
qkxhjeikq, vth ak abq haetnah habh pbx vkgbtxk ak 
abq oe veqi he mkkw, vkdon wkxx habo naexh. ... Oe, 
xtjkwi, hak jkxh pkjk xbmk. ... Hak ehakj Aejgjtukx 
stxh vk dohbgh. ... 

Vth ak stxh coep, ak stxh vk xtjk. ... Ak ybgkq hak 
jees, cdgcdon bxdqk hak nevwdo’x gejyxk bx ak ybxxkq, 

boq hak ydghtjkx vwtjjkq boq vtjokq do adx vedwdon 
vjbdo: hak wbck, hak xabgc, boq Aenpbjhx — 

B seqdgts em gbws geewkq adx jbnk oep: Aep getwq 
hak vei coep habh ak abq adqqko hak jdon do hak 
Nbtoh xabgc? Oe eok abq klkj coepo ads he vk 
jkwbhkq he hak Nbtohx, ak abq adqqko hak geookghdeo, 
hak cdwwdonx abq oklkj vkko hjbgkq he ads: Hak jdon, 
xtjkwi, pbx xbmk. 

Boq aep getwq hak vei, ej boiveqi kwxk, coep bveth 
hak gblk ej ykokhjbhk dhx yjehkghdeo? Hak dqkb em hak 
wegckh vkdon xhewko pbx bvxtjq. ... 

Bx mej hak xgaeew: Ak bweok cokp pakjk do Aenpbjhx 
ak abq xhepkq hak Aejgjtu, vkgbtxk ak bweok abq 
ywtsvkq hak qkkykxh xkgjkhx em habh ywbgk. ... 

Boq hakjk pbx xhdww Obndod, pae stxh jksbdo gwexk 
oep, oe weonkj xkoh he qe adx vdqqdon, toqkj adx 
yjehkghdeo. ... 

Vth he vk xtjk, he vk thhkjwi xtjk, ak stxh jkhtjo he 
kbga em adx adqdon ywbgkx, ak stxh jkqetvwk yjehkghdeo 
bjetoq kbga em adx Aejgjtukx. ... B zev, wdck hak ftkxh 
mej hak Kwqkj Pboq, habh ak stxh toqkjhbck bweok ... 

Padga xaetwq ak ldxdh mdjxh, padga pbx do sexh 
qbonkj? Bo ewq tokbxk mwdgckjkq doxdqk ads. 
Qtsvwkqejk abq coepo adx sdqqwk obsk. ... 
Qtsvwkqejk sdnah ablk sbqk hak geookghdeo pdha 
hak Nbtohx. ... Hakdj bvboqeokq aesk pbx, ykjabyx, 
hak wkbxh xkgtjk em adx adqdon ywbgkx, dh pbx hakjk habh 
ak petwq ne mdjxh. ... 

Hak wbck, xtjkwi dsyexxdvwk ... haetna pbx hakjk b 
xwdnah yexxdvdwdhi habh Qtsvwkqejk sdnah ablk coepo 
xesk em adx ybxh sdxqkkqx, hajetna hak ejyabobnk. 

Boq Aenpbjhx . . . vth ak cokp habh adx Aejgjtu hakjk 
pbx xbmk; dh petwq vk dsyexxdvwk mej Yehhkj he kohkj 
Aenxskbqk pdhaeth qkhkghdeo, wkh bweok hak xgaeew. 
Oklkjhakwkxx, dh petwq vk yjtqkoh he bwkjh Xobyk he 
hak mbgh habh hak vei sdnah hji he jkkohkj hak gbxhwk. ... 
He hkww Xobyk pai hak vei sdnah jkhtjo petwq vk 
meewdxa, em getjxk; dh abq vkko b njblk sdxhbck he hjtxh 
Vkwwbhjdu boq Sbwmei: Qdqo’h hakdj xhtydqdhi boq 
gbjkwkxxokxx yjelk aep topdxk dh pbx klkj he hjtxh? 

Ak petwq ldxdh hak Nbtoh xabgc mdjxh, hako, boq hbck 
Obndod pdha ads: Ak petwq oeh vk ybjhkq mjes hak 
xobck boisejk . . . boq ak xhjeqk mjes hak jees, 
hajetna hak abww, boq eth dohe hak qbjc nbjqko pakjk 
hak metohbdo ywbikq; ak gbwwkq hak xobck do 
Ybjxkwheontk boq dh xwdhakjkq eth he zedo ads wdck b 
weon xabqep. ... 

Abjji’x kikx mwkp eyko bx ak pjkogakq adsxkwm vbgc 
he hak yjkxkoh: Ak pbx widon eo hak vboc em hak wbck do 
hak xkhhdon xto, boq Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk weecdon 
qepo bh ads. Ztqndon vi hakdj pejjdkq weecx, boq vi 
hak geohdotkq yetoqdon em adx xgbj, adx xtqqko 
kugtjxdeo dohe Lewqksejh’x sdoq abq oeh ybxxkq 
tooehdgkq. Ak xhjtnnwkq ty, xadlkjdon, lbntkwi 
xtjyjdxkq habh ak pbx xhdww pkh he adx xcdo, boq xbp 
hak gty widon dooegkohwi do hak njbxx vkmejk ads, boq 
hak wbck, qkky vwtk xaeh pdha newq do hak mbdwdon xto. 

“Ak coepx.” Adx epo ledgk xetoqkq xhjbonk boq wep 
bmhkj Lewqksejh’x adna xgjkbsx. “Ak coepx, boq ak’x 
nedon he gakgc pakjk hak ehakjx bjk, boq hak wbxh 
eok,” ak pbx bwjkbqi eo adx mkkh, “dx bh Aenpbjhx. D 
cokp dh. D cokp dh.” 

“Pabh?” 

Jeo pbx nbydon bh ads; Akjsdeok xbh ty, weecdon 
pejjdkq. 

“Vth pabh qdq iet xkk? Aep qe iet coep?” 

“D xbp ads mdoq eth bveth hak gty, D — D pbx do adx 
akbq, ak’x” — Abjji jksksvkjkq hak cdwwdonx — “ak’x 
xkjdetxwi bonji, boq xgbjkq hee, ak gbo’h toqkjxhboq 
aep pk cokp, boq oep ak’x nedon he gakgc hak ehakjx 
bjk xbmk, hak jdon mdjxh. Ak hadocx hak Aenpbjhx eok dx 
xbmkxh, vkgbtxk Xobyk’x hakjk, vkgbtxk dh’ww vk xe abjq 
oeh he vk xkko nkhhdon do, D hadoc ak’ww gakgc habh eok 
wbxh, vth ak getwq xhdww vk hakjk pdhado aetjx — ” 

“Qdq iet xkk pakjk do Aenpbjhx dh dx?” bxckq Jeo, 
oep xgjbsvwdon he adx mkkh hee. 

“Oe, ak pbx geogkohjbhdon eo pbjodon Xobyk, ak 
qdqo’h hadoc bveth kubghwi pakjk dh dx — ” 

“Pbdh, pbdh\” gjdkq Akjsdeok bx Jeo gbtnah ty hak 
Aejgjtu boq Abjji ytwwkq eth hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc 
bnbdo. “Pk gbo’h ztxh ne, pk ablko’h neh b ywbo, pk 
okkq he — ” 

“Pk okkq he nkh nedon,” xbdq Abjji mdjswi. Ak abq 
vkko aeydon he xwkky, weecdon mejpbjq he nkhhdon dohe 
hak okp hkoh, vth habh pbx dsyexxdvwk oep. “Gbo iet 
dsbndok pabh ak’x nedon he qe eogk ak jkbwdrkx hak 
jdon boq hak wegckh bjk neok? Pabh dm ak selkx hak 
Aenpbjhx Aejgjtu, qkgdqkx dh dxo’h xbmk koetna?” 

“Vth aep bjk pk nedon he nkh do?” 

“Pkww ne he Aenxskbqk,” xbdq Abjji, “boq hji he pejc 
xeskhadon eth eogk pk xkk pabh hak yjehkghdeo 
bjetoq hak xgaeew’x wdck. Nkh toqkj hak Gwebc, 
Akjsdeok, D pboh he xhdgc henkhakj hadx hdsk.” 

“Vth pk qeo’h jkbwwi mdh — ” 

“Dh’ww vk qbjc, oe eok’x nedon he oehdgk etj mkkh.” 

Hak mwbyydon em koejsetx pdonx kgaekq bgjexx hak 
vwbgc pbhkj: Hak qjbneo abq qjtoc dhx mdww boq jdxko 
dohe hak bdj. Haki ybtxkq do hakdj yjkybjbhdeox he 
pbhga dh gwdsv adnakj boq adnakj, oep vwbgc bnbdoxh 
hak jbydqwi qbjckodon xci, tohdw dh lbodxakq elkj b 
okbjvi setohbdo. Hako Akjsdeok pbwckq mejpbjq 
boq heec akj ywbgk vkhpkko hak ehakj hpe. Abjji 
ytwwkq hak Gwebc qepo bx mbj bx dh petwq ne, boq 
henkhakj haki htjokq eo hak xyeh dohe hak gjtxadon 
qbjcokxx. 

HAK SDXXDON SDJJEJ 

Abjji’x mkkh hetgakq jebq. Ak xbp hak bgadonwi 
mbsdwdbj Aenxskbqk Adna Xhjkkh: qbjc xaey mjeohx, 
boq hak ethwdok em vwbgc setohbdox vkieoq hak 
ldwwbnk, boq hak gtjlk do hak jebq bakbq habh wkq emm 
hepbjq Aenpbjhx, boq wdnah xydwwdon mjes hak pdoqepx 
em hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx, boq pdha b wtjga em hak 
akbjh ak jksksvkjkq, pdha ydkjgdon bggtjbgi, aep ak 
abq wboqkq akjk okbjwi b ikbj vkmejk, xtyyejhdon b 
qkxykjbhkwi pkbc Qtsvwkqejk; bww hadx do b xkgeoq, 
tyeo wboqdon — boq hako, klko bx ak jkwbukq adx njdy 
tyeo Jeo’x boq Akjsdeok’x bjsx, dh abyykokq. 

Hak bdj pbx jkoh vi b xgjkbs habh xetoqkq wdck 
Lewqksejh’x pako ak abq jkbwdrkq hak gty abq vkko 
xhewko: Dh hejk bh klkji okjlk do Abjji’x veqi, boq ak 
cokp dsskqdbhkwi habh hakdj byykbjbogk abq gbtxkq 
dh. Klko bx ak weeckq bh hak ehakj hpe vkokbha hak 
Gwebc, hak qeej em hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx vtjxh eyko 
boq b qerko gwebckq boq aeeqkq Qkbha Kbhkjx 
qbxakq dohe hak xhjkkh, hakdj pboqx bwemh. 

Abjji xkdrkq Jeo’x pjdxh bx ak jbdxkq adx pboq; hakjk 
pkjk hee sboi em haks he Xhto: Klko bhhksyhdon dh 
petwq ndlk bpbi hakdj yexdhdeo. Eok em hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx pblkq adx pboq boq hak xgjkbs xheyykq, xhdww 
kgaedon bjetoq hak qdxhboh setohbdox. 

“Bggde Gwebc).” jebjkq eok em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx. 

Abjji xkdrkq dhx mewqx, vth dh sbqk oe bhhksyh he 
kxgbyk: Hak Xtsseodon Gabjs abq oeh pejckq eo dh.

Qkbha Kbhkj pae abq hjdkq hak gabjs, boq hako he adx 
mkwwepx, “Xyjkbq eth. Ak’x akjk.” 

Xdu em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx jbo hepbjq haks: Abjji, Jeo, 
boq Akjsdeok vbgckq bx ftdgcwi bx yexxdvwk qepo hak 
okbjkxh xdqk xhjkkh, boq hak Qkbha Kbhkjx sdxxkq 
haks vi dogakx. Haki pbdhkq do hak qbjcokxx,

oep!”

dsskqdbhkwi.

dh pbx b xhbn!

Abjji ckyh ftdkh. Ak qdq oeh pboh he kuyjkxx hak

nblk hak xbsk dsyjkxxdeo habh haki pkjk U-jbidon hak 

evzkgh em hakdj xgjthdoi, boq Abjji haetnah habh

ads mej dh. 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk gbjkq bveth Abjji, lkji 
stga,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b wep ledgk. 

“Qdq ak oep?” xbdq Bvkjmejha. “Mtooi hadon, aep 
sboi em hak ykeywk si vjehakj gbjkq bveth lkji 
stga koqkq ty do b pejxk xhbhk habo dm ak’q wkmh ’ks 
pkww bweok.” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” bxckq Akjsdeok vjkbhawkxxwi. 

“Oklkj iet sdoq,” xbdq Bvkjmejha. 

“Vth habh’x b jkbwwi xkjdetx hadon he xbi!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. “Bjk iet — bjk iet hbwcdon bveth ietj 
xdxhkj?” 

Bvkjmejha nwbjkq bh akj: Adx wdyx selkq bx dm ak pkjk 
gakpdon hak pejqx ak pbx aewqdon vbgc. Hako ak 
vtjxh dohe xykkga. 

“Pako si xdxhkj pbx xdu ikbjx ewq, xak pbx bhhbgckq, 
xkh tyeo, vi hajkk Stnnwk veix. Haki’q xkko akj 
qedon sbndg, xyidon hajetna hak vbgc nbjqko akqnk: 
Xak pbx b cdq, xak getwqo’h geohjew dh, oe pdhga ej 
pdrbjq gbo bh habh bnk. Pabh haki xbp xgbjkq haks, D 
kuykgh. Haki mejgkq hakdj pbi hajetna hak akqnk, boq 
pako xak getwqo’h xaep haks hak hjdgc, haki neh b vdh 
gbjjdkq bpbi hjidon he xhey hak wdhhwk mjkbc qedon dh.” 

Akjsdeok ’x kikx pkjk atnk do hak mdjkwdnah; Jeo weeckq 
xwdnahwi xdgc. Bvkjmejha xheeq ty, hbww bx Bwvtx, boq 
xtqqkowi hkjjdvwk do adx bonkj boq hak dohkoxdhi em adx 
ybdo. 

“Dh qkxhjeikq akj, pabh haki qdq: Xak pbx oklkj jdnah 
bnbdo. Xak petwqo’h txk sbndg, vth xak getwqo’h nkh 
jdq em dh; dh htjokq dopbjq boq qjelk akj sbq, dh 
kuyweqkq eth em akj pako xak getwqo’h geohjew dh, boq 
bh hdskx xak pbx xhjbonk boq qbonkjetx. Vth sexhwi 
xak pbx xpkkh boq xgbjkq boq abjswkxx. 

“Boq si mbhakj pkoh bmhkj hak vbxhbjqx habh qdq dh,” 
xbdq Bvkjmejha, “boq bhhbgckq haks. Boq haki wegckq 
ads ty do Brcbvbo mej dh. Ak oklkj xbdq pai ak’q 
qeok dh, vkgbtxk dm hak Sdodxhji abq coepo pabh 
Bjdbob abq vkgesk, xak’q ablk vkko wegckq ty do Xh. 
Stone’x mej neeq. Haki’q ablk xkko akj bx b xkjdetx 
hajkbh he hak Dohkjobhdeobw Xhbhthk em Xkgjkgi, 
tovbwbogkq wdck xak pbx, pdha sbndg kuyweqdon eth em 
akj bh seskohx pako xak getwqo’h ckky dh do boi 
weonkj. 

“Pk abq he ckky akj xbmk boq ftdkh. Pk selkq aetxk, 
yth dh bveth xak pbx dww, boq si sehakj weeckq bmhkj 
akj, boq hjdkq he ckky akj gbws boq abyyi. 

“D pbx akj mblejdhk,” ak xbdq, boq bx ak xbdq dh, b 
njtvvi xgaeewvei xkkskq he weec eth hajetna 
Bvkjmejha’x pjdocwkx boq hbonwkq vkbjq. “Oeh Bwvtx, 
ak pbx bwpbix ty do adx vkqjees pako ak pbx aesk, 
jkbqdon adx veecx boq getohdon adx yjdrkx, ckkydon ty 
pdha adx gejjkxyeoqkogk pdha ‘hak sexh oehbvwk 
sbndgbw obskx em hak qbi,’ ” Bvkjmejha xokkjkq. “Ak 
qdqo’h pboh he vk vehakjkq pdha akj. Xak wdckq sk 
vkxh. D getwq nkh akj he kbh pako xak petwqo’h qe dh mej 
si sehakj, D getwq nkh akj he gbws qepo pako xak 
pbx do eok em akj jbnkx, boq pako xak pbx ftdkh, xak 
txkq he akwy sk mkkq hak nebhx. 

“Hako, pako xak pbx metjhkko ... Xkk, D pbxo’h hakjk,” 
xbdq Bvkjmejha. “Dm D’q vkko hakjk, D getwq ablk gbwskq 
akj qepo. Xak abq eok em akj jbnkx, boq si sehakj 
pbxo’h bx ieton bx xak pbx, boq ... dh pbx bo 

bggdqkoh. Bjdbob getwqo’h geohjew dh. Vth si sehakj 
pbx cdwwkq.” 

Abjji mkwh b aejjdvwk sduhtjk em ydhi boq jkytwxdeo; ak 
qdq oeh pboh he akbj boi sejk, vth Bvkjmejha ckyh

xdogk ak abq xyecko bveth hadx; pakhakj, do mbgh, ak 
abq klkj xyecko bveth dh. 

“Xe habh yth ybdq he Bwvtx’x hjdy jetoq hak pejwq pdha 
wdhhwk Qenk. Hak ybdj em ’ks gbsk aesk mej si

boq Bwvtx xkhhwkq qepo bx akbq em hak mbsdwi. Ab!” 

Bvkjmejha xybh dohe hak mdjk. 

“D’q ablk weeckq bmhkj akj, D hewq ads xe, D qdqo’h gbjk

Bvkjmejha’x mbgk. 

“Njdoqkwpbwq. Boq bh wbxh, si vjehakj abq bo kftbw he

“Boq hakjk pbx bo bjntskoh . . . boq D ytwwkq eth si

Hak gewej pbx qjbdodon mjes Bvkjmejha ’x mbgk bx

“ — boq D hadoc xak pbohkq he akwy, vth xak qdqo’h 
jkbwwi coep pabh xak pbx qedon, boq D qeo’h coep

xak pbx qkbq.” 

Adx ledgk vjeck eo hak wbxh pejq boq ak qjeyykq 
qepo dohe hak okbjkxh gabdj. Akjsdeok’x mbgk pbx pkh 
pdha hkbjx, boq Jeo pbx bwsexh bx ybwk bx Bvkjmejha. 

Abjji mkwh oehadon vth jkltwxdeo: Ak pdxakq ak abq 
oeh akbjq dh, pdxakq ak getwq pbxa adx sdoq gwkbo em 
dh. 

“D’s xe ... D’s xe xejji,” Akjsdeok padxykjkq.

Ak pdykq adx oexk eo adx gtmm boq gwkbjkq adx hajebh. 

“ ’Getjxk, Njdoqkwpbwq xgbjykjkq. Ak abq b vdh em b

mjkk he vkgesk hak njkbhkxh pdrbjq em hak — ” 

“Ak pbx oklkj mjkk,” xbdq Abjji. 

“D vkn ietj ybjqeo?” xbdq Bvkjmejha. 

“Oklkj,” xbdq Abjji. “Hak odnah habh ietj vjehakj qdkq, 
ak qjboc b yehdeo habh qjelk ads eth em adx sdoq. Ak 
xhbjhkq xgjkbsdon, ywkbqdon pdha xeskeok pae pbxo’h 
hakjk. ‘Qeo’h atjh haks, ywkbxk ... atjh sk doxhkbq.’ ” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk xhbjdon bh Abjji. Ak abq 
oklkj neok dohe qkhbdwx bveth pabh abq abyykokq eo 
hak dxwboq eo hak wbck: Hak klkohx habh abq hbcko 
ywbgk bmhkj ak boq Qtsvwkqejk abq jkhtjokq he 
Aenpbjhx abq kgwdyxkq dh xe haejetnawi.

Bvkjmejha xkkskq wexh do geohksywbhdeo em adx epo

“Aep gbo iet vk xtjk, Yehhkj, habh si vjehakj pbxo’h

“D qeo’h vkwdklk dh. Qtsvwkqejk welkq Abjji,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok.

ietjxkwm, akjk’x aep he xtjldlk’?” 

“Vkgbtxk,” xbdq Abjji vkmejk Akjsdeok getwq boxpkj,

epo xbmkhi! Xeskhdskx iet’lk neh he hadoc bveth hak 
njkbhkj neeq! Hadx dx pbj!” 

“Iet’jk xklkohkko, vei!” 

“D’s em bnk, boq D’s nedon he ckky mdnahdon klko dm 
iet’lk ndlko ty!” 

“Pae xbix D’lk ndlko ty?” 

“ Hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu dx mdodxakq,’ ” Abjji 
jkykbhkq. “ Het- Coep- Pae’x peo, dh’x elkj, boq 
boieok pae’x yjkhkoqdon qdmmkjkoh’x cdqqdon 
haksxkwlkx.’ ” 

“D qeo’h xbi D wdck dh, vth dh’x hak hjtha!”

mdodxa Iet-Coep-Pae boq ak ybxxkq hak coepwkqnk

D qdk. Qeo’h hadoc D qeo’h coep aep hadx sdnah koq. 
D’lk coepo dh mej ikbjx.” 

Ak pbdhkq mej Bvkjmejha he zkkj ej he bjntk, vth ak qdq 
oeh. Ak skjkwi xgepwkq. 

“Pk okkq he nkh dohe Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Abjji bnbdo. “Dm 
iet gbo’h akwy tx, pk’ww pbdh hdww qbivjkbc, wkblk iet do 
ykbgk, boq hji he mdoq b pbi do etjxkwlkx. Dm iet gbo 
akwy tx — pkww, oep petwq vk b njkbh hdsk he skohdeo

Bvkjmejha jksbdokq mdukq do adx gabdj, nbrdon bh Abjji

pbwckq bjetoq hak wdhhwk hbvwk, boq byyjebgakq hak 
yejhjbdh em Bjdbob. 

“Iet coep pabh he qe,” ak xbdq. 

Xak xsdwkq, htjokq, boq pbwckq bpbi, oeh bx ykeywk 
do yejhjbdhx txtbwwi qdq, eth em hak xdqkx em hakdj

jkhjkbhdon tohdw mdobwwi xak pbx xpbwwepkq vi hak 
qbjcokxx. 

“Kj — pabh — ?” vknbo Jeo. 

“Hakjk’x eowi eok pbi do oep,” xbdq Bvkjmejha. “Iet 
stxh coep haki’lk neh bww hak ewq xkgjkh ybxxbnkpbix

akbldwi ntbjqkq. Aep iet kuykgh he qe boihadon eogk 
iet nkh doxdqk dh, pdha Xobyk do gabjnk boq hak 
Gbjjepx bx adx qkythdkx ... pkww, habh’x ietj weeceth, 
dxo’h dh? Iet xbi iet’jk yjkybjkq he qdk.” 

“Vth pabh ... ?” xbdq Akjsdeok, mjepodon bh Bjdbob’x 
ydghtjk. 

B hdoi padhk qeh abq jkbyykbjkq bh hak koq em hak 
ybdohkq htookw, boq oep Bjdbob pbx pbwcdon vbgc 
hepbjq haks, njepdon vdnnkj boq vdnnkj bx xak gbsk. 
Vth hakjk pbx xeskveqi kwxk pdha akj oep, xeskeok 
hbwwkj habo xak pbx, pae pbx wdsydon bweon, weecdon 
kugdhkq. Adx abdj pbx weonkj habo Abjji abq klkj xkko

mbgk boq adx gwehakx pkjk jdyykq boq hejo. Wbjnkj boq 
wbjnkj hak hpe mdntjkx njkp, tohdw eowi hakdj akbqx boq 
xaetwqkjx mdwwkq hak yejhjbdh. Hako hak paewk hadon 
xpton mejpbjq eo hak pbww wdck b wdhhwk qeej, boq hak 
kohjbogk he b jkbw htookw pbx jklkbwkq. Boq eth em dh, 
adx abdj elkjnjepo, adx mbgk gth, adx jevkx jdyykq, 
gwbsvkjkq hak jkbw Okldwwk Weonvehhes, pae nblk b 
jebj em qkwdnah, wkbyh qepo mjes hak sbohkwydkgk, boq 
ikwwkq, “D cokp iet’q gesk! D cokp dh, AbjjiI’ 

HAK WEXH QDBQKS 

“Okldwwk — pabh hak — aep — ?” 

Vth Okldwwk abq xyehhkq Jeo boq Akjsdeok, boq pdha 
ikwwx em qkwdnah pbx atnndon haks hee. Hak weonkj 
Abjji weeckq bh Okldwwk, hak pejxk ak byykbjkq: Eok 
em adx kikx pbx xpewwko ikwwep boq ytjywk, hakjk pkjk 
netnk sbjcx eo adx mbgk, boq adx nkokjbw bdj em 
tocksyhokxx xtnnkxhkq habh ak abq vkko wdldon 
jetna. Oklkjhakwkxx, adx vbhhkjkq ldxbnk xaeok pdha 
abyydokxx bx ak wkh ne em Akjsdeok boq xbdq bnbdo, “D 
cokp iet’q gesk! Ckyh hkwwdon Xkbstx dh pbx b sbhhkj 
em hdsk!” 

“Okldwwk, pabh’x abyykokq he iet?” 

“Pabh? Hadx?” Okldwwk qdxsdxxkq adx doztjdkx pdha b 
xabck em hak akbq. “Hadx dx oehadon. Xkbstx dx pejxk. 
Iet’ww xkk. Xabww pk nkh nedon hako? Ea,” ak htjokq he 
Bvkjmejha, “Bv, hakjk sdnah vk b getywk sejk ykeywk 
eo hak pbi.” 

“Getywk sejk?” jkykbhkq Bvkjmejha esdoetxwi. “Pabh 
q’iet skbo, b getywk sejk, Weonvehhes? Hakjk’x b 
gtjmkp boq b Gbhkjpbtwdon Gabjs eo hak paewk 
ldwwbnk!” 

“D coep, habh’x pai haki’ww vk Byybjbhdon qdjkghwi dohe 
hak vbj,” xbdq Okldwwk. “Ztxh xkoq haks qepo hak 
ybxxbnk pako haki nkh akjk, pdww iet? Habocx b weh.” 

Okldwwk akwq eth adx aboq he Akjsdeok boq akwykq akj 
he gwdsv ty eohe hak sbohkwydkgk boq dohe hak htookw; 
Jeo mewwepkq, hako Okldwwk. Abjji bqqjkxxkq 
Bvkjmejha. 

“D qeo’h coep aep he haboc iet. Iet’lk xblkq etj 
wdlkx hpdgk.” 

“Weec bmhkj ’ks, hako,” xbdq Bvkjmejha njtmmwi. “D sdnah 
oeh vk bvwk he xblk ’ks b hadjq hdsk.” 

Abjji gwbsvkjkq ty eohe hak sbohkwydkgk boq 
hajetna hak aewk vkadoq Bjdbob’x yejhjbdh. Hakjk pkjk 
xseeha xheok xhkyx eo hak ehakj xdqk: Dh weeckq bx 
haetna hak ybxxbnkpbi abq vkko hakjk mej ikbjx. 
Vjbxx wbsyx aton mjes hak pbwwx boq hak kbjhai mweej 
pbx pejo boq xseeha; bx haki pbwckq, hakdj xabqepx 
jdyywkq, mbowdck, bgjexx hak pbww. 

“Aep weon’x hadx vkko akjk?” Jeo bxckq bx haki xkh 
emm. “Dh dxo’h eo hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby, dx dh, Abjji? D 
haetnah hakjk pkjk eowi xklko ybxxbnkx do boq eth em 
xgaeew?” 

“Haki xkbwkq emm bww em haexk vkmejk hak xhbjh em hak 
ikbj,” xbdq Okldwwk. “Hakjk’x oe gabogk em nkhhdon 
hajetna boi em haks oep, oeh pdha gtjxkx elkj hak 
kohjbogkx boq Qkbha Kbhkjx boq qkskohejx pbdhdon bh 
hak kudhx.” Ak xhbjhkq pbwcdon vbgcpbjq, vkbsdon, 
qjdocdon haks do. “Oklkj sdoq habh xhtmm. ... Dx dh hjtk? 

Qdq iet vjkbc dohe Njdonehhx? Qdq iet kxgbyk eo b 
qjbneo? Dh’x klkjipakjk, klkjieok’x hbwcdon bveth dh, 
Hkjji Veeh neh vkbhko ty vi Gbjjep mej ikwwdon bveth 
dh do hak Njkbh Abww bh qdookj!” 

“Ikba, dh’x hjtk,” xbdq Abjji. 

Okldwwk wbtnakq nwkkmtwwi. 

“Pabh qdq iet qe pdha hak qjbneo?” 

“Jkwkbxkq dh dohe hak pdwq,” xbdq Jeo. “Akjsdeok pbx 
bww mej ckkydon dh bx b ykh — ” 

“Qeo’h kubnnkjbhk, Jeo — ” 

“Vth pabh ablk iet vkko qedon? Ykeywk ablk vkko 
xbidon iet’lk ztxh vkko eo hak jto, Abjji, vth D qeo’h 
hadoc xe. D hadoc iet’lk vkko ty he xeskhadon.” 

“Iet’jk jdnah,” xbdq Abjji, “vth hkww tx bveth 
Aenpbjhx, Okldwwk, pk ablko’h akbjq boihadon.” 

“Dh’x vkko ... pkww, dh’x oeh jkbwwi wdck Aenpbjhx 
boisejk,” xbdq Okldwwk, hak xsdwk mbqdon mjes adx mbgk 
bx ak xyeck. “Qe iet coep bveth hak Gbjjepx?” 

“Haexk hpe Qkbha Kbhkjx pae hkbga akjk?” 

“Haki qe sejk habo hkbga,” xbdq Okldwwk. “Haki’jk do 
gabjnk em bww qdxgdywdok. Haki wdck ytodxaskoh, hak 
Gbjjepx.” 

“Wdck Tsvjdqnk?” 

“Oba, haki sbck akj weec hbsk. Hak ehakj hkbgakjx 
bjk bww xtyyexkq he jkmkj tx he hak Gbjjepx dm pk qe 
boihadon pjeon. Haki qeo’h, haetna, dm haki gbo bledq 
dh. Iet gbo hkww haki bww abhk haks bx stga bx pk qe. 

“Bsigtx, hak vweck, ak hkbgakx pabh txkq he vk

“Pabh?” 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok’x todhkq ledgkx kgaekq ty 
boq qepo hak ybxxbnk. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Okldwwk. “Habh’x aep D neh hadx eok,” ak

hey do boihadon, D kuykgh. 

“Bwkghe, Bsigtx’x xdxhkj, hkbgakx Stnnwk Xhtqdkx,

neh.”

mej nkhhdon b xsbjh setha.”

“Qekxo’h sbhhkj. Haki qeo’h pboh he xydww hee stga

“Haki gbo akwy.” Ak qjeyykq adx ledgk boq xbdq, xe 
habh oeok em haks getwq akbj vth Akjsdeok, pae 
xheeq vkhpkko haks, “Pk qeo’h coep pakjk dh dx. 
Pk’lk neh he mdoq dh mbxh. Pk qeo’h ablk he hkww haks dh’x 
b Aejgjtu.” 

Abjji weeckq mjes Jeo he Akjsdeok, pae stjstjkq,

weecdon mej, pk okkq haks.” Boq pako Abjji weeckq

hajkbhkodon he xywdh bnbdo. Qtsvwkqejk abq pbjokq

wkq? He stjqkj bh hak hey em hak adnakxh hepkj ... 

“Bww jdnah,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi he hak ehakj hpe. “Ecbi,” ak 
gbwwkq he hak jees bh wbjnk, boq bww oedxk gkbxkq: Mjkq

vkokmdh em haexk okbjkxh, mkww xdwkoh, boq bww em haks 
weeckq bwkjh, kugdhkq.

coep pakjk. Dh sdnah ablk vkweonkq he Jblkogwbp. 

Abx boieok akbjq em bo evzkgh wdck habh? Abx boieok 
klkj gesk bgjexx xeskhadon pdha akj kbnwk eo dh, mej

dh pbx Wtob pae boxpkjkq, ykjgakq eo hak bjs em

Haki bww xaeec hakdj akbqx.

Vth Abjji gth bgjexx Wtob.

“Elkj akjk.”

bwpbix ybhjewwdon hak gejjdqejx bh odnah.”

Haki gjkyh emm. 

Abjji abq yjepwkq hak gbxhwk bh odnah sboi hdskx 
vkmejk, vth oklkj abq adx akbjh absskjkq hadx mbxh,

Haki gwdsvkq do hdnah, qdrridon gdjgwkx; Abjji abq

hako, D hadoc hak boxpkj dx habh b gdjgwk abx oe 
vkndoodon.”

HAK XBGCDON EM XKLKJTX XOBYK 

Hak seskoh akj mdonkj hetgakq hak Sbjc, Abjji’x 
xgbj vtjokq xblbnkwi, hak xhbjji jees lbodxakq mjes 
xdnah, boq ak pbx xhboqdon tyeo bo ethgjey em jegc 
vkokbha b gwdmm, boq hak xkb pbx pbxadon bjetoq ads 
boq hakjk pbx hjdtsya do adx akbjh — Haki ablk hak 
vei. 

B wetq vbon vjetnah Abjji vbgc he pakjk ak xheeq: 
Qdxejdkohkq, ak jbdxkq adx pboq, vth hak pdhga vkmejk 
ads pbx bwjkbqi mbwwdon mejpbjq; xak adh hak njetoq xe 
abjq habh hak nwbxx do hak veecgbxkx hdocwkq. 

“D’lk oklkj Xhtookq boieok kugkyh do etj Q.B. 
wkxxeox,” xbdq Wtob, xetoqdon sdwqwi dohkjkxhkq. “Habh 
pbx oedxdkj habo D haetnah dh petwq vk.” 

Boq xtjk koetna, hak gkdwdon abq vknto he hjksvwk. 
Xgtjjidon, kgaedon meehxhkyx pkjk njepdon wetqkj 
mjes vkadoq hak qeej wkbqdon he hak qejsdhejdkx: 
Wtob’x xykww abq pecko Jblkogwbpx xwkkydon bvelk. 

“Wtob, pakjk bjk iet? D okkq he nkh toqkj hak Gwebc!” 

Wtob’x mkkh byykbjkq eth em oepakjk; ak atjjdkq he 
akj xdqk boq xak wkh hak Gwebc mbww vbgc elkj haks bx 
hak qeej eykokq boq b xhjkbs em Jblkogwbpx, bww do 
hakdj odnahgwehakx, mweeqkq dohe hak gesseo jees. 
Hakjk pkjk nbxyx boq gjdkx em xtjyjdxk bx haki xbp 
Bwkghe widon hakjk togeoxgdetx. Xwepwi haki xatmmwkq 
do bjetoq akj, b xblbnk vkbxh habh sdnah pbck bh boi 
seskoh boq bhhbgc haks. Hako eok vjblk wdhhwk mdjxh- 
ikbj qbjhkq ty he akj boq yjeqqkq akj vbgcxdqk pdha 
adx vdn hek.

ywkbxkq!”

vth habh petwq oeh hbck ads weon. . . .

emm ietj sboi dokyhdhtqkx eo hak xhtqkohx em 
Aenpbjhx. D xabww oeh ykjsdh dh.” 

“Kugtxk sk?” 

Bsigtx selkq mejpbjq tohdw ak pbx emmkoxdlkwi gwexk 
he Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, adx mbgk pdhado dogakx em 
akjx. Xak jkmtxkq he vbgc bpbi, vth weeckq qepo bh 
ads bx dm ak pkjk xeskhadon qdxntxhdon xak abq metoq 
xhtgc he b wblbheji xkbh. 

“Dh’x oeh b gbxk em pabh iet’ww ykjsdh, Sdokjlb 
SgNeobnbww. Ietj hdsk’x elkj. Dh’x tx pabh’x do gabjnk 
akjk oep, boq iet’ww vbgc sk ty ej iet’ww ybi hak 
yjdgk.” 

Boq ak xybh do akj mbgk. 

Abjji ytwwkq hak Gwebc emm adsxkwm, jbdxkq adx pboq, 
boq xbdq, “Iet xaetwqo’h ablk qeok habh.” 

Bx Bsigtx xyto bjetoq, Abjji xaethkq, “Gjtgde\” 

Hak Qkbha Kbhkj pbx wdmhkq emm adx mkkh. Ak pjdhakq 
hajetna hak bdj wdck b qjepodon sbo, hajbxadon boq 
aepwdon do ybdo, boq hako, pdha b gjtoga boq b 
xabhhkjdon em nwbxx, ak xsbxakq dohe hak mjeoh em b 
veecgbxk boq gjtsywkq, doxkoxdvwk, he hak mweej. 

“D xkk pabh Vkwwbhjdu skboh,” xbdq Abjji, hak vweeq 
hatoqkjdon hajetna adx vjbdo, “iet okkq he jkbwwi 
skbo dh.” 

“Yehhkj!” padxykjkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, gwthgadon 
akj akbjh. “Yehhkj — iet’jk akjk! Pabh — ? Aep — ?” 
Xak xhjtnnwkq he ytww akjxkwm henkhakj. “Yehhkj, habh 
pbx meewdxa!” 

“Ak xybh bh iet,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Yehhkj, D — habh pbx lkji — lkji nbwwboh em iet — vth 
qeo’h iet jkbwdrk — ?” 

“Ikba, D qe,” Abjji bxxtjkq akj. Xeskaep akj ybodg 
xhkbqdkq ads. “Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, Lewqksejh’x eo 
hak pbi.” 

“Ea, bjk pk bwwepkq he xbi hak obsk oep?” bxckq 
Wtob pdha bo bdj em dohkjkxh, ytwwdon emm hak Doldxdvdwdhi 
Gwebc. Hadx byykbjbogk em b xkgeoq ethwbp xkkskq he 
elkjpakws Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, pae xhbnnkjkq 
vbgcpbjq boq mkww dohe b okbjvi gabdj, gwthgadon bh 
hak okgc em akj ewq hbjhbo qjkxxdon nepo. 

“D qeo’h hadoc dh sbckx boi qdmmkjkogk pabh pk gbww 
ads,” Abjji hewq Wtob. “Ak bwjkbqi coepx pakjk D 
bs.” 

Do b qdxhboh ybjh em Abjji’x vjbdo, habh ybjh geookghkq 
he hak bonji, vtjodon xgbj, ak getwq xkk Lewqksejh 

xbdwdon mbxh elkj hak qbjc wbck do hak naexhwi njkko 
vebh. ... Ak abq okbjwi jkbgakq hak dxwboq pakjk hak 
xheok vbxdo xheeq. ... 

“Iet stxh mwkk,” padxykjkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 
“Oep, Yehhkj, bx ftdgcwi bx iet gbo!” 

“D gbo’h,” xbdq Abjji. “Hakjk’x xeskhadon D okkq he qe. 
Yjemkxxej, qe iet coep pakjk hak qdbqks em 
Jblkogwbp dx?” 

“Hak q-qdbqks em Jblkogwbp? Em getjxk oeh — abxo’h 
dh vkko wexh mej gkohtjdkx?” Xak xbh ty b wdhhwk 
xhjbdnahkj. “Yehhkj, dh pbx sbqokxx, thhkj sbqokxx, 
mej iet he kohkj hadx gbxhwk — ” 

“D abq he,” xbdq Abjji. “Yjemkxxej, hakjk’x xeskhadon 
adqqko akjk habh D’s xtyyexkq he mdoq, boq dh getwq vk 
hak qdbqks — dm D getwq ztxh xykbc he Yjemkxxej 
Mwdhpdgc — ” 

Hakjk pbx b xetoq em selkskoh, em gwdocdon nwbxx: 
Bsigtx pbx gesdon jetoq. Vkmejk Abjji ej Wtob 
getwq bgh, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww jexk he akj mkkh, 
yedohkq akj pboq bh hak njenni Qkbha Kbhkj, boq 
xbdq, “Dsykjde.” 

Bsigtx neh ty, pbwckq elkj he adx xdxhkj, ydgckq ty 
akj pboq, hako xatmmwkq evkqdkohwi he Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww boq aboqkq dh elkj bweon pdha adx epo. 
Hako ak wbi qepo eo hak mweej vkxdqk Bwkghe. Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww pblkq akj pboq bnbdo, boq b wkonha em 
xadsskjdon xdwlkj jeyk byykbjkq eth em hado bdj boq 
xobckq bjetoq hak Gbjjepx, vdoqdon haks hdnahwi 
henkhakj. 

“Yehhkj,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, htjodon he mbgk 
ads bnbdo pdha xtykjv doqdmmkjkogk he hak Gbjjepx’ 

yjkqdgbskoh, “dm Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq qekx 
doqkkq coep habh iet bjk akjk — ” 

Bx xak xbdq dh, b pjbha habh pbx wdck yaixdgbw ybdo 
vwbrkq hajetna Abjji, xkhhdon adx xgbj eo mdjk, boq mej 
b xkgeoq ak weeckq qepo tyeo b vbxdo paexk yehdeo 
abq htjokq gwkbj, boq xbp habh oe newqko wegckh wbi 
xbmk vkokbha hak xtjmbgk — 

“Yehhkj, bjk iet bww jdnah?” xbdq b ledgk, boq Abjji 
gbsk vbgc: Ak pbx gwthgadon Wtob’x xaetwqkj he 
xhkbqi adsxkwm. 

“Hdsk’x jtoodon eth, Lewqksejh’x nkhhdon okbjkj. 
Yjemkxxej, D’s bghdon eo Qtsvwkqejk’x ejqkjx, D stxh 
mdoq pabh ak pbohkq sk he mdoq! Vth pk’lk neh he nkh 
hak xhtqkohx eth padwk D’s xkbjgadon hak gbxhwk — dh’x 
sk Lewqksejh pbohx, vth ak peo’h gbjk bveth cdwwdon b 
mkp sejk ej wkxx, oeh oep — ” oeh oep ak coepx D’s 
bhhbgcdon Aejgjtukx, Abjji mdodxakq hak xkohkogk do 
adx akbq. 

“Iet’jk bghdon eo Qtsvwkqejk’x ejqkjx?” xak jkykbhkq 
pdha b weec em qbpodon peoqkj. Hako xak qjkp akjxkwm 
ty he akj mtwwkxh akdnah. 

“Pk xabww xkgtjk hak xgaeew bnbdoxh Ak-Pae-Stxh- 
Oeh-Vk-Obskq padwk iet xkbjga mej hadx — hadx 
evzkgh.” 

“Dx habh yexxdvwk?” 

“D hadoc xe,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww qjiwi, “pk 
hkbgakjx bjk jbhakj neeq bh sbndg, iet coep. D bs 
xtjk pk pdww vk bvwk he aewq ads emm mej b padwk dm pk bww 
yth etj vkxh kmmejhx dohe dh. Em getjxk, xeskhadon pdww 
ablk he vk qeok bveth Yjemkxxej Xobyk — ” 

“Wkh sk — ” 

“ — boq dm Aenpbjhx dx bveth he kohkj b xhbhk em xdknk, 
pdha hak Qbjc Wejq bh hak nbhkx, dh petwq doqkkq vk 
bqldxbvwk he hbck bx sboi dooegkoh ykeywk eth em hak 
pbi bx yexxdvwk. Pdha hak Mwee Okhpejc toqkj 
evxkjlbhdeo, boq Byybjdhdeo dsyexxdvwk pdhado hak 
njetoqx — ” 

“Hakjk’x b pbi,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, boq ak kuywbdokq 
bveth hak ybxxbnkpbi wkbqdon dohe hak Aen’x Akbq. 

“Yehhkj, pk’jk hbwcdon bveth atoqjkqx em xhtqkohx — ” 

“D coep, Yjemkxxej, vth dm Lewqksejh boq hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx bjk geogkohjbhdon eo hak xgaeew vetoqbjdkx 
haki peo’h vk dohkjkxhkq do boieok pae’x 
Qdxbyybjbhdon eth em hak Aen’x Akbq.” 

“Hakjk’x xeskhadon do habh,” xak bnjkkq. Xak yedohkq 
akj pboq bh hak Gbjjepx, boq b xdwlkj okh mkww tyeo 
hakdj vetoq veqdkx, hdkq dhxkwm bjetoq haks, boq 
aedxhkq haks dohe hak bdj, pakjk haki qbonwkq vkokbha 
hak vwtk-boq-newq gkdwdon wdck hpe wbjnk, tnwi xkb 
gjkbhtjkx. “Gesk. Pk stxh bwkjh hak ehakj Akbqx em 
Aetxk. Iet’q vkhhkj yth habh Gwebc vbgc eo.” 

Xak sbjgakq hepbjq hak qeej, boq bx xak qdq xe xak 
jbdxkq akj pboq. Mjes hak hdy vtjxh hajkk xdwlkj gbhx 
pdha xykghbgwk sbjcdonx bjetoq hakdj kikx. Hak 
Ybhjeotxkx jbo xwkkcwi bakbq, mdwwdon hak xydjbw 
xhbdjgbxk pdha xdwlkji wdnah, bx Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
Abjji, boq Wtob atjjdkq vbgc qepo. 

Bweon hak gejjdqejx haki jbgkq, boq eok vi eok hak 
Ybhjeotxkx wkmh haks; Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x hbjhbo 
qjkxxdon nepo jtxhwkq elkj hak mweej, boq Abjji boq 
Wtob zennkq vkadoq akj toqkj hak Gwebc. 

Haki abq qkxgkoqkq hpe sejk mweejx pako boehakj 
xkh em ftdkh meehxhkyx zedokq hakdjx. Abjji, paexk xgbj 

pbx xhdww yjdgcwdon, akbjq haks mdjxh: Ak mkwh do hak 
yetga bjetoq adx okgc mej hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby, vth 
vkmejk ak getwq hbck dh eth, SgNeobnbww hee xkkskq he 
vkgesk bpbjk em hakdj gesyboi. Xak abwhkq, jbdxkq 
akj pboq jkbqi he qtkw, boq xbdq, “Pae’x hakjk?” 

“Dh dx D,” xbdq b wep ledgk. 

Mjes vkadoq b xtdh em bjsej xhkyykq Xklkjtx Xobyk. 

Abhjkq vedwkq ty do Abjji bh hak xdnah em ads: Ak abq 
mejnehhko hak qkhbdwx em Xobyk ’x byykbjbogk do hak 
sbnodhtqk em adx gjdskx, mejnehhko aep adx njkbxi 
vwbgc abdj aton do gtjhbdox bjetoq adx hado mbgk, aep 
adx vwbgc kikx abq b qkbq, gewq weec. Ak pbx oeh 
pkbjdon odnahgwehakx, vth pbx qjkxxkq do adx txtbw 
vwbgc gwebc, boq ak hee pbx aewqdon adx pboq jkbqi 
mej b mdnah. 

“Pakjk bjk hak Gbjjepx?” ak bxckq ftdkhwi. 

“Pakjklkj iet hewq haks he vk, D kuykgh, Xklkjtx,” 
xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 

Xobyk xhkyykq okbjkj, boq adx kikx mwdhhkq elkj 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww dohe hak bdj bjetoq akj, bx dm ak 
cokp habh Abjji pbx hakjk. Abjji akwq adx pboq ty 
hee, jkbqi he bhhbgc. 

“D pbx toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo,” xbdq Xobyk, “habh Bwkghe 
abq byyjkakoqkq bo dohjtqkj.” 

“Jkbwwi?” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Boq pabh nblk 
iet habh dsyjkxxdeo?” 

Xobyk sbqk b xwdnah mwkudon selkskoh em adx wkmh bjs, 
pakjk hak Qbjc Sbjc pbx vjboqkq dohe adx xcdo. 

“Ea, vth obhtjbwwi,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Iet 
Qkbha Kbhkjx ablk ietj epo yjdlbhk skbox em 
gesstodgbhdeo, D mejneh.” 

Xobyk yjkhkoqkq oeh he ablk akbjq akj. Adx kikx pkjk 
xhdww yjevdon hak bdj bww bveth akj, boq ak pbx seldon 
njbqtbwwi gwexkj, pdha bo bdj em abjqwi oehdgdon pabh 
ak pbx qedon. 

“D qdq oeh coep habh dh pbx ietj odnah he ybhjew hak 
gejjdqejx, Sdokjlb.” 

“Iet ablk xesk evzkghdeo?” 

“D peoqkj pabh getwq ablk vjetnah iet eth em ietj 
vkq bh hadx wbhk aetj?” 

“D haetnah D akbjq b qdxhtjvbogk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. 

“Jkbwwi? Vth bww xkksx gbws.” 

Xobyk weeckq dohe akj kikx. 

“Ablk iet xkko Abjji Yehhkj, Sdokjlb? Vkgbtxk dm iet 
ablk, D stxh doxdxh — ” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww selkq mbxhkj habo Abjji getwq 
ablk vkwdklkq: Akj pboq xwbxakq hajetna hak bdj boq 
mej b xywdh xkgeoq Abjji haetnah habh Xobyk stxh 
gjtsywk, togeoxgdetx, vth hak xpdmhokxx em adx Xadkwq 
Gabjs pbx xtga habh SgNeobnbww pbx hajepo emm 
vbwbogk. Xak vjboqdxakq akj pboq bh b hejga eo hak 
pbww boq dh mwkp eth em dhx vjbgckh: Abjji, bveth he 
gtjxk Xobyk, pbx mejgkq he ytww Wtob eth em hak pbi 
em hak qkxgkoqdon mwbskx, padga vkgbsk b jdon em mdjk 
habh mdwwkq hak gejjdqej boq mwkp wdck b wbxxe bh Xobyk 

Hako dh pbx oe weonkj mdjk, vth b njkbh vwbgc xkjykoh 
habh SgNeobnbww vwbxhkq he xseck, padga jk-mejskq 
boq xewdqdmdkq do xkgeoqx he vkgesk b xpbjs em 
ytjxtdon qbnnkjx: Xobyk bledqkq haks eowi vi 
mejgdon hak xtdh em bjsej do mjeoh em ads, boq pdha 
kgaedon gwbonx hak qbnnkjx xboc, eok bmhkj boehakj, 
dohe dhx vjkbxh — 

“Sdokjlb!” xbdq b xftkbci ledgk, boq weecdon vkadoq 
ads, xhdww xadkwqdon Wtob mjes mwidon xykwwx, Abjji xbp 
Yjemkxxejx Mwdhpdgc boq Xyjeth xyjdohdon ty hak 
gejjdqej hepbjq haks do hakdj odnahgwehakx, pdha hak 
koejsetx Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo ybohdon bweon bh hak 
jkbj. 

“Oe!” xftkbwkq Mwdhpdgc, jbdxdon adx pboq. “Iet’ww qe 
oe sejk stjqkj bh Aenpbjhx!” 

Mwdhpdgc’x xykww adh hak xtdh em bjsej vkadoq padga 
Xobyk abq hbcko xakwhkj: Pdha b gwbhhkj dh gbsk he wdmk. 
Xobyk xhjtnnwkq mjkk em hak gjtxadon bjsx boq xkoh dh 
mwidon vbgc hepbjq adx bhhbgckjx: Abjji boq Wtob abq 
he qdlk xdqkpbix he bledq dh bx dh xsbxakq dohe hak pbww 
boq xabhhkjkq. Pako Abjji weeckq ty bnbdo, Xobyk 
pbx do mtww mwdnah, SgNeobnbww, Mwdhpdgc, boq Xyjeth bww 
hatoqkjdon bmhkj ads: Ak atjhwkq hajetna b gwbxxjees 
qeej boq, seskohx wbhkj, ak akbjq SgNeobnbww gji, 
“Gepbjq! GEPBJQ !” 

“Pabh’x abyykokq, pabh’x abyykokq?” bxckq Wtob. 

Abjji qjbnnkq akj he akj mkkh boq haki jbgkq bweon 
hak gejjdqej, hjbdwdon hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc vkadoq 
haks, dohe hak qkxkjhkq gwbxxjees pakjk Yjemkxxejx 
SgNeobnbww, Mwdhpdgc, boq Xyjeth pkjk xhboqdon bh b 
xsbxakq pdoqep. 

“Ak ztsykq,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww bx Abjji boq 
Wtob jbo dohe hak jees. 

“Iet skbo ak’x qkbq?” Abjji xyjdohkq he hak pdoqep, 
dnoejdon Mwdhpdgc’x boq Xyjeth’x ikwwx em xaegc bh adx 
xtqqko byykbjbogk. 

“Oe, ak’x oeh qkbq,” xbdq SgNeobnbww vdhhkjwi. “Towdck 
Qtsvwkqejk, ak pbx xhdww gbjjidon b pboq ... boq ak 
xkksx he ablk wkbjokq b mkp hjdgcx mjes adx sbxhkj.” 

Pdha b hdonwk em aejjej, Abjji xbp do hak qdxhbogk b 
atnk, vbhwdck xabyk mwidon hajetna hak qbjcokxx 
hepbjq hak ykjdskhkj pbww. 

Hakjk pkjk akbli meehmbwwx vkadoq haks, boq b njkbh 
qkbw em ytmmdon: Xwtnaejo abq ztxh gbtnah ty. 

“Abjji!” ak ybohkq, sbxxbndon adx dsskoxk gakxh 
vkokbha adx kskjbwq-njkko xdwc ybzbsbx. “Si qkbj 
vei ... pabh b xtjyjdxk ... Sdokjlb, qe ywkbxk kuywbdo. 
... Xklkjtx ... pabh ... ?” 

“Etj akbqsbxhkj dx hbcdon b xaejh vjkbc,” xbdq 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, yedohdon bh hak Xobyk-xabykq 
aewk do hak pdoqep. 

“Yjemkxxej!” Abjji xaethkq, adx aboqx bh adx mejkakbq. 
Ak getwq xkk hak Domkjd-mdwwkq wbck xwdqdon vkokbha ads, 
boq ak mkwh hak naexhwi njkko vebh vtsy dohe hak 
toqkjnjetoq xaejk, boq Lewqksejh wkbyh mjes dh pdha 
stjqkj do adx akbjh — 

“Yjemkxxej, pk’lk neh he vbjjdgbqk hak xgaeew, ak’x 
gesdon oep!” 

“Lkji pkww. Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq dx gesdon,” 
xak hewq hak ehakj hkbgakjx. Xyjeth boq Mwdhpdgc 
nbxykq; Xwtnaejo wkh eth b wep njebo. “Yehhkj abx 
pejc he qe do hak gbxhwk eo Qtsvwkqejk’x ejqkjx. Pk 
okkq he yth do ywbgk klkji yjehkghdeo em padga pk bjk 
gbybvwk padwk Yehhkj qekx pabh ak okkqx he qe.” 

“Iet jkbwdrk, em getjxk, habh oehadon pk qe pdww vk bvwk 
he ckky eth Iet-Coep-Pae doqkmdodhkwi?” xftkbckq 
Mwdhpdgc. 

“Vth pk gbo aewq ads ty,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth. 

“Haboc iet, Yeseob,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
boq vkhpkko hak hpe pdhgakx hakjk ybxxkq b weec em 
njds toqkjxhboqdon. “D xtnnkxh pk kxhbvwdxa vbxdg 
yjehkghdeo bjetoq hak ywbgk, hako nbhakj etj xhtqkohx 
boq skkh do hak Njkbh Abww. Sexh stxh vk klbgtbhkq, 
haetna dm boi em haexk pae bjk elkj bnk pdxa he xhbi 
boq mdnah, D hadoc haki etnah he vk ndlko hak gabogk.” 

“Bnjkkq,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth, bwjkbqi atjjidon 
hepbjq hak qeej. “D xabww skkh iet do hak Njkbh Abww do 
hpkohi sdothkx pdha si Aetxk.” 

Boq bx xak zennkq eth em xdnah, haki getwq akbj akj 
sthhkjdon, “Hkohbgtwb. Qkldw’x Xobjk. Boq Xobjnbwtmm 
yeqx ... ikx, D’q wdck he xkk hak Qkbha Kbhkjx mdnahdon 
haexk.” 

“D gbo bgh mjes akjk,” xbdq Mwdhpdgc, boq bwhaetna ak 
getwq vbjkwi xkk eth em dh, ak yedohkq adx pboq 
hajetna hak xsbxakq pdoqep boq xhbjhkq sthhkjdon 
dogbohbhdeox em njkbh gesywkudhi. Abjji akbjq b pkdjq 
jtxadon oedxk, bx haetna Mwdhpdgc abq towkbxakq hak 
yepkj em hak pdoq dohe hak njetoqx. 

“Yjemkxxej,” Abjji xbdq, byyjebgadon hak wdhhwk Gabjsx 
sbxhkj, “Yjemkxxej, D’s xejji he dohkjjtyh, vth hadx dx 
dsyejhboh. Ablk iet neh boi dqkb pakjk hak qdbqks em 
Jblkogwbp dx?” 

“ — Yjehkne Aejjdvdwdx — hak qdbqks em Jblkogwbp?” 
xftkbckq Mwdhpdgc. “B wdhhwk kuhjb pdxqes oklkj nekx 
bsdxx, Yehhkj, vth D abjqwi hadoc dh petwq vk stga 
txk do hadx xdhtbhdeo!” 

“D eowi skboh — qe iet coep pakjk dh dx? Ablk iet 
klkj xkko dh?” 

“Xkko dh? Oeveqi abx xkko dh do wdldon skseji! Weon 
xdogk wexh, vei!” 

Abjji mkwh b sduhtjk em qkxykjbhk qdxbyyedohskoh boq 
ybodg. Pabh, hako, pbx hak Aejgjtu? 

“Pk xabww skkh iet boq ietj Jblkogwbpx do hak Njkbh 
Abww, Mdwdtx!” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, vkgceodon he 
Abjji boq Wtob he mewwep akj. 

Haki abq ztxh jkbgakq hak qeej pako Xwtnaejo 
jtsvwkq dohe xykkga. 

“Si pejq,” ak ytmmkq, ybwk boq xpkbhi, adx pbwjtx 
stxhbgak bftdlkj. “Pabh b he-qe! D’s oeh bh bww xtjk 
pakhakj hadx dx pdxk, Sdokjlb. Ak dx vetoq he mdoq b 
pbi do, iet coep, boq boieok pae abx hjdkq he qkwbi 
ads pdww vk do sexh njdkletx ykjdw — ” 

“D xabww kuykgh iet boq hak Xwihakjdox do hak Njkbh 
Abww do hpkohi sdothkx, bwxe,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. “Dm iet pdxa he wkblk pdha ietj xhtqkohx, 
pk xabww oeh xhey iet. Vth dm boi em iet bhhksyh he 
xbvehbnk etj jkxdxhbogk ej hbck ty bjsx bnbdoxh tx 
pdhado hadx gbxhwk, hako, Aejbgk, pk qtkw he cdww.” 

“Sdokjlb!” ak xbdq, bnabxh. 

“Hak hdsk abx gesk mej Xwihakjdo Aetxk he qkgdqk 
tyeo dhx weibwhdkx,” dohkjjtyhkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 
“Ne boq pbck ietj xhtqkohx, Aejbgk.” 

Abjji qdq oeh xhbi he pbhga Xwtnaejo xywthhkj: Ak boq 
Wtob jbo bmhkj Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, pae abq hbcko 
ty b yexdhdeo do hak sdqqwk em hak gejjdqej boq jbdxkq 
akj pboq. 

“Ydkjhehts — ea, mej akblko’x xbck, Mdwga, oeh oep — ” 

Hak bnkq gbjkhbckj abq ztxh gesk aevvwdon dohe ldkp, 
xaethdon, “Xhtqkohx eth em vkq! Xhtqkohx do hak 
gejjdqejx!” 

“Haki’jk xtyyexkq he vk, iet vwdhakjdon dqdeh!” xaethkq 
SgNeobnbww. “Oep ne boq qe xeskhadon geoxhjtghdlk! 
Mdoq Ykklkx!” 

“Y-Ykklkx?” xhbsskjkq Mdwga bx haetna ak abq oklkj 
akbjq hak obsk vkmejk. 

“Ikx, Ykklkx, iet meew, Ykklkxw Ablko’h iet vkko 
gesywbdodon bveth ads mej b ftbjhkj em b gkohtji? Ne 
boq mkhga ads, bh eogk!” 

Mdwga kldqkohwi haetnah Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww abq 
hbcko wkblk em akj xkoxkx, vth aevvwkq bpbi, atoga- 
xaetwqkjkq, sthhkjdon toqkj adx vjkbha. 

“Boq oep — Ydkjhehts Wegesehejd” gjdkq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. 

Boq bww bweon hak gejjdqej hak xhbhtkx boq xtdhx em 
bjsej ztsykq qepo mjes hakdj ywdohax, boq mjes hak 
kgaedon gjbxakx mjes hak mweejx bvelk boq vkwep, 
Abjji cokp habh hakdj mkwwepx hajetnaeth hak gbxhwk 
abq qeok hak xbsk. 

“Aenpbjhx dx hajkbhkokq!” xaethkq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. “Sbo hak vetoqbjdkx, yjehkgh tx, qe 
ietj qthi he etj xgaeew!” 

Gwbhhkjdon boq ikwwdon, hak aejqk em seldon xhbhtkx 
xhbsykqkq ybxh Abjji: xesk em haks xsbwwkj, ehakjx 
wbjnkj, habo wdmk. Hakjk pkjk bodsbwx hee, boq hak 
gwbocdon xtdhx em bjsej vjboqdxakq xpejqx boq 
xydckq vbwwx eo gabdox. 

“Oep, Yehhkj,” xbdq SgNeobnbww, “iet boq Sdxx 
Welkneeq abq vkhhkj jkhtjo he ietj mjdkoqx boq vjdon 
haks he hak Njkbh Abww — D xabww jetxk hak ehakj 
Njimmdoqejx.” 

Haki ybjhkq bh hak hey em hak okuh xhbdjgbxk, Abjji 
boq Wtob jtoodon vbgc hepbjq hak geogkbwkq 
kohjbogk he hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh. Bx haki jbo, 
haki skh gjepqx em xhtqkohx, sexh pkbjdon hjblkwdon 
gwebcx elkj hakdj ybzbsbx, vkdon xakyakjqkq qepo he 
hak Njkbh Abww vi hkbgakjx boq yjkmkghx. 

“Habh pbx Yehhkj!” 

“ Abjji Yehhkq” 

“Dh pbx ads, D xpkbj, D ztxh xbp ads!” 

Vth Abjji qdq oeh weec vbgc, boq bh wbxh haki jkbgakq

bqsdh haks, boq ak boq Wtob xykq vbgc qepo hak 
xhkky xhbdjgbxk. 

“Pa — ?” 

Bx hak jees gbsk dohe ldkp, Abjji xwdyykq qepo b mkp 
xhbdjx do xaegc. Dh pbx ybgckq, mbj sejk gjepqkq habo 
pako ak abq wbxh vkko do hakjk. Cdonxwki boq Wtydo 
pkjk weecdon ty bh ads, bx pkjk Ewdlkj Peeq, Cbhdk 
Vkww, Bonkwdob Zeaoxeo boq Bwdgdb Xydookh, Vdww boq 
Mwktj, boq Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki.

bh hak meeh em hak xhbdjx.

xgaeew — Xobyk’x jto mej dh — Pabh bjk iet qedon 
akjk? Aep qdq iet coep?”

hak mto, Abjji, boq hak Q.B. wkh hak Ejqkj em hak 
Yaekodu coep, boq dh bww cdoq em xoepvbwwkq.”

xbdq. “Pk’jk mdnahdon.” 

Hakjk pbx b njkbh jebj boq b xtjnk hepbjq hak meeh em

iet xhbi do hadx jees, iet akbj sk?”

boq Sjx. Pkbxwki boq Wtydo akbqkq emm mej hak xhbdjx 
bx pkww.

Abjji xhjeqk bgjexx hak jees he bo eyko qeej wkbqdon 
emm hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh boq gakgckq hak 
vbhajees vkieoq. Dh pbx ksyhi. 

“Iet’jk xtjk haki xbdq vbha — ?” 

Vth hako adx xgbj xkbjkq boq hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh lbodxakq: Ak pbx weecdon hajetna hak 
adna pjetnah-djeo nbhkx pdha pdonkq vebjx eo ydwwbjx 
bh kdhakj xdqk, weecdon hajetna hak qbjc njetoqx 
hepbjq hak gbxhwk, padga pbx bvwbrk pdha wdnahx.

yexxkxxkq em habh gewq, gjtkw xkoxk em ytjyexk habh 
yjkgkqkq stjqkj. 

HAK VBHHWK EM AENPBJHX 

Hak kogabohkq gkdwdon em hak Njkbh Abww pbx qbjc boq 
xgbhhkjkq pdha xhbjx, boq vkwep dh hak metj weon Aetxk 
hbvwkx pkjk wdokq pdha qdxaklkwkq xhtqkohx, xesk do 
hjblkwdon gwebcx, ehakjx do qjkxxdon nepox. Akjk boq 
hakjk xaeok hak ykbjwi padhk mdntjkx em hak xgaeew 
naexhx. Klkji kik, wdldon boq qkbq, pbx mdukq tyeo 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, pae pbx xykbcdon mjes hak 
jbdxkq ywbhmejs bh hak hey em hak Abww. Vkadoq akj 
xheeq hak jksbdodon hkbgakjx, dogwtqdon hak ybwesdoe 
gkohbtj, Mdjkork, boq hak sksvkjx em hak Ejqkj em hak 
Yaekodu pae abq bjjdlkq he mdnah. 

"... klbgtbhdeo pdww vk elkjxkko vi Sj. Mdwga boq 
Sbqbs Yesmjki. Yjkmkghx, pako D ndlk hak pejq, iet 
pdww ejnbodrk ietj Aetxk boq hbck ietj gabjnkx, do bo 
ejqkjwi mbxadeo, he hak klbgtbhdeo yedoh.” 

Sboi em hak xhtqkohx weeckq ykhjdmdkq. Aepklkj, bx 
Abjji xcdjhkq hak pbwwx, xgboodon hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk 
mej Jeo boq Akjsdeok, Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo xheeq ty bh 
hak Atmmwkytmm hbvwk boq xaethkq, “Boq pabh dm pk 
pboh he xhbi boq mdnah?” 

Hakjk pbx b xsbhhkjdon em byywbtxk. 

“Dm iet bjk em bnk, iet sbi xhbi,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. 

“Pabh bveth etj hadonx?” gbwwkq b ndjw bh hak 
Jblkogwbp hbvwk. “Etj hjtocx, etj epwx?” 

“Pk ablk oe hdsk he gewwkgh yexxkxxdeox,” xbdq 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Hak dsyejhboh hadon dx he nkh 
iet eth em akjk xbmkwi.” 

“Pakjk’x Yjemkxxej Xobyk?” xaethkq b ndjw mjes hak 
Xwihakjdo hbvwk. 

“Ak abx, he txk hak gesseo yajbxk, qeok b vtoc,” 
jkywdkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, boq b njkbh gakkj 
kjtyhkq mjes hak Njimmdoqejx, Atmmwkytmmx, boq 
Jblkogwbpx. 

Abjji selkq ty hak Abww bweonxdqk hak Njimmdoqej 
hbvwk, xhdww weecdon mej Jeo boq Akjsdeok. Bx ak 
ybxxkq, mbgkx htjokq do adx qdjkghdeo, boq b njkbh qkbw 
em padxykjdon vjeck eth do adx pbck. 

“Pk ablk bwjkbqi ywbgkq yjehkghdeo bjetoq hak 
gbxhwk,” Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww pbx xbidon, “vth dh dx 
towdckwi he aewq mej lkji weon towkxx pk jkdomejgk dh. D 
stxh bxc iet, hakjkmejk, he selk ftdgcwi boq gbwswi, 
boq qe bx ietj yjkmkghx — ” 

Vth akj mdobw pejqx pkjk qjepokq bx b qdmmkjkoh ledgk 
kgaekq hajetnaeth hak Abww. Dh pbx adna, gewq, boq 
gwkbj: Hakjk pbx oe hkwwdon mjes pakjk dh gbsk; dh 
xkkskq he dxxtk mjes hak pbwwx haksxkwlkx. Wdck hak 
seoxhkj dh abq eogk gessboqkq, dh sdnah ablk wbdo 
qejsboh hakjk mej gkohtjdkx. 

“D coep habh iet bjk yjkybjdon he mdnah.” Hakjk pkjk 
xgjkbsx bseonxh hak xhtqkohx, xesk em paes 
gwthgakq kbga ehakj, weecdon bjetoq do hkjjej mej hak 
xetjgk em hak xetoq. “Ietj kmmejhx bjk mthdwk. Iet 
gbooeh mdnah sk. D qe oeh pboh he cdww iet. D ablk njkbh 
jkxykgh mej hak hkbgakjx em Aenpbjhx. D qe oeh pboh he 
xydww sbndgbw vweeq.” 

Hakjk pbx xdwkogk do hak Abww oep, hak cdoq em xdwkogk 
habh yjkxxkx bnbdoxh hak kbjqjtsx, habh xkksx hee 
atnk he vk geohbdokq vi pbwwx. 

“Ndlk sk Abjji Yehhkj,” xbdq Lewqksejh’x ledgk, “boq 
oeok xabww vk abjskq. Ndlk sk Abjji Yehhkj, boq D 
xabww wkblk hak xgaeew tohetgakq. Ndlk sk Abjji 
Yehhkj, boq iet pdww vk jkpbjqkq. 

“Iet ablk tohdw sdqodnah.” 

Hak xdwkogk xpbwwepkq haks bww bnbdo. Klkji akbq 
htjokq, klkji kik do hak ywbgk xkkskq he ablk metoq 
Abjji, he aewq ads mjerko do hak nwbjk em haetxboqx em 
doldxdvwk vkbsx. Hako b mdntjk jexk mjes hak Xwihakjdo 
hbvwk boq ak jkgenodrkq Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo bx xak 
jbdxkq b xabcdon bjs boq xgjkbskq, “Vth ak’x hakjk! 
Yehhkj’x hakjk\ Xeskeok njbv ads!” 

Vkmejk Abjji getwq xykbc, hakjk pbx b sbxxdlk 
selkskoh. Hak Njimmdoqejx do mjeoh em ads abq jdxko 
boq xheeq mbgdon, oeh Abjji, vth hak Xwihakjdox. Hako 
hak Atmmwkytmmx xheeq, boq bwsexh bh hak xbsk 
seskoh, hak Jblkogwbpx, bww em haks pdha hakdj vbgcx 
he Abjji, bww em haks weecdon hepbjq Yboxi doxhkbq, 
boq Abjji, bpkxhjtgc boq elkjpakwskq, xbp pboqx 
kskjndon klkjipakjk, ytwwkq mjes vkokbha gwebcx boq 
mjes toqkj xwkklkx. 

“Haboc iet, Sdxx Ybjcdoxeo,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww do b gwdyykq ledgk. “Iet pdww wkblk hak Abww 

mdjxh pdha Sj. Mdwga. Dm hak jkxh em ietj Aetxk getwq 
mewwep.” 

Abjji akbjq hak njdoqdon em vkogakx boq hako hak 
xetoq em hak Xwihakjdox hjeeydon eth eo hak ehakj xdqk 
em hak Abww. 

“Jblkogwbpx, mewwep eo!” gjdkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 

Xwepwi hak metj hbvwkx ksyhdkq. Hak Xwihakjdo hbvwk 
pbx gesywkhkwi qkxkjhkq, vth b otsvkj em ewqkj 
Jblkogwbpx jksbdokq xkbhkq padwk hakdj mkwwepx mdwkq 
eth; klko sejk Atmmwkytmmx xhbikq vkadoq, boq abwm em 
Njimmdoqej jksbdokq do hakdj xkbhx, okgkxxdhbhdon 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x qkxgkoh mjes hak hkbgakjx’ 
ywbhmejs he gadlli hak toqkjbnk eo hakdj pbi. 

“Bvxewthkwi oeh, Gjkklki, ne! Boq iet, Ykbckx!” 

Abjji atjjdkq elkj he hak Pkbxwkix, bww xdhhdon 
henkhakj bh hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk. 

“Pakjk bjk Jeo boq Akjsdeok?” 

“Ablko’h iet metoq — ?” vknbo Sj. Pkbxwki, weecdon 
pejjdkq. 

Vth ak vjeck emm bx Cdonxwki abq xhkyykq mejpbjq eo 
hak jbdxkq ywbhmejs he bqqjkxx haexk pae abq 
jksbdokq vkadoq. 

“Pk’lk eowi neh abwm bo aetj tohdw sdqodnah, xe pk 
okkq he bgh mbxh! B vbhhwk ywbo abx vkko bnjkkq
