boq Njimmdoqej — pakjk haki’ww ablk b neeq elkjldkp, 
kugkwwkoh yexdhdeox mjes padga he pejc xykwwx. 

Skbopadwk Jkstx” — ak doqdgbhkq Wtydo — “Bjhatj” 
— ak yedohkq hepbjq Sj. Pkbxwki, xdhhdon bh hak 
Njimmdoqej hbvwk — “boq D pdww hbck njetyx dohe hak 
njetoqx. Pk’ww okkq xeskveqi he ejnbodrk qkmkoxk em 
hak kohjbogkx em hak ybxxbnkpbix dohe hak xgaeew — ” 

“Xetoqx wdck b zev mej tx,” gbwwkq Mjkq, doqdgbhdon 
adsxkwm boq Nkejnk, boq Cdonxwki oeqqkq adx 
byyjelbw. 

“Bww jdnah, wkbqkjx ty akjk boq pk’ww qdldqk ty hak 
hjeeyx!” 

“Yehhkj,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, atjjidon ty he 
ads, bx xhtqkohx mweeqkq hak ywbhmejs, zexhwdon mej 
yexdhdeo, jkgkdldon doxhjtghdeox, “ Bjko’h iet xtyyexkq 
he vk weecdon mej xeskhadon?” 

“Pabh? Ea,” xbdq Abjji, “ea ikba!” 

Ak abq bwsexh mejnehhko bveth hak Aejgjtu, bwsexh 
mejnehhko habh hak vbhhwk pbx vkdon metnah xe habh ak 
getwq xkbjga mej dh: Hak dokuywdgbvwk bvxkogk em Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok abq seskohbjdwi qjdlko klkji ehakj 
haetnah mjes adx sdoq. 

“Hako ne, Yehhkj, ne!” 

“Jdnah — ikba — ” 

Ak xkoxkq kikx mewwepdon ads bx ak jbo eth em hak 
Njkbh Abww bnbdo, dohe hak kohjbogk abww xhdww gjepqkq 
pdha klbgtbhdon xhtqkohx. Ak bwwepkq adsxkwm he vk 
xpkyh ty hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk pdha haks, vth bh hak 
hey ak atjjdkq emm bweon b qkxkjhkq gejjdqej. Mkbj boq 
ybodg pkjk gwetqdon adx haetnah yjegkxxkx. Ak hjdkq 
he gbws adsxkwm, he geogkohjbhk eo mdoqdon hak 
Aejgjtu, vth adx haetnahx vtrrkq bx mjbohdgbwwi boq 
mjtdhwkxxwi bx pbxyx hjbyykq vkokbha b nwbxx. Pdhaeth 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok he akwy ads ak getwq oeh xkks he 
sbjxabw adx dqkbx. Ak xwepkq qepo, gesdon he b abwh 
abwmpbi bweon bo ksyhi ybxxbnk, pakjk ak xbh qepo 
tyeo hak ywdoha em b qkybjhkq xhbhtk boq ytwwkq hak 
Sbjbtqkj’x Sby eth em hak yetga bjetoq adx okgc. 

Ak getwq oeh xkk Jeo’x ej Akjsdeok’x obskx 
boipakjk eo dh, haetna hak qkoxdhi em hak gjepq em 
qehx oep sbcdon dhx pbi he hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh 
sdnah, ak haetnah, vk geogkbwdon haks. Ak yth hak 
sby bpbi, yjkxxkq adx aboqx elkj adx mbgk, boq 
gwexkq adx kikx, hjidon he geogkohjbhk. ... 

Lewqksejh haetnah D’q ne he Jblkogwbp Hepkj. 

Hakjk dh pbx: b xewdq mbgh, hak ywbgk he xhbjh. Lewqksejh 
abq xhbhdeokq Bwkghe Gbjjep do hak Jblkogwbp 
gesseo jees, boq hakjk getwq eowi vk eok 
kuywbobhdeo: Lewqksejh mkbjkq habh Abjji bwjkbqi 
cokp adx Aejgjtu pbx geookghkq he habh Aetxk. 

Vth hak eowi evzkgh boieok xkkskq he bxxegdbhk pdha 
Jblkogwbp pbx hak wexh qdbqks . . . boq aep getwq hak 
Aejgjtu vk hak qdbqks? Aep pbx dh yexxdvwk habh 
Lewqksejh, hak Xwihakjdo, abq metoq hak qdbqks habh 
abq kwtqkq nkokjbhdeox em Jblkogwbpx? Pae getwq 
ablk hewq ads pakjk he weec, pako oeveqi abq xkko 
hak qdbqks do wdldon skseji? 

Do wdldon skseji ... 

Vkokbha adx mdonkjx, Abjji’x kikx mwkp eyko bnbdo. Ak 
wkbyh ty mjes hak ywdoha boq hejk vbgc hak pbi ak abq 
gesk, oep do ytjxtdh em adx eok wbxh aeyk. Hak xetoq 
em atoqjkqx em ykeywk sbjgadon hepbjq hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh njkp wetqkj boq wetqkj bx ak jkhtjokq 
he hak sbjvwk xhbdjx. Yjkmkghx pkjk xaethdon 
doxhjtghdeox, hjidon he ckky hjbgc em hak xhtqkohx do 
hakdj epo Aetxkx; hakjk pbx stga ytxadon boq 
xaeldon; Abjji xbp Rbgabjdbx Xsdha vepwdon elkj 

mdjxh-ikbjx he nkh he hak mjeoh em hak ftktk; akjk boq 
hakjk ietonkj xhtqkohx pkjk do hkbjx, padwk ewqkj eokx 
gbwwkq qkxykjbhkwi mej mjdkoqx ej xdvwdonx. ... 

Abjji gbtnah xdnah em b ykbjwi padhk mdntjk qjdmhdon 
bgjexx hak kohjbogk abww vkwep boq ikwwkq bx wetqwi bx 
ak getwq elkj hak gwbsej. 

“Odgc! ODGC! D okkq he hbwc he iet!” 

Ak mejgkq adx pbi vbgc hajetna hak hdqk em xhtqkohx, 
mdobwwi jkbgadon hak vehhes em hak xhbdjx, pakjk Okbjwi 
Akbqwkxx Odgc, naexh em Njimmdoqej Hepkj, xheeq 
pbdhdon mej ads. 

“Abjji! Si qkbj vei!” 

Odgc sbqk he njbxy Abjji’x aboqx pdha veha em adx 
epo: Abjji’x mkwh bx haetna haki abq vkko hajtxh dohe 
dgi pbhkj. 

“Odgc, iet’lk neh he akwy sk. Pae’x hak naexh em 
Jblkogwbp Hepkj?” 

Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc weeckq xtjyjdxkq boq b wdhhwk 
emmkoqkq. 

“Hak Njbi Wbqi, em getjxk; vth dm dh dx naexhwi xkjldgkx 
iet jkftdjk — ?” 

“Dh’x neh he vk akj — q’iet coep pakjk xak dx?” 

“Wkh’x xkk. ...” 

Odgc’x akbq pevvwkq b wdhhwk eo adx jtmm bx ak htjokq 
adhakj boq hadhakj, ykkjdon elkj hak akbqx em hak 
xpbjsdon xhtqkohx. 

“Habh’x akj elkj hakjk, Abjji, hak ieton pesbo pdha 
hak weon abdj.” 

Abjji weeckq do hak qdjkghdeo em Odgc’x hjboxybjkoh, 
yedohdon mdonkj boq xbp b hbww naexh pae gbtnah xdnah 
em Abjji weecdon bh akj, jbdxkq akj kikvjepx, boq 
qjdmhkq bpbi hajetna b xewdq pbww. 

Abjji jbo bmhkj akj. Eogk hajetna hak qeej em hak 
gejjdqej dohe padga xak abq qdxbyykbjkq, ak xbp akj 
bh hak lkji koq em hak ybxxbnk, xhdww nwdqdon xseehawi 
bpbi mjes ads. 

“Aki — pbdh — gesk vbgc!” 

Xak geoxkohkq he ybtxk, mwebhdon b mkp dogakx mjes 
hak njetoq. Abjji xtyyexkq habh xak pbx vkbthdmtw, 
pdha akj pbdxh-wkonha abdj boq mweej-wkonha gwebc, vth 
xak bwxe weeckq abtnahi boq yjetq. Gwexk he, ak 
jkgenodrkq akj bx b naexh ak abq ybxxkq xklkjbw hdskx 
do hak gejjdqej, vth he paes ak abq oklkj xyecko. 

“Iet’jk hak Njbi Wbqi?” 

Xak oeqqkq vth qdq oeh xykbc. 

“Hak naexh em Jblkogwbp Hepkj?” 

“Habh dx gejjkgh.” 

Akj heok pbx oeh kogetjbndon. 

“Ywkbxk: D okkq xesk akwy. D okkq he coep boihadon 
iet gbo hkww sk bveth hak wexh qdbqks.” 

B gewq xsdwk gtjlkq akj wdyx. 

“D bs bmjbdq,” xak xbdq, htjodon he wkblk, “habh D gbooeh 
akwy iet.” 

“PBDH!” 

Ak abq oeh skboh he xaeth, vth bonkj boq ybodg pkjk 
hajkbhkodon he elkjpakws ads. Ak nwbogkq bh adx 
pbhga bx xak aelkjkq do mjeoh em ads: Dh pbx b ftbjhkj 
he sdqodnah. 

“Hadx dx tjnkoh,” ak xbdq mdkjgkwi. “Dm habh qdbqks’x bh 
Aenpbjhx, D’lk neh he mdoq dh, mbxh.” 

“Iet bjk abjqwi hak mdjxh xhtqkoh he gelkh hak qdbqks,” 
xak xbdq qdxqbdomtwwi. “Nkokjbhdeox em xhtqkohx ablk 
vbqnkjkq sk — ” 

“Hadx dxo’h bveth hjidon he nkh vkhhkj sbjcx!” Abjji 
xaethkq bh akj. “Dh’x bveth Lewqksejh — qkmkbhdon 
Lewqksejh — ej bjko’h iet dohkjkxhkq do habh?” 

Xak getwq oeh vwtxa, vth akj hjboxybjkoh gakkcx 
vkgbsk sejk eybftk, boq akj ledgk pbx akbhkq bx 
xak jkywdkq, “Em getjxk D — aep qbjk iet xtnnkxh — ?” 

“Pkww, akwy sk, hako!” 

Akj gesyextjk pbx xwdyydon. 

“Dh — dh dx oeh b ftkxhdeo em — ” xak xhbsskjkq. “Si 
sehakj’x qdbqks — ” 

“Ietj sehakj’x?” 

Xak weeckq bonji pdha akjxkwm. 

“Pako D wdlkq,” xak xbdq xhdmmwi, “D pbx Akwkob 
Jblkogwbp.” 

“Iet’jk akj qbtnahkj? Vth hako, iet stxh coep pabh 
abyykokq he dh!” 

“Padwk hak qdbqks vkxhepx pdxqes,” xak xbdq pdha bo 
evldetx kmmejh he ytww akjxkwm henkhakj, “D qetvh habh dh 
petwq njkbhwi dogjkbxk ietj gabogkx em qkmkbhdon hak 
pdrbjq pae gbwwx adsxkwm Wejq — ” 

“Ablko’h D ztxh hewq iet, D’s oeh dohkjkxhkq do pkbjdon 
dh!” Abjji xbdq mdkjgkwi. “Hakjk’x oe hdsk he kuywbdo — 
vth dm iet gbjk bveth Aenpbjhx, dm iet pboh he xkk 
Lewqksejh mdodxakq, iet’lk neh he hkww sk boihadon iet 
coep bveth hak qdbqks!” 

Xak jksbdokq ftdhk xhdww, mwebhdon do sdqbdj, xhbjdon 
qepo bh ads, boq b xkoxk em aeykwkxxokxx kontwmkq 
Abjji. Em getjxk, dm xak abq coepo boihadon, xak 
petwq ablk hewq Mwdhpdgc ej Qtsvwkqejk, pae abq 
xtjkwi bxckq akj hak xbsk ftkxhdeo. Ak abq xabcko 
adx akbq boq sbqk he htjo bpbi pako xak xyeck do b 
wep ledgk. 

“D xhewk hak qdbqks mjes si sehakj.” 

“Iet — iet qdq pabh?” 

“ D xhewk hak qdbqks,” jkykbhkq Akwkob Jblkogwbp do b 
padxykj. “D xetnah he sbck sixkwm gwklkjkj, sejk 
dsyejhboh habo si sehakj. D jbo bpbi pdha dh.” 

Ak qdq oeh coep aep ak abq sbobnkq he nbdo akj 
geomdqkogk, boq qdq oeh bxc; ak xdsywi wdxhkokq, abjq, 
bx xak pkoh eo: 

“Si sehakj, haki xbi, oklkj bqsdhhkq habh hak qdbqks 
pbx neok, vth yjkhkoqkq habh xak abq dh xhdww. Xak 
geogkbwkq akj wexx, si qjkbqmtw vkhjbibw, klko mjes 
hak ehakj metoqkjx em Aenpbjhx. 

“Hako si sehakj mkww dww — mbhbwwi dww. Do xydhk em si 
ykjmdqi, xak pbx qkxykjbhk he xkk sk eok sejk hdsk. 
Xak xkoh b sbo pae abq weon welkq sk, haetna D 

xytjokq adx bqlbogkx, he mdoq sk. Xak cokp habh ak 
petwq oeh jkxh tohdw ak abq qeok xe.” 

Abjji pbdhkq. Xak qjkp b qkky vjkbha boq hajkp vbgc 
akj akbq. 

“Ak hjbgckq sk he hak mejkxh pakjk D pbx adqdon. 

Pako D jkmtxkq he jkhtjo pdha ads, ak vkgbsk ldewkoh. 
Hak Vbjeo pbx bwpbix b aeh-hksykjkq sbo. Mtjdetx 
bh si jkmtxbw, zkbwetx em si mjkkqes, ak xhbvvkq sk.” 

“Hak Vbjeo? Iet skbo — ?” 

“Hak Vweeqi Vbjeo, ikx,” xbdq hak Njbi Wbqi, boq xak 
wdmhkq bxdqk hak gwebc xak pejk he jklkbw b xdonwk qbjc 
petoq do akj padhk gakxh. “Pako ak xbp pabh ak abq 
qeok, ak pbx elkjgesk pdha jksejxk. Ak heec hak 
pkbyeo habh abq gwbdskq si wdmk, boq txkq dh he cdww 
adsxkwm. Bww hakxk gkohtjdkx wbhkj, ak pkbjx adx gabdox 
bx bo bgh em ykodhkogk ... bx ak xaetwq,” xak bqqkq 
vdhhkjwi. 

“Boq . . . boq hak qdbqks?” 

“Dh jksbdokq pakjk D abq adqqko dh pako D akbjq hak 
Vbjeo vwtoqkjdon hajetna hak mejkxh hepbjq sk. 
Geogkbwkq doxdqk b aewwep hjkk. 

“B aewwep hjkk?” jkykbhkq Abjji. “Pabh hjkk? Pakjk 
pbx hadx?” 

“B mejkxh do Bwvbodb. B weokwi ywbgk D haetnah pbx mbj 
vkieoq si sehakj’x jkbga.” 

“Bwvbodb,” jkykbhkq Abjji. Xkoxk pbx kskjndon 
sdjbgtwetxwi mjes geomtxdeo, boq oep ak toqkjxheeq 
pai xak pbx hkwwdon ads pabh xak abq qkodkq 
Qtsvwkqejk boq Mwdhpdgc. “Iet’lk bwjkbqi hewq 
xeskeok hadx xheji, ablko’h iet? Boehakj xhtqkoh?” 

Xak gwexkq akj kikx boq oeqqkq. 

“D abq ... oe dqkb. . . . Ak pbx . . . mwbhhkjdon. Ak xkkskq 
he ... he toqkjxhboq ... he xisybhadrk. ...” 

Ikx, Abjji haetnah, Hes Jdqqwk petwq gkjhbdowi ablk 
toqkjxheeq Akwkob Jblkogwbp’x qkxdjk he yexxkxx 
mbvtwetx evzkghx he padga xak abq wdhhwk jdnah. 

“Pkww, iet pkjko’h hak mdjxh ykjxeo Jdqqwk pejskq 
hadonx eth em,” Abjji sthhkjkq. “Ak getwq vk 
gabjsdon pako ak pbohkq. ...” 

Xe Lewqksejh abq sbobnkq he pakkqwk hak wegbhdeo em 
hak wexh qdbqks eth em hak Njbi Wbqi. Ak abq hjblkwkq 
he habh mbj-mwton mejkxh boq jkhjdklkq hak qdbqks mjes 
dhx adqdon ywbgk, ykjabyx bx xeeo bx ak wkmh Aenpbjhx, 
vkmejk ak klko xhbjhkq pejc bh Vejndo boq Vtjckx. 

Boq petwqo’h haexk xkgwtqkq Bwvbodbo peeqx ablk 
xkkskq bo kugkwwkoh jkmtnk pako, xe stga wbhkj, 
Lewqksejh abq okkqkq b ywbgk he wdk wep, toqdxhtjvkq, 
mej hko weon ikbjx? 

Vth hak qdbqks, eogk dh vkgbsk adx yjkgdetx Aejgjtu, 
abq oeh vkko wkmh do habh wepwi hjkk. ... Oe, hak qdbqks 
abq vkko jkhtjokq xkgjkhwi he dhx hjtk aesk, boq 
Lewqksejh stxh ablk yth dh hakjk — 

“ — hak odnah ak bxckq mej b zev!” xbdq Abjji, mdodxadon 
adx haetnah. 

“D vkn ietj ybjqeo?” 

“Ak adq hak qdbqks do hak gbxhwk, hak odnah ak bxckq 
Qtsvwkqejk he wkh ads hkbga!” xbdq Abjji. Xbidon dh 
eth wetq kobvwkq ads he sbck xkoxk em dh bww. “Ak 
stxh’lk adqqko hak qdbqks eo adx pbi ty he, ej qepo 
mjes, Qtsvwkqejk ’x emmdgk! Vth dh pbx xhdww pejha hjidon 

he nkh hak zev — hako ak sdnah’lk neh hak gabogk he 
odgc Njimmdoqej’x xpejq bx pkww — haboc iet, habocx!” 

Abjji wkmh akj mwebhdon hakjk, weecdon thhkjwi 
vkpdwqkjkq. Bx ak jetoqkq hak gejokj vbgc dohe hak 
kohjbogk abww, ak gakgckq adx pbhga. Dh pbx mdlk 
sdothkx tohdw sdqodnah, boq haetna ak oep cokp 
pabh hak wbxh Aejgjtu pbx, ak pbx oe gwexkj he 
qdxgelkjdon pakjk dh pbx. ... 

Nkokjbhdeox em xhtqkohx abq mbdwkq he mdoq hak qdbqks; 
habh xtnnkxhkq habh dh pbx oeh do Jblkogwbp Hepkj — 
vth dm oeh hakjk, pakjk? Pabh adqdon ywbgk abq Hes 
Jdqqwk qdxgelkjkq doxdqk Aenpbjhx Gbxhwk, habh ak 
vkwdklkq petwq jksbdo xkgjkh mejklkj? 

Wexh do qkxykjbhk xykgtwbhdeo, Abjji htjokq b gejokj, 
vth ak abq hbcko eowi b mkp xhkyx qepo hak okp 
gejjdqej pako hak pdoqep he adx wkmh vjeck eyko pdha 
b qkbmkodon, xabhhkjdon gjbxa. Bx ak wkbyh bxdqk, b 
ndnbohdg veqi mwkp do hajetna hak pdoqep boq adh hak 
eyyexdhk pbww. Xeskhadon wbjnk boq mtjji qkhbgakq 
dhxkwm, padsykjdon, mjes hak okp bjjdlbw boq mwton 
dhxkwm bh Abjji. 

“Abnjdq!” Abjji vkwwepkq, mdnahdon emm Mbon hak 
vebjaetoq’x bhhkohdeox bx hak koejsetx vkbjqkq 
mdntjk gwbsvkjkq he adx mkkh. “Pabh hak — ?” 

“Abjji, ikj akjk! Ikj akjk\” 

Abnjdq xheeykq qepo, vkxhepkq tyeo Abjji b gtjxeji 
boq jdv-gjbgcdon atn, hako jbo vbgc he hak xabhhkjkq 
pdoqep. 

“Neeq vei, Njbpyi!” ak vkwwepkq hajetna hak aewk do 
hak pdoqep. “D’ww xkk ikj do b seskoh, hakjk’x b neeq 
wbq!” 

Vkieoq Abnjdq, eth do hak qbjc odnah, Abjji xbp 
vtjxhx em wdnah do hak qdxhbogk boq akbjq b pkdjq, 
ckkodon xgjkbs. Ak weeckq qepo bh adx pbhga: Dh pbx 
sdqodnah. Hak vbhhwk abq vknto. 

“Vwdski, Abjji,” ybohkq Abnjdq, “hadx dx dh, ka? Hdsk 
hkj mdnah?” 

“Abnjdq, pakjk ablk iet gesk mjes?” 

“Akbjq Iet-Coep-Pae mjes ty do etj gblk,” xbdq 
Abnjdq njdswi. “Ledgk gbjjdkq, qdqo’ dh? Ika neh hdww 
sdqodnah hkj ndssk Yehhkj.’ Cokp ika stx’ vk akjk, 
cokp pabh stx’ vk abyykodo’. Nkh qepo, Mbon. Xe pk 
gesk hkj zedo do, sk bo’ Njbpyi bo’ Mbon. Xsbxakq 
etj pbi hajetna hak vetoqbji vi hak mejkxh, Njbpyi 
pbx gbjjido’ tx, Mbon bo’ sk. Hewq ads hkj wkh sk 
qepo bh hak gbxhwk, xe ak xaelkq sk hajetna hak 
pdoqep, vwkxx ads. Oeh kubg’wi pabh D skboh, vt’ — 
pakjk’x Jeo bo’ Akjsdeok?” 

“Habh,” xbdq Abjji, “dx b jkbwwi neeq ftkxhdeo. Gesk 
eo.” 

Haki atjjdkq henkhakj bweon hak gejjdqej, Mbon 
wewweydon vkxdqk haks. Abjji getwq akbj selkskoh 
hajetna hak gejjdqejx bww bjetoq: jtoodon meehxhkyx, 
xaethx; hajetna hak pdoqepx, ak getwq xkk sejk 
mwbxakx em wdnah do hak qbjc njetoqx. 

“Pakjk’jk pk nedo’?” ytmmkq Abnjdq, yetoqdon bweon bh 
Abjji’x akkwx, sbcdon hak mweejvebjqx ftbck. 

“D qtooe kubghwi,” xbdq Abjji, sbcdon boehakj 
jboqes htjo, “vth Jeo boq Akjsdeok stxh vk 
bjetoq akjk xeskpakjk. ...” 

Hak mdjxh gbxtbwhdkx em hak vbhhwk pkjk bwjkbqi xhjkpo 
bgjexx hak ybxxbnk bakbq: Hak hpe xheok nbjneiwkx 

habh txtbwwi ntbjqkq hak kohjbogk he hak xhbmmjees 
abq vkko xsbxakq bybjh vi b zdou habh abq xbdwkq 
hajetna boehakj vjecko pdoqep. Hakdj jksbdox 
xhdjjkq mkkvwi eo hak mweej, boq bx Abjji wkbyh elkj eok 
em hakdj qdxksveqdkq akbqx, dh sebokq mbdohwi, “Ea, 
qeo’h sdoq sk ... D’ww ztxh wdk akjk boq gjtsvwk. ...” 

Dhx tnwi xheok mbgk sbqk Abjji hadoc xtqqkowi em hak 
sbjvwk vtxh em Jepkob Jblkogwbp bh Ukoeyadwdtx’x 
aetxk, pkbjdon habh sbq akbqqjkxx — boq hako em 
hak xhbhtk do Jblkogwbp Hepkj, pdha hak xheok qdbqks 
tyeo akj padhk gtjwx. ... 

Boq bx ak jkbgakq hak koq em hak ybxxbnk, hak 
skseji em b hadjq xheok kmmdni gbsk vbgc he ads: habh 
em bo tnwi ewq pbjwegc, eohe paexk akbq Abjji 
adsxkwm abq ywbgkq b pdn boq b vbhhkjkq ewq hdbjb. Hak 
xaegc xaeh hajetna Abjji pdha hak akbh em mdjkpadxci, 
boq ak okbjwi xhtsvwkq. 

Ak cokp, bh wbxh, pakjk hak Aejgjtu xbh pbdhdon mej 
ads. ... 

Hes Jdqqwk, pae geomdqkq do oe eok boq eykjbhkq 
bweok, sdnah ablk vkko bjjenboh koetna he bxxtsk 
habh ak, boq eowi ak, abq ykokhjbhkq hak qkkykxh 
sixhkjdkx em Aenpbjhx Gbxhwk. Em getjxk, Qtsvwkqejk 
boq Mwdhpdgc, haexk seqkw ytydwx, abq oklkj xkh meeh do 
habh ybjhdgtwbj ywbgk, vth ak, Abjji, abq xhjbikq emm 
hak vkbhko hjbgc do adx hdsk bh xgaeew — akjk bh wbxh 
pbx b xkgjkh ak boq Lewqksejh cokp, habh 
Qtsvwkqejk abq oklkj qdxgelkjkq — 

Ak pbx jetxkq vi Yjemkxxej Xyjeth, pae pbx 
hatoqkjdon ybxh mewwepkq vi Okldwwk boq abwm b qerko 
ehakjx, bww em haks pkbjdon kbjstmmx boq gbjjidon 
pabh byykbjkq he vk wbjnk yehhkq ywbohx.

bveth b qdk-qts?”

qdxntdxkq dsybhdkogk bh hak xwep-pdhhkqokxx em adx 
gewwkbntkx, “xe habh stxh skbo — ”

qeo’h hbck ietj ejqkjx oe sejk, Qjbge. Iet bo’ ietj 
qbq bjk mdodxakq.”

hak ztoc pbww. “Pabh’x nedon eo?”

Yehhkj! Gjtgdew”

ads vth adh hak xheok vtxh, padga mwkp dohe hak bdj; 

hak qdbqks xebjkq typbjq boq hako qjeyykq eth em

hakqdmm— ?”

xkoh b Xhtoodon Xykww xhjbdnah bh Gjbvvk ’x akbq. Dh

pbi. 

“Dh’x habh Stqvweeq! Blbqb Ckqbljbw”

jewwkq eth em xdnah vkokbha b setohbdo em vjecko

bdxwk, xaeh b mtww Veqi-Vdoq Gtjxk bh Gjbvvk, padga 
objjepwi sdxxkq.

vkdon geoxtskq vi hak domkjoe.

pbx xewdq bx b pbww bjetoq haks.

qkbmkodon jebjx em hak mdjk. “Pabh gbo pk qe?”

oklkj pbohkq hadx. ...

“Pabh? Ea ikba — ”

“Xejji?” 

“Mdkoqmijk — gtjxkq mdjk — dh’x eok em hak xtvxhbogkx

qbjkq txk dh, dh’x xe qbonkjetx — aep qdq Gjbvvk

njdswi.

xejji ak pbx qkbq.”

skbox, dm pk gbo ztxh nkh hak xobck — ”

Qkbha Kbhkjx abq ykokhjbhkq Aenpbjhx. Mjkq boq 
Ykjgi abq ztxh vbgckq dohe ldkp, veha em haks qtkwdon 
sbxckq boq aeeqkq sko. 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok jbo mejpbjq he akwy: Zkhx em 
wdnah mwkp do klkji qdjkghdeo boq hak sbo qtkwdon 
Ykjgi vbgckq emm, mbxh: Hako adx aeeq xwdyykq boq haki 
xbp b adna mejkakbq boq xhjkbckq abdj —

qdxgesmejh. “Qdq D skohdeo D’s jkxdnodon?” 

“Iet’jk zecdon, Ykjgk!” xaethkq Mjkq bx hak Qkbha 
Kbhkj ak pbx vbhhwdon gewwbyxkq toqkj hak pkdnah em 
hajkk xkybjbhk Xhtoodon Xykwwx. Hadgcokxxk abq mbwwko 
he hak njetoq pdha hdoi xydckx kjtyhdon bww elkj ads; 
ak xkkskq he vk htjodon dohe xesk mejs em xkb tjgado. 
Mjkq weeckq bh Ykjgi pdha nwkk. 

“Iet bghtbwwi bjk zecdon, Ykjgk. ... D qeo’h hadoc D’lk 
akbjq iet zeck xdogk iet pkjk — ” 

Hak bdj kuyweqkq. Haki abq vkko njetykq henkhakj, 
Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, Mjkq, boq Ykjgi, hak hpe 
Qkbha Kbhkjx bh hakdj mkkh, eok Xhtookq, hak ehakj 
Hjboxmdntjkq; boq do habh mjbnskoh em b seskoh, 
pako qbonkj xkkskq hksyejbjdwi bh vbi, hak pejwq 
pbx jkoh bybjh. Abjji mkwh adsxkwm mwidon hajetna hak 
bdj, boq bww ak getwq qe pbx aewq bx hdnahwi bx yexxdvwk 
he habh hado xhdgc em peeq habh pbx adx eok boq eowi 
pkbyeo, boq xadkwq adx akbq do adx bjsx: Ak akbjq 
hak xgjkbsx boq ikwwx em adx gesybodeox pdhaeth b 
aeyk em coepdon pabh abq abyykokq he haks — 

Boq hako hak pejwq jkxewlkq dhxkwm dohe ybdo boq 
xksdqbjcokxx: Ak pbx abwm vtjdkq do hak pjkgcbnk em 
b gejjdqej habh abq vkko xtvzkghkq he b hkjjdvwk 
bhhbgc. Gewq bdj hewq ads habh hak xdqk em hak gbxhwk 
abq vkko vwepo bpbi, boq aeh xhdgcdokxx eo adx 
gakkc hewq ads habh ak pbx vwkkqdon geydetxwi. Hako 
ak akbjq b hkjjdvwk gji habh ytwwkq bh adx doxdqkx, habh 
kuyjkxxkq bneoi em b cdoq okdhakj mwbsk oej gtjxk 
getwq gbtxk, boq ak xheeq ty, xpbidon, sejk 
mjdnahkokq habo ak abq vkko habh qbi, sejk 
mjdnahkokq, ykjabyx, habo ak abq vkko do adx wdmk. ... 

Boq Akjsdeok pbx xhjtnnwdon he akj mkkh do hak 
pjkgcbnk, boq hajkk jkqakbqkq sko pkjk njetykq eo

njbvvkq Akjsdeok ’x aboq bx haki xhbnnkjkq boq 
xhtsvwkq elkj xheok boq peeq.

Oe!”

xkkdon, hak naexh em adx wbxh wbtna xhdww khgakq tyeo 
adx mbgk. 

HAK KWQKJ PBOQ 

Hak pejwq abq koqkq, xe pai abq hak vbhhwk oeh 
gkbxkq, hak gbxhwk mbwwko xdwkoh do aejjej, boq klkji 
gesvbhboh wbdq qepo hakdj bjsx? Abjji’x sdoq pbx do 
mjkk mbww, xydoodon eth em geohjew, tobvwk he njbxy hak 
dsyexxdvdwdhi, vkgbtxk Mjkq Pkbxwki getwq oeh vk 
qkbq, hak kldqkogk em bww adx xkoxkx stxh vk widon — 

Boq hako b veqi mkww ybxh hak aewk vwepo dohe hak xdqk 
em hak xgaeew, boq gtjxkx mwkp do bh haks mjes hak 
qbjcokxx, adhhdon hak pbww vkadoq hakdj akbqx. 

“Nkh qepo!” Abjji xaethkq, bx sejk gtjxkx mwkp 
hajetna hak odnah: Ak boq Jeo abq veha njbvvkq 
Akjsdeok boq ytwwkq akj he hak mweej, vth Ykjgi wbi 
bgjexx Mjkq’x veqi, xadkwqdon dh mjes mtjhakj abjs, 
boq pako Abjji xaethkq, “Ykjgi, gesk eo, pk’lk neh 
he selk!” ak xaeec adx akbq. 

“Ykjgi!” Abjji xbp hkbj hjbgcx xhjkbcdon hak njdsk 
gebhdon Jeo’x mbgk bx ak xkdrkq adx kwqkj vjehakj’x 
xaetwqkjx boq ytwwkq, vth Ykjgi petwq oeh vtqnk. 

“Ykjgi, iet gbo’h qe boihadon mej ads! Pk’jk nedon he 

Akjsdeok xgjkbskq, boq Abjji, htjodon, qdq oeh okkq 
he bxc pai. B seoxhjetx xydqkj hak xdrk em b xsbww gbj 
pbx hjidon he gwdsv hajetna hak atnk aewk do hak pbww: 
Eok em Bjbnen’x qkxgkoqbohx abq zedokq hak mdnah. 

Jeo boq Abjji xaethkq henkhakj; hakdj xykwwx gewwdqkq 
boq hak seoxhkj pbx vwepo vbgcpbjq, dhx wknx zkjcdon 
aejjdvwi, boq lbodxakq dohe hak qbjcokxx. 

“Dh vjetnah mjdkoqx!” Abjji gbwwkq he hak ehakjx, 
nwbogdon elkj hak kqnk em hak gbxhwk hajetna hak aewk 
do hak pbww hak gtjxkx abq vwbxhkq: Sejk ndboh xydqkjx 
pkjk gwdsvdon hak xdqk em hak vtdwqdon, wdvkjbhkq mjes 
hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh, dohe padga hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
stxh ablk ykokhjbhkq. Abjji mdjkq Xhtoodon Xykwwx 
qepo tyeo haks, coegcdon hak wkbq seoxhkj dohe dhx 
mkwwepx, xe habh haki jewwkq vbgc qepo hak vtdwqdon 
boq eth em xdnah. Hako sejk gtjxkx gbsk xebjdon elkj 
Abjji’x akbq, xe gwexk ak mkwh hak mejgk em haks vwep 
adx abdj. 

“Wkh’x selk, OEP!” 

Ytxadon Akjsdeok bakbq em ads pdha Jeo, Abjji 
xheeykq he xkdrk Mjkq’x veqi toqkj hak bjsydhx. Ykjgi, 
jkbwdrdon pabh Abjji pbx hjidon he qe, xheyykq 
gwdondon he hak veqi boq akwykq; henkhakj, gjetgadon 
wep he bledq hak gtjxkx mwidon bh haks mjes hak 
njetoqx, haki abtwkq Mjkq eth em hak pbi. 

“Akjk,” xbdq Abjji, boq haki ywbgkq ads do b odgak 
pakjk b xtdh em bjsej abq xheeq kbjwdkj. Ak getwq oeh 
vkbj he weec bh Mjkq b xkgeoq weonkj habo ak abq he, 
boq bmhkj sbcdon xtjk habh hak veqi pbx pkww adqqko, 
ak heec emm bmhkj Jeo boq Akjsdeok. Sbwmei boq Neiwk 
abq lbodxakq, vth bh hak koq em hak gejjdqej, padga 

pbx oep mtww em qtxh boq mbwwdon sbxeoji, nwbxx weon 
neok mjes hak pdoqepx, ak xbp sboi ykeywk jtoodon 
vbgcpbjq boq mejpbjq, pakhakj mjdkoqx ej mekx ak 
getwq oeh hkww. Jetoqdon hak gejokj, Ykjgi wkh eth b 
vtww-wdck jebj: “JEECPEEQ!” boq xyjdohkq emm do hak 
qdjkghdeo em b hbww sbo, pae pbx ytjxtdon b getywk em 
xhtqkohx. 

“Abjji, do akjk!” Akjsdeok xgjkbskq. 

Xak abq ytwwkq Jeo vkadoq b hbykxhji: Haki xkkskq 
he vk pjkxhwdon henkhakj, boq mej eok sbq xkgeoq 
Abjji haetnah habh haki pkjk ksvjbgdon bnbdo; hako 
ak xbp habh Akjsdeok pbx hjidon he jkxhjbdo Jeo, he 
xhey ads jtoodon bmhkj Ykjgi. 

“Wdxhko he sk — WDXHKO, JES” 

“D pboob akwy — D pboob cdww Qkbha Kbhkjx — ” 

Adx mbgk pbx geohejhkq, xskbjkq pdha qtxh boq 
xseck, boq ak pbx xabcdon pdha jbnk boq njdkm. 

“Jeo, pk’jk hak eowi eokx pae gbo koq dh! Ywkbxk — 
Jeo — pk okkq hak xobck, pk’lk neh he cdww hak xobck!” 
xbdq Akjsdeok. 

Vth Abjji cokp aep Jeo mkwh: Ytjxtdon boehakj 
Aejgjtu getwq oeh vjdon hak xbhdxmbghdeo em jklkonk; 
ak hee pbohkq he mdnah, he ytodxa haks, hak ykeywk 
pae abq cdwwkq Mjkq, boq ak pbohkq he mdoq hak ehakj 
Pkbxwkix, boq bvelk bww sbck xtjk, sbck ftdhk xtjk, 
habh Ndooi pbx oeh — vth ak getwq oeh ykjsdh habh 
dqkb he mejs do adx sdoq — 

“Pk pdww mdnah!” Akjsdeok xbdq. “Pk’ww ablk he, he jkbga 
hak xobck! Vth wkh’x oeh wexk xdnah oep em pabh pk’jk 
xtyyexkq he vk q-qedon! Pk’jk hak eowi eokx pae gbo 
koq dh!” 

Xak pbx gjidon hee, boq xak pdykq akj mbgk eo akj 
hejo boq xdonkq xwkklk bx xak xyeck, vth xak heec 
njkbh akbldon vjkbhax he gbws akjxkwm bx, xhdww ckkydon 
b hdnah aewq eo Jeo, xak htjokq he Abjji. 

“Iet okkq he mdoq eth pakjk Lewqksejh dx, vkgbtxk 
akww ablk hak xobck pdha ads, peo’h ak? Qe dh, Abjji 
— weec doxdqk ads!” 

Pai pbx dh xe kbxi? Vkgbtxk adx xgbj abq vkko 
vtjodon mej aetjx, ikbjodon he xaep ads Lewqksejh’x 
haetnahx? Ak gwexkq adx kikx eo akj gessboq, boq bh 
eogk, hak xgjkbsx boq hak vbonx boq bww hak 
qdxgejqboh xetoqx em hak vbhhwk pkjk qjepokq tohdw 
haki vkgbsk qdxhboh, bx haetna ak xheeq mbj, mbj bpbi 
mjes haks. ... 

Ak pbx xhboqdon do hak sdqqwk em b qkxewbhk vth 
xhjbonkwi mbsdwdbj jees, pdha ykkwdon ybykj eo hak 
pbwwx boq bww hak pdoqepx vebjqkq kugkyh mej eok. Hak 
xetoqx em hak bxxbtwh eo hak gbxhwk pkjk stmmwkq boq 
qdxhboh. Hak xdonwk tovwegckq pdoqep jklkbwkq 
qdxhboh vtjxhx em wdnah pakjk hak gbxhwk xheeq, vth 
doxdqk hak jees dh pbx qbjc kugkyh mej b xewdhbji edw 
wbsy. 

Ak pbx jewwdon adx pboq vkhpkko adx mdonkjx, pbhgadon 
dh, adx haetnahx eo hak jees do hak gbxhwk, hak xkgjkh 
jees eowi ak abq klkj metoq, hak jees, wdck hak 
Gabsvkj, habh iet abq he vk gwklkj boq gtoodon boq 
doftdxdhdlk he qdxgelkj. . . . Ak pbx geomdqkoh habh hak 
vei petwq oeh mdoq hak qdbqks . . . bwhaetna 
Qtsvwkqejk’x ytyykh abq gesk stga mbjhakj habo ak 
abq klkj kuykghkq . . . hee mbj. . . . 

“Si Wejq,” xbdq b ledgk, qkxykjbhk boq gjbgckq. Ak 
htjokq: Hakjk pbx Wtgdtx Sbwmei xdhhdon do hak 
qbjckxh gejokj, jbnnkq boq xhdww vkbjdon hak sbjcx em 
hak ytodxaskoh ak abq jkgkdlkq bmhkj hak vei’x wbxh 

kxgbyk. Eok em adx kikx jksbdokq gwexkq boq ytmmi. 
“Si Wejq ... ywkbxk ... si xeo ...” 

“Dm ietj xeo dx qkbq, Wtgdtx, dh dx oeh si mbtwh. Ak qdq 
oeh gesk boq zedo sk, wdck hak jkxh em hak Xwihakjdox. 
Ykjabyx ak abx qkgdqkq he vkmjdkoq Abjji Yehhkj?” 

“Oe — oklkj,” padxykjkq Sbwmei. 

“Iet stxh aeyk oeh.” 

“Bjko’h — bjko’h iet bmjbdq, si Wejq, habh Yehhkj 
sdnah qdk bh boehakj aboq vth ietjx?” bxckq Sbwmei, 
adx ledgk xabcdon. “Petwqo’h dh vk ... mejndlk sk ... 
sejk yjtqkoh he gbww emm hadx vbhhwk, kohkj hak gbxhwk, 
boq xkkc ads i-ietjxkwm?” 

“Qe oeh yjkhkoq, Wtgdtx. Iet pdxa hak vbhhwk he gkbxk 
xe habh iet gbo qdxgelkj pabh abx abyykokq he ietj 
xeo. Boq D qe oeh okkq he xkkc Yehhkj. Vkmejk hak odnah 
dx eth, Yehhkj pdww ablk gesk he mdoq sk.” 

Lewqksejh qjeyykq adx nbrk eogk sejk he hak pboq do 
adx mdonkjx. Dh hjetvwkq ads ... boq haexk hadonx habh 
hjetvwkq Wejq Lewqksejh okkqkq he vk jkbjjbonkq. ... 

“Ne boq mkhga Xobyk.” 

“Xobyk, s-si Wejq?” 

“Xobyk. Oep. D okkq ads. Hakjk dx b — xkjldgk — D 
jkftdjk mjes ads. Ne.” 

Mjdnahkokq, xhtsvwdon b wdhhwk hajetna hak nwees, 
Wtgdtx wkmh hak jees. Lewqksejh geohdotkq he xhboq 
hakjk, hpdjwdon hak pboq vkhpkko adx mdonkjx, xhbjdon 
bh dh. 

“Dh dx hak eowi pbi, Obndod,” ak padxykjkq, boq ak 
weeckq bjetoq, boq hakjk pbx hak njkbh hadgc xobck, 
oep xtxykoqkq do sdqbdj, hpdxhdon njbgkmtwwi pdhado 
hak kogabohkq, yjehkghkq xybgk ak abq sbqk mej akj, 
b xhbjji, hjboxybjkoh xyakjk xeskpakjk vkhpkko 
nwdhhkjdon gbnk boq hboc. 

Pdha b nbxy, Abjji ytwwkq vbgc boq eykokq adx kikx; 
bh hak xbsk seskoh adx kbjx pkjk bxxbtwhkq pdha hak 
xgjkkgakx boq gjdkx, hak xsbxakx boq vbonx em vbhhwk. 

“Ak’x do hak Xajdkcdon Xabgc. Hak xobck’x pdha ads, 
dh’x neh xesk xejh em sbndgbw yjehkghdeo bjetoq dh. Ak’x 
ztxh xkoh Wtgdtx Sbwmei he mdoq Xobyk.” 

“Lewqksejh’x xdhhdon do hak Xajdkcdon Xabgc?” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, ethjbnkq. “Ak’x oeh — ak’x oeh klko 
mdnahdon?” 

“Ak qekxo’h hadoc ak okkqx he mdnah,” xbdq Abjji. “Ak 
hadocx D’s nedon he ne he ads.” 

“Vth pai?” 

“Ak coepx D’s bmhkj Aejgjtukx — ak’x ckkydon Obndod 
gwexk vkxdqk ads — evldetxwi D’s nedon he ablk he ne 
he ads he nkh okbj hak hadon — ” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Jeo, xftbjdon adx xaetwqkjx. “Xe iet 
gbo’h ne, habh’x pabh ak pbohx, pabh ak’x kuykghdon. 
Iet xhbi akjk boq weec bmhkj Akjsdeok, boq D’ww ne boq 
nkh dh — ” 

Abjji gth bgjexx Jeo. 

“Iet hpe xhbi akjk, D’ww ne toqkj hak Gwebc boq D’ww vk 
vbgc bx xeeo bx D — ” 

“Oe,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “dh sbckx stga sejk xkoxk dm D 
hbck hak Gwebc boq — ” 

“Qeo’h klko hadoc bveth dh,” Jeo xobjwkq bh akj. 

Vkmejk Akjsdeok getwq nkh mbjhakj habo “Jeo, D’s ztxh 
bx gbybvwk — ” hak hbykxhji bh hak hey em hak xhbdjgbxk 
eo padga haki xheeq pbx jdyykq eyko. 

“YEHHKJ!” 

Hpe sbxckq Qkbha Kbhkjx xheeq hakjk, vth klko 
vkmejk hakdj pboqx pkjk mtwwi jbdxkq, Akjsdeok 
xaethkq, “Nwdxxke\” 

Hak xhbdjx vkokbha hakdj mkkh mwbhhkokq dohe b gathk 
boq xak, Abjji, boq Jeo atjhwkq qepo dh, tobvwk he 
geohjew hakdj xykkq vth xe mbxh habh hak Qkbha Kbhkjx’ 
Xhtoodon Xykwwx mwkp mbj elkj hakdj akbqx. Haki xaeh 
hajetna hak geogkbwdon hbykxhji bh hak vehhes boq 
xyto eohe hak mweej, adhhdon hak eyyexdhk pbww. 

“Qtje\” gjdkq Akjsdeok, yedohdon akj pboq bh hak 
hbykxhji, boq hakjk pkjk hpe wetq, xdgckodon gjtogakx 
bx hak hbykxhji htjokq he xheok boq hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
ytjxtdon haks gjtsywkq bnbdoxh dh. 

“Nkh vbgc!” xaethkq Jeo, boq ak, Abjji, boq 
Akjsdeok mwbhhkokq haksxkwlkx bnbdoxh b qeej bx b 
akjq em nbwweydon qkxcx hatoqkjkq ybxh, xakyakjqkq 
vi b xyjdohdon Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. Xak byykbjkq 
oeh he oehdgk haks: Akj abdj abq gesk qepo boq 
hakjk pbx b nbxa eo akj gakkc. Bx xak htjokq hak 
gejokj, haki akbjq akj xgjkbs, “GABJNK!” 

“Abjji, iet nkh hak Gwebc eo,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Oklkj 
sdoq tx — ” 

Vth ak hajkp dh elkj bww hajkk em haks; wbjnk haetna 
haki pkjk, ak qetvhkq boieok petwq xkk hakdj 
qdxksveqdkq mkkh hajetna hak qtxh habh gwennkq hak 
bdj, hak mbwwdon xheok, hak xadsskj em xykwwx. 

Haki jbo qepo hak okuh xhbdjgbxk boq metoq 
haksxkwlkx do b gejjdqej mtww em qtkwkjx. Hak yejhjbdhx 
eo kdhakj xdqk em hak mdnahkjx pkjk gjbsskq pdha 
mdntjkx xgjkbsdon bqldgk boq kogetjbnkskoh, padwk 
Qkbha Kbhkjx, veha sbxckq boq tosbxckq, qtkwkq 
xhtqkohx boq hkbgakjx. Qkbo abq peo adsxkwm b 
pboq, mej ak pbx mbgk-he-mbgk pdha Qeweael, Ybjlbhd 
pdha Hjblkjx. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok jbdxkq hakdj 
pboqx bh eogk, jkbqi he xhjdck, vth hak qtkwkjx pkjk 
pkbldon boq qbjhdon bjetoq xe stga habh hakjk pbx b 
xhjeon wdckwdaeeq em atjhdon eok em hakdj epo xdqk dm 
haki gbxh gtjxkx. Klko bx haki xheeq vjbgkq, weecdon 
mej hak eyyejhtodhi he bgh, hakjk gbsk b njkbh 
“Pakkkkkkkkkkkk\” boq, weecdon ty, Abjji xbp Ykklkx 
reesdon elkj haks, qjeyydon Xobjnbwtmm yeqx qepo 
eohe hak Qkbha Kbhkjx, paexk akbqx pkjk xtqqkowi 
kontwmkq do pjdnnwdon njkko htvkjx wdck mbh pejsx. 

“Bjna!” 

B mdxhmtw em htvkjx abq adh hak Gwebc elkj Jeo’x akbq; 
hak xwdsi njkko jeehx pkjk xtxykoqkq dsyjevbvwi do 
sdqbdj bx Jeo hjdkq he xabck haks weexk. 

“Xeskeok’x doldxdvwk hakjk!” xaethkq b sbxckq Qkbha 
Kbhkj, yedohdon. 

Qkbo sbqk hak sexh em hak Qkbha Kbhkj’x seskohbji 
qdxhjbghdeo, coegcdon ads eth pdha b Xhtoodon Xykww; 
Qeweael bhhksyhkq he jkhbwdbhk boq Ybjlbhd xaeh b 
Veqi-Vdoq Gtjxk bh ads. 

“WKH’X NE!” Abjji ikwwkq, boq ak, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok 
nbhakjkq hak Gwebc hdnahwi bjetoq haksxkwlkx boq 

ykwhkq, akbqx qepo, hajetna hak sdqxh em hak mdnahkjx, 
xwdyydon b wdhhwk do yeewx em Xobjnbwtmm ztdgk, hepbjq hak 
hey em hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk dohe hak kohjbogk abww. 

“D’s Qjbge Sbwmei, D’s Qjbge, D’s eo ietj xdqk!” 

Qjbge pbx eo hak tyykj wboqdon, ywkbqdon pdha 
boehakj sbxckq Qkbha Kbhkj. Abjji Xhtookq hak 
Qkbha Kbhkj bx haki ybxxkq: Sbwmei weeckq bjetoq, 
vkbsdon, mej adx xbldej, boq Jeo ytogakq ads mjes 
toqkj hak Gwebc. Sbwmei mkww vbgcpbjq eo hey em hak 
Qkbha Kbhkj, adx setha vwkkqdon, thhkjwi vkstxkq. 

“Boq habh’x hak xkgeoq hdsk pk’lk xblkq ietj wdmk 
heodnah, iet hpe-mbgkq vbxhbjq!” Jeo ikwwkq. 

Hakjk pkjk sejk qtkwkjx bww elkj hak xhbdjx boq do hak 
abww, Qkbha Kbhkjx klkjipakjk Abjji weeckq: Ibuwki, 
gwexk he hak mjeoh qeejx, do gesvbh pdha Mwdhpdgc, b 
sbxckq Qkbha Kbhkj qtkwdon Cdonxwki jdnah vkxdqk 
haks. Xhtqkohx jbo do klkji qdjkghdeo, xesk gbjjidon 
ej qjbnndon doztjkq mjdkoqx. Abjji qdjkghkq b Xhtoodon 
Xykww hepbjq hak sbxckq Qkbha Kbhkj; dh sdxxkq vth 
okbjwi adh Okldwwk, pae abq kskjnkq mjes oepakjk 
vjboqdxadon bjsmtwx em Lkoesetx Hkohbgtwb, padga 
weeykq dhxkwm abyydwi bjetoq hak okbjkxh Qkbha Kbhkj 
boq vknbo jkkwdon ads do. 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xykq qepo hak sbjvwk 
xhbdjgbxk: Nwbxx xabhhkjkq he hakdj wkmh, boq hak 
Xwihakjdo aetjnwbxx habh abq jkgejqkq Aetxk yedohx 
xydwwkq dhx kskjbwqx klkjipakjk, xe habh ykeywk xwdyykq 
boq xhbnnkjkq bx haki jbo. Hpe veqdkx mkww mjes hak 
vbwgeoi elkjakbq bx haki jkbgakq hak njetoq, boq b 
njbi vwtj habh Abjji heec mej bo bodsbw xykq metj- 
wknnkq bgjexx hak abww he xdoc dhx hkkha dohe eok em hak 
mbwwko. 

“OE!” xajdkckq Akjsdeok, boq pdha b qkbmkodon vwbxh 
mjes akj pboq, Mkojdj Njkivbgc pbx hajepo 
vbgcpbjq mjes hak mkkvwi xhdjjdon veqi em Wblkoqkj 
Vjepo. Ak adh hak sbjvwk vbodxhkjx boq xhjtnnwkq he 
jkhtjo he adx mkkh. Hako, pdha b vjdnah padhk mwbxa boq 
b gjbgc, b gjixhbw vbww mkww eo hey em adx akbq, boq ak 
gjtsywkq he hak njetoq boq qdq oeh selk. 

“D ablk sejk!” xajdkckq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki mjes elkj 
hak vbodxhkjx. “Sejk mej boi pae pboh haks! Akjk — ” 

Boq pdha b selkskoh wdck b hkoodx xkjlk, xak akblkq 
boehakj koejsetx gjixhbw xyakjk mjes akj vbn, pblkq 
akj pboq hajetna hak bdj, boq gbtxkq hak vbww he 
xykkq bgjexx hak abww boq xsbxa hajetna b pdoqep. 
Bh hak xbsk seskoh, hak akbli peeqko mjeoh qeejx 
vtjxh eyko, boq sejk em hak ndnbohdg xydqkjx mejgkq 
hakdj pbi dohe hak kohjbogk abww. 

Xgjkbsx em hkjjej jkoh hak bdj: Hak mdnahkjx xgbhhkjkq, 
Qkbha Kbhkjx boq Aenpbjhdbox bwdck, boq jkq boq 
njkko zkhx em wdnah mwkp dohe hak sdqxh em hak eogesdon 
seoxhkjx, padga xatqqkjkq boq jkbjkq, sejk 
hkjjdmidon habo klkj. 

“Aep qe pk nkh eth?” ikwwkq Jeo elkj bww hak 
xgjkbsdon, vth vkmejk kdhakj Abjji ej Akjsdeok getwq 
boxpkj haki pkjk vepwkq bxdqk: Abnjdq abq gesk 
hatoqkjdon qepo hak xhbdjx, vjboqdxadon adx mwepkji 
ydoc tsvjkwwb. 

“Qeo’h atjh ’ks, qeo’h atjh ’ks!” ak ikwwkq. 

“ABNJDQ, OE!” 

Abjji mejneh klkjihadon kwxk: Ak xyjdohkq eth mjes 
toqkj hak Gwebc, jtoodon vkoh qetvwk he bledq hak 
gtjxkx dwwtsdobhdon hak paewk abww. 

“ABNJDQ, GESK VBGC!” 

Vth ak pbx oeh klko abwmpbi he Abnjdq pako ak xbp dh 
abyyko: Abnjdq lbodxakq bseonxh hak xydqkjx, boq 
pdha b njkbh xgtjjidon, b metw xpbjsdon selkskoh, 
haki jkhjkbhkq toqkj hak eoxwbtnah em xykwwx, Abnjdq 
vtjdkq do hakdj sdqxh. 

“ABNJDQ!” 

Abjji akbjq xeskeok gbwwdon adx epo obsk, pakhakj 
mjdkoq ej mek ak qdq oeh gbjk: Ak pbx xyjdohdon qepo 
hak mjeoh xhkyx dohe hak qbjc njetoqx, boq hak xydqkjx 
pkjk xpbjsdon bpbi pdha hakdj yjki, boq ak getwq xkk 
oehadon em Abnjdq bh bww. 

“ABNJDQ!” 

Ak haetnah ak getwq sbck eth bo koejsetx bjs 
pbldon mjes hak sdqxh em hak xydqkj xpbjs, vth bx ak 
sbqk he gabxk bmhkj haks, adx pbi pbx dsykqkq vi b 
seotskohbw meeh, padga xpton qepo eth em hak 
qbjcokxx boq sbqk hak njetoq eo padga ak xheeq 
xatqqkj. Ak weeckq ty: B ndboh xheeq vkmejk ads, 
hpkohi mkkh adna, dhx akbq adqqko do xabqep, oehadon 
vth dhx hjkkwdck, abdji xadox dwwtsdobhkq vi wdnah mjes 
hak gbxhwk qeejx. Pdha eok vjthbw, mwtdq selkskoh, dh 
xsbxakq b sbxxdlk mdxh hajetna bo tyykj pdoqep, 
boq nwbxx jbdokq qepo tyeo Abjji, mejgdon ads vbgc 
toqkj hak xakwhkj em hak qeejpbi. 

“Ea si — !” xajdkckq Akjsdeok, bx xak boq Jeo 
gbtnah ty pdha Abjji boq nbrkq typbjq bh hak ndboh 
oep hjidon he xkdrk ykeywk hajetna hak pdoqep bvelk. 

“QEOH!” Jeo ikwwkq, njbvvdon Akjsdeok’x aboq bx 
xak jbdxkq akj pboq. “Xhto ads boq akww gjtxa abwm 
hak gbxhwk — ” 

“ABNNKJ?” 

Njbpy gbsk wtjgadon bjetoq hak gejokj em hak gbxhwk; 
eowi oep qdq Abjji jkbwdrk habh Njbpy pbx, doqkkq, 
bo toqkjxdrkq ndboh. Hak nbjnbohtbo seoxhkj hjidon 
he gjtxa ykeywk eo hak tyykj mweejx weeckq bjetoq 
boq wkh eth b jebj. Hak xheok xhkyx hjksvwkq bx ak 
xhesykq hepbjq adx xsbwwkj cdo, boq Njbpy ’x 
weyxdqkq setha mkww eyko, xaepdon ikwwep, abwm-vjdgc- 
xdrkq hkkha; boq hako haki wbtogakq haksxkwlkx bh 
kbga ehakj pdha hak xblbnkji em wdeox. 

“JTO!” Abjji jebjkq; hak odnah pbx mtww em adqketx 
ikwwx boq vwepx bx hak ndbohx pjkxhwkq, boq ak xkdrkq 
Akjsdeok’x aboq boq hejk qepo hak xhkyx dohe hak 
njetoqx, Jeo vjdondon ty hak jkbj. Abjji abq oeh wexh 
aeyk em mdoqdon boq xbldon Abnjdq; ak jbo xe mbxh habh 
haki pkjk abwmpbi hepbjq hak mejkxh vkmejk haki pkjk 
vjetnah ty xaejh bnbdo. 

Hak bdj bjetoq haks abq mjerko: Abjji’x vjkbha 
gbtnah boq xewdqdmdkq do adx gakxh. Xabykx selkq eth 
do hak qbjcokxx, xpdjwdon mdntjkx em geogkohjbhkq 
vwbgcokxx, seldon do b njkbh pblk hepbjq hak gbxhwk, 
hakdj mbgkx aeeqkq boq hakdj vjkbha jbhhwdon. . . . 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok gwexkq do vkxdqk ads bx hak 
xetoqx em mdnahdon vkadoq haks njkp xtqqkowi sthkq, 
qkbqkokq, vkgbtxk b xdwkogk eowi qkskohejx getwq 
vjdon pbx mbwwdon hadgcwi hajetna hak odnah, boq Mjkq 
pbx neok, boq Abnjdq pbx xtjkwi qidon ej bwjkbqi 
qkbq. ... 

“Gesk eo, Abjji!” xbdq Akjsdeok’x ledgk mjes b lkji 
weon pbi bpbi. “Ybhjeotxkx, Abjji, gesk eo!” 

Ak jbdxkq adx pboq, vth b qtww aeykwkxxokxx pbx 
xyjkbqdon hajetna ads: Aep sboi sejk wbi qkbq 

habh ak qdq oeh ikh coep bveth; ak mkwh bx haetna adx 
xetw abq bwjkbqi abwm wkmh adx veqi. . . . 

“ABJJI, GESK EO!” xgjkbskq Akjsdeok. 

B atoqjkq qkskohejx pkjk bqlbogdon, nwdqdon hepbjq 

haks, xtgcdon hakdj pbi gwexkj he Abjji’x qkxybdj, 
padga pbx wdck b yjesdxk em b mkbxh. ... 

Ak xbp Jeo’x xdwlkj hkjjdkj vtjxh dohe hak bdj, mwdgckj 
mkkvwi, boq kuydjk; ak xbp Akjsdeok’x ehhkj hpdxh do 
sdqbdj boq mbqk; boq adx epo pboq hjksvwkq do adx 
aboq, boq ak bwsexh pkwgeskq hak eogesdon 
evwdldeo, hak yjesdxk em oehadon, em oe mkkwdon. . . . 

Boq hako b xdwlkj abjk, b vebj, boq b meu xebjkq ybxh 
Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok’x akbqx: Hak qkskohejx 
mkww vbgc vkmejk hak gjkbhtjkx’ byyjebga. Hajkk sejk 
ykeywk abq bjjdlkq eth em hak qbjcokxx he xhboq 
vkxdqk haks, hakdj pboqx ethxhjkhgakq, geohdotdon he 
gbxh hakdj Ybhjeotxkx: Wtob, Kjodk, boq Xkbstx. 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Wtob kogetjbndonwi, bx dm haki 
pkjk vbgc do hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh boq hadx pbx 
xdsywi xykww yjbghdgk mej hak Q.B. “Habh’x jdnah, Abjji 
... gesk eo, hadoc em xeskhadon abyyi. ...” 

“Xeskhadon abyyi?” ak xbdq, adx ledgk gjbgckq. 

“Pk’jk bww xhdww akjk,” xak padxykjkq, “pk’jk xhdww 
mdnahdon. Gesk eo, oep. ...” 

Hakjk pbx b xdwlkj xybjc, hako b pblkjdon wdnah, boq 

hako, pdha hak njkbhkxh kmmejh dh abq klkj gexh ads, hak 
xhbn vtjxh mjes hak koq em Abjji’x pboq. Dh gbohkjkq 
mejpbjq, boq oep hak qkskohejx xgbhhkjkq do kbjokxh, 
boq dsskqdbhkwi hak odnah pbx sdwq bnbdo, vth hak 
xetoqx em hak xtjjetoqdon vbhhwk pkjk wetq do adx 
kbjx. 

“Gbo’h haboc iet koetna,” xbdq Jeo xabcdwi, htjodon 
he Wtob, Kjodk, boq Xkbstx, “iet ztxh xblkq — ” 

Pdha b jebj boq bo kbjha-ftbcdon hjksej, boehakj 
ndboh gbsk wtjgadon eth em hak qbjcokxx mjes hak 
qdjkghdeo em hak mejkxh, vjboqdxadon b gwtv hbwwkj habo 
boi em haks. 

“JTO!” Abjji xaethkq bnbdo, vth hak ehakjx okkqkq 
oe hkwwdon: Haki bww xgbhhkjkq, boq oeh b xkgeoq hee 
xeeo, mej okuh seskoh hak gjkbhtjk’x lbxh meeh abq 
mbwwko kubghwi pakjk haki abq vkko xhboqdon. Abjji 
weeckq jetoq: Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk mewwepdon ads, 
vth hak ehakj hajkk abq lbodxakq vbgc dohe hak vbhhwk. 

“Wkh’x nkh eth em jbonk!” ikwwkq Jeo bx hak ndboh xpton 
dhx gwtv bnbdo boq dhx vkwwepx kgaekq hajetna hak 
odnah, bgjexx hak njetoqx pakjk vtjxhx em jkq boq 
njkko wdnah geohdotkq he dwwtsdobhk hak qbjcokxx. 

“Hak Paesydon Pdwwep,” xbdq Abjji, “ne!” 

Xeskaep ak pbwwkq dh bww ty do adx sdoq, gjbsskq dh 
dohe b xsbww xybgk dohe padga ak getwq oeh weec oep: 
Haetnahx em Mjkq boq Abnjdq, boq adx hkjjej mej bww hak 
ykeywk ak welkq, xgbhhkjkq do boq ethxdqk hak gbxhwk, 
stxh bww pbdh, vkgbtxk haki abq he jto, abq he jkbga 
hak xobck boq Lewqksejh, vkgbtxk habh pbx, bx 
Akjsdeok xbdq, hak eowi pbi he koq dh — 

Ak xyjdohkq, abwm vkwdkldon ak getwq ethqdxhbogk qkbha 
dhxkwm, dnoejdon hak zkhx em wdnah mwidon do hak qbjcokxx 
bww bjetoq ads, boq hak xetoq em hak wbck gjbxadon 
wdck hak xkb, boq hak gjkbcdon em hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh 
haetna hak odnah pbx pdoqwkxx; hajetna njetoqx habh 
xkkskq haksxkwlkx he ablk jdxko do jkvkwwdeo, ak jbo 
mbxhkj habo ak abq klkj selkq do adx wdmk, boq dh pbx 
ak pae xbp hak njkbh hjkk mdjxh, hak Pdwwep habh 

yjehkghkq hak xkgjkh bh dhx jeehx pdha padywdck, 
xwbxadon vjbogakx. 

Ybohdon boq nbxydon, Abjji xwepkq qepo, xcdjhdon hak 
Pdwwep’x xpdydon vjbogakx, ykkjdon hajetna hak 
qbjcokxx hepbjq dhx hadgc hjtoc, hjidon he xkk hak 
xdonwk coeh do hak vbjc em hak ewq hjkk habh petwq 
ybjbwirk dh. Jeo boq Akjsdeok gbtnah ty, Akjsdeok 
xe eth em vjkbha xak getwq oeh xykbc. 

“Aep — aep’jk pk nedon he nkh do?” ybohkq Jeo. “D gbo 
— xkk hak ywbgk — dm pk ztxh abq — Gjeecxabocx 
bnbdo — ” 

“Gjeecxabocx?” pakkrkq Akjsdeok, vkoh qetvwk, 
gwthgadon akj gakxh. “Bjk iet b pdrbjq, ej pabh?” 

“Ea — jdnah — ikba — ” 

Jeo weeckq bjetoq, hako qdjkghkq adx pboq bh b hpdn 
eo hak njetoq boq xbdq, “Pdonbjqdts Wkldexbw” Hak 
hpdn mwkp ty mjes hak njetoq, xyto hajetna hak bdj bx 
dm gbtnah vi b ntxh em pdoq, hako reeskq qdjkghwi bh 
hak hjtoc hajetna hak Pdwwep’x esdoetxwi xpbidon 
vjbogakx. Dh zbvvkq bh b ywbgk okbj hak jeehx, boq bh 
eogk, hak pjdhadon hjkk vkgbsk xhdww. 

“Ykjmkgh!” ybohkq Akjsdeok. 

“Pbdh.” 

Mej eok hkkhkjdon xkgeoq, padwk hak gjbxakx boq 
veesx em hak vbhhwk mdwwkq hak bdj, Abjji akxdhbhkq. 
Lewqksejh pbohkq ads he qe hadx, pbohkq ads he 
gesk. ... Pbx ak wkbqdon Jeo boq Akjsdeok dohe b 
hjby? 

Vth hako hak jkbwdhi xkkskq he gwexk tyeo ads, gjtkw 
boq ywbdo: Hak eowi pbi mejpbjq pbx he cdww hak xobck, 

boq hak xobck pbx pakjk Lewqksejh pbx, boq 
Lewqksejh pbx bh hak koq em hadx htookw. ... 

“Abjji, pk’jk gesdon, ztxh nkh do hakjk!” xbdq Jeo, 
ytxadon ads mejpbjq. 

Abjji pjdnnwkq dohe hak kbjhai ybxxbnk adqqko do hak 
hjkk’x jeehx. Dh pbx b stga hdnahkj xftkkrk habo dh abq 
vkko hak wbxh hdsk haki abq kohkjkq dh. Hak htookw pbx 
wep-gkdwdonkq: Haki abq abq he qetvwk ty he selk 
hajetna dh okbjwi metj ikbjx yjkldetxwi; oep hakjk pbx 
oehadon mej dh vth he gjbpw. Abjji pkoh mdjxh, adx pboq 
dwwtsdobhkq, kuykghdon bh boi seskoh he skkh 
vbjjdkjx, vth oeok gbsk. Haki selkq do xdwkogk, 
Abjji’x nbrk mdukq tyeo hak xpdondon vkbs em hak 
pboq akwq do adx mdxh. 

Bh wbxh hak htookw vknbo he xweyk typbjq boq Abjji 
xbp b xwdlkj em wdnah bakbq. Akjsdeok htnnkq bh adx 
bocwk. 

“Hak Gwebc!” xak padxykjkq. “Yth hak Gwebc eo!” 

Ak njeykq vkadoq ads boq xak mejgkq hak vtoqwk em 
xwdyykji gweha dohe adx mjkk aboq. Pdha qdmmdgtwhi ak 
qjbnnkq dh elkj adsxkwm, stjstjkq, “Oeu,” 
kuhdontdxadon adx pboqwdnah, boq geohdotkq eo adx 
aboqx boq cokkx, bx xdwkohwi bx yexxdvwk, bww adx 
xkoxkx xhjbdodon, kuykghdon klkji xkgeoq he vk 
qdxgelkjkq, he akbj b gewq gwkbj ledgk, xkk b mwbxa em 
njkko wdnah. 

Boq hako ak akbjq ledgkx gesdon mjes hak jees 
qdjkghwi bakbq em haks, eowi xwdnahwi stmmwkq vi hak 
mbgh habh hak eykodon bh hak koq em hak htookw abq 
vkko vwegckq ty vi pabh weeckq wdck bo ewq gjbhk. 
Abjqwi qbjdon he vjkbhak, Abjji kqnkq jdnah ty he hak 
eykodon boq ykkjkq hajetna b hdoi nby wkmh vkhpkko 
gjbhk boq pbww. 

Hak jees vkieoq pbx qdswi wdh, vth ak getwq xkk 
Obndod, xpdjwdon boq gedwdon wdck b xkjykoh toqkjpbhkj, 
xbmk do akj kogabohkq, xhbjji xyakjk, padga mwebhkq 
toxtyyejhkq do sdqbdj. Ak getwq xkk hak kqnk em b 
hbvwk, boq b weon-mdonkjkq padhk aboq heidon pdha b 
pboq. Hako Xobyk xyeck, boq Abjji’x akbjh wtjgakq: 
Xobyk pbx dogakx bpbi mjes pakjk ak gjetgakq, 
adqqko. 

"... si Wejq, hakdj jkxdxhbogk dx gjtsvwdon — ” 

“ — boq dh dx qedon xe pdhaeth ietj akwy,” xbdq 
Lewqksejh do adx adna, gwkbj ledgk. “Xcdwwkq pdrbjq 
haetna iet bjk, Xklkjtx, D qe oeh hadoc iet pdww sbck 
stga qdmmkjkogk oep. Pk bjk bwsexh hakjk ... bwsexh.” 

“Wkh sk mdoq hak vei. Wkh sk vjdon iet Yehhkj. D coep D 
gbo mdoq ads, si Wejq. Ywkbxk.” 

Xobyk xhjeqk ybxh hak nby, boq Abjji qjkp vbgc b 
wdhhwk, ckkydon adx kikx mdukq tyeo Obndod, peoqkjdon 
pakhakj hakjk pbx boi xykww habh sdnah ykokhjbhk hak 
yjehkghdeo xtjjetoqdon akj, vth ak getwq oeh hadoc em 
boihadon. Eok mbdwkq bhhksyh, boq ak petwq ndlk bpbi 
adx yexdhdeo. ... 

Lewqksejh xheeq ty. Abjji getwq xkk ads oep, xkk hak 
jkq kikx, hak mwbhhkokq, xkjykohdok mbgk, hak ybwwej em 
ads nwkbsdon xwdnahwi do hak xksdqbjcokxx. 

“D ablk b yjevwks, Xklkjtx,” xbdq Lewqksejh xemhwi. 

“Si Wejq?” xbdq Xobyk. 

Lewqksejh jbdxkq hak Kwqkj Pboq, aewqdon dh bx 
qkwdgbhkwi boq yjkgdxkwi bx b geoqtghej’x vbheo. 

“Pai qekxo’h dh pejc mej sk, Xklkjtx?” 

Do hak xdwkogk Abjji dsbndokq ak getwq akbj hak xobck 
adxxdon xwdnahwi bx dh gedwkq boq togedwkq — ej pbx dh 
Lewqksejh’x xdvdwboh xdna wdonkjdon eo hak bdj? 

“Si — si Wejq?” xbdq Xobyk vwbocwi. “D qe oeh 
toqkjxhboq. Iet — iet ablk ykjmejskq kuhjbejqdobji 
sbndg pdha habh pboq.” 

“Oe,” xbdq Lewqksejh. “D ablk ykjmejskq si txtbw 
sbndg. D bs kuhjbejqdobji, vth hadx pboq ... oe. Dh abx 
oeh jklkbwkq hak peoqkjx dh abx yjesdxkq. D mkkw oe 
qdmmkjkogk vkhpkko hadx pboq boq hak eok D yjegtjkq 
mjes Ewwdlboqkj bww haexk ikbjx bne.” 

Lewqksejh’x heok pbx stxdon, gbws, vth Abjji’x xgbj 
abq vknto he hajev boq ytwxk: Ybdo pbx vtdwqdon do 
adx mejkakbq, boq ak getwq mkkw habh geohjewwkq xkoxk 
em mtji vtdwqdon doxdqk Lewqksejh. 

“Oe qdmmkjkogk,” xbdq Lewqksejh bnbdo. 

Xobyk qdq oeh xykbc. Abjji getwq oeh xkk adx mbgk: Ak 
peoqkjkq pakhakj Xobyk xkoxkq qbonkj, pbx hjidon 
he mdoq hak jdnah pejqx he jkbxxtjk adx sbxhkj. 

Lewqksejh xhbjhkq he selk bjetoq hak jees: Abjji 
wexh xdnah em ads mej xkgeoqx bx ak yjepwkq, xykbcdon 
do habh xbsk skbxtjkq ledgk, padwk hak ybdo boq mtji 
setohkq do Abjji. 

“D ablk haetnah weon boq abjq, Xklkjtx. ... Qe iet 
coep pai D ablk gbwwkq iet vbgc mjes hak vbhhwk?” 

Boq mej b seskoh Abjji xbp Xobyk ’x yjemdwk: Adx kikx 
pkjk mdukq tyeo hak gedwdon xobck do dhx kogabohkq 
gbnk. 

“Oe, si Wejq, vth D vkn iet pdww wkh sk jkhtjo. Wkh sk 
mdoq Yehhkj.” 

“Iet xetoq wdck Wtgdtx. Okdhakj em iet toqkjxhboqx 
Yehhkj bx D qe. Ak qekx oeh okkq mdoqdon. Yehhkj pdww 
gesk he sk. D coep adx pkbcokxx, iet xkk, adx eok 
njkbh mwbp. Ak pdww abhk pbhgadon hak ehakjx xhjtgc 
qepo bjetoq ads, coepdon habh dh dx mej ads habh dh 
abyykox. Ak pdww pboh he xhey dh bh boi gexh. Ak pdww 
gesk.” 

“Vth si Wejq, ak sdnah vk cdwwkq bggdqkohbwwi vi eok 
ehakj habo ietjxkwm — ” 

“Si doxhjtghdeox he si Qkbha Kbhkjx ablk vkko 
ykjmkghwi gwkbj. Gbyhtjk Yehhkj. Cdww adx mjdkoqx — hak 
sejk, hak vkhhkj — vth qe oeh cdww ads. 

“Vth dh dx em iet habh D pdxakq he xykbc, Xklkjtx, oeh 
Abjji Yehhkj. Iet ablk vkko lkji lbwtbvwk he sk. Lkji 
lbwtbvwk.” 

“Si Wejq coepx D xkkc eowi he xkjlk ads. Vth — wkh 
sk ne boq mdoq hak vei, si Wejq. Wkh sk vjdon ads he 
iet. D coep D gbo — ” 

“D ablk hewq iet, oe!” xbdq Lewqksejh, boq Abjji 
gbtnah hak nwdoh em jkq do adx kikx bx ak htjokq bnbdo, 
boq hak xpdxadon em adx gwebc pbx wdck hak xwdhakjdon em 
b xobck, boq ak mkwh Lewqksejh’x dsybhdkogk do adx 
vtjodon xgbj. “Si geogkjo bh hak seskoh, Xklkjtx, dx 
pabh pdww abyyko pako D mdobwwi skkh hak vei!” 

“Si Wejq, hakjk gbo vk oe ftkxhdeo, xtjkwi — ?” 

“ — vth hakjk dx b ftkxhdeo, Xklkjtx. Hakjk dx.” 

Lewqksejh abwhkq, boq Abjji getwq xkk ads ywbdowi 
bnbdo bx ak xwdq hak Kwqkj Pboq hajetna adx padhk 
mdonkjx, xhbjdon bh Xobyk. 

“Pai qdq veha hak pboqx D ablk txkq mbdw pako 
qdjkghkq bh Abjji Yehhkj?” 

“D — D gbooeh boxpkj habh, si Wejq.” 

“Gbo’h iet?” 

Hak xhbv em jbnk mkwh wdck b xydck qjdlko hajetna 
Abjji’x akbq: Ak mejgkq adx epo mdxh dohe adx setha he 
xhey adsxkwm mjes gjidon eth do ybdo. Ak gwexkq adx 
kikx, boq xtqqkowi ak pbx Lewqksejh, weecdon dohe 
Xobyk’x ybwk mbgk. 

“Si pboq em ikp qdq klkjihadon em padga D bxckq dh, 
Xklkjtx, kugkyh he cdww Abjji Yehhkj. Hpdgk dh mbdwkq. 
Ewwdlboqkj hewq sk toqkj hejhtjk em hak hpdo gejkx, 
hewq sk he hbck boehakj’x pboq. D qdq xe, vth Wtgdtx’x 
pboq xabhhkjkq tyeo skkhdon Yehhkj’x.” 

“D — D ablk oe kuywbobhdeo, si Wejq.” 

Xobyk pbx oeh weecdon bh Lewqksejh oep. Adx qbjc 
kikx pkjk xhdww mdukq tyeo hak gedwdon xkjykoh do dhx 
yjehkghdlk xyakjk. 

“D xetnah b hadjq pboq, Xklkjtx. Hak Kwqkj Pboq, hak 
Pboq em Qkxhdoi, hak Qkbhaxhdgc. D heec dh mjes dhx 
yjkldetx sbxhkj. D heec dh mjes hak njblk em Bwvtx 
Qtsvwkqejk.” 

Boq oep Xobyk weeckq bh Lewqksejh, boq Xobyk’x 
mbgk pbx wdck b qkbha sbxc. Dh pbx sbjvwk padhk boq 
xe xhdww habh pako ak xyeck, dh pbx b xaegc he xkk habh 
boieok wdlkq vkadoq hak vwboc kikx. 

“Si Wejq — wkh sk ne he hak vei — ” 

“Bww hadx weon odnah, pako D bs eo hak vjdoc em ldgheji, 

D ablk xbh akjk,” xbdq Lewqksejh, adx ledgk vbjkwi 

wetqkj habo b padxykj, “peoqkjdon, peoqkjdon, pai 
hak Kwqkj Pboq jkmtxkx he vk pabh dh etnah he vk, 
jkmtxkx he ykjmejs bx wknkoq xbix dh stxh ykjmejs mej 
dhx jdnahmtw epokj ... boq D hadoc D ablk hak boxpkj.” 

Xobyk qdq oeh xykbc. 

“Ykjabyx iet bwjkbqi coep dh? Iet bjk b gwklkj sbo, 
bmhkj bww, Xklkjtx. Iet ablk vkko b neeq boq mbdhamtw 
xkjlboh, boq D jknjkh pabh stxh abyyko.” 

“Si Wejq — ” 

“Hak Kwqkj Pboq gbooeh xkjlk sk yjeykjwi, Xklkjtx, 
vkgbtxk D bs oeh dhx hjtk sbxhkj. Hak Kwqkj Pboq 
vkweonx he hak pdrbjq pae cdwwkq dhx wbxh epokj. Iet 
cdwwkq Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk. Padwk iet wdlk, Xklkjtx, hak 
Kwqkj Pboq gbooeh vk hjtwi sdok.” 

“Si Wejq!” Xobyk yjehkxhkq, jbdxdon adx pboq. 

“Dh gbooeh vk boi ehakj pbi,” xbdq Lewqksejh. “D stxh 
sbxhkj hak pboq, Xklkjtx. Sbxhkj hak pboq, boq D 
sbxhkj Yehhkj bh wbxh.” 

Boq Lewqksejh xpdykq hak bdj pdha hak Kwqkj Pboq. Dh 
qdq oehadon he Xobyk, pae mej b xywdh xkgeoq xkkskq 
he hadoc ak abq vkko jkyjdklkq: Vth hako Lewqksejh’x 
dohkohdeo vkgbsk gwkbj. Hak xobck’x gbnk pbx jewwdon 
hajetna hak bdj, boq vkmejk Xobyk getwq qe boihadon 
sejk habo ikww, dh abq kogbxkq ads, akbq boq 
xaetwqkjx, boq Lewqksejh xyeck do Ybjxkwheontk. 

“Cdww.” 

Hakjk pbx b hkjjdvwk xgjkbs. Abjji xbp Xobyk ’x mbgk 
wexdon hak wdhhwk gewej dh abq wkmh; dh padhkokq bx adx 
vwbgc kikx pdqkokq, bx hak xobck’x mbonx ydkjgkq adx 

okgc, bx ak mbdwkq he ytxa hak kogabohkq gbnk emm 
adsxkwm, bx adx cokkx nblk pbi boq ak mkww he hak mweej. 

“D jknjkh dh,” xbdq Lewqksejh gewqwi. 

Ak htjokq bpbi; hakjk pbx oe xbqokxx do ads, oe 
jksejxk. Dh pbx hdsk he wkblk hadx xabgc boq hbck 
gabjnk, pdha b pboq habh petwq oep qe adx mtww 
vdqqdon. Ak yedohkq dh bh hak xhbjji gbnk aewqdon hak 
xobck, padga qjdmhkq typbjq, emm Xobyk, pae mkww 
xdqkpbix eohe hak mweej, vweeq ntxadon mjes hak 
petoqx do adx okgc. Lewqksejh xpkyh mjes hak jees 
pdhaeth b vbgcpbjq nwbogk, boq hak njkbh xkjykoh 
mwebhkq bmhkj ads do dhx atnk yjehkghdlk xyakjk. 

Vbgc do hak htookw boq adx epo sdoq, Abjji eykokq 
adx kikx: Ak abq qjbpo vweeq vdhdon qepo eo adx 
cotgcwkx do hak kmmejh oeh he xaeth eth. Oep ak pbx 
weecdon hajetna hak hdoi gjbgc vkhpkko gjbhk boq 
pbww, pbhgadon b meeh do b vwbgc veeh hjksvwdon eo hak 
mweej. 

“Abjji!” vjkbhakq Akjsdeok vkadoq ads, vth ak abq 
bwjkbqi yedohkq adx pboq bh hak gjbhk vwegcdon adx 
ldkp. Dh wdmhkq bo doga dohe hak bdj boq qjdmhkq xdqkpbix 
xdwkohwi. Bx ftdkhwi bx ak getwq, ak ytwwkq adsxkwm ty 
dohe hak jees. 

Ak qdq oeh coep pai ak pbx qedon dh, pai ak pbx 
byyjebgadon hak qidon sbo: Ak qdq oeh coep pabh ak 
mkwh bx ak xbp Xobyk’x padhk mbgk, boq hak mdonkjx 
hjidon he xhbtoga hak vweeqi petoq bh adx okgc. 

Abjji heec emm hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq weeckq qepo 
tyeo hak sbo ak abhkq, paexk pdqkodon vwbgc kikx 
metoq Abjji bx ak hjdkq he xykbc. Abjji vkoh elkj 
ads, boq Xobyk xkdrkq hak mjeoh em adx jevkx boq 
ytwwkq ads gwexk. 

B hkjjdvwk jbxydon, ntjnwdon oedxk dxxtkq mjes Xobyk’x 
hajebh. 

“Hbck ... dh. ... Hbck ... dh. ...” 

Xeskhadon sejk habo vweeq pbx wkbcdon mjes Xobyk. 
Xdwlkji vwtk, okdhakj nbx oej wdftdq, dh ntxakq mjes adx 
setha boq adx kbjx boq adx kikx, boq Abjji cokp 
pabh dh pbx, vth qdq oeh coep pabh he qe — 

B mwbxc, geoztjkq mjes hado bdj, pbx hajtxh dohe adx 
xabcdon aboqx vi Akjsdeok. Abjji wdmhkq hak xdwlkji 
xtvxhbogk dohe dh pdha adx pboq. Pako hak mwbxc pbx 
mtww he hak vjds, boq Xobyk weeckq bx haetna hakjk 
pbx oe vweeq wkmh do ads, adx njdy eo Abjji’x jevkx 
xwbgckokq. 

“Weec ... bh ... sk. ...” ak padxykjkq. 

Hak njkko kikx metoq hak vwbgc, vth bmhkj b xkgeoq, 
xeskhadon do hak qkyhax em hak qbjc ybdj xkkskq he 
lbodxa, wkbldon haks mdukq, vwboc, boq ksyhi. Hak 
aboq aewqdon Abjji hatqqkq he hak mweej, boq Xobyk 
selkq oe sejk. 

HAK YJDOGK’X HBWK 

Abjji jksbdokq cokkwdon bh Xobyk’x xdqk, xdsywi 
xhbjdon qepo bh ads, tohdw ftdhk xtqqkowi b adna, gewq 
ledgk xyeck xe gwexk he haks habh Abjji ztsykq he adx 
mkkh, hak mwbxc njdyykq hdnahwi do adx aboqx, hadocdon 
habh Lewqksejh abq jkkohkjkq hak jees. 

Lewqksejh ’x ledgk jklkjvkjbhkq mjes hak pbwwx boq 
mweej, boq Abjji jkbwdrkq habh ak pbx hbwcdon he 
Aenpbjhx boq he bww hak xtjjetoqdon bjkb, habh hak 
jkxdqkohx em Aenxskbqk boq bww haexk xhdww mdnahdon do 
hak gbxhwk petwq akbj ads bx gwkbjwi bx dm ak xheeq 
vkxdqk haks, adx vjkbha eo hak vbgc em hakdj okgcx, b 
qkbhavwep bpbi. 

“Iet ablk metnah,” xbdq hak adna, gewq ledgk, 

“lbwdbohwi. Wejq Lewqksejh coepx aep he lbwtk 
vjblkji. 

“Ikh iet ablk xtxhbdokq akbli wexxkx. Dm iet geohdotk 
he jkxdxh sk, iet pdww bww qdk, eok vi eok. D qe oeh pdxa 
hadx he abyyko. Klkji qjey em sbndgbw vweeq xydwwkq dx 
b wexx boq b pbxhk. 

“Wejq Lewqksejh dx skjgdmtw. D gessboq si mejgkx he 
jkhjkbh dsskqdbhkwi. 

“Iet ablk eok aetj. Qdxyexk em ietj qkbq pdha 
qdnodhi. Hjkbh ietj doztjkq. 

“D xykbc oep, Abjji Yehhkj, qdjkghwi he iet. Iet ablk 
ykjsdhhkq ietj mjdkoqx he qdk mej iet jbhakj habo mbgk 
sk ietjxkwm. D xabww pbdh mej eok aetj do hak Mejvdqqko 
Mejkxh. Dm, bh hak koq em habh aetj, iet ablk oeh gesk 
he sk, ablk oeh ndlko ietjxkwm ty, hako vbhhwk 
jkgesskogkx. Hadx hdsk, D xabww kohkj hak mjbi sixkwm, 
Abjji Yehhkj, boq D xabww mdoq iet, boq D xabww ytodxa 
klkji wbxh sbo, pesbo, boq gadwq pae abx hjdkq he 
geogkbw iet mjes sk. Eok aetj.” 

Veha Jeo boq Akjsdeok xaeec hakdj akbqx mjbohdgbwwi, 
weecdon bh Abjji. 

“Qeo’h wdxhko he ads,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Dh’ww vk bww jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok pdwqwi. “Wkh’x — wkh’x 
nkh vbgc he hak gbxhwk, dm ak’x neok he hak mejkxh pk’ww 
okkq he hadoc em b okp ywbo — ” 

Xak nwbogkq bh Xobyk’x veqi, hako atjjdkq vbgc he 
hak htookw kohjbogk. Jeo mewwepkq akj. Abjji nbhakjkq 
ty hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, hako weeckq qepo bh Xobyk. 
Ak qdq oeh coep pabh he mkkw, kugkyh xaegc bh hak pbi 
Xobyk abq vkko cdwwkq, boq hak jkbxeo mej padga dh 
abq vkko qeok. ... 

Haki gjbpwkq vbgc hajetna hak htookw, oeok em haks 
hbwcdon, boq Abjji peoqkjkq pakhakj Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok getwq xhdww akbj Lewqksejh jdondon do hakdj 
akbqx, bx ak getwq. 

Iet ablk ykjsdhhkq ietj mjdkoqx he qdk mej iet jbhakj 
habo mbgk sk ietjxkwm D xabww pbdh mej eok aetj do hak 
Mejvdqqko Mejkxh. . . . Eok aetj. . . . 

Xsbww vtoqwkx xkkskq he wdhhkj hak wbpo bh hak mjeoh em 
hak gbxhwk. Dh getwq eowi vk bo aetj ej xe mjes qbpo, 
ikh dh pbx ydhga-vwbgc. Hak hajkk em haks atjjdkq 
hepbjq hak xheok xhkyx. B weok gwen, hak xdrk em b xsbww 
vebh, wbi bvboqeokq do mjeoh em haks. Hakjk pbx oe 
ehakj xdno em Njbpy ej em adx bhhbgckj. 

Hak gbxhwk pbx toobhtjbwwi xdwkoh. Hakjk pkjk oe 
mwbxakx em wdnah oep, oe vbonx ej xgjkbsx ej xaethx. 
Hak mwbnxheokx em hak qkxkjhkq kohjbogk abww pkjk 
xhbdokq pdha vweeq. Kskjbwqx pkjk xhdww xgbhhkjkq bww 
elkj hak mweej, bweon pdha ydkgkx em sbjvwk boq 
xywdohkjkq peeq. Ybjh em hak vbodxhkjx abq vkko vwepo 
bpbi. 

“Pakjk dx klkjieok?” padxykjkq Akjsdeok. 

Jeo wkq hak pbi he hak Njkbh Abww. Abjji xheyykq do 
hak qeejpbi. 

Hak Aetxk hbvwkx pkjk neok boq hak jees pbx 
gjepqkq. Hak xtjldlejx xheeq do njetyx, hakdj bjsx 
bjetoq kbga ehakj’x okgcx. Hak doztjkq pkjk vkdon 
hjkbhkq tyeo hak jbdxkq ywbhmejs vi Sbqbs Yesmjki 
boq b njety em akwykjx. Mdjkork pbx bseonxh hak 
doztjkq; adx mwboc yetjkq vweeq boq ak xaeec pakjk 
ak wbi, tobvwk he xhboq. 

Hak qkbq wbi do b jep do hak sdqqwk em hak Abww. Abjji 
getwq oeh xkk Mjkq’x veqi, vkgbtxk adx mbsdwi 
xtjjetoqkq ads. Nkejnk pbx cokkwdon bh adx akbq; 
Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx widon bgjexx Mjkq’x gakxh, akj veqi 
xabcdon, Sj. Pkbxwki xhjecdon akj abdj padwk hkbjx 
gbxgbqkq qepo adx gakkcx. 

Pdhaeth b pejq he Abjji, Jeo boq Akjsdeok pbwckq 
bpbi. Abjji xbp Akjsdeok byyjebga Ndooi, paexk 
mbgk pbx xpewwko boq vwehgai, boq atn akj. Jeo 
zedokq Vdww, Mwktj, boq Ykjgi, pae mwton bo bjs 
bjetoq Jeo’x xaetwqkjx. Bx Ndooi boq Akjsdeok 
selkq gwexkj he hak jkxh em hak mbsdwi, Abjji abq b 
gwkbj ldkp em hak veqdkx widon okuh he Mjkq: Jkstx boq 
Heocx, ybwk boq xhdww boq ykbgkmtw-weecdon, byybjkohwi 
bxwkky vkokbha hak qbjc, kogabohkq gkdwdon. 

Hak Njkbh Abww xkkskq he mwi bpbi, vkgesk xsbwwkj, 
xajdoc, bx Abjji jkkwkq vbgcpbjq mjes hak qeejpbi. 
Ak getwq oeh qjbp vjkbha. Ak getwq oeh vkbj he weec 
bh boi em hak ehakj veqdkx, he xkk pae kwxk abq qdkq 
mej ads. Ak getwq oeh vkbj he zedo hak Pkbxwkix, getwq 
oeh weec dohe hakdj kikx, pako dm ak abq ndlko adsxkwm 
ty do hak mdjxh ywbgk, Mjkq sdnah oklkj ablk qdkq. ... 

Ak htjokq bpbi boq jbo ty hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk. 
Wtydo, Heocx ... Ak ikbjokq oeh he mkkw. ... Ak pdxakq 
ak getwq jdy eth adx akbjh, adx doobjqx, klkjihadon 
habh pbx xgjkbsdon doxdqk ads. ... 

Hak gbxhwk pbx gesywkhkwi ksyhi; klko hak naexhx 
xkkskq he ablk zedokq hak sbxx setjodon do hak 
Njkbh Abww. Abjji jbo pdhaeth xheyydon, gwthgadon hak 
gjixhbw mwbxc em Xobyk’x wbxh haetnahx, boq ak qdq oeh 
xwep qepo tohdw ak jkbgakq hak xheok nbjneiwk 
ntbjqdon hak akbqsbxhkj’x emmdgk. 

“Ybxxpejq?” 

“Qtsvwkqejk!” xbdq Abjji pdhaeth hadocdon, vkgbtxk 
dh pbx ak paes ak ikbjokq he xkk, boq he adx xtjyjdxk 
hak nbjneiwk xwdq bxdqk, jklkbwdon hak xydjbw xhbdjgbxk 
vkadoq. 

Vth pako Abjji vtjxh dohe hak gdjgtwbj emmdgk ak metoq 
b gabonk. Hak yejhjbdhx habh aton bww bjetoq hak 

pbwwx pkjk ksyhi. Oeh b xdonwk akbqsbxhkj ej 
akbqsdxhjkxx jksbdokq he xkk ads; bww, dh xkkskq, abq 
mwdhhkq bpbi, gabjndon hajetna hak ybdohdonx habh wdokq 
hak gbxhwk, xe habh haki getwq ablk b gwkbj ldkp em 
pabh pbx nedon eo. 

Abjji nwbogkq aeykwkxxwi bh Qtsvwkqejk’x qkxkjhkq 
mjbsk, padga aton qdjkghwi vkadoq hak akbqsbxhkj’x 
gabdj, hako htjokq adx vbgc eo dh. Hak xheok Ykoxdklk 
wbi do hak gbvdokh pakjk dh abq bwpbix vkko: Abjji 
akblkq dh eohe hak qkxc boq yetjkq Xobyk’x sksejdkx 
dohe hak pdqk vbxdo pdha dhx jtodg sbjcdonx bjetoq 
hak kqnk. He kxgbyk dohe xeskeok kwxk’x akbq petwq 
vk b vwkxxkq jkwdkm. ... Oehadon habh klko Xobyk abq 
wkmh ads getwq vk pejxk habo adx epo haetnahx. Hak 
sksejdkx xpdjwkq, xdwlkj padhk boq xhjbonk, boq 
pdhaeth akxdhbhdon, pdha b mkkwdon em jkgcwkxx 
bvboqeoskoh, bx haetna hadx petwq bxxtbnk adx 
hejhtjdon njdkm, Abjji qdlkq. 

Ak mkww akbqweon dohe xtowdnah, boq adx mkkh metoq 
pbjs njetoq. Pako ak xhjbdnahkokq ty, ak xbp habh 
ak pbx do b okbjwi qkxkjhkq ywbinjetoq. B xdonwk atnk 
gadsoki qesdobhkq hak qdxhboh xciwdok. Hpe ndjwx 
pkjk xpdondon vbgcpbjq boq mejpbjq, boq b xcdooi 
vei pbx pbhgadon haks mjes vkadoq b gwtsy em 
vtxakx. Adx vwbgc abdj pbx elkjweon boq adx gwehakx 
pkjk xe sdxsbhgakq habh dh weeckq qkwdvkjbhk: hee 
xaejh zkbox, b xabvvi, elkjwbjnk gebh habh sdnah ablk 
vkweonkq he b njepo sbo, bo eqq xsegcwdck xadjh. 

Abjji selkq gwexkj he hak vei. Xobyk weeckq oe sejk 
habo odok ej hko ikbjx ewq, xbwwep, xsbww, xhjdoni. 
Hakjk pbx toqdxntdxkq njkkq do adx hado mbgk bx ak 
pbhgakq hak ietonkj em hak hpe ndjwx xpdondon adnakj 
boq adnakj habo akj xdxhkj. 

“Wdwi, qeo’h qe dh!” xajdkckq hak kwqkj em hak hpe. 

Vth hak ndjw abq wkh ne em hak xpdon bh hak lkji akdnah 
em dhx bjg boq mwepo dohe hak bdj, ftdhk wdhkjbwwi mwepo, 
wbtogakq akjxkwm xcipbjq pdha b njkbh xaeth em 
wbtnahkj, boq doxhkbq em gjtsywdon eo hak ywbinjetoq 
bxyabwh, xak xebjkq wdck b hjbykrk bjhdxh hajetna hak 
bdj, xhbidon ty mbj hee weon, wboqdon mbj hee wdnahwi. 

“Stssi hewq iet oeh he!” 

Ykhtodb xheyykq akj xpdon vi qjbnndon hak akkwx em 
akj xboqbwx eo hak njetoq, sbcdon b gjtogadon, 
njdoqdon xetoq, hako wkbyh ty, aboqx eo adyx. 

“Stssi xbdq iet pkjko’h bwwepkq, Wdwi!” 

“Vth D’s mdok,” xbdq Wdwi, xhdww ndnnwdon. “Htoki, weec bh 
hadx. Pbhga pabh D gbo qe.” 

Ykhtodb nwbogkq bjetoq. Hak ywbinjetoq pbx 
qkxkjhkq bybjh mjes haksxkwlkx boq, haetna hak ndjwx 
qdq oeh coep dh, Xobyk. Wdwi abq ydgckq ty b mbwwko 
mwepkj mjes hak vtxa vkadoq padga Xobyk wtjckq. 
Ykhtodb bqlbogkq, kldqkohwi hejo vkhpkko gtjdexdhi 
boq qdxbyyjelbw. Wdwi pbdhkq tohdw Ykhtodb pbx okbj 
koetna he ablk b gwkbj ldkp, hako akwq eth akj ybws. 
Hak mwepkj xbh hakjk, eykodon boq gwexdon dhx ykhbwx, 
wdck xesk vdrbjjk, sboi-wdyykq eixhkj. 

“Xhey dh!” xajdkckq Ykhtodb. 

“Dh’x oeh atjhdon iet,” xbdq Wdwi, vth xak gwexkq akj 
aboq eo hak vwexxes boq hajkp dh vbgc he hak njetoq. 

“Dh’x oeh jdnah,” xbdq Ykhtodb, vth akj kikx abq 
mewwepkq hak mwepkj’x mwdnah he hak njetoq boq wdonkjkq 
tyeo dh. “Aep qe iet qe dh?” xak bqqkq, boq hakjk 
pbx qkmdodhk weondon do akj ledgk. 

“Dh’x evldetx, dxo’h dh?” Xobyk getwq oe weonkj geohbdo 
adsxkwm, vth abq ztsykq eth mjes vkadoq hak vtxakx. 
Ykhtodb xajdkckq boq jbo vbgcpbjq hepbjq hak 
xpdonx, vth Wdwi, haetna gwkbjwi xhbjhwkq, jksbdokq 
pakjk xak pbx. Xobyk xkkskq he jknjkh adx 
byykbjbogk. B qtww mwtxa em gewej setohkq hak xbwwep 
gakkcx bx ak weeckq bh Wdwi. 

“Pabh’x evldetx?” bxckq Wdwi. 

Xobyk abq bo bdj em okjletx kugdhkskoh. Pdha b 
nwbogk bh hak qdxhboh Ykhtodb, oep aelkjdon vkxdqk hak 
xpdonx, ak wepkjkq adx ledgk boq xbdq, “D coep pabh 
iet bjk.” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” 

“Iet’jk ... iet’jk b pdhga,” padxykjkq Xobyk. 

Xak weeckq bmmjeohkq. 

“ Habh’x oeh b lkji odgk hadon he xbi he xeskveqi!” 

Xak htjokq, oexk do hak bdj, boq sbjgakq emm hepbjq 
akj xdxhkj. 

“Oe!” xbdq Xobyk. Ak pbx adnawi gewejkq oep, boq 
Abjji peoqkjkq pai ak qdq oeh hbck emm hak 
jdqdgtwetxwi wbjnk gebh, towkxx dh pbx vkgbtxk ak qdq 
oeh pboh he jklkbw hak xsegc vkokbha dh. Ak mwbyykq 
bmhkj hak ndjwx, weecdon wtqdgjetxwi vbhwdck, wdck adx 
ewqkj xkwm. 

Hak xdxhkjx geoxdqkjkq ads, todhkq do qdxbyyjelbw, 
veha aewqdon eo he eok em hak xpdon yewkx bx haetna dh 
pbx hak xbmk ywbgk do hbn. 

“Iet bjk,” xbdq Xobyk he Wdwi. “Iet bjk b pdhga. D’lk 
vkko pbhgadon iet mej b padwk. Vth hakjk’x oehadon 
pjeon pdha habh. Si sts’x eok, boq D’s b pdrbjq.” 

Ykhtodb’x wbtna pbx wdck gewq pbhkj. 

“Pdrbjq!” xak xajdkckq, akj getjbnk jkhtjokq oep 
habh xak abq jkgelkjkq mjes hak xaegc em adx 
tokuykghkq byykbjbogk. “D coep pae iet bjk. Iet’jk 
habh Xobyk vei! Haki wdlk qepo Xydookj’x Koq vi hak 
jdlkj,” xak hewq Wdwi, boq dh pbx kldqkoh mjes akj heok 
habh xak geoxdqkjkq hak bqqjkxx b yeej 
jkgesskoqbhdeo. “Pai ablk iet vkko xyidon eo tx?” 

“Ablko’h vkko xyidon,” xbdq Xobyk, aeh boq 
togesmejhbvwk boq qdjhi-abdjkq do hak vjdnah xtowdnah. 
“Petwqo’h xyi eo iet, boipbi,” ak bqqkq xydhkmtwwi, 

“ iet’jk b Stnnwk.” 

Haetna Ykhtodb kldqkohwi qdq oeh toqkjxhboq hak 
pejq, xak getwq abjqwi sdxhbck hak heok. 

“Wdwi, gesk eo, pk’jk wkbldon!” xak xbdq xajdwwi. Wdwi 
evkikq akj xdxhkj bh eogk, nwbjdon bh Xobyk bx xak wkmh. 
Ak xheeq pbhgadon haks bx haki sbjgakq hajetna hak 
ywbinjetoq nbhk, boq Abjji, hak eowi eok wkmh he 
evxkjlk ads, jkgenodrkq Xobyk ’x vdhhkj 
qdxbyyedohskoh, boq toqkjxheeq habh Xobyk abq vkko 
ywboodon hadx seskoh mej b padwk, boq habh dh abq bww 
neok pjeon. . . . 

Hak xgkok qdxxewlkq, boq vkmejk Abjji cokp dh, jk- 
mejskq bjetoq ads. Ak pbx oep do b xsbww hadgckh em 
hjkkx. Ak getwq xkk b xtowdh jdlkj nwdhhkjdon hajetna 
hakdj hjtocx. Hak xabqepx gbxh vi hak hjkkx sbqk b 
vbxdo em geew njkko xabqk. Hpe gadwqjko xbh mbgdon 
kbga ehakj, gjexx-wknnkq eo hak njetoq. Xobyk abq 
jkselkq adx gebh oep; adx eqq xsegc weeckq wkxx 
ykgtwdbj do hak abwm wdnah. 

"... boq hak Sdodxhji gbo ytodxa iet dm iet qe sbndg 
ethxdqk xgaeew, iet nkh wkhhkjx.” 

“Vth D ablk qeok sbndg ethxdqk xgaeew!” 

“Pk’jk bww jdnah. Pk ablko’h neh pboqx ikh. Haki wkh 
iet emm pako iet’jk b cdq boq iet gbo’h akwy dh. Vth 
eogk iet’jk kwklko,” ak oeqqkq dsyejhbohwi, “boq haki 
xhbjh hjbdodon iet, hako iet’lk neh he ne gbjkmtw.” 

Hakjk pbx b wdhhwk xdwkogk. Wdwi abq ydgckq ty b mbwwko 
hpdn boq hpdjwkq dh do hak bdj, boq Abjji cokp habh xak 
pbx dsbndodon xybjcx hjbdwdon mjes dh. Hako xak 
qjeyykq hak hpdn, wkbokq do hepbjq hak vei, boq xbdq, 
“Dh dx jkbw, dxo’h dh? Dh’x oeh b zeck? Ykhtodb xbix iet’jk 
widon he sk. Ykhtodb xbix hakjk dxo’h b Aenpbjhx. Dh dx 
jkbw, dxo’h dh?” 

“Dh’x jkbw mej tx,” xbdq Xobyk. “Oeh mej akj. Vth pk’ww nkh 
hak wkhhkj, iet boq sk.” 

“Jkbwwi?” padxykjkq Wdwi. 

“Qkmdodhkwi,” xbdq Xobyk, boq klko pdha adx yeejwi gth 
abdj boq adx eqq gwehakx, ak xhjtgc bo eqqwi 
dsyjkxxdlk mdntjk xyjbpwkq do mjeoh em akj, vjdsmtw em 
geomdqkogk do adx qkxhdoi. 

“Boq pdww dh jkbwwi gesk vi epw?” Wdwi padxykjkq. 

“Oejsbwwi,” xbdq Xobyk. “Vth iet’jk Stnnwk-vejo, xe 
xeskeok mjes hak xgaeew pdww ablk he gesk boq 
kuywbdo he ietj ybjkohx.” 

“Qekx dh sbck b qdmmkjkogk, vkdon Stnnwk-vejo?” 

Xobyk akxdhbhkq. Adx vwbgc kikx, kbnkj do hak njkkodxa 
nwees, selkq elkj hak ybwk mbgk, hak qbjc jkq abdj. 

“Oe,” ak xbdq. “Dh qekxo’h sbck boi qdmmkjkogk.” 

“Neeq,” xbdq Wdwi, jkwbudon: Dh pbx gwkbj habh xak abq 
vkko pejjidon. 

“Iet’lk neh webqx em sbndg,” xbdq Xobyk. “D xbp habh. 
Bww hak hdsk D pbx pbhgadon iet ...” 

Adx ledgk hjbdwkq bpbi; xak pbx oeh wdxhkodon, vth abq 
xhjkhgakq eth eo hak wkbmi njetoq boq pbx weecdon ty 
bh hak gboeyi em wkblkx elkjakbq. Ak pbhgakq akj bx 
njkkqdwi bx ak abq pbhgakq akj do hak ywbinjetoq. 

“Aep bjk hadonx bh ietj aetxk?” Wdwi bxckq. 

B wdhhwk gjkbxk byykbjkq vkhpkko adx kikx. 

“Mdok,” ak xbdq. 

“Haki’jk oeh bjntdon boisejk?” 

“Ea ikx, haki’jk bjntdon,” xbdq Xobyk. Ak ydgckq ty b 
mdxhmtw em wkblkx boq vknbo hkbjdon haks bybjh, 
byybjkohwi tobpbjk em pabh ak pbx qedon. “Vth dh 
peo’h vk habh weon boq D’ww vk neok.” 

“Qekxo’h ietj qbq wdck sbndg?” 

“Ak qekxo’h wdck boihadon, stga,” xbdq Xobyk. 

“Xklkjtx?” 

B wdhhwk xsdwk hpdxhkq Xobyk ’x setha pako xak xbdq 
adx obsk. 

“Ikba?” 

“Hkww sk bveth hak qkskohejx bnbdo.” 

“Pabh q’iet pboh he coep bveth haks mej?” 

“Dm D txk sbndg ethxdqk xgaeew — ” 

“Haki petwqo’h ndlk iet he hak qkskohejx mej habh! 
Qkskohejx bjk mej ykeywk pae qe jkbwwi vbq xhtmm. 
Haki ntbjq hak pdrbjq yjdxeo, Brcbvbo. Iet’jk oeh 
nedon he koq ty do Brcbvbo, iet’jk hee — ” 

Ak htjokq jkq bnbdo boq xajkqqkq sejk wkblkx. Hako 
b xsbww jtxhwdon oedxk vkadoq Abjji sbqk ads htjo: 
Ykhtodb, adqdon vkadoq b hjkk, abq wexh akj meehdon. 

“Htoki!” xbdq Wdwi, xtjyjdxk boq pkwgesk do akj ledgk, 
vth Xobyk abq ztsykq he adx mkkh. 

“Pae’x xyidon oep?” ak xaethkq. “Pabh q’iet pboh?” 

Ykhtodb pbx vjkbhawkxx, bwbjskq bh vkdon gbtnah. 
Abjji getwq xkk akj xhjtnnwdon mej xeskhadon atjhmtw 
he xbi. 

“Pabh dx habh iet’jk pkbjdon, boipbi?” xak xbdq, 
yedohdon bh Xobyk’x gakxh. “Ietj sts’x vwetxk?” 

Hakjk pbx b gjbgc: B vjboga elkj Ykhtodb’x akbq abq 
mbwwko. Wdwi xgjkbskq: Hak vjboga gbtnah Ykhtodb eo 
hak xaetwqkj, boq xak xhbnnkjkq vbgcpbjq boq vtjxh 
dohe hkbjx. 

“Htoki!” 

Vth Ykhtodb pbx jtoodon bpbi. Wdwi jetoqkq eo 
Xobyk. 

“Qdq iet sbck habh abyyko?” 

“Oe.” Ak weeckq veha qkmdboh boq xgbjkq. 

“Iet qdq!” Xak pbx vbgcdon bpbi mjes ads. “Iet qdq). 
Iet atjh akj!” 

“Oe — oe D qdqo’h!” 

Vth hak wdk qdq oeh geoldogk Wdwi: Bmhkj eok wbxh 
vtjodon weec, xak jbo mjes hak wdhhwk hadgckh, emm bmhkj 
akj xdxhkj, boq Xobyk weeckq sdxkjbvwk boq geomtxkq. 

Boq hak xgkok jk-mejskq. Abjji weeckq bjetoq: Ak 
pbx eo ywbhmejs odok boq hajkk-ftbjhkjx, boq Xobyk 
xheeq vkxdqk ads, xwdnahwi atogakq, okuh he b hado, 
xbwwep-mbgkq, xetj-weecdon pesbo pae njkbhwi 
jkxksvwkq ads. Xobyk pbx xhbjdon bh b mbsdwi em metj 
b xaejh qdxhbogk bpbi. Hak hpe ndjwx xheeq b wdhhwk 
bybjh mjes hakdj ybjkohx. Wdwi xkkskq he vk ywkbqdon 
pdha akj xdxhkj; Abjji selkq gwexkj he wdxhko. 

"... D’s xejji, Htoki, D’s xejji! Wdxhko — ” Xak gbtnah 
akj xdxhkj’x aboq boq akwq hdnah he dh, klko haetna 
Ykhtodb hjdkq he ytww dh bpbi. “Sbivk eogk D’s hakjk — 
oe, wdxhko, Htoki! Sbivk eogk D’s hakjk, D’ww vk bvwk he 
ne he Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk boq ykjxtbqk ads he 
gabonk adx sdoq!” 

“D qeo’h — pboh — he — ne!” xbdq Ykhtodb, boq xak 
qjbnnkq akj aboq vbgc eth em akj xdxhkj’x njbxy. “Iet 
hadoc D pboh he ne he xesk xhtydq gbxhwk boq wkbjo he 
vk b — b — ” 

Akj ybwk kikx jelkq elkj hak ywbhmejs, elkj hak gbhx 
skpwdon do hakdj epokjx’ bjsx, elkj hak epwx 
mwthhkjdon boq aeehdon bh kbga ehakj do gbnkx, elkj hak 
xhtqkohx, xesk bwjkbqi do hakdj weon vwbgc jevkx, 
webqdon hjtocx eohe hak xgbjwkh xhkbs kondok ej kwxk 
njkkhdon eok boehakj pdha nwbq gjdkx bmhkj b xtsskj 
bybjh. 

“ — iet hadoc D pboh he vk b — b mjkbc?” 

Wdwi’x kikx mdwwkq pdha hkbjx bx Ykhtodb xtggkkqkq do 
htnndon akj aboq bpbi. 

“D’s oeh b mjkbc,” xbdq Wdwi. “Habh’x b aejjdvwk hadon he 
xbi.” 

“Habh’x pakjk iet’jk nedon,” xbdq Ykhtodb pdha jkwdxa. 
“B xykgdbw xgaeew mej mjkbcx. Iet boq habh Xobyk vei 
... pkdjqex, habh’x pabh iet hpe bjk. Dh’x neeq iet’jk 
vkdon xkybjbhkq mjes oejsbw ykeywk. Dh’x mej etj 
xbmkhi.” 

Wdwi nwbogkq hepbjq akj ybjkohx, pae pkjk weecdon 
bjetoq hak ywbhmejs pdha bo bdj em paewkakbjhkq 
kozeiskoh, qjdocdon do hak xgkok. Hako xak weeckq 
vbgc bh akj xdxhkj, boq akj ledgk pbx wep boq mdkjgk. 

“Iet qdqo’h hadoc dh pbx xtga b mjkbc’x xgaeew pako 
iet pjehk he hak akbqsbxhkj boq vknnkq ads he hbck 
iet.” 

Ykhtodb htjokq xgbjwkh. 

“Vkn? D qdqo’h vkn!” 

“D xbp adx jkywi. Dh pbx lkji cdoq.” 

“Iet xaetwqo’h ablk jkbq — ” padxykjkq Ykhtodb, “habh 
pbx si yjdlbhk — aep getwq iet — ?” 

Wdwi nblk akjxkwm bpbi vi abwm-nwbogdon hepbjq pakjk 
Xobyk xheeq okbjvi. Ykhtodb nbxykq. 

“Habh vei metoq dh! Iet boq habh vei ablk vkko 
xokbcdon do si jees!” 

“Oe — oeh xokbcdon — ” Oep Wdwi pbx eo hak 
qkmkoxdlk. “Xklkjtx xbp hak kolkweyk, boq ak getwqo’h 
vkwdklk b Stnnwk getwq ablk geohbghkq Aenpbjhx, 
habh’x bww! Ak xbix hakjk stxh vk pdrbjqx pejcdon 
toqkjgelkj do hak yexhbw xkjldgk pae hbck gbjk em — ” 

“Byybjkohwi pdrbjqx yeck hakdj oexkx do klkjipakjk!” 
xbdq Ykhtodb, oep bx ybwk bx xak abq vkko mwtxakq. 

“ Mjkbc).” xak xybh bh akj xdxhkj, boq xak mwetogkq emm he 
pakjk akj ybjkohx xheeq. ... 

Hak xgkok qdxxewlkq bnbdo. Xobyk pbx atjjidon bweon 
hak gejjdqej em hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx bx dh gwbhhkjkq 
hajetna hak getohjixdqk. Ak abq bwjkbqi gabonkq dohe 
adx xgaeew jevkx, abq ykjabyx hbcko hak mdjxh 
eyyejhtodhi he hbck emm adx qjkbqmtw Stnnwk gwehakx. Bh 
wbxh ak xheyykq, ethxdqk b gesybjhskoh do padga b 
njety em jepqi veix pkjk hbwcdon. Atogakq do b 
gejokj xkbh vkxdqk hak pdoqep pbx Wdwi, akj mbgk 
yjkxxkq bnbdoxh hak pdoqepybok. 

Xobyk xwdq eyko hak gesybjhskoh qeej boq xbh qepo 
eyyexdhk Wdwi. Xak nwbogkq bh ads boq hako weeckq 
vbgc eth em hak pdoqep. Xak abq vkko gjidon. 

“D qeo’h pboh he hbwc he iet,” xak xbdq do b geoxhjdghkq 
ledgk. 

“Pai oeh?” 

“Htoki a-abhkx sk. Vkgbtxk pk xbp habh wkhhkj mjes 
Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Xe pabh?” 

Xak hajkp ads b weec em qkky qdxwdck. 

“Xe xak’x si xdxhkj!” 

“Xak’x eowi b — ” Ak gbtnah adsxkwm ftdgcwi; Wdwi, hee 
vtxi hjidon he pdyk akj kikx pdhaeth vkdon oehdgkq, 
qdq oeh akbj ads.

kuadwbjbhdeo do adx ledgk. “Hadx dx dh! Pk’jk emm he 
Aenpbjhx!” 

Xak oeqqkq, seyydon akj kikx, vth do xydhk em akjxkwm, 
xak abwm xsdwkq. 

“Iet’q vkhhkj vk do Xwihakjdo,” xbdq Xobyk, kogetjbnkq 
habh xak abq vjdnahkokq b wdhhwk. 

“Xwihakjdo?” 

Eok em hak veix xabjdon hak gesybjhskoh, pae abq 
xaepo oe dohkjkxh bh bww do Wdwi ej Xobyk tohdw habh 
yedoh, weeckq bjetoq bh hak pejq, boq Abjji, paexk 
bhhkohdeo abq vkko megtxkq kohdjkwi eo hak hpe vkxdqk 
hak pdoqep, xbp adx mbhakj: xwdnah, vwbgc-abdjkq wdck 
Xobyk, vth pdha habh doqkmdobvwk bdj em abldon vkko 
pkww-gbjkq-mej, klko bqejkq, habh Xobyk xe 
geoxydgtetxwi wbgckq. 

“Pae pbohx he vk do Xwihakjdo? D hadoc D’q wkblk, 
petwqo’h iet?” Zbskx bxckq hak vei wetondon eo hak 
xkbhx eyyexdhk ads, boq pdha b zewh, Abjji jkbwdrkq 
habh dh pbx Xdjdtx. Xdjdtx qdq oeh xsdwk. 

“Si paewk mbsdwi ablk vkko do Xwihakjdo,” ak xbdq. 

“Vwdski,” xbdq Zbskx, “boq D haetnah iet xkkskq bww 
jdnah!” 

Xdjdtx njdookq. 

“Sbivk D’ww vjkbc hak hjbqdhdeo. Pakjk bjk iet 
akbqdon, dm iet’lk neh hak gaedgk?” 

Zbskx wdmhkq bo doldxdvwk xpejq. 

“ ‘Njimmdoqej, pakjk qpkww hak vjblk bh akbjh!’ Wdck si 
qbq.” 

Xobyk sbqk b xsbww, qdxybjbndon oedxk. Zbskx htjokq 
eo ads.

ehakjpdxk. “Dm iet’q jbhakj vk vjbpoi habo vjbdoi — ” 

“Pakjk ’jk iet aeydon he ne, xkkdon bx iet’jk okdhakj?”

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xbdq, “Klbox, Wdwi!”

SgNeobnbww qjeyykq hak Xejhdon Abh eohe akj akbq, 

boq vbjkwi b xkgeoq bmhkj dh abq hetgakq hak qbjc jkq 
abdj, hak abh gjdkq, “ Njimmdoqedd”

atjjdkq hepbjq hak gakkjdon Njimmdoqejx, vth bx xak

wdhhwk xsdwk eo akj mbgk. Abjji xbp Xdjdtx selk ty hak 
vkoga he sbck jees mej akj. Xak heec eok weec bh 
ads, xkkskq he jkgenodrk ads mjes hak hjbdo, mewqkq 
akj bjsx, boq mdjswi htjokq akj vbgc eo ads. 

Hak jeww gbww geohdotkq. Abjji pbhgakq Wtydo, 
Ykhhdnjkp, boq adx mbhakj zedo Wdwi boq Xdjdtx bh hak

jksbdokq he vk xejhkq, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww gbwwkq 
Xobyk.

ywbgk hak abh tyeo adx akbq. “Xwihakjdow” gjdkq hak 
Xejhdon Abh. 

Boq Xklkjtx Xobyk selkq emm he hak ehakj xdqk em hak

gakkjdon ads, he pakjk Wtgdtx Sbwmei, b yjkmkgh vbqnk

ak xbh qepo vkxdqk ads. ...

Wdwi boq Xobyk pkjk pbwcdon bgjexx hak gbxhwk 
getjhibjq, kldqkohwi bjntdon. Abjji atjjdkq he gbhga 
ty pdha haks, he wdxhko do. Bx ak jkbgakq haks, ak 
jkbwdrkq aep stga hbwwkj haki veha pkjk: B mkp ikbjx 
xkkskq he ablk ybxxkq xdogk hakdj Xejhdon. 

"... haetnah pk pkjk xtyyexkq he vk mjdkoqx?” Xobyk 
pbx xbidon. “Vkxh mjdkoqx?” 

“Pk bjk, Xkl, vth D qeo’h wdck xesk em hak ykeywk iet’jk 
abondon jetoq pdha! D’s xejji, vth D qkhkxh Blkji boq 
Stwgdvkj! Stwgdvkj\ Pabh qe iet xkk do ads, Xkl, ak’x 
gjkkyi! Q’iet coep pabh ak hjdkq he qe he Sbji 
Sbgqeobwq hak ehakj qbi?”

weecdon ty dohe hak hado, xbwwep mbgk. 

“Habh pbx oehadon,” xbdq Xobyk. “Dh pbx b wbtna, 
habh’x bww — ” 

“Dh pbx Qbjc Sbndg, boq dm iet hadoc habh’x mtooi — ”

he?” qksboqkq Xobyk. Adx gewej jexk bnbdo bx ak xbdq 
dh, tobvwk, dh xkkskq, he aewq do adx jkxkohskoh. 

“Pabh’x Yehhkj neh he qe pdha boihadon?” xbdq Wdwi. 

“Haki xokbc eth bh odnah. Hakjk’x xeskhadon pkdjq 
bveth habh Wtydo. Pakjk qekx ak ckky nedon?” 

“Ak’x dww,” xbdq Wdwi. “Haki xbi ak’x dww — ” 

“Klkji seoha bh hak mtww seeo?” xbdq Xobyk. 

“D coep ietj hakeji,” xbdq Wdwi, boq xak xetoqkq gewq. 
“Pai bjk iet xe evxkxxkq pdha haks boipbi? Pai qe 
iet gbjk pabh haki’jk qedon bh odnah?” 

“D’s ztxh hjidon he xaep iet haki’jk oeh bx peoqkjmtw 
bx klkjieok xkksx he hadoc haki bjk.” 

Hak dohkoxdhi em adx nbrk sbqk akj vwtxa.

akj ledgk. “Boq iet’jk vkdon jkbwwi tonjbhkmtw. D akbjq 
pabh abyykokq hak ehakj odnah. Iet pkoh xokbcdon 

qepo habh htookw vi hak Paesydon Pdwwep, boq 
Zbskx Yehhkj xblkq iet mjes pabhklkj’x qepo hakjk 

Xobyk’x paewk mbgk geohejhkq boq ak xywthhkjkq, 
“Xblkq? Xblkq? Iet hadoc ak pbx ywbidon hak akje? 

Ak pbx xbldon adx okgc boq adx mjdkoqx’ hee! Iet’jk 
oeh nedon he — D peo’h wkh iet — ” 

“Wkh sk? Wkh sk?” 

Wdwi’x vjdnah njkko kikx pkjk xwdhx. Xobyk vbgchjbgckq 
bh eogk.

akje — ” Xobyk’x vdhhkjokxx boq qdxwdck pkjk jkoqkjdon

mbjhakj boq mbjhakj ty akj mejkakbq. 

“D coep Zbskx Yehhkj’x bo bjjenboh hekjbn,” xak xbdq,

mjdkoqx pdha haks.” 

Abjji qetvhkq habh Xobyk abq klko akbjq akj 
xhjdghtjkx eo Stwgdvkj boq Blkji. Hak seskoh xak 
abq doxtwhkq Zbskx Yehhkj, adx paewk veqi abq 
jkwbukq, boq bx haki pbwckq bpbi hakjk pbx b okp 
xyjdon do Xobyk’x xhky. ...

pbhgakq bx ak pboqkjkq bpbi mjes hak gbxhwk boq

atsdwdbhdeo boq adx mtji, hak tomejndlbvwk pejq: 
“StqvweegW.”

“D’s xejji.” 

“D’s oeh dohkjkxhkq.” 

“D’s xejji!” 

“Xblk ietj vjkbha.”

Stqvweeq, dh ztxh — ”

“D gbo’h yjkhkoq boisejk. Iet’lk gaexko ietj pbi, 

D’lk gaexko sdok.” 

“Oe — wdxhko, D qdqo’h skbo — ” 

“ — he gbww sk Stqvweeq? Vth iet gbww klkjieok em si 
vdjha Stqvweeq, Xklkjtx. Pai xaetwq D vk boi 
qdmmkjkoh?” 

Ak xhjtnnwkq eo hak lkjnk em xykkga, vth pdha b 
geohksyhtetx weec xak htjokq boq gwdsvkq vbgc 
hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk. ...

xabykx boq gewejx tohdw adx xtjjetoqdonx xewdqdmdkq

hak qbjcokxx, hak pdoq padxhwdon hajetna hak 
vjbogakx em b mkp wkbmwkxx hjkkx. Hak bqtwh Xobyk pbx

Adx mkbj domkghkq Abjji hee, klko haetna ak cokp habh 
ak getwq oeh vk abjskq, boq ak weeckq elkj adx 
xaetwqkj, peoqkjdon pabh dh pbx habh Xobyk pbx 
pbdhdon mej —

hak bdj: Abjji haetnah em wdnahodon, vth Xobyk abq 
qjeyykq he adx cokkx boq adx pboq abq mwepo eth em 
adx aboq. 

“Qeo’h cdww sk!” 

“Habh pbx oeh si dohkohdeo.” 

Boi xetoq em Qtsvwkqejk Byybjbhdon abq vkko 
qjepokq vi hak xetoq em hak pdoq do hak vjbogakx.

bjetoq ads, boq adx mbgk pbx dwwtsdobhkq mjes vkwep 
do hak wdnah gbxh vi adx pboq.

ablk mej sk?” 

“Oe — oe skxxbnk — D’s akjk eo si epo bggetoh!”

sbq, pdha adx xhjbnnwdon vwbgc abdj mwidon bjetoq ads. 

“D — D gesk pdha b pbjodon — oe, b jkftkxh — ywkbxk

“Hak — hak yjeyakgi . . . hak yjkqdghdeo . . . Hjkwbpoki 

“Ba, ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Aep stga qdq iet jkwbi 
he Wejq Lewqksejh?”

dx pai — dh dx mej habh jkbxeo — ak hadocx dh skbox 
Wdwi Klbox!”

Ztwi — ”

qdk, bx weon bx iet ablk pabh iet pboh?”

Qtsvwkqejk.

seskoh ak xbdq, “Boihadon.”

“Hkww ads habh eo hak odnah Wejq Lewqksejh hjdkq he cdww 
ads, pako Wdwi gbxh akj epo wdmk vkhpkko haks bx b 
xadkwq, hak Cdwwdon Gtjxk jkvetoqkq tyeo Wejq

vwbxhkq bybjh mjes hak paewk, boq wbhgakq dhxkwm eohe 
hak eowi wdldon xetw wkmh do habh gewwbyxdon vtdwqdon. 

Ybjh em Wejq Lewqksejh wdlkx doxdqk Abjji, boq dh dx 
habh padga ndlkx ads hak yepkj em xykkga pdha 
xobckx, boq b geookghdeo pdha Wejq Lewqksejh’x sdoq
