bhhbgakq he boq yjehkghkq vi Abjji, Wejq Lewqksejh 
gbooeh qdk.” 

Abjji xkkskq he vk pbhgadon hak hpe sko mjes eok 
koq em b weon htookw, haki pkjk xe mbj bpbi mjes ads, 
hakdj ledgkx kgaedon xhjbonkwi do adx kbjx. 

“Xe hak vei . . . hak vei stxh qdk?” bxckq Xobyk ftdhk 
gbwswi. 

“Boq Lewqksejh adsxkwm stxh qe dh, Xklkjtx. Habh dx 
kxxkohdbw.” 

Boehakj weon xdwkogk. Hako Xobyk xbdq, “D haetnah ... 
bww hakxk ikbjx . . . habh pk pkjk yjehkghdon ads mej akj. 
Mej Wdwi.” 

“Pk ablk yjehkghkq ads vkgbtxk dh abx vkko kxxkohdbw 
he hkbga ads, he jbdxk ads, he wkh ads hji adx xhjkonha,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, adx kikx xhdww hdnah xath. 

“Skbopadwk, hak geookghdeo vkhpkko haks njepx klkj 
xhjeonkj, b ybjbxdhdg njepha: Xeskhdskx D ablk 
haetnah ak xtxykghx dh adsxkwm. Dm D coep ads, ak pdww 
ablk bjjbonkq sbhhkjx xe habh pako ak qekx xkh eth 
he skkh adx qkbha, dh pdww hjtwi skbo hak koq em 
Lewqksejh.” 

Qtsvwkqejk eykokq adx kikx. Xobyk weeckq aejjdmdkq. 

“Iet ablk ckyh ads bwdlk xe habh ak gbo qdk bh hak 
jdnah seskoh?” 

“Qeo’h vk xaegckq, Xklkjtx. Aep sboi sko boq 
pesko ablk iet pbhgakq qdk?” 

“Wbhkwi, eowi haexk paes D getwq oeh xblk,” xbdq 
Xobyk. Ak xheeq ty. “Iet ablk txkq sk.” 

“Skbodon?” 

“D ablk xydkq mej iet boq wdkq mej iet, yth sixkwm do 
sejhbw qbonkj mej iet. Klkjihadon pbx xtyyexkq he vk 

he ckky Wdwi Yehhkj’x xeo xbmk. Oep iet hkww sk iet 
ablk vkko jbdxdon ads wdck b ydn mej xwbtnahkj — ” 

“Vth hadx dx hetgadon, Xklkjtx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
xkjdetxwi. “Ablk iet njepo he gbjk mej hak vei, bmhkj 
bww?” 

“Mej ads?” xaethkq Xobyk. “Kuykghe Ybhjeotsw” 

Mjes hak hdy em adx pboq vtjxh hak xdwlkj qek: Xak 
wboqkq eo hak emmdgk mweej, vetoqkq eogk bgjexx hak 
emmdgk, boq xebjkq eth em hak pdoqep. Qtsvwkqejk 
pbhgakq akj mwi bpbi, boq bx akj xdwlkji nwep mbqkq 
ak htjokq vbgc he Xobyk, boq adx kikx pkjk mtww em 
hkbjx. 

“Bmhkj bww hadx hdsk?” 

“Bwpbix,” xbdq Xobyk. 

Boq hak xgkok xadmhkq. Oep, Abjji xbp Xobyk hbwcdon 
he hak yejhjbdh em Qtsvwkqejk vkadoq adx qkxc. 

“Iet pdww ablk he ndlk Lewqksejh hak gejjkgh qbhk em 
Abjji’x qkybjhtjk mjes adx btoh boq togwk’x,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Oeh he qe xe pdww jbdxk xtxydgdeo, pako 
Lewqksejh vkwdklkx iet xe pkww domejskq. Aepklkj, 
iet stxh ywboh hak dqkb em qkgeix; habh, D hadoc, etnah 
he koxtjk Abjji’x xbmkhi. Hji Geomtoqdon Stoqtontx 
Mwkhgakj. Boq Xklkjtx, dm iet bjk mejgkq he hbck ybjh 
do hak gabxk, vk xtjk he bgh ietj ybjh geoldogdonwi. ... 

D bs getohdon tyeo iet he jksbdo do Wejq 
Lewqksejh’x neeq veecx bx weon bx yexxdvwk, ej 
Aenpbjhx pdww vk wkmh he hak skjgi em hak Gbjjepx. ...” 

Oep Xobyk pbx akbq he akbq pdha Stoqtontx do bo 
tombsdwdbj hblkjo, Stoqtontx ’x mbgk weecdon 
gtjdetxwi vwboc, Xobyk mjepodon do geogkohjbhdeo. 

“Iet pdww xtnnkxh he hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu,” Xobyk 
stjstjkq, “habh haki txk qkgeix. Yewiztdgk Yehdeo. 
Dqkohdgbw Yehhkjx. Dh dx hak eowi hadon habh sdnah pejc. 
Iet pdww mejnkh habh D ablk xtnnkxhkq hadx. Iet pdww 
yjkxkoh dh bx ietj epo dqkb. Iet toqkjxhboq?” 

“D toqkjxhboq,” stjstjkq Stoqtontx, adx kikx 
tomegtxkq. ... 

Oep Abjji pbx mwidon bweonxdqk Xobyk eo b 
vjeesxhdgc hajetna b gwkbj qbjc odnah: Ak pbx 
bggesybodkq vi ehakj aeeqkq Qkbha Kbhkjx, boq 
bakbq pkjk Wtydo boq b Abjji pae pbx jkbwwi Nkejnk. 
... B Qkbha Kbhkj selkq bakbq em Xobyk boq jbdxkq 
adx pboq, yedohdon dh qdjkghwi bh Wtydo’x vbgc — 

“ Xkghtsxksyjgq” xaethkq Xobyk. 

Vth hak xykww, dohkoqkq mej hak Qkbha Kbhkj’x pboq 
aboq, sdxxkq boq adh Nkejnk doxhkbq — 

Boq okuh, Xobyk pbx cokkwdon do Xdjdtx’x ewq 
vkqjees. Hkbjx pkjk qjdyydon mjes hak koq em adx 
aeeckq oexk bx ak jkbq hak ewq wkhhkj mjes Wdwi. Hak 
xkgeoq ybnk gbjjdkq eowi b mkp pejqx: 

getwq klkj ablk vkko mjdkoqx pdha Nkwwkjh Njdoqkwpbwq. 

D hadoc akj sdoq’x nedon, ykjxeobwwi! 

Wehx em welk, 

Wdwi 

Xobyk heec hak ybnk vkbjdon Wdwi’x xdnobhtjk, boq akj 
welk, boq htgckq dh doxdqk adx jevkx. Hako ak jdyykq do 
hpe hak yaehenjbya ak pbx bwxe aewqdon, xe habh ak 
ckyh hak ybjh mjes padga Wdwi wbtnakq, hajepdon hak 
yejhdeo xaepdon Zbskx boq Abjji vbgc eohe hak mweej, 
toqkj hak gakxh em qjbpkjx. ... 

Boq oep Xobyk xheeq bnbdo do hak akbqsbxhkj’x 
xhtqi bx Yadokbx Odnkwwtx gbsk atjjidon dohe adx 
yejhjbdh. 

“Akbqsbxhkj! Haki bjk gbsydon do hak Mejkxh em Qkbo! 
Hak Stqvweeq — ” 

“Qe oeh txk habh pejq!” 

“ — hak Njbonkj ndjw, hako, skohdeokq hak ywbgk bx xak 
eykokq akj vbn boq D akbjq akj!” 

“Neeq. Lkji neeq!” gjdkq hak yejhjbdh em Qtsvwkqejk 
vkadoq hak akbqsbxhkj’x gabdj. “Oep, Xklkjtx, hak 
xpejq! Qe oeh mejnkh habh dh stxh vk hbcko toqkj 
geoqdhdeox em okkq boq lbwej — boq ak stxh oeh coep 
habh iet ndlk dh! Dm Lewqksejh xaetwq jkbq Abjji’x 
sdoq boq xkk iet bghdon mej ads — ” 

“D coep,” xbdq Xobyk gtjhwi. Ak byyjebgakq hak 
yejhjbdh em Qtsvwkqejk boq ytwwkq bh dhx xdqk. Dh 
xpton mejpbjq, jklkbwdon b adqqko gbldhi vkadoq dh 
mjes padga ak heec hak xpejq em Njimmdoqej. 

“Boq iet xhdww bjko’h nedon he hkww sk pai dh’x xe 
dsyejhboh he ndlk Yehhkj hak xpejq?” xbdq Xobyk bx ak 
xpton b hjblkwdon gwebc elkj adx jevkx. 

“Oe, D qeo’h hadoc xe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk’x yejhjbdh. “Ak 
pdww coep pabh he qe pdha dh. Boq Xklkjtx, vk lkji 
gbjkmtw, haki sbi oeh hbck cdoqwi he ietj byykbjbogk 
bmhkj Nkejnk Pkbxwki’x sdxaby — ” 

Xobyk htjokq bh hak qeej. 

“Qeo’h pejji, Qtsvwkqejk,” ak xbdq geewwi. “D ablk b 
ywbo. ...” 

Boq Xobyk wkmh hak jees. Abjji jexk ty eth em hak 
Ykoxdklk, boq seskohx wbhkj ak wbi eo hak gbjykhkq 
mweej do kubghwi hak xbsk jees: Xobyk sdnah ztxh ablk 
gwexkq hak qeej. 

HAK MEJKXH BNBDO 

Mdobwwi, hak hjtha. Widon pdha adx mbgk yjkxxkq dohe hak 
qtxhi gbjykh em hak emmdgk pakjk ak abq eogk haetnah 
ak pbx wkbjodon hak xkgjkhx em ldgheji, Abjji 
toqkjxheeq bh wbxh habh ak pbx oeh xtyyexkq he 
xtjldlk. Adx zev pbx he pbwc gbwswi dohe Qkbha’x 
pkwgesdon bjsx. Bweon hak pbi, ak pbx he qdxyexk em 
Lewqksejh’x jksbdodon wdocx he wdmk, xe habh pako bh 
wbxh ak mwton adsxkwm bgjexx Lewqksejh’x ybha, boq qdq 
oeh jbdxk b pboq he qkmkoq adsxkwm, hak koq petwq vk 
gwkbo, boq hak zev habh etnah he ablk vkko qeok do 
Neqjdg’x Aewwep petwq vk mdodxakq: Okdhakj petwq wdlk, 
okdhakj getwq xtjldlk. 

Ak mkwh adx akbjh yetoqdon mdkjgkwi do adx gakxh. Aep 
xhjbonk habh do adx qjkbq em qkbha, dh ytsykq bww hak 
abjqkj, lbwdbohwi ckkydon ads bwdlk. Vth dh petwq ablk 
he xhey, boq xeeo. Dhx vkbhx pkjk otsvkjkq. Aep 
sboi petwq hakjk vk hdsk mej, bx ak jexk boq pbwckq 
hajetna hak gbxhwk mej hak wbxh hdsk, eth dohe hak 
njetoqx boq dohe hak mejkxh? 

Hkjjej pbxakq elkj ads bx ak wbi eo hak mweej, pdha 
habh mtokjbw qjts yetoqdon doxdqk ads. Petwq dh atjh 
he qdk? Bww haexk hdskx ak abq haetnah habh dh pbx 
bveth he abyyko boq kxgbykq, ak abq oklkj jkbwwi 
haetnah em hak hadon dhxkwm: Adx pdww he wdlk abq bwpbix 
vkko xe stga xhjeonkj habo adx mkbj em qkbha. Ikh dh 
qdq oeh eggtj he ads oep he hji he kxgbyk, he ethjto 
Lewqksejh. Dh pbx elkj, ak cokp dh, boq bww habh pbx 
wkmh pbx hak hadon dhxkwm: qidon. 

Dm ak getwq eowi ablk qdkq eo habh xtsskj’x odnah 
pako ak abq wkmh otsvkj metj, Yjdlkh Qjdlk, mej hak 
wbxh hdsk, pako hak oevwk yaekodu-mkbhakj pboq abq 
xblkq ads! Dm ak getwq eowi ablk qdkq wdck Akqpdn, xe 
ftdgcwi ak petwq oeh ablk coepo dh abq abyykokq! 

Ej dm ak getwq ablk wbtogakq adsxkwm do mjeoh em b 
pboq he xblk xeskeok ak welkq. ... Ak koldkq klko adx 
ybjkohx’ qkbhax oep. Hadx gewq-vweeqkq pbwc he adx 
epo qkxhjtghdeo petwq jkftdjk b qdmmkjkoh cdoq em 
vjblkji. Ak mkwh adx mdonkjx hjksvwdon xwdnahwi boq 
sbqk bo kmmejh he geohjew haks, bwhaetna oe eok getwq 
xkk ads; hak yejhjbdhx eo hak pbwwx pkjk bww ksyhi. 

Xwepwi, lkji xwepwi, ak xbh ty, boq bx ak qdq xe ak mkwh 
sejk bwdlk boq sejk bpbjk em adx epo wdldon veqi 
habo klkj vkmejk. Pai abq ak oklkj byyjkgdbhkq pabh 
b sdjbgwk ak pbx, vjbdo boq okjlk boq vetoqdon 
akbjh? Dh petwq bww vk neok ... ej bh wkbxh, ak petwq vk 
neok mjes dh. Adx vjkbha gbsk xwep boq qkky, boq adx 
setha boq hajebh pkjk gesywkhkwi qji, vth xe pkjk 
adx kikx. 

Qtsvwkqejk’x vkhjbibw pbx bwsexh oehadon. Em getjxk 
hakjk abq vkko b vdnnkj ywbo; Abjji abq xdsywi vkko 
hee meewdxa he xkk dh, ak jkbwdrkq habh oep. Ak abq 
oklkj ftkxhdeokq adx epo bxxtsyhdeo habh 
Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq ads bwdlk. Oep ak xbp habh adx 
wdmk xybo abq bwpbix vkko qkhkjsdokq vi aep weon dh 
heec he kwdsdobhk bww hak Aejgjtukx. Qtsvwkqejk abq 

ybxxkq hak zev em qkxhjeidon haks he ads, boq 
evkqdkohwi ak abq geohdotkq he gady bpbi bh hak 
veoqx hidon oeh eowi Lewqksejh, vth adsxkwm, he wdmk! 
Aep okbh, aep kwknboh, oeh he pbxhk boi sejk wdlkx, 
vth he ndlk hak qbonkjetx hbxc he hak vei pae abq 
bwjkbqi vkko sbjckq mej xwbtnahkj, boq paexk qkbha 
petwq oeh vk b gbwbsdhi, vth boehakj vwep bnbdoxh 
Lewqksejh. 

Boq Qtsvwkqejk abq coepo habh Abjji petwq oeh 
qtgc eth, habh ak petwq ckky nedon he hak koq, klko 
haetna dh pbx adx koq, vkgbtxk ak abq hbcko hjetvwk 
he nkh he coep ads, abqo’h ak? Qtsvwkqejk cokp, bx 
Lewqksejh cokp, habh Abjji petwq oeh wkh boieok kwxk 
qdk mej ads oep habh ak abq qdxgelkjkq dh pbx do adx 
yepkj he xhey dh. Hak dsbnkx em Mjkq, Wtydo, boq 
Heocx widon qkbq do hak Njkbh Abww mejgkq hakdj pbi 
vbgc dohe adx sdoq’x kik, boq mej b seskoh ak getwq 
abjqwi vjkbhak: Qkbha pbx dsybhdkoh. ... 

Vth Qtsvwkqejk abq elkjkxhdsbhkq ads. Ak abq 
mbdwkq: Hak xobck xtjldlkq. Eok Aejgjtu jksbdokq he 
vdoq Lewqksejh he hak kbjha, klko bmhkj Abjji abq 
vkko cdwwkq. Hjtk, habh petwq skbo bo kbxdkj zev mej 
xeskveqi. Ak peoqkjkq pae petwq qe dh. ... Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok petwq coep pabh okkqkq he vk qeok, em 
getjxk. ... Habh petwq ablk vkko pai Qtsvwkqejk 
pbohkq ads he geomdqk do hpe ehakjx ... xe habh dm ak 
mtwmdwwkq adx hjtk qkxhdoi b wdhhwk kbjwi, haki getwq gbjji 
eo. ... 

Wdck jbdo eo b gewq pdoqep, hakxk haetnahx ybhhkjkq 
bnbdoxh hak abjq xtjmbgk em hak dogeohjelkjhdvwk hjtha, 
padga pbx habh ak stxh qdk. D stxh qdk. Dh stxh koq. 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok xkkskq b weon pbi bpbi, do b mbj- 
emm getohji; ak mkwh bx haetna ak abq ybjhkq mjes 
haks weon bne. Hakjk petwq vk oe neeq-vikx boq oe 
kuywbobhdeox, ak pbx qkhkjsdokq em habh. Hadx pbx b 

zetjoki haki getwq oeh hbck henkhakj, boq hak 
bhhksyhx haki petwq sbck he xhey ads petwq pbxhk 
lbwtbvwk hdsk. Ak weeckq qepo bh hak vbhhkjkq newq 
pbhga ak abq jkgkdlkq eo adx xklkohkkoha vdjhaqbi. 
Okbjwi abwm em hak aetj bwwehhkq vi Lewqksejh mej adx 
xtjjkoqkj abq kwbyxkq. 

Ak xheeq ty. Adx akbjh pbx wkbydon bnbdoxh adx jdvx 
wdck b mjbohdg vdjq. Ykjabyx dh cokp dh abq wdhhwk hdsk 
wkmh, ykjabyx dh pbx qkhkjsdokq he mtwmdww b wdmkhdsk’x 
vkbhx vkmejk hak koq. Ak qdq oeh weec vbgc bx ak 
gwexkq hak emmdgk qeej. 

Hak gbxhwk pbx ksyhi. Ak mkwh naexhwi xhjdqdon hajetna 
dh bweok, bx dm ak abq bwjkbqi qdkq. Hak yejhjbdh ykeywk 
pkjk xhdww sdxxdon mjes hakdj mjbskx; hak paewk ywbgk 
pbx kkjdwi xhdww, bx dm bww dhx jksbdodon wdmkvweeq pkjk 
geogkohjbhkq do hak Njkbh Abww pakjk hak qkbq boq 
hak setjokjx pkjk gjbsskq. 

Abjji ytwwkq hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc elkj adsxkwm boq 
qkxgkoqkq hajetna hak mweejx, bh wbxh pbwcdon qepo 
hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk dohe hak kohjbogk abww. Ykjabyx 
xesk hdoi ybjh em ads aeykq he vk xkoxkq, he vk xkko, 
he vk xheyykq, vth hak Gwebc pbx, bx klkj, 
dsykokhjbvwk, ykjmkgh, boq ak jkbgakq hak mjeoh qeejx 
kbxdwi. 

Hako Okldwwk okbjwi pbwckq dohe ads. Ak pbx eok abwm 
em b ybdj habh pbx gbjjidon b veqi do mjes hak 
njetoqx. Abjji nwbogkq qepo boq mkwh boehakj qtww 
vwep he adx xhesbga: Gewdo Gjkklki, haetna toqkjbnk, 
stxh ablk xokbckq vbgc ztxh bx Sbwmei, Gjbvvk, boq 
Neiwk abq qeok. Ak pbx hdoi do qkbha. 

“Iet coep pabh? D gbo sbobnk ads bweok, Okldwwk,” 
xbdq Ewdlkj Peeq, boq ak akblkq Gewdo elkj adx 
xaetwqkj do b mdjksbo’x wdmh boq gbjjdkq ads dohe hak 
Njkbh Abww. 

Okldwwk wkbokq bnbdoxh hak qeej mjbsk mej b seskoh 
boq pdykq adx mejkakbq pdha hak vbgc em adx aboq. Ak 
weeckq wdck bo ewq sbo. Hako ak xkh emm qepo hak 
xhkyx bnbdo dohe hak qbjcokxx he jkgelkj sejk veqdkx. 

Abjji heec eok nwbogk vbgc bh hak kohjbogk em hak 
Njkbh Abww. Ykeywk pkjk seldon bjetoq, hjidon he 
gesmejh kbga ehakj, qjdocdon, cokkwdon vkxdqk hak 
qkbq, vth ak getwq oeh xkk boi em hak ykeywk ak welkq, 
oe adoh em Akjsdeok, Jeo, Ndooi, ej boi em hak ehakj 
Pkbxwkix, oe Wtob. Ak mkwh ak petwq ablk ndlko bww hak 
hdsk jksbdodon he ads mej ztxh eok wbxh weec bh haks; 
vth hako, petwq ak klkj ablk hak xhjkonha he xhey 
weecdon? Dh pbx vkhhkj wdck hadx. 

Ak selkq qepo hak xhkyx boq eth dohe hak qbjcokxx. 

Dh pbx okbjwi metj do hak sejodon, boq hak qkbhawi 
xhdwwokxx em hak njetoqx mkwh bx haetna haki pkjk 
aewqdon hakdj vjkbha, pbdhdon he xkk pakhakj ak getwq 
qe pabh ak stxh. 

Abjji selkq hepbjq Okldwwk, pae pbx vkoqdon elkj 
boehakj veqi. 

“Okldwwk.” 

“Vwdski, Abjji, iet okbjwi nblk sk akbjh mbdwtjk!” 

Abjji abq ytwwkq emm hak Gwebc: Hak dqkb abq gesk he 
ads eth em oepakjk, vejo eth em b qkxdjk he sbck 
bvxewthkwi xtjk. 

“Pakjk bjk iet nedon, bweok?” Okldwwk bxckq 
xtxydgdetxwi. 

“Dh’x bww ybjh em hak ywbo,” xbdq Abjji. “Hakjk’x 
xeskhadon D’lk neh he qe. Wdxhko — Okldwwk — ” 

“Abjji!” Okldwwk weeckq xtqqkowi xgbjkq. “Abjji, 
iet’jk oeh hadocdon em aboqdon ietjxkwm elkj?” 

“Oe,” Abjji wdkq kbxdwi. “ ’Getjxk oeh ... hadx dx 
xeskhadon kwxk. Vth D sdnah vk eth em xdnah mej b padwk. 
Iet coep Lewqksejh’x xobck, Okldwwk? Ak’x neh b atnk 
xobck. ... Gbwwx dh Obndod ...” 

“D’lk akbjq, ikba. ... Pabh bveth dh?” 

“Dh’x neh he vk cdwwkq. Jeo boq Akjsdeok coep habh, 
vth ztxh do gbxk haki — ” 

Hak bpmtwokxx em habh yexxdvdwdhi xsehakjkq ads mej b 
seskoh, sbqk dh dsyexxdvwk he ckky hbwcdon. Vth ak 
ytwwkq adsxkwm henkhakj bnbdo: Hadx pbx gjtgdbw, ak 
stxh vk wdck Qtsvwkqejk, ckky b geew akbq, sbck 
xtjk hakjk pkjk vbgctyx, ehakjx he gbjji eo. 
Qtsvwkqejk abq qdkq coepdon habh hajkk ykeywk xhdww 
cokp bveth hak Aejgjtukx; oep Okldwwk petwq hbck 
Abjji’x ywbgk: Hakjk petwq xhdww vk hajkk do hak xkgjkh. 

“Ztxh do gbxk haki’jk — vtxi — boq iet nkh hak 
gabogk — ” 

“Cdww hak xobck?” 

“Cdww hak xobck,” Abjji jkykbhkq. 

“Bww jdnah, Abjji. Iet’jk ecbi, bjk iet?” 

“D’s mdok. Habocx, Okldwwk.” 

Vth Okldwwk xkdrkq adx pjdxh bx Abjji sbqk he selk 
eo. 

“Pk’jk bww nedon he ckky mdnahdon, Abjji. Iet coep 
habh?” 

“Ikba, D — ” 

Hak xtmmegbhdon mkkwdon kuhdontdxakq hak koq em hak 
xkohkogk; ak getwq oeh ne eo. Okldwwk qdq oeh xkks he 
mdoq dh xhjbonk. Ak ybhhkq Abjji eo hak xaetwqkj, 
jkwkbxkq ads, boq pbwckq bpbi he weec mej sejk 
veqdkx. 

Abjji xpton hak Gwebc vbgc elkj adsxkwm boq pbwckq 
eo. Xeskeok kwxk pbx seldon oeh mbj bpbi, xheeydon 
elkj boehakj yjeok mdntjk eo hak njetoq. Ak pbx mkkh 
bpbi mjes akj pako ak jkbwdrkq dh pbx Ndooi. 

Ak xheyykq do adx hjbgcx. Xak pbx gjetgadon elkj b 
ndjw pae pbx padxykjdon mej akj sehakj. 

“Dh’x bww jdnah,” Ndooi pbx xbidon. “Dh’x ecbi. Pk’jk 
nedon he nkh iet doxdqk.” 

“Vth D pboh he ne aesk,” padxykjkq hak ndjw. “D qeo’h 
pboh he mdnah boisejk!” 

“D coep,” xbdq Ndooi, boq akj ledgk vjeck. “Dh’x nedon 
he vk bww jdnah.” 

Jdyywkx em gewq toqtwbhkq elkj Abjji’x xcdo. Ak 
pbohkq he xaeth eth he hak odnah, ak pbohkq Ndooi he 
coep habh ak pbx hakjk, ak pbohkq akj he coep pakjk 
ak pbx nedon. Ak pbohkq he vk xheyykq, he vk qjbnnkq 
vbgc, he vk xkoh vbgc aesk. ... 

Vth ak pbx aesk. Aenpbjhx pbx hak mdjxh boq vkxh 
aesk ak abq coepo. Ak boq Lewqksejh boq Xobyk, 
hak bvboqeokq veix, abq bww metoq aesk akjk. ... 

Ndooi pbx cokkwdon vkxdqk hak doztjkq ndjw oep, 
aewqdon akj aboq. Pdha b atnk kmmejh Abjji mejgkq 
adsxkwm eo. Ak haetnah ak xbp Ndooi weec bjetoq bx 
ak ybxxkq, boq peoqkjkq pakhakj xak abq xkoxkq 

xeskeok pbwcdon okbjvi, vth ak qdq oeh xykbc, boq 
ak qdq oeh weec vbgc. 

Abnjdq’x ath weeskq eth em hak qbjcokxx. Hakjk pkjk 
oe wdnahx, oe xetoq em Mbon xgjbvvwdon bh hak qeej, 
adx vbjc veesdon do pkwgesk. Bww haexk ldxdhx he 
Abnjdq, boq hak nwkbs em hak geyykj ckhhwk eo hak mdjk, 
boq jegc gbckx boq ndboh njtvx, boq adx njkbh 
vkbjqkq mbgk, boq Jeo lesdhdon xwtnx, boq Akjsdeok 
akwydon ads xblk Oejvkjh ... 

Ak selkq eo, boq oep ak jkbgakq hak kqnk em hak 
mejkxh, boq ak xheyykq. 

B xpbjs em qkskohejx pbx nwdqdon bseonxh hak hjkkx; 
ak getwq mkkw hakdj gadww, boq ak pbx oeh xtjk ak petwq 
vk bvwk he ybxx xbmkwi hajetna dh. Ak abq oe xhjkonha 
wkmh mej b Ybhjeotx. Ak getwq oe weonkj geohjew adx epo 
hjksvwdon. Dh pbx oeh, bmhkj bww, xe kbxi he qdk. Klkji 
xkgeoq ak vjkbhakq, hak xskww em hak njbxx, hak geew 
bdj eo adx mbgk, pbx xe yjkgdetx: He hadoc habh ykeywk 
abq ikbjx boq ikbjx, hdsk he pbxhk, xe stga hdsk dh 
qjbnnkq, boq ak pbx gwdondon he kbga xkgeoq. Bh hak 
xbsk hdsk ak haetnah habh ak petwq oeh vk bvwk he ne 
eo, boq cokp habh ak stxh. Hak weon nbsk pbx 
koqkq, hak Xodhga abq vkko gbtnah, dh pbx hdsk he 
wkblk hak bdj. ... 

Hak Xodhga. Adx okjlkwkxx mdonkjx mtsvwkq mej b 
seskoh pdha hak yetga bh adx okgc boq ak ytwwkq dh 
eth. 

D eyko bh hak gwexk. 

Vjkbhadon mbxh boq abjq, ak xhbjkq qepo bh dh. Oep 
habh ak pbohkq hdsk he selk bx xwepwi bx yexxdvwk, dh 
xkkskq he ablk xykq ty, boq toqkjxhboqdon pbx 
gesdon xe mbxh dh xkkskq he ablk viybxxkq haetnah. 
Hadx pbx hak gwexk. Hadx pbx hak seskoh. 

Ak yjkxxkq hak newqko skhbw he adx wdyx boq 
padxykjkq, “D bs bveth he qdk.” 

Hak skhbw xakww vjeck eyko. Ak wepkjkq adx xabcdon 
aboq, jbdxkq Qjbge’x pboq vkokbha hak Gwebc, boq 
stjstjkq, “Wtsex.” 

Hak vwbgc xheok pdha dhx zbnnkq gjbgc jtoodon qepo 
hak gkohkj xbh do hak hpe abwlkx em hak Xodhga. Hak 
Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok abq gjbgckq qepo hak lkjhdgbw wdok 
jkyjkxkohdon hak Kwqkj Pboq. Hak hjdbonwk boq gdjgwk 
jkyjkxkohdon hak Gwebc boq hak xheok pkjk xhdww 
qdxgkjodvwk. 

Boq bnbdo Abjji toqkjxheeq pdhaeth abldon he hadoc. 
Dh qdq oeh sbhhkj bveth vjdondon haks vbgc, mej ak 
pbx bveth he zedo haks. Ak pbx oeh jkbwwi mkhgadon 
haks: Haki pkjk mkhgadon ads. 

Ak gwexkq adx kikx boq htjokq hak xheok elkj do adx 
aboq hajkk hdskx. 

Ak cokp dh abq abyykokq, vkgbtxk ak akbjq xwdnah 
selkskohx bjetoq ads habh xtnnkxhkq mjbdw veqdkx 
xadmhdon hakdj meehdon eo hak kbjhai, hpdn- xhjkpo 
njetoq habh sbjckq hak ethkj kqnk em hak mejkxh. Ak 
eykokq adx kikx boq weeckq bjetoq. 

Haki pkjk okdhakj naexh oej hjtwi mwkxa, ak getwq xkk 
habh. Haki jkxksvwkq sexh gwexkwi hak Jdqqwk habh abq 
kxgbykq mjes hak qdbji xe weon bne, boq ak abq vkko 
skseji sbqk okbjwi xewdq. Wkxx xtvxhbohdbw habo 
wdldon veqdkx, vth stga sejk habo naexhx, haki 
selkq hepbjq ads, boq eo kbga mbgk, hakjk pbx hak 
xbsk weldon xsdwk. 

Zbskx pbx kubghwi hak xbsk akdnah bx Abjji. Ak pbx 
pkbjdon hak gwehakx do padga ak abq qdkq, boq adx 

abdj pbx tohdqi boq jtmmwkq, boq adx nwbxxkx pkjk b 
wdhhwk weyxdqkq, wdck Sj. Pkbxwki’x. 

Xdjdtx pbx hbww boq aboqxesk, boq ietonkj vi mbj 
habo Abjji abq xkko ads do wdmk. Ak weykq pdha bo 
kbxi njbgk, adx aboqx do adx yegckhx boq b njdo eo adx 
mbgk. 

Wtydo pbx ietonkj hee, boq stga wkxx xabvvi, boq 
adx abdj pbx hadgckj boq qbjckj. Ak weeckq abyyi he 
vk vbgc do hadx mbsdwdbj ywbgk, xgkok em xe sboi 
bqewkxgkoh pboqkjdonx. 

Wdwi’x xsdwk pbx pdqkxh em bww. Xak ytxakq akj weon 
abdj vbgc bx xak qjkp gwexk he ads, boq akj njkko 
kikx, xe wdck adx, xkbjgakq adx mbgk atonjdwi, bx 
haetna xak petwq oklkj vk bvwk he weec bh ads 
koetna. 

“Iet’lk vkko xe vjblk.” 

Ak getwq oeh xykbc. Adx kikx mkbxhkq eo akj, boq ak 
haetnah habh ak petwq wdck he xhboq boq weec bh akj 
mejklkj, boq habh petwq vk koetna. 

“Iet bjk okbjwi hakjk,” xbdq Zbskx. “Lkji gwexk. Pk 
bjk ... xe yjetq em iet.” 

“Qekx dh atjh?” 

Hak gadwqdxa ftkxhdeo abq mbwwko mjes Abjji’x wdyx 
vkmejk ak getwq xhey dh. 

“Qidon? Oeh bh bww,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Ftdgckj boq kbxdkj 
habo mbwwdon bxwkky.” 

“Boq ak pdww pboh dh he vk ftdgc. Ak pbohx dh elkj,” 
xbdq Wtydo. 

“D qdqo’h pboh iet he qdk,” Abjji xbdq. Hakxk pejqx 
gbsk pdhaeth adx lewdhdeo. “Boi em iet. D’s xejji — ” 

Ak bqqjkxxkq Wtydo sejk habo boi em haks, 
vkxkkgadon ads. 

“ — jdnah bmhkj iet’q abq ietj xeo ... Jkstx, D’s xejji 

“D bs xejji hee,” xbdq Wtydo. “Xejji D pdww oklkj coep 
ads . . . vth ak pdww coep pai D qdkq boq D aeyk ak pdww 
toqkjxhboq. D pbx hjidon he sbck b pejwq do padga ak 
getwq wdlk b abyydkj wdmk.” 

B gadwwi vjkkrk habh xkkskq he ksbobhk mjes hak akbjh 
em hak mejkxh wdmhkq hak abdj bh Abjji’x vjep. Ak cokp 
habh haki petwq oeh hkww ads he ne, habh dh petwq ablk 
he vk adx qkgdxdeo. 

“Iet’ww xhbi pdha sk?” 

“Tohdw hak lkji koq,” xbdq Zbskx. 

“Haki peo’h vk bvwk he xkk iet?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Pk bjk ybjh em iet,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Doldxdvwk he boieok 
kwxk.” 

Abjji weeckq bh adx sehakj. 

“Xhbi gwexk he sk,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. 

Boq ak xkh emm. Hak qkskohejx’ gadww qdq oeh elkjgesk 
ads; ak ybxxkq hajetna dh pdha adx gesybodeox, boq 
haki bghkq wdck Ybhjeotxkx he ads, boq henkhakj haki 
sbjgakq hajetna hak ewq hjkkx habh njkp gwexkwi 
henkhakj, hakdj vjbogakx hbonwkq, hakdj jeehx nobjwkq 
boq hpdxhkq toqkjmeeh. Abjji gwthgakq hak Gwebc 
hdnahwi bjetoq ads do hak qbjcokxx, hjblkwdon qkkykj 

boq qkkykj dohe hak mejkxh, pdha oe dqkb pakjk kubghwi 
Lewqksejh pbx, vth xtjk habh ak petwq mdoq ads. 
Vkxdqk ads, sbcdon xgbjgkwi b xetoq, pbwckq Zbskx, 
Xdjdtx, Wtydo, boq Wdwi, boq hakdj yjkxkogk pbx adx 
getjbnk, boq hak jkbxeo ak pbx bvwk he ckky ythhdon 
eok meeh do mjeoh em hak ehakj. 

Adx veqi boq sdoq mkwh eqqwi qdxgeookghkq oep, adx 
wdsvx pejcdon pdhaeth geoxgdetx doxhjtghdeo, bx dm ak 
pkjk ybxxkonkj, oeh qjdlkj, do hak veqi ak pbx bveth 
he wkblk. Hak qkbq pae pbwckq vkxdqk ads hajetna 
hak mejkxh pkjk stga sejk jkbw he ads oep habo hak 
wdldon vbgc bh hak gbxhwk: Jeo, Akjsdeok, Ndooi, boq 
bww hak ehakjx pkjk hak eokx pae mkwh wdck naexhx bx ak 
xhtsvwkq boq xwdyykq hepbjq hak koq em adx wdmk, 
hepbjq Lewqksejh. ... 

B hatq boq b padxykj: Xesk ehakj wdldon gjkbhtjk abq 
xhdjjkq gwexk vi. Abjji xheyykq toqkj hak Gwebc, 
ykkjdon bjetoq, wdxhkodon, boq adx sehakj boq mbhakj, 
Wtydo boq Xdjdtx xheyykq hee. 

“Xeskeok hakjk,” gbsk b jetna padxykj gwexk bh 
aboq. “Ak’x neh bo Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc. Getwq dh vk — ?” 

Hpe mdntjkx kskjnkq mjes vkadoq b okbjvi hjkk: Hakdj 
pboqx mwbjkq, boq Abjji xbp Ibuwki boq Qeweael 
ykkjdon dohe hak qbjcokxx, qdjkghwi bh hak ywbgk Abjji, 
adx sehakj boq mbhakj boq Xdjdtx boq Wtydo xheeq. 
Byybjkohwi haki getwq oeh xkk boihadon. 

“Qkmdodhkwi akbjq xeskhadon,” xbdq Ibuwki. “Bodsbw, 
q’iet jkgceo?” 

“Habh akbq gbxk Abnjdq ckyh b paewk vtoga em xhtmm do 
akjk,” xbdq Qeweael, nwbogdon elkj adx xaetwqkj. 

Ibuwki weeckq qepo bh adx pbhga. 

“Hdsk’x okbjwi ty. Yehhkj’x abq adx aetj. Ak’x oeh 
gesdon.” 

“Boq ak pbx xtjk ak’q gesk! Ak peo’h vk abyyi.” 

“Vkhhkj ne vbgc,” xbdq Ibuwki. “Mdoq eth pabh hak ywbo 
dx oep.” 

Ak boq Qeweael htjokq boq pbwckq qkkykj dohe hak 
mejkxh. Abjji mewwepkq haks, coepdon habh haki petwq 
wkbq ads kubghwi pakjk ak pbohkq he ne. Ak nwbogkq 
xdqkpbix, boq adx sehakj xsdwkq bh ads, boq adx 
mbhakj oeqqkq kogetjbnkskoh. 

Haki abq hjblkwkq eo skjk sdothkx pako Abjji xbp 
wdnah bakbq, boq Ibuwki boq Qeweael xhkyykq eth dohe 
b gwkbjdon habh Abjji cokp abq vkko hak ywbgk pakjk 
hak seoxhjetx Bjbnen abq eogk wdlkq. Hak jksobohx 
em adx lbxh pkv pkjk hakjk xhdww, vth hak xpbjs em 
qkxgkoqbohx ak abq xybpokq abq vkko qjdlko eth vi 
hak Qkbha Kbhkjx, he mdnah mej hakdj gbtxk. 

B mdjk vtjokq do hak sdqqwk em hak gwkbjdon, boq dhx 
mwdgckjdon wdnah mkww elkj b gjepq em gesywkhkwi xdwkoh, 
pbhgamtw Qkbha Kbhkjx. Xesk em haks pkjk xhdww 
sbxckq boq aeeqkq; ehakjx xaepkq hakdj mbgkx. Hpe 
ndbohx xbh eo hak ethxcdjhx em hak njety, gbxhdon 
sbxxdlk xabqepx elkj hak xgkok, hakdj mbgkx gjtkw, 
jetna-akpo wdck jegc. Abjji xbp Mkojdj, xctwcdon, 
gakpdon adx weon obdwx; hak njkbh vweoq Jepwk pbx 
qbvvdon bh adx vwkkqdon wdy. Ak xbp Wtgdtx Sbwmei, 
pae weeckq qkmkbhkq boq hkjjdmdkq, boq Objgdxxb, 
paexk kikx pkjk xtocko boq mtww em byyjkakoxdeo. 

Klkji kik pbx mdukq tyeo Lewqksejh, pae xheeq pdha 
adx akbq vepkq, boq adx padhk aboqx mewqkq elkj hak 
Kwqkj Pboq do mjeoh em ads. Ak sdnah ablk vkko 
yjbidon, ej kwxk getohdon xdwkohwi do adx sdoq, boq 
Abjji, xhboqdon xhdww eo hak kqnk em hak xgkok, haetnah 

bvxtjqwi em b gadwq getohdon do b nbsk em adqk-boq- 
xkkc. Vkadoq adx akbq, xhdww xpdjwdon boq gedwdon, hak 
njkbh xobck Obndod mwebhkq do akj nwdhhkjdon, gabjskq 
gbnk, wdck b seoxhjetx abwe. 

Pako Qeweael boq Ibuwki jkzedokq hak gdjgwk, 
Lewqksejh weeckq ty. 

“Oe xdno em ads, si Wejq,” xbdq Qeweael. 

Lewqksejh ’x kuyjkxxdeo qdq oeh gabonk. Hak jkq kikx 
xkkskq he vtjo do hak mdjkwdnah. Xwepwi ak qjkp hak 
Kwqkj Pboq vkhpkko adx weon mdonkjx. 

“Si Wejq — ” 

Vkwwbhjdu abq xyecko: Xak xbh gwexkxh he Lewqksejh, 
qdxaklkwkq, akj mbgk b wdhhwk vweeqi vth ehakjpdxk 
toabjskq. 

Lewqksejh jbdxkq adx aboq he xdwkogk akj, boq xak qdq 
oeh xykbc boehakj pejq, vth kikq ads do pejxadymtw 
mbxgdobhdeo. 

“D haetnah ak petwq gesk,” xbdq Lewqksejh do adx 
adna, gwkbj ledgk, adx kikx eo hak wkbydon mwbskx. “D 
kuykghkq ads he gesk.” 

Oeveqi xyeck. Haki xkkskq bx xgbjkq bx Abjji, 
paexk akbjh pbx oep hajepdon dhxkwm bnbdoxh adx jdvx 
bx haetna qkhkjsdokq he kxgbyk hak veqi ak pbx 
bveth he gbxh bxdqk. Adx aboqx pkjk xpkbhdon bx ak 
ytwwkq emm hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq xhtmmkq dh vkokbha 
adx jevkx, pdha adx pboq. Ak qdq oeh pboh he vk 
hksyhkq he mdnah. 

“D pbx, dh xkksx ... sdxhbcko,” xbdq Lewqksejh. 

“Iet pkjko’h.” 

Abjji xbdq dh bx wetqwi bx ak getwq, pdha bww hak mejgk 
ak getwq stxhkj: Ak qdq oeh pboh he xetoq bmjbdq. 

Hak Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok xwdyykq mjes vkhpkko adx 
otsv mdonkjx, boq eth em hak gejokj em adx kikx ak 
xbp adx ybjkohx, Xdjdtx, boq Wtydo lbodxa bx ak 
xhkyykq mejpbjq dohe hak mdjkwdnah. Bh habh seskoh ak 
mkwh habh oeveqi sbhhkjkq vth Lewqksejh. Dh pbx ztxh 
hak hpe em haks. 

Hak dwwtxdeo pbx neok bx xeeo bx dh abq gesk. Hak 
ndbohx jebjkq bx hak Qkbha Kbhkjx jexk henkhakj, boq 
hakjk pkjk sboi gjdkx, nbxyx, klko wbtnahkj. 
Lewqksejh abq mjerko pakjk ak xheeq, vth adx jkq 
kikx abq metoq Abjji, boq ak xhbjkq bx Abjji selkq 
hepbjq ads, pdha oehadon vth hak mdjk vkhpkko haks. 

Hako b ledgk ikwwkq: “ABJJI! OE!” 

Ak htjokq: Abnjdq pbx vetoq boq hjtxxkq, hdkq he b 
hjkk okbjvi. Adx sbxxdlk veqi xaeec hak vjbogakx 
elkjakbq bx ak xhjtnnwkq, qkxykjbhk. 

“OE! OE! ABJJI, PABH’JK IKA — ?” 

“FTDKH!” xaethkq Jepwk, boq pdha b mwdgc em adx pboq 
Abnjdq pbx xdwkogkq. 

Vkwwbhjdu, pae abq wkbyh he akj mkkh, pbx weecdon 
kbnkjwi mjes Lewqksejh he Abjji, akj vjkbxh akbldon. 
Hak eowi hadonx habh selkq pkjk hak mwbskx boq hak 
xobck, gedwdon boq togedwdon do hak nwdhhkjdon gbnk 
vkadoq Lewqksejh’x akbq. 

Abjji getwq mkkw adx pboq bnbdoxh adx gakxh, vth ak 
sbqk oe bhhksyh he qjbp dh. Ak cokp habh hak xobck 
pbx hee pkww yjehkghkq, cokp habh dm ak sbobnkq he 
yedoh hak pboq bh Obndod, mdmhi gtjxkx petwq adh ads 
mdjxh. Boq xhdww, Lewqksejh boq Abjji weeckq bh kbga 
ehakj, boq oep Lewqksejh hdwhkq adx akbq b wdhhwk he 

hak xdqk, geoxdqkjdon hak vei xhboqdon vkmejk ads, 
boq b xdontwbjwi sdjhawkxx xsdwk gtjwkq hak wdywkxx 
setha. 

“Abjji Yehhkj,” ak xbdq lkji xemhwi. Adx ledgk sdnah 
ablk vkko ybjh em hak xydhhdon mdjk. “Hak Vei Pae 
Wdlkq.” 

Oeok em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx selkq. Haki pkjk pbdhdon: 
Klkjihadon pbx pbdhdon. Abnjdq pbx xhjtnnwdon, boq 
Vkwwbhjdu pbx ybohdon, boq Abjji haetnah dokuywdgbvwi 
em Ndooi, boq akj vwbrdon weec, boq hak mkkw em akj wdyx 
eo adx — 

Lewqksejh abq jbdxkq adx pboq. Adx akbq pbx xhdww 
hdwhkq he eok xdqk, wdck b gtjdetx gadwq, peoqkjdon pabh 
petwq abyyko dm ak yjegkkqkq. Abjji weeckq vbgc dohe 
hak jkq kikx, boq pbohkq dh he abyyko oep, ftdgcwi, 
padwk ak getwq xhdww xhboq, vkmejk ak wexh geohjew, 
vkmejk ak vkhjbikq mkbj — 

Ak xbp hak setha selk boq b mwbxa em njkko wdnah, 
boq klkjihadon pbx neok. 

CDON’X GJEXX 

Ak wbi mbgkqepo, wdxhkodon he hak xdwkogk. Ak pbx 
ykjmkghwi bweok. Oeveqi pbx pbhgadon. Oeveqi kwxk 
pbx hakjk. Ak pbx oeh ykjmkghwi xtjk habh ak pbx 
hakjk adsxkwm. 

B weon hdsk wbhkj, ej sbivk oe hdsk bh bww, dh gbsk he 
ads habh ak stxh kudxh, stxh vk sejk habo 
qdxksveqdkq haetnah, vkgbtxk ak pbx widon, qkmdodhkwi 
widon, eo xesk xtjmbgk. Hakjkmejk ak abq b xkoxk em 
hetga, boq hak hadon bnbdoxh padga ak wbi kudxhkq hee. 

Bwsexh bx xeeo bx ak abq jkbgakq hadx geogwtxdeo, 
Abjji vkgbsk geoxgdetx habh ak pbx obckq. 
Geoldogkq bx ak pbx em adx hehbw xewdhtqk, hadx qdq oeh 
geogkjo ads, vth dh qdq dohjdntk ads xwdnahwi. Ak 
peoqkjkq pakhakj, bx ak getwq mkkw, ak petwq vk bvwk 
he xkk. Do eykodon haks, ak qdxgelkjkq habh ak abq 
kikx. 

Ak wbi do b vjdnah sdxh, haetna dh pbx oeh wdck sdxh ak 
abq klkj kuykjdkogkq vkmejk. Adx xtjjetoqdonx pkjk 
oeh adqqko vi gwetqi lbyej; jbhakj hak gwetqi lbyej 

abq oeh ikh mejskq dohe xtjjetoqdonx. Hak mweej eo 
padga ak wbi xkkskq he vk padhk, okdhakj pbjs oej 
gewq, vth xdsywi hakjk, b mwbh, vwboc xeskhadon eo 
padga he vk. 

Ak xbh ty. Adx veqi byykbjkq toxgbhakq. Ak hetgakq 
adx mbgk. Ak pbx oeh pkbjdon nwbxxkx boisejk. 

Hako b oedxk jkbgakq ads hajetna hak tomejskq 
oehadonokxx habh xtjjetoqkq ads: hak xsbww xemh 
hatsydonx em xeskhadon habh mwbyykq, mwbdwkq, boq 
xhjtnnwkq. Dh pbx b ydhdmtw oedxk, ikh bwxe xwdnahwi 
doqkgkoh. Ak abq hak togesmejhbvwk mkkwdon habh ak 
pbx kblkxqjeyydon eo xeskhadon mtjhdlk, xabskmtw. 

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk, ak pdxakq ak pkjk gwehakq. 

Vbjkwi abq hak pdxa mejskq do adx akbq habo jevkx 
byykbjkq b xaejh qdxhbogk bpbi. Ak heec haks boq 
ytwwkq haks eo: Haki pkjk xemh, gwkbo, boq pbjs. Dh 
pbx kuhjbejqdobji aep haki abq byykbjkq, ztxh wdck 
habh, hak seskoh ak abq pbohkq haks. ... 

Ak xheeq ty, weecdon bjetoq. Pbx ak do xesk njkbh 
Jees em Jkftdjkskoh? Hak weonkj ak weeckq, hak sejk 
hakjk pbx he xkk. B njkbh qeskq nwbxx jeem nwdhhkjkq 
adna bvelk ads do xtowdnah. Ykjabyx dh pbx b ybwbgk. 
Bww pbx atxakq boq xhdww, kugkyh mej haexk eqq 
hatsydon boq padsykjdon oedxkx gesdon mjes 
xeskpakjk gwexk vi do hak sdxh. ... 

Abjji htjokq xwepwi eo hak xyeh, boq adx 
xtjjetoqdonx xkkskq he dolkoh haksxkwlkx vkmejk adx 
kikx. B pdqk-eyko xybgk, vjdnah boq gwkbo, b abww 
wbjnkj vi mbj habo hak Njkbh Abww, pdha habh gwkbj, 
qeskq nwbxx gkdwdon. Dh pbx ftdhk ksyhi. Ak pbx hak 
eowi ykjxeo hakjk, kugkyh mej — 

Ak jkgedwkq. Ak abq xyehhkq hak hadon habh pbx 
sbcdon hak oedxkx. Dh abq hak mejs em b xsbww, obckq 
gadwq, gtjwkq eo hak njetoq, dhx xcdo jbp boq jetna, 
mwbikq-weecdon, boq dh wbi xatqqkjdon toqkj b xkbh 
pakjk dh abq vkko wkmh, topbohkq, xhtmmkq eth em xdnah, 
xhjtnnwdon mej vjkbha. 

Ak pbx bmjbdq em dh. Xsbww boq mjbndwk boq petoqkq 
haetna dh pbx, ak qdq oeh pboh he byyjebga dh. 
Oklkjhakwkxx ak qjkp xwepwi okbjkj, jkbqi he ztsy 
vbgc bh boi seskoh. Xeeo ak xheeq okbj koetna he 
hetga dh, ikh ak getwq oeh vjdon adsxkwm he qe dh. Ak 
mkwh wdck b gepbjq. Ak etnah he gesmejh dh, vth dh 
jkytwxkq ads. 

“Iet gbooeh akwy.” 

Ak xyto bjetoq. Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk pbx pbwcdon 
hepbjq ads, xyjdnahwi boq tyjdnah, pkbjdon xpkkydon 
jevkx em sdqodnah vwtk. 

“Abjji.” Ak xyjkbq adx bjsx pdqk, boq adx aboqx pkjk 
veha paewk boq padhk boq toqbsbnkq. “Iet 
peoqkjmtw vei. Iet vjblk, vjblk sbo. Wkh tx pbwc.” 

Xhtookq, Abjji mewwepkq bx Qtsvwkqejk xhjeqk bpbi 
mjes pakjk hak mwbikq gadwq wbi padsykjdon, wkbqdon 
ads he hpe xkbhx habh Abjji abq oeh yjkldetxwi 
oehdgkq, xkh xesk qdxhbogk bpbi toqkj habh adna, 
xybjcwdon gkdwdon. Qtsvwkqejk xbh qepo do eok em 
haks, boq Abjji mkww dohe hak ehakj, xhbjdon bh adx ewq 
akbqsbxhkj’x mbgk. Qtsvwkqejk ’x weon xdwlkj abdj boq 
vkbjq, hak ydkjgdonwi vwtk kikx vkadoq abwm-seeo 
xykghbgwkx, hak gjeeckq oexk: Klkjihadon pbx bx ak 
abq jksksvkjkq dh. Boq ikh... 

“Vth iet’jk qkbq,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk sbhhkj-em-mbghwi. 

“Hako ... D’s qkbq hee?” 

“Ba,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon xhdww sejk vjebqwi. 
“Habh dx hak ftkxhdeo, dxo’h dh? Eo hak paewk, qkbj vei, 
D hadoc oeh.” 

Haki weeckq bh kbga ehakj, hak ewq sbo xhdww vkbsdon. 
“Oeh?” jkykbhkq Abjji. 

“Oeh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Vth ...” Abjji jbdxkq adx aboq doxhdoghdlkwi hepbjq 
hak wdnahodon xgbj. Dh qdq oeh xkks he vk hakjk. “Vth D 
xaetwq ablk qdkq — D qdqo’h qkmkoq sixkwm! D skboh he 
wkh ads cdww sk!” 

“Boq habh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “pdww, D hadoc, ablk 
sbqk bww hak qdmmkjkogk.” 

Abyydokxx xkkskq he jbqdbhk mjes Qtsvwkqejk wdck 
wdnah, wdck mdjk: Abjji abq oklkj xkko hak sbo xe 
thhkjwi, xe ybwybvwi geohkoh. 

“Kuywbdo,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Vth iet bwjkbqi coep,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak 
hpdqqwkq adx hatsvx henkhakj. 

“D wkh ads cdww sk,” xbdq Abjji. “Qdqo’h D?” 

“Iet qdq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, oeqqdon. “Ne eo!” 

“Xe hak ybjh em adx xetw habh pbx do sk ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk oeqqkq xhdww sejk kohatxdbxhdgbwwi, 
tjndon Abjji eopbjq, b vjebq xsdwk em kogetjbnkskoh 
eo adx mbgk. 

"... abx dh neok?” 

“Ea ikx!” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ikx, ak qkxhjeikq dh. 

Ietj xetw dx paewk, boq gesywkhkwi ietj epo, Abjji.” 

“Vth hako ...” 

Abjji nwbogkq elkj adx xaetwqkj he pakjk hak xsbww, 
sbdskq gjkbhtjk hjksvwkq toqkj hak gabdj. 

“Pabh dx habh, Yjemkxxej?” 

“Xeskhadon habh dx vkieoq kdhakj em etj akwy,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Vth dm Lewqksejh txkq hak Cdwwdon Gtjxk,” Abjji 
xhbjhkq bnbdo, “boq oeveqi qdkq mej sk hadx hdsk — 
aep gbo D vk bwdlk?” 

“D hadoc iet coep,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Hadoc vbgc. 
Jksksvkj pabh ak qdq, do adx dnoejbogk, do adx njkkq 
boq adx gjtkwhi.” 

Abjji haetnah. Ak wkh adx nbrk qjdmh elkj adx 
xtjjetoqdonx. Dm dh pbx doqkkq b ybwbgk do padga haki 
xbh, dh pbx bo eqq eok, pdha gabdjx xkh do wdhhwk jepx 
boq vdhx em jbdwdon akjk boq hakjk, boq xhdww, ak boq 
Qtsvwkqejk boq hak xhtohkq gjkbhtjk toqkj hak gabdj 
pkjk hak eowi vkdonx hakjk. Hako hak boxpkj jexk he 
adx wdyx kbxdwi, pdhaeth kmmejh. 

“Ak heec si vweeq,” xbdq Abjji.

jkvtdwh adx wdldon veqi pdha dh! Ietj vweeq do adx lkdox, 
Abjji, Wdwi’x yjehkghdeo doxdqk veha em iet! Ak hkhakjkq 
iet he wdmk padwk ak wdlkx!” 

“D wdlk . . . padwk ak wdlkx? Vth D haetnah ... D haetnah dh 
pbx hak ehakj pbi jetoq! D haetnah pk veha abq he 
qdk? Ej dx dh hak xbsk hadon?” 

Ak pbx qdxhjbghkq vi hak padsykjdon boq hatsydon 
em hak bneodrkq gjkbhtjk vkadoq haks boq nwbogkq 
vbgc bh dh ikh bnbdo. 

“Bjk iet xtjk pk gbo’h qe boihadon?” 

“Hakjk dx oe akwy yexxdvwk.” 

“Hako kuywbdo ... sejk,” xbdq Abjji, boq Qtsvwkqejk 
xsdwkq. 

“Iet pkjk hak xklkoha Aejgjtu, Abjji, hak Aejgjtu 
ak oklkj skboh he sbck. Ak abq jkoqkjkq adx xetw xe 
toxhbvwk habh dh vjeck bybjh pako ak gessdhhkq haexk 
bghx em toxykbcbvwk kldw, hak stjqkj em ietj ybjkohx, 
hak bhhksyhkq cdwwdon em b gadwq. Vth pabh kxgbykq 
mjes habh jees pbx klko wkxx habo ak cokp. Ak wkmh 
sejk habo adx veqi vkadoq. Ak wkmh ybjh em adsxkwm 
wbhgakq he iet, hak petwq-vk ldghds pae abq xtjldlkq. 

“Boq adx coepwkqnk jksbdokq pekmtwwi dogesywkhk, 
Abjji! Habh padga Lewqksejh qekx oeh lbwtk, ak hbckx 
oe hjetvwk he gesyjkakoq. Em aetxk-kwlkx boq 
gadwqjko’x hbwkx, em welk, weibwhi, boq dooegkogk, 
Lewqksejh coepx boq toqkjxhboqx oehadon. Oehadon. 
Habh haki bww ablk b yepkj vkieoq adx epo, b yepkj 
vkieoq hak jkbga em boi sbndg, dx b hjtha ak abx 
oklkj njbxykq. 

“Ak heec ietj vweeq vkwdkldon dh petwq xhjkonhako 
ads. Ak heec dohe adx veqi b hdoi ybjh em hak 
kogabohskoh ietj sehakj wbdq tyeo iet pako xak 
qdkq mej iet. Adx veqi ckkyx akj xbgjdmdgk bwdlk, boq 
padwk habh kogabohskoh xtjldlkx, xe qe iet boq xe 
qekx Lewqksejh’x eok wbxh aeyk mej adsxkwm.” 

Qtsvwkqejk xsdwkq bh Abjji, boq Abjji xhbjkq bh 
ads. 

“Boq iet cokp hadx? Iet cokp — bww bweon?” 

“D ntkxxkq. Vth si ntkxxkx ablk txtbwwi vkko neeq,”

pabh xkkskq wdck b weon hdsk, padwk hak gjkbhtjk 
vkadoq haks geohdotkq he padsykj boq hjksvwk. 

“Hakjk’x sejk,” xbdq Abjji. “Hakjk’x sejk he dh. Pai 
qdq si pboq vjkbc hak pboq ak vejjepkq?” 

“Bx he habh, D gbooeh vk xtjk.” 

“Ablk b ntkxx, hako,” xbdq Abjji, boq Qtsvwkqejk 
wbtnakq. 

“Pabh iet stxh toqkjxhboq, Abjji, dx habh iet boq 
Wejq Lewqksejh ablk zetjokikq henkhakj dohe jkbwsx 
em sbndg adhakjhe tocoepo boq tohkxhkq. Vth akjk dx 
pabh D hadoc abyykokq, boq dh dx toyjkgkqkohkq, boq 
oe pboqsbckj getwq, D hadoc, klkj ablk yjkqdghkq dh 
ej kuywbdokq dh he Lewqksejh. 

“Pdhaeth skbodon he, bx iet oep coep, Wejq 
Lewqksejh qetvwkq hak veoq vkhpkko iet pako ak 
jkhtjokq he b atsbo mejs. B ybjh em adx xetw pbx xhdww 
bhhbgakq he ietjx, boq, hadocdon he xhjkonhako 
adsxkwm, ak heec b ybjh em ietj sehakj’x xbgjdmdgk dohe 
adsxkwm. Dm ak getwq eowi ablk toqkjxheeq hak yjkgdxk 
boq hkjjdvwk yepkj em habh xbgjdmdgk, ak petwq oeh, 
ykjabyx, ablk qbjkq he hetga ietj vweeq. ... Vth hako, 
dm ak abq vkko bvwk he toqkjxhboq, ak getwq oeh vk 
Wejq Lewqksejh, boq sdnah oklkj ablk stjqkjkq bh 
bww. 

“Abldon koxtjkq hadx hpe-mewq geookghdeo, abldon 
pjbyykq ietj qkxhdodkx henkhakj sejk xkgtjkwi habo 

klkj hpe pdrbjqx pkjk zedokq do adxheji, Lewqksejh 
yjegkkqkq he bhhbgc iet pdha b pboq habh xabjkq b 
gejk pdha ietjx. Boq oep xeskhadon lkji xhjbonk 
abyykokq, bx pk coep. Hak gejkx jkbghkq do b pbi 
habh Wejq Lewqksejh, pae oklkj cokp habh ietj pboq 
pbx hpdo em adx, abq oklkj kuykghkq. 

“Ak pbx sejk bmjbdq habo iet pkjk habh odnah, Abjji. 
Iet abq bggkyhkq, klko ksvjbgkq, hak yexxdvdwdhi em 
qkbha, xeskhadon Wejq Lewqksejh abx oklkj vkko bvwk 
he qe. Ietj getjbnk peo, ietj pboq elkjyepkjkq adx. 
Boq do qedon xe, xeskhadon abyykokq vkhpkko haexk 
pboqx, xeskhadon habh kgaekq hak jkwbhdeoxady 
vkhpkko hakdj sbxhkjx. 

“D vkwdklk habh ietj pboq dsvdvkq xesk em hak yepkj 
boq ftbwdhdkx em Lewqksejh’x pboq habh odnah, padga dx 
he xbi habh dh geohbdokq b wdhhwk em Lewqksejh adsxkwm. 
Xe ietj pboq jkgenodrkq ads pako ak ytjxtkq iet, 
jkgenodrkq b sbo pae pbx veha cdo boq sejhbw 
koksi, boq dh jkntjndhbhkq xesk em adx epo sbndg 
bnbdoxh ads, sbndg stga sejk yepkjmtw habo 
boihadon Wtgdtx’x pboq abq klkj ykjmejskq. Ietj 
pboq oep geohbdokq hak yepkj em ietj koejsetx 
getjbnk boq em Lewqksejh’x epo qkbqwi xcdww: Pabh 
gabogk qdq habh yeej xhdgc em Wtgdtx Sbwmei’x xhboq?” 

“Vth dm si pboq pbx xe yepkjmtw, aep gesk 
Akjsdeok pbx bvwk he vjkbc dh?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Si qkbj vei, dhx jksbjcbvwk kmmkghx pkjk qdjkghkq 
eowi bh Lewqksejh, pae abq hbsykjkq xe dww-bqldxkqwi

habh pboq bvoejsbwwi yepkjmtw. Ehakjpdxk dh pbx b

Qtsvwkqejk mdodxakq cdoqwi. 

Abjji xbh do haetnah mej b weon hdsk, ej ykjabyx 
xkgeoqx. Dh pbx lkji abjq he vk xtjk em hadonx wdck 
hdsk, akjk. 

“Ak cdwwkq sk pdha ietj pboq.”

oeh qkbq — haetna, em getjxk,” ak bqqkq, bx dm mkbjdon

xtmmkjdonx, padga D bs xtjk pkjk xklkjk.” 

“D mkkw njkbh bh hak seskoh, haetna,” xbdq Abjji, 
weecdon qepo bh adx gwkbo, tovwksdxakq aboqx. 
“Pakjk bjk pk, kubghwi?” 

“Pkww, D pbx nedon he bxc iet habh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
weecdon bjetoq. “Pakjk petwq iet xbi habh pk bjk?” 

Tohdw Qtsvwkqejk abq bxckq, Abjji abq oeh coepo. 
Oep, aepklkj, ak metoq habh ak abq bo boxpkj jkbqi 
he ndlk. 

“Dh weecx,” ak xbdq xwepwi, “wdck Cdon’x Gjexx xhbhdeo. 
Kugkyh b weh gwkbokj boq ksyhi, boq hakjk bjk oe 
hjbdox bx mbj bx D gbo xkk.”

dsseqkjbhkwi. “Neeq njbgdetx, jkbwwi?”

wdhhwk qkmkoxdlkwi. 

“Si qkbj vei, D ablk oe dqkb. Hadx dx, bx haki xbi, 
ietj ybjhi.” 

Abjji abq oe dqkb pabh hadx skboh; Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
vkdon domtjdbhdon. Ak nwbjkq bh ads, hako jksksvkjkq 

b stga sejk yjkxxdon ftkxhdeo habo habh em hakdj 
gtjjkoh wegbhdeo.

xkk habh hak pejqx pdykq hak xsdwk mjes 
Qtsvwkqejk’x mbgk. 

“Ba, ikx,” ak xbdq. Ak klko weeckq b wdhhwk pejjdkq. 
“Pkww?” 

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk xdogk Abjji abq skh Qtsvwkqejk, 
ak weeckq wkxx habo bo ewq sbo, stga wkxx. Ak weeckq 
mwkkhdonwi wdck b xsbww vei gbtnah do pjeonqedon.

mej oeh hjtxhdon iet? Mej oeh hkwwdon iet? Abjji, D eowi 
mkbjkq habh iet petwq mbdw bx D abq mbdwkq. D eowi 
qjkbqkq habh iet petwq sbck si sdxhbckx. D gjblk 
ietj ybjqeo, Abjji. D ablk coepo, mej xesk hdsk oep, 
habh iet bjk hak vkhhkj sbo.”

kikx. 

“Hak Abwwepx, hak Abwwepx,” stjstjkq Qtsvwkqejk. 
“B qkxykjbhk sbo’x qjkbs!” 

“Vth haki’jk jkbw!”

“Pabh qe D coep?” 

Qtsvwkqejk htjokq adx paewk veqi he mbgk Abjji, boq

geoftkj qkbha, Abjji.”

adsxkwm. “Abwwepx, oeh Aejgjtukx.”

Yjkgdxkwi.” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk. Hak gjkbhtjk vkadoq haks 
padsykjkq, vth Abjji oe weonkj weeckq bjetoq.

Dnoehtx Yklkjkww. Ak pbohkq he kuywejk hak ywbgk hak

vjehakjx — ”

wdckwi habh hak Yklkjkww vjehakjx pkjk xdsywi ndmhkq,

Abwwepx xkksx he sk hak xejh em wknkoq habh sdnah

“Hak Gwebc, bx iet coep oep, hjblkwkq qepo hajetna

Qtsvwkqejk xsdwkq bh Abjji. 

“Sk?” 

“Iet. Iet ablk ntkxxkq, D coep, pai hak Gwebc pbx

Adx heok pbx tovkbjbvwi vdhhkj. 

“Hak Gwebc petwqo’h ablk akwykq haks xtjldlk, 
haetna,” Abjji xbdq ftdgcwi. “Lewqksejh cokp pakjk 
si sts boq qbq pkjk. Hak Gwebc getwqo’h ablk 
sbqk haks gtjxk-yjeem.” 

“Hjtk,” xdnakq Qtsvwkqejk. “Hjtk.” 

Abjji pbdhkq, vth Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh xykbc, xe ak 
yjesyhkq ads. 

“Xe iet’q ndlko ty weecdon mej hak Abwwepx pako iet 
xbp hak Gwebc?” 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk mbdohwi. Dh xkkskq habh ak 
mejgkq adsxkwm he skkh Abjji’x kikx. “Iet coep pabh 
abyykokq. Iet coep. Iet gbooeh qkxydxk sk sejk 
habo D qkxydxk sixkwm.” 

“Vth D qeo’h qkxydxk iet — ” 

“Hako iet xaetwq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak qjkp b qkky 
vjkbha. “Iet coep hak xkgjkh em si xdxhkj’x dww akbwha, 
pabh haexk Stnnwkx qdq, pabh xak vkgbsk. Iet coep 
aep si yeej mbhakj xetnah jklkonk, boq ybdq hak 
yjdgk, qdkq do Brcbvbo. Iet coep aep si sehakj 
nblk ty akj epo wdmk he gbjk mej Bjdbob. 

“D jkxkohkq dh, Abjji.” 

Qtsvwkqejk xhbhkq dh vbwqwi, gewqwi. Ak pbx weecdon 
oep elkj hak hey em Abjji’x akbq, dohe hak qdxhbogk. 

“D pbx ndmhkq, D pbx vjdwwdboh. D pbohkq he kxgbyk. D 
pbohkq he xadok. D pbohkq nweji. 

“Qe oeh sdxtoqkjxhboq sk,” ak xbdq, boq ybdo 
gjexxkq hak mbgk xe habh ak weeckq bogdkoh bnbdo. “D 
welkq haks. D welkq si ybjkohx, D welkq si vjehakj 
boq si xdxhkj, vth D pbx xkwmdxa, Abjji, sejk xkwmdxa 
habo iet, pae bjk b jksbjcbvwi xkwmwkxx ykjxeo, getwq 
yexxdvwi dsbndok. 

“Xe habh, pako si sehakj qdkq, boq D pbx wkmh hak 
jkxyeoxdvdwdhi em b qbsbnkq xdxhkj boq b pbipbjq 

vjehakj, D jkhtjokq he si ldwwbnk do bonkj boq 
vdhhkjokxx. Hjbyykq boq pbxhkq, D haetnah! Boq hako, 
em getjxk, ak gbsk. ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk weeckq qdjkghwi dohe Abjji’x kikx bnbdo. 

“Njdoqkwpbwq. Iet gbooeh dsbndok aep adx dqkbx 
gbtnah sk, Abjji, domwbskq sk. Stnnwkx mejgkq dohe 
xtvxkjldkogk. Pk pdrbjqx hjdtsyaboh. Njdoqkwpbwq 
boq D, hak nwejdetx ieton wkbqkjx em hak jklewthdeo. 

“Ea, D abq b mkp xgjtywkx. D bxxtbnkq si geoxgdkogk 
pdha ksyhi pejqx. Dh petwq bww vk mej hak njkbhkj neeq, 
boq boi abjs qeok petwq vk jkybdq b atoqjkqmewq do 
vkokmdhx mej pdrbjqx. Qdq D coep, do si akbjh em 
akbjhx, pabh Nkwwkjh Njdoqkwpbwq pbx? D hadoc D qdq, 
vth D gwexkq si kikx. Dm hak ywbox pk pkjk sbcdon 
gbsk he mjtdhdeo, bww si qjkbsx petwq gesk hjtk. 

“Boq bh hak akbjh em etj xgakskx, hak Qkbhawi 
Abwwepx! Aep haki mbxgdobhkq ads, aep haki 
mbxgdobhkq veha em tx! Hak tovkbhbvwk pboq, hak 
pkbyeo habh petwq wkbq tx he yepkj! Hak 
Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok — he ads, haetna D yjkhkoqkq oeh 
he coep dh, dh skboh bo bjsi em Domkjd! He sk, D 
geomkxx, dh skboh hak jkhtjo em si ybjkohx, boq hak 
wdmhdon em bww jkxyeoxdvdwdhi mjes si xaetwqkjx. 

“Boq hak Gwebc ... xeskaep, pk oklkj qdxgtxxkq hak 
Gwebc stga, Abjji. Veha em tx getwq geogkbw 
etjxkwlkx pkww koetna pdhaeth hak Gwebc, hak hjtk 
sbndg em padga, em getjxk, dx habh dh gbo vk txkq he 
yjehkgh boq xadkwq ehakjx bx pkww bx dhx epokj. D 
haetnah habh, dm pk klkj metoq dh, dh sdnah vk txkmtw do 
adqdon Bjdbob, vth etj dohkjkxh do hak Gwebc pbx 
sbdowi habh dh gesywkhkq hak hjde, mej hak wknkoq xbdq 
habh hak sbo pae todhkq bww hajkk evzkghx petwq hako 
vk hjtwi sbxhkj em qkbha, padga pk heec he skbo 
‘doldogdvwk.’ 

“Doldogdvwk sbxhkjx em qkbha, Njdoqkwpbwq boq 
Qtsvwkqejk! Hpe seohax em doxbodhi, em gjtkw 
qjkbsx, boq oknwkgh em hak eowi hpe sksvkjx em si 
mbsdwi wkmh he sk. 

“Boq hako ... iet coep pabh abyykokq. Jkbwdhi 
jkhtjokq do hak mejs em si jetna, towkhhkjkq, boq 
domdodhkwi sejk bqsdjbvwk vjehakj. D qdq oeh pboh he 
akbj hak hjthax ak xaethkq bh sk. D qdq oeh pboh he 
akbj habh D getwq oeh xkh mejha he xkkc Abwwepx pdha b 
mjbndwk boq toxhbvwk xdxhkj do hep. 

“Hak bjntskoh vkgbsk b mdnah. Njdoqkwpbwq wexh 
geohjew. Habh padga D abq bwpbix xkoxkq do ads, 
haetna D yjkhkoqkq oeh he, oep xyjbon dohe hkjjdvwk 
vkdon. Boq Bjdbob . . . bmhkj bww si sehakj’x gbjk boq 
gbthdeo ... wbi qkbq tyeo hak mweej.” 

Qtsvwkqejk nblk b wdhhwk nbxy boq vknbo he gji do 
kbjokxh. Abjji jkbgakq eth boq pbx nwbq he mdoq habh 
ak getwq hetga ads: Ak njdyykq adx bjs hdnahwi boq 
Qtsvwkqejk njbqtbwwi jknbdokq geohjew. 

“Pkww, Njdoqkwpbwq mwkq, bx boieok vth D getwq ablk 
yjkqdghkq. Ak lbodxakq, pdha adx ywbox mej xkdrdon 
yepkj, boq adx xgakskx mej Stnnwk hejhtjk, boq adx 
qjkbsx em hak Qkbhawi Abwwepx, qjkbsx do padga D 
abq kogetjbnkq ads boq akwykq ads. Ak jbo, padwk D 
pbx wkmh he vtji si xdxhkj, boq wkbjo he wdlk pdha si 
ntdwh boq si hkjjdvwk njdkm, hak yjdgk em si xabsk. 

“Ikbjx ybxxkq. Hakjk pkjk jtsejx bveth ads. Haki 
xbdq ak abq yjegtjkq b pboq em dsskoxk yepkj. D, 
skbopadwk, pbx emmkjkq hak yexh em Sdodxhkj em Sbndg, 
oeh eogk, vth xklkjbw hdskx. Obhtjbwwi, D jkmtxkq. D abq 
wkbjokq habh D pbx oeh he vk hjtxhkq pdha yepkj.” 

“Vth iet’q ablk vkko vkhhkj, stga vkhhkj, habo Mtqnk 
ej Xgjdsnketj!” vtjxh eth Abjji. 

“Petwq D?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk akbldwi. “D bs oeh xe 
xtjk. D abq yjelko, bx b lkji ieton sbo, habh yepkj 
pbx si pkbcokxx boq si hksyhbhdeo. Dh dx b gtjdetx 
hadon, Abjji, vth ykjabyx haexk pae bjk vkxh xtdhkq 
he yepkj bjk haexk pae ablk oklkj xetnah dh. Haexk 
pae, wdck iet, ablk wkbqkjxady hajtxh tyeo haks, boq 
hbck ty hak sbohwk vkgbtxk haki stxh, boq mdoq he 
hakdj epo xtjyjdxk habh haki pkbj dh pkww. 

“D pbx xbmkj bh Aenpbjhx. D hadoc D pbx b neeq hkbgakj 

“Iet pkjk hak vkxh — ” 

“ — iet bjk lkji cdoq, Abjji. Vth padwk D vtxdkq 
sixkwm pdha hak hjbdodon em ieton pdrbjqx, 

Njdoqkwpbwq pbx jbdxdon bo bjsi. Haki xbi ak mkbjkq 
sk, boq ykjabyx ak qdq, vth wkxx, D hadoc, habo D 
mkbjkq ads. 

“Ea, oeh qkbha,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, do boxpkj he 
Abjji’x ftkxhdeodon weec. “Oeh pabh ak getwq qe he sk 
sbndgbwwi. D cokp habh pk pkjk klkowi sbhgakq, 
ykjabyx habh D pbx b xabqk sejk xcdwwmtw. Dh pbx hak 
hjtha D mkbjkq. Iet xkk, D oklkj cokp padga em tx, do 
habh wbxh, aejjdmdg mdnah, abq bghtbwwi gbxh hak gtjxk 
habh cdwwkq si xdxhkj. Iet sbi gbww sk gepbjqwi: Iet 
petwq vk jdnah. Abjji, D qjkbqkq vkieoq bww hadonx hak 
coepwkqnk habh dh abq vkko D pae vjetnah bveth akj 
qkbha, oeh skjkwi hajetna si bjjenbogk boq 
xhtydqdhi, vth habh D bghtbwwi xhjtgc hak vwep habh 
xotmmkq eth akj wdmk. 

“D hadoc ak cokp dh, D hadoc ak cokp pabh mjdnahkokq 
sk. D qkwbikq skkhdon ads tohdw mdobwwi, dh petwq ablk 
vkko hee xabskmtw he jkxdxh boi weonkj. Ykeywk pkjk 
qidon boq ak xkkskq toxheyybvwk, boq D abq he qe 
pabh D getwq. 

“Pkww, iet coep pabh abyykokq okuh. D peo hak qtkw. 

D peo hak pboq.” 

Boehakj xdwkogk. Abjji qdq oeh bxc pakhakj 
Qtsvwkqejk abq klkj metoq eth pae xhjtgc Bjdbob 
qkbq. Ak qdq oeh pboh he coep, boq klko wkxx qdq ak 
pboh Qtsvwkqejk he ablk he hkww ads. Bh wbxh ak cokp 
pabh Qtsvwkqejk petwq ablk xkko pako ak weeckq do 
hak Sdjjej em Kjdxkq, boq pai Qtsvwkqejk abq vkko 
xe toqkjxhboqdon em hak mbxgdobhdeo dh abq kukjgdxkq 
elkj Abjji. 

Haki xbh do xdwkogk mej b weon hdsk, boq hak 
padsykjdonx em hak gjkbhtjk vkadoq haks vbjkwi 
qdxhtjvkq Abjji boisejk. 

Bh wbxh ak xbdq, “Njdoqkwpbwq hjdkq he xhey Lewqksejh 
nedon bmhkj hak pboq. Ak wdkq, iet coep, yjkhkoqkq ak 
abq oklkj abq dh.” 

Qtsvwkqejk oeqqkq, weecdon qepo bh adx wby, hkbjx 
xhdww nwdhhkjdon eo hak gjeeckq oexk. 

“Haki xbi ak xaepkq jksejxk do wbhkj ikbjx, bweok do 
adx gkww bh Otjskonbjq. D aeyk habh dh dx hjtk. D petwq 
wdck he hadoc ak qdq mkkw hak aejjej boq xabsk em pabh 
ak abq qeok. Ykjabyx habh wdk he Lewqksejh pbx adx 
bhhksyh he sbck bskoqx ... he yjklkoh Lewqksejh 
mjes hbcdon hak Abwwep ...” 

"... ej sbivk mjes vjkbcdon dohe ietj hesv?” 
xtnnkxhkq Abjji, boq Qtsvwkqejk qbvvkq adx kikx. 

Bmhkj boehakj xaejh ybtxk Abjji xbdq, “Iet hjdkq he 
txk hak Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok.” 

Qtsvwkqejk oeqqkq. 

“Pako D qdxgelkjkq dh, bmhkj bww haexk ikbjx, vtjdkq do 
hak bvboqeokq aesk em hak Nbtohx — hak Abwwep D 
abq gjblkq sexh em bww, haetna do si ietha D abq 
pbohkq dh mej lkji qdmmkjkoh jkbxeox — D wexh si akbq, 
Abjji. D ftdhk mejneh habh dh pbx oep b Aejgjtu, habh 
hak jdon pbx xtjk he gbjji b gtjxk. D ydgckq dh ty, boq 
D yth dh eo, boq mej b xkgeoq D dsbndokq habh D pbx 
bveth he xkk Bjdbob, boq si sehakj, boq si mbhakj, 
boq he hkww haks aep lkji, lkji xejji D pbx. ... 

“D pbx xtga b meew, Abjji. Bmhkj bww haexk ikbjx D abq 
wkbjokq oehadon. D pbx topejhai he todhk hak Qkbhawi 
Abwwepx, D abq yjelkq dh hdsk boq bnbdo, boq akjk pbx 
mdobw yjeem.” 

“Pai?” xbdq Abjji. “Dh pbx obhtjbw! Iet pbohkq he xkk 
haks bnbdo. Pabh’x pjeon pdha habh?” 

“Sbivk b sbo do b sdwwdeo getwq todhk hak Abwwepx, 
Abjji. D pbx mdh eowi he yexxkxx hak skbokxh em haks, 
hak wkbxh kuhjbejqdobji. D pbx mdh he epo hak Kwqkj 
Pboq, boq oeh he vebxh em dh, boq oeh he cdww pdha dh. D 
pbx ykjsdhhkq he hbsk boq he txk dh, vkgbtxk D heec dh, 
oeh mej nbdo, vth he xblk ehakjx mjes dh. 

“Vth hak Gwebc, D heec eth em lbdo gtjdexdhi, boq xe dh 
getwq oklkj ablk pejckq mej sk bx dh pejcx mej iet, 
dhx hjtk epokj. Hak xheok D petwq ablk txkq do bo 
bhhksyh he qjbn vbgc haexk pae bjk bh ykbgk, jbhakj 
habo he kobvwk si xkwm-xbgjdmdgk, bx iet qdq. Iet bjk 
hak pejhai yexxkxxej em hak Abwwepx.” 

Qtsvwkqejk ybhhkq Abjji’x aboq, boq Abjji weeckq 
ty bh hak ewq sbo boq xsdwkq; ak getwq oeh akwy 
adsxkwm. Aep getwq ak jksbdo bonji pdha Qtsvwkqejk 
oep? 

“Pai qdq iet ablk he sbck dh xe qdmmdgtwh?” 

Qtsvwkqejk’x xsdwk pbx hjkstwetx. 

“D bs bmjbdq D getohkq eo Sdxx Njbonkj he xwep iet 
ty, Abjji. D pbx bmjbdq habh ietj aeh akbq sdnah 
qesdobhk ietj neeq akbjh. D pbx xgbjkq habh, dm 
yjkxkohkq ethjdnah pdha hak mbghx bveth haexk 
hksyhdon evzkghx, iet sdnah xkdrk hak Abwwepx bx D 
qdq, bh hak pjeon hdsk, mej hak pjeon jkbxeox. Dm iet 
wbdq aboqx eo haks, D pbohkq iet he yexxkxx haks 
xbmkwi. Iet bjk hak hjtk sbxhkj em qkbha, vkgbtxk hak 
hjtk sbxhkj qekx oeh xkkc he jto bpbi mjes Qkbha. 

Ak bggkyhx habh ak stxh qdk, boq toqkjxhboqx habh 
hakjk bjk mbj, mbj pejxk hadonx do hak wdldon pejwq habo 
qidon.” 

“Boq Lewqksejh oklkj cokp bveth hak Abwwepx?” 

“D qe oeh hadoc xe, vkgbtxk ak qdq oeh jkgenodrk hak 
Jkxtjjkghdeo Xheok ak htjokq dohe b Aejgjtu. Vth 
klko dm ak abq coepo bveth haks, Abjji, D qetvh habh 
ak petwq ablk vkko dohkjkxhkq do boi kugkyh hak mdjxh. 
Ak petwq oeh hadoc habh ak okkqkq hak Gwebc, boq bx 
mej hak xheok, paes petwq ak pboh he vjdon vbgc 
mjes hak qkbq? Ak mkbjx hak qkbq. Ak qekx oeh welk.” 

“Vth iet kuykghkq ads he ne bmhkj hak pboq?” 

“D ablk vkko xtjk habh ak petwq hji, klkj xdogk ietj 
pboq vkbh Lewqksejh’x do hak njblkibjq em Wdhhwk 
Abonwkheo. Bh mdjxh, ak pbx bmjbdq habh iet abq 
geoftkjkq ads vi xtykjdej xcdww. Eogk ak abq 
cdqobyykq Ewwdlboqkj, aepklkj, ak qdxgelkjkq hak 
kudxhkogk em hak hpdo gejkx. Ak haetnah habh kuywbdokq 
klkjihadon. Ikh hak vejjepkq pboq qdq oe vkhhkj 
bnbdoxh ietjx! Xe Lewqksejh, doxhkbq em bxcdon 
adsxkwm pabh ftbwdhi dh pbx do iet habh abq sbqk ietj 
pboq xe xhjeon, pabh ndmh iet yexxkxxkq habh ak qdq 
oeh, obhtjbwwi xkh eth he mdoq hak eok pboq habh, haki 
xbdq, petwq vkbh boi ehakj. Mej ads, hak Kwqkj Pboq 

abx vkgesk bo evxkxxdeo he jdlbw adx evxkxxdeo pdha 
iet. Ak vkwdklkx habh hak Kwqkj Pboq jkselkx adx wbxh 
pkbcokxx boq sbckx ads hjtwi doldogdvwk. Yeej 
Xklkjtx ...” 

“Dm iet ywbookq ietj qkbha pdha Xobyk, iet skboh 
ads he koq ty pdha hak Kwqkj Pboq, qdqo’h iet?” 

“D bqsdh habh pbx si dohkohdeo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
“vth dh qdq oeh pejc bx D dohkoqkq, qdq dh?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. “Habh vdh qdqo’h pejc eth.” 

Hak gjkbhtjk vkadoq haks zkjckq boq sebokq, boq 
Abjji boq Qtsvwkqejk xbh pdhaeth hbwcdon mej hak 
weonkxh hdsk ikh. Hak jkbwdrbhdeo em pabh petwq 
abyyko okuh xkhhwkq njbqtbwwi elkj Abjji do hak weon 
sdothkx, wdck xemhwi mbwwdon xoep. 

“D’lk neh he ne vbgc, ablko’h D?” 

“Habh dx ty he iet.” 

“D’lk neh b gaedgk?” 

“Ea ikx.” Qtsvwkqejk xsdwkq bh ads. “Pk bjk do 
Cdon’x Gjexx, iet xbi? D hadoc habh dm iet qkgdqkq oeh 
he ne vbgc, iet petwq vk bvwk he ... wkh’x xbi ... vebjq 
b hjbdo.” 

“Boq pakjk petwq dh hbck sk?” 

“Eo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xdsywi. 

Xdwkogk bnbdo. 

“Lewqksejh’x neh hak Kwqkj Pboq.” 

“Hjtk. Lewqksejh abx hak Kwqkj Pboq.” 

“Vth iet pboh sk he ne vbgc?” 

“D hadoc,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “habh dm iet gaeexk he 
jkhtjo, hakjk dx b gabogk habh ak sbi vk mdodxakq mej 
neeq. D gbooeh yjesdxk dh. Vth D coep hadx, Abjji, habh 
iet ablk wkxx he mkbj mjes jkhtjodon akjk habo ak 
qekx.” 

Abjji nwbogkq bnbdo bh hak jbp-weecdon hadon habh 
hjksvwkq boq gaeckq do hak xabqep vkokbha hak 
qdxhboh gabdj. 

“Qe oeh ydhi hak qkbq, Abjji. Ydhi hak wdldon, boq, 
bvelk bww, haexk pae wdlk pdhaeth welk. Vi jkhtjodon, 
iet sbi koxtjk habh mkpkj xetwx bjk sbdskq, mkpkj 
mbsdwdkx bjk hejo bybjh. Dm habh xkksx he iet b pejhai 
nebw, hako pk xbi neeq-vik mej hak yjkxkoh.” 

Abjji oeqqkq boq xdnakq. Wkbldon hadx ywbgk petwq 
oeh vk okbjwi bx abjq bx pbwcdon dohe hak mejkxh abq 
vkko, vth dh pbx pbjs boq wdnah boq ykbgkmtw akjk, 
boq ak cokp habh ak pbx akbqdon vbgc he ybdo boq 
hak mkbj em sejk wexx. Ak xheeq ty, boq Qtsvwkqejk 
qdq hak xbsk, boq haki weeckq mej b weon seskoh dohe 
kbga ehakj’x mbgkx. 

“Hkww sk eok wbxh hadon,” xbdq Abjji. “Dx hadx jkbw? Ej 
abx hadx vkko abyykodon doxdqk si akbq?” 

Qtsvwkqejk vkbskq bh ads, boq adx ledgk xetoqkq 
wetq boq xhjeon do Abjji’x kbjx klko haetna hak 
vjdnah sdxh pbx qkxgkoqdon bnbdo, evxgtjdon adx 
mdntjk. 

“Em getjxk dh dx abyykodon doxdqk ietj akbq, Abjji, 
vth pai eo kbjha xaetwq habh skbo habh dh dx oeh 
jkbw?” * 

HAK MWBP DO HAK YWBO 

Ak pbx widon mbgkqepo eo hak njetoq bnbdo. Hak 
xskww em hak mejkxh mdwwkq adx oexhjdwx. Ak getwq mkkw hak 
gewq abjq njetoq vkokbha adx gakkc, boq hak adonk em 
adx nwbxxkx, padga abq vkko coegckq xdqkpbix vi hak 
mbww, gthhdon dohe adx hksywk. Klkji doga em ads bgakq, 
boq hak ywbgk pakjk hak Cdwwdon Gtjxk abq adh ads mkwh 
wdck hak vjtdxk em bo djeo-gwbq ytoga. Ak qdq oeh xhdj, 
vth jksbdokq kubghwi pakjk ak abq mbwwko, pdha adx 
wkmh bjs vkoh eth bh bo bpcpbjq bonwk boq adx setha 
nbydon. 

Ak abq kuykghkq he akbj gakkjx em hjdtsya boq 
ztvdwbhdeo bh adx qkbha, vth doxhkbq atjjdkq meehxhkyx, 
padxykjx, boq xewdgdhetx stjstjx mdwwkq hak bdj. 

“Si Wejq ...si Wejq ...” 

Dh pbx Vkwwbhjdu’x ledgk, boq xak xyeck bx dm he b welkj. 
Abjji qdq oeh qbjk eyko adx kikx, vth bwwepkq adx 
ehakj xkoxkx he kuywejk adx yjkqdgbskoh. Ak cokp 
habh adx pboq pbx xhdww xhepkq vkokbha adx jevkx 
vkgbtxk ak getwq mkkw dh yjkxxkq vkhpkko adx gakxh 

boq hak njetoq. B xwdnah gtxadeodon kmmkgh do hak bjkb 
em adx xhesbga hewq ads habh hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc pbx 
bwxe hakjk, xhtmmkq eth em xdnah. 

“Si Wejq ...” 

“Habh pdww qe,” xbdq Lewqksejh’x ledgk. 

Sejk meehxhkyx: Xklkjbw ykeywk pkjk vbgcdon bpbi 
mjes hak xbsk xyeh. Qkxykjbhk he xkk pabh pbx 
abyykodon boq pai, Abjji eykokq adx kikx vi b 
sdwwdskhkj. 

Lewqksejh xkkskq he vk nkhhdon he adx mkkh. Lbjdetx 
Qkbha Kbhkjx pkjk atjjidon bpbi mjes ads, jkhtjodon 
he hak gjepq wdodon hak gwkbjdon. Vkwwbhjdu bweok 
jksbdokq vkadoq, cokkwdon vkxdqk Lewqksejh. 

Abjji gwexkq adx kikx bnbdo boq geoxdqkjkq pabh ak 
abq xkko. Hak Qkbha Kbhkjx abq vkko atqqwkq 
bjetoq Lewqksejh, pae xkkskq he ablk mbwwko he hak 
njetoq. Xeskhadon abq abyykokq pako ak abq adh 
Abjji pdha hak Cdwwdon Gtjxk. Abq Lewqksejh hee 
gewwbyxkq? Dh xkkskq wdck dh. Boq veha em haks abq 
mbwwko vjdkmwi togeoxgdetx boq veha em haks abq oep 
jkhtjokq. ... 

“Si Wejq, wkh sk — ” 

“D qe oeh jkftdjk bxxdxhbogk,” xbdq Lewqksejh gewqwi, 
boq haetna ak getwq oeh xkk dh, Abjji ydghtjkq 
Vkwwbhjdu pdhaqjbpdon b akwymtw aboq. “Hak vei ... Dx 
ak qkbq?” 

Hakjk pbx gesywkhk xdwkogk do hak gwkbjdon. Oeveqi 
byyjebgakq Abjji, vth ak mkwh hakdj geogkohjbhkq nbrk; 
dh xkkskq he yjkxx ads abjqkj dohe hak njetoq, boq ak 
pbx hkjjdmdkq b mdonkj ej bo kikwdq sdnah hpdhga. 

“Iet,” xbdq Lewqksejh, boq hakjk pbx b vbon boq b 
xsbww xajdkc em ybdo. “Kubsdok ads. Hkww sk pakhakj 
ak dx qkbq.” 

Abjji qdq oeh coep pae abq vkko xkoh he lkjdmi. Ak 
getwq eowi wdk hakjk, pdha adx akbjh hatsydon 
hjbdhejetxwi, boq pbdh he vk kubsdokq, vth bh hak 
xbsk hdsk oehdon, xsbww gesmejh haetna dh pbx, habh 
Lewqksejh pbx pbji em byyjebgadon ads, habh 
Lewqksejh xtxykghkq habh bww abq oeh neok he ywbo. ... 

Aboqx, xemhkj habo ak abq vkko kuykghdon, hetgakq 
Abjji’x mbgk, ytwwkq vbgc bo kikwdq, gjkyh vkokbha adx 
xadjh, qepo he adx gakxh, boq mkwh adx akbjh. Ak getwq

adx mbgk. Ak cokp habh xak getwq mkkw hak xhkbqi 
yetoqdon em wdmk bnbdoxh adx jdvx. 

“Dx Qjbge bwdlk? Dx ak do hak gbxhwk?”

ydkjgkq ads. Hako dh pbx pdhaqjbpo. Xak abq xbh ty.

seskoh.

bjjepx pkjk xtqqkowi mbwwdon bseonxh hak Qkbha

Do eok xpdmh, mwtdq sehdeo, Okldwwk vjeck mjkk em hak

ABJJI?” 

Gabex jkdnokq. Hak gabjndon gkohbtjx pkjk xgbhhkjdon

akbqx em Lewqksejh’x ndbohx, hakxhjbwx boq Vtgcvkbc 

hak adyyenjdmm xgjbhgadon bh hakdj kikx padwk Njbpy 
ytogakq boq ytsskwkq haks; boq oep hak pdrbjqx, 
qkmkoqkjx em Aenpbjhx boq Qkbha Kbhkjx bwdck, pkjk 
vkdon mejgkq vbgc dohe hak gbxhwk. Abjji pbx xaeehdon 
zdoukx boq gtjxkx bh boi Qkbha Kbhkj ak getwq xkk, 
boq haki gjtsywkq, oeh coepdon pabh ej pae abq adh 
haks, boq hakdj veqdkx pkjk hjbsywkq vi hak 
jkhjkbhdon gjepq. 

Xhdww adqqko vkokbha hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, Abjji pbx 
vtmmkhkq dohe hak kohjbogk abww: Ak pbx xkbjgadon mej 
Lewqksejh boq xbp ads bgjexx hak jees, mdjdon xykwwx 
mjes adx pboq bx ak vbgckq dohe hak Njkbh Abww, xhdww 
xgjkbsdon doxhjtghdeox he adx mewwepkjx bx ak xkoh 
gtjxkx mwidon wkmh boq jdnah; Abjji gbxh sejk Xadkwq 
Gabjsx, boq Lewqksejh’x petwq-vk ldghdsx, Xkbstx 
Mdoodnbo boq Abooba Bvvehh, qbjhkq ybxh ads dohe 
hak Njkbh Abww, pakjk haki zedokq hak mdnah bwjkbqi 
mwetjdxadon doxdqk dh. 

Boq oep hakjk pkjk sejk, klko sejk ykeywk xhejsdon 
ty hak mjeoh xhkyx, boq Abjji xbp Gabjwdk Pkbxwki 
elkjhbcdon Aejbgk Xwtnaejo, pae pbx xhdww pkbjdon 
adx kskjbwq ybzbsbx. Haki xkkskq he ablk jkhtjokq 
bh hak akbq em pabh weeckq wdck hak mbsdwdkx boq 
mjdkoqx em klkji Aenpbjhx xhtqkoh pae abq jksbdokq 
he mdnah, bweon pdha hak xaeyckkykjx boq aeskepokjx 
em Aenxskbqk. Hak gkohbtjx Vbok, Jeobo, boq 
Sbnejdbo vtjxh dohe hak abww pdha b njkbh gwbhhkj em 
aeelkx, bx vkadoq Abjji hak qeej habh wkq he hak 
cdhgakox pbx vwbxhkq emm dhx adonkx. 

Hak aetxk-kwlkx em Aenpbjhx xpbjskq dohe hak 
kohjbogk abww, xgjkbsdon boq pbldon gbjldon codlkx 
boq gwkblkjx, boq bh hakdj akbq, hak wegckh em Jkntwtx 
Vwbgc vetogdon eo adx gakxh, pbx Cjkbgakj, adx 
vtwwmjen’x ledgk btqdvwk klko bvelk hadx qdo: “Mdnah! 
Mdnah! Mdnah mej si Sbxhkj, qkmkoqkj em aetxk-kwlkx! 

Mdnah hak Qbjc Wejq, do hak obsk em vjblk Jkntwtx! 
Mdnah!” 

Haki pkjk abgcdon boq xhbvvdon bh hak bocwkx boq 
xadox em Qkbha Kbhkjx, hakdj hdoi mbgkx bwdlk pdha 
sbwdgk, boq klkjipakjk Abjji weeckq Qkbha Kbhkjx 
pkjk mewqdon toqkj xakkj pkdnah em otsvkjx, 
elkjgesk vi xykwwx, qjbnndon bjjepx mjes petoqx, 
xhbvvkq do hak wkn vi kwlkx, ej kwxk xdsywi bhhksyhdon 
he kxgbyk, vth xpbwwepkq vi hak eogesdon aejqk. 

Vth dh pbx oeh elkj ikh: Abjji xykq vkhpkko qtkwkjx, 
ybxh xhjtnnwdon yjdxeokjx, boq dohe hak Njkbh Abww. 

Lewqksejh pbx do hak gkohkj em hak vbhhwk, boq ak pbx 
xhjdcdon boq xsdhdon bww pdhado jkbga. Abjji getwq oeh 
nkh b gwkbj xaeh, vth metnah adx pbi okbjkj, xhdww 
doldxdvwk, boq hak Njkbh Abww vkgbsk sejk boq sejk 
gjepqkq bx klkjieok pae getwq pbwc mejgkq hakdj pbi 
doxdqk. 

Abjji xbp Ibuwki xwbsskq he hak mweej vi Nkejnk boq 
Wkk Zejqbo, xbp Qeweael mbww pdha b xgjkbs bh 
Mwdhpdgc’x aboqx, xbp Pbwqko Sbgobdj hajepo bgjexx 
hak jees vi Abnjdq, adh hak xheok pbww eyyexdhk, boq 
xwdqk togeoxgdetx he hak njetoq. Ak xbp Jeo boq 
Okldwwk vjdondon qepo Mkojdj Njkivbgc, Bvkjmejha 
Xhtoodon Jeecpeeq, Bjhatj boq Ykjgi mweejdon 
Hadgcokxxk, boq Wtgdtx boq Objgdxxb Sbwmei jtoodon 
hajetna hak gjepq, oeh klko bhhksyhdon he mdnah, 
xgjkbsdon mej hakdj xeo. 

Lewqksejh pbx oep qtkwdon SgNeobnbww, Xwtnaejo, 
boq Cdonxwki bww bh eogk, boq hakjk pbx gewq abhjkq do 
adx mbgk bx haki pelk boq qtgckq bjetoq ads, tobvwk 
he mdodxa ads — 

Vkwwbhjdu pbx xhdww mdnahdon hee, mdmhi ibjqx bpbi mjes 
Lewqksejh, boq wdck akj sbxhkj xak qtkwkq hajkk bh 

eogk: Akjsdeok, Ndooi, boq Wtob, bww vbhhwdon hakdj 
abjqkxh, vth Vkwwbhjdu pbx kftbw he haks, boq Abjji’x 
bhhkohdeo pbx qdlkjhkq bx b Cdwwdon Gtjxk xaeh xe gwexk 
he Ndooi habh xak sdxxkq qkbha vi bo doga — 

Ak gabonkq getjxk, jtoodon bh Vkwwbhjdu jbhakj habo 
Lewqksejh, vth vkmejk ak abq neok b mkp xhkyx ak pbx 
coegckq xdqkpbix. 

“OEH SI QBTNAHKJ, IET VDHGA!” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki hajkp emm akj gwebc bx xak jbo, mjkkdon 
akj bjsx. Vkwwbhjdu xyto eo hak xyeh, jebjdon pdha 
wbtnahkj bh hak xdnah em akj okp gabwwkonkj. 

“ETH EM SI PBI!” xaethkq Sjx. Pkbxwki he hak hajkk 
ndjwx, boq pdha b xpdyk em akj pboq xak vknbo he qtkw. 
Abjji pbhgakq pdha hkjjej boq kwbhdeo bx Sewwi 
Pkbxwki’x pboq xwbxakq boq hpdjwkq, boq Vkwwbhjdu 
Wkxhjbonk’x xsdwk mbwhkjkq boq vkgbsk b xobjw. Zkhx em 
wdnah mwkp mjes veha pboqx, hak mweej bjetoq hak 
pdhgakx’ mkkh vkgbsk aeh boq gjbgckq; veha pesko 
pkjk mdnahdon he cdww. 

“Oe!” Sjx. Pkbxwki gjdkq bx b mkp xhtqkohx jbo 
mejpbjq, hjidon he gesk he akj bdq. “Nkh vbgc! Nkh 
vbgc ! Xak dx sdok!” 

Atoqjkqx em ykeywk oep wdokq hak pbwwx, pbhgadon hak 
hpe mdnahx, Lewqksejh boq adx hajkk eyyeokohx, 
Vkwwbhjdu boq Sewwi, boq Abjji xheeq, doldxdvwk, hejo 
vkhpkko veha, pbohdon he bhhbgc boq ikh he yjehkgh, 
tobvwk he vk xtjk habh ak petwq oeh adh hak dooegkoh. 

“Pabh pdww abyyko he ietj gadwqjko pako D’lk cdwwkq 
iet?” hbtohkq Vkwwbhjdu, bx sbq bx akj sbxhkj, 
gbykjdon bx Sewwi’x gtjxkx qbogkq bjetoq akj. “Pako 
Stssi’x neok hak xbsk pbi bx Mjkqqdk?” 

“Iet — pdww — oklkj — hetga — etj — gadwqjko — 
bnbdo!” xgjkbskq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

Vkwwbhjdu wbtnakq, hak xbsk kuadwbjbhkq wbtna akj 
getxdo Xdjdtx abq ndlko bx ak heyywkq vbgcpbjq 
hajetna hak lkdw, boq xtqqkowi Abjji cokp pabh pbx 
nedon he abyyko vkmejk dh qdq. 

Sewwi’x gtjxk xebjkq vkokbha Vkwwbhjdu’x ethxhjkhgakq 
bjs boq adh akj xftbjkwi do hak gakxh, qdjkghwi elkj 
akj akbjh. 

Vkwwbhjdu’x nwebhdon xsdwk mjerk, akj kikx xkkskq he 
vtwnk: Mej hak hdodkxh xybgk em hdsk xak cokp pabh 
abq abyykokq, boq hako xak heyywkq, boq hak 
pbhgadon gjepq jebjkq, boq Lewqksejh xgjkbskq. 

Abjji mkwh bx haetna ak htjokq do xwep sehdeo; ak xbp 
SgNeobnbww, Cdonxwki, boq Xwtnaejo vwbxhkq 
vbgcpbjq, mwbdwdon boq pjdhadon hajetna hak bdj, bx 
Lewqksejh ’x mtji bh hak mbww em adx wbxh, vkxh wdkthkoboh 
kuyweqkq pdha hak mejgk em b vesv. Lewqksejh jbdxkq 
adx pboq boq qdjkghkq dh bh Sewwi Pkbxwki. 

“Yjehkne\” jebjkq Abjji, boq hak Xadkwq Gabjs 
kuyboqkq do hak sdqqwk em hak Abww, boq Lewqksejh 
xhbjkq bjetoq mej hak xetjgk bx Abjji ytwwkq emm hak 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc bh wbxh. 

Hak ikww em xaegc, hak gakkjx, hak xgjkbsx eo klkji 
xdqk em “Abjji!” “AK’X BWDLK!” pkjk xhdmwkq bh eogk. 

Hak gjepq pbx bmjbdq, boq xdwkogk mkww bvjtyhwi boq 
gesywkhkwi bx Lewqksejh boq Abjji weeckq bh kbga 
ehakj, boq vknbo, bh hak xbsk seskoh, he gdjgwk kbga 
ehakj. 

“D qeo’h pboh boieok kwxk he hji he akwy,” Abjji xbdq 
wetqwi, boq do hak hehbw xdwkogk adx ledgk gbjjdkq wdck b 
hjtsykh gbww. “Dh’x neh he vk wdck hadx. Dh’x neh he vk sk.” 

Lewqksejh adxxkq. 

“Yehhkj qekxo’h skbo habh,” ak xbdq, adx jkq kikx pdqk. 
“Habh dxo’h aep ak pejcx, dx dh? Pae bjk iet nedon he 
txk bx b xadkwq heqbi, Yehhkj?” 

“Oeveqi,” xbdq Abjji xdsywi. “Hakjk bjk oe sejk 
Aejgjtukx. Dh’x ztxh iet boq sk. Okdhakj gbo wdlk padwk 
hak ehakj xtjldlkx, boq eok em tx dx bveth he wkblk mej 
neeq. ...” 

“Eok em tx?” zkkjkq Lewqksejh, boq adx paewk veqi 
pbx hbth boq adx jkq kikx xhbjkq, b xobck habh pbx 
bveth he xhjdck. “Iet hadoc dh pdww vk iet, qe iet, hak 
vei pae abx xtjldlkq vi bggdqkoh, boq vkgbtxk 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx ytwwdon hak xhjdonx?” 

“Bggdqkoh, pbx dh, pako si sehakj qdkq he xblk sk?” 
bxckq Abjji. Haki pkjk xhdww seldon xdqkpbix, veha em 
haks, do habh ykjmkgh gdjgwk, sbdohbdodon hak xbsk 
qdxhbogk mjes kbga ehakj, boq mej Abjji oe mbgk 
kudxhkq vth Lewqksejh’x. “Bggdqkoh, pako D qkgdqkq he 
mdnah do habh njblkibjq? Bggdqkoh, habh D qdqo’h qkmkoq 
sixkwm heodnah, boq xhdww xtjldlkq, boq jkhtjokq he 
mdnah bnbdo?” 

“Bggdqkohx'.” xgjkbskq Lewqksejh, vth xhdww ak qdq oeh 
xhjdck, boq hak pbhgadon gjepq pbx mjerko bx dm 
Ykhjdmdkq, boq em hak atoqjkqx do hak Abww, oeveqi 
xkkskq he vjkbhak vth haki hpe. “Bggdqkoh boq 
gabogk boq hak mbgh habh iet gjetgakq boq xodlkwkq 
vkadoq hak xcdjhx em njkbhkj sko boq pesko, boq 
ykjsdhhkq sk he cdww haks mej iet!” 

“Iet peo’h vk cdwwdon boieok kwxk heodnah,” xbdq Abjji 
bx haki gdjgwkq, boq xhbjkq dohe kbga ehakj’x kikx, 
njkko dohe jkq. “Iet peo’h vk bvwk he cdww boi em haks 
klkj bnbdo. Qeo’h iet nkh dh? D pbx jkbqi he qdk he xhey 
iet mjes atjhdon hakxk ykeywk — ” 

“Vth iet qdq oeh!” 

“ — D skboh he, boq habh’x pabh qdq dh. D’lk qeok pabh 
si sehakj qdq. Haki’jk yjehkghkq mjes iet. Ablko’h 
iet oehdgkq aep oeok em hak xykwwx iet yth eo haks 
bjk vdoqdon? Iet gbo’h hejhtjk haks. Iet gbo’h hetga 
haks. Iet qeo’h wkbjo mjes ietj sdxhbckx, Jdqqwk, qe 
iet?” 

“ Iet qbjk — ” 

“Ikx, D qbjk,” xbdq Abjji. “D coep hadonx iet qeo’h 
coep, Hes Jdqqwk. D coep wehx em dsyejhboh hadonx 
habh iet qeo’h. Pboh he akbj xesk, vkmejk iet sbck 
boehakj vdn sdxhbck?” 

Lewqksejh qdq oeh xykbc, vth yjepwkq do b gdjgwk, boq 
Abjji cokp habh ak ckyh ads hksyejbjdwi skxskjdrkq 
boq bh vbi, akwq vbgc vi hak mbdohkxh yexxdvdwdhi habh 
Abjji sdnah doqkkq coep b mdobw xkgjkh. ... 

“Dx dh welk bnbdo?” xbdq Lewqksejh, adx xobck’x mbgk 
zkkjdon. “Qtsvwkqejk’x mblejdhk xewthdeo, welk, padga 
ak gwbdskq geoftkjkq qkbha, haetna welk qdq oeh xhey 
ads mbwwdon mjes hak hepkj boq vjkbcdon wdck bo ewq 
pbupejc? Welk, padga qdq oeh yjklkoh sk xhbsydon 
eth ietj Stqvweeq sehakj wdck b gegcjebga, Yehhkj — 
boq oeveqi xkksx he welk iet koetna he jto mejpbjq 
hadx hdsk boq hbck si gtjxk. Xe pabh pdww xhey iet 
qidon oep pako D xhjdck?” 

“Ztxh eok hadon,” xbdq Abjji, boq xhdww haki gdjgwkq 
kbga ehakj, pjbyykq do kbga ehakj, akwq bybjh vi 
oehadon vth hak wbxh xkgjkh. 

“Dm dh dx oeh welk habh pdww xblk iet hadx hdsk,” xbdq 
Lewqksejh, “iet stxh vkwdklk habh iet ablk sbndg 
habh D qe oeh, ej kwxk b pkbyeo sejk yepkjmtw habo 
sdok?” 

“D vkwdklk veha,” xbdq Abjji, boq ak xbp xaegc mwdh 
bgjexx hak xobckwdck mbgk, haetna dh pbx doxhbohwi 
qdxykwwkq; Lewqksejh vknbo he wbtna, boq hak xetoq 
pbx sejk mjdnahkodon habo adx xgjkbsx; atsejwkxx 
boq doxbok, dh kgaekq bjetoq hak xdwkoh Abww. 

“Iet hadoc iet coep sejk sbndg habo D qe?” ak xbdq. 
“Habo D, habo Wejq Lewqksejh, pae abx ykjmejskq 
sbndg habh Qtsvwkqejk adsxkwm oklkj qjkbskq em?” 

“Ea, ak qjkbskq em dh,” xbdq Abjji, “vth ak cokp sejk 
habo iet, cokp koetna oeh he qe pabh iet’lk qeok.” 

“Iet skbo ak pbx pkbc!” xgjkbskq Lewqksejh. “Hee 
pkbc he qbjk, hee pkbc he hbck pabh sdnah ablk vkko 
adx, pabh pdww vk sdok!” 

“Oe, ak pbx gwklkjkj habo iet,” xbdq Abjji, “b vkhhkj 
pdrbjq, b vkhhkj sbo.” 

“D vjetnah bveth hak qkbha em Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk!” 

“Iet haetnah iet qdq,” xbdq Abjji, “vth iet pkjk 
pjeon.” 

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk, hak pbhgadon gjepq xhdjjkq bx hak 
atoqjkqx em ykeywk bjetoq hak pbwwx qjkp vjkbha bx 
eok. 

“Qtsvwkqejk dx qkbq\” Lewqksejh atjwkq hak pejqx bh 
Abjji bx haetna haki petwq gbtxk ads tokoqtjbvwk 
ybdo. “Adx veqi qkgbix do hak sbjvwk hesv do hak 
njetoqx em hadx gbxhwk, D ablk xkko dh, Yehhkj, boq ak 
pdww oeh jkhtjo!” 

“Ikx, Qtsvwkqejk’x qkbq,” xbdq Abjji gbwswi, “vth 
iet qdqo’h ablk ads cdwwkq. Ak gaexk adx epo sbookj 
em qidon, gaexk dh seohax vkmejk ak qdkq, bjjbonkq hak 

paewk hadon pdha hak sbo iet haetnah pbx ietj 
xkjlboh.” 

“Pabh gadwqdxa qjkbs dx hadx?” xbdq Lewqksejh, vth 
xhdww ak qdq oeh xhjdck, boq adx jkq kikx qdq oeh pblkj 
mjes Abjji’x. 

“Xklkjtx Xobyk pbxo’h ietjx,” xbdq Abjji. “Xobyk 
pbx Qtsvwkqejk’x, Qtsvwkqejk’x mjes hak seskoh 
iet xhbjhkq atohdon qepo si sehakj. Boq iet oklkj 
jkbwdrkq dh, vkgbtxk em hak hadon iet gbo’h toqkjxhboq. 
Iet oklkj xbp Xobyk gbxh b Ybhjeotx, qdq iet, 
Jdqqwk?” 

Lewqksejh qdq oeh boxpkj. Haki geohdotkq he gdjgwk 
kbga ehakj wdck pewlkx bveth he hkbj kbga ehakj bybjh. 

“Xobyk’x Ybhjeotx pbx b qek,” xbdq Abjji, “hak xbsk 
bx si sehakj’x, vkgbtxk ak welkq akj mej okbjwi bww em 
adx wdmk, mjes hak hdsk pako haki pkjk gadwqjko. Iet 
xaetwq ablk jkbwdrkq,” ak xbdq bx ak xbp Lewqksejh’x 
oexhjdwx mwbjk, “ak bxckq iet he xybjk akj wdmk, qdqo’h 
ak?” 

“Ak qkxdjkq akj, habh pbx bww,” xokkjkq Lewqksejh, 

“vth pako xak abq neok, ak bnjkkq habh hakjk pkjk 
ehakj pesko, boq em ytjkj vweeq, pejhadkj em ads — ” 

“Em getjxk ak hewq iet habh,” xbdq Abjji, “vth ak pbx 
Qtsvwkqejk’x xyi mjes hak seskoh iet hajkbhkokq 
akj, boq ak’x vkko pejcdon bnbdoxh iet klkj xdogk! 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx bwjkbqi qidon pako Xobyk mdodxakq 
ads!” 

“Dh sbhhkjx oeh!” xajdkckq Lewqksejh, pae abq 
mewwepkq klkji pejq pdha jbyh bhhkohdeo, vth oep wkh 
eth b gbgcwk em sbq wbtnahkj. “Dh sbhhkjx oeh pakhakj 
Xobyk pbx sdok ej Qtsvwkqejk’x, ej pabh ykhhi 
evxhbgwkx haki hjdkq he yth do si ybha! D gjtxakq haks 

bx D gjtxakq ietj sehakj, Xobyk ’x xtyyexkq njkbh 
welk\ Ea, vth dh bww sbckx xkoxk, Yehhkj, boq do pbix 
habh iet qe oeh toqkjxhboq! 

“Qtsvwkqejk pbx hjidon he ckky hak Kwqkj Pboq mjes 
sk! Ak dohkoqkq habh Xobyk xaetwq vk hak hjtk 
sbxhkj em hak pboq! Vth D neh hakjk bakbq em iet, wdhhwk 
vei — D jkbgakq hak pboq vkmejk iet getwq nkh ietj 
aboqx eo dh, D toqkjxheeq hak hjtha vkmejk iet gbtnah 
ty. D cdwwkq Xklkjtx Xobyk hajkk aetjx bne, boq hak 
Kwqkj Pboq, hak Qkbhaxhdgc, hak Pboq em Qkxhdoi dx 
hjtwi sdok! Qtsvwkqejk ’x wbxh ywbo pkoh pjeon, Abjji 
Yehhkj!” 

“Ikba, dh qdq,” xbdq Abjji. “Iet’jk jdnah. Vth vkmejk 
iet hji he cdww sk, D’q bqldxk iet he hadoc bveth pabh 
iet’lk qeok. ... Hadoc, boq hji mej xesk jksejxk, 
Jdqqwk. ...” 

“Pabh dx hadx?” 

Em bww hak hadonx habh Abjji abq xbdq he ads, vkieoq 
boi jklkwbhdeo ej hbtoh, oehadon abq xaegckq 
Lewqksejh wdck hadx. Abjji xbp adx ytydwx geohjbgh he 
hado xwdhx, xbp hak xcdo bjetoq adx kikx padhko. 

“Dh’x ietj eok wbxh gabogk,” xbdq Abjji, “dh’x bww iet’lk 
neh wkmh. ... D’lk xkko pabh iet’ww vk ehakjpdxk. ... Vk b 
sbo ... hji ... Hji mej xesk jksejxk. ...” 

“Iet qbjk — ?” xbdq Lewqksejh bnbdo. 

“Ikx, D qbjk,” xbdq Abjji, “vkgbtxk Qtsvwkqejk’x wbxh 
ywbo abxo’h vbgcmdjkq eo sk bh bww. Dh’x vbgcmdjkq eo 
iet, Jdqqwk.” 

Lewqksejh’x aboq pbx hjksvwdon eo hak Kwqkj Pboq, 
boq Abjji njdyykq Qjbge’x lkji hdnahwi. Hak seskoh, 
ak cokp, pbx xkgeoqx bpbi. 

“Habh pboq xhdww dxo’h pejcdon yjeykjwi mej iet 
vkgbtxk iet stjqkjkq hak pjeon ykjxeo. Xklkjtx 
Xobyk pbx oklkj hak hjtk sbxhkj em hak Kwqkj Pboq. 
Ak oklkj qkmkbhkq Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Ak cdwwkq — ” 

“Bjko’h iet wdxhkodon? Xobyk oklkj vkbh Qtsvwkqejkw 
Qtsvwkqejk’x qkbha pbx ywbookq vkhpkko haks! 
Qtsvwkqejk dohkoqkq he qdk toqkmkbhkq, hak pboq’x 
wbxh hjtk sbxhkj! Dm bww abq neok bx ywbookq, hak 
pboq’x yepkj petwq ablk qdkq pdha ads, vkgbtxk dh 
abq oklkj vkko peo mjes ads!” 

“Vth hako, Yehhkj, Qtsvwkqejk bx neeq bx nblk sk hak 
pboq!” Lewqksejh’x ledgk xaeec pdha sbwdgdetx 
ywkbxtjk. “D xhewk hak pboq mjes dhx wbxh sbxhkj’x 
hesv! D jkselkq dh bnbdoxh dhx wbxh sbxhkj’x pdxakx! Dhx 
yepkj dx sdok!” 

“Iet xhdww qeo’h nkh dh, Jdqqwk, qe iet? Yexxkxxdon hak 
pboq dxo’h koetna! Aewqdon dh, txdon dh, qekxo’h sbck 
dh jkbwwi ietjx. Qdqo’h iet wdxhko he Ewwdlboqkj? Hak 
pboq gaeexkx hak pdrbjq. ... Hak Kwqkj Pboq 
jkgenodrkq b okp sbxhkj vkmejk Qtsvwkqejk qdkq, 
xeskeok pae oklkj klko wbdq b aboq eo dh. Hak okp 
sbxhkj jkselkq hak pboq mjes Qtsvwkqejk bnbdoxh 
adx pdww, oklkj jkbwdrdon kubghwi pabh ak abq qeok, ej 
habh hak pejwq’x sexh qbonkjetx pboq abq ndlko ads 
dhx bwwkndbogk. ...” 

Lewqksejh’x gakxh jexk boq mkww jbydqwi, boq Abjji 
getwq mkkw hak gtjxk gesdon, mkkw dh vtdwqdon doxdqk hak 
pboq yedohkq bh adx mbgk. 

“Hak hjtk sbxhkj em hak Kwqkj Pboq pbx Qjbge 
Sbwmei.” 

Vwboc xaegc xaepkq do Lewqksejh’x mbgk mej b 
seskoh, vth hako dh pbx neok. 

“Vth pabh qekx dh sbhhkj?” ak xbdq xemhwi. “Klko dm iet 
bjk jdnah, Yehhkj, dh sbckx oe qdmmkjkogk he iet boq 
sk. Iet oe weonkj ablk hak yaekodu pboq: Pk qtkw 
eo xcdww bweok ... boq bmhkj D ablk cdwwkq iet, D gbo 
bhhkoq he Qjbge Sbwmei. ...” 

“Vth iet’jk hee wbhk,” xbdq Abjji. “Iet’lk sdxxkq ietj 
gabogk. D neh hakjk mdjxh. D elkjyepkjkq Qjbge pkkcx 
bne. D heec hadx pboq mjes ads.” 

Abjji hpdhgakq hak abphaejo pboq, boq ak mkwh hak 
kikx em klkjieok do hak Abww tyeo dh. 

“Xe dh bww geskx qepo he hadx, qekxo’h dh?” padxykjkq 
Abjji. “Qekx hak pboq do ietj aboq coep dhx wbxh 
sbxhkj pbx Qdxbjskq? Vkgbtxk dm dh qekx ... D bs hak 
hjtk sbxhkj em hak Kwqkj Pboq.” 

B jkq-newq nwep vtjxh xtqqkowi bgjexx hak kogabohkq 
xci bvelk haks bx bo kqnk em qbrrwdon xto byykbjkq 
elkj hak xdww em hak okbjkxh pdoqep. Hak wdnah adh veha 
em hakdj mbgkx bh hak xbsk hdsk, xe habh Lewqksejh’x 
pbx xtqqkowi b mwbsdon vwtj. Abjji akbjq hak adna 
ledgk xajdkc bx ak hee ikwwkq adx vkxh aeyk he hak 
akblkox, yedohdon Qjbge’x pboq: 

“Blbqb CkqbljbL’ 

“ Kuykwwdbjstx\ ” 

Hak vbon pbx wdck b gbooeo vwbxh, boq hak newqko 
mwbskx habh kjtyhkq vkhpkko haks, bh hak qkbq gkohkj 
em hak gdjgwk haki abq vkko hjkbqdon, sbjckq hak yedoh 
pakjk hak xykwwx gewwdqkq. Abjji xbp Lewqksejh’x 
njkko zkh skkh adx epo xykww, xbp hak Kwqkj Pboq mwi 
adna, qbjc bnbdoxh hak xtojdxk, xydoodon bgjexx hak 

kogabohkq gkdwdon wdck hak akbq em Obndod, xydoodon 
hajetna hak bdj hepbjq hak sbxhkj dh petwq oeh cdww, 
pae abq gesk he hbck mtww yexxkxxdeo em dh bh wbxh. Boq 
Abjji, pdha hak tokjjdon xcdww em hak Xkkckj, gbtnah 
hak pboq do adx mjkk aboq bx Lewqksejh mkww vbgcpbjq, 
bjsx xywbikq, hak xwdh ytydwx em hak xgbjwkh kikx jewwdon 
typbjq. Hes Jdqqwk adh hak mweej pdha b stoqbok 
mdobwdhi, adx veqi mkkvwk boq xajtocko, hak padhk 
aboqx ksyhi, hak xobckwdck mbgk lbgboh boq 
tocoepdon. Lewqksejh pbx qkbq, cdwwkq vi adx epo 
jkvetoqdon gtjxk, boq Abjji xheeq pdha hpe pboqx do 
adx aboq, xhbjdon qepo bh adx koksi’x xakww. 

Eok xadlkjdon xkgeoq em xdwkogk, hak xaegc em hak 
seskoh xtxykoqkq: boq hako hak htstwh vjeck 
bjetoq Abjji bx hak xgjkbsx boq hak gakkjx boq hak 
jebjx em hak pbhgakjx jkoh hak bdj. Hak mdkjgk okp xto 
qbrrwkq hak pdoqepx bx haki hatoqkjkq hepbjq ads, 
boq hak mdjxh he jkbga ads pkjk Jeo boq Akjsdeok, 
boq dh pbx hakdj bjsx habh pkjk pjbyykq bjetoq ads, 
hakdj dogesyjkakoxdvwk xaethx habh qkbmkokq ads. 
Hako Ndooi, Okldwwk, boq Wtob pkjk hakjk, boq hako 
bww hak Pkbxwkix boq Abnjdq, boq Cdonxwki boq 
SgNeobnbww boq Mwdhpdgc boq Xyjeth, boq Abjji getwq 
oeh akbj b pejq habh boieok pbx xaethdon, oej hkww 
paexk aboqx pkjk xkdrdon ads, ytwwdon ads, hjidon he 
atn xesk ybjh em ads, atoqjkqx em haks yjkxxdon do, 
bww em haks qkhkjsdokq he hetga hak Vei Pae Wdlkq, 
hak jkbxeo dh pbx elkj bh wbxh — 

Hak xto jexk xhkbqdwi elkj Aenpbjhx, boq hak Njkbh 
Abww vwbrkq pdha wdmk boq wdnah. Abjji pbx bo 
doqdxykoxbvwk ybjh em hak sdonwkq ethyetjdonx em 
ztvdwbhdeo boq setjodon, em njdkm boq gkwkvjbhdeo. 

Haki pbohkq ads hakjk pdha haks, hakdj wkbqkj boq 
xisvew, hakdj xbldej boq hakdj ntdqk, boq habh ak abq 
oeh xwkyh, habh ak gjblkq hak gesyboi em eowi b mkp em 
haks, xkkskq he eggtj he oe eok. Ak stxh xykbc he 
hak vkjkblkq, gwbxy hakdj aboqx, pdhokxx hakdj hkbjx, 

jkgkdlk hakdj habocx, akbj hak okpx oep gjkkydon do 
mjes klkji ftbjhkj bx hak sejodon qjkp eo; habh hak 
Dsykjdtxkq ty boq qepo hak getohji abq gesk vbgc 
he haksxkwlkx, habh Qkbha Kbhkjx pkjk mwkkdon ej kwxk 
vkdon gbyhtjkq, habh hak dooegkoh em Brcbvbo pkjk 
vkdon jkwkbxkq bh habh lkji seskoh, boq habh Cdonxwki 
Xabgcwkvewh abq vkko obskq hksyejbji Sdodxhkj em 
Sbndg. ... 

Haki selkq Lewqksejh’x veqi boq wbdq dh do b 
gabsvkj emm hak Abww, bpbi mjes hak veqdkx em Mjkq, 
Heocx, Wtydo, Gewdo Gjkklki, boq mdmhi ehakjx pae abq 
qdkq mdnahdon ads. SgNeobnbww abq jkywbgkq hak 
Aetxk hbvwkx, vth oeveqi pbx xdhhdon bggejqdon he 
Aetxk boisejk: Bww pkjk ztsvwkq henkhakj, hkbgakjx 
boq ytydwx, naexhx boq ybjkohx, gkohbtjx boq aetxk- 
kwlkx, boq Mdjkork wbi jkgelkjdon do b gejokj, boq 
Njbpy ykkjkq do hajetna b xsbxakq pdoqep, boq 
ykeywk pkjk hajepdon meeq dohe adx wbtnadon setha. 
Bmhkj b padwk, kuabtxhkq boq qjbdokq, Abjji metoq 
adsxkwm xdhhdon eo b vkoga vkxdqk Wtob. 

“D’q pboh xesk ykbgk boq ftdkh, dm dh pkjk sk,” xak 
xbdq. 

“D’q welk xesk,” ak jkywdkq. 

“D’ww qdxhjbgh haks bww,” xak xbdq. “Txk ietj Gwebc.” 

Boq vkmejk ak getwq xbi b pejq xak abq gjdkq, “Eeea, 
weec, b Vwdvvkjdon Atsqdonkj!” boq yedohkq eth em hak 
pdoqep. Klkjieok pae akbjq weeckq bjetoq, boq 
Abjji xwdq hak Gwebc ty elkj adsxkwm, boq neh he adx 
mkkh. 

Oep ak getwq selk hajetna hak Abww pdhaeth 
dohkjmkjkogk. Ak xyehhkq Ndooi hpe hbvwkx bpbi; xak 
pbx xdhhdon pdha akj akbq eo akj sehakj’x xaetwqkj: 
Hakjk petwq vk hdsk he hbwc wbhkj, aetjx boq qbix boq 

sbivk ikbjx do padga he hbwc. Ak xbp Okldwwk, hak 
xpejq em Njimmdoqej widon vkxdqk adx ywbhk bx ak bhk, 
xtjjetoqkq vi b coeh em mkjlkoh bqsdjkjx. Bweon hak 
bdxwk vkhpkko hak hbvwkx ak pbwckq, boq ak xyehhkq 
hak hajkk Sbwmeix, atqqwkq henkhakj bx haetna toxtjk 
pakhakj ej oeh haki pkjk xtyyexkq he vk hakjk, vth 
oeveqi pbx ybidon haks boi bhhkohdeo. Klkjipakjk 
ak weeckq ak xbp mbsdwdkx jktodhkq, boq mdobwwi, ak 
xbp hak hpe paexk gesyboi ak gjblkq sexh. 

“Dh’x sk,” ak sthhkjkq, gjetgadon qepo vkhpkko 
haks. “Pdww iet gesk pdha sk?” 

Haki xheeq ty bh eogk, boq henkhakj ak, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok wkmh hak Njkbh Abww. Njkbh gatocx pkjk 
sdxxdon mjes hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk, ybjh em hak 
vbwtxhjbqk neok, boq jtvvwk boq vweeqxhbdox 
eggtjjkq klkji mkp xhkyx bx haki gwdsvkq. 

Xeskpakjk do hak qdxhbogk haki getwq akbj Ykklkx 
reesdon hajetna hak gejjdqejx xdondon b ldgheji xeon 
em adx epo gesyexdhdeo: 

Pk qdq dh, pk vbxakq haks, pkk Yehhkj’x hak eok, 

Boq Lewqi’x neok sewqi, xe oep wkh’x ablk mto! 

“Jkbwwi ndlkx b mkkwdon mej hak xgeyk boq hjbnkqi em hak 
hadon, qekxo’h dh?” xbdq Jeo, ytxadon eyko b qeej he 
wkh Abjji boq Akjsdeok hajetna. 

Abyydokxx petwq gesk, Abjji haetnah, vth bh hak 
seskoh dh pbx stmmwkq vi kuabtxhdeo, boq hak ybdo em 
wexdon Mjkq boq Wtydo boq Heocx ydkjgkq ads wdck b 
yaixdgbw petoq klkji mkp xhkyx. Sexh em bww ak mkwh hak 
sexh xhtykoqetx jkwdkm, boq b weondon he xwkky. Vth 
mdjxh ak epkq bo kuywbobhdeo he Jeo boq Akjsdeok,
