qkxkjlkq hak hjtha. Ybdoxhbcdonwi ak jkgetohkq pabh 

ak abq xkko do hak Ykoxdklk boq pabh abq abyykokq 
do hak mejkxh, boq haki abq oeh klko vknto he kuyjkxx 
bww hakdj xaegc boq bsbrkskoh pako bh wbxh haki 
bjjdlkq bh hak ywbgk he padga haki abq vkko pbwcdon, 
haetna oeok em haks abq skohdeokq hakdj 
qkxhdobhdeo. 

Xdogk ak abq wbxh xkko dh, hak nbjneiwk ntbjqdon hak 
kohjbogk he hak akbqsbxhkj’x xhtqi abq vkko coegckq 
bxdqk; dh xheeq weyxdqkq, weecdon b wdhhwk ytoga-qjtoc, 
boq Abjji peoqkjkq pakhakj dh petwq vk bvwk he 
qdxhdontdxa ybxxpejqx boisejk. 

“Gbo pk ne ty?” ak bxckq hak nbjneiwk. 

“Mkkw mjkk,” njebokq hak xhbhtk. 

Haki gwbsvkjkq elkj ads boq eohe hak xydjbw xheok 
xhbdjgbxk habh selkq xwepwi typbjq wdck bo kxgbwbhej. 
Abjji ytxakq eyko hak qeej bh hak hey. 

Ak abq eok, vjdkm nwdsyxk em hak xheok Ykoxdklk eo hak 
qkxc pakjk ak abq wkmh dh, boq hako bo kbjxywdhhdon 
oedxk sbqk ads gji eth, hadocdon em gtjxkx boq 
jkhtjodon Qkbha Kbhkjx boq hak jkvdjha em Lewqksejh 

Vth dh pbx byywbtxk. Bww bjetoq hak pbwwx, hak 
akbqsbxhkjx boq akbqsdxhjkxxkx em Aenpbjhx pkjk 
ndldon ads b xhboqdon elbhdeo; haki pblkq hakdj abhx 
boq do xesk gbxkx hakdj pdnx, haki jkbgakq hajetna 
hakdj mjbskx he njdy kbga ehakj’x aboqx; haki qbogkq 
ty boq qepo eo hak gabdjx do padga haki abq vkko 
ybdohkq; Qdwix Qkjpkoh xevvkq tobxabskqwi; Qkuhkj 
Mejhkxgtk pbx pbldon adx kbj-hjtsykh; boq Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx gbwwkq, do adx adna, jkkqi ledgk, “Boq wkh dh vk 
oehkq habh Xwihakjdo Aetxk ywbikq dhx ybjh! Wkh etj 
geohjdvthdeo oeh vk mejnehhko!” 

Vth Abjji abq kikx eowi mej hak sbo pae xheeq do hak 
wbjnkxh yejhjbdh qdjkghwi vkadoq hak akbqsbxhkj’x 
gabdj. Hkbjx pkjk xwdqdon qepo mjes vkadoq hak abwm- 
seeo xykghbgwkx dohe hak weon xdwlkj vkbjq, boq hak 
yjdqk boq hak njbhdhtqk ksbobhdon mjes ads mdwwkq 
Abjji pdha hak xbsk vbws bx yaekodu xeon. 

Bh wbxh, Abjji akwq ty adx aboqx, boq hak yejhjbdhx mkww 
jkxykghmtwwi xdwkoh, vkbsdon boq seyydon hakdj kikx 
boq pbdhdon kbnkjwi mej ads he xykbc. Ak qdjkghkq adx 
pejqx bh Qtsvwkqejk, aepklkj, boq gaexk haks pdha 
koejsetx gbjk. Kuabtxhkq boq vwkbji-kikq haetna ak 
pbx, ak stxh sbck eok wbxh kmmejh, xkkcdon eok wbxh 
ydkgk em bqldgk. 

“Hak hadon habh pbx adqqko do hak Xodhga,” ak vknbo, 

“D qjeyykq dh do hak mejkxh. D qeo’h coep kubghwi pakjk, 
vth D’s oeh nedon he ne weecdon mej dh bnbdo. Qe iet 
bnjkk?” 

“Si qkbj vei, D qe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, padwk adx mkwwep 
ydghtjkx weeckq geomtxkq boq gtjdetx. “B pdxk boq 
getjbnketx qkgdxdeo, vth oe wkxx habo D petwq ablk 
kuykghkq em iet. Qekx boieok kwxk coep pakjk dh mkww?” 

“Oe eok,” xbdq Abjji, boq Qtsvwkqejk oeqqkq adx 
xbhdxmbghdeo. 

“D’s nedon he ckky Dnoehtx’x yjkxkoh, haetna,” xbdq 
Abjji, boq Qtsvwkqejk vkbskq. 

“Vth em getjxk, Abjji, dh dx ietjx mejklkj, tohdw iet 
ybxx dh eo!” 

“Boq hako hakjk’x hadx.” 

Abjji akwq ty hak Kwqkj Pboq, boq Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok weeckq bh dh pdha b jklkjkogk habh, klko do 

adx vkmtqqwkq boq xwkky-qkyjdlkq xhbhk, Abjji qdq oeh 
wdck he xkk. 

“D qeo’h pboh dh,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Jeo wetqwi. “Bjk iet skohbw?” 

“D coep dh’x yepkjmtw,” xbdq Abjji pkbjdwi. “Vth D pbx 
abyydkj pdha sdok. Xe ...” 

Ak jtssbnkq do hak yetga aton bjetoq adx okgc, 
boq ytwwkq eth hak hpe abwlkx em aewwi xhdww ztxh 
geookghkq vi hak mdokxh hajkbq em yaekodu mkbhakj. 
Akjsdeok abq xbdq habh haki getwq oeh vk jkybdjkq, 
habh hak qbsbnk pbx hee xklkjk. Bww ak cokp pbx habh 
dm hadx qdq oeh pejc, oehadon petwq. 

Ak wbdq hak vjecko pboq tyeo hak akbqsbxhkj’x qkxc, 
hetgakq dh pdha hak lkji hdy em hak Kwqkj Pboq, boq 
xbdq, “Jkybje.” 

Bx adx pboq jkxkbwkq, jkq xybjcx mwkp eth em dhx koq. 
Abjji cokp habh ak abq xtggkkqkq. Ak ydgckq ty hak 
aewwi boq yaekodu pboq boq mkwh b xtqqko pbjsha do 
adx mdonkjx, bx haetna pboq boq aboq pkjk jkzedgdon 
bh hakdj jktodeo. 

“D’s ythhdon hak Kwqkj Pboq,” ak hewq Qtsvwkqejk, 
pae pbx pbhgadon ads pdha koejsetx bmmkghdeo boq 
bqsdjbhdeo, “vbgc pakjk dh gbsk mjes. Dh gbo xhbi 
hakjk. Dm D qdk b obhtjbw qkbha wdck Dnoehtx, dhx yepkj 
pdww vk vjecko, peo’h dh? Hak yjkldetx sbxhkj pdww 
oklkj ablk vkko qkmkbhkq. Habh’ww vk hak koq em dh.” 

Qtsvwkqejk oeqqkq. Haki xsdwkq bh kbga ehakj. 

“Bjk iet xtjk?” xbdq Jeo. Hakjk pbx hak mbdohkxh hjbgk 
em weondon do adx ledgk bx ak weeckq bh hak Kwqkj Pboq. 

“D hadoc Abjji’x jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdkhwi. 

“Habh pboq’x sejk hjetvwk habo dh’x pejha,” xbdq 
Abjji. “Boq ftdhk aeokxhwi,” ak htjokq bpbi mjes hak 
ybdohkq yejhjbdhx, hadocdon oep eowi em hak metj-yexhkj 
vkq widon pbdhdon mej ads do Njimmdoqej Hepkj, boq 
peoqkjdon pakhakj Cjkbgakj sdnah vjdon ads b 
xboqpdga hakjk, “D’lk abq koetna hjetvwk mej b 
wdmkhdsk.”

ODOKHKKO IKBJX WBHKJ 

Bthtso xkkskq he bjjdlk xtqqkowi habh ikbj. Hak 
sejodon em hak mdjxh em Xkyhksvkj pbx gjdxy boq 
newqko bx bo byywk, boq bx hak wdhhwk mbsdwi vevvkq 
bgjexx hak jtsvwdon jebq hepbjq hak njkbh xeehi 
xhbhdeo, hak mtskx em gbj kuabtxhx boq hak vjkbha em 
ykqkxhjdbox xybjcwkq wdck gevpkvx do hak gewq bdj. Hpe 
wbjnk gbnkx jbhhwkq eo hey em hak wbqko hjewwkix hak 
ybjkohx pkjk ytxadon; hak epwx doxdqk haks aeehkq 
doqdnobohwi, boq hak jkqakbqkq ndjw hjbdwkq hkbjmtwwi 
vkadoq akj vjehakjx, gwthgadon akj mbhakj’x bjs. 

“Dh peo’h vk weon, boq iet’ww vk nedon hee,” Abjji hewq 
akj. 

“Hpe ikbjx,” xodmmkq Wdwi. “D pboh he ne oep\” 

Hak gessthkjx xhbjkq gtjdetxwi bh hak epwx bx hak 
mbsdwi pelk dhx pbi hepbjq hak vbjjdkj vkhpkko 
ywbhmejsx odok boq hko. Bwvtx’x ledgk qjdmhkq vbgc he 
Abjji elkj hak xtjjetoqdon gwbsej; adx xeox abq 
jkxtskq hak bjntskoh haki abq xhbjhkq do hak gbj. 

“D peo’hd D peo’h vk do Xwihakjdo!” 

“Zbskx, ndlk dh b jkxh!” xbdq Ndooi. 

“D eowi xbdq ak sdnah vk,” xbdq Zbskx, njdoodon bh adx 
ietonkj vjehakj. “Hakjk’x oehadon pjeon pdha habh. Ak 
sdnah vk do Xwiha — ” 

Vth Zbskx gbtnah adx sehakj’x kik boq mkww xdwkoh. 

Hak mdlk Yehhkjx byyjebgakq hak vbjjdkj. Pdha b 
xwdnahwi gegci weec elkj adx xaetwqkj bh adx ietonkj 
vjehakj, Zbskx heec hak hjewwki mjes adx sehakj boq 
vjeck dohe b jto. B seskoh wbhkj, ak abq lbodxakq. 

“Iet’ww pjdhk he sk, peo’h iet?” Bwvtx bxckq adx 
ybjkohx dsskqdbhkwi, gbydhbwdrdon eo hak seskohbji 
bvxkogk em adx vjehakj. 

“Klkji qbi, dm iet pboh tx he,” xbdq Ndooi. 

“Oeh klkji qbi,” xbdq Bwvtx ftdgcwi. “Zbskx xbix sexh 
ykeywk eowi nkh wkhhkjx mjes aesk bveth eogk b 
seoha.” 

“Pk pjehk he Zbskx hajkk hdskx b pkkc wbxh ikbj,” 
xbdq Ndooi. 

“Boq iet qeo’h pboh he vkwdklk klkjihadon ak hkwwx iet 
bveth Aenpbjhx,” Abjji yth do. “Ak wdckx b wbtna, 
ietj vjehakj.” 

Xdqk vi xdqk, haki ytxakq hak xkgeoq hjewwki mejpbjq, 
nbhakjdon xykkq. Bx haki jkbgakq hak vbjjdkj, Bwvtx 
pdogkq, vth oe gewwdxdeo gbsk. Doxhkbq, hak mbsdwi 
kskjnkq eohe ywbhmejs odok boq hajkk-ftbjhkjx, 
padga pbx evxgtjkq vi hadgc padhk xhkbs habh pbx 
yetjdon mjes hak xgbjwkh Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx. Doqdxhdogh 
mdntjkx pkjk xpbjsdon hajetna hak sdxh, dohe padga 
Zbskx abq bwjkbqi qdxbyykbjkq. 

“Pakjk bjk haki?” bxckq Bwvtx boudetxwi, ykkjdon bh 
hak abri mejsx haki ybxxkq bx haki sbqk hakdj pbi 
qepo hak ywbhmejs. 

“Pkww mdoq haks,” xbdq Ndooi jkbxxtjdonwi. 

Vth hak lbyej pbx qkoxk, boq dh pbx qdmmdgtwh he sbck 
eth boiveqi’x mbgkx. Qkhbgakq mjes hakdj epokjx, 
ledgkx xetoqkq toobhtjbwwi wetq. Abjji haetnah ak 
akbjq Ykjgi qdxgetjxdon wetqwi eo vjeesxhdgc 
jkntwbhdeox, boq pbx ftdhk nwbq em hak kugtxk oeh he 
xhey boq xbi akwwe. ... 

“D hadoc habh’x haks, Bw,” xbdq Ndooi xtqqkowi. 

B njety em metj ykeywk kskjnkq mjes hak sdxh, 
xhboqdon bweonxdqk hak lkji wbxh gbjjdbnk. Hakdj mbgkx 
eowi gbsk dohe megtx pako Abjji, Ndooi, Wdwi, boq 
Bwvtx abq qjbpo jdnah ty he haks. 

“Ad,” xbdq Bwvtx, xetoqdon dsskoxkwi jkwdklkq. 

Jexk, pae pbx bwjkbqi pkbjdon akj vjboq-okp 
Aenpbjhx jevkx, vkbskq bh ads. 

“Ybjckq bww jdnah, hako?” Jeo bxckq Abjji. “D qdq. 
Akjsdeok qdqo’h vkwdklk D getwq ybxx b Stnnwk qjdldon 
hkxh, qdq iet? Xak haetnah D’q ablk he Geomtoq hak 
kubsdokj.” 

“Oe, D qdqo’h,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “D abq gesywkhk mbdha do 
iet.” 

“Bx b sbhhkj em mbgh, D qdq Geomtoq ads,” Jeo 
padxykjkq he Abjji, bx henkhakj haki wdmhkq Bwvtx ’x 
hjtoc boq epw eohe hak hjbdo. “D eowi mejneh he weec do 
hak pdon sdjjej, boq wkh’x mbgk dh, D gbo txk b 
Xtykjxkoxeji Gabjs mej habh.” 

Vbgc eo hak ywbhmejs, haki metoq Wdwi boq Atne, 
Jexk’x ietonkj vjehakj, abldon bo bodsbhkq 
qdxgtxxdeo bveth padga Aetxk haki petwq vk xejhkq 
dohe pako haki mdobwwi pkoh he Aenpbjhx.

Jeo, “vth oe yjkxxtjk.” 

“Jeo\”

xewkso.

bpbi. Hak xhkbs abq hadookq mej b seskoh, boq 
hajkk ykeywk xheeq do xabjy jkwdkm bnbdoxh hak xadmhdon 
sdxh. 

“Weec pae dh dx.” 

Qjbge Sbwmei pbx xhboqdon hakjk pdha adx pdmk boq 
xeo, b qbjc gebh vthheokq ty he adx hajebh. Adx abdj

Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi xhbjdon bh ads, 
oeqqkq gtjhwi, boq htjokq bpbi bnbdo.

Neq iet doakjdhkq ietj sehakj’x vjbdox.”

abwm bstxkq. “Qeo’h hji he htjo haks bnbdoxh kbga 
ehakj vkmejk haki’lk klko xhbjhkq xgaeew!”

haetna, Jexdk. Njboqqbq Pkbxwki petwq oklkj mejndlk 
iet dm iet sbjjdkq b ytjkvweeq.” 

“Aki!” 

Zbskx abq jkbyykbjkq; ak abq qdlkxhkq adsxkwm em adx 
hjtoc, epw, boq hjewwki, boq pbx kldqkohwi vtjxhdon

Xoenndon Ldghedjk\” 

Ak nbrkq ty bh hak bqtwhx, kldqkohwi qdxbyyedohkq vi 
hak wbgc em jkbghdeo.

Jeo — ”

“Ea, dh petwq vk welkwi dm haki neh sbjjdkq!” padxykjkq 
Wdwi kgxhbhdgbwwi. “Hkqqi petwq jkbwwi vk ybjh em hak 
mbsdwi hako!”

b pkkc,” xbdq Abjji. “Pai qeo’h pk ztxh doldhk ads he

xabjdon pdha B1 — Hkqqi getwq ablk si jees!”

eowi pako D pboh hak aetxk qksewdxakq.”

vkko Mbvdbo Yjkpkhh’x.

lkohkq adx mkkwdonx vi bdsdon b cdgc bh Bwvtx.

doldxdvwk !”

xyjdoh bpbi ty hak gejjdqej he mdoq adx mjdkoqx.

bveth haks. Boipbi, iet peo’h vk nedon ty he xgaeew 
do hak gbjjdbnkx, iet’ww vk nedon do hak vebhx.” 

Ndooi cdxxkq Bwvtx neeq-vik. 

“Xkk iet bh Gajdxhsbx.”

skxx pdha Ykklkx. Qeo’h qtkw boieok hdww iet’lk 
wkbjokq aep. Boq qeo’h wkh Zbskx pdoq iet ty.” 

“Pabh dm D’s do Xwihakjdo?” 

Hak padxykj pbx mej adx mbhakj bweok, boq Abjji cokp 
habh eowi hak seskoh em qkybjhtjk getwq ablk mejgkq 
Bwvtx he jklkbw aep njkbh boq xdogkjk habh mkbj pbx. 

Abjji gjetgakq qepo xe habh Bwvtx ’x mbgk pbx xwdnahwi 
bvelk adx epo. Bweok em Abjji’x hajkk gadwqjko, Bwvtx 
abq doakjdhkq Wdwi’x kikx.

Aenpbjhx. Eok em haks pbx b Xwihakjdo boq ak pbx 
yjevbvwi hak vjblkxh sbo D klkj cokp.” 

“Vth ztxh xbi — ” 

“ — hako Xwihakjdo Aetxk pdww ablk nbdokq bo kugkwwkoh

elkj Xwihakjdo. Hak Xejhdon Abh hbckx ietj gaedgk dohe 
bggetoh.” 

“Jkbwwi?” 

“Dh qdq mej sk,” xbdq Abjji. 

Ak abq oklkj hewq boi em adx gadwqjko habh vkmejk, boq 
ak xbp hak peoqkj do Bwvtx’x mbgk pako ak xbdq dh.

jksdoqkjx. Bwvtx ztsykq dohe hak gbjjdbnk boq Ndooi 
gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq ads. Xhtqkohx pkjk abondon

mbgkx, veha eo hak hjbdo boq emm, xkkskq he vk htjokq 
hepbjq Abjji.

boq Jexk gjbokq bjetoq he weec bh hak ehakj 
xhtqkohx.

kuhjkskwi mbsetx.”

he selk, boq Abjji pbwckq bweonxdqk dh, pbhgadon adx
